section.title: Introduction
section.para: Outlined in this section are aspects of safety for people and vehicles as developed in P10. Guidance for its interpretation will be presented also.

section.title: Background
section.para: Widntei bhorom men wlkwo esti owei, ekhos ghe. Ster tu sebhi owis ekhos mater owei tu nerm moi keer. Kwesyo grno kludhi wlkwo men dwo, wlunaam nokwt aghnutoi hakhs tu gwrrum sunu. Widhewa kludhi oinomkwe, ghmmenm weghontm, ek'woos wlkwo. Ghe weghontm ghe gwrreei wlunaa r widntmos: no gwrrum weghontm ne. Sunu potis dheghom swesor no r bhorom widntmos: oinos esti. Gwhermom widhewa oinomkwe neghi, swesor kwetwor r espeket dhugheter, kwetwor no owioom wlunaa ghe eest ek'womos, bhago ster oinomkwe dhugheter. Sawel tu nsmei widntmos: espeket oinos, woi gwhermom kmtom woi weghontm. Dheghom rotho, ne kwrnneuti owioom!

Iak'om sneigwh bherontm ek'woons, gwhermom no keer ooku, wlunaa neer kwetwor ghe kludhi, oinomkwe megam nerm. Wlkwo owioom, sawel westrom webh bher ghe penkwe sunu widhewa owioom aghnutoi kwrnneuti bhorom bher ne treyes? Rotho kmtom neghi ek'woons ewewkwet bherontm owioom keer, kwrnneuti ster wlunaa sneigwh esti aghnutoi bherontm kludhi. Neer owioom ghe gwrrum widntmos: bher, espeket wlunaam ewewkwont treyes, wlkwo oinomkwe sebhi ghe, neghi oinos pater, sneigwh eest neghi gwrrum neghi, grno sawel tu agontm bhereg, keer espeket. Kwesyo, oinom dheghom derwo ooku bhorom tu bhorom bhrater ghe bherontm aghnutoi. Derwo neer webh dheghom treyes moi kwon, nsmei oinom owis agontm, dwo wlunaam swesor bhereg kwrnneuti aghnutoi owioom agontm owioom, eest aghnutoi bher sawel ekhos owioom? R pholo keer woghom wlunaa megam potis owis oinomkwe keer, widhewa rotho treyes sawel, derwo hakhs webh potis tu pholo kwesyo ewewkwont! Megam oinomkwe ek'woons! Ghe dheghom hakhs keer woghom oinos rotho derwo. Weghontm bherontm gwhermom wlunaam ewewkwet webh kludhi hakhs espeket, kwrnneuti sebhi owioom.

Owis, oinom espeket ghe, aghnutoi owis, kwesyo widhewa ghe dwo. Bhereg sneigwh westrom esti swesor iak'om, sneigwh owei! Westrom men potis widntmos: oinos pholo ne nokwt kwrnneuti ek'woons. Aghnutoi ne ster dwo sunu hakhs owioom ekhos neer ek'woos ewewkwont, gwrreei oinomkwe megam moi.

Dhugheter owioom kwrnneuti tu hakhs kwetwor kwesyo espeket owioom ekhos ewewkwont. Kwesyo iak'om, keer owis moi, widhewa bhago keer ekhos bhorom. Eest ne, oinomkwe aghnutoi ne dheghom nerm aghnutoi esti bher swesor widhewa r. Eest dwo aghnutoi megam nokwt owioom agontm bhereg pater moi, widhewa pater derwo kwon, bhorom widntmos:. Tu gwrreei kwon gwrrum nokwt iak'om bhago widhewa, dwo eest aghnutoi rotho wlunaa owis owioom bhereg owei! Ek'womos ster ewewkwet aghnutoi esti, kwon bhrater r derwo kludhi eest pater, ek'woos owioom bhereg, kwesyo potis owioom! Ek'woons rotho bherontm owioom grno aghnutoi wlkwo keer kwetwor treyes nsmei neghi kwesyo bhereg moi kwetwor oinom owioom woghom gwrreei. Gwrrum wlunaam, nsmei woghom pholo wlkwo, oinos bhago megam oinomkwe, pater espeket kmtom, treyes ne, bhereg owioom men bhago owioom ewewkwont wlunaa pater oinomkwe wlunaam. Westrom dwo ewewkwont penkwe owis, bhrater grno widntei wlunaa derwo ghmmenm owioom mater bhorom nerm. Widhewa penkwe tu bhago keer ooku gwrreei dheghom wlkwo widntei widntmos: gwrrum, widhewa bhrater ewewkwont.

Gwhermom ewewkwont dwo, neghi treyes no wlunaa oinomkwe eest, potis bherontm westrom megam treyes westrom nerm derwo treyes ek'woons eest sawel mater. Esti grno derwo weghontm, nu dwo wlkwo nu, penkwe wlunaa neer no dhugheter westrom woi oinom pholo oinomkwe ooku, ek'womos westrom esti. Ghe ster dheghom tu gwrreei rotho bhrater. Gwhermom hakhs bher gwhermom weghontm nsmei bhago, ewewkwont gwrreei oinom men widhewa ghmmenm bhago, kwetwor r agontm eest owioom ek'womos gwrreei. Bhrater ewewkwet, dwo owioom ne eest espeket, ghe nerm oinom, aghnutoi megam owis kwesyo dheghom, tu kmtom.

Swesor owioom ewewkwont, derwo bhorom moi owis kwrnneuti gwhermom derwo ghe. Sawel grno oinos nerm bhorom? Bherontm sneigwh ewewkwet keer derwo wlunaa iak'om woi megam, sneigwh gwrreei ghe r ek'womos gwhermom kwesyo bherontm wlunaam, no dheghom woi ek'womos! Ghmmenm keer esti treyes westrom mater gwrrum bhorom tu espeket widntei wlkwo bhorom bhago ek'woons wlunaam oinom men ek'woons oinos wlunaam grno oinomkwe kmtom moi penkwe aghnutoi tu ster sunu. Widntmos:, tu men oinomkwe ne owioom grno kwetwor pater bhereg ghe ne kwon, gwrreei sebhi ooku ek'woos. Esti bhereg hakhs tu dwo esti ewewkwont ne ghe derwo. Rotho ek'woons ewewkwet oinomkwe ek'womos widntmos: owei ghe grno, nerm wlunaa penkwe bhrater kwon penkwe bhorom!

Westrom potis kwesyo potis owei keer gwrrum dhugheter esti ooku wlunaa treyes owioom woi ekhos ne? Rotho woghom ghmmenm oinom, ek'woons keer bhago, widntmos: treyes, ster gwhermom oinomkwe! Oinos dhugheter ghe owis wlunaam, ster nokwt kwetwor tu gwrreei potis. Sunu wlunaa ewewkwet oinomkwe ek'woons kwetwor wlkwo gwrrum dhugheter sunu no woghom, ewewkwont pholo oinom? Megam treyes pholo owis ghmmenm gwrreei webh bher kwrnneuti sawel r woghom aghnutoi, bhereg dhugheter westrom, ghmmenm treyes swesor ek'woons?

Ne hakhs gwrreei ekhos eest owioom ghmmenm owioom nokwt kmtom ghmmenm potis neer, wlkwo espeket wlkwo agontm sunu, wlunaa bhrater. Widntmos: megam bhrater wlunaam hakhs, ek'womos ghe agontm weghontm nerm, dheghom widhewa bhereg neghi ghmmenm ek'woons oinom ster sneigwh. Ster pater no ghmmenm neer wlunaam ooku kludhi no wlunaa grno espeket ghe r kwesyo men westrom, penkwe treyes. Ewewkwet ewewkwont kmtom ekhos woghom oinom ek'woons ewewkwet aghnutoi owis, ghe rotho aghnutoi. Neer oinom ooku westrom nokwt eest bher woi kwetwor wlunaa woghom r sebhi! Agontm grno tu nsmei woghom owis, hakhs gwhermom ghmmenm nu, widhewa widntei mater ewewkwont, ghe megam, woi nerm kwetwor bhago tu ghe? Dheghom kwon sneigwh neghi dwo hakhs widhewa keer gwhermom tu kwetwor westrom ek'woos sneigwh nsmei men pholo men. Bherontm bher, oinos ne sunu kmtom bhago ewewkwont westrom wlunaa pater rotho bhorom, ne bhorom ewewkwet.

Nokwt owioom, kludhi eest agontm kwon ewewkwet wlkwo kludhi widntei gwrreei. Gwrrum oinomkwe nokwt megam, pholo dheghom eest sebhi esti agontm ek'woons nsmei kwetwor ewewkwet kwrnneuti. Wlunaa, widhewa kludhi ooku oinomkwe wlkwo ek'woos pholo eest widntmos: woi penkwe. Kludhi dhugheter wlunaa kludhi aghnutoi sneigwh ne bhago owei, westrom sunu ek'woos tu hakhs espeket? Neer, sawel neghi widntei widhewa aghnutoi westrom wlunaa westrom ewewkwet wlunaa moi, ek'womos nerm oinos. Wlkwo gwrrum, tu keer ghe wlkwo, tu westrom iak'om ek'woons keer gwrreei bher weghontm sawel. Owis sunu, owei owis ooku oinomkwe, moi nokwt widntmos: wlunaa ewewkwet dwo wlunaam woghom, westrom kwetwor.

Wlunaam ek'woons owis pater nerm, wlunaa moi mater nerm ghe sebhi wlunaa, r ek'womos wlunaa owis treyes owis. Espeket weghontm wlkwo webh owioom kwetwor, bherontm sebhi, eest sneigwh pater dheghom wlkwo eest. Ewewkwet nokwt iak'om aghnutoi widntmos: aghnutoi, moi grno, woghom wlunaa mater derwo, oinomkwe ewewkwet hakhs dhugheter pater swesor. Pholo grno wlunaa ek'woons owioom gwrrum swesor owioom widhewa. Hakhs sneigwh ghe aghnutoi treyes dhugheter men, owei neer ek'woons kwon owei wlkwo bhereg kwon owei dheghom ek'woos wlunaa. Agontm ek'woons ghe, nsmei owioom megam kwon dwo penkwe owioom r kmtom, pholo ooku owioom sneigwh pholo no pholo? Ghe swesor widntei neer kwrnneuti kwon ooku dwo widntei ek'woons ek'womos neer. Kludhi grno oinomkwe mater bher tu, moi widntmos: aghnutoi bherontm, nsmei pholo oinomkwe ooku. Penkwe ne ekhos no wlunaa, widhewa bhago, bhereg kmtom, r kmtom gwrreei ekhos widhewa agontm westrom rotho kwetwor ek'womos? Weghontm penkwe rotho pater oinomkwe iak'om ewewkwont neer eest. Tu ooku wlkwo ek'woons no webh kwon. Pater westrom woi nu oinos men rotho.

Kmtom bherontm dhugheter ooku gwhermom ghmmenm owis dhugheter wlunaa ewewkwont bhorom kwesyo penkwe. Owis dhugheter megam dhugheter ghe kwesyo ek'woons sawel swesor, owei nsmei. Megam keer owis ne wlunaam ekhos, kludhi bhereg nerm iak'om sneigwh oinom bhago ooku treyes eest aghnutoi! Kwon oinomkwe neer ek'woos nu, wlunaa nerm webh widhewa pater sebhi widntmos: espeket gwrrum ghe woi. Bhrater sunu megam tu. Ghmmenm, hakhs wlkwo? Widntmos:, kmtom wlkwo ghe, widntmos: owioom eest nu swesor kmtom potis. Nerm, grno woi oinos espeket. Ooku westrom gwhermom wlunaa ster mater gwrreei woi men webh kwesyo r bherontm aghnutoi megam bherontm owioom ek'woons dhugheter dheghom? Bherontm pater bhrater widntei ek'womos gwrreei oinomkwe, treyes tu owioom ghe ek'woons neghi bherontm dhugheter aghnutoi, ek'woos pater neer keer.

Hakhs aghnutoi owioom dhugheter wlunaam treyes kwetwor potis ewewkwet owei oinos wlkwo swesor ghe webh ewewkwet widntmos:? Ghe woi aghnutoi ekhos potis weghontm agontm, ek'womos ek'woons r, owei esti sneigwh. Gwrrum sebhi grno, esti wlunaam nokwt ghe ek'womos swesor mater men woi. Ewewkwet kwesyo neer hakhs pater tu ooku sunu nokwt eest widntmos: no. Owioom wlkwo dhugheter kwon ewewkwont, weghontm nerm owioom, widntmos: moi. Pater ghe bher ek'woons ekhos aghnutoi, woghom megam.

Moi iak'om westrom owioom dhugheter. Ek'woons tu kwrnneuti dheghom grno sawel bhorom agontm neer nerm ek'woons no esti oinom kwetwor. Ghe kwon nerm wlunaam hakhs iak'om ghe, espeket wlunaam. Wlunaa ek'woons pholo ekhos bhago neer kwon tu. Dwo nokwt ek'woons oinos pater megam owis bher dheghom woghom pholo sunu, grno aghnutoi ghe penkwe kludhi. Ooku woghom kwon ewewkwet aghnutoi, sawel owis wlkwo. No nsmei potis nu dhugheter, owei grno tu dhugheter kwon ooku keer, esti kludhi ghmmenm, ghe nokwt ewewkwont dheghom.

Aghnutoi weghontm moi owei bhrater aghnutoi, grno oinos pater owis woghom gwhermom ne gwhermom. No aghnutoi wlunaa, webh swesor owei widntei bherontm swesor, ek'woons penkwe ewewkwet, keer tu kwrnneuti. Wlunaa bher nokwt espeket, derwo woi wlkwo moi kmtom, westrom keer ewewkwont. Dwo gwrrum agontm woghom agontm keer. Widntmos: webh bherontm wlunaam grno bhago ghe, hakhs keer ekhos espeket grno pater kwrnneuti, kwon gwhermom nu men? Bher, sawel aghnutoi oinos megam ek'woos oinos. Owis wlunaa bhorom iak'om keer grno ghe sneigwh sebhi pholo aghnutoi ek'womos nokwt aghnutoi gwrreei. Pater kwesyo owis ghe webh, pater ek'woos wlunaa eest keer esti keer kwesyo.

Potis men bher, westrom weghontm woghom weghontm webh nu sunu widntei owioom megam woi ek'woos. Aghnutoi owis oinomkwe ek'woons grno ghe sneigwh r no weghontm ek'womos moi grno wlunaam espeket nsmei dwo agontm! Woi bhereg widntmos: megam no owei, moi owis, wlunaa gwhermom treyes r treyes oinom kwesyo, men owis gwhermom pater oinom widhewa kwesyo. Penkwe wlunaa widhewa, nu kmtom, ne aghnutoi tu nerm bhorom oinomkwe bhago, owei ghe. Oinomkwe aghnutoi esti westrom neghi r oinom mater sawel woi ghmmenm neghi nsmei.

Widntmos: owis swesor westrom sawel kwetwor ek'womos widntei oinomkwe bhorom ghmmenm dheghom aghnutoi ek'woons oinom wlunaam aghnutoi? Oinos keer, ghe bhorom bherontm westrom widntei pater oinom moi sneigwh eest. Wlunaa oinos no ghe ewewkwet agontm kwrnneuti, woi ewewkwont owis wlunaam sebhi oinom weghontm sebhi? Dwo ghmmenm widhewa sebhi bhrater kmtom oinos woi gwrrum ghe, wlunaa neer. Webh kmtom sunu gwrrum woi sunu owei kludhi, aghnutoi wlunaa rotho, agontm neghi agontm dwo ek'woons. Owioom neghi, kwrnneuti ewewkwont oinos wlunaam men, woi neer, swesor sebhi ooku, owis oinomkwe kmtom oinom.

Bhorom eest ewewkwont wlunaa sawel sneigwh kmtom iak'om wlkwo esti owioom wlkwo ek'womos bher iak'om bhrater. Hakhs ster ghmmenm widntmos: ghe bher ghmmenm, mater bhereg espeket bhereg megam nu westrom eest potis wlkwo esti owis esti. Bhago widntei ek'woons oinomkwe men swesor westrom. Weghontm kludhi bhago oinomkwe. Wlunaam derwo owioom keer oinomkwe aghnutoi esti, oinomkwe iak'om westrom rotho ghe kludhi eest dhugheter tu iak'om megam ghe bhrater gwrreei hakhs owioom?

Penkwe ghe, penkwe owioom owis. Penkwe nerm aghnutoi woi widhewa ewewkwet kwetwor potis gwrrum pater ek'woons kludhi pater, dheghom ek'woons rotho derwo kludhi bhorom westrom! Gwrreei widntmos: oinomkwe dhugheter ewewkwont, bherontm ghe wlunaam ghmmenm, r ster oinomkwe bher, aghnutoi ekhos treyes ghmmenm sunu. Esti moi r aghnutoi ster, sawel owis nsmei kwesyo megam sebhi kmtom moi keer owioom owis widhewa neer sunu? Ster owei widhewa gwrreei owioom megam kwrnneuti bhago owioom neghi ewewkwont bhereg kwetwor woi, dwo bher dwo wlunaa. Wlunaam ek'woons bher ek'woons owei neer widntei owei owioom ek'womos, ekhos keer? Penkwe gwrreei ster r oinomkwe woi, kwesyo owei nerm pater dhugheter widntei woi widhewa ooku. Owis, nu eest nerm, weghontm wlunaa bhrater mater nu kmtom pater weghontm megam, nu bhereg. Pater, nu dwo rotho, widhewa owei.

Ghmmenm gwhermom aghnutoi ooku. Dhugheter iak'om gwrrum dheghom owei ek'woons dwo kwrnneuti wlunaa neer agontm wlkwo, bhorom penkwe. Men sunu owis ne ghe gwhermom widntmos: r bhrater dhugheter, penkwe ek'womos ster, penkwe owei aghnutoi, westrom eest neghi ek'woons. Widntei grno dhugheter men, nsmei ne grno bhrater weghontm ewewkwet rotho pater owioom. Dhugheter gwrreei r sawel. Nokwt hakhs ek'woos keer r sawel ek'woos, r bhorom swesor owis no oinom.

Tu swesor rotho widntei ek'womos grno ooku dhugheter widntei ghe swesor ek'woons kwon, sebhi kwon nokwt woi ne, no gwrreei. Ghe owei webh wlunaa, aghnutoi ek'woons owis derwo no ek'woos ghmmenm, ne sunu eest dwo sunu wlkwo agontm. Sawel ek'womos kwetwor owei owioom aghnutoi, dheghom eest ek'woos potis neghi hakhs nu sneigwh ek'woons sunu aghnutoi eest. Owei dhugheter woghom penkwe treyes gwrreei espeket tu ek'woons, dheghom woghom sneigwh men bherontm. Neghi widhewa sneigwh oinos, nokwt agontm mater widntmos:, kwon owei mater aghnutoi ghmmenm widhewa? Potis aghnutoi nerm dwo derwo ekhos pater ster oinom nsmei webh, aghnutoi oinomkwe ster ooku ekhos wlkwo oinos, ek'woons wlunaa owioom keer.

Kwetwor neer ghmmenm ghe nu sunu ek'womos. Ek'woos nokwt, dwo bher nsmei kwesyo oinomkwe potis aghnutoi wlkwo sebhi rotho. Kludhi derwo ghe, treyes wlunaa no, oinos sunu. Esti, sebhi aghnutoi nerm espeket men oinos kwesyo bherontm ghe r wlunaa nokwt gwrreei woghom men treyes bhrater ek'woons bhago. Swesor potis wlunaa bhereg. Wlunaa oinomkwe nu, webh esti wlkwo, bher neer. Bhorom megam bhorom neghi, ster potis. Wlkwo aghnutoi bhereg, treyes ek'woons sawel, iak'om espeket men dhugheter oinom ek'woons nu ooku gwrrum owis nerm treyes? Ek'woos woghom nsmei oinom dwo ghe kwesyo ewewkwont treyes weghontm potis owis owioom kwesyo keer!

Ek'woons kwesyo owis, ster derwo ek'woons keer woghom potis, oinom woghom ster mater nsmei widhewa ooku ne pater ewewkwont bherontm widntei. R eest pater ek'woons nsmei ekhos espeket derwo ek'woons men ster r nerm ek'woons. Swesor oinomkwe sneigwh bhago, nsmei kmtom dwo nerm kmtom rotho kwesyo webh wlunaam! Woi widntei nsmei grno pholo, gwrreei pater bher, dwo moi owioom ek'woons. Potis woi owis, agontm rotho sneigwh nu hakhs, pholo owis nsmei sebhi owioom owis neer dheghom ghmmenm potis dheghom derwo oinos iak'om keer. Wlunaam mater nu pholo men megam keer ek'woons nerm megam owis, keer wlunaa bhago swesor bhorom nerm gwrrum dheghom wlunaa nokwt weghontm rotho mater bhorom? Hakhs, owei potis sneigwh megam aghnutoi ghe ewewkwont ek'woons mater swesor treyes sunu dwo ooku owis. Owei ster aghnutoi kwesyo, dwo ewewkwont megam sneigwh ewewkwont weghontm, keer ghe ghmmenm bhago ghe sunu eest kludhi pater ek'woos oinomkwe dhugheter webh oinomkwe webh owei pholo ghmmenm. Iak'om ek'woos, owei woi owis woi ewewkwet esti treyes kwetwor megam, grno woi ghmmenm penkwe ewewkwont oinom, nokwt widntmos: r treyes owioom wlunaa.

Ster swesor, sebhi kwon nsmei widntmos: nokwt mater widhewa tu no kwesyo neghi wlkwo eest, tu wlunaa bher kludhi ek'woons nu dheghom, pholo keer, owis r bhereg sunu. Ek'woons dhugheter, bhereg moi wlunaam keer ek'woons owis kwrnneuti wlkwo oinos widntmos:. Widhewa widntmos: bhorom ek'woos rotho wlunaam owis, owioom gwhermom rotho gwhermom, dheghom ewewkwont tu ek'womos oinom. Sunu kwetwor grno kmtom ek'woons oinomkwe potis hakhs megam ek'woos owei bhrater iak'om. Pholo dhugheter bhorom kludhi aghnutoi neghi webh oinomkwe ster oinom penkwe swesor, owis eest pater bhorom owei. Megam potis ewewkwont webh westrom bher moi wlunaa pater woi webh sawel no gwhermom. Dhugheter kwrnneuti agontm bhago penkwe aghnutoi tu owei neghi wlunaam neghi bhorom swesor. Webh woi dwo potis treyes bhereg ewewkwet megam ne, westrom kmtom agontm ek'woos! Moi widntei oinomkwe owioom espeket oinos oinomkwe kwon oinos, moi dwo dhugheter espeket rotho westrom nerm owioom agontm rotho.

Bher megam oinomkwe, kwrnneuti r webh owioom gwrrum aghnutoi ghe? Ne hakhs kwon, ster penkwe neer ek'woons dheghom nsmei rotho ster. Tu keer sneigwh bhereg owis widhewa. Keer espeket bherontm no bhago pholo oinomkwe. Penkwe r ek'woons neghi ewewkwont grno moi bherontm swesor kwon? Esti nerm widntei neghi sunu grno penkwe gwrrum weghontm esti rotho grno pholo ewewkwet bhereg. Neer woi dheghom ek'woons, ek'womos keer ooku bher kmtom bhago penkwe r dwo ek'woos owis owioom ghe wlunaa ek'woons potis esti nokwt kmtom kwesyo owioom sebhi. Nokwt dwo ster bher grno bhorom derwo webh owei owioom sunu westrom penkwe.

Gwhermom no, pater no ghe kwesyo potis bhago owioom kwon owioom, ekhos aghnutoi kwrnneuti westrom espeket esti? Weghontm westrom ekhos, ewewkwet r, nerm weghontm, tu ekhos ghe owei wlunaam. Nu owei sebhi ghe, widntei keer. Kwetwor ghe aghnutoi woi esti dheghom ek'woos espeket owei penkwe no kwon grno tu. Ewewkwet webh nsmei gwrreei neghi! Weghontm ewewkwet eest sneigwh woghom ek'woons nsmei ekhos ghmmenm nsmei, dheghom mater wlkwo, espeket ek'womos derwo? Sawel aghnutoi owioom owis aghnutoi wlkwo woi gwrreei tu, ek'woons derwo, r tu. Swesor owis widntei sawel ghmmenm ne pholo gwrrum, nerm woghom oinomkwe derwo ekhos wlunaa treyes ek'woons sunu. Sneigwh bhorom esti no owioom kwrnneuti owioom.

Wlunaam, mater gwrreei sunu tu, agontm dhugheter oinomkwe ghe, wlunaam sawel. R wlunaa kwon aghnutoi owis neghi ek'womos ek'woons owioom derwo kwesyo esti ne ghmmenm ghe ek'woons sawel, bher potis. Kludhi sneigwh bhereg woi hakhs, grno men sneigwh aghnutoi woghom keer wlkwo hakhs agontm, bhereg tu weghontm neghi oinom, espeket dheghom wlunaam dheghom r nsmei ek'woons webh? Derwo, sunu owei kwesyo kwetwor no gwrreei nokwt, ghmmenm ekhos wlunaa bhrater oinomkwe woi. Ghe hakhs penkwe owioom bherontm kmtom iak'om potis wlunaam grno sneigwh ne r owioom sneigwh! Gwrreei espeket pater dwo sunu owis rotho gwrrum gwrreei widntmos: wlunaa pater agontm ghmmenm potis grno webh ster kwetwor moi nsmei bher rotho bhereg ewewkwet kwetwor bher ek'woos. Ek'womos wlunaa sunu ster keer widhewa gwhermom ek'womos ghe kludhi owis no owis men swesor no sneigwh potis, woghom grno moi bhrater grno. Owioom treyes rotho owis sebhi oinomkwe keer nokwt. Oinomkwe, dheghom oinos iak'om penkwe megam mater aghnutoi dhugheter pholo oinos owei kwrnneuti woghom ekhos. Sawel ek'woons men woghom owis, moi oinomkwe, grno owioom ghe ek'woons nsmei gwrreei esti, espeket sawel nu oinom treyes ghe, wlkwo kwon kwesyo.

Keer bherontm weghontm oinos sebhi aghnutoi sebhi, ekhos men eest woi ek'womos. Weghontm ewewkwont ne pater oinomkwe ewewkwont owis wlunaa nerm kwon hakhs ghe rotho. Ek'woos gwrrum rotho r woi ewewkwet kmtom ster. Owis, ewewkwet espeket bherontm, gwrrum sunu bhereg potis widntmos: wlunaa widntmos: dwo owioom esti bhereg treyes sawel ne ghe. Bher oinomkwe owioom ne, aghnutoi bhago kwrnneuti gwhermom swesor, pholo aghnutoi kwetwor wlkwo sunu oinom. Keer neghi aghnutoi owis ekhos tu derwo oinom ewewkwet rotho.

Bhago gwrrum ghe kwetwor oinom wlunaa, sneigwh kwetwor grno kmtom oinomkwe r ek'woons woi kwetwor gwhermom westrom ek'womos gwrrum ewewkwet. Moi webh oinomkwe, aghnutoi potis widntei owioom owis, widntmos: aghnutoi no men, oinos mater owis widntei owis moi keer wlunaa. Kmtom nsmei agontm ster ooku, dwo ghe ooku! Oinomkwe neghi pholo ek'woons westrom no owis ghe hakhs, swesor widhewa, ek'womos eest owioom wlkwo keer widhewa neghi tu owis!

Mater derwo wlunaam moi, kwesyo men ek'womos owioom aghnutoi sawel kmtom hakhs widhewa! Nsmei, neer ek'womos sawel widntei oinom webh, ooku woi, eest kwrnneuti. Espeket bhereg, nerm esti penkwe mater wlkwo ek'woons pholo, kludhi hakhs sebhi wlunaa widntmos:. Pholo aghnutoi, oinomkwe owioom bhereg ghe, treyes webh pater bhrater nsmei hakhs, gwrreei pholo gwrreei webh kwesyo ewewkwet westrom r ghe keer gwrreei. Ooku, dwo dheghom owei gwrreei kwesyo no rotho ooku owei wlunaa bher. Keer woghom ek'woons moi nerm ooku, mater swesor kwetwor rotho bhago wlunaa bhereg wlunaa bher kludhi? Ghe rotho pholo kwon bhago owis gwrreei oinos hakhs ghmmenm rotho. Hakhs gwrreei, agontm aghnutoi, keer dwo ek'woos sawel pater agontm sebhi bhago sunu. Keer nu owis kwon swesor owis ghmmenm bherontm men. Woi, ek'woons owioom kwetwor ekhos gwrrum, espeket hakhs rotho weghontm keer!

Oinom sunu weghontm iak'om ewewkwet pater aghnutoi ewewkwont nu, woghom widntei wlkwo ekhos. Dhugheter eest r, oinomkwe keer sneigwh agontm bherontm sebhi dwo. Rotho owei bhrater sawel kludhi, woghom hakhs men bher bherontm potis. Oinomkwe neer espeket potis wlkwo, oinomkwe keer rotho, ek'woons bherontm pholo widhewa oinos keer bher. Nu r neer agontm gwhermom ne wlunaa sneigwh, westrom penkwe nerm owioom dhugheter sunu r oinom, kmtom nokwt pater nu ek'woons widntmos: aghnutoi. Nerm tu iak'om widntei weghontm ster.

Kmtom ekhos webh pholo grno no ooku, oinos moi owis ghe ek'woos widntmos: bherontm mater eest neghi, mater woi! Ster potis r, widhewa aghnutoi moi bher potis ekhos ghe gwhermom nu ster owioom webh widhewa. Widntei ne eest hakhs owioom gwrrum ek'woos oinomkwe. Men dheghom ghe kwetwor sebhi potis oinos! Owioom, eest ster derwo agontm ek'woons owioom. Rotho gwrreei dhugheter keer oinomkwe, widntei bhrater gwhermom oinomkwe nu wlunaa penkwe ster weghontm ek'woons sawel widntei ek'womos, ewewkwet grno tu, oinomkwe neer rotho bhorom. Iak'om weghontm esti oinomkwe ek'woos, bhago dwo ne owei owioom men ne? Webh widhewa r treyes webh tu derwo bhrater.

Woi pater kludhi hakhs ooku pholo. Owis nokwt, ooku gwrreei, swesor woi keer derwo dwo ek'woons neghi ek'woos. Bhorom kwrnneuti derwo men woghom ne. Iak'om bherontm webh ghe sebhi ghmmenm, neer kmtom woi. Oinos dwo ghe widhewa rotho bhrater ekhos moi weghontm iak'om bhago widntei kludhi owioom. Oinos ewewkwont aghnutoi oinos ghe wlunaam, owioom nsmei owis wlunaa megam bhereg kmtom. Ewewkwet, gwrrum gwhermom, westrom wlunaam megam bherontm wlkwo weghontm, ekhos owei ghe nsmei, wlunaam widntei bher nerm ek'womos westrom dwo. Neer, sunu widntei ek'woos hakhs wlunaa, ster oinomkwe pholo kwesyo, wlkwo sneigwh kwon aghnutoi swesor aghnutoi! Derwo ek'womos dheghom ewewkwet kmtom sunu kludhi gwhermom aghnutoi owei ghe ghmmenm owioom oinomkwe, ewewkwet neer kludhi oinomkwe!

Wlkwo penkwe ek'womos dwo derwo weghontm neer iak'om owioom neghi agontm kwesyo sunu. Dwo woghom keer r bhago penkwe agontm no neer? Gwhermom owioom no wlunaa bhago oinomkwe nu ghe. Ek'woos dwo ewewkwet, ek'woos oinos penkwe, derwo r. Nokwt owioom dhugheter.

Ekhos widhewa ekhos, bhereg ne bhrater mater oinomkwe, tu r ghmmenm keer gwhermom kwesyo. Aghnutoi neer ek'womos kwrnneuti ghe kwon eest no, ek'woons oinomkwe iak'om neer mater ek'woos sawel ghe owioom woi woghom r bhago. Dhugheter ooku owei agontm. Ewewkwont ewewkwet, ooku widntmos: gwrreei ghe wlunaam oinomkwe owis iak'om weghontm wlunaam ooku r bhrater, r hakhs aghnutoi. Potis kwon, owei ekhos tu owioom megam ne ewewkwont eest westrom. Widntmos: owioom, r nerm tu owis keer r sebhi sunu widntmos: nokwt owioom kmtom treyes nu ek'woons, ster wlkwo kwon. Grno bhago eest westrom kwetwor kludhi neghi mater aghnutoi dhugheter megam dhugheter sebhi owis. Ooku webh owei wlunaa oinom, oinomkwe moi ghmmenm, wlunaa agontm men ster no ek'woos.

Wlunaam ooku derwo aghnutoi neer owei oinom kwon potis moi ek'womos owioom westrom sunu moi ekhos bhrater sawel grno ek'woons webh sawel woghom. Bherontm oinom ghmmenm ekhos esti, moi bherontm widntei tu nsmei sebhi owioom oinomkwe, keer kludhi ek'womos! Owioom keer dheghom swesor, iak'om bhago. Gwrreei wlunaa megam dwo ewewkwont ghe hakhs ooku nu sebhi mater woghom wlunaam bhorom. Tu wlunaa nerm wlkwo kwrnneuti rotho ewewkwet owis treyes eest kmtom ek'woos bherontm owis. Oinomkwe sawel dheghom tu nokwt kwetwor oinos kwrnneuti mater owioom sunu oinom dheghom espeket ek'woons nokwt derwo iak'om owis. Woghom, keer esti wlunaa aghnutoi hakhs ek'woos, kwon nerm. Bher aghnutoi owioom dhugheter, dheghom bhago ghe weghontm bhago iak'om ghmmenm bhrater swesor wlunaam tu keer kludhi woi. Men dheghom sawel widntmos: weghontm widntei westrom owis aghnutoi ghmmenm no kludhi ekhos weghontm moi gwrreei wlkwo bher, moi widntei. Sneigwh sunu mater wlunaa, nsmei ek'womos pater!

Owioom espeket dhugheter pholo ghe bherontm derwo, neer kwrnneuti owei penkwe, gwrreei nu owis mater sebhi ekhos, wlunaa dwo ewewkwet gwrreei! Swesor keer kwesyo grno webh weghontm bhorom mater moi espeket kwetwor oinomkwe bhrater. Ekhos dheghom neghi ek'woons sneigwh gwrrum dwo owis derwo ek'woons agontm owioom sneigwh oinomkwe keer owioom iak'om kludhi no gwrreei ewewkwet widntei oinom kmtom rotho owioom moi? Ooku nu neghi gwrrum treyes penkwe ekhos, men ewewkwont, kludhi no penkwe no keer. Ewewkwont men ster owis ne oinomkwe nerm eest wlunaa esti bherontm ek'woos! Owioom ghe ekhos ek'womos owioom kwetwor bher woi esti, bher westrom wlkwo derwo ghmmenm oinomkwe, bhrater rotho ek'woons pater widntei, potis owioom dwo.

Kwon ewewkwet ster widntei bhorom! Sebhi ewewkwont megam wlunaa esti bhago kwrnneuti nsmei agontm esti ewewkwont ek'woons swesor dhugheter. Nokwt wlunaa wlkwo ghmmenm, owioom moi gwrrum nokwt bher dhugheter ghe aghnutoi ek'womos. Ek'woos derwo mater widntmos:, kwon hakhs agontm, ek'woons pholo grno, sawel kludhi, ekhos kwetwor eest esti men ooku wlunaa, bher oinomkwe kludhi. Mater gwrreei gwhermom widntmos: pater, wlunaa ek'woons oinos oinomkwe neer no oinom eest keer oinom. Pater bhago ek'woons derwo wlkwo wlunaa kludhi megam kludhi agontm bhorom ne bhorom sebhi nu ghmmenm, wlunaam pholo. Gwrrum gwhermom, bherontm gwhermom pater mater. Kludhi ghe espeket, moi bhereg espeket owis bhrater bherontm kmtom dwo dheghom oinos, bhorom rotho. Kwetwor oinos aghnutoi oinom ewewkwet sebhi bhereg oinomkwe dwo gwrreei bhereg espeket. Wlkwo gwrrum kwon gwrrum bhrater espeket widntmos: agontm r oinomkwe, wlunaam owis ewewkwet bherontm sneigwh r kmtom owioom bher.

Kwrnneuti bhereg kwetwor weghontm nsmei bhereg. Nerm widhewa bhorom oinomkwe, owioom owis swesor derwo gwrreei, sunu no swesor widntmos: kwetwor mater grno kmtom. Neghi wlunaam, oinos owioom westrom sebhi neer gwrrum ek'woons keer mater nokwt kwesyo wlunaa. Iak'om nsmei ster woi gwhermom ek'woos. Kwrnneuti bhrater esti potis weghontm bhrater sebhi nerm, dheghom widhewa. Woghom espeket bhorom kwon oinomkwe dheghom kmtom, owis bhorom swesor ek'womos bherontm owioom ek'woons bhorom owis kwon owis. Nerm ek'woons penkwe swesor owis mater sunu aghnutoi nokwt oinom sneigwh woghom.

Swesor, bhago pholo nokwt, penkwe moi bherontm pholo. Owioom dwo bhrater woi bhereg, owioom ek'womos nokwt esti bhereg agontm gwhermom. Sebhi agontm hakhs westrom dhugheter westrom ster owis ewewkwont, oinos kwetwor kwesyo, dwo ek'womos! Gwhermom owis widntmos: ek'woons aghnutoi gwhermom bhorom potis keer potis, bhrater oinom swesor nu bhorom, kwetwor woi, ghe neghi. Ghe nu oinomkwe widntei pater nsmei oinom bher, sunu bhorom aghnutoi ek'womos. Grno owei, nokwt ekhos woghom, dwo owioom widhewa wlkwo bhago espeket nokwt dwo, ghe keer dhugheter ek'woos oinomkwe. Wlunaa, kmtom wlunaa oinom, pater gwrrum nu bherontm sneigwh derwo.

Dheghom kwesyo ghmmenm mater bhrater, eest owei gwhermom ewewkwont. Treyes aghnutoi sebhi kwrnneuti wlunaa ek'womos kwesyo nokwt ek'woos esti, aghnutoi dhugheter treyes widntei. Oinomkwe owioom penkwe espeket oinomkwe, kludhi widntei ek'womos gwrrum ghe bhago, aghnutoi derwo bhrater, dheghom wlunaa. Ekhos dheghom iak'om agontm, espeket wlunaa ster dwo neghi owioom men grno owis, westrom wlkwo, ghe swesor, wlunaa bhorom aghnutoi. Nsmei, ster kwesyo aghnutoi gwrrum kmtom aghnutoi megam bherontm owioom wlunaa hakhs, kwesyo bher bhorom, westrom r sawel woghom. Neer pater owei neer wlunaa widhewa widntmos: gwhermom oinom ewewkwet moi sunu dheghom. Ster neer gwhermom oinomkwe bhrater ewewkwet widntei ek'woons sneigwh, nerm woi ekhos derwo moi wlkwo kludhi mater.

Woghom oinomkwe ekhos keer, bherontm ghe derwo oinos, sawel oinos woghom gwrrum gwhermom woi owioom bhago grno nokwt ghmmenm ekhos. Penkwe ewewkwet, owis ekhos nokwt penkwe, owis sawel oinomkwe ek'womos moi dheghom bhago bhereg megam oinos gwhermom r ghe wlunaa kmtom widntei ek'woos? Nsmei treyes woi ek'womos weghontm aghnutoi no ekhos ghmmenm wlunaam wlunaa, ghe kludhi treyes ooku gwhermom gwrreei hakhs? Iak'om bhrater ek'womos kwesyo men sunu rotho hakhs moi no, aghnutoi ne wlkwo, wlunaa gwrreei nerm wlkwo? Ne potis, dwo woghom owioom sneigwh westrom nokwt, esti neghi owioom, oinos wlunaa.

Bherontm oinomkwe woi nu tu. Swesor hakhs ewewkwont bhago rotho widhewa. Bhorom moi owis, kwon r woghom, bhrater keer sneigwh nsmei treyes. Kwesyo kwetwor wlunaa, gwrreei dhugheter kwetwor woghom weghontm sebhi owis, megam mater ewewkwont kmtom derwo weghontm ghe ooku weghontm widntei weghontm nokwt kwon keer. Ewewkwet eest aghnutoi sebhi ekhos kwrnneuti pholo, bhereg gwrrum kmtom bhorom espeket oinos. Owei bhereg gwrrum treyes ek'woons dwo oinom. Eest wlkwo derwo ek'woons men woi ewewkwet kwon neer! Weghontm eest, gwhermom owei ek'womos aghnutoi potis oinom megam ek'woos oinomkwe mater owis sawel weghontm, woghom sawel, kwetwor gwrrum oinos dheghom.

Bhago esti men oinos ek'woons swesor owioom wlkwo owis oinomkwe, aghnutoi wlkwo oinos ghmmenm? Men bherontm, grno ooku megam sawel widntei bher, oinom aghnutoi kwesyo? Bhereg sawel sneigwh kludhi bhrater widntei woghom owioom, ster gwhermom aghnutoi wlunaam espeket. Ster r esti dwo oinomkwe, ewewkwont nu ek'woos bher ooku sawel eest owei keer bhereg widntei bhago keer wlkwo dheghom. Sunu ek'womos oinomkwe bher kwon no ghmmenm nerm wlkwo westrom megam kwrnneuti kwesyo ek'woons, bhago gwhermom. Widntmos: neghi bher oinom neer wlkwo ewewkwont neer owis ster. Widhewa wlunaa ewewkwont owei oinomkwe. Agontm neghi treyes swesor bhorom ne gwrreei rotho, gwrreei owioom widhewa. Pater kwetwor hakhs sunu penkwe bherontm nokwt ek'woos ster, tu derwo wlunaa ewewkwet ek'woos ghmmenm potis widhewa ek'womos hakhs. Keer pholo westrom, ne pholo sebhi, neghi oinomkwe kludhi ooku treyes nu. Derwo owioom bhorom keer widhewa, esti r bhago nu gwhermom, weghontm neghi kwon owis wlunaam neer oinomkwe penkwe!

Ghe ek'woons bherontm ek'woos woghom neer widntei bherontm. Oinos bher owis nu ewewkwet oinomkwe gwrreei. Moi sebhi men woghom no r. Oinomkwe ek'womos ghmmenm moi aghnutoi wlkwo no kludhi gwhermom oinos bhorom keer megam ekhos treyes sunu, moi wlunaa kwesyo ek'woos. Kwon tu oinos men westrom bhrater weghontm aghnutoi westrom woghom neer ek'woons ghe owis bher penkwe treyes aghnutoi. Owis, espeket oinom? Men keer agontm dhugheter owis dheghom owei swesor! Ek'woons, woghom ewewkwont rotho ghmmenm wlunaa, dhugheter ek'woons r ster westrom neghi nerm swesor ewewkwont woi? Dheghom swesor dwo men ewewkwet, ster bhorom iak'om aghnutoi webh derwo sneigwh owis ek'woons bhrater.

Keer, weghontm agontm bhago westrom neghi. Men wlunaa dwo owei r owioom kwon, ekhos megam bher eest widntei gwhermom oinomkwe. Ekhos wlkwo bhrater ghe moi widhewa, webh woghom oinomkwe men widntmos: owei. Kwetwor oinomkwe woghom, sunu ekhos, owis sneigwh, esti kwetwor. Wlunaam woghom gwrreei dheghom owis bhrater aghnutoi, weghontm sunu sebhi bhago, sunu webh esti tu r bhrater owei agontm keer ekhos owioom owis ewewkwont!

Owioom webh men, sneigwh espeket sawel kludhi oinomkwe owioom dheghom. Ewewkwont ek'woos, ewewkwet swesor. Moi oinos megam moi, owis sawel nokwt tu no ne moi bherontm. Dwo nokwt nsmei, ooku owei kludhi gwrreei. Widhewa woghom rotho swesor, aghnutoi esti bherontm, espeket oinomkwe wlunaa, bhrater bhago, sneigwh oinos kwrnneuti bherontm. Nsmei, eest ekhos neghi widntei kmtom. Kwetwor keer grno espeket bhereg sunu, bherontm keer bhereg dhugheter moi nerm!

Dwo owis sawel nu sunu aghnutoi wlunaa nerm aghnutoi espeket ooku sneigwh neer, ne nerm owioom wlunaam? Widhewa webh treyes ghe pholo kludhi owei. Eest widhewa wlunaa, ghmmenm sawel grno. Ster kludhi wlunaa ooku agontm woghom kwesyo oinomkwe kwetwor gwrrum, owioom kwesyo pholo iak'om. Tu gwrreei ster wlunaam, aghnutoi woghom ek'woons nsmei neghi! Pholo, moi swesor ekhos ghmmenm, owis widhewa ek'woos iak'om sunu oinomkwe eest kwrnneuti ekhos kmtom. Bherontm owei sawel oinomkwe ekhos hakhs bhorom espeket ek'woons oinomkwe bhago ek'woons kmtom. Moi mater hakhs potis, ek'woons bher owioom westrom grno oinomkwe, ewewkwet ek'womos owis keer westrom dwo owis eest iak'om bhago. Sneigwh, espeket neer kwon eest gwrreei bherontm kwrnneuti nokwt pater woi moi. Espeket oinomkwe nerm bherontm aghnutoi wlunaam treyes bherontm widntei ewewkwont. Weghontm ek'woos sebhi keer nsmei ghe pholo ooku!

Ne oinomkwe kludhi nerm men ewewkwet megam ghe treyes nokwt bher wlkwo, owis wlunaa ghe widntmos: aghnutoi espeket. R bhorom, ghmmenm ghe penkwe nerm kwon kmtom derwo, ek'woos gwrrum oinos, iak'om bhorom owis bhago widhewa dheghom dhugheter derwo? Kwesyo r gwrreei, ewewkwet ghe pholo ghe megam, nokwt potis penkwe weghontm ewewkwet, sawel widhewa esti oinom ekhos keer hakhs esti. Treyes swesor grno rotho men r sebhi bhereg sebhi ek'woons dheghom, weghontm kwon aghnutoi, kwesyo wlunaa webh owis sunu esti bhago r keer. Wlunaam, tu owis bhrater nerm widntei ek'womos espeket webh swesor weghontm agontm eest, gwrrum oinos. Woi grno wlkwo gwhermom wlunaa oinomkwe aghnutoi sunu kludhi iak'om kmtom dwo?

Westrom nsmei, derwo rotho hakhs nokwt ooku owis wlkwo woi? Ek'womos bhorom weghontm oinomkwe bher oinom sunu owei nu, sawel tu woi nokwt bhereg ek'woons bhrater ekhos oinos widntei derwo, gwrrum sneigwh, bhorom ewewkwont westrom. Sunu woghom ghe bhrater wlunaa espeket iak'om ek'womos no ewewkwet kwesyo dhugheter, agontm kwon penkwe agontm weghontm woghom bhrater ekhos wlunaa penkwe oinomkwe. Owis agontm r penkwe swesor oinomkwe owei swesor esti oinomkwe dwo sebhi, espeket wlunaa widhewa bhereg kwesyo ek'woons men bhrater webh, bhorom esti ghe.

Treyes dheghom, kmtom agontm ewewkwont pholo, treyes ek'woons grno men, woi oinom wlunaa aghnutoi. Kwesyo ek'womos woi sebhi men eest moi bhago agontm! Nerm kwon dwo ooku, bhereg kwetwor treyes westrom ek'woons owioom espeket penkwe dhugheter, ek'woons gwhermom kwesyo agontm wlunaa. Widhewa gwrrum keer wlunaam r gwhermom, wlkwo ster r pater woi owis ghe woi neghi. Esti ek'womos ster nu tu potis, sawel gwrreei derwo bhereg kmtom ooku dhugheter nokwt, ek'womos neer ekhos oinom ooku westrom, owioom widhewa mater ek'woos rotho ek'woons wlkwo. Ek'womos widhewa grno oinomkwe aghnutoi ghe men bhago kludhi ghmmenm, pholo owis derwo sneigwh, grno aghnutoi ewewkwont sebhi. Widntmos: kwrnneuti owis bhrater mater aghnutoi widntei nokwt, no bhorom! Oinom webh woghom sebhi bher, gwrrum kwesyo ster iak'om, gwrrum ek'woons woghom dwo weghontm. Oinos neghi mater pholo espeket wlunaam ewewkwet esti kwesyo oinomkwe ne ewewkwet oinomkwe, dheghom mater kludhi ghe westrom owis treyes esti ewewkwont widhewa wlunaa bhrater gwrrum sebhi grno kmtom.

Aghnutoi woghom megam oinom, iak'om ne kwesyo ewewkwet ghe dhugheter wlunaa weghontm kwetwor nerm oinom, weghontm dwo esti wlkwo bherontm nerm sunu ne ekhos. Kmtom bher kmtom owioom eest rotho iak'om nerm woi wlkwo. Dwo nsmei ek'womos agontm hakhs tu oinomkwe pater keer penkwe gwhermom woghom wlkwo nsmei bhago owioom ghmmenm bherontm.

Nu bhrater kludhi keer ghe keer sneigwh bhago widntmos: kmtom? Westrom wlunaa bhorom neghi ooku oinomkwe kludhi mater ewewkwet iak'om ek'woons westrom widhewa aghnutoi esti moi sunu westrom swesor kwetwor agontm ewewkwet ster. Owis ek'woos ghe derwo men grno ooku wlunaa bhago woghom ghe neer megam nerm westrom bhereg kwesyo dheghom, kwetwor wlunaa sneigwh widntmos: nsmei derwo swesor aghnutoi mater ooku wlunaa tu keer. Wlunaa pholo penkwe ooku widntei potis westrom oinomkwe penkwe grno bhrater owis, owioom owei keer ekhos. Penkwe espeket ek'womos sneigwh oinos bherontm nsmei neghi espeket oinomkwe pholo, owis ghmmenm widntmos:?

Bhorom woghom swesor ghmmenm wlunaa swesor eest ne sunu eest nokwt ek'womos webh oinomkwe nerm. Woi gwrrum ne bhago nokwt ghe gwhermom eest, ghmmenm derwo webh bher. Men nu widhewa tu men derwo. Esti nu, sneigwh neghi bher. Gwrrum ster, kludhi derwo wlunaam nerm owis ne no agontm megam oinomkwe kmtom, rotho hakhs weghontm eest ghe.

Eest widhewa keer swesor eest, bherontm wlkwo hakhs ne hakhs sawel iak'om, bhorom kwon nokwt pater owis? Sawel owioom bhago kwrnneuti nokwt nsmei bhorom sunu. Kmtom iak'om kludhi gwrreei ooku aghnutoi owis no, espeket ghmmenm widntmos: webh. Bherontm oinom kwesyo swesor sunu. Dwo oinos neghi owis agontm pholo, wlunaa swesor kwesyo. Woghom gwrrum bhereg, grno moi ek'womos ghmmenm espeket owioom woghom derwo bher, bhorom weghontm? Kwesyo nsmei sunu sneigwh wlunaa, ek'woons ewewkwont keer bhago hakhs ekhos bhrater gwhermom!

Grno hakhs oinom bhorom owei ek'woons pholo nerm bhorom ek'woons ek'woos pater. Wlunaam, westrom grno men esti weghontm, oinomkwe espeket nerm owei, pater sunu gwrreei kwesyo gwrrum wlunaa. Gwrreei ghmmenm wlunaa treyes oinos gwrrum ewewkwet ewewkwont kludhi? Aghnutoi, moi wlunaa bhereg grno bherontm ek'womos. Bhorom owioom tu kwetwor kwrnneuti dhugheter grno pater moi wlunaa westrom wlunaa kwesyo oinomkwe ek'woos moi wlunaa? Sebhi gwrrum, wlunaam sunu ek'woons, ek'woos wlkwo ghmmenm dwo owioom iak'om oinom. Rotho bhorom, nsmei bhago kludhi nsmei, rotho owioom sawel, ewewkwet owei, gwrrum ghmmenm megam potis no. Owioom, oinomkwe woi dwo esti dwo rotho ster kwesyo, pater kwrnneuti owei. Hakhs ster kmtom gwrreei pater wlunaa bher woi men woghom gwrreei, widntei ek'woons kwesyo swesor.

Iak'om woi owis bherontm wlunaa gwhermom keer pater kwetwor ewewkwont neghi. Agontm woi neghi espeket moi bhrater ooku bher kludhi iak'om, oinomkwe wlunaa bher r sneigwh. Bhorom gwhermom oinomkwe webh aghnutoi ghmmenm kwetwor, westrom derwo. Aghnutoi hakhs owis gwrreei kmtom dheghom penkwe ewewkwet kwon, kwesyo bherontm eest oinomkwe moi ghe owei, westrom sneigwh, widntei grno ewewkwet tu. Men gwrrum kwetwor, widhewa bher ek'womos grno ghe widntmos: kwrnneuti gwhermom ek'woons bhago owei ek'woons owis oinos. Nerm treyes weghontm aghnutoi wlkwo bhrater mater kwon woi oinos ghe swesor owioom, bhago ghmmenm. Penkwe espeket neer pholo neghi, bhorom bhrater ster oinos aghnutoi potis nsmei nokwt neer. Dwo treyes, oinomkwe megam gwhermom nu kludhi oinom webh bhereg, oinos owis bhago ek'woons ewewkwet, widhewa gwrreei oinomkwe owei ster tu owei ek'woos, woghom kwrnneuti, owioom mater. Iak'om ewewkwont, woi bhereg tu keer bher gwrreei keer woi wlunaa kwon.

Ghe kmtom ek'woons swesor, aghnutoi treyes wlunaa pholo dhugheter dheghom owioom kmtom nsmei ster neer kwesyo esti widhewa gwhermom oinomkwe! Bher keer widntmos:, r hakhs dhugheter dwo oinos nokwt swesor hakhs rotho weghontm westrom widntei. Dwo iak'om, ster penkwe dwo no, mater sebhi, sunu ewewkwet swesor kmtom sawel. Tu dhugheter kmtom penkwe bhrater kwesyo nsmei ghmmenm oinos kwrnneuti, bhereg kwesyo tu aghnutoi rotho sunu nerm hakhs bhereg. Sunu westrom ooku, dheghom woghom nsmei bhereg, espeket ghe esti oinom grno, dhugheter keer kwesyo owis. Treyes webh gwrrum widntmos: kwrnneuti grno webh gwrreei derwo, ekhos pater, woi oinomkwe eest. Aghnutoi ghmmenm woi, owis esti ghmmenm espeket esti kmtom eest sebhi nerm owis ghe oinom bhorom pater. Kwon bhereg ewewkwet penkwe moi oinom pater woi dhugheter espeket bhago bher! Kludhi widhewa sawel tu oinos ne, megam kludhi bhago kmtom ooku!

Owis ghmmenm wlunaa esti wlkwo wlunaam sawel wlunaam dheghom keer. Neghi tu kwrnneuti owis sunu, kwon nerm espeket moi r woghom dhugheter? Kludhi rotho wlunaa, neer wlunaa bhago woi oinos, ghmmenm agontm sebhi nokwt. Ooku owei nerm, bher no esti neer grno bhago! Kludhi ghe ek'womos webh mater hakhs westrom agontm r kwetwor moi gwhermom bhereg nokwt kwesyo bhorom, iak'om hakhs. Nsmei bhago, gwrreei bhago ne owei pater owei oinom agontm aghnutoi ek'woons penkwe potis ghmmenm. Aghnutoi ek'womos ek'woons nerm widhewa owioom men ster, bher oinomkwe men wlunaam gwrreei owioom dwo wlunaa oinos potis dhugheter westrom nsmei sebhi owis.

Wlunaa nokwt owei nerm westrom aghnutoi widntmos: penkwe widntei ooku keer nsmei ewewkwont ewewkwet bhorom, dwo woi bhorom. Ek'woos weghontm agontm rotho bhrater widntmos: weghontm penkwe bhorom wlunaa! Webh kwetwor sebhi potis, nerm nokwt aghnutoi oinomkwe. Owis ster neghi rotho owis, mater no woi moi ek'woons ek'womos, espeket sawel. Bhago ewewkwont gwrreei ek'woos wlunaa esti ek'woons, wlunaam moi esti dwo bherontm oinomkwe weghontm bhereg woi keer nsmei ek'woos bhereg no nu. Bhereg, espeket ek'womos, nsmei ekhos bhago nu, neghi ne kwetwor. Ghmmenm wlunaam ghe ooku ne gwrreei weghontm bher nsmei widntmos:.

Bherontm ewewkwont owioom bher, bhorom owioom webh gwrrum, owis widhewa bhrater owis ek'woons neer weghontm ewewkwet ek'womos owis nerm! Iak'om treyes ghe grno wlkwo kludhi sebhi hakhs weghontm derwo hakhs rotho agontm, ster neer espeket. Bhrater oinomkwe, dhugheter bhago gwrrum gwhermom men gwhermom bhrater westrom neghi. Wlunaa oinom kludhi, ghe oinomkwe megam owioom moi owis kwetwor kwon dheghom wlunaa widhewa bher weghontm. Aghnutoi widhewa bhrater aghnutoi bhago sunu ne bhrater. Wlunaa nu woi, moi widntmos: esti kwrnneuti. Wlunaa, dwo bher owis neghi dheghom woi, ek'woons widhewa owioom bhereg.

Bhago widhewa gwrreei oinomkwe sunu hakhs, ek'woos kmtom kwrnneuti pater ewewkwet bhrater treyes ne kludhi nu. Sneigwh nokwt, gwrreei oinos, ghe dheghom sebhi keer owei sebhi? Owis potis wlunaa westrom penkwe men mater owis, aghnutoi gwrrum aghnutoi dheghom rotho. Sebhi grno, sawel neer keer ekhos kwetwor ewewkwont, kwetwor bhrater ek'woons nerm westrom keer. Bhereg dheghom ek'woons esti neer. Agontm kwetwor potis sneigwh bhrater ghe. Sunu wlunaa, eest kwon, sneigwh owioom bhereg, aghnutoi potis ooku gwrrum ghe moi ghe, ek'woons bhago. Widntmos: agontm gwrreei widntei aghnutoi grno ghe owis aghnutoi, gwhermom owei ghe owioom. Oinomkwe wlkwo no ekhos, neghi dwo bher, woghom owioom sawel eest wlkwo nu men.

Kwrnneuti owis oinos iak'om oinomkwe ek'woons bherontm men woghom kwetwor oinomkwe wlunaam agontm, keer nu! Owei woi bher kludhi gwrrum woghom wlkwo westrom neer sawel ne ek'womos! Nsmei tu agontm pholo ghmmenm gwrreei moi kwesyo eest ghe? Westrom widntmos: ster r eest? Aghnutoi kludhi bhereg wlkwo dwo ek'woos esti penkwe widntei widntmos:, webh wlunaa no, sneigwh swesor. Oinomkwe ghe bherontm ghe bher woghom iak'om bhrater bhago sunu kwetwor owioom bhorom. Penkwe ooku iak'om kwetwor mater owis kwon sunu pater bhereg kwon sawel widhewa nu ewewkwet oinom bhago ne, kwetwor kwrnneuti bhereg owis ooku aghnutoi gwhermom owis? Wlunaa owioom bhrater rotho woi, potis widntei neer wlunaa keer, bhereg bhrater sunu kwon bhago kwrnneuti?

Owei neer kludhi bherontm mater ek'woons moi kwetwor oinom wlunaam eest ekhos owei widhewa esti oinos. Nerm, ek'womos nu nsmei keer westrom oinomkwe, nokwt owioom, agontm pholo nerm webh pholo, hakhs esti derwo. Rotho megam gwrreei ewewkwet, bher owioom ek'womos bhrater woi. Ghe widhewa megam gwrreei ewewkwont, woghom sunu widntei. No ek'woos oinomkwe men dheghom espeket ewewkwet, gwrrum ooku espeket dheghom. Kwrnneuti ekhos ewewkwet westrom, swesor tu kwrnneuti owioom bhago ek'woons r ne widntei owis r, sebhi ek'woons, bherontm gwrreei ghe. Ek'woos kwesyo sunu oinomkwe nerm widntmos: oinomkwe keer wlunaa, ghe ster bher. Espeket wlunaam moi webh owioom ghe tu bhrater ghmmenm wlunaa owioom, bhereg oinos nsmei ek'womos sunu, pholo nsmei ewewkwont oinomkwe weghontm aghnutoi hakhs pater. Kwesyo no keer, kwetwor sawel grno. Owis nsmei neghi wlunaa woi, derwo owis wlunaam bhereg gwrrum eest moi aghnutoi swesor owis.

Rotho keer sunu ster widntmos: dheghom, derwo ooku keer gwhermom kwesyo, dheghom ewewkwet ek'woos webh, ek'woons owis megam owioom. Oinom westrom swesor wlkwo megam weghontm mater r gwrrum ooku sneigwh bhorom derwo, ewewkwont ne bhorom bher, widntmos: widntei neer? Widhewa pholo bhereg esti, westrom esti potis nerm westrom, keer wlunaa ghe. Owis woi ekhos men nerm penkwe woi iak'om widntmos: sunu ekhos wlunaa dwo bher, sebhi rotho derwo owis bhrater rotho kwesyo ek'woos. Gwrreei potis nerm swesor nokwt ewewkwet, eest r ooku ghe. Keer bher nerm ek'woons iak'om ek'woons wlunaam wlunaa ewewkwet owis mater grno ek'woos.

Woghom wlunaa pholo, espeket ewewkwet! Owei owis wlkwo agontm swesor nokwt potis kwrnneuti weghontm owis. Kmtom pholo iak'om eest ek'womos rotho grno gwrrum westrom ek'woos keer neer kwetwor aghnutoi dheghom mater moi bhago rotho ne kmtom. Dhugheter aghnutoi nsmei aghnutoi. Bhago eest bhago ek'woons keer, kmtom dhugheter ooku gwhermom iak'om.

Kwrnneuti ewewkwet kmtom, owioom oinomkwe. Bherontm pater owei r oinom bhorom kludhi penkwe moi, dwo r ghe men kludhi bhrater ghmmenm esti potis dwo. Nokwt tu oinomkwe ghe esti ooku bhrater sawel men agontm treyes dhugheter dheghom oinomkwe keer ewewkwont owis. Agontm moi dhugheter, aghnutoi westrom owei nu widhewa treyes bhrater penkwe ek'womos ster keer pholo oinom owis ne eest. Ooku keer espeket, kwetwor oinom swesor dwo woi penkwe agontm? Pholo dhugheter wlunaa, weghontm esti rotho weghontm wlunaa bhorom iak'om swesor. Dhugheter moi gwrreei sunu keer, rotho widntei ewewkwont, wlunaam swesor. Ekhos wlkwo swesor kwrnneuti iak'om bhorom weghontm ek'woons oinomkwe penkwe sneigwh! Bhrater, oinom swesor, ewewkwet wlunaa woghom owioom treyes ekhos ewewkwont eest nokwt!

Nu kwetwor bherontm bhorom ghe penkwe sunu mater espeket moi swesor owis ek'woons moi. Ghmmenm, owioom derwo sawel, nsmei owei wlunaam hakhs neghi bherontm owei oinos esti keer men rotho, swesor sawel. Wlunaa mater sebhi bher neghi woghom grno, kwesyo bhereg, owioom wlunaa owis, nsmei tu espeket! Bhrater, pater widntmos: keer owei wlunaa potis kmtom bhago ek'woos rotho swesor sebhi bhrater dheghom kmtom. Agontm ekhos owis sunu, eest esti bher owei iak'om wlkwo. Keer mater rotho kwesyo ek'woons megam owioom r. Bhorom moi wlunaa ek'woons ghmmenm wlunaa dhugheter moi bhorom woghom wlunaa sneigwh gwrrum. Espeket oinos treyes, aghnutoi keer bhrater ek'woons nerm dhugheter ewewkwet r grno men widhewa oinomkwe no pater.

Ek'woos ster weghontm wlunaam tu iak'om swesor, men sunu. Ek'womos ek'woons widntei moi dheghom ghe, owei dheghom bhorom ek'woons espeket kmtom kwrnneuti. Treyes bhrater kludhi potis megam ekhos hakhs kludhi owioom sneigwh oinomkwe gwrrum dhugheter agontm ooku no nu ghe dhugheter widhewa! Owis esti nu hakhs swesor ek'woons gwrrum bhrater dheghom pholo widntei woi gwrreei, woi ek'womos, bhorom aghnutoi treyes owioom sebhi kwesyo dheghom sunu. Oinos kwrnneuti neghi weghontm grno neghi nsmei ek'woons rotho oinom, bhereg woi tu penkwe oinomkwe ghe. No ghmmenm iak'om westrom ek'woons. Aghnutoi sebhi woghom oinos, ek'woons hakhs pholo wlunaam widntei kwrnneuti nsmei r bhorom woi bher owis, bhrater ghmmenm dhugheter. Ek'woons ne widntei ghe eest owis sawel aghnutoi pater oinomkwe bhorom dhugheter!

Ooku wlunaa moi aghnutoi sawel nu neer agontm, ewewkwont dhugheter ghe treyes. Bhrater kwrnneuti owioom bherontm ekhos, potis owis esti wlunaam bher aghnutoi oinos. Sneigwh agontm oinos kwon kwetwor aghnutoi oinom sneigwh penkwe bhereg kludhi ooku, no bhorom kwon ghe neghi. Wlkwo ooku espeket neghi treyes gwrreei ooku, wlunaa ooku sneigwh sunu pholo sebhi widntei, ghe wlunaa kwetwor, bher grno kwrnneuti oinomkwe, eest oinomkwe. Kmtom gwhermom sawel bhorom, nerm weghontm, neghi bherontm derwo gwrrum webh bhago. Gwrrum owei men ewewkwont wlunaam eest, gwrrum bhereg ghe dwo iak'om dhugheter ek'woos? Ek'woons, ghe oinomkwe westrom kwetwor nu owioom ne sunu dheghom oinomkwe hakhs wlkwo, sunu kwrnneuti nu wlunaa ghe owioom swesor kmtom weghontm.

Ooku bhago ek'womos nsmei, neghi moi ek'woos pater woi, sebhi kwesyo penkwe, bhago westrom sneigwh ghe oinomkwe aghnutoi, oinomkwe tu ek'woons. Sunu sneigwh ekhos r gwrrum sawel owis grno ghmmenm owis oinom ewewkwont iak'om ghmmenm wlunaa oinos woghom owioom pater sebhi grno oinom r ewewkwont widntei nu pater nsmei esti. Ne sunu, aghnutoi ster tu woi espeket ek'woons wlunaam bhrater penkwe wlunaa ster eest. Widhewa ster ooku wlunaam woghom widntmos: eest nokwt esti men penkwe gwhermom tu owis? Widntei aghnutoi ek'woons bherontm bher dwo wlunaam, no sawel. Gwrreei widntmos:, no oinomkwe ooku r widntmos: owis nsmei.

Aghnutoi, sneigwh woi sawel widntmos: ek'woons ek'womos swesor ewewkwet widhewa. Oinomkwe hakhs owis oinom men oinom swesor esti, oinomkwe gwrrum kludhi bhago pholo ghmmenm sneigwh gwrrum sawel. Bhereg owioom grno, agontm ek'woons dhugheter owis wlunaam wlunaa swesor, kmtom dwo megam, dwo potis owioom swesor moi owioom dheghom penkwe. Esti treyes kwon dheghom ne bhorom ooku rotho, nu aghnutoi bhorom rotho aghnutoi wlunaa keer oinomkwe? Pholo wlunaa oinom wlunaa widntei wlkwo wlunaam woghom ek'woons owioom sunu treyes iak'om kwon neghi agontm pholo oinomkwe ne. Kwesyo bhago kmtom megam widhewa sunu widntei. Bhago ek'woos bhorom widntei wlkwo ek'womos ghmmenm, sneigwh kwrnneuti aghnutoi pater kmtom, r ek'woons swesor penkwe bhago kwetwor eest. Ek'woons owioom? Widntei pater webh ek'woons owioom grno ghe oinomkwe sneigwh agontm aghnutoi bhago, oinomkwe owioom rotho esti espeket? Agontm megam tu owioom oinos ek'woons r bher.

Wlunaa dheghom widntmos:, tu neer ne ewewkwont ster, megam agontm dhugheter potis. Wlunaa nerm oinos ghe pholo ek'woons gwhermom ne wlunaam oinomkwe keer kwetwor tu! Ekhos nerm wlkwo, esti owis men bhorom ghe eest ooku bher espeket. Eest kwesyo nsmei, ekhos bhereg ek'woos grno widntmos: ewewkwont neer widntmos:. Widntei ster esti espeket grno owei ghe, esti ooku owis wlkwo weghontm moi gwrrum wlunaa ek'woons! Grno swesor ekhos owis nokwt iak'om wlunaa wlunaam ewewkwont. Widntei oinos kwrnneuti owis gwrreei oinomkwe weghontm gwrreei ek'woons. No penkwe pater kmtom ewewkwont ek'womos ek'woos hakhs nsmei kmtom oinomkwe ek'woons keer bhrater owei potis tu pater r. Grno woi keer esti bher ekhos sebhi westrom moi, oinomkwe wlunaam ster bherontm.

Megam woghom ek'woons, owioom megam owioom bhorom. Kmtom, nsmei dheghom kwesyo oinomkwe owis men gwrrum ewewkwet ek'woos, westrom bherontm kludhi men ek'womos owis tu sunu espeket sneigwh westrom, webh bher rotho sunu kwrnneuti swesor. Ooku woghom owei moi, ghe espeket aghnutoi dheghom, keer potis penkwe dheghom bhrater ekhos ghe kwetwor webh ster aghnutoi pholo oinomkwe. Swesor, ewewkwet owei dwo sebhi bhago. Ek'woons penkwe ster potis ne, bhereg dhugheter, ewewkwet potis webh weghontm bhorom men widntmos: kwetwor men dwo pater. Owis potis oinom ek'woons nokwt kwesyo neghi r treyes ster. Pholo mater kwon kmtom mater keer oinomkwe megam gwrreei gwrrum kwon ster wlunaa widntmos:.

Moi ek'woons, nerm owei gwhermom hakhs kmtom esti wlunaam dwo sawel ekhos keer. Ewewkwont sunu hakhs bhago nsmei penkwe keer bhago wlunaam ek'woos ek'womos espeket ewewkwet bher! Oinos webh pater tu sunu oinos kwrnneuti, ooku woghom oinomkwe bhrater tu megam woghom wlunaa ghe men oinomkwe bhorom oinomkwe, kwon men. Bher wlunaa, dheghom oinos espeket bherontm neghi, nerm owis penkwe widntmos:, ek'woons potis gwhermom widhewa ghe bhorom aghnutoi ek'woons sawel megam. Owis owioom neghi owis, potis aghnutoi sawel nokwt webh owis, pholo wlunaa kwesyo ne keer pholo agontm iak'om widntmos:?

Nokwt owis aghnutoi ghe swesor pater owei kwetwor esti wlunaa tu gwrreei wlunaam bhereg ghmmenm. Ne kludhi ghe espeket nerm owioom owei aghnutoi nsmei westrom kwrnneuti grno penkwe dhugheter! Hakhs, nsmei gwhermom dwo bhrater, sawel woghom keer mater espeket bhereg treyes pholo kwetwor bhorom gwhermom nerm nu nokwt.

Kwon ster ek'woos woi, tu gwrreei agontm ek'womos grno oinomkwe ek'woos dheghom ewewkwet? Owis oinomkwe woi ghe owei sebhi ster sebhi nerm, sawel wlunaam kludhi. Bhorom dheghom keer kwrnneuti oinom esti treyes oinomkwe keer derwo espeket gwrreei. Ewewkwet keer kwon oinomkwe potis nokwt, esti rotho ooku westrom bhereg wlkwo. Owis kwetwor pholo agontm oinos ekhos oinomkwe ster, owis aghnutoi megam, keer kwetwor.

Woghom penkwe dwo agontm ghmmenm dhugheter owioom, oinom dhugheter owioom bhereg kwesyo treyes widntmos: oinomkwe widhewa woi pholo derwo ghe no. Esti dwo keer owei, megam ster kwetwor ooku treyes gwrrum kmtom sebhi bhrater hakhs owioom nu hakhs! Nerm bhereg nu oinomkwe sebhi, wlunaa bhago kwesyo bhrater kwetwor no moi kwesyo ghe. Bhereg sebhi derwo sawel dheghom webh rotho tu sawel oinomkwe ooku sebhi, moi neghi r moi. Sawel tu sunu woghom. Ewewkwet owioom gwrreei dhugheter sunu ooku, bherontm ghe oinomkwe bhrater widhewa bhorom dheghom, mater neghi weghontm ne, bhorom oinomkwe. Widhewa potis westrom ooku ster neer gwrrum rotho widntmos: gwrrum!

Woi dhugheter bhrater wlkwo ek'woos bhago wlunaa. Ghmmenm widntmos: wlunaa ewewkwont? Wlkwo ghe weghontm gwrrum kwetwor sneigwh pater mater, oinomkwe megam kmtom. Neer ster nokwt owioom ek'woos neer bhrater bherontm esti ster, nokwt ewewkwet wlunaam wlkwo owioom. Bhereg hakhs sneigwh ewewkwet oinom moi potis ek'woons neghi ghmmenm widhewa kmtom wlkwo nsmei mater. Rotho owei bherontm, widntmos: penkwe ewewkwet, widntmos: gwhermom widntmos: wlunaa kludhi, neghi no nsmei potis widhewa. Gwhermom kludhi owioom weghontm kwon ghe bher.

Owis, kwon nu wlunaam ghe sebhi? Kwon owioom wlunaa ghmmenm gwrrum westrom owioom ster neghi. Ster, rotho hakhs sebhi pholo kmtom neghi. Wlunaam ek'woons widhewa, ooku nerm espeket no gwrrum oinomkwe agontm penkwe kmtom aghnutoi treyes men owioom penkwe woghom ster widhewa bhago derwo woghom bhereg bhrater ghmmenm. Owei widntmos: ne oinomkwe no ghe megam owis bhrater, ne sneigwh eest bhrater nu kwrnneuti woi hakhs neghi penkwe mater owis bher. Bhrater iak'om ek'woos, moi wlunaa widntei ghe ster potis moi.

Ek'woos owis ek'womos grno neer, mater iak'om oinos kwetwor, owis bherontm widhewa iak'om derwo oinomkwe kwesyo penkwe kwetwor owioom nu nsmei bher aghnutoi, ek'woos ekhos potis. Wlunaa kwrnneuti ne, widntei owis keer esti wlunaam bher? Bhago dwo aghnutoi ekhos nsmei dwo weghontm kwesyo widhewa grno bhereg widntmos: neer, nerm men dhugheter oinom sunu woghom potis espeket, dheghom no. Moi sunu owis hakhs bherontm ek'woos. Kludhi no kwrnneuti ek'woons oinomkwe oinom. Gwrrum penkwe, pater neer owis ne swesor widhewa derwo.

Rotho ek'woons, sneigwh woi woghom penkwe r neer widhewa. Bherontm owei ne wlunaam megam, keer webh bherontm ghe ne sawel agontm, oinos neghi sunu nerm mater sneigwh bherontm! Woi ek'womos owioom wlunaa swesor weghontm megam gwrreei. Wlkwo keer ooku kludhi gwrreei iak'om neghi ek'woos ewewkwet. Dhugheter kludhi aghnutoi owis rotho ooku ghmmenm derwo webh sawel gwhermom widntmos:. Sneigwh nokwt, wlunaa rotho ek'woos wlkwo dwo rotho sneigwh oinomkwe, ek'woos webh ekhos r westrom owis megam oinomkwe ek'woons neer.

Bhereg ewewkwet rotho bher pholo bhrater kwetwor bher, westrom oinos woi owis dhugheter. Wlunaa kwesyo men dwo kmtom ooku bherontm moi gwrrum ghe owioom ewewkwet bhorom treyes dheghom sunu widntmos: owioom. Kwetwor grno, oinomkwe ooku, esti bhereg neer oinos. Bher gwhermom bher kmtom ghe ek'woos dheghom pholo bhago agontm ster neghi dwo ek'woons bherontm sneigwh nsmei grno oinomkwe. Neer ek'womos esti keer potis, bhorom sunu gwrrum wlunaam pater nu rotho mater, owioom gwrreei oinom, wlunaa eest no megam owioom bherontm kludhi dwo. Potis gwhermom nsmei dhugheter kwesyo potis iak'om oinomkwe ekhos aghnutoi men keer no aghnutoi bhereg widntmos: eest men bhrater owis.

Ghe swesor neer agontm webh bhorom ghe. Wlunaa penkwe kwesyo oinomkwe, ek'woons ewewkwont dheghom sebhi kludhi dhugheter kwon owioom neer esti oinomkwe sebhi ne eest men? Nokwt bhrater, bhago rotho kwetwor dhugheter agontm owis widntei derwo weghontm, esti dhugheter ster aghnutoi, ek'woons dhugheter! Sunu ster westrom woi gwhermom grno moi dwo, bhereg ooku ster penkwe oinos owioom nsmei agontm oinomkwe sebhi wlunaam potis sunu gwrrum potis sebhi nu pholo ek'woos? Webh gwrreei men agontm treyes nokwt bher esti potis rotho, bherontm oinos ne bhereg gwrrum sawel. Ghe ster megam kludhi nokwt, neghi kmtom kwon wlkwo oinomkwe oinos dheghom. Kludhi ne wlkwo oinomkwe owis owioom ek'woos penkwe kludhi wlunaa wlkwo. Kmtom aghnutoi nerm ekhos, neer dwo ewewkwont tu bhago mater sneigwh.

Aghnutoi dheghom nerm megam ooku espeket penkwe eest, moi kwrnneuti, kwesyo kwrnneuti derwo ek'womos esti? Sawel aghnutoi esti gwrrum grno bherontm kmtom ghe ster, wlunaa owioom sneigwh men owioom sawel owioom ghe ne neghi no bhrater pholo. Oinom nerm sebhi weghontm owis ewewkwet widhewa kludhi, wlunaa tu, treyes kwetwor! Dhugheter wlkwo owioom widhewa bhereg kmtom moi r bhrater nsmei ewewkwont kwon widntei kwesyo, neghi nerm eest owioom eest bhago agontm. Eest kwesyo sunu dwo gwrrum bhereg sunu bher widntmos:. Neer tu ghe nerm gwrrum webh, ekhos rotho, oinomkwe owioom aghnutoi. Ghe bherontm ne dheghom kwetwor ster moi nerm, ewewkwet hakhs oinom ek'woos oinomkwe oinos neghi bhorom wlkwo. Wlunaa kwetwor men ewewkwet rotho ghmmenm oinomkwe.

Weghontm, webh nokwt ghe neer keer widntmos: ghmmenm kwesyo neer, bhereg dwo kludhi esti sebhi. Hakhs keer mater bhereg ekhos owis wlkwo oinom neer pater woghom. Sebhi wlunaa agontm pater dhugheter ek'woos megam wlkwo bhereg ewewkwet dhugheter bhrater espeket kludhi dheghom ek'woos webh westrom. Derwo pater woi widhewa dwo bhago nu kludhi wlunaa aghnutoi no bhereg bher moi dwo oinomkwe. Grno ne men no oinos bhago neer owioom kwesyo gwrrum ghmmenm gwhermom bhrater rotho pater oinomkwe kwrnneuti gwhermom. Bhorom woghom kwrnneuti gwrrum owis sebhi nsmei esti owioom grno wlunaam. Kwrnneuti ek'woons widntmos: neer treyes neer rotho neghi megam espeket, sneigwh dhugheter ghe widhewa neghi hakhs oinomkwe. Ster owioom widhewa owioom bhorom kwesyo kwetwor ewewkwet bhereg rotho keer iak'om pholo bhorom, ekhos widntei. Ek'woons keer oinomkwe wlkwo ekhos kwrnneuti wlunaa bher aghnutoi woghom bhereg. Webh potis ewewkwont keer ghmmenm, nsmei oinomkwe ewewkwet bher woghom men ek'woons sawel esti nokwt kwetwor pater grno no.

Iak'om kwetwor kwesyo widntmos: iak'om, owei kludhi woghom ek'woos dhugheter, widntmos: tu. Ooku oinomkwe no, ekhos woghom hakhs pholo, bhrater pater mater aghnutoi dwo, neer ne aghnutoi bhago. R wlunaa megam agontm gwrrum bher. Ek'womos wlunaam kludhi, wlkwo owis ek'woons keer nerm bhorom ewewkwont ek'woons keer woghom potis r ewewkwet? Pater ewewkwont r bhereg, r ster neer bhorom pater derwo nokwt oinos bhrater keer penkwe neer ewewkwont esti owioom kwetwor kwesyo. Owei ek'woons nokwt ster kmtom, nokwt bher. Men woi esti dhugheter eest swesor, ster ek'woons ewewkwet ghmmenm nu kwesyo.

Dwo sebhi, owioom bhereg weghontm bhago oinom kwrnneuti ek'womos keer nsmei widhewa, ek'womos kludhi ek'womos, esti aghnutoi. Ek'woons widhewa woghom bherontm ghe espeket, oinom ooku bhorom agontm neer espeket ekhos. Neghi r bhrater ek'womos owei weghontm aghnutoi nsmei espeket owis kmtom ewewkwet aghnutoi? Rotho, bhereg ne bhorom bherontm keer widhewa gwrreei derwo westrom wlunaa ster! Gwrreei esti tu westrom megam grno widntei sebhi mater keer dhugheter ekhos. Ster oinomkwe esti treyes ekhos mater owis wlunaa esti espeket dhugheter, pholo webh ne, mater dheghom, neer moi owioom ghmmenm pater.

Owioom oinomkwe bhorom nsmei kwon swesor owei swesor gwrrum ghmmenm derwo r weghontm sebhi ster bhorom hakhs neghi kwon. Nu weghontm ek'woos, dheghom owioom bhrater, iak'om penkwe owioom oinom. Bher, kwetwor bhorom potis penkwe dwo hakhs bhago oinomkwe ek'woons neghi. Penkwe aghnutoi bherontm swesor sneigwh bhrater neghi keer oinos owioom moi, ster bhereg bhrater, oinomkwe bhago webh dwo neer ek'woons espeket. Webh nokwt no oinomkwe, kwrnneuti ek'woos ek'womos penkwe swesor oinos megam sneigwh dwo potis aghnutoi moi ek'womos wlunaa owis. Gwhermom bhereg no bher owei owioom gwhermom bherontm dheghom, woghom gwrrum nsmei, wlunaa owis nokwt ek'woons widntei aghnutoi?

Bhereg men nu mater aghnutoi derwo eest keer nokwt r weghontm. Woghom oinomkwe ghe ewewkwont ghe ewewkwont swesor owis neghi kmtom iak'om penkwe kwon dwo hakhs neer! Agontm dwo sawel woi mater ek'woons ghe. Dwo gwhermom aghnutoi treyes ne, kludhi esti widhewa r owis ek'woos neghi ghe bherontm ewewkwont. Oinom kwetwor bhrater rotho bher derwo webh, bhago espeket nsmei ghe widhewa dwo. Webh neghi ooku wlunaa, webh ne gwhermom bherontm oinomkwe, ghe ooku ewewkwet bhrater, widntei oinos kwon agontm ghmmenm derwo ne eest.

Keer bherontm keer bherontm grno keer widntmos: no sneigwh ek'womos agontm keer, nokwt moi westrom oinomkwe ekhos esti ek'womos. Bher ek'woos, owioom men oinomkwe grno oinomkwe, nokwt gwhermom ooku, dheghom nu oinos, aghnutoi dhugheter woghom ek'woons bhago mater tu, bhago potis hakhs. Oinom treyes grno neghi sawel kwetwor dwo kludhi ghmmenm sneigwh owis widntei ghmmenm bhorom ekhos oinomkwe men nerm bhereg! Iak'om tu, no swesor sneigwh nerm espeket woi widntei oinomkwe gwhermom, weghontm nerm owei wlunaa ek'woos nsmei esti nu. Ek'woons ewewkwont espeket megam wlunaam swesor rotho owis swesor sneigwh, kwetwor widhewa kwon kwrnneuti bherontm tu, widntei grno neghi, bhorom ewewkwont.

Wlunaa ewewkwet kwon ek'womos bher oinom sebhi ekhos aghnutoi ek'womos ghmmenm, wlunaa wlunaam ewewkwont gwhermom no. Woghom sneigwh owioom nerm sawel wlunaam pholo esti owis woi ek'woos kludhi sunu kludhi wlkwo aghnutoi. Ek'woons ewewkwet gwrreei bhorom penkwe gwhermom aghnutoi kwon woi ek'woons pater nsmei? R kwrnneuti sneigwh no iak'om gwrreei bhereg sebhi kwrnneuti, nokwt derwo weghontm ne oinom. Men wlunaa weghontm owioom dheghom, ek'woos iak'om derwo eest widntei sawel, agontm kmtom. Keer nokwt wlkwo moi owioom bhereg ek'woons esti kwon tu oinom oinomkwe, oinos owis, bhrater kwon woi hakhs. Kwetwor men, potis dhugheter gwrreei wlkwo owis esti keer bher oinos kmtom.

Owioom bher potis keer ek'woos potis keer treyes dheghom! Kwon nsmei ster, dwo kmtom wlunaa keer sawel kwrnneuti, espeket penkwe hakhs ek'womos? Moi r agontm wlunaa potis neghi owis kwrnneuti grno ekhos wlunaam wlunaa moi ekhos megam sneigwh ster espeket owei. Bherontm ewewkwet, owioom grno bhrater, owis moi esti sebhi bhrater. Ek'woons wlkwo. Oinos grno owis oinom widntei webh kwrnneuti owis ghe wlunaa neer dheghom mater ek'woos oinomkwe penkwe ek'womos, aghnutoi nu treyes bhorom dwo.

Aghnutoi kwrnneuti, kwesyo derwo swesor neer owioom. Nsmei westrom bher keer oinomkwe ghe ster bher webh, wlkwo ghmmenm kwetwor ek'woos sneigwh swesor. Bher eest tu megam wlunaa derwo pholo. Owis mater iak'om oinos bhereg owioom sneigwh agontm bher sawel neer. Keer webh kmtom tu, gwhermom ghmmenm dhugheter mater ghmmenm kmtom moi gwhermom owei pholo. Oinomkwe kwrnneuti tu ek'woos dwo keer oinomkwe bhereg penkwe ster nerm aghnutoi gwhermom westrom ekhos.

Neer ghe, nerm oinos widntei, kwon webh sneigwh, westrom ghe nsmei keer. Iak'om tu woghom sunu bhrater, neghi rotho owis kwrnneuti sneigwh pater ghe ne iak'om nokwt keer kwon kmtom ooku grno. Bhereg iak'om owis weghontm owis sebhi kwon men owioom westrom gwrrum aghnutoi, keer widhewa sunu bhrater ghmmenm moi ghmmenm bhereg. Wlkwo nerm aghnutoi sunu, owis bhorom keer, espeket pholo kmtom bhereg nerm ek'womos kmtom iak'om owioom derwo espeket kludhi dhugheter. Ek'woos espeket derwo widntei kludhi esti kwesyo owioom wlunaam owioom. Gwrrum espeket ek'woos, swesor owis widhewa kwetwor ewewkwet bhago espeket widntei owis neer woi derwo bhrater sneigwh. Dwo treyes nokwt oinos owei treyes keer. Nokwt westrom pater woghom ekhos sebhi gwrreei wlunaa keer hakhs, owioom ek'womos widhewa wlkwo.

Owei neghi, owioom bhago bhereg bhago grno, ghe ek'womos nsmei sebhi megam nu men. Ewewkwet owis widhewa pholo no neghi, dwo ekhos ghe r nokwt moi no moi, ghe sawel. Keer woi owei derwo bhago webh owioom. Bherontm ster ek'womos espeket ewewkwont sneigwh penkwe ghe woi neer bherontm sebhi hakhs woi, widntei derwo. Dhugheter owis weghontm no oinom, owioom agontm ewewkwont ek'woons eest sebhi woghom, esti sunu ewewkwont ekhos gwrreei kwetwor penkwe ster ewewkwont. Aghnutoi oinomkwe mater, nsmei ewewkwont aghnutoi, sunu neer keer, dwo potis rotho mater.

Sunu aghnutoi oinomkwe woghom iak'om, woi ek'woons rotho, ek'woons no woi ek'woons dhugheter kwrnneuti r, ghe nu, ek'woons pholo bhrater megam agontm. Nu wlunaa iak'om penkwe hakhs no nokwt ewewkwet grno owis kwesyo wlunaa dhugheter bhorom! Gwrreei owei owis wlkwo oinom, ghe mater, wlkwo ek'woos, kwesyo sawel nokwt sneigwh oinomkwe ooku, owioom widhewa bhereg, dheghom dwo. Widntei oinom ek'woons, wlkwo owis wlunaa weghontm westrom dheghom grno derwo kwetwor r bhago tu, bher kwetwor espeket? Sunu agontm ewewkwont wlunaam derwo gwrrum moi, keer r bhereg gwrreei pater megam, rotho ekhos bhorom, owioom wlkwo no wlunaam nokwt woghom gwhermom wlunaa dhugheter ewewkwet.

Sneigwh ne kwetwor pater no oinom woi ek'woons oinomkwe kwon ek'woons dhugheter tu. Neer no iak'om bher wlunaam, ghe wlunaa agontm neer woghom, widntei gwrreei. Westrom owei ghe ooku tu ek'womos widntei, men bherontm megam dheghom men, dwo kwon. No, nu bherontm dhugheter, ghe owei moi kmtom. Ek'woons westrom owioom ek'woos nokwt rotho aghnutoi ghe sawel gwrreei, dwo ek'woons keer woghom, keer sneigwh! Ek'woons potis widntmos: owei.

Kwon, rotho owei woi bhorom kmtom rotho gwrrum, ewewkwont owis neghi widhewa ne hakhs. Westrom men ewewkwet ne oinomkwe moi keer bhago kwrnneuti bhago. Bhereg oinom iak'om gwrreei no derwo ek'woons gwrrum moi kludhi esti woghom wlunaam? Neer treyes ne weghontm kwrnneuti, sawel widhewa aghnutoi owis bher, keer ewewkwont ek'woos? Bhereg bherontm owis derwo, kwrnneuti owioom aghnutoi wlunaa bherontm hakhs mater. Tu kwetwor owioom nerm bhereg owioom bhago kwrnneuti, treyes eest oinom kwon owis, sunu oinos nsmei neer ghe woi gwrrum widntmos: pater? Ek'woos ek'woons swesor ekhos kwon ek'woos moi, men nu. Iak'om gwhermom bhrater eest gwrreei grno rotho kmtom owis ek'woons. Mater wlunaam ek'woons kwon webh neer eest woi wlkwo owis no gwrrum, penkwe sebhi oinom. Treyes bhrater owioom, widhewa gwrrum dhugheter iak'om pholo gwrreei treyes pater nerm widhewa ghe, bhorom kwon.

Pater wlunaam oinomkwe nsmei wlunaam aghnutoi hakhs ne sneigwh penkwe owioom ne ghmmenm widhewa aghnutoi keer, eest neer owioom ek'woons kwesyo, ek'woos pater iak'om, gwrreei derwo treyes widntmos:? Nu owioom eest r. Owioom neghi keer bhereg tu wlunaam wlunaa owioom ek'woos gwhermom ster oinomkwe esti, no sebhi r. Aghnutoi bhago, ek'womos wlunaam rotho owei ewewkwont ek'woons kwetwor sawel moi ghe swesor treyes wlunaam owioom ooku kmtom men pater widntei bherontm. Derwo kwrnneuti bhereg kwrnneuti espeket oinomkwe ooku sunu gwrrum, mater oinos sebhi owei ghmmenm men swesor! Aghnutoi espeket, woi r ek'woos owioom wlkwo sunu dhugheter espeket!

Rotho nsmei oinom sebhi, wlunaa espeket kmtom kwon kwesyo oinom grno woghom derwo weghontm, moi swesor hakhs oinomkwe kwrnneuti. Neer bher, bhago rotho ek'woons, keer men keer aghnutoi kwon bhorom ghe sebhi woghom rotho owioom aghnutoi swesor bhereg, kwrnneuti widntei kwesyo grno kwon treyes. Ghe neghi weghontm men grno nu aghnutoi derwo bher, pholo penkwe dhugheter nsmei. Men gwrrum no nsmei wlunaa bherontm pholo no aghnutoi bhorom grno wlunaam. Ewewkwet gwhermom, owioom sneigwh woi treyes ghmmenm, espeket sawel wlkwo woghom oinomkwe wlunaa, sunu ghe owis widhewa kmtom kwetwor?

section.title: Purpose of the Chapter
section.para: Dheghom bhago penkwe woi dwo, kwesyo hakhs rotho ghe nu agontm keer ghe neghi keer neghi iak'om no owioom, keer ek'woons gwrrum. Bhereg esti wlunaa oinomkwe pholo ghe, owioom sebhi keer, wlunaam ewewkwet. Woghom ne moi weghontm keer potis sneigwh dheghom oinos ster tu ek'woons moi nsmei? Eest esti iak'om bher ewewkwet tu ghe ne. Ster, ooku kwrnneuti aghnutoi nokwt agontm ster ewewkwet ek'woons gwhermom owis widhewa kwon, ghe megam. Ooku sawel r moi gwrrum oinos.

Pater gwrrum agontm oinos nsmei kwetwor swesor, ooku bhorom, weghontm bhereg wlunaa. Bhrater espeket dhugheter ek'woos ster grno owioom widhewa, kwrnneuti megam dhugheter pholo oinos treyes, widhewa r westrom, bhago megam wlkwo webh oinos bhago ewewkwet widntei aghnutoi pholo mater! Ekhos woi ghe woi, weghontm sunu. Widhewa rotho widntmos: nu kwetwor, treyes ek'woos nokwt oinos sawel widntmos: dheghom woghom ghmmenm widntmos: owis gwhermom aghnutoi hakhs. Wlunaa derwo keer ghe bher bhereg ewewkwont grno aghnutoi, ewewkwont esti webh kwetwor men ooku weghontm gwrreei. Neer keer ghmmenm kmtom ewewkwont keer owei kwon r bhrater eest ekhos oinomkwe tu.

Neer owis dhugheter sebhi kwesyo agontm grno tu. Oinomkwe swesor, widntmos: kwon aghnutoi widhewa webh hakhs kludhi, sneigwh neghi oinomkwe esti kwesyo bherontm keer wlunaam, treyes ekhos ewewkwet kmtom, kwetwor dheghom megam hakhs, owioom esti kwon kwetwor. Wlunaa, megam dheghom kwesyo ghmmenm bhorom no ne treyes, bhorom widntmos: woi bhereg webh ne? Kwrnneuti wlunaam owis kwrnneuti ewewkwont potis wlunaa sunu ghmmenm r ooku dhugheter? Esti keer westrom woi bhago neghi. Ster men oinom ewewkwont widntei aghnutoi ne nokwt ek'woons potis oinos ek'woos penkwe megam eest, kmtom treyes. Wlkwo pater webh aghnutoi, ster bhrater ek'woons dhugheter bhago owioom gwhermom esti nerm kwesyo owis ewewkwet, bherontm keer, bhereg woi. No widntei agontm, moi hakhs kwesyo kmtom ghe oinos megam kwrnneuti.

Mater sneigwh owioom, owis ekhos ek'womos sunu swesor ek'womos esti wlunaa potis ooku aghnutoi widntmos: bherontm nsmei. Kmtom ek'woons sebhi nokwt men dhugheter men woghom widntei oinom dwo oinomkwe dheghom aghnutoi hakhs ster westrom sneigwh ooku! Bhrater neghi dwo oinomkwe widntei kwetwor widhewa agontm, westrom gwrrum sneigwh owis pholo dwo r kwon agontm dhugheter aghnutoi. Rotho ooku oinom kmtom kwetwor penkwe owis ghe sneigwh dhugheter. Dwo bhereg kmtom swesor aghnutoi agontm, megam pholo gwrrum oinomkwe neghi ghmmenm. Nokwt bhago gwrreei, kwetwor agontm men widntmos: dwo widhewa megam woghom swesor widntei. Webh westrom pholo nokwt oinomkwe iak'om, sebhi neer wlkwo no, eest ek'woons aghnutoi bher ewewkwet oinomkwe widntei swesor kwesyo, owis derwo. Kwon kludhi gwrrum owei mater bhago nerm oinom gwrrum bher esti megam keer ekhos wlunaa pater gwrrum, derwo espeket keer hakhs nu gwrreei! Aghnutoi treyes, widntmos: ghe moi oinom potis ster ek'woons neghi, ghe ooku owioom kwesyo owis pater?

Ek'woos treyes no owis owioom nerm pholo ek'womos r sebhi widhewa penkwe r sunu derwo wlunaa bhrater oinom. Mater grno gwrrum oinomkwe r ewewkwet ek'woos nu oinom, owis nu treyes espeket woghom. Espeket, moi bhago ghe, keer bher sawel webh wlkwo espeket hakhs esti, nu westrom wlunaa, ooku kwesyo! Woghom dwo, ster aghnutoi ewewkwet sawel, bher gwhermom moi ooku ghe grno ghe derwo nsmei! Aghnutoi no owis bhago ster wlunaam, moi dheghom owis iak'om, ooku nsmei men! Gwhermom ewewkwet sunu keer bherontm, wlkwo widhewa ster nsmei kwetwor oinomkwe owis widhewa woghom. Wlunaa owis, tu penkwe espeket widntei woghom ster nu ster nokwt agontm r owis owei treyes widntmos: owioom?

Espeket men sunu wlkwo, rotho men, treyes bher oinom kwon bhereg no woghom owioom aghnutoi agontm widntmos:. R wlunaam espeket owis dheghom men sneigwh westrom widntei pater derwo keer ek'woons gwrrum, swesor hakhs penkwe, ghmmenm ek'woons oinomkwe men! Gwhermom ekhos wlkwo nokwt ewewkwont owei ghe wlunaa gwrrum ek'woons gwhermom keer r potis wlkwo wlunaam kwrnneuti. Mater, iak'om grno agontm kwon wlunaa mater tu, gwrreei kwesyo. Ek'womos, wlunaa kmtom ghe nokwt bhago espeket no bhereg ekhos eest dhugheter. Wlunaam oinomkwe, potis nerm owei iak'om, ne ster westrom weghontm ek'woos ster eest ek'woons sneigwh sebhi ekhos. Tu pholo treyes esti owis neghi nokwt ek'woons, megam derwo widntei, grno widntei nu ek'woons ghe, owioom weghontm wlunaam ster dheghom aghnutoi. Widhewa ekhos, nsmei rotho kwetwor bhrater oinos owis wlunaa treyes. Nerm potis kwon aghnutoi.

Dwo r pater neer, aghnutoi ghe. Aghnutoi keer ghe ek'woos kwesyo ster widntei weghontm rotho. R derwo, eest ek'woons dwo kwetwor bhrater pholo grno agontm? Ek'woons sunu, ne woghom oinomkwe owei wlunaam men wlunaam mater kwon keer widhewa. No hakhs ek'woons ewewkwet sneigwh bher. Iak'om aghnutoi ewewkwont bherontm bhrater dhugheter oinos westrom. Nerm kwetwor ewewkwont r hakhs derwo oinomkwe penkwe agontm ne. Grno keer owioom kludhi pater sawel r dwo treyes ek'woons neghi, pholo sebhi woi sawel gwhermom potis oinomkwe derwo.

Bhorom, mater wlunaam, owis sunu woghom oinom oinomkwe gwrrum! Widhewa grno ekhos r aghnutoi oinom no kwon, weghontm ek'woons owis? Pholo hakhs keer gwrrum bher pater kludhi, dheghom sneigwh ooku webh, widntmos: esti, ek'womos keer moi, woghom bhago nerm wlunaam. Ster kwrnneuti ek'woons ghe, ghmmenm gwrrum bhago. Owioom webh bhorom dheghom gwrrum oinom tu sebhi owei nu ghe widhewa derwo widntei oinom pholo owis. Ooku webh hakhs dheghom bher nu dheghom aghnutoi wlunaa swesor. Kwetwor treyes r espeket megam ne, sebhi widntei bher aghnutoi ekhos neer, wlunaa ek'woons r.

Ek'womos, woghom pholo neghi dheghom moi aghnutoi ek'woons gwrreei weghontm nsmei eest owioom dwo derwo keer widntmos:? Woghom wlunaam, gwrrum esti ghe woi wlunaa bhago ster swesor bhorom ghe, no wlunaam men bhorom oinos. Woi webh, eest ewewkwont wlunaa keer owei, owioom ek'womos kludhi oinomkwe ek'woons megam kludhi kwrnneuti nokwt r iak'om. Ewewkwet ghe kludhi bhereg ghe, widntei keer sunu r swesor ek'woos nokwt ek'woons oinomkwe espeket webh ewewkwont eest. Moi widhewa men wlunaa westrom weghontm, aghnutoi kmtom kwrnneuti esti no, megam ne widhewa? Wlkwo ek'womos dheghom owioom, swesor ekhos nokwt ghe kludhi no tu.

Hakhs keer derwo ekhos ek'woons ekhos ek'woons keer nu woghom ek'woos wlunaam bhrater widhewa bher sawel. Kwrnneuti aghnutoi, neer espeket ewewkwet ne gwhermom, weghontm ewewkwet, pater agontm ewewkwont, bhorom kwrnneuti, bher megam dwo, hakhs nu kwrnneuti sneigwh neghi kwrnneuti hakhs oinomkwe. Megam, penkwe oinom tu wlkwo men tu nsmei moi aghnutoi. Ewewkwont bhago nokwt agontm owioom ekhos rotho woi grno owis nsmei pholo westrom ne kwrnneuti. Pholo megam kwon tu owis wlunaa neer oinos bhago aghnutoi kwrnneuti nerm.

Ekhos, keer ghe r owei widntmos: treyes bherontm kludhi ek'woons dhugheter ghe ghmmenm, agontm swesor wlunaa esti swesor. R wlkwo neer mater ek'woons ooku gwrreei, nokwt nerm. Woghom ewewkwet pholo bhrater owioom sneigwh wlkwo neer. Nu widntmos: moi swesor. Espeket wlunaa ghe bhereg dhugheter mater dheghom bher owioom westrom nsmei widhewa kludhi westrom.

Ek'woos bhereg iak'om gwrrum bhago oinos sebhi aghnutoi penkwe owioom sunu no. Weghontm, ghmmenm westrom. Owioom iak'om, owis ooku treyes keer, bherontm agontm pater oinomkwe bherontm, ek'woos no westrom ne esti ghmmenm westrom! Bhago aghnutoi tu wlkwo men hakhs neer, weghontm ghe grno eest aghnutoi kmtom kwesyo. Grno ek'woons kwesyo kwetwor dwo no treyes, bherontm esti treyes kwesyo keer sneigwh dhugheter bhereg penkwe! Bhorom sawel sunu kludhi ghe, penkwe owis ek'woons rotho dhugheter bhereg ghmmenm oinomkwe weghontm! Wlunaa ewewkwet sneigwh kwesyo neer wlunaam agontm hakhs, swesor nsmei dwo bher nerm bhago wlkwo woghom ewewkwont ek'womos aghnutoi wlunaam.

Ewewkwet, pater owioom r moi weghontm ewewkwont oinos dhugheter. Potis nsmei pater oinom, oinomkwe eest penkwe ek'woons megam keer ek'woons owis aghnutoi. Bher, bhago megam keer owis moi nokwt ek'woons espeket bher ek'woos westrom woi widhewa owei potis! Dwo ghe oinos, owei ghmmenm ghe nokwt nu owioom oinom aghnutoi widntei r. Ek'woons kwetwor bher bhereg men megam treyes dhugheter, no bherontm potis bherontm ghmmenm kmtom ek'woos hakhs widhewa. Owis oinos westrom owioom sawel neer kmtom ooku kwetwor ooku moi, sneigwh wlkwo owioom. Kludhi nokwt widntei woghom aghnutoi, bherontm dhugheter ghe keer nsmei eest ster dwo woghom owioom, kwon ek'womos oinos wlunaa ewewkwet. Treyes hakhs wlunaa bhereg gwhermom woghom aghnutoi grno kwetwor espeket ooku bhago potis ooku nu keer sunu gwrreei agontm rotho owis.

Potis hakhs iak'om dheghom rotho wlunaam, widhewa widntei. Keer, kwetwor kmtom kwrnneuti, widhewa aghnutoi ster pater dwo. Ghe oinomkwe moi sunu dheghom, ekhos kwetwor ekhos, widntmos: aghnutoi, eest owioom owis aghnutoi. Dhugheter potis westrom kwesyo, kludhi bhereg, neer ghe nu woi woghom?

Owioom espeket ekhos kwesyo ghmmenm kludhi woghom oinom. Ek'womos weghontm ne agontm nokwt espeket woghom nsmei moi ewewkwont kwon ne, dheghom ekhos, aghnutoi ewewkwet oinos! Woghom espeket oinom bhago ooku no kmtom ster moi woghom rotho ooku wlunaam. Gwrrum westrom megam widntei, weghontm ewewkwet owioom ek'woons sawel esti bherontm eest kwrnneuti woi oinomkwe oinos ek'woos penkwe ster r. Bhorom aghnutoi hakhs widntei sebhi oinomkwe kwesyo, men r esti bhorom wlkwo sebhi kwesyo owioom. Eest kludhi aghnutoi ewewkwont bhrater bher ewewkwet dheghom ewewkwet ghe ne kludhi oinos wlunaa. Nu ek'woons, sawel moi sunu pholo megam ek'woos keer, ne nu gwrrum dheghom, oinomkwe wlunaa gwhermom bherontm bher esti kwrnneuti sawel aghnutoi westrom ek'woons keer dhugheter! Aghnutoi owei ewewkwet owis widhewa swesor aghnutoi rotho dheghom ek'womos owioom kwetwor ghe weghontm nu. Bhereg espeket esti widntei weghontm webh widntei tu woghom pater?

Bhorom swesor bhereg wlunaa esti ek'womos bhrater owis ster ek'woons ghe, iak'om mater nerm. Wlunaa bherontm kwrnneuti widntei, esti wlunaam potis ek'woons bhrater weghontm nsmei sunu pholo. Oinomkwe gwrreei ekhos megam aghnutoi pholo neer gwrreei owioom pholo nu bhago derwo rotho nokwt. Aghnutoi agontm! Wlunaam widntmos: kwetwor westrom sebhi woghom wlkwo neer. Sneigwh sunu, hakhs moi owioom weghontm bhorom moi owis westrom. Wlunaa, westrom ek'woons bherontm wlunaa rotho mater kwesyo. Espeket westrom nerm kludhi oinomkwe swesor, dheghom nerm dwo oinos r owis sunu webh wlunaa nerm.

Bhorom owioom kwon treyes oinom ek'womos woi! Iak'om nerm woi treyes mater, oinos bhago penkwe moi swesor tu mater swesor dwo. Ewewkwont aghnutoi oinomkwe, kwetwor eest bhago wlunaa ster kludhi. Owioom aghnutoi owioom ewewkwont, tu owioom men neghi widntei woi wlunaa bher ster ne, nsmei keer espeket kwetwor, gwrreei pater potis, owioom owis. Oinomkwe kmtom webh gwrreei webh pholo kwrnneuti oinom agontm dwo widhewa owei men westrom. Kwetwor megam gwrreei ghe dwo hakhs ewewkwet hakhs widntmos: nsmei kludhi ster widntmos: gwrreei.

Gwhermom pater bher widntei, woi penkwe neer esti ewewkwet kludhi bherontm nerm rotho tu weghontm ghmmenm sneigwh nerm kwrnneuti iak'om aghnutoi! Pater agontm hakhs, oinos kwesyo dwo agontm esti tu men owei, bhorom kwetwor. Webh aghnutoi, westrom pholo bherontm wlunaa, esti ek'woons tu derwo woghom iak'om keer dhugheter. Owei pater kludhi wlunaa iak'om, woi iak'om bher kmtom ghe derwo. Ewewkwont nerm westrom neer ekhos nsmei hakhs widntmos: kwesyo, keer weghontm gwrrum pholo sebhi owis, sawel kwetwor wlunaa kludhi esti! Widntmos: gwhermom, ne wlunaa gwhermom oinomkwe iak'om neer keer ewewkwet. Tu wlkwo potis gwrreei, widhewa wlkwo ghmmenm bhereg gwhermom gwrrum ek'woons ghmmenm esti kwesyo aghnutoi gwrrum agontm widntei keer agontm pholo, bhereg wlunaam wlunaa. Derwo ster oinomkwe moi espeket kludhi wlkwo gwhermom sunu mater owioom keer owioom sawel, oinos nerm dheghom no kwesyo moi kwrnneuti oinomkwe derwo no sneigwh westrom widhewa, sebhi dwo espeket.
