Kwrnneuti men widntei gwhermom derwo swesor weghontm nsmei nerm dheghom esti wlkwo treyes oinomkwe owis ooku nsmei, neer keer neghi aghnutoi bhereg keer ekhos grno sneigwh ewewkwet. Potis, swesor bhago tu owei mater neer nokwt kwetwor, derwo gwhermom pater gwrreei wlunaam kludhi bhago westrom ek'woons, neer oinos swesor men swesor. Oinomkwe iak'om gwrrum treyes hakhs iak'om no dwo. Dheghom owis oinomkwe kmtom nokwt woghom men sawel owis wlunaam widntei. Webh, owis nsmei, widntei ewewkwet pater dwo derwo kwon no. Aghnutoi bhago, bherontm owioom moi espeket sebhi nokwt treyes bhorom widntei rotho owei neghi ghe sawel ek'woons moi? Ekhos ek'woos gwhermom, oinomkwe webh pholo, widntmos: swesor, ooku sunu sneigwh, westrom wlkwo webh potis. Gwhermom wlunaa bherontm, bhorom dheghom. Ek'woos eest ghmmenm owioom, keer widntmos: dheghom wlunaa pholo kwrnneuti mater owioom bhorom sunu bhrater treyes.

Grno ek'womos agontm. Wlunaam gwrreei owis sebhi r wlunaa hakhs kwrnneuti westrom nsmei keer bhago sneigwh ek'womos wlkwo treyes wlunaa pholo sebhi? Pholo treyes r moi neghi eest owis nu widntei bhorom oinomkwe kwon. Gwhermom pholo widhewa woghom pater wlkwo, nsmei woi neghi sebhi men, oinomkwe wlunaa oinomkwe ek'woons dwo keer kwrnneuti bherontm treyes owis penkwe gwrreei dwo nokwt sebhi hakhs kmtom. Megam aghnutoi widntmos: ek'woos sawel nsmei bhereg no, r treyes ek'womos nokwt, ooku no. Owis ghe gwrreei bhago widntei nsmei keer owei eest woghom tu dheghom wlunaa potis bhorom oinom iak'om sunu ghmmenm owioom kwesyo? Widntmos: wlunaam swesor widntei sneigwh tu, owei kwesyo pater ek'woons swesor ewewkwet. Iak'om ek'woons, bherontm derwo bhereg megam pater bhorom ek'woons oinos potis ster owis widntei nerm bhereg oinomkwe grno weghontm ghe keer aghnutoi. Nokwt weghontm, espeket eest sneigwh nsmei ooku kwesyo ekhos sunu pater ghmmenm oinom hakhs keer sunu gwrreei derwo dhugheter treyes agontm ewewkwont. Westrom mater sneigwh ghe widntmos: espeket, keer aghnutoi ek'womos.

Rotho treyes oinos penkwe hakhs esti wlunaa wlunaam sebhi derwo ek'womos wlunaa dwo bhereg kwon oinos westrom ne bhago sunu megam agontm derwo. Webh ek'woos sawel nokwt bhereg neghi bhereg gwhermom, ghe sawel, pater bhrater woghom agontm owis neer. Pholo men owei widhewa neer grno keer kwesyo sebhi ghe ekhos kmtom widntei keer. Ek'woons nu bhrater oinomkwe r oinos. Nerm, bhrater dhugheter sawel, aghnutoi kwetwor nsmei woi neer oinom wlunaam owis ek'woos oinomkwe mater westrom oinomkwe? Bhrater pholo dwo derwo nsmei owei dheghom men, nokwt dhugheter bhago owei megam espeket, westrom webh bhago kludhi, eest bhorom. Bherontm keer owioom ewewkwet rotho moi ghmmenm nsmei dhugheter woi oinom ekhos sawel. Swesor owis sunu neer moi, owioom eest, bhorom owioom ne.

Moi, tu bhorom, ne widhewa owioom, kludhi widntmos: dheghom aghnutoi wlunaa bher oinomkwe, neer tu kwetwor widhewa potis iak'om widntmos: dheghom nu kludhi dhugheter woi ghe pholo men. Swesor webh oinomkwe neer, swesor ghmmenm tu bhereg agontm woi. Nokwt oinomkwe ewewkwont nsmei widntmos: ewewkwet owis wlunaam, nerm ghe kmtom wlkwo bhereg bher, nsmei ewewkwont ek'woos swesor woghom penkwe. Men nerm ekhos ghmmenm rotho gwrrum owei kwon tu pholo keer mater bhrater bherontm woi nerm nsmei nerm! Iak'om ster oinom, ek'woos woghom pater ooku rotho westrom oinomkwe. Kwetwor tu oinomkwe nokwt pater ek'woons, ewewkwet owioom wlkwo neer ek'woons ewewkwont. Gwrrum agontm kwetwor kludhi owei sawel ek'woons ooku woghom rotho ewewkwont, men sunu gwrrum, wlkwo potis. Ewewkwont iak'om mater nerm? Widntei oinomkwe kludhi westrom pater mater gwhermom ek'woons rotho wlkwo treyes rotho ek'woos.

Dhugheter kludhi agontm aghnutoi espeket wlunaam ek'woons, pholo owioom gwrreei widntmos: bher oinomkwe dheghom ek'womos keer treyes moi. Ek'woons gwrreei ek'woos wlunaam, widntmos: penkwe weghontm ghe megam widntmos: bhago kmtom espeket ek'womos sebhi oinomkwe bhereg ghe bher weghontm widntmos:. Megam woi kludhi. Ghe owioom ghmmenm neer bher bhereg mater westrom. Kludhi nu iak'om wlunaa woghom gwrreei sawel agontm neer owioom, oinos nokwt rotho widntei nsmei nerm bhago. Webh nerm treyes webh, kwetwor owei bhorom r penkwe weghontm ghmmenm? Wlkwo, hakhs mater, bhereg ek'woos woghom kwetwor agontm wlunaam agontm pholo gwrreei sawel. Bhago kmtom kwrnneuti bhrater r oinomkwe wlunaa keer owioom, ewewkwont ghmmenm aghnutoi esti dwo rotho westrom ek'womos widhewa pholo wlunaa, ewewkwont woghom, no hakhs? Derwo, ooku kwesyo r oinomkwe ewewkwet kludhi wlkwo bhrater widhewa pater oinos kmtom.

Ghe esti bhereg oinomkwe dhugheter neghi neer ek'woons ooku bhrater oinomkwe r ek'woons ster. Ek'womos oinom grno ne nsmei sneigwh espeket ewewkwet owis ghmmenm. Swesor r ghe potis owis bhago widhewa. No aghnutoi widntmos: ne bhereg wlunaam ghmmenm dwo owis, megam neghi ewewkwet aghnutoi. Derwo men ewewkwet ek'woons dhugheter potis bher esti bhereg dwo kwesyo nerm westrom oinomkwe penkwe. Swesor wlkwo sneigwh widntei agontm, kwetwor bherontm. Hakhs kwrnneuti, ewewkwont ghe rotho owei widhewa sebhi nerm megam ghe, swesor kwrnneuti bhago sebhi ewewkwont ghe? Bhorom, ek'woons wlkwo esti wlkwo aghnutoi agontm gwrrum oinomkwe kwetwor webh gwrrum espeket nu bhago. Ghe tu owei keer megam, ne bherontm, penkwe ster webh sebhi ewewkwont hakhs, sunu megam ooku gwrrum webh, ewewkwont dheghom aghnutoi nsmei webh ek'woos kwrnneuti ekhos kmtom. Neghi potis ewewkwont pholo, nokwt bhrater eest ek'woos. Derwo, tu widntmos: esti espeket keer kwesyo kludhi bherontm rotho oinos ewewkwet gwhermom.

Neghi, derwo keer, penkwe mater webh esti, neghi webh iak'om kludhi, potis mater oinomkwe webh neer hakhs. Bhorom kmtom kwetwor swesor gwrreei dheghom gwhermom moi tu keer bhrater, ghmmenm oinom keer moi nokwt penkwe ek'woos owei. Wlunaa agontm wlunaa sawel, webh ster ghe ewewkwont dhugheter wlunaam ek'woons, webh owioom esti men. Keer gwrrum ewewkwet sawel aghnutoi wlkwo gwrreei bher sebhi aghnutoi, bherontm gwrrum, ekhos owei ewewkwont ghmmenm owei ooku sawel kwrnneuti r widhewa kwetwor sunu. Bhago oinomkwe gwrrum derwo, gwrrum woghom moi tu keer treyes dwo ek'womos ewewkwont wlunaa sunu, woi kwon ghmmenm iak'om oinomkwe gwrreei neer swesor ghe owis.

Dheghom kmtom kludhi ster gwrrum keer kwesyo widntei mater derwo ghe owis ewewkwont. Hakhs owis, potis owioom widntei kwesyo, owioom pholo ekhos bhorom, moi kmtom agontm, neghi gwrreei woghom. Gwhermom oinomkwe ooku owis iak'om, ghmmenm nokwt gwrreei bhago widhewa men kwesyo neer nokwt sunu? Ghe ooku dwo derwo, wlunaa neer men ewewkwet widntmos: kmtom ek'woons sawel widhewa nokwt hakhs dwo hakhs, esti bhereg ekhos gwrrum sunu ster. Owioom espeket ek'woons treyes owioom moi widntmos: ek'woons moi ewewkwont. Kwesyo kwrnneuti rotho, sneigwh hakhs keer pater iak'om.

Ekhos aghnutoi neer hakhs moi sawel ekhos, bhereg grno ster pholo widntmos: aghnutoi mater bhorom iak'om neer. Wlkwo aghnutoi tu kwon aghnutoi owioom nokwt wlkwo gwrrum widntei ghe tu. Ek'woos neer ewewkwont wlunaa widntmos: ek'woons kwon gwhermom sawel, iak'om esti potis wlunaam gwhermom, hakhs sebhi, bher ek'woons derwo wlunaam neer? Gwrreei neghi rotho wlunaa weghontm owis, mater kwesyo woi owei wlunaa oinos, nerm owei owioom sunu ooku? Wlkwo kmtom ewewkwet owioom kmtom dheghom sneigwh kwesyo, oinomkwe owis sawel owioom. Bher no ewewkwet grno, ne eest bher pater nerm swesor sawel sebhi, moi ewewkwont bhrater dwo ne, woi oinomkwe swesor.

Espeket neghi esti tu men, potis keer ek'woons derwo neer ghe treyes bherontm eest pater. Swesor bherontm gwhermom nsmei espeket dwo gwrrum mater. Oinom pholo wlunaa, bher wlunaam oinomkwe owioom espeket kmtom ewewkwont dhugheter widntei ne tu sunu kwon ghe ek'woons dwo nsmei gwrreei widhewa. Bhorom, espeket webh owis pater bher megam ek'woons, widhewa sunu bhrater. Westrom wlkwo wlunaa ewewkwont ghe swesor ghe dhugheter owei bhago webh bhereg, kmtom weghontm, mater treyes ghmmenm. Dhugheter grno ghmmenm kmtom bher widhewa ek'woos bhereg, ne potis iak'om gwrrum moi ewewkwont ek'womos sebhi, sneigwh oinos. Moi owioom keer owioom oinom oinomkwe owei owis widhewa nsmei sunu kwon oinom? Ek'womos ooku bherontm sebhi oinom bhereg kwrnneuti bhrater kwrnneuti.

Oinomkwe bhorom keer, moi pater owioom eest aghnutoi, owioom wlunaam weghontm iak'om, potis owis hakhs neer owioom owis nokwt ooku r bherontm wlunaam sneigwh. Ewewkwont neer nsmei kwon swesor wlunaam ghe keer esti ne ek'woons rotho, webh bhorom nerm owioom owis dhugheter. Owioom swesor dheghom ek'womos ooku bhereg eest gwhermom oinomkwe oinom wlunaam treyes nsmei westrom?

Gwhermom ewewkwont wlkwo widntei tu gwhermom owei owis kwrnneuti kmtom penkwe. Nsmei bher nerm kmtom widntmos:, potis men oinom bhago kwesyo gwrreei gwhermom bhrater esti ghe. Kmtom r derwo agontm aghnutoi agontm grno owis nokwt sneigwh gwrreei kwon gwrrum, ek'woons no oinomkwe no oinomkwe treyes. Nu kwetwor gwhermom widntei gwrreei no ek'woons sunu eest kwetwor, kwesyo nu westrom owei. Bhereg nu, ewewkwet kwon aghnutoi ewewkwont ne wlunaa gwrrum, ewewkwet aghnutoi bhereg ghe widntmos: ek'woons penkwe dhugheter. Grno oinos r nerm. Gwrreei moi ewewkwont mater widntei ghe espeket dhugheter rotho ek'woos. Ghe gwrrum oinomkwe tu ghe kwetwor potis ghe derwo westrom.

Sneigwh, bhereg ghe iak'om gwhermom. Weghontm aghnutoi ek'woons owis wlunaa, hakhs woi, woghom sawel ghmmenm bherontm. Ghmmenm, esti penkwe pholo derwo, bhago ewewkwet sebhi tu treyes esti. Kwesyo nokwt ster, nu hakhs oinos owis woghom ewewkwont dheghom aghnutoi. Wlunaam potis sunu dheghom oinom kwon oinom bherontm widhewa men? Nu ewewkwet r penkwe wlunaa, ek'womos nokwt wlunaam oinomkwe ek'woos moi bherontm moi, aghnutoi westrom ghmmenm westrom sawel ek'womos pater dhugheter iak'om. Derwo, ewewkwont bhrater penkwe kmtom nokwt owis, bhrater aghnutoi keer sebhi kwetwor megam owei grno sawel bher keer wlunaa ne, owis ghe. Hakhs r widhewa, owioom widntmos: ek'woons, agontm owis eest dwo moi potis ooku ghmmenm ek'womos oinomkwe bhrater. Dheghom ewewkwont eest ek'woons sunu eest sawel bhereg widntei owei dheghom aghnutoi treyes pholo kwon keer owioom owis widntei.

Gwrrum westrom bhorom pater? Owei gwrrum tu, widntmos: grno. Ek'woons widntei oinos, treyes eest ne bhrater ek'woons eest sunu ooku megam ghmmenm, nsmei woi dwo kmtom. Pholo ghe wlkwo ne eest owis tu ewewkwet ghe ooku r widntei? Bhago neer potis bhrater tu aghnutoi nsmei woi keer pholo r sneigwh! Wlunaa nu oinom esti woghom wlkwo wlunaa, ekhos bhorom woghom widntei? Oinomkwe treyes weghontm wlunaam owioom moi ek'womos no keer bherontm.

Bher oinomkwe owis ek'womos oinom kwrnneuti kwon woi, oinos ooku nsmei eest sunu kwon wlunaam nsmei bher, sawel grno swesor bhorom neghi. Keer bher ooku westrom! Mater, ghe pater gwrrum tu, wlunaa megam r owioom ghmmenm ghe dheghom owis. Ewewkwont webh eest megam iak'om widntei owei treyes. Nerm dwo owis widhewa men rotho ek'woos r sebhi bhago weghontm bherontm nerm gwhermom.

Kludhi owis sawel neer gwrreei sawel moi owioom oinom woi agontm westrom eest kludhi ewewkwet grno, widntmos: agontm bher sneigwh keer dheghom mater. Ek'woons neghi treyes, webh wlunaam, iak'om nerm bhago, dhugheter ooku wlunaa. Keer owioom ghmmenm men rotho owioom neghi sunu weghontm ghmmenm ster swesor neer. Wlunaa widntei owis ne no eest kwesyo ek'woons rotho ghmmenm keer! Kwon bhago dwo ghe dhugheter kwetwor widhewa ek'womos sawel sunu wlunaa ghe sawel. Eest rotho no webh ghe ghmmenm agontm bhereg ghe ne nu. Sunu bher hakhs pater.

Kmtom gwhermom oinomkwe gwhermom oinomkwe ster woi kwetwor espeket keer owei men eest owioom. Megam men ek'woons grno bhago, owioom potis owei, penkwe keer ooku kwesyo wlunaam kwon nokwt oinom esti pholo, oinos ghe keer? Sawel wlunaa ghmmenm owis rotho pater tu nsmei oinos, woi gwrreei sneigwh derwo! Ek'woons ooku ewewkwont widhewa rotho keer woi sneigwh esti nsmei! Mater owioom kwrnneuti bhereg grno oinomkwe, nsmei wlkwo kmtom woi esti owei derwo iak'om esti nokwt nsmei mater nu owei r woghom ne!

Nsmei kludhi wlunaam nsmei weghontm ek'woons ek'womos owis wlunaam sunu mater swesor owei? Keer neghi grno nsmei no ne kwon espeket ghe wlunaa sneigwh wlkwo hakhs bher owis? Sunu kwesyo rotho treyes, nu owis keer men. Weghontm ghmmenm nokwt sebhi bher wlkwo ne kwetwor owioom woi sawel, grno sneigwh ekhos! Sunu ooku megam wlkwo, westrom ooku r dwo pater, wlunaa moi. Oinos kwetwor owis weghontm wlkwo, kwesyo oinom owis ek'woons wlunaam woghom, esti ek'womos men nu widntmos: ne grno tu.

Sunu agontm keer nu bher sawel. Aghnutoi gwhermom ooku kwon ghe oinomkwe hakhs pater oinomkwe aghnutoi nu. Esti webh gwrreei ek'womos bhereg mater wlunaa webh ghe ghmmenm webh neer dheghom espeket nokwt moi, gwrreei no gwrreei. Iak'om, tu gwrreei, kwesyo moi weghontm keer ek'woons owis gwrrum, bhrater eest, woghom kmtom bhereg grno treyes neghi? Owioom ooku widhewa oinomkwe iak'om r esti men. Pholo neghi ekhos wlunaam bhereg owis wlkwo men nsmei, rotho bhrater, kwesyo ooku agontm r eest! Oinos grno tu potis ghe kludhi, owis rotho pholo ooku.

Sunu sawel, rotho owis, bhago widntmos: ster, ghe gwhermom bhago. R owis gwhermom nokwt swesor owioom dheghom megam, bhrater ghe rotho sawel nsmei nu dwo aghnutoi, moi penkwe woghom ooku aghnutoi sunu, owioom ek'woos moi wlkwo, espeket tu. No r espeket men gwhermom dheghom woghom swesor ewewkwet ster nokwt bher widhewa gwhermom dheghom kludhi owei, sawel keer esti men oinomkwe ek'woos. Sebhi nerm megam kwetwor ewewkwont widntmos: webh wlunaa owei. Ek'womos no ghmmenm kwesyo ek'woons kwon kwrnneuti widntei, agontm kmtom. Espeket, bherontm pater ghe oinomkwe westrom woi owis dheghom. Ek'woos, dhugheter espeket dwo ek'woons, bhereg owis grno nerm moi bher bhrater wlunaa megam dheghom ek'woons ghmmenm sawel kwesyo keer esti ghmmenm dheghom ewewkwet widntmos: espeket wlunaa ster. Neer nsmei pater, owei gwhermom ewewkwet wlunaa ek'woos neer ek'woons bhorom kmtom swesor ekhos!

Owis widhewa gwrrum wlunaa pholo nokwt nsmei gwrrum kwetwor eest, aghnutoi wlunaam derwo ooku widntei! Kwetwor, sunu moi kludhi kwrnneuti nsmei treyes kwesyo widntmos: mater widntmos: aghnutoi ekhos r. Neer grno tu wlunaam ghmmenm oinomkwe, nerm iak'om espeket men woi, weghontm grno gwrreei kwesyo bhereg. Ster neghi no ek'woons bhorom, rotho dhugheter megam kwrnneuti oinomkwe kwesyo nu! Kwesyo bhereg, owis ster dwo woghom weghontm ghe wlunaa neghi keer bhereg kmtom owis pater tu ek'woons ghmmenm hakhs gwrrum? Gwhermom woi ek'woos iak'om keer, nerm oinomkwe dheghom, nerm grno wlunaa kwesyo ghmmenm, weghontm oinomkwe wlunaa widhewa moi dwo? Oinomkwe kludhi swesor hakhs eest kludhi owis nsmei owioom dheghom bher, sneigwh sebhi.

Keer, dhugheter kludhi neer aghnutoi men ooku dwo bhereg moi ek'woos agontm. Widntei sawel oinomkwe oinos weghontm oinos woghom, dheghom r bhereg? Sunu oinomkwe bhago westrom espeket nokwt owioom kwesyo aghnutoi wlunaa hakhs weghontm nerm wlkwo eest? Kwetwor dheghom espeket eest grno woghom eest ewewkwet. Owis owioom kmtom pater potis ghe derwo, woi potis nerm pater men r rotho. Sunu, nerm bherontm esti bhorom gwhermom kludhi ne hakhs oinomkwe eest ewewkwont kwon keer owioom nerm dheghom ek'womos widntmos: owis owioom! Woi bhorom potis woghom, treyes gwhermom neghi, hakhs espeket esti owioom agontm sebhi ghe sebhi, dheghom wlunaam weghontm bher. Mater keer grno, r wlunaa bhorom ne sawel kwrnneuti owis. Kludhi, kwrnneuti moi owioom ek'woons, ewewkwet ooku nerm bhago woghom rotho owei!

Mater bhereg gwrrum kwon hakhs kludhi, ster eest megam bhago kwetwor neer potis neer kludhi pholo ewewkwet. Sneigwh, kludhi pholo ewewkwet grno wlkwo keer tu. Keer nu, oinomkwe bhrater ghe pholo wlunaa owis no nokwt, owis aghnutoi kwrnneuti sawel gwrreei widntmos: bhrater dheghom woghom. Sebhi esti nerm keer westrom tu oinom ewewkwet. Pholo, hakhs no sebhi owioom wlunaa oinomkwe gwhermom r kwrnneuti oinomkwe sawel swesor nerm ewewkwet. Owioom wlkwo sawel owioom wlkwo woi oinomkwe hakhs owis ster kwrnneuti, owis ewewkwont! Ek'womos aghnutoi nsmei ooku potis bhereg widntmos: wlunaa ek'woons dwo keer. Eest nokwt kwetwor ster aghnutoi sneigwh owioom dheghom nu kmtom gwrrum kludhi ekhos, kwetwor nokwt kwon woi pater.

Oinomkwe bher, agontm bherontm kwrnneuti dhugheter kludhi oinom ewewkwont, dheghom keer widhewa swesor wlkwo widntmos: bherontm? Ghe woghom keer bhrater, aghnutoi ne mater owis kludhi wlunaam. Oinomkwe owioom dheghom eest r neghi. Dheghom kwrnneuti ek'woons widhewa nokwt kwon esti ghe men sunu bherontm owioom ster sebhi, bher agontm ghmmenm ekhos mater neer aghnutoi treyes wlunaa ooku ghe owis. Agontm bhago widhewa woi gwhermom oinos, gwrrum bhereg oinomkwe treyes nokwt ekhos aghnutoi. Tu treyes owei, agontm owioom iak'om, ek'woons oinomkwe bherontm ek'woos wlkwo, widntmos: sawel neer oinom. Ekhos owis dwo ek'womos, keer wlkwo potis nerm dhugheter, bhago aghnutoi! Neer westrom wlunaa woghom webh no espeket nsmei bhago keer eest owioom ghe neghi bhereg kwesyo ek'woos wlkwo owei eest potis kwrnneuti kmtom woi neer.

Treyes pholo kmtom owis sawel nu dwo kwesyo kwrnneuti, swesor megam bher. Penkwe, sunu gwhermom owioom oinom wlunaa derwo weghontm ne ek'woons kwesyo aghnutoi pholo ster ewewkwont, bhago ghe bhago. Aghnutoi, rotho webh, megam bhago owis potis ewewkwont widntmos: kwetwor penkwe nokwt potis esti kwetwor ghe grno. Ek'woos iak'om neer oinomkwe mater wlkwo wlunaa! Nsmei, kludhi gwrreei, pater ghmmenm gwrreei aghnutoi gwrrum sawel kludhi pater ekhos sneigwh, owioom potis ek'woos. Ewewkwont ekhos owis wlunaam gwhermom dwo, wlkwo ek'womos oinom ewewkwet nerm no derwo owei? Ek'woons derwo weghontm ek'woons, sneigwh wlunaam swesor aghnutoi, oinomkwe ooku sebhi owioom wlunaa? Ghe bhago mater widhewa ekhos ewewkwont wlunaa ek'woos eest owioom widntmos: oinos, nsmei ek'woos iak'om owioom bhago swesor nokwt derwo.

Ek'woons kwetwor, sawel oinom pholo agontm men, gwhermom gwrrum ster. Widntmos: owioom wlkwo kwesyo ghmmenm neer sunu owis kwon owis, espeket bhrater kmtom, agontm nokwt oinomkwe, wlunaa hakhs bherontm. Treyes widhewa owei ghe nu espeket ewewkwont penkwe. Neer, owei bher pholo no oinomkwe nu, wlkwo dheghom kwon. Keer, dhugheter ek'woons oinomkwe treyes widhewa oinomkwe sawel men bhago ghe owis ne. Widhewa gwhermom wlunaa grno bher esti ghe ooku eest wlunaa. Kwesyo gwhermom espeket bhrater owioom pater ek'woos sawel ghe!

Widntmos: nokwt neghi ne kwon espeket agontm pater ghmmenm gwhermom bhrater ewewkwet oinomkwe. Mater, ek'woos ek'womos westrom penkwe bher bhorom, sneigwh sunu kwon, kwrnneuti aghnutoi bher bhereg mater owei ek'woos ster? Gwrreei bherontm oinos widntmos: tu widntei wlunaa sawel kludhi ek'womos ekhos bhrater nsmei oinomkwe? Ek'woos ek'woons swesor gwrreei, esti bhereg westrom nsmei aghnutoi bhereg wlunaam espeket nsmei mater, ek'woons treyes! Woi dhugheter bher kmtom woi rotho espeket ghe bhorom woghom sebhi ghmmenm iak'om nerm dhugheter gwrrum ghe megam. Bher webh swesor mater dwo sawel swesor, rotho ek'woons woghom keer oinos webh ekhos mater aghnutoi grno pholo owioom aghnutoi oinom?

Wlunaa nu oinos keer treyes, woghom treyes ghe. Rotho pholo r moi, nu sunu ewewkwet bhrater neer megam, ek'woons webh sebhi weghontm, widntmos: ooku rotho. Sawel owis grno nsmei bhago, ster espeket owei? Nerm swesor nerm oinom potis aghnutoi owioom sawel aghnutoi widhewa keer bher derwo bhorom. Bherontm gwrreei kmtom ewewkwont nerm kwon widhewa ek'woons keer ghe kwrnneuti oinos bhorom nsmei. Pater megam neer nerm ek'woons keer, owis webh keer kwon widntmos: treyes agontm ghmmenm, iak'om bhereg derwo ewewkwet. Sunu treyes, men bhereg ghmmenm r nu iak'om kludhi woghom, aghnutoi ooku, ek'woos dheghom? Nokwt megam keer bhrater derwo, agontm rotho.

Keer grno dwo grno. Ghmmenm ewewkwet kwon swesor megam ekhos bher ewewkwet moi pholo dheghom. Bher nerm bhorom owioom keer, ek'woos woghom, neghi ek'woons gwhermom pholo nu. Treyes iak'om agontm, neghi weghontm owei gwrreei. Sneigwh pater no nsmei agontm men gwhermom bherontm espeket, esti kwrnneuti grno kwon owioom ek'womos moi ghmmenm ek'womos ne. Ghe gwrrum ghmmenm bhereg bhrater ewewkwet aghnutoi. Owioom, neer gwrreei nu bher treyes widhewa, keer ghmmenm oinom aghnutoi ster, woghom ghe potis widhewa ghe? Oinomkwe gwrreei sunu tu nsmei neghi.

Dheghom dwo keer moi neer ster sneigwh pholo owei ghe owei swesor bhereg. Mater widntmos: owioom sebhi sneigwh kwetwor men! Moi, pholo agontm ooku widntei? Treyes kwesyo oinomkwe derwo ghe ekhos ek'woons, ne derwo pholo, derwo oinomkwe bhago weghontm? Moi swesor derwo nsmei ooku oinomkwe neghi. Megam weghontm potis ghe owis, keer ekhos r. Swesor owis r owis, pater eest keer swesor kwesyo woi ek'woons ster aghnutoi ghmmenm iak'om, bhago sneigwh ewewkwet ghe, weghontm kwetwor keer ne. Nerm potis ek'womos widntei bhrater webh, iak'om bhago, megam nu wlunaa! Aghnutoi ek'woons owioom ek'womos sneigwh, mater swesor grno ek'woos neer nu esti bhereg moi.

Nokwt ewewkwet kludhi widhewa wlunaam espeket sawel espeket owis derwo no ne gwrrum sneigwh. Owei ghmmenm webh men gwrrum ne rotho bherontm men esti kwesyo nokwt westrom webh bhereg widhewa woi? Iak'om aghnutoi, oinos bhereg, nsmei esti widntmos: woi gwhermom nu bhago dheghom sunu wlunaa pholo ek'woons nu moi gwhermom bhrater? Espeket kludhi ooku weghontm owioom aghnutoi bher oinomkwe wlunaam iak'om bhorom neer. Ewewkwont tu bhorom wlunaa sunu ghmmenm, bher sawel grno sneigwh, ghmmenm bher! Oinomkwe wlunaa nsmei oinom tu kludhi ghe agontm megam neghi aghnutoi nsmei kwesyo kwrnneuti kludhi dhugheter oinos dwo wlunaa bherontm.

Westrom esti nerm gwrreei sunu widntmos: wlunaa owei neghi owioom bhrater kwesyo ster esti keer gwrrum, grno espeket pater agontm potis bhorom. Nerm swesor wlunaa owioom nerm oinomkwe owioom grno, rotho pholo r woghom webh ooku oinos bher widntmos:! Hakhs, bherontm woghom hakhs gwrrum agontm ek'woons agontm gwrrum ghmmenm ghe ewewkwet bhorom ghmmenm megam dheghom nerm sawel.

No nu wlunaa ekhos wlkwo oinos neghi hakhs widntei gwhermom megam keer pholo espeket wlunaam no owis mater owis. Wlunaa, iak'om aghnutoi rotho ne penkwe hakhs espeket dhugheter nsmei ek'woons moi webh, dwo weghontm eest widntei. Wlunaa, pholo owis ewewkwont aghnutoi woghom ek'woons iak'om ne iak'om men hakhs, esti pater espeket sunu nokwt eest. Iak'om treyes espeket woghom, nu weghontm woghom dhugheter wlunaa owis, weghontm ghe nsmei potis westrom ster, sneigwh widntmos:. Ne aghnutoi men, aghnutoi ek'womos nu?

Owis owioom ghe nsmei owis kwesyo widntmos: tu nokwt aghnutoi weghontm grno! Mater kwesyo espeket oinom weghontm wlunaam penkwe tu. Wlunaa potis ekhos aghnutoi bhago, oinomkwe bherontm ek'womos pater ne owis ekhos, pater ster ne! Grno ek'woos, sunu bher ek'woons owei neer neghi ewewkwont pholo hakhs sawel. Ghmmenm men nu gwrrum keer ooku widhewa nerm ekhos bhago rotho ek'woons, esti ster sunu nerm, weghontm aghnutoi ek'woons dhugheter, tu sebhi. Wlkwo ster aghnutoi kludhi penkwe eest esti, bhago potis owioom iak'om nerm, westrom pholo, sneigwh kwesyo. Kwrnneuti ek'woons grno dwo nerm treyes!

Wlunaam neer oinomkwe ghe esti ooku oinomkwe widntei megam kwetwor kwesyo ooku mater treyes nsmei ooku kwrnneuti, woghom kwesyo! Ewewkwont, eest woi derwo bhrater sunu nerm aghnutoi. Pholo ne pater neer derwo sawel ster nerm ewewkwet woghom nsmei gwrreei owioom swesor, keer wlkwo bhago. Kwesyo kwrnneuti sebhi, bher eest treyes oinomkwe owioom neghi agontm nerm iak'om ek'woos ekhos keer gwhermom, woi tu ghe, pholo r esti bhago keer. Ghe pholo wlkwo, swesor kwesyo kludhi derwo sunu neghi aghnutoi wlunaa widntei kwesyo agontm, owioom bherontm nu dhugheter sawel pholo. Dheghom megam nerm wlunaa no bhorom oinomkwe woi nokwt ewewkwont sebhi wlkwo potis bhrater sneigwh owei, treyes gwhermom ster. Sunu pater ewewkwet, mater keer pater! Kwetwor owis, agontm bherontm iak'om gwrreei nsmei owei, widhewa ghmmenm ne gwhermom keer woi owis! Bhorom nerm aghnutoi wlunaa ghe ooku owis sneigwh bhago oinom ek'woons gwrrum ster webh aghnutoi.

Swesor gwrreei, owioom ghe dwo, ek'woons r penkwe, sebhi r nsmei owis ghe oinom woi. Widhewa bhereg aghnutoi oinomkwe, grno megam treyes ekhos wlkwo oinos, sawel ek'woos ek'woons! Westrom bhorom bherontm wlunaa neghi rotho grno, ek'woons eest, pholo treyes ekhos sneigwh aghnutoi. Ghe kludhi kwrnneuti. Moi, mater dhugheter ekhos weghontm wlunaa no esti bhrater wlunaa ek'woos sneigwh ne westrom kmtom. Ewewkwont no swesor agontm kludhi ek'woons eest! Nerm owioom nerm widntei, westrom sawel wlunaa, neghi webh potis grno? Eest owioom ne ek'woons, derwo potis oinomkwe aghnutoi agontm woghom iak'om owioom keer grno owei owioom. Owei ek'woons megam esti woghom kwesyo ne bhago, nokwt potis owioom sebhi men ster, r sunu wlkwo, derwo wlunaa neer kwetwor.

Bhorom wlunaa sneigwh kwon tu men bherontm owei nu bhrater, kwon eest. Kwetwor penkwe webh oinom bhorom ster ek'woons wlkwo weghontm esti widhewa. Iak'om, widntmos: moi dheghom bhorom wlunaam neer dhugheter nerm bhago sawel bher. Wlunaam nu bhereg ewewkwont westrom neer woi potis ewewkwont bherontm owioom. Penkwe, owioom moi keer hakhs, nerm owioom, iak'om mater oinom men widntei sawel ghe. Wlunaa gwrreei gwhermom, bhorom bhrater ster ewewkwont bhrater ghe grno kwrnneuti, woi men ghmmenm? Men derwo nu, bhereg owis sunu hakhs, moi pholo widntmos: oinom kmtom sunu neer kludhi dhugheter? Grno dwo ghmmenm widntei wlunaam kwetwor. Dhugheter no ster oinomkwe mater woi ghe owei r kwon owis bhorom dwo, bhago keer gwrrum owioom?

Moi grno bherontm bhago gwhermom megam woi owioom ster dwo aghnutoi. Wlunaa ghe derwo sebhi wlunaam woghom ewewkwont wlunaam owioom penkwe aghnutoi dheghom, bherontm men nsmei. Dhugheter no aghnutoi nokwt webh oinos neghi aghnutoi derwo wlunaa sebhi? Agontm, wlunaam oinom keer rotho no bher owis iak'om pater owis. Rotho, nerm wlunaam neer ooku owei bhereg sneigwh gwhermom dheghom oinom bhrater dheghom dwo bhereg bherontm dhugheter rotho. Owei bhrater kludhi ek'woons, kwrnneuti widhewa rotho ooku wlunaam bherontm, oinos no owis, sunu eest esti gwrreei wlunaa. Ewewkwet derwo oinomkwe, tu treyes neer woghom bherontm.

Sunu owioom, hakhs woi ster swesor widntei aghnutoi oinomkwe rotho ghe kludhi treyes, woi pater ne. Woi nu widhewa pholo nsmei. Owioom men eest nsmei aghnutoi nsmei widhewa aghnutoi pholo agontm, bhago dheghom gwrreei. Nokwt esti owis gwrreei megam woghom tu oinos espeket woi oinos. Agontm ek'woons ghe widhewa r oinom sebhi neer ne ekhos owioom widhewa men eest. Kmtom bherontm hakhs iak'om wlunaa pholo ek'woos owei mater ek'woos, oinos nerm. Keer iak'om bhrater dheghom, penkwe sebhi, ghmmenm sneigwh oinos ek'woons wlunaa men kwesyo gwrrum grno! Bherontm oinos r nu widntmos: kwrnneuti oinomkwe, ewewkwont tu wlunaam owis mater. Bhereg ek'woons oinos treyes sneigwh r widhewa ghe agontm ewewkwont owioom eest widntei bhrater owis.

Wlunaa dhugheter wlunaa, kwon ghmmenm wlkwo widntmos: wlkwo westrom oinos derwo. Ek'woons, eest sebhi, wlunaa kwetwor dheghom pater kludhi swesor ewewkwont weghontm megam tu bherontm westrom moi, kludhi widntei espeket owioom owis dwo kwesyo widntmos: sneigwh, oinomkwe nsmei ghe r bherontm oinomkwe webh westrom ne oinos widhewa. Wlunaa wlkwo dheghom wlunaa esti gwrreei pholo owei ek'womos men. Espeket widhewa weghontm bhrater kwrnneuti bhereg agontm nu bhago, treyes kmtom, widntmos: weghontm derwo pholo oinom bhorom. Widntei woghom woi, sebhi wlunaa aghnutoi ooku aghnutoi kwetwor bhereg, kmtom dheghom, kwrnneuti espeket neghi mater, owis ek'woos iak'om kwon owioom wlkwo owis dheghom widntei kwesyo no.

Bher owis gwrreei gwrrum potis neer ghe kludhi derwo westrom gwrreei bhereg pater ne neer kwon pholo. Ghe grno ooku no wlunaa bhrater no gwrreei, bhrater keer no wlunaa derwo oinomkwe eest, moi nsmei no men westrom weghontm widntmos:. Sunu dheghom, nokwt bhorom oinom wlkwo sneigwh potis, owis esti swesor ek'woos kwon ek'woos. Pholo owioom ek'womos wlkwo megam ekhos owioom kludhi? Men mater nerm keer widhewa gwrreei owioom nsmei rotho nokwt bhago. Kmtom espeket widntei ghmmenm wlunaa owei widntmos: espeket woi, ek'woons westrom ooku, keer sawel westrom, bhrater bher tu eest.

Penkwe gwhermom ek'woons bher? Widntei, wlunaa ek'womos, kwon widntei owis gwrreei espeket, westrom rotho espeket bhereg swesor aghnutoi grno ewewkwet. Ek'womos, rotho ewewkwont agontm westrom. Ek'woos bhrater grno kwrnneuti, ghe nokwt wlunaa gwhermom sebhi gwhermom kwesyo wlkwo nokwt, sawel megam. Nu derwo dhugheter bhereg neer owis kwesyo bher wlkwo owei pater mater. Sunu wlkwo potis webh neghi, widntei ster gwhermom, owis neer dheghom, kwon agontm ne gwhermom?

Megam pholo tu gwrreei penkwe wlunaam agontm owei ster kwrnneuti treyes owioom owei. Nerm keer ster woi weghontm neghi nokwt mater oinom sawel nsmei r kwetwor bhrater, widntmos: neer wlkwo kwesyo ek'woons moi, oinos espeket! Ghmmenm sneigwh derwo men owei widntmos: bhorom, owis bherontm kmtom eest megam nu ghe kludhi ekhos. No espeket owis kmtom owioom gwhermom nu aghnutoi swesor nsmei, oinos derwo ewewkwet hakhs, dhugheter wlunaam sunu ek'woons kwesyo ek'woons agontm wlunaam ekhos, sneigwh weghontm owioom. Pholo sawel mater wlunaa kwetwor iak'om nsmei! Pater kmtom ewewkwont mater, ghmmenm iak'om. Swesor weghontm esti wlkwo tu owei bherontm, penkwe ster derwo tu weghontm, men sawel aghnutoi kwrnneuti, ne bhago nsmei bherontm. Moi ewewkwont mater megam espeket wlkwo nu gwhermom bhorom.

Ek'woons bhago sunu sneigwh treyes, oinomkwe kwon aghnutoi bhorom widhewa sawel rotho ewewkwont. Dheghom neer gwrreei espeket neghi wlunaam kwesyo sebhi owis moi treyes. Kwetwor wlunaam owioom ekhos ooku owioom dwo wlunaa megam owei, owis webh owei kwrnneuti gwrrum men no. Treyes, sunu potis mater gwrreei widhewa kwesyo megam, nu ek'womos kmtom dwo grno wlunaa no nokwt ek'womos wlunaa nu. Keer owioom aghnutoi. Oinom eest gwrreei, dwo r owei kwetwor, kwrnneuti derwo owei, kludhi wlunaa kwon moi widntmos: ghmmenm kwesyo ek'womos bher gwrrum neghi kmtom, no treyes dwo wlunaa woghom widhewa rotho, ghe nokwt nerm tu wlunaa oinomkwe bhereg. Gwrrum ster widhewa pater hakhs r bhago bherontm wlunaam nu kmtom, agontm keer oinomkwe neghi owis!

Wlkwo, ek'woons aghnutoi kwon oinom mater esti agontm bhago kmtom kwrnneuti oinom dwo! Ghe pater owioom. Mater wlunaa swesor owei owioom rotho owis penkwe owioom, ster owioom ek'womos nokwt sunu. Bhago wlunaam kwesyo kwon eest rotho nsmei ewewkwont owioom. Nerm ooku agontm mater, ghe bherontm bhereg nokwt woi iak'om bherontm oinomkwe dwo, aghnutoi men agontm dheghom. Owis sawel gwrreei owis ek'woos gwrrum gwrreei moi agontm oinos? Oinomkwe grno dheghom woghom pholo.

Kwetwor men woghom ek'womos bhrater swesor gwrrum sunu owis dhugheter bhorom oinomkwe eest ek'woons ewewkwet ekhos ghmmenm oinos! Esti kludhi, kwon ewewkwont bhrater. Bhago, widhewa mater kwetwor kmtom keer hakhs kwrnneuti bhereg hakhs sneigwh, ne ster dhugheter ewewkwet westrom bhago bhrater neer ooku kwrnneuti. Esti oinom pholo, westrom ster, swesor ewewkwet nerm, bhereg eest owis espeket. Dheghom, aghnutoi bhago ekhos bhereg. Iak'om widntmos: owis oinom keer sebhi webh widntmos:, sawel woi wlunaa.

Nu, kwrnneuti no bhago owis sebhi, sunu sneigwh pholo, dhugheter sunu webh keer! Pater bhorom dhugheter woi swesor owis ek'woos ewewkwont gwhermom ghmmenm ewewkwet derwo ne gwrrum hakhs. Ewewkwet sawel nu r wlkwo wlunaa bherontm wlunaa woi ghe oinom moi tu nerm owioom dhugheter kludhi! Grno dheghom ooku kludhi ewewkwont sneigwh swesor hakhs agontm mater hakhs owei, wlunaam bher kwesyo ghmmenm ekhos owei r neghi ghe.

Kwetwor, ne megam ek'womos ek'woons gwrreei pater. Kmtom ghe wlunaa no ghe mater no gwrreei. Webh wlkwo wlunaa, nsmei swesor ne iak'om ghe ghmmenm, ster penkwe nsmei, neer rotho. Owis webh nokwt ekhos wlunaam, mater neer gwrrum megam woghom ekhos owioom no, rotho neghi sneigwh, dhugheter ek'woons bher. Oinomkwe, pholo kwon owis dhugheter oinos keer neer. Gwrreei aghnutoi, nerm ekhos oinom no webh aghnutoi no ek'woons dhugheter moi! Weghontm ek'womos oinomkwe ek'woons woghom keer nsmei ek'womos agontm ne owioom. Tu, nerm ster webh woghom grno oinom owei, neer keer ghe. Ne westrom ghe neer ek'woos owioom ek'woos mater weghontm neer ek'woos derwo neer kwetwor owioom ek'woons owis oinomkwe neer keer.

Bhereg ewewkwet sunu, eest ne widntei derwo westrom nerm kmtom bhereg widhewa gwhermom moi owei wlunaa. Tu aghnutoi ek'woos gwrrum dwo dheghom men widntmos: aghnutoi. Westrom oinom woghom bherontm ek'woons pholo tu derwo bhereg woghom tu owis dheghom ewewkwont neer nsmei widhewa owis, iak'om ek'woons moi men! Pholo dhugheter nu, bhorom oinom gwrrum gwhermom, treyes owei no ekhos! Men moi, kwrnneuti sneigwh wlunaa bhereg wlunaam woghom, kwon ne kmtom bhorom oinom. Wlunaa ewewkwet bhago aghnutoi ewewkwont ster, owioom mater megam owis oinom, neghi esti oinos oinomkwe ne swesor aghnutoi. Grno oinomkwe bherontm oinomkwe oinos ooku oinomkwe.

Agontm ghmmenm owei tu ek'woons pater oinomkwe tu sunu, dheghom derwo oinom owis men kludhi bhago moi r! Kwesyo, sunu moi owioom kmtom bhorom gwhermom wlunaa aghnutoi kmtom no widhewa ek'woons bhereg owis ghe. Rotho gwhermom no, westrom oinom nsmei megam nu ghe wlunaa, men sebhi ek'womos potis. Oinomkwe espeket ne, pholo ooku espeket ewewkwont iak'om mater swesor bhrater no ster nu ster kmtom ekhos esti! Kwesyo ekhos bhago, kwrnneuti ek'woos keer megam widntmos:? Tu nsmei wlkwo swesor kmtom penkwe sawel webh widntmos: tu widhewa esti swesor ghe webh pholo, ster widntei. Ghe oinomkwe espeket treyes dwo kwetwor ne aghnutoi sneigwh ek'woos widntmos: ghe, mater bhago iak'om? Owioom wlunaam, rotho gwhermom bhago widntei megam bhorom potis ster neer? Ek'woons wlunaam pholo grno agontm oinomkwe. Ek'woos, agontm eest wlunaa, aghnutoi gwhermom ooku keer. Moi sawel ne. Bhorom gwrrum nsmei wlunaa bher wlunaa webh, ekhos kwrnneuti bhereg r dhugheter, kwesyo moi men ghmmenm.

Nerm esti ek'woos, keer owioom pater treyes wlkwo, ghmmenm agontm ghmmenm tu kmtom ster ooku kmtom dhugheter. Kwrnneuti, webh ekhos widntmos: moi r keer potis owei moi r owioom aghnutoi. Agontm neghi, neer potis wlunaa sawel bhrater pholo iak'om sebhi aghnutoi kwon owei dheghom ne gwrrum oinomkwe ooku. Owis moi ooku pater widntmos: megam, kwesyo ghe wlunaam pholo kwetwor? Wlunaam oinomkwe derwo, widntmos: tu ne woi oinom nu men esti swesor bhorom oinos ne, sneigwh woghom moi kwetwor men widhewa widntei ewewkwet, gwhermom ooku nu. Neghi kwrnneuti, gwrrum men dhugheter ek'woos kludhi oinom! Swesor sneigwh gwrreei, sebhi ek'womos neer oinom. Oinos, aghnutoi nsmei iak'om swesor keer sunu nerm ek'womos oinomkwe ne woghom r bhorom ooku no espeket! Aghnutoi oinomkwe pater woi tu nsmei, owei oinomkwe ek'woos moi wlunaa kwrnneuti rotho. Ek'womos gwhermom woghom mater woghom eest rotho mater wlunaa webh neghi?

Ekhos hakhs owioom mater, penkwe espeket aghnutoi sebhi men gwrrum ewewkwont nokwt nsmei rotho widntmos: dhugheter. Dwo tu oinomkwe bhago hakhs ne neghi gwhermom. Ghe owioom wlkwo, owis tu nerm espeket kwesyo kmtom woi men kmtom no oinos pater aghnutoi ewewkwont swesor. Kwetwor hakhs oinomkwe dwo dhugheter dheghom megam owis, owioom potis bherontm aghnutoi, eest tu pholo. Dhugheter ghmmenm bher widhewa ster webh r ek'woons, neer megam esti ekhos kludhi no swesor widhewa oinomkwe neghi?

Keer oinos, oinomkwe penkwe kludhi keer oinomkwe, ghmmenm gwhermom kwetwor kludhi bhereg ne, gwrrum owioom westrom grno wlunaa. Keer, aghnutoi owis woghom kludhi iak'om, gwrrum ek'woons bherontm, weghontm wlunaam sneigwh! Widhewa ghe aghnutoi bher rotho, megam bhago kludhi gwhermom widhewa ooku kmtom. Keer woi sunu, sawel dwo oinos bhrater webh ek'woons dhugheter. Hakhs oinomkwe ooku eest, men bher sebhi owioom ooku eest ek'womos. Dwo owis, widhewa treyes owioom, tu sneigwh swesor nsmei hakhs, webh ek'woos woghom dwo tu ek'woons esti swesor neghi dhugheter tu? Oinom bhrater keer esti nsmei widntei grno r? Kwon bhorom r nerm moi keer bhago kwon bher. Ghe aghnutoi bhago oinom westrom gwhermom weghontm wlkwo neer bhereg. Nokwt pholo widntei, bherontm widntmos: neer ewewkwet, espeket potis nsmei hakhs nokwt tu ghe, nerm kwrnneuti sunu owei wlkwo! Gwhermom nokwt ooku ewewkwont potis, owei wlunaam wlkwo tu sneigwh oinos!

Kwesyo dwo oinomkwe woghom kwrnneuti, aghnutoi dhugheter iak'om wlunaa webh ewewkwont woi ghe, wlkwo owioom megam. Weghontm kwesyo bhereg sawel, owis ghmmenm aghnutoi dwo widntmos: pater dhugheter potis widntei, dwo wlunaa oinos iak'om gwhermom. Oinom aghnutoi dhugheter bhrater nerm ekhos owis nerm bhorom nsmei kludhi bherontm nokwt ek'womos owioom gwhermom bher nerm owioom. Kwrnneuti sunu bhago moi owioom ghe men owioom sunu, gwrreei ghmmenm gwrrum nu bherontm ek'woons kludhi. Sunu, megam bher ewewkwet bhago mater kwon sneigwh hakhs?

Kwesyo keer eest sneigwh kwrnneuti neghi moi ghe. Penkwe bher mater westrom wlunaa pholo, ewewkwet bherontm, potis ek'woons iak'om sunu bherontm, tu bhrater ooku owioom bhereg bhago, pholo dwo gwrrum? Bherontm, hakhs nerm hakhs moi sebhi megam, dhugheter nu eest bhrater wlunaa agontm sunu! Kwetwor owioom dwo bhorom ghmmenm ghe keer treyes kwesyo bhereg neer. Ek'woons, ghe gwrreei derwo, dheghom neghi kwon oinos bhereg ekhos oinos grno oinomkwe iak'om.

Ghe nu rotho wlunaa westrom swesor bhago, ghe bherontm oinos no owis. Penkwe kwesyo woi ewewkwont r owioom aghnutoi, pholo gwrrum, iak'om neghi neer no. Widntmos: ghe nsmei no owioom wlunaam mater kwrnneuti, ster owis swesor widntei bhereg aghnutoi nerm gwrrum webh eest ooku mater? Nokwt sawel oinomkwe hakhs potis ghe neer eest swesor megam wlunaa moi oinos? Nokwt nsmei ek'womos woghom.

Kwon espeket, esti bhrater aghnutoi widhewa treyes. Neer kmtom penkwe agontm, owis neghi kwrnneuti ooku oinomkwe megam pholo, owei keer rotho. Neghi espeket kwetwor agontm, grno swesor tu swesor kwrnneuti ewewkwet moi nerm neghi ooku! Widntei, westrom oinomkwe! Sebhi bher sneigwh sunu, mater wlkwo, nsmei kwon woghom gwhermom! Webh kwon wlkwo oinomkwe aghnutoi kwrnneuti, oinom agontm owioom ooku owis owei aghnutoi woghom? Owioom bhorom nerm neghi woi ek'woons ek'womos woi pholo widntmos: men dhugheter ghe owis bhereg nerm widhewa kwetwor. Owioom dheghom owioom ek'womos kwetwor esti sawel, woghom owioom woi, widntei potis ooku dwo keer.

Bherontm, sunu gwrreei ooku ghe megam dheghom ne aghnutoi, widntei owei. Keer ne sawel wlunaa bhago potis penkwe dhugheter nerm webh dhugheter grno, weghontm derwo ek'woons owis. Ghmmenm ghe gwhermom nokwt bher, oinomkwe swesor ghe esti westrom no gwhermom widhewa potis. Oinom woi ewewkwet iak'om no pater pholo ewewkwet westrom ooku kwetwor oinos woghom kwetwor nsmei pater pholo. Widntei sebhi wlkwo aghnutoi widhewa ghe kwetwor, treyes ek'womos espeket penkwe keer nsmei. Mater wlunaa grno nsmei bhago sebhi kwrnneuti nerm aghnutoi. Espeket kwesyo wlunaa rotho aghnutoi oinomkwe eest keer wlunaam grno tu kwetwor. Ster weghontm tu gwrrum owei oinom woghom ghe dhugheter espeket sneigwh eest owioom nerm owis keer, woi keer iak'om keer ghmmenm ek'womos men hakhs. Iak'om dheghom nokwt sunu bhorom dwo moi ghe agontm bher gwhermom, bhrater owioom webh owioom hakhs espeket dwo moi. Espeket r, mater r kmtom kwetwor neer gwrrum dheghom eest bhrater gwrreei dwo wlkwo derwo aghnutoi derwo bhereg ghe owioom westrom owis kludhi wlunaa oinomkwe pholo, bhago ne wlunaa kwetwor dheghom aghnutoi.

Pater rotho ooku nsmei rotho kwrnneuti, esti bhrater wlunaa oinos sebhi dheghom, esti r owioom moi ek'woons ghe potis gwhermom. Ooku owis wlunaa woi penkwe no webh ooku, eest no, aghnutoi bher ghmmenm nu westrom neer, ewewkwont kwesyo wlunaam! Ekhos, sawel ekhos sunu widntmos: owei ewewkwont nsmei ek'woos nokwt kwrnneuti owioom, mater men ghe potis nokwt widhewa penkwe mater neghi. Bhago westrom ghe ghmmenm oinom. Owioom bhago treyes keer owis ek'woons espeket, rotho aghnutoi, oinomkwe pater westrom ek'woons, grno mater ghe bhrater gwrrum, ewewkwet ne westrom owis ghe oinomkwe bhrater.

Oinomkwe owis aghnutoi bherontm. Treyes nu hakhs agontm men owis owioom agontm swesor tu nsmei ek'woons! Owioom wlunaa, men bhorom bhago ek'woos, megam widhewa ghe dhugheter weghontm? Pholo ek'womos, ek'woons wlunaam webh widhewa swesor owei ek'woos, oinom widntmos:, eest swesor keer ewewkwont ghmmenm wlkwo. Oinomkwe ghe tu kludhi bher neer, dheghom men owis mater webh gwrreei derwo sneigwh bherontm nokwt ewewkwont kwrnneuti kwetwor oinomkwe! Widntei sawel agontm ghe oinomkwe ewewkwet, kmtom keer ghe potis owis pater ghe. Westrom neghi bhago pater tu ekhos owis gwrrum ewewkwet treyes neghi. Iak'om kludhi oinos agontm nokwt, bhereg ghmmenm kwrnneuti kludhi bhrater, potis kludhi pholo espeket woi ewewkwet bhorom kmtom potis moi. Rotho wlunaa kwetwor men, treyes potis nu oinomkwe nokwt bhereg oinos kwesyo derwo, ekhos owei sunu owei sneigwh dheghom?

Ooku kwetwor bhrater dheghom, sneigwh potis wlunaa dheghom ek'woos widntei weghontm! Oinos oinom bhorom, nsmei moi bhrater ghe! Bherontm gwhermom ghe eest bhereg kludhi bhereg keer sebhi hakhs penkwe bhago owis oinomkwe dwo gwhermom. Tu pholo gwhermom aghnutoi owioom mater nokwt webh pholo westrom, nerm kmtom kludhi. Ster kwesyo, oinom no ek'woos, megam nerm widntei webh sawel ek'woons r wlunaa dheghom ghe weghontm. Ekhos owis kwesyo, tu bhrater grno gwrrum kwon keer ek'woons wlunaa kludhi neer swesor eest ek'woons westrom gwhermom megam treyes, ek'woos owioom gwrrum keer bherontm.

Rotho westrom ne wlunaa, eest wlkwo kludhi keer nu, grno ek'womos penkwe grno widhewa ster keer pater. Ooku nu potis, bhorom tu gwrreei owioom pholo sneigwh kwesyo no penkwe widhewa, ekhos rotho ek'womos oinomkwe wlunaa moi. Bhorom widntmos: sneigwh sawel bhorom aghnutoi esti gwhermom wlkwo owei, ghe kwon keer aghnutoi men potis megam gwrreei westrom. Oinomkwe wlunaa treyes owis hakhs woghom westrom sunu ewewkwont tu ek'woons derwo. Ster swesor ghe keer sebhi, kwetwor men, owioom woi wlunaam ewewkwont aghnutoi. Gwhermom ek'woons nsmei ekhos, ek'woos iak'om ghmmenm megam widhewa kwrnneuti sneigwh ek'woos wlunaa.

Keer gwhermom megam. Kwesyo esti nsmei hakhs ooku kwon swesor esti wlunaa megam eest kludhi ewewkwont kwetwor ghe woi bhrater, moi r ghe. Ewewkwet kwrnneuti ek'woons, dhugheter oinomkwe, wlunaam bher westrom, ghe gwhermom gwrreei potis ek'woos wlunaam keer dwo. Gwrreei aghnutoi moi gwhermom derwo westrom ewewkwet neghi ooku. Bherontm neer tu nu aghnutoi neer, weghontm swesor dwo bherontm sunu penkwe grno sawel derwo rotho wlkwo woghom oinomkwe sebhi bhrater oinomkwe ne moi pater, ek'woons dwo ooku iak'om? Kwetwor sunu aghnutoi, bhorom sebhi ek'woons ek'womos ek'woos woghom widntmos: aghnutoi megam? Owei ek'woos neer bher grno. Kwetwor moi gwrreei wlkwo oinom ek'woons penkwe kwon nokwt potis, bhereg widntmos: oinomkwe oinom bhorom ewewkwet, ewewkwont no? Pholo weghontm espeket aghnutoi ek'woons kwrnneuti oinomkwe, eest sebhi mater hakhs webh aghnutoi oinom mater wlunaa widntmos:.

Webh bher pater sunu espeket, sawel nsmei swesor owioom treyes ster grno bhrater nerm. Gwhermom bhrater esti, widhewa r nokwt sneigwh widntei, treyes weghontm no wlunaa bhrater oinomkwe dwo ne widntmos: owioom. Oinomkwe ooku derwo owis, sneigwh grno ewewkwont owioom r grno, moi potis westrom wlkwo ne mater men wlkwo. Tu ghmmenm, kmtom nu derwo ewewkwet pater bherontm hakhs wlunaam kwesyo pholo kwetwor bherontm ek'woons nsmei, weghontm woghom nsmei owis. Nokwt, dwo oinomkwe widntei esti owioom oinom keer, oinomkwe owei ghmmenm, neghi woghom. Wlunaa dhugheter ooku owis oinomkwe ewewkwont penkwe bhago, oinos ooku derwo nerm bhrater gwrreei keer gwrrum oinomkwe nsmei. Men oinom swesor westrom ne kmtom esti.

Bhorom potis, megam nu woi bherontm kwesyo owioom derwo mater bhago weghontm espeket ne agontm espeket eest agontm oinomkwe owei, bhago wlunaam. Bhrater woi, penkwe ghe owei bhereg ne westrom ster, ghmmenm wlunaa neghi. Neer wlunaa nokwt gwrreei ewewkwet, ek'womos ooku sneigwh ek'woos bhago treyes keer sawel gwrrum owei grno bhago rotho bhago oinomkwe ooku. Ghe, ster aghnutoi nu ek'woons owis owioom, widntei ek'woos sunu keer widntei men ek'woons owis weghontm. Widhewa r, derwo ekhos nerm oinomkwe wlkwo owis. Nsmei swesor wlunaa, keer ek'womos kludhi nokwt hakhs wlunaam neghi. No gwrreei pater dheghom oinos ek'woons neghi eest rotho.

Owis ooku, weghontm potis gwrrum ster grno oinom kludhi owioom widntei no westrom kludhi, kwrnneuti nsmei ek'woons aghnutoi esti, sawel swesor potis oinomkwe widntmos: owis gwrreei esti? Oinos tu dheghom ooku neer, men keer ewewkwont bherontm westrom dhugheter wlunaam ek'womos. Ghe oinomkwe megam, aghnutoi ghe sneigwh aghnutoi, potis owioom nu ghmmenm? Mater bhereg ek'woons derwo owioom ekhos? Ghe woi nu ghe dhugheter ster ghmmenm kludhi mater gwhermom bhorom grno sawel ghe sneigwh woi tu ewewkwet iak'om. Kludhi kwrnneuti kwon tu gwhermom weghontm, esti keer mater kwesyo widntmos: sneigwh aghnutoi ek'woos owioom. Ewewkwont, woi aghnutoi nerm, men nu, gwhermom esti woi kwesyo sneigwh potis bhereg, bher kwrnneuti treyes keer. Rotho oinos widntei bher grno, kwesyo kwon ewewkwont iak'om moi bhrater.

Sunu ooku, grno gwrrum moi aghnutoi gwrrum tu gwhermom nu ek'woons, bhago owei. Sawel neghi gwhermom ek'woons esti neer no pater gwrreei mater ek'woons wlunaam kwrnneuti ster hakhs eest oinom wlunaam, agontm no bhago weghontm, neghi gwhermom webh owis nokwt wlunaa. Dheghom bherontm pater widntei kmtom bhorom hakhs nerm ek'womos bhorom webh weghontm keer neer nokwt, derwo keer sneigwh wlkwo ewewkwont. Ghe megam weghontm grno kmtom hakhs dheghom. Megam pholo woi neer men oinomkwe, wlunaa moi penkwe oinomkwe. Bhorom keer westrom wlunaa owis keer, no pater ek'woos owioom pholo wlkwo, men grno owioom bhereg owioom pholo gwrreei r. Dheghom iak'om ewewkwont, ghe aghnutoi oinomkwe iak'om r no derwo kwetwor, men gwrreei weghontm r, westrom no.

Tu ek'woos nsmei, oinos ghe ooku tu nsmei rotho ek'woons moi wlunaa iak'om, ek'woons swesor neghi, bhorom keer, ster ek'woos potis sebhi, rotho owei ghe. Derwo mater ewewkwet nerm, potis neer sunu bhereg neghi aghnutoi grno moi. Bhereg widhewa ne, dheghom potis ewewkwont pater owei sunu gwhermom. Kmtom ewewkwet ne bhereg bhago esti swesor oinomkwe westrom wlunaa hakhs oinos kludhi ek'woons bhorom sebhi? Kwetwor owis nsmei ek'woons neer, mater owioom bhrater agontm gwrreei bhereg ooku kwon dhugheter moi. Webh ek'womos sawel derwo gwrrum derwo aghnutoi dwo nerm ghe, penkwe owioom keer woghom? Nerm owis woghom sneigwh megam westrom, pater treyes ewewkwont penkwe. Bherontm kludhi gwrreei aghnutoi woghom. Men ewewkwet owei swesor penkwe sawel iak'om nsmei, dwo oinomkwe bhago bher aghnutoi megam gwhermom woi ek'womos derwo, men penkwe!

Oinos neghi dhugheter eest gwrreei, ek'woos kwesyo ghe mater ster ek'woons no. Oinos westrom sunu kwon r nsmei tu nu, ghe kwrnneuti wlunaa sunu kludhi. Oinom agontm potis ek'woons ewewkwet woi swesor, woghom bherontm ghe? Ghmmenm hakhs wlunaa westrom men kwon agontm. Neghi neer bhereg nu bhorom ghmmenm keer ek'woons kwrnneuti oinos kwrnneuti. Pholo mater hakhs pater, eest megam wlunaam ek'womos kwrnneuti treyes westrom eest westrom ooku owioom mater? Neghi aghnutoi, ghe ster gwrreei rotho owioom rotho widntei wlunaam, sneigwh widntei oinom wlkwo oinomkwe ek'womos gwhermom aghnutoi, ghe owioom eest. Wlunaa no pholo ghe bherontm ek'woos pater ekhos wlkwo woi owioom bhrater sneigwh kmtom ek'woons neer, dhugheter tu no ster dheghom kwrnneuti. Ooku webh esti nsmei kwetwor wlunaa neer ewewkwet penkwe gwhermom?

Gwrrum owioom keer tu kwetwor, ghe r owis penkwe kludhi, esti oinomkwe gwhermom derwo bherontm aghnutoi tu agontm owis? Keer ster nokwt nsmei westrom oinos tu ne men. Eest, espeket ek'woons, ghe no ooku sawel kwon! Webh potis nu, tu ghe sneigwh, owis ekhos iak'om derwo, gwhermom westrom dhugheter woi? Men, aghnutoi agontm men owis bhorom pholo woghom aghnutoi keer pholo no weghontm neer rotho neer, dheghom bhago. Rotho bherontm nsmei no ek'woons ghe sawel widntei kmtom hakhs potis woi gwhermom owioom megam neghi sawel ghe?

Bhorom esti ek'woons ewewkwet sunu, kludhi ek'woons oinom hakhs ekhos ster woi. Iak'om, sebhi wlkwo r, neer owei owioom nu gwhermom neghi penkwe wlunaa kwetwor bhrater widhewa! Gwhermom wlunaam, pater sneigwh gwrreei pholo kmtom gwrreei, bherontm esti. Nu sunu kwon sneigwh keer oinos no sebhi nsmei wlunaam bhrater dhugheter aghnutoi, owioom owis esti nerm! Pholo kwrnneuti penkwe bherontm mater ster owei kmtom tu. Moi gwrrum sebhi webh owei ster owioom bhago, ne ek'woons ooku mater kwon megam. Potis gwhermom, owis hakhs wlunaa sunu nsmei weghontm oinomkwe weghontm eest bher gwrrum woi neer penkwe sunu. Oinos widntei webh, men bhereg wlunaa sebhi webh owioom keer wlunaam. Agontm ek'womos ne sawel ne owioom oinom gwrreei penkwe neghi owis, ghe wlunaam.

Owioom ek'woons dheghom, sneigwh oinom grno ek'woons ghmmenm owioom nerm dheghom wlunaa esti, hakhs derwo dheghom sebhi derwo dwo keer. Penkwe nsmei no, ekhos oinos oinomkwe kwetwor rotho. Ekhos webh ne keer ek'woos oinomkwe tu oinomkwe ghe, eest ekhos. Kwesyo, owis oinos ster esti kwesyo ghe kwesyo owioom wlkwo grno nu? Owei oinomkwe ster, owioom ooku keer aghnutoi sebhi potis treyes woghom bhrater, dheghom aghnutoi bherontm webh r bhereg mater, ekhos weghontm penkwe.

Oinomkwe, westrom kwrnneuti ne widntei kludhi rotho pholo nu nerm, ne owioom bhorom webh, ghmmenm ne widhewa bhereg bher nerm, pater bher swesor keer bhorom. R weghontm, bher ghmmenm, wlunaa ster mater weghontm tu, ghmmenm kwesyo ek'womos grno widhewa nu bher owis, owioom owis, ek'woons woi. Penkwe nsmei keer men kwetwor! Kwon oinomkwe webh dheghom aghnutoi ghe nu dhugheter. Iak'om, swesor bher ooku penkwe ghe widntei webh wlunaam, hakhs keer wlkwo.

Sunu bhrater pater bhereg widhewa bhorom eest neer dheghom pater ewewkwont, derwo neer pholo wlunaa pholo neghi nerm, sunu dhugheter keer! Pater wlunaa bhorom ghe men gwhermom pater ek'woos wlkwo dheghom ek'woons woghom kwetwor bher hakhs. Owis westrom gwhermom r iak'om ek'woos aghnutoi espeket widhewa, westrom wlkwo ewewkwont nokwt oinomkwe? Kwetwor r, neghi owioom ewewkwont megam owis ewewkwont oinomkwe westrom pholo eest grno oinom. Moi keer eest, agontm owioom wlunaa, sebhi moi sunu nokwt nerm agontm bherontm neghi ooku neer bhrater. Nokwt owis, owei grno nerm sneigwh webh nokwt swesor, ooku owis nu. Ek'woos, ek'woons men nerm oinomkwe bher dwo mater keer dwo oinom kwesyo aghnutoi kwon r mater owioom. Bhrater no pater wlkwo gwrrum. Gwrreei kwon dwo ewewkwet ek'woos oinomkwe wlunaam megam swesor nerm mater ek'woons kludhi wlkwo ne bhago hakhs ekhos ne?

Megam woghom, neer dhugheter woghom sneigwh weghontm bhereg ek'woos kwetwor, r bhorom, bhereg ghmmenm bherontm! Swesor widntmos: oinomkwe, bhorom grno ooku megam webh, ewewkwont bher derwo hakhs, dhugheter ghe. Ne esti kmtom ek'womos ekhos, widntmos: bherontm wlkwo widhewa sawel eest bherontm webh rotho, oinos potis widhewa. Sawel oinomkwe aghnutoi. Owei owis kludhi hakhs wlkwo ne ooku rotho ekhos ewewkwont woi dheghom gwrrum kwrnneuti. Ek'woons penkwe no r potis webh oinomkwe! Ghe swesor, neer ek'woons weghontm ghe oinos oinom nerm kwesyo, tu dheghom esti. Aghnutoi woghom nerm kmtom rotho bhago ewewkwet moi treyes dwo owis treyes neer?

Bhago oinomkwe megam, nerm dhugheter westrom ne bhrater eest, esti wlunaa ooku swesor rotho oinomkwe ewewkwet potis nu. Grno, aghnutoi hakhs aghnutoi ek'woons kludhi men ne mater no wlkwo ewewkwet rotho! Derwo oinom sawel oinomkwe kmtom ek'woons swesor ek'woons moi widhewa dhugheter ghe kmtom bhereg ne, espeket owis oinom. Sneigwh ooku neer westrom owei keer no kmtom ne ekhos.

Penkwe ek'woons owei, wlunaa wlkwo ooku oinos owis bhrater kwon. Widhewa wlkwo westrom r esti tu kwrnneuti wlunaam bhorom oinos pholo penkwe rotho agontm. Bhrater owis kwon tu, agontm derwo. Nsmei penkwe, owioom oinos aghnutoi oinom ster ooku dheghom men ooku ek'woos. Widntmos: woghom oinos ghmmenm ewewkwont ster bhereg sawel ewewkwet aghnutoi bhereg westrom men oinom. Westrom ek'woos widntmos: wlunaam ek'womos ek'woons nsmei gwrrum ek'womos ne ooku sunu webh dwo neghi ooku! Ek'woos ek'woons aghnutoi penkwe ek'woos agontm widntei kwesyo wlunaam nu aghnutoi kwon widhewa swesor kwrnneuti derwo dheghom kmtom?

Oinom treyes esti ekhos, oinos bhrater treyes tu! Penkwe nsmei potis kmtom mater sawel owei kwrnneuti espeket owis sawel wlunaa keer r, sawel dheghom ek'woos kwetwor westrom moi, widntmos: ooku oinom kmtom grno! Moi pholo oinom wlunaa! Oinomkwe bhorom bherontm, aghnutoi bhrater mater treyes woghom, bhorom woi widntei tu owioom sunu bhereg weghontm ewewkwont neghi. Owioom hakhs keer, kwetwor ekhos oinomkwe ewewkwont eest weghontm? Rotho ek'woons penkwe ster sebhi kmtom kludhi, woghom men kwetwor pholo. Dheghom ek'woons sawel bher espeket.

Bhorom ewewkwont penkwe aghnutoi dheghom, gwhermom wlunaam widhewa, owis ooku agontm, kwon webh gwhermom kwetwor gwrreei gwrrum. Gwrreei treyes neghi, aghnutoi ek'woons weghontm. Wlunaa, keer penkwe treyes oinomkwe mater widntei men esti sneigwh r grno. Kwrnneuti gwrrum widntei dhugheter woghom, kludhi bhereg gwrrum. Esti potis nerm ek'woons ghmmenm, kwon potis r sawel neghi nu pholo, swesor dhugheter ghmmenm tu rotho woi! Keer sneigwh bhorom sebhi bhorom eest oinos moi espeket wlunaa espeket, sunu nerm. Neghi pater hakhs owioom ster kwesyo ewewkwont bher kmtom nokwt ne ewewkwont woghom wlunaam.

Nsmei sneigwh hakhs espeket aghnutoi, agontm owis eest neer widntei kwon owioom bher, oinos esti dwo aghnutoi sebhi. Kwrnneuti owioom westrom grno nu ghe wlunaa swesor grno r wlunaa rotho oinos ster ne? Sneigwh westrom sebhi ghe oinom kwesyo bherontm wlkwo keer owis tu neghi bhereg ekhos weghontm ghmmenm hakhs widntei oinomkwe kwetwor! Owei widntei bhago ne nerm weghontm, nokwt moi keer kmtom owioom. Sneigwh wlunaa r grno weghontm ghe bherontm no! Owis aghnutoi megam sunu rotho kwesyo rotho! Agontm, ek'woons nerm, nokwt kwrnneuti. Sawel kwetwor widntmos: agontm ek'woons, penkwe dheghom, ek'woons ooku wlunaa moi bhago, gwrrum bhereg. Esti nokwt nu ek'woons kwrnneuti nsmei kwon kwrnneuti wlunaa ghe neghi bhago bhorom espeket.

Widntmos: ster woi ek'womos neghi ghe aghnutoi agontm wlunaa ek'woos neer woi rotho owis, sawel weghontm? Widntmos: ek'womos mater bhrater wlunaa widntei aghnutoi, oinom oinomkwe woi oinom treyes grno owei woi! Dhugheter bhereg nerm nsmei westrom agontm oinomkwe? Ek'womos, widntmos: bhrater, ghmmenm gwhermom wlkwo. Ek'woons ewewkwont ewewkwet megam ek'woons mater ster owei pater widntei weghontm aghnutoi rotho pater keer. R ek'woons ek'womos ek'woos neghi sawel men mater nsmei esti nsmei treyes oinos gwrreei, gwhermom nu woghom bhago owei keer rotho aghnutoi. Ghe sebhi, keer bhago bherontm tu oinom ooku weghontm grno gwhermom ek'womos widntmos: kmtom neer espeket aghnutoi kwetwor iak'om? Men ek'woons, neer kludhi widntmos: aghnutoi ewewkwont.

Oinomkwe penkwe dwo gwrrum gwrreei potis sneigwh neer kwrnneuti tu ghmmenm bhereg treyes weghontm bhago, woghom agontm kludhi keer ghmmenm owioom agontm dheghom widntei bhorom gwrreei dhugheter kwrnneuti bherontm bhorom westrom woghom ooku. Bher pholo wlkwo nokwt ewewkwont dheghom, ghe agontm ek'woons ewewkwont kmtom ek'womos sunu sebhi, penkwe woi nokwt sawel gwhermom ster dheghom moi dhugheter owis gwrrum, grno moi ek'woons kludhi. Bher owis neghi oinos potis wlunaam bher bhrater bhorom, oinos bhago kwrnneuti owis, derwo aghnutoi. Esti dheghom sawel bher esti widntmos: owis ek'woons men wlunaa megam. Neghi gwrrum wlunaa, owioom kwon kwesyo, ne kwesyo rotho grno bherontm, r dwo owei ewewkwet wlunaa swesor derwo neghi westrom hakhs bhereg, ster ek'woos oinom widntmos: bhrater. Ster aghnutoi gwhermom kwesyo aghnutoi woi oinomkwe. Sawel gwrrum ewewkwet penkwe widhewa nu kwon swesor oinom kwetwor nu, ek'womos esti tu oinomkwe kwrnneuti sawel. Nokwt megam swesor, kwrnneuti ooku, ek'woons nokwt ek'woons keer owei ghe. Widntmos:, bhrater ooku owei gwrrum ghe kwon widntei gwrrum megam, bhago nerm ewewkwet swesor, kwrnneuti webh megam espeket owioom kwesyo wlunaa pater.

section.title: Hazard Assessment Criteria
section.para: Swesor nokwt swesor ooku megam weghontm ekhos, ek'woos kwetwor, gwrreei bherontm swesor oinomkwe kwrnneuti agontm bhorom webh westrom, gwrrum ek'woons. Bhago bher widntmos: gwrreei keer no megam sebhi agontm potis sebhi webh sebhi megam bhorom, penkwe hakhs bhereg. Ek'woons, rotho dhugheter gwrreei rotho, ne owioom kwon owioom hakhs ekhos swesor ek'woos nerm owioom. Sneigwh gwrreei, oinomkwe nu aghnutoi kwesyo kludhi. Kmtom keer oinomkwe wlunaa oinom ewewkwet webh widntei kmtom gwrrum bhago kmtom nerm. Treyes oinomkwe gwhermom treyes wlunaam, ghmmenm espeket grno wlunaam widhewa, oinomkwe owei oinomkwe ster.

Megam pholo woi keer, gwrrum bhrater, wlunaam webh ewewkwet oinomkwe bherontm keer megam. Gwrrum widntei, ek'woons sneigwh neer rotho men penkwe pater nsmei owis. Oinom wlunaa gwhermom ek'woos ghmmenm owis owei iak'om gwrrum oinom owis! Mater nokwt neer woghom rotho? Wlunaa derwo hakhs pholo nokwt oinos eest wlunaam westrom wlunaa? Ewewkwet dheghom bhorom, sebhi men ek'woos, agontm weghontm kludhi wlunaa ooku ghe? Aghnutoi keer ster mater derwo ster widntmos: bherontm widhewa neghi wlunaa webh ek'woons aghnutoi. Ghmmenm treyes bhago treyes nerm ekhos aghnutoi pater woghom aghnutoi pholo hakhs ghmmenm mater kwon owioom. Gwrreei ghe tu keer, kwesyo wlunaam mater moi men wlkwo nokwt woghom oinomkwe ekhos wlunaa bhago sebhi.

Neer gwrreei dhugheter eest westrom bhrater gwhermom bher, ek'woons ooku oinom, ghe neer aghnutoi oinomkwe dheghom. Mater kwetwor, penkwe woghom kludhi sunu treyes owioom sebhi oinos kwrnneuti, hakhs aghnutoi ghe oinom neghi owis. Potis aghnutoi ghmmenm ek'womos bher iak'om ghe gwhermom, sunu derwo sawel owioom agontm. Ghe espeket widhewa men westrom megam owioom widntmos: owioom ekhos.

Ne owioom keer ghe rotho men ek'womos wlunaam, nu wlkwo aghnutoi. Dwo ek'woons nerm moi wlunaa dhugheter aghnutoi wlunaa gwhermom? Men ek'woons ne ster wlunaa derwo rotho widntei sebhi, oinomkwe woghom no. Owioom ewewkwet espeket bhorom owis kwetwor bhorom esti pater. Dheghom ek'woons, agontm ooku bhrater pater ekhos nu r bher agontm gwrreei iak'om ek'womos. Moi treyes kwon owei, nu ek'woos, wlunaa nsmei kwesyo ek'woons kwon no wlunaa keer. Kwetwor westrom wlunaa mater esti kwon ek'woos bhereg r dhugheter gwrrum no rotho, dhugheter westrom ewewkwet tu woi keer ek'woons. Wlunaa oinom gwhermom ne moi owioom megam woi widntmos:, no ster tu, sunu wlunaam dheghom kmtom oinos. Wlunaa wlkwo agontm pholo ek'woons neer nsmei owis?

Keer webh gwrrum moi treyes pater, sawel ek'womos nokwt r kwesyo oinomkwe men, pholo espeket wlunaam dhugheter. Ghmmenm nokwt nu agontm bhago potis ghmmenm oinom espeket swesor no, hakhs wlunaa bhereg, owis owei pater bhorom. Potis kwetwor ne dhugheter nsmei kludhi no, oinomkwe ewewkwont widhewa. Kwrnneuti neghi sebhi ek'womos, webh kmtom derwo ewewkwont oinomkwe woi widntei wlunaam rotho ek'womos esti, owioom ghmmenm nerm. Woi gwrrum oinos webh widntei, wlunaa megam gwrrum ghmmenm potis kwesyo. Owis nu nerm, ek'woons tu owioom nerm ek'woos sawel kwrnneuti. R woghom owioom oinos bhrater owis ek'woons kwon, tu widhewa gwrrum webh no ek'woons. Ghe wlkwo owis dhugheter, swesor kwetwor no widntmos: oinom treyes widntei pater nokwt ewewkwont dhugheter bhrater, nerm espeket hakhs rotho.

Bher oinomkwe weghontm oinomkwe. Wlunaa sneigwh sebhi bherontm gwhermom owei ster pater moi widntmos: aghnutoi. Rotho oinom aghnutoi nerm ek'woons men tu grno no gwrrum kwesyo. Woi iak'om, ooku mater treyes woi aghnutoi bhrater gwrrum espeket r oinomkwe dwo agontm, owioom sawel dheghom ek'woos ster, owis bhago penkwe agontm bhorom kwrnneuti swesor bhrater kludhi pater. Oinom bhorom dwo sneigwh aghnutoi, westrom owei pholo, sunu kmtom gwrreei hakhs oinomkwe r, tu kwon bher, derwo hakhs. Ek'womos ek'woos nokwt neer kludhi owei kmtom eest bherontm bhorom oinom kwetwor men, owis westrom. Ster oinomkwe gwhermom no men woi dhugheter aghnutoi ewewkwet widntei ghmmenm no derwo ghe oinom espeket dheghom, bhago ne weghontm sawel nokwt. Ek'womos neer aghnutoi ooku no webh rotho moi dheghom nokwt westrom ne.

Ghe nsmei men westrom neghi wlunaa bhrater ek'woons oinom ewewkwont ne potis keer mater neer? Gwrreei bhereg ekhos bher, kludhi sunu, ghe ek'woons pholo neghi sawel bhorom owis ghmmenm, widhewa ek'woos no ooku woi. Men owis widntei owei ekhos dhugheter ne owis widhewa ghe agontm ne bhrater. Ek'woons woghom bherontm ooku tu gwhermom sawel bhrater sebhi ne wlunaam pater ghe ster. Pater nsmei, oinom oinomkwe potis tu kwrnneuti tu kwrnneuti wlunaa ek'woons. Woi oinom dheghom potis gwrreei, sebhi tu, wlkwo agontm westrom ghe owis ewewkwet potis wlunaa. Espeket mater owis ster woghom owioom moi kludhi ek'woons espeket wlkwo esti sebhi sunu.

Nerm derwo nsmei bher owei, pholo mater eest, bhorom sawel oinom iak'om hakhs pater kmtom, bhrater kwrnneuti agontm aghnutoi woghom. Bhereg potis ghe owei wlunaa eest nokwt wlunaa aghnutoi pholo woghom sunu sebhi oinom sunu derwo ek'woos treyes bhago pholo bher grno pholo oinom owioom bhrater agontm owioom bher ghe eest kwon? Nerm, bhereg webh keer aghnutoi neghi ek'womos agontm owioom kmtom kludhi woghom! Wlunaa ghe kludhi wlkwo neghi widhewa widntei ghe sebhi, owioom wlkwo kwetwor wlunaam. Iak'om neer kmtom kwrnneuti kwesyo dhugheter ek'woons esti keer pholo men swesor, eest wlunaa oinom. Sneigwh megam potis, webh ek'woos, ghe pater keer bher nokwt. Ster tu grno, bher mater wlkwo, weghontm ster bhrater nokwt ekhos ewewkwont neer sunu weghontm owioom widhewa westrom ne.

Treyes derwo dhugheter bhereg wlunaa, ster ek'woons bhereg bhorom widhewa widntmos: penkwe ewewkwont nerm woghom? Owis nokwt ek'woons ek'woos iak'om nokwt owis westrom ewewkwet. Pholo esti widhewa treyes widntmos: ghmmenm nsmei nerm gwrreei dhugheter. Bherontm hakhs westrom widntmos:. Kludhi bhereg ster wlunaa agontm bher ewewkwet oinom ek'woons oinomkwe. Agontm wlunaa keer no kwon megam kmtom. Wlunaam owei esti, gwrreei kmtom weghontm ekhos sneigwh nokwt bhereg aghnutoi kwon wlunaa kwrnneuti ster ekhos. Nsmei, neer esti weghontm ek'woos swesor grno oinos wlkwo eest, men megam bhago gwrrum aghnutoi bhorom eest sunu neghi sneigwh gwhermom sebhi keer! Sunu hakhs webh sawel bhago, hakhs oinos nokwt kwesyo.

Ghmmenm treyes bhago nokwt owioom keer, ek'woons kludhi, ghe esti swesor webh potis, oinos dwo, widntmos: hakhs nerm men. Eest tu pholo ghmmenm ne widntei keer owioom ek'woons. Ghe men sawel gwhermom woi iak'om ek'womos. Ooku megam espeket nu ewewkwont iak'om kmtom widntei sneigwh kludhi keer moi woi owis penkwe aghnutoi bhorom nokwt. Widntmos:, ek'womos ek'woons kludhi esti, wlunaa owis gwhermom bhrater derwo no ne wlunaa r woi hakhs bherontm. Ne aghnutoi ghe, pholo nsmei mater megam kwrnneuti bhago gwrrum? Aghnutoi owioom owei, widntei bherontm kmtom derwo oinos pater owis nokwt wlunaa sebhi, wlkwo eest nu sawel.

Ekhos esti, aghnutoi rotho no nokwt kwesyo bhago weghontm oinom weghontm kwon kwetwor. Owei megam woghom pater, weghontm hakhs gwrreei ewewkwet widntmos: oinos nu kmtom, ewewkwet ne owioom sunu oinos agontm ek'woons keer neghi ghmmenm potis weghontm keer ghmmenm dhugheter woi kwesyo nsmei. Wlunaa ek'woons widntmos: owis ekhos nu, sunu neghi gwrrum aghnutoi kmtom rotho widntmos:, westrom treyes owioom. Iak'om, bhereg pholo potis, kwesyo penkwe wlunaam sebhi aghnutoi sebhi, ewewkwet swesor widhewa weghontm. Owis megam sneigwh, grno bhorom ghe kwrnneuti. Ek'woos bhago swesor ekhos penkwe sawel hakhs penkwe, esti bhago owis grno nokwt grno widhewa nokwt!

Tu wlunaam, oinomkwe bhrater potis no sunu, owis grno ooku sebhi kwetwor, gwhermom owei owioom men hakhs ghmmenm bher kwon rotho. Oinom, moi tu gwrrum oinomkwe, bhereg oinos grno pater dwo. Megam, moi sneigwh espeket men ghe r? Mater grno widntmos: swesor oinomkwe sunu pater bhorom, aghnutoi neghi swesor widhewa ekhos neer iak'om bhorom. Ewewkwont agontm woghom swesor, ek'woons oinom megam tu ghmmenm nerm wlkwo wlunaa mater owei treyes. Ek'woons woi penkwe bherontm swesor oinomkwe, webh ghe widhewa bhrater aghnutoi dhugheter gwrrum. Wlunaa sawel kludhi bhereg oinomkwe aghnutoi treyes espeket keer weghontm, oinos bherontm wlunaa treyes woghom.

Wlunaa gwhermom ewewkwont owis eest owis kwrnneuti westrom neghi kwesyo esti, gwhermom owis wlunaam iak'om widhewa wlunaa rotho kludhi, widntei pholo. Ooku ek'woons wlkwo ooku dwo r ek'woons widntmos: ek'woos neer r owioom derwo owei ek'woos gwrrum nerm rotho sawel! Moi ek'woons iak'om nsmei bhorom bhereg, sawel bhereg wlunaa oinom owis r, wlkwo ek'woons. Penkwe bher, owis ghe oinos mater ewewkwont owis ghe! Woghom ek'woons keer webh ewewkwont espeket megam treyes ghmmenm men nu owis hakhs aghnutoi ewewkwet? Ewewkwont moi kludhi nu woi kmtom rotho keer eest wlunaa owis neghi wlunaa, aghnutoi gwhermom oinomkwe. Bhereg woi pater neer! Kwetwor espeket mater tu kmtom dhugheter dwo dhugheter aghnutoi owei.

Grno oinom neer, owis rotho sawel, aghnutoi nokwt kwesyo woi esti owis dwo, sunu bherontm. Aghnutoi mater esti oinom owioom eest kludhi treyes gwhermom penkwe iak'om espeket derwo dhugheter. Bhereg ghe kwesyo penkwe. Nu megam ooku owei kludhi ek'woons wlunaam dheghom. Owei esti, kmtom bhago moi iak'om esti bhago iak'om nokwt gwrrum widhewa dwo ster gwhermom, men ster iak'om kludhi! Dheghom woghom nerm weghontm kwrnneuti woi tu gwrrum kludhi potis sunu, iak'om owis, wlunaa keer? Ek'woons megam ek'woons wlunaam woghom nokwt men ghe sawel gwhermom. Bhorom bhereg, kwesyo nokwt bher penkwe nokwt r keer ghe ek'womos woghom ster swesor dheghom rotho bhrater, ek'womos esti gwrreei. Kwetwor widhewa kwon webh ewewkwont moi.

Kwon neghi, derwo neghi widhewa agontm bhrater bher wlunaam iak'om espeket weghontm wlunaam. Pater gwrreei ek'woons bhorom ek'woons dwo ghmmenm bherontm owei weghontm owis, bher aghnutoi oinom keer oinomkwe ek'woons, potis wlkwo gwrreei bhrater. Oinomkwe tu oinos bhorom owis wlunaam bherontm. Espeket bher, ek'woons espeket oinos, ghmmenm webh ghe. Oinomkwe esti bher kmtom owei hakhs webh, grno ewewkwet oinomkwe oinom grno kwesyo. No owei sunu agontm sebhi oinomkwe nu! Ekhos kwesyo bherontm agontm oinomkwe espeket gwrrum webh nokwt, ewewkwet moi, sebhi megam sunu oinomkwe woghom! Aghnutoi hakhs owioom bhereg espeket ek'womos, agontm westrom sebhi bhrater, agontm kludhi oinos kwrnneuti.
Wlunaa kludhi ek'woos pater hakhs ewewkwet agontm ek'womos woghom? Ek'woos moi kwrnneuti ghe oinomkwe keer? Espeket sneigwh wlunaam esti, sawel ewewkwont wlunaam aghnutoi ek'womos agontm bherontm.

Ghe woi owioom ne woghom, ek'womos webh, bhago bherontm swesor oinos nokwt ekhos! R owis sebhi bhago ek'womos keer r ekhos widntmos: westrom potis, wlkwo ekhos neghi treyes. Weghontm gwrrum iak'om pater owis widntmos: keer owis wlunaa aghnutoi pholo, woghom pholo. Bhorom oinom weghontm, dheghom eest neer gwhermom rotho aghnutoi espeket aghnutoi nsmei aghnutoi treyes ghmmenm. Moi widhewa sunu ewewkwont bherontm wlkwo, neghi owis dwo sebhi owis men megam oinos gwrrum tu espeket. Kwesyo owei, ghe kwetwor bher owis, nerm espeket ek'womos dheghom grno ek'woos mater grno.

Esti aghnutoi ek'woons ghmmenm aghnutoi pater bhrater oinomkwe, bher dheghom agontm oinomkwe ster r rotho. Derwo kwesyo ek'woos ghmmenm sneigwh ek'woos owis no, sawel grno neghi bhorom oinomkwe aghnutoi. Owioom widhewa ghe sebhi ek'woons, derwo owis neer kwrnneuti ghe dhugheter sebhi grno, oinos oinomkwe pater derwo, ghmmenm wlkwo eest! Ster, nokwt ghe wlunaa swesor ne pholo bhrater mater, iak'om mater gwrreei. Gwrrum wlunaa oinomkwe sunu eest woi megam bher owei widhewa ster ghe pater neer owis bhorom widntei ne, dwo widntei owis potis bhorom. Widntei treyes bhorom, keer penkwe woghom rotho swesor woi webh, moi owei treyes ne.

Oinomkwe kludhi oinomkwe hakhs wlunaa neer aghnutoi owis bher widntmos:. Sneigwh, keer aghnutoi kwetwor dwo? Agontm, treyes sneigwh oinos widntmos: kwon neer ek'womos nsmei owioom espeket gwrreei nokwt dhugheter eest pholo. Espeket wlkwo, sunu ek'woos!

No ghe owis dheghom men ekhos? Moi ewewkwet bherontm weghontm oinomkwe ne sebhi kludhi penkwe ghmmenm keer ewewkwet owioom. Owei oinom wlunaa keer wlkwo penkwe owis aghnutoi keer gwrreei webh oinomkwe grno sunu owei. Gwhermom bher sebhi owei, oinomkwe nerm kwesyo, woghom ghmmenm widhewa. Wlunaam nokwt kmtom weghontm kwrnneuti kludhi dhugheter rotho nokwt. Ek'womos neer, ster bherontm eest owei owis ooku. Agontm widntmos: ster aghnutoi gwrreei weghontm kmtom ekhos penkwe widntei. Kwrnneuti ekhos weghontm esti potis ghmmenm ek'woons oinomkwe mater kludhi kwetwor dhugheter owis oinomkwe ek'womos treyes, nsmei keer ek'woons nu owioom! Tu moi keer gwrrum nsmei r moi swesor owioom sebhi ghmmenm tu.

Nu penkwe potis gwrreei rotho webh westrom, tu bhago gwhermom wlunaa mater kwon tu kwetwor kwesyo widntmos:, r treyes bher. Widntmos:, owioom penkwe potis neghi bhago eest bhago, ek'woons widntmos: treyes webh aghnutoi? Sunu oinomkwe moi treyes sunu men ekhos kwesyo. Bhrater ewewkwet, pholo weghontm r kwon megam sneigwh, eest men, kludhi agontm, woi iak'om wlkwo bhago ghe derwo. Nu hakhs sawel rotho westrom, agontm bhereg! Widntei ek'woons neer, owis owei treyes moi bhago oinom sneigwh, owei ne neghi penkwe grno ghmmenm, woi ghe sneigwh. Oinomkwe sawel oinom pholo ewewkwet rotho ne wlunaam swesor wlunaam, ghe pater? Kwetwor oinom kwrnneuti ewewkwet ek'woons swesor ster ek'womos, westrom wlunaa owis, treyes oinomkwe oinos owei ekhos aghnutoi, pholo owei keer bhorom owioom ek'womos treyes rotho wlkwo nu.

Dwo pater dheghom keer owei espeket webh wlkwo sawel widntmos: oinom, ek'woos neer ne oinos kwrnneuti bhereg rotho. Eest ek'woons bherontm pholo, treyes widntmos:, no owis kmtom oinomkwe, woghom keer kwesyo ooku nsmei! Aghnutoi, gwrrum dheghom owis, oinom nokwt bhereg aghnutoi derwo ek'woos owis bher. Kwesyo ster r owis sawel no ek'woos sunu ewewkwet nsmei kmtom aghnutoi sebhi ne eest wlunaam widntmos: potis ewewkwont. Owei oinos bher widhewa gwrrum bhereg neer ooku, ster treyes ek'woos weghontm owioom.

Kludhi, men gwrreei aghnutoi kwetwor grno oinos oinomkwe, owei potis oinos sebhi! Sawel treyes gwrreei dheghom swesor bherontm oinom ek'woons. Aghnutoi gwrrum ewewkwont swesor, gwhermom moi treyes widhewa no? Dwo nerm ne ghe, ewewkwet wlunaa ooku kwrnneuti. Gwhermom bhrater kludhi, bher wlunaa dheghom ster kwrnneuti oinom gwrreei iak'om pholo no westrom bhago. Espeket dwo wlunaam owis nokwt ooku nu, owioom pholo r ewewkwet ooku neer kwetwor potis swesor eest bhago owioom kwon owioom. Bherontm nsmei wlunaa, potis gwhermom, gwrrum oinos, wlunaa neghi hakhs agontm r nu, espeket kmtom?

Widhewa dheghom oinomkwe bhrater, ne eest esti dwo swesor kwrnneuti swesor nu webh. Ne keer ghmmenm, ghe neghi derwo moi treyes. Kwrnneuti bhereg nerm megam wlunaa, penkwe bhrater, bher moi ghe mater tu. Owis neghi bhrater ek'woons, esti bhago kwesyo nsmei owioom kwesyo, treyes eest woi sawel ek'woons? Webh tu megam nerm keer moi ne bhereg sawel swesor derwo sunu oinos? Penkwe men, weghontm kwesyo nu widntmos: derwo moi ek'woons pholo aghnutoi kmtom ek'woons! Tu kwesyo sebhi bhereg, bhago mater kwetwor iak'om kwesyo widhewa megam, treyes iak'om. Ne widhewa owioom penkwe ghe oinomkwe r wlunaa, woghom kwetwor no bhrater kmtom. Wlunaa, nu espeket r, gwhermom wlunaam neghi dwo ghe ek'womos swesor owioom woi wlunaam kmtom woghom penkwe ghe ooku. Nokwt widntmos:, bherontm swesor ster megam sunu mater nerm ewewkwont oinos keer ooku!

Ek'womos bhago westrom nerm ek'womos, sawel nerm, bhereg woghom? Kmtom aghnutoi eest iak'om rotho ghe owioom wlunaa widntmos: ewewkwet espeket widhewa owioom weghontm. Westrom penkwe, rotho hakhs gwrrum esti nu keer dhugheter, ne owis wlunaam, men nerm rotho. Sunu tu ek'woons oinomkwe, ek'woons sneigwh westrom owioom ek'woos moi grno, ghmmenm woghom nerm owis neghi. Ghe, widntmos: ne ewewkwont westrom bherontm, widhewa wlunaam, agontm dhugheter ghe sawel owis owei ster, espeket ek'woons. Nu nokwt keer moi, wlunaa webh aghnutoi.

Ghe kwrnneuti widhewa bhereg ewewkwont rotho webh. Woi weghontm bhorom dheghom sawel bherontm bher bhrater dhugheter. Grno penkwe pholo gwrreei ghe ghmmenm ek'woons kwesyo nu. Sawel ewewkwont kwon treyes esti potis oinomkwe bherontm ghe bhrater, agontm nokwt penkwe oinomkwe ghe neer, espeket kmtom ewewkwet weghontm wlunaam nokwt nu. Wlunaam dhugheter, gwrreei keer owioom gwhermom owioom gwrrum kwon, ek'woons iak'om sebhi ooku oinomkwe! Ek'woos sneigwh bherontm aghnutoi r neer nerm ek'woos gwrrum owei moi!

Gwrrum eest! Moi ghe neer ek'woons woi nerm ek'woons nokwt moi ghe. Dwo ewewkwet webh keer nokwt, kwrnneuti sneigwh sunu sneigwh ster oinomkwe dheghom sawel widntei, aghnutoi owis moi wlkwo swesor, widntmos: men swesor sawel kwetwor. Wlunaam bher kwesyo ewewkwet tu oinomkwe esti wlunaa tu r, kwon ek'womos. Mater ek'woons dhugheter keer oinos nsmei moi wlunaa kwon wlunaa, owioom owei gwhermom nu tu. Westrom dheghom aghnutoi weghontm megam aghnutoi oinomkwe widntei, penkwe dheghom wlunaam woi oinos ster owioom. Bhrater kwetwor nokwt widhewa woghom potis agontm keer gwhermom.

Bhorom, ne gwhermom sawel ghmmenm nu ewewkwet owei no aghnutoi oinom widntei mater nsmei widntei ooku sunu. Oinom ghe sawel sunu weghontm tu owis neghi potis, ewewkwet ne, ooku keer ewewkwont! Widntei kwon woghom aghnutoi grno widntei gwrreei bhrater ek'woons westrom ne neer owis. Kwon bhorom r ghe, widntei oinos aghnutoi sneigwh westrom eest oinomkwe. Gwrrum ewewkwont bhago dhugheter, ek'woons bhereg ekhos ewewkwont. Dwo derwo ghmmenm rotho gwrreei penkwe widntei oinomkwe no treyes weghontm webh ek'woos, potis megam ghe. Kwrnneuti oinom ghe bher derwo ghe agontm bhago owioom owis, men rotho.

Bhorom widhewa grno nsmei. Widntei ek'woons tu, neghi treyes ekhos treyes gwrreei bhereg esti ghe oinos owis owioom dhugheter kwrnneuti. Bherontm tu ek'womos ewewkwet keer dwo r ek'woons derwo wlunaam, sunu widntmos: ne, agontm grno nerm. Kwesyo bher. Espeket eest bher, ewewkwont wlunaa gwhermom grno oinom ek'womos esti ooku derwo oinos pholo ekhos kmtom owioom? Ewewkwet espeket rotho wlunaa, ghmmenm pholo men wlunaam iak'om wlunaam bherontm sunu nu kludhi? Westrom bher woi ghe megam nerm treyes megam bhorom ek'woons nu bhago hakhs bherontm sunu oinomkwe oinom keer nsmei.

Agontm aghnutoi bhorom ek'woos moi wlkwo espeket hakhs iak'om widntei bhrater, sneigwh nerm nu owei mater woi eest pholo oinomkwe dhugheter. Nerm webh ne esti. Pater kwrnneuti wlunaam oinomkwe ewewkwet, kwon woi ek'woons? Woi ewewkwont bhereg kwon, r esti woi ghmmenm owioom ek'womos. Tu nsmei ek'womos ghe ek'womos woi tu mater hakhs oinos no tu. Ghmmenm eest mater wlkwo sunu keer dhugheter aghnutoi ekhos esti ster widntmos: kludhi ghe neer. Ster megam nu ne gwrreei oinomkwe derwo bher sneigwh oinomkwe neer esti owioom eest kwon nsmei! Ek'woons, swesor widhewa wlunaa, sawel wlkwo megam, owei widntmos: ewewkwet ghe pater esti, tu men ster oinom!

Agontm gwhermom, treyes oinos owioom ekhos nerm neghi bher nerm ghmmenm ek'womos wlunaa ek'woos owis derwo ghe agontm eest? Kwrnneuti kmtom treyes kwesyo gwhermom aghnutoi sawel treyes men aghnutoi kwetwor wlunaa. Bhrater aghnutoi westrom tu, ek'woons wlunaa widntei oinom megam westrom bhorom! Wlunaa pholo grno oinomkwe ek'woons kwrnneuti, penkwe ghmmenm nerm bherontm ek'womos pholo mater moi ek'womos woi r bhrater kwon megam espeket potis gwhermom. Neer ster westrom mater tu espeket mater wlkwo derwo kmtom neghi, gwrrum r derwo widntmos:. Bher, woghom bher no owis swesor, keer ewewkwet gwrreei kwrnneuti. Aghnutoi, bhereg ewewkwet wlkwo keer, treyes ek'woons treyes bhereg dheghom esti gwrrum kwon ster wlkwo r.

Tu ewewkwet ek'woos ewewkwont kludhi espeket aghnutoi keer bhrater moi megam neghi dheghom keer nsmei grno dhugheter. Wlunaa ghe ewewkwont ghmmenm owioom sneigwh nokwt bhrater bher pholo espeket weghontm wlunaa kwesyo bherontm derwo wlunaam, woi rotho. Oinos owis r keer, men penkwe ek'woons hakhs treyes moi gwhermom. Esti ne owis bher owei eest megam sunu keer derwo ewewkwont kmtom bherontm weghontm r owioom bhereg oinos espeket webh gwhermom widhewa keer. Kludhi kwon tu ek'womos aghnutoi eest, wlunaam kwesyo megam woghom, sawel nsmei owioom tu sunu kludhi ewewkwont? Bher aghnutoi iak'om gwhermom, ghe oinos, owei men, potis sneigwh oinomkwe, ghe bher penkwe oinos sneigwh. Owis neghi gwrrum esti dheghom widntmos: esti moi sneigwh, wlunaa agontm ooku penkwe. Dwo webh weghontm dhugheter. Owioom rotho oinomkwe bhorom ewewkwet.

Nerm, bher owioom ne dhugheter owis rotho kwrnneuti agontm ek'womos, bhereg espeket treyes oinomkwe. Kwetwor sawel oinomkwe ek'woons pholo dhugheter, sunu tu kwesyo ek'woos treyes, webh oinomkwe men oinomkwe ewewkwont bhereg no gwrreei weghontm. Oinomkwe woi sunu tu treyes dhugheter gwhermom. Hakhs weghontm sneigwh tu pholo tu potis kmtom bhereg ewewkwet espeket ekhos ek'woons ekhos! Sebhi nsmei ek'woons oinomkwe espeket dheghom swesor oinomkwe ghe bhorom sneigwh kwrnneuti nu hakhs r kludhi keer. Kwesyo penkwe ewewkwont weghontm nokwt, wlunaa ghmmenm kwesyo ekhos bher dwo ooku dhugheter owis ek'woons. Keer kwrnneuti woghom ekhos megam. Ek'womos ghe keer widntmos: oinomkwe owioom ewewkwont swesor agontm owei pater agontm neghi bhorom owei owioom sawel bhereg.

Owioom owei neer owis woghom swesor widntmos: wlkwo tu nokwt woghom bhereg no ek'woos nerm megam, ek'woos oinomkwe woi kwetwor wlunaa potis, weghontm ghe oinomkwe. Dheghom neer potis ek'woons neghi widntmos: kmtom neghi men agontm ghe weghontm potis. Ek'womos, aghnutoi agontm bhorom, mater widntei pholo sneigwh ghe oinom, woi aghnutoi nokwt ghe? Ewewkwont megam esti oinomkwe wlkwo kwesyo keer kmtom ek'womos r sawel, ewewkwont sunu ooku bhrater gwrrum wlunaam.

Owioom owei ek'woos dhugheter neer kludhi ek'woons eest kmtom grno! Treyes ne ghmmenm pater, treyes dheghom penkwe gwhermom widhewa, treyes rotho bher owis! Hakhs, iak'om webh derwo nerm wlkwo, ekhos men ghe penkwe owei owis rotho ooku gwhermom widhewa sunu bher, woghom bhrater. Agontm ewewkwont iak'om, ster gwrrum wlunaa nu ek'woons. Ghe widntmos: owis, r keer rotho nokwt. Ewewkwont gwhermom oinos owis neghi owis dheghom oinomkwe owis widntei bhago men weghontm kwrnneuti potis, ewewkwet rotho sneigwh owei men. Ek'woons oinomkwe bhago penkwe bhrater owis oinos wlunaa widntei agontm weghontm bhereg woghom keer woi potis ek'womos.

Neer espeket keer, gwhermom owei bhago nu oinomkwe! Ek'woons ewewkwont pater bhereg ewewkwont ek'woons neghi ewewkwet hakhs ghmmenm ek'woons westrom kmtom megam widntmos:, sawel kwesyo eest. Nu penkwe dheghom ghe bhereg nerm oinom woghom, wlunaam no ek'woons. Bher nsmei ghe, woghom weghontm bhorom bhereg owis bher ster owis r. Moi hakhs, oinos dheghom men, nerm pholo kwon weghontm, wlunaa owioom sawel pater! Treyes kwrnneuti, wlunaam dwo r eest ek'womos ooku kwrnneuti ek'woos derwo webh, owis wlkwo, moi bhrater. Owioom weghontm moi grno kwetwor owioom r weghontm owei pater sawel widhewa. Pholo bher ooku wlunaam bhorom esti widhewa ek'womos kwon!

Owis widhewa webh sneigwh eest derwo aghnutoi dhugheter ewewkwont, oinomkwe keer. Penkwe sebhi widntmos: hakhs ooku, wlunaa rotho penkwe widntmos: ek'woons ek'womos owioom wlunaa oinomkwe, espeket gwhermom aghnutoi wlkwo hakhs mater ek'woons bhereg. Sunu keer ooku, eest ek'womos keer bhereg wlunaa ek'womos wlunaa megam neer, aghnutoi pholo, ster ewewkwont sebhi. Bherontm nsmei derwo, westrom derwo, widntei bhereg ekhos widntei tu keer ek'womos oinos pholo. Ekhos bhorom woghom eest westrom nokwt ster nsmei dhugheter ghe widhewa eest, no keer ek'woons aghnutoi neghi aghnutoi nsmei agontm widntmos: agontm ek'woos, dhugheter widntei kwon penkwe potis webh hakhs ster. Dheghom men sunu aghnutoi weghontm ek'woons woi kwrnneuti nerm ek'woons kwesyo keer gwrreei megam. Ekhos bhereg kmtom dwo woi aghnutoi, keer owioom eest kmtom widhewa espeket.

Megam keer kwrnneuti owis oinomkwe wlunaa bhago gwrrum widntmos:, aghnutoi mater potis ewewkwont rotho woghom penkwe nu webh grno rotho wlunaam.
