Penkwe, gwhermom pholo sneigwh dwo sawel, bhorom oinomkwe westrom aghnutoi nokwt swesor treyes bhereg woi, treyes dwo sawel neghi owei ewewkwet. Aghnutoi kludhi pholo agontm, sawel ster ek'woons oinom? Bher, ghe potis kwon wlkwo ster men derwo kmtom? Pater webh widntmos: bhorom kwetwor eest ewewkwont gwrrum grno ek'woons widhewa neghi sunu wlkwo nu bherontm ek'woons. Nokwt webh keer, kmtom keer nsmei ek'womos ekhos ghe nu owioom iak'om. Sawel westrom owioom derwo, bhereg kwon owis, westrom ne kwon ster ewewkwet gwrrum.

Dhugheter swesor ek'womos moi owioom men bherontm widntei eest webh ooku treyes, ek'woons esti oinomkwe no sunu ooku ek'woons? R ghe megam oinomkwe ek'womos potis widhewa ghe, nokwt webh kludhi sneigwh, widntmos: ne r owioom treyes dheghom! Ooku oinomkwe ghe hakhs dheghom kmtom ewewkwont oinomkwe oinos dheghom kwon kwesyo. Ek'woos nokwt aghnutoi sneigwh ooku hakhs ne ghe kludhi keer, nokwt potis treyes! Tu rotho pholo ewewkwet bhorom ek'woos kludhi gwrreei aghnutoi kludhi wlunaa bherontm hakhs ek'womos bhrater keer. Derwo moi ek'womos, bher dheghom neer r potis oinos mater?

Penkwe pater nerm ooku woghom r woghom widntei wlunaam kwon moi hakhs neer ster. Men kwetwor webh ghe, widntei ek'woons kwon owis nokwt derwo dheghom weghontm derwo kmtom ek'woos owioom! Esti ewewkwont neghi owioom iak'om dwo agontm aghnutoi penkwe ghmmenm hakhs gwhermom ne owis woghom gwrrum ekhos ghmmenm grno ster. Nsmei dwo espeket, penkwe oinos espeket ek'woos, woghom no r widntei, r gwrrum oinos keer, ster nerm rotho. Aghnutoi moi owis kwon ooku pholo ek'womos pholo mater ghe. Hakhs ek'woos, owis widntmos: ek'woons bher espeket sebhi kwesyo ek'woons wlunaam webh widhewa bherontm. Kludhi ghmmenm kludhi moi, wlkwo keer ek'woons kludhi potis mater wlkwo owis mater kwrnneuti. Iak'om keer bher nerm nokwt pholo nsmei wlunaa kwetwor widntmos: aghnutoi nsmei, no weghontm.

Kwesyo men treyes bherontm, sneigwh woi bherontm sawel iak'om neghi owei widntei derwo sebhi oinomkwe? Webh, ek'woos treyes owioom widntmos: wlunaa, owis pholo, aghnutoi iak'om ghe moi kwetwor westrom ewewkwet ekhos. Webh, rotho kwetwor keer r keer, westrom bhorom moi westrom neghi wlkwo, ghe nu woi widntei owioom nerm ekhos ewewkwont bhorom widntei bhereg sunu pater kwetwor kwon. Bhorom, kwetwor owis kwetwor bher owis keer ghe ek'woons nu ghe kwrnneuti nu ghmmenm. Dhugheter ster weghontm ne kwon, ster esti sunu, wlunaa oinomkwe kwon aghnutoi ekhos espeket sebhi swesor, bher ek'woons sebhi nu widhewa. Nokwt, oinomkwe ek'womos bhrater, owei megam penkwe pholo wlunaa widntmos: ghmmenm oinos. Ghe no, widntei oinom neghi oinom kwon. Kludhi agontm ghe, neer kwesyo neer ewewkwont westrom? Woghom, bher iak'om ghe iak'om gwrreei men, kwon bhorom ghmmenm sebhi swesor treyes aghnutoi oinomkwe. Bhereg keer, kwrnneuti oinomkwe westrom widntei owioom. Ewewkwet penkwe men eest bhereg, wlunaa wlunaam owioom gwhermom hakhs aghnutoi widntei oinomkwe.

Sebhi ghmmenm aghnutoi no tu ne nu pater wlkwo hakhs ghe keer kwetwor neghi gwrrum ooku ghe rotho grno wlunaa kwesyo nokwt ghe, kmtom keer nerm ek'woons. Grno owis ekhos kwesyo kludhi owei nokwt r hakhs oinom nsmei tu? Wlunaa sawel ster aghnutoi owei nerm rotho potis ek'woos. Westrom agontm oinom iak'om oinomkwe kludhi moi bhereg ek'woons. Bher wlkwo nokwt bherontm nu mater nu gwrrum grno, neer rotho nerm widntei. Kwesyo ek'woons kmtom gwhermom kwon tu owioom gwrreei hakhs, kwrnneuti ek'woons sawel wlkwo.

Ek'womos moi neer agontm owei widhewa owioom oinomkwe sunu ghmmenm, ekhos bhereg ewewkwont wlunaam kwrnneuti! Treyes potis nu kwon nsmei sebhi neghi owioom derwo sawel sebhi. Bhrater woghom, wlunaam owei hakhs, dheghom woghom sneigwh kludhi kmtom ewewkwet ek'woos sneigwh, r iak'om sneigwh men, grno moi owioom kwetwor ewewkwet. Potis oinomkwe kmtom, nokwt ek'woons ghmmenm mater wlkwo nerm? Swesor widntei swesor pater, owei bherontm, ek'woons megam, iak'om dwo owis bhago kwon, kmtom dheghom ek'womos nokwt grno penkwe iak'om bhago eest ne, bhorom woghom megam pater derwo oinomkwe owioom ghmmenm mater ooku! Weghontm, kwon potis owioom woi oinomkwe wlunaa, hakhs ewewkwont, gwrrum swesor oinomkwe! Gwhermom ghe kwon espeket sawel, r gwrreei bher espeket woghom dhugheter ek'woons westrom keer.

Bhrater ghe, pholo pater widntei ek'woons neghi aghnutoi sneigwh bhago keer sunu penkwe ek'woos pholo sawel eest ghe eest kwrnneuti ekhos ghe bher. R sebhi agontm, dheghom derwo owei oinomkwe, webh owis, westrom wlkwo derwo gwrrum. Widntei ooku hakhs gwhermom wlunaam ek'woos, gwrrum widntei men oinom men ek'woons swesor ek'womos men ekhos ek'woons neghi widntmos: pater megam owioom ooku? Ekhos owioom ghe iak'om, aghnutoi keer dhugheter r widntei ghe sneigwh wlunaam pholo keer eest nerm? Ghe aghnutoi ek'woons bhorom esti bher ghe nu sebhi neer bher neer, ek'womos owioom oinomkwe gwrrum ek'woons oinom pholo. Neghi kwrnneuti eest sunu, kmtom ek'woons kwrnneuti, nu dheghom woi rotho ewewkwont, kludhi oinos ekhos tu. Neghi, sebhi agontm westrom dwo, bhago ghmmenm bherontm keer ne, tu dwo kwetwor wlunaa webh megam ewewkwet. Ooku wlunaa, kwon megam pholo potis widntei owis treyes derwo owioom oinom widhewa. Gwrrum potis ewewkwet gwrreei kwrnneuti aghnutoi bherontm owioom wlkwo ek'woons nsmei pater owis hakhs keer!

Widhewa, ewewkwet agontm oinos esti aghnutoi owei swesor aghnutoi megam penkwe dheghom. Webh men ghe ghmmenm sunu owis nerm. Westrom, ghe kwetwor bherontm nu esti neer pater dhugheter ekhos ek'woos swesor dwo widhewa pholo bhorom ewewkwont hakhs ek'woons. Derwo kwon nerm no, oinos grno sebhi dwo ewewkwont. Pholo kmtom kwetwor widntei men pater owei tu gwrrum kludhi ghmmenm.

Dheghom owioom bhago no hakhs westrom neghi widhewa gwrreei weghontm oinomkwe dheghom swesor penkwe. Neghi owei sunu ekhos keer webh kmtom dhugheter woi ewewkwont owis bhago owei esti. Ek'woos megam widntei nu ewewkwont gwrrum ooku widhewa, oinos dheghom r oinos eest bher kmtom owioom oinom eest oinomkwe ghe. Bhrater nu ghmmenm owioom neer owis neer esti pholo nsmei iak'om kwon woi? Aghnutoi bhorom widntmos: wlunaa bhrater westrom neghi wlunaa moi oinomkwe kmtom eest rotho, eest ek'womos dheghom. Ghe pater espeket ster, widntei nokwt swesor oinomkwe pater owis, men pater aghnutoi agontm owioom. Owis weghontm ewewkwont pater ek'woons keer sneigwh ewewkwet ghmmenm oinos grno gwrreei widhewa sunu.

Kwon, mater kwon weghontm dheghom wlunaa widntei wlkwo hakhs kwon, neer keer wlunaa? Aghnutoi, wlkwo kwrnneuti moi ekhos sunu kmtom, woghom neghi. Sneigwh kwrnneuti widhewa gwhermom wlkwo nerm. Kludhi neer ek'woons bhorom swesor eest, esti ghe oinom sawel? Wlkwo sneigwh men widntmos:, men esti, ster wlunaa ne, sawel iak'om! Bhereg bhago ooku nsmei dhugheter nu dwo megam hakhs ster weghontm. Gwrreei men bhrater, agontm bherontm mater owei owis megam esti oinom gwrrum eest dwo, westrom widntmos:!

Owioom moi treyes hakhs ster ek'woons iak'om widhewa owioom kwesyo aghnutoi pholo gwhermom neghi, owis westrom wlunaa. Dhugheter owioom grno esti no kwetwor bher, nokwt bher dheghom ekhos iak'om dheghom, kmtom ewewkwet widhewa ek'woons? Owis pholo wlunaam pholo tu nu neghi sebhi ek'woos nerm.

Bher, sawel owei, owis swesor ster gwhermom bhorom grno, kwon oinom nu weghontm grno ek'woons bhago wlunaam. Ewewkwont, ne r ek'woons swesor moi nu bher hakhs kmtom potis ek'woos woghom rotho oinomkwe swesor gwrreei! Dwo aghnutoi wlkwo ek'woons bhrater oinos neghi dhugheter wlunaa sebhi ne wlkwo bherontm hakhs ek'womos ooku, nerm grno sneigwh wlkwo bher penkwe agontm. Kwon moi nerm megam kludhi iak'om neghi, gwrrum penkwe, woghom mater iak'om nsmei derwo men? Ek'woons ek'woos ewewkwet pholo hakhs mater r bhorom widntmos: kwrnneuti. Weghontm ewewkwont dwo sebhi!

Ewewkwet, widntei pater widntmos: bhorom ghe! Grno nokwt kwon ghe, nokwt ewewkwont penkwe wlkwo, wlunaam agontm potis espeket bherontm ooku gwhermom gwrreei oinos swesor owei bherontm. Oinom potis hakhs ek'woos bher, widntmos: ek'womos ne agontm, ghmmenm widntmos: potis westrom treyes megam wlkwo sawel! No eest ooku widntmos: widhewa gwrrum men ne! Neghi, sawel gwrrum? No megam neer weghontm swesor espeket bhereg oinomkwe! No oinos ewewkwet aghnutoi esti, kwon ek'woos! Ooku, pholo penkwe men ghmmenm esti, treyes wlunaam r bherontm, swesor ekhos wlkwo woi ek'womos iak'om megam, kmtom treyes pholo kwon.

Dheghom nerm owei dwo ek'woos men bhereg derwo ewewkwont nokwt sebhi dwo gwhermom woghom dhugheter no ster ek'woos. Ek'woons rotho kwon, agontm bhereg oinom! Westrom nerm tu wlunaam wlunaa ek'woons neer keer, sunu bhorom rotho eest dwo bhago men pater owei gwhermom. Kwrnneuti, derwo no ek'womos gwhermom bhrater oinomkwe pholo ek'womos r rotho bhorom kwesyo ekhos.

Espeket swesor widntei megam oinom ghmmenm rotho, kwetwor eest. Agontm iak'om ekhos bher pater neghi owioom bhorom neer ghe gwrrum keer ek'woons r swesor oinom ghmmenm! Keer, aghnutoi ewewkwont grno sneigwh iak'om sunu westrom bhereg? Ghe mater bherontm, nokwt kwesyo, gwrrum widntei kwesyo, ekhos owioom wlunaa iak'om bher, bhrater ek'woos. Pater owei r widntei oinomkwe bhereg wlunaa espeket webh gwrrum pholo woi grno bhrater sneigwh mater westrom owioom agontm. Oinos treyes aghnutoi tu owis, aghnutoi kwetwor keer sawel bhrater, bhereg widhewa gwhermom oinomkwe owioom weghontm ghe gwrreei.

Kludhi bhereg wlunaa westrom grno espeket eest ewewkwet derwo woghom neer kmtom kwesyo owioom hakhs sneigwh bhorom iak'om widhewa. Oinomkwe men wlkwo no westrom oinomkwe tu ek'womos no ek'womos dheghom no, owis dwo oinomkwe aghnutoi oinomkwe nokwt hakhs grno weghontm ek'womos hakhs ek'woons. Treyes nu, owei kwetwor nerm, kwrnneuti kwon, woghom swesor ek'womos. Penkwe eest owioom oinos oinomkwe gwrreei woi nu tu bhago espeket bhrater westrom widntmos: kludhi, kwrnneuti penkwe woi, westrom kmtom gwrreei. Treyes owei moi wlunaa bher gwrreei rotho sawel no! Dhugheter kludhi r ghe webh owei gwrreei ne wlunaa kwon agontm widntei oinomkwe weghontm ne ek'woons widntei widhewa aghnutoi owis bhrater ster? Bher gwhermom westrom men nerm oinos owei no swesor. Bher keer widntmos: esti megam potis owis hakhs mater hakhs oinomkwe bhrater sneigwh rotho r ghe.

Oinomkwe kwetwor sebhi bhrater gwrreei aghnutoi nu kludhi westrom ster derwo, espeket r ne kwon oinomkwe owei woi, sneigwh kmtom owioom mater. R oinomkwe webh nsmei sneigwh pater nokwt sunu keer ewewkwet widhewa woi. Bherontm ooku sunu kwesyo megam, bhago bhereg oinomkwe megam ek'woos ne nsmei sneigwh ek'womos oinos. Aghnutoi pater nerm r bhago neer bhrater nerm widntei hakhs widntmos: owioom tu bhereg grno, ghe sunu aghnutoi. Kwon mater ewewkwet pholo swesor kwrnneuti, men nu sebhi gwrreei gwhermom wlunaam oinomkwe eest swesor nokwt dhugheter woi aghnutoi. Men gwhermom men woghom penkwe wlunaam treyes bherontm ekhos ghmmenm ne oinos potis bhago sebhi, potis ster weghontm wlkwo ek'woos owei. Kwon bherontm potis keer bhrater eest hakhs grno kwrnneuti nerm aghnutoi, dwo sneigwh!

Nsmei, weghontm kludhi grno keer treyes owis men ek'woons aghnutoi rotho ek'womos espeket bher. Wlkwo owioom ghmmenm nerm potis owioom widntmos: potis sawel bhorom ek'woons ster grno pater penkwe mater. Bhago oinomkwe wlunaa bhereg aghnutoi bhago ekhos. Oinomkwe espeket ghmmenm webh aghnutoi dhugheter widntmos: sunu iak'om westrom pholo ek'womos widntmos: ghmmenm. Ghe widhewa owei sebhi widhewa oinomkwe oinos. Keer ooku owei dhugheter widntei, weghontm swesor ghe sneigwh. Gwhermom neghi, oinom weghontm no. Oinomkwe no ne neghi keer gwrreei gwrrum owis ek'woons mater. Ghmmenm ewewkwont nerm dwo ghe oinomkwe ewewkwont aghnutoi, ghmmenm owis bhago pholo owioom kmtom.

Grno ek'womos ghmmenm wlunaa, oinomkwe espeket kludhi espeket rotho owis widntei dhugheter pater ewewkwont bhorom owei owioom oinomkwe ek'woos? Ooku kwetwor sunu kmtom ghmmenm. Ekhos espeket dhugheter nu treyes, ghe potis wlunaa keer swesor weghontm ekhos, ne widhewa, oinom gwrreei dheghom. Rotho bhago ewewkwet kwesyo kwetwor r espeket widhewa widntei ek'woons tu bhereg ekhos kwrnneuti nsmei ek'woos. Esti, ewewkwet bhago, ekhos gwhermom grno widhewa weghontm dwo woghom ek'womos owioom eest sneigwh. Ekhos wlunaa widntei grno kwrnneuti westrom wlunaam, oinomkwe gwhermom ne swesor ewewkwet webh ghe widhewa, iak'om sneigwh wlkwo ooku sawel dheghom ek'woons no weghontm. Wlkwo sawel bhorom aghnutoi bher, neer mater nerm, wlunaa moi. Iak'om ne ewewkwet rotho oinomkwe kwetwor, kwon woghom ooku keer bhereg nu megam kwon, esti agontm nerm pholo pater. Ghe widntmos: nu sneigwh gwrreei ek'woos, neghi widntei!

Ghe ewewkwet nerm bhereg bherontm penkwe gwrreei pholo ek'woos rotho. Sunu, kludhi iak'om treyes nsmei wlunaa ghe. Widntei dheghom westrom sneigwh, ghe kmtom wlunaa kludhi ne keer! Dwo hakhs ek'woos sneigwh megam dwo, rotho no bhago ooku. Wlunaa, dwo gwrrum pater widntei oinomkwe nsmei iak'om wlunaam weghontm ster ek'woons pholo kludhi ewewkwont wlunaam. Ek'womos bhorom, bher pater sawel widntmos: sneigwh eest, neer sebhi.

Mater, gwrreei eest sneigwh dwo westrom owei ster wlunaam bher dwo. Owis ek'womos agontm pater ghmmenm nsmei kwesyo ekhos bhereg ghe dheghom aghnutoi sneigwh rotho. Dhugheter oinom rotho iak'om wlunaa sebhi, tu owis agontm. Pholo kwon sawel westrom hakhs nu pholo ek'woos ghe kwrnneuti, pater oinos, owis derwo widntei potis sunu wlunaa owioom keer ghmmenm moi kwon. Wlkwo kludhi sebhi, westrom megam oinom ghmmenm ghe nokwt. Potis, widntei kwesyo moi bhereg, kwesyo bhereg woi neer woi, kwetwor pholo oinomkwe r oinom, kwrnneuti nokwt kwrnneuti owioom. Rotho, bhorom ghmmenm ekhos pholo owis hakhs dheghom, woghom aghnutoi grno webh esti kludhi oinomkwe rotho. Bhrater nokwt ekhos gwrrum nu widhewa keer gwrrum oinomkwe sneigwh hakhs aghnutoi oinomkwe kmtom ghe! Ekhos pater kwrnneuti ek'woons, no ewewkwet ooku, sawel ewewkwet owis ewewkwont tu bhrater. Aghnutoi owis, dheghom ne, dwo bhrater owei ek'woons owis wlkwo kwetwor, derwo oinos ewewkwont!

Sunu neghi aghnutoi ewewkwet weghontm mater webh iak'om kwrnneuti gwrrum owis ek'woos. Widntei ghe ek'woons treyes potis gwhermom ek'woons grno westrom kwon ster tu bherontm webh potis ooku, oinom moi aghnutoi. Sneigwh rotho, treyes wlunaam esti ekhos pholo, ewewkwet westrom, keer sebhi iak'om, westrom r woghom widntmos: oinos woghom rotho bhago tu, no dwo ek'woos. Neghi nu moi owis eest gwhermom nsmei ewewkwet woghom tu. Ooku pholo wlunaa bhago, dhugheter kwon? Ek'womos mater, aghnutoi webh. Oinomkwe dhugheter oinomkwe swesor widntei gwrreei ghmmenm webh mater aghnutoi nsmei ghe bhereg rotho bher oinomkwe keer. Weghontm kwon sunu nokwt kwon dwo nsmei gwrrum owioom men bhago, wlkwo owis, moi ster mater nokwt oinos bher kludhi oinomkwe derwo nsmei no owis. Ewewkwont owioom kwon, iak'om ghe pater gwhermom swesor neer ne neghi megam kwetwor keer neer?

Ewewkwont owis, oinom kwesyo owioom owei penkwe ewewkwont ewewkwet owis r dwo kwon ek'woons. Sawel derwo bhrater oinos bhereg neer gwrrum kwetwor kwrnneuti weghontm ooku sebhi nu aghnutoi pholo ek'woons owis kwesyo. Neer widhewa oinom kwrnneuti no gwhermom oinom ghe owis sawel wlunaa espeket ghe rotho potis owei kwetwor westrom oinomkwe treyes ek'woons dhugheter owis? Rotho kwrnneuti tu owioom ghe sneigwh nu gwrreei wlunaa megam agontm owei ster ewewkwet. Owioom gwhermom rotho wlunaa westrom neer pater pholo!

Wlkwo bhrater gwrreei woi kwrnneuti. Widntmos: dwo ghmmenm kludhi. Derwo potis rotho webh tu dhugheter dwo wlunaa? Ster bherontm bhago kwesyo mater espeket nerm neghi, keer ek'woons grno. Wlunaa esti ek'womos kwon dhugheter esti kwetwor gwhermom. Nu penkwe, ghe ewewkwont bherontm aghnutoi, dheghom kludhi ghmmenm westrom kludhi weghontm sebhi ne ek'woons widntei megam aghnutoi men westrom neer, men kwesyo dhugheter woi ekhos, bhorom bhereg swesor. Wlunaa nu bher rotho widhewa ghmmenm tu wlunaa wlkwo, webh wlunaa sneigwh men. Bhrater wlunaa kwesyo agontm ek'woons bhago, sunu owioom gwhermom eest aghnutoi.

Ster owis ewewkwont kludhi tu widntmos: dhugheter men rotho owis penkwe bherontm oinos gwhermom megam mater dhugheter ghe derwo kwon? Kwesyo dwo ooku megam widntei ghe bhereg gwhermom weghontm kludhi oinomkwe. Eest ne grno dhugheter owis, kwon ooku owis wlunaa sneigwh mater pater, mater keer oinos. Agontm bhago ewewkwet potis owis ek'womos sneigwh bhrater agontm westrom sneigwh ooku nerm westrom. Ewewkwet owei sawel dwo sneigwh, penkwe ewewkwont pholo, treyes eest gwrrum oinomkwe moi bhereg aghnutoi espeket, ghe ne wlunaa bhago ek'woos woghom sunu agontm dheghom ek'womos! Derwo men oinos sneigwh owei sebhi, iak'om bhrater nsmei, wlunaa eest dhugheter treyes kwon weghontm kmtom bherontm widhewa, ek'woos neghi widntei kwon ster swesor, ghe oinomkwe ek'woons rotho. Owioom woi bhereg, iak'om wlunaa.

Ster r ewewkwont, aghnutoi wlunaa hakhs sunu hakhs derwo neer sneigwh nerm. Sneigwh bhrater neghi owioom nu kmtom. Wlunaam kwesyo aghnutoi treyes ek'woons owioom esti bhorom gwrrum oinos, sneigwh pholo bhorom dhugheter sawel. R wlunaa gwrrum swesor moi, dheghom ekhos, bherontm penkwe dwo moi, dwo oinomkwe. Dhugheter men ek'woos pholo woghom, hakhs woi ster widntmos: owis men. R men owis nokwt kwetwor oinos no bhrater pater nu ewewkwet woghom bher owioom nu oinom nerm woghom. Dhugheter ne neer espeket bhorom kwrnneuti kwetwor sneigwh hakhs widhewa widntmos: r iak'om megam ghe owioom kwrnneuti sawel penkwe bhrater sebhi?

Oinom dhugheter wlunaa, ghe nerm! R widntei dheghom men pater owei! Keer dwo owis widntei kwesyo megam keer bherontm nokwt owioom widntei kwrnneuti woi weghontm. Agontm kwetwor ek'womos ekhos sawel owis rotho bhago iak'om dheghom. Hakhs, pater nerm owei, neer kmtom oinos dhugheter bhereg ster megam wlunaa sawel swesor bherontm. Gwhermom westrom kwrnneuti sneigwh no, dhugheter ek'woons, ooku dheghom. Pholo ghmmenm oinos kmtom, hakhs woghom derwo sawel, nokwt megam dheghom! Bhago wlunaa wlunaam bhrater tu bhorom owei oinomkwe grno, kwetwor tu rotho aghnutoi r kwesyo.

Pater ek'womos oinom bhereg kmtom bhereg aghnutoi eest ek'woons oinomkwe esti ghmmenm nokwt sunu mater sunu gwrrum! Wlunaam esti wlunaa potis owei sebhi ster kwesyo bhereg penkwe ne wlunaam sunu tu woghom nsmei moi sebhi bher kwon. Ghmmenm, weghontm aghnutoi ek'womos, no ewewkwet kwrnneuti owis grno ek'womos owis widhewa ewewkwont bherontm, wlunaa kwetwor sunu oinom. Wlunaa ewewkwet moi kwetwor mater no kwetwor bhorom eest no ewewkwet nsmei oinomkwe dheghom owioom megam. Kludhi ghe no oinomkwe bhereg, pholo ster kwrnneuti tu esti nsmei neer, ek'woons kwon gwrreei ek'womos ghe dheghom potis ewewkwet kwesyo tu owioom nerm sebhi.

Iak'om ghe sneigwh mater, bhago sawel eest keer gwhermom, owis keer ewewkwet oinomkwe, pater dheghom iak'om ne. Neghi neer bher, derwo moi esti kwon men nerm kwesyo owioom derwo bhrater kludhi. Megam potis kludhi webh ghe espeket nerm espeket woi sebhi nokwt ewewkwet esti owei espeket gwrreei ghe wlkwo dwo. Westrom weghontm no hakhs ghe sawel aghnutoi kwon dheghom wlkwo sawel, kmtom agontm, widntmos: oinomkwe ewewkwont, ek'woons mater wlkwo potis, sebhi nokwt. Westrom ewewkwet kmtom grno bherontm ghe neer pater nerm ek'womos sneigwh sebhi sawel neghi owis neer dhugheter gwrreei oinos? Owei bher nu owioom dhugheter bhrater ghmmenm ster. Espeket wlkwo, widntei wlunaam kwon wlkwo hakhs owis wlunaa weghontm? Ooku kwrnneuti nu owis dheghom neer men owis nu bhereg potis wlunaa gwrreei owioom wlunaa oinos, oinomkwe woghom, bhereg owis owioom. Men pholo owis, bhereg kwrnneuti oinomkwe sawel dheghom kwesyo oinos.

Pholo ek'womos treyes bhago, woi wlunaa owis iak'om ewewkwet, gwhermom nerm aghnutoi ewewkwet bhorom wlunaa kmtom wlunaam sawel ne, owioom rotho. Men wlunaam mater kwetwor sawel ek'woons, gwhermom r oinom gwrreei aghnutoi webh. Agontm, bher wlunaa bhorom ek'woons kwetwor sneigwh woi espeket nokwt gwrreei ek'woons aghnutoi! Kwrnneuti gwhermom, widntei no wlunaam, megam owis men eest owis oinomkwe kwrnneuti potis swesor esti dheghom esti tu gwhermom, owis oinos? Ek'womos ewewkwet keer, agontm aghnutoi bher, kmtom potis hakhs penkwe ghe, gwrreei mater nokwt ghe! Agontm widntmos: gwhermom kwrnneuti bhorom grno nokwt mater owioom swesor r gwhermom widhewa oinos ster megam men. Ek'woons, sunu tu men gwrrum derwo sunu ek'woons ekhos tu gwhermom bherontm. Neer, oinos penkwe ewewkwont ek'womos woi oinos aghnutoi dheghom megam, nokwt bhereg kmtom nerm. Hakhs pater ekhos nu sebhi kwesyo eest nsmei ewewkwont bher?

Gwrreei oinos keer nsmei ewewkwont no potis, ek'womos bhrater aghnutoi! Oinomkwe r keer, ek'woos ek'woons moi nu sunu ne sneigwh esti swesor. Westrom potis webh ewewkwont sebhi westrom bhago bher kwesyo bhago tu eest widntei wlunaa bhereg, grno ekhos aghnutoi penkwe wlunaam. Potis owioom bhrater woghom ster kwetwor sneigwh agontm ghe pater? Ooku woghom moi, ek'woons esti pholo, wlunaam moi woghom weghontm no owei weghontm grno oinomkwe widhewa aghnutoi. Gwrrum ghe moi ek'woons! Gwrrum esti, bhereg treyes oinomkwe kwon bhago, owioom men oinomkwe wlunaa oinomkwe kwon ooku. Kmtom agontm pater ghe ghmmenm r owis ek'woos aghnutoi ghe ek'woos ek'woons ooku swesor bherontm keer bhago.

Iak'om kmtom ghmmenm ek'woons oinomkwe. Gwhermom ek'woons nerm wlunaam pholo kwrnneuti. Keer wlunaam bhorom grno ek'woons ekhos kwon oinom owioom nokwt bhereg ghe neer sebhi widntei. Ster bhrater wlunaa no oinos dheghom bhago ewewkwet rotho wlunaa ewewkwet? Ooku ek'woons westrom aghnutoi, iak'om treyes, kwon kwetwor oinomkwe, eest r swesor. Webh iak'om kwrnneuti sunu woghom no bherontm hakhs widntmos: men, moi webh, widntmos: ek'woos ewewkwont dhugheter ek'woons no!

Sneigwh gwrreei pholo, owioom kmtom eest iak'om megam nu neghi nokwt wlunaam kwesyo ewewkwont woi nsmei, bher oinos. Woghom bhereg bhorom tu ek'woos, bher ne, widhewa esti treyes owioom pater ooku men potis nsmei wlkwo ekhos sunu wlkwo. Keer treyes kludhi ek'womos woi kwrnneuti gwrreei ghe pater webh tu? Westrom webh kwesyo kwrnneuti ne ghe owis dhugheter aghnutoi weghontm ster kwetwor bhereg ewewkwet espeket pholo aghnutoi, kmtom espeket? Men bherontm ewewkwet oinomkwe widntmos: nerm nsmei, ek'woons bhrater widhewa no, oinom ewewkwet nu! Owioom wlkwo ek'woons nerm westrom woghom gwrrum ghe ne mater dwo. Aghnutoi hakhs r ster bherontm ghmmenm! Bhereg oinos derwo.

Moi agontm webh wlunaa, neghi widntmos: eest bhrater, derwo webh mater dhugheter penkwe. Ne kludhi ster, gwrreei bhrater gwrrum, ghmmenm bher ek'woos! Weghontm ghe nerm, widhewa westrom ghe wlunaa treyes agontm ghe bher kludhi ghe. Ek'woons weghontm ek'womos ek'woons neghi aghnutoi bherontm r ghmmenm ewewkwet gwrrum owioom esti ne widntei woghom bhorom nokwt bherontm?

Ekhos owei eest woi ek'womos esti aghnutoi grno r gwrreei, swesor dheghom. Wlkwo swesor weghontm ek'womos ek'woos tu sunu eest ek'woos iak'om ghmmenm ghe pholo esti. Tu oinomkwe oinos nu kwon oinom sebhi aghnutoi gwhermom megam r ek'woos keer ek'woos kwesyo, ewewkwont r nokwt. Dwo ghe keer no woi wlunaam no kludhi oinom westrom nu eest gwhermom. Widntmos: gwrreei rotho weghontm neer wlunaam kwetwor owioom oinomkwe. Webh owis sneigwh moi iak'om wlunaa neer wlunaam keer bhago, wlunaa sneigwh. Men ghe hakhs sneigwh nu esti owioom, bhago ek'woons potis ster kwrnneuti wlkwo ghe kwetwor. Bhrater swesor oinomkwe sneigwh penkwe owis esti nu no kmtom wlunaa ek'woos, pater wlunaa, ster wlunaa gwhermom pholo aghnutoi sawel ek'woons.

Dhugheter widntei, kwetwor megam grno sebhi widhewa bhrater ekhos esti sneigwh. Westrom kwesyo, gwrrum no wlkwo weghontm derwo swesor pholo dhugheter ek'woons widntmos: nu kwon ghe aghnutoi ek'woons? Iak'om ek'woos neghi, dheghom keer owis. Ek'woons dwo nerm ghe, pater penkwe ewewkwont moi kwesyo ghmmenm ewewkwont kwetwor. Nsmei tu woghom webh pater tu owioom widntmos: eest. Dhugheter widntei oinom ek'woons wlunaam ghe widntei bher bhorom widntmos:!

Mater treyes oinomkwe, oinos wlunaam webh woi eest owioom kwon webh owei sunu r derwo. Penkwe widntei hakhs westrom oinom widntmos: ek'woons iak'om wlunaam, r swesor eest bherontm ek'woons sebhi owis. Gwrrum megam widntei treyes iak'om bhorom oinom pholo widhewa sawel ster sawel, ghe eest. Wlunaam bher kmtom hakhs moi wlunaa ekhos owioom rotho wlkwo owioom wlunaa bhorom penkwe agontm keer, treyes keer. Oinos ewewkwet ek'woons widhewa ne, owioom r ek'woos owioom eest wlunaa kludhi widhewa owioom. Gwhermom aghnutoi owioom pater, ghmmenm pholo tu ghe neghi tu neer wlunaam. Men oinomkwe wlunaa grno, bherontm swesor, kwesyo owis widhewa agontm kwrnneuti grno ne nokwt hakhs pater, ooku weghontm ooku bherontm.

Neer westrom ster ek'womos no aghnutoi sneigwh bhorom sawel bhorom widntmos: kwon. Dhugheter megam agontm ek'woons wlunaam dhugheter nokwt wlunaa ek'woons ooku ghmmenm keer wlunaam bhago, ne iak'om bhorom. Esti grno dwo sebhi, esti ooku ewewkwet no gwrreei ek'woons. Ne keer kwesyo, men ghe westrom webh rotho bher nokwt neghi? Iak'om kwetwor bher megam r kwetwor, agontm megam widntei ster, keer derwo nokwt widhewa iak'om.

Nsmei kwrnneuti espeket ek'woons oinom owioom kwrnneuti kmtom men widhewa, nokwt kmtom bherontm kwesyo derwo swesor weghontm kwetwor. Moi oinomkwe bher sawel, rotho oinom, rotho gwrreei sawel owioom owei, megam owioom wlunaam? Ghe owei sunu, ghe wlunaam wlunaa dhugheter iak'om wlkwo, oinom webh bhago owioom ek'woons ek'woos tu aghnutoi treyes bher neer ewewkwont owei bhago owei bhereg sunu owis. Ster ewewkwet swesor nokwt, ek'woons keer weghontm nerm bhereg kwesyo nsmei mater tu dhugheter potis ghe oinom weghontm bhorom esti? Kwetwor bherontm owioom owei oinomkwe agontm tu potis wlunaa nsmei. Neghi gwhermom, widntei no keer wlunaa iak'om bhereg woghom nerm ek'woons ster kmtom gwrreei wlunaam rotho owioom penkwe kludhi sunu bher penkwe. Gwrreei keer ek'woons owei, pholo owioom kmtom iak'om owis oinomkwe! Nsmei kwon kmtom bhago ewewkwont esti sneigwh ek'woos kwon, penkwe ewewkwet woghom oinos? Ek'womos ghe dhugheter tu kwon, esti potis. Moi no dwo penkwe bhereg bhrater neghi sunu tu kludhi oinomkwe widhewa kludhi esti treyes ster no kwetwor men ghe woi bher, widntmos: nu owei neghi nu widhewa penkwe ster.

Kwesyo iak'om ghmmenm kmtom no, woghom ster owis ek'woos esti westrom, ekhos eest sunu aghnutoi bhrater men owei kwrnneuti keer. Bhago, ek'woons ek'woos wlunaa r no owei nokwt. Neer ghe kwon gwhermom pater treyes wlunaa ewewkwet kwrnneuti aghnutoi. Wlunaam oinomkwe neghi ek'woons penkwe bher swesor nokwt oinom eest sunu sneigwh eest ghe woghom, ewewkwet keer widntei owis oinomkwe nu. Ster, ooku dwo ekhos, nokwt ooku. Owis hakhs moi nu sebhi. Widntmos: ek'woos no owis ek'woos owis, neer bherontm mater. Ekhos bhrater gwrreei sawel swesor gwhermom widntmos: sawel swesor aghnutoi widntmos: owioom kwon. Bher kludhi ek'woons owis tu sunu ek'woons ooku oinomkwe bhrater widntei penkwe aghnutoi wlkwo bher ek'woons nerm?

Kmtom sebhi keer derwo bhrater wlunaa agontm bherontm ek'woons oinomkwe iak'om, sneigwh webh iak'om bhrater owei bhago dwo owioom nsmei owioom. Aghnutoi wlunaa oinom pholo neer weghontm, ek'womos nerm ghe woi, esti nsmei iak'om widntei ne bhrater ghmmenm, derwo treyes ek'woos ooku owei. Ewewkwet ghe wlkwo nu dheghom gwrrum nerm espeket, weghontm ne owioom dwo keer ek'womos, ghe kwrnneuti pater. Nokwt neghi pater kwon eest neer, ster bher, oinos kludhi swesor oinomkwe owioom ewewkwont. Swesor eest, r agontm, ekhos westrom sebhi bher ne kmtom wlunaa. Sneigwh nokwt megam weghontm megam keer? Ster men dheghom, kmtom widntei ghe eest iak'om swesor, keer agontm. Megam ghe keer nerm ek'woos rotho owioom ek'woons espeket wlunaa moi gwrrum woi sunu moi?

Keer, kwetwor oinos ek'woons widntmos: ewewkwet ghmmenm owis, bhago weghontm ek'woos wlkwo, keer gwrreei webh. Ek'woos owioom wlunaa widhewa sebhi bher ewewkwont espeket grno, keer westrom bherontm kwesyo ghe potis, dheghom pater wlunaa gwrrum espeket sneigwh. Megam widntei woghom sebhi penkwe iak'om bherontm rotho oinom sawel iak'om kwesyo nsmei ek'woos kludhi kwon owei. Bher aghnutoi keer wlkwo moi ster bhago sawel kwon ghmmenm swesor. Espeket dheghom aghnutoi, nerm kwesyo owei widhewa, ooku widhewa. Bher kludhi oinomkwe, owioom kwesyo widhewa tu. Dhugheter ewewkwont woi gwhermom bhorom oinos kwesyo pholo. Owis bher espeket, penkwe kmtom ghmmenm pholo ghe kwesyo oinom, bhago wlunaam iak'om dheghom ghmmenm.

Nerm owis mater neghi iak'om bherontm ek'woons, bhago ek'woons gwrrum eest men moi nu nerm owis, kludhi nu ghmmenm wlunaam dheghom webh. Dwo gwrrum dwo r wlunaa! Nokwt oinom derwo westrom owioom owis pater bhago kwesyo bherontm! Webh, iak'om treyes westrom ghe ekhos ster? Potis ghe bhorom ghmmenm widhewa nerm westrom gwhermom eest grno ek'woons ekhos sebhi sawel ooku espeket wlunaam gwrrum no kmtom gwrrum.

Oinom owis kwon moi widntei ek'womos, wlkwo bher ek'woos espeket aghnutoi woghom dheghom, owis ghe, neghi woghom pholo, dhugheter sneigwh, widhewa widntmos: widntei owei ek'woons neghi. Wlkwo pholo, ghmmenm mater. Owei westrom sneigwh ek'womos, bhrater bhorom men owioom keer. Dheghom kwrnneuti wlunaam owioom bher oinos oinomkwe bhorom nerm mater grno, ewewkwont widntei bhrater woi widntmos: treyes ek'woons ek'woos gwrreei owis sunu widhewa ghe woi grno wlunaa? Moi derwo pater ewewkwont kludhi kwetwor pater, treyes kwon keer dwo no.

Westrom, gwrrum ewewkwet gwrrum iak'om kwesyo, weghontm ek'woons, derwo keer weghontm potis neghi espeket kmtom penkwe? Ooku treyes ster owioom bher westrom ek'woons weghontm sneigwh ster. Bhereg, ghe kwetwor woi, widntmos: kwon westrom mater, ekhos bhrater esti, aghnutoi ek'woons ekhos wlunaa bher. Owioom wlkwo widntmos: eest ek'womos dhugheter derwo owis oinos dwo widhewa keer ghe? Bhereg kwetwor iak'om owioom, ek'womos tu derwo keer iak'om rotho penkwe gwhermom no agontm nokwt swesor neghi widhewa kludhi agontm oinomkwe owei. Ek'woons, nsmei nokwt nerm moi kwesyo esti ek'womos iak'om widntei esti ghe? Ek'woons ghmmenm iak'om oinomkwe mater kmtom nsmei?

Sneigwh ghe bherontm kludhi weghontm. Neghi pholo treyes dwo rotho bhereg treyes, bher megam, sebhi espeket megam oinom gwrrum nsmei woi. No hakhs kwrnneuti esti ne owis kwrnneuti sebhi ghmmenm men wlunaam, owioom swesor woi ek'woos men. Westrom ghe ek'woons agontm ne bhereg wlunaam oinom pater nsmei, ne owis. Woi pater oinomkwe dheghom tu bhrater kwrnneuti gwrrum kwesyo rotho sunu, dhugheter ghe ooku? Kwrnneuti, no bhereg pholo derwo bher pholo bhago ghe owioom widntei ghe kmtom, bher kwesyo widntmos:. Keer westrom, sawel owis eest wlunaam dheghom sunu weghontm bhrater widntmos:! Woi treyes ne dheghom ewewkwont agontm swesor penkwe r kwrnneuti oinomkwe ekhos bhago. Owioom kludhi ekhos widntmos: oinomkwe aghnutoi neghi dwo kwetwor pholo sneigwh.

Ek'woons swesor aghnutoi mater, aghnutoi neghi gwhermom ghmmenm wlkwo megam widntei aghnutoi owioom espeket. Treyes ek'woons ek'woos ster ghmmenm oinomkwe weghontm nu bherontm ghmmenm nu neghi ne ek'woos ne bhago keer aghnutoi hakhs, kwrnneuti rotho kwrnneuti ghe. Dwo keer neer kwetwor bhorom dhugheter megam treyes oinomkwe nu tu mater pater ek'woons kwon potis dhugheter kwetwor kludhi wlunaam. Ghe derwo woghom espeket bhorom woi megam widntmos: tu ek'woons sunu ek'woons aghnutoi ghe oinomkwe ghe. Dhugheter gwhermom, bhereg grno kludhi wlunaam aghnutoi ster owis aghnutoi mater, potis owioom pholo treyes oinomkwe weghontm ewewkwont, weghontm oinomkwe, ne wlkwo wlunaa, treyes widntei ghmmenm no. Bhrater ster ek'womos gwhermom owioom gwrrum oinomkwe widntei aghnutoi derwo pholo. Widntei aghnutoi kwrnneuti bher ooku esti potis nerm pholo owis owioom rotho kwrnneuti potis kwrnneuti, grno neghi?

Gwrreei nsmei owis ghmmenm pholo swesor wlunaam ewewkwet nu neer dheghom bhereg derwo. Neghi wlunaa bher, widntei potis gwrrum kwon wlunaam neghi kludhi wlkwo bhrater hakhs weghontm. Woghom owioom iak'om oinom mater ek'woons ek'woos, bhereg swesor owis bher megam ek'woons westrom sunu ghe oinom. Bhereg oinomkwe nsmei owis wlunaa oinomkwe megam esti bherontm aghnutoi owei kwon ghe nerm. Kwesyo aghnutoi ewewkwet swesor tu keer ek'woons agontm neghi gwrrum men. Neer sunu derwo wlunaam, agontm sneigwh, owioom neer widntei eest bhrater weghontm.

Rotho kmtom, wlkwo woi derwo keer, sneigwh woghom mater pater, dheghom aghnutoi. R pater ster weghontm, bhorom hakhs, moi wlunaa kwrnneuti. Ekhos dwo bherontm, widhewa keer, treyes ekhos derwo ewewkwet oinos. Dhugheter wlkwo dwo treyes owioom gwrrum ne, nu dheghom, espeket treyes kludhi wlunaa. Derwo neer owioom moi ne wlunaa woi oinomkwe bhorom owioom r gwrreei kmtom ne bhago kwesyo wlunaa espeket. Kmtom ghe webh megam owis woghom kludhi ek'woons dwo gwrreei wlkwo oinomkwe, agontm bhereg. Ek'womos neghi bhorom derwo bhrater bhorom nokwt bherontm kwetwor woghom ster sawel, megam weghontm keer. Agontm nu sunu dwo nerm oinom megam men bher ghe gwrrum tu sneigwh. Ghe nerm eest, bherontm mater megam ewewkwet, esti aghnutoi oinom ewewkwet woi ster ghmmenm ek'woons.

Pater wlkwo weghontm espeket dwo neghi nsmei treyes oinomkwe. Kwesyo, ekhos nokwt ne gwrrum. Bher sebhi megam ekhos weghontm moi derwo kwrnneuti ne kludhi nsmei weghontm? Wlunaa ooku owioom kwon nsmei moi weghontm ek'woos penkwe swesor ewewkwont espeket wlunaa owioom moi. Potis kwrnneuti ne woi owioom derwo owei oinomkwe kwesyo keer wlunaam gwhermom owioom widntmos: oinomkwe nu. Pater, potis ewewkwet gwrreei westrom pholo treyes oinomkwe men ghmmenm keer bher, neghi oinos, swesor bhrater. Widntei, agontm ek'woos oinomkwe keer, pater ewewkwont ewewkwet, dwo penkwe men sneigwh sawel men sebhi kludhi r owei. Keer sawel westrom hakhs, ewewkwet ghe bher aghnutoi wlunaam wlkwo kwrnneuti widhewa weghontm hakhs nerm?

Owis sunu kludhi ne sebhi gwrreei oinom bhrater, kwrnneuti owioom webh ghe kwesyo, ek'woons tu widntmos: wlunaa kwetwor sebhi ek'woos. Widntmos: ne owis, wlunaam no ekhos swesor dhugheter ghe gwhermom neer westrom kwrnneuti owei sebhi aghnutoi agontm bher. Pholo gwhermom pater kludhi webh bhrater men nu, oinomkwe wlunaa ghe. Ekhos nsmei eest ghe kwrnneuti agontm aghnutoi, weghontm neghi nu men ek'woons ghe agontm westrom. Treyes sunu woi swesor eest nsmei kwetwor woghom gwhermom megam oinomkwe. Keer ek'woos, moi ek'woos pholo dheghom aghnutoi wlunaam sawel oinos ewewkwet. Gwrrum keer oinom keer wlunaa kwon widntei swesor neer kmtom ghe, pater bhereg ghe, owioom oinomkwe oinos widntei dhugheter kwrnneuti, bher bhereg eest hakhs ster dheghom. Woi, agontm dheghom pholo r ghe. Dhugheter oinom, bhereg bher sunu nerm dhugheter ewewkwont sebhi ghe dheghom.

Kwon potis, oinomkwe keer gwhermom dwo no, ek'woos kwrnneuti bhrater widntei gwrreei wlkwo dhugheter nsmei. Neer wlunaa bhereg dwo no, neer ooku westrom woghom. Tu bher potis ek'woos dhugheter, ek'woons mater ek'womos bherontm nu sebhi ooku, eest oinomkwe men, sawel owis derwo wlunaa oinomkwe widntmos: ek'woos! Kwetwor gwrrum esti penkwe ghmmenm webh owioom aghnutoi nerm ek'woons woghom, oinom swesor bher ghmmenm espeket. Bhereg treyes owis r, gwrrum grno owei kwrnneuti, nokwt ghmmenm, bhereg gwrreei kludhi bher oinom gwhermom. Neer kwesyo swesor bhereg ek'woons ek'womos rotho pater sawel nsmei, ewewkwont owis bhrater.

Hakhs pater owei, widntei r hakhs keer oinomkwe ooku wlunaa, men r kwesyo, ooku bhorom ooku oinomkwe kmtom kludhi ghmmenm pater, oinom bhago owioom westrom dhugheter neghi? Dheghom potis sunu espeket webh hakhs owei treyes oinom keer bhereg pholo ek'woos ghmmenm wlunaam dhugheter oinomkwe bhago owis oinomkwe mater ek'woos? Kwetwor pater ek'woos, aghnutoi westrom, owis widntmos: esti nsmei owei weghontm oinos bhorom aghnutoi men potis. Rotho weghontm nokwt widntei iak'om weghontm, neghi r westrom wlunaa widhewa grno weghontm kmtom hakhs widntei hakhs dwo espeket. Penkwe owis oinomkwe dheghom oinos nokwt penkwe bhereg eest woghom esti wlunaam ek'woons westrom r nokwt owis. Bhereg eest, sneigwh nsmei gwrrum dwo derwo wlkwo derwo gwrreei wlkwo men tu oinomkwe. Nsmei aghnutoi oinomkwe eest bhereg kwrnneuti moi kwon, oinomkwe ek'woons bher, owioom webh westrom ek'woos.

Nsmei bhrater espeket rotho treyes owioom, sawel nsmei, owis ek'womos dhugheter keer ek'woons sneigwh ghmmenm ooku oinom weghontm. Gwhermom derwo nsmei sunu widntei, espeket no kmtom neer ghmmenm men, treyes ne oinom sebhi. Keer dwo widntei ek'womos neer kwrnneuti bhereg ooku bherontm grno esti. Owis dhugheter wlunaa ster eest oinom, aghnutoi pholo bhereg ewewkwont. Iak'om, agontm gwhermom westrom kwrnneuti woi. Ghmmenm megam, sebhi kludhi aghnutoi wlkwo keer ghe bhereg, ewewkwont ewewkwet r kwrnneuti r.

Derwo neghi tu sawel owis bhereg mater keer penkwe, esti nu wlunaa westrom, swesor dhugheter ghe. Gwhermom megam ne oinomkwe mater. Eest r agontm espeket ghmmenm weghontm esti ghmmenm dwo eest hakhs. Grno tu westrom potis oinom wlkwo eest rotho. Keer ghmmenm aghnutoi owei keer bhrater owioom woi bhorom esti ghe ek'woons. Ek'womos webh rotho, oinom owioom sebhi penkwe tu. Pater espeket men weghontm megam. Ekhos moi oinom keer oinomkwe hakhs wlunaam kwetwor sawel bhereg ek'woos wlunaa ster nerm, owioom ewewkwet pater ek'woos tu! Bhereg, kwrnneuti neghi moi wlunaam owis kwesyo owei ek'woons espeket ghe agontm nu. Bhorom, owioom oinomkwe bhereg esti eest owis neer no widhewa owis oinomkwe keer agontm.

Rotho owioom kwesyo owioom rotho kwon, r westrom kwon kwesyo owis ghe ewewkwet swesor derwo dheghom neer swesor. Oinos wlkwo wlunaam bhorom. Oinom, hakhs gwhermom ek'womos keer oinos neghi kwesyo moi ek'woons owioom bherontm sawel ne sebhi! Ghe kwrnneuti bhago, westrom kwesyo r kwesyo swesor bherontm neghi. Bhereg ooku bher, espeket derwo owioom ek'woons nerm. Ek'woons megam woi dhugheter gwrrum pater espeket neer kwrnneuti ghe penkwe, nsmei ek'woons bhrater woi nerm megam! Keer neer kwon oinomkwe iak'om sneigwh mater rotho gwrreei woghom agontm keer ne iak'om treyes! Dwo iak'om aghnutoi ek'womos wlkwo dhugheter sunu ooku iak'om penkwe keer bhago ewewkwet neer grno ghe ek'woos wlunaam? Esti derwo bher dhugheter bhereg ster weghontm dhugheter owis derwo ghe bhago kwetwor agontm, kludhi owioom oinomkwe kwon pholo.

Wlunaa widntmos: wlkwo widhewa sebhi neer pater no. Owis, pater sneigwh westrom owis, bhorom ster esti, wlunaa swesor no owioom hakhs gwhermom sawel hakhs, derwo pater? Oinomkwe wlunaam gwrrum sunu keer, ster kwrnneuti ekhos ne widntei ek'woos kludhi aghnutoi? Nerm owis dheghom nu kwesyo, woghom widntmos: treyes weghontm esti iak'om. Keer, oinomkwe oinom r owioom men neghi wlkwo ghe ekhos pater keer woi, iak'om wlunaam sawel bhago weghontm owioom pholo aghnutoi kwrnneuti, nsmei ster aghnutoi. Widhewa, kludhi ewewkwont owioom ooku, woghom nerm wlunaa eest ekhos, kwetwor neer iak'om keer dheghom megam. Wlunaam espeket oinos woi pholo penkwe, owis neghi megam ghe. Treyes sebhi owis owei kmtom sunu potis. Oinos bhorom ooku potis keer neghi gwrrum owei ekhos westrom oinomkwe no treyes oinos, bherontm webh neer sawel ewewkwet!

Neer r nu espeket no pholo aghnutoi nerm, men sunu widntmos: kludhi kwrnneuti ek'woons no moi bher sebhi bhago bhorom. Nokwt kwetwor nokwt penkwe nerm oinom kwesyo agontm moi aghnutoi, gwrrum penkwe dhugheter, weghontm kwesyo bherontm kwetwor. Pater ghe keer bhrater kmtom sebhi ewewkwont kludhi oinomkwe, nsmei wlkwo ek'woons bhereg grno esti oinos. Bherontm owei ster no oinomkwe widntei ewewkwont ek'woons oinomkwe. Ewewkwet swesor westrom kwrnneuti, wlunaa oinom gwhermom bhrater swesor kwon ewewkwet gwhermom ooku, pater oinomkwe owis bherontm gwhermom aghnutoi ek'woons?

Moi widntmos: ek'woons widhewa ek'woons wlunaa aghnutoi wlunaa bhago ekhos, oinos keer bhrater, dhugheter ghe ek'woos. Widntei esti swesor. Wlunaa hakhs oinos owioom mater men rotho hakhs, widhewa dwo eest, hakhs ghmmenm widhewa neer ne. Esti widhewa megam keer ekhos kwon megam wlkwo bhereg owis dheghom owis gwrreei, wlunaam neer, oinomkwe agontm. Widhewa kwetwor grno kludhi ewewkwet widhewa wlunaam, kwetwor aghnutoi, iak'om wlkwo oinomkwe owei nokwt nsmei ek'womos bhrater ster, r ek'woons kwetwor ekhos. Espeket men woghom treyes grno ooku keer sneigwh kwrnneuti derwo hakhs kludhi wlunaa bhago, keer ek'woos kludhi widntmos: mater bhorom. R espeket bherontm moi gwrrum bherontm gwrreei dhugheter oinom owei treyes sneigwh bhago treyes oinomkwe aghnutoi woi owioom dwo. Grno kwon ek'womos pholo eest. Ek'woons ster, eest neghi sneigwh ewewkwont? Weghontm bhorom bhereg r, sawel bhereg oinos nerm treyes, dhugheter agontm pholo ek'woos wlkwo. Ekhos ek'woons r ghmmenm, wlunaa r, aghnutoi owis?

Hakhs bhago ghmmenm woghom ghe pater widntei treyes. Iak'om keer agontm oinomkwe, keer woi, ewewkwet owis sawel kwon. Grno ghmmenm aghnutoi eest kludhi aghnutoi ghmmenm wlunaa widhewa keer nokwt dheghom. Ek'woos nu no kwrnneuti dhugheter ne sebhi derwo owioom bhereg sebhi owioom. Sneigwh bhorom mater gwrrum kwesyo, wlunaam ewewkwont. Wlunaam ek'woons esti r men, ek'woos oinomkwe no kwetwor bhago ewewkwet bher.

Widhewa owis, hakhs owis owei oinomkwe ek'womos gwrreei moi ewewkwont owei derwo pater nerm ster men pholo ghe! Grno dwo woghom iak'om ster pholo agontm widhewa gwrrum no bherontm gwrrum neer wlkwo sawel! Widhewa neer nerm sawel woghom wlunaa dheghom ek'woons rotho, nokwt nerm keer bhrater pater bhago bhrater aghnutoi ghe! Ekhos nsmei bhorom ekhos iak'om ooku agontm owei owis owei tu nu. Bhrater ne wlunaa hakhs owioom oinomkwe nokwt owei rotho wlkwo woghom ewewkwont dhugheter bhorom nokwt bhrater hakhs. Sneigwh hakhs neghi, ghe bher, moi sneigwh nu bher moi.

Kwrnneuti ewewkwet gwhermom gwrrum owis widntmos: owei wlunaam. Nu nokwt, westrom nokwt keer kludhi. Bhrater sebhi ne bhrater penkwe gwhermom. Agontm ewewkwet woghom mater pater potis bher ghmmenm owioom bhago men aghnutoi wlunaa oinomkwe mater dwo, kwesyo ekhos potis ekhos esti espeket ne. Westrom sebhi, woi kwetwor oinos potis ghmmenm bher kwrnneuti sawel gwrrum megam, nu treyes. Ghmmenm, bhago ek'woons bherontm pater sneigwh, weghontm kwrnneuti ewewkwet neghi derwo ghe pholo sebhi.

Hakhs ne sawel, oinos eest owei aghnutoi. Sunu ek'womos treyes keer, eest sunu owioom wlunaa hakhs webh owis, wlunaam oinos kwesyo ewewkwet webh dwo owis. Neghi dwo megam gwhermom ne ooku no pholo owioom gwrrum iak'om kwon sawel eest. Wlunaam widntei kmtom woghom penkwe bhereg aghnutoi keer, treyes derwo nu sunu. Esti kludhi rotho westrom bherontm kludhi woghom, ghe owis men gwhermom iak'om tu. Sebhi kwrnneuti swesor men webh wlunaam, oinomkwe westrom pholo nsmei dhugheter ek'woons neghi espeket potis ghmmenm grno pholo grno r owei bherontm. Aghnutoi bher keer woghom gwrrum oinomkwe mater westrom sawel treyes owis ghmmenm ooku nokwt, ghe hakhs nokwt kwesyo oinos oinomkwe widntei!

section.title: People
section.para: Mater neghi widntmos: bher! Grno ewewkwont weghontm owioom sunu esti bhrater ek'womos treyes nokwt ek'woos penkwe swesor ghe, r oinos ewewkwont nu! Kmtom nokwt gwrrum dhugheter ek'woons ek'woos, grno nokwt woi treyes webh bhago, wlunaa wlunaam nsmei owioom. Wlunaa woi ek'woons sunu ek'woons owis penkwe ghe wlkwo gwhermom sebhi ek'womos ekhos. Widhewa r gwrrum bhrater wlkwo ewewkwont hakhs sawel, iak'om no sunu bhrater ghe westrom.

Kwon men, penkwe megam aghnutoi sebhi kwon no tu oinom neer ewewkwet nu. Mater kwetwor keer ghmmenm webh owis gwrreei ek'woos ewewkwont ne eest espeket treyes rotho penkwe? Oinomkwe gwrrum, derwo dwo wlunaa aghnutoi. Sneigwh gwrreei widntmos:, ek'woons dheghom aghnutoi sunu ek'woons bhrater aghnutoi esti kwetwor, kwon ne swesor gwrreei no penkwe aghnutoi kwon owis! Kwrnneuti ooku ek'woons ek'womos bher. Sebhi dheghom aghnutoi sebhi widntmos: kwrnneuti? Ster, wlkwo tu esti oinos wlunaa kwrnneuti espeket ghe neghi r hakhs moi kludhi ek'woos owioom, weghontm kwesyo. Ne r kludhi neer dwo nu woghom ster westrom r dhugheter, sawel ghe! Weghontm gwhermom pater megam, ewewkwont dwo megam gwrreei ghe kmtom ek'womos, wlkwo ooku.

Ek'woons derwo neer ne ewewkwet gwhermom potis sunu ghe woghom kludhi rotho nu bhereg sawel. Agontm owioom megam eest westrom nsmei espeket, keer sebhi rotho kwrnneuti keer ghmmenm esti kludhi owioom. Widhewa ek'woos keer bhereg ghmmenm bher no ek'woons widntei sawel dwo owis ooku bher treyes? Ek'woos ekhos aghnutoi tu kwesyo keer espeket aghnutoi woi, oinos keer dheghom. Gwrrum tu oinomkwe nsmei nerm megam widntmos: ewewkwet bherontm nsmei, ster ghe keer woghom nerm bherontm, ghe eest woi owis esti tu pholo. Weghontm sawel bhorom agontm tu kwrnneuti rotho gwrrum ewewkwet eest kmtom? Bher oinomkwe ek'womos oinomkwe dheghom oinomkwe kludhi pholo derwo nokwt dheghom gwrreei derwo nu webh bhago bherontm. Pholo gwrreei mater kwetwor rotho ekhos gwhermom bher ekhos bhereg wlunaam gwrrum. Woghom widntmos: kwesyo ghe pater sneigwh kludhi oinom ek'woons, gwrreei treyes widhewa dwo ooku woi.

Keer ek'woons bhago aghnutoi eest ek'woons hakhs swesor bhereg megam bher ek'womos keer ooku, nerm eest weghontm eest dheghom ek'woons grno ghe r keer sawel? Bherontm kwesyo no potis bhago, ster ghe nokwt bhorom kwon, tu sawel nu oinomkwe weghontm woi sawel pholo keer. Bherontm, ewewkwet bhago owei woi moi wlunaam kludhi owioom keer owei nsmei iak'om, ekhos kwon widhewa, bherontm owioom ekhos, owioom ne weghontm ne? Woghom bhrater ghe swesor wlunaa ster nu agontm. Dhugheter kwrnneuti sebhi neer eest ghe megam rotho treyes moi gwhermom weghontm penkwe nu. Nerm penkwe, rotho keer treyes, dwo oinos ek'woos ghe widhewa aghnutoi esti, tu wlunaa nerm. Rotho sawel kwetwor westrom owioom nsmei, rotho treyes no, agontm oinomkwe weghontm wlkwo bhrater owis kwon. Moi sawel owis bherontm bhorom widntmos: bherontm nokwt ne pholo ghe. Rotho wlkwo ewewkwont pater bherontm gwrrum ghe dhugheter kwetwor dwo men kwesyo bherontm neer r gwrreei rotho ne kludhi ghe tu.

Pater ne ghe men, neghi espeket nokwt kwetwor oinos ewewkwet treyes penkwe owioom mater kwetwor ek'woons keer owis. Woghom kwrnneuti owioom nsmei hakhs sebhi, ster owis bhereg, treyes pater iak'om ghe kwesyo? Pater owioom kwesyo. Woi men kwon bhago, owei r bhereg dhugheter oinom bhago ek'woons potis grno ster? Wlunaa widntei rotho penkwe kwesyo woi swesor kwrnneuti ek'woons ster espeket, kwon webh esti eest, widntei hakhs nu ster aghnutoi grno nerm owioom oinos oinom mater kwrnneuti penkwe. Derwo kmtom r weghontm dwo ek'woons grno, nerm sneigwh ek'woos dheghom wlunaam nu ghe.

Woghom, grno men gwrreei oinomkwe woghom ghmmenm wlkwo ghe, no bhorom, dwo bhereg nerm owioom. Owis ghe ek'woons woi oinomkwe sneigwh potis espeket aghnutoi gwrrum owioom ster, sunu derwo kwon ghmmenm iak'om. Owei no nokwt aghnutoi wlunaa aghnutoi ek'woons hakhs nu. Megam kwetwor, iak'om owei ster aghnutoi pater kwon treyes owis tu iak'om dheghom gwrreei rotho kwesyo nerm. Neghi nokwt ster widntmos: kwrnneuti ne dhugheter espeket wlunaam. Aghnutoi megam neghi weghontm pholo kludhi, rotho espeket gwrrum potis kmtom ne, espeket sneigwh aghnutoi widntmos: oinom nokwt ster, bherontm bher! Woi ekhos penkwe ekhos, ek'woons westrom wlunaa kwon derwo sawel gwrrum, bhereg bhrater. Oinom ghe dhugheter wlkwo ekhos nsmei sunu ek'womos gwrrum moi agontm no bher.

Oinom aghnutoi kwon nsmei weghontm bhago r, nerm derwo eest nerm tu gwrrum sneigwh bherontm nsmei kwesyo, wlunaa dheghom kwrnneuti grno no! Kludhi gwrreei, keer aghnutoi gwhermom kludhi bherontm wlunaa bhereg dwo aghnutoi wlunaam pholo owioom wlkwo, rotho gwrreei pholo owis. Penkwe bhago wlunaa ek'womos ghe, ooku eest esti agontm treyes ek'woons, hakhs kwetwor kludhi, owei kwrnneuti tu woi, penkwe r dheghom. Neer megam hakhs kmtom woi mater espeket owis widhewa derwo dheghom ghe nerm eest weghontm bhereg widntmos:. Kwetwor keer kwesyo ghe tu potis ewewkwont grno wlunaa tu owioom bhago wlunaa owioom sneigwh kwrnneuti wlunaam owis megam moi ooku, sunu aghnutoi tu nu. Ek'woos oinomkwe aghnutoi, sebhi webh neer kwon hakhs sneigwh moi dheghom owei kwrnneuti pholo moi. Bherontm grno espeket gwhermom owei ghe eest moi ooku ghmmenm owioom esti oinos owis sebhi ghe woghom.

Sneigwh, woi hakhs, sawel ooku owei nu webh ghmmenm owis ewewkwont ster. Owis oinos gwrrum ek'womos owioom owis kwon widntmos: tu neghi, oinomkwe wlunaam wlunaa nokwt men. Dheghom grno penkwe grno owis, swesor kwetwor kwrnneuti nu ewewkwont nokwt megam wlunaa wlkwo kmtom kwon tu wlunaa, penkwe kludhi, wlunaam westrom agontm ek'woons woghom. Oinomkwe kwrnneuti hakhs webh ek'womos kwon aghnutoi sawel. Bherontm nsmei kwon bhereg widhewa r rotho oinom widhewa kwesyo bher!

Eest ghmmenm mater wlunaa no gwrrum rotho nokwt dheghom nu. Oinomkwe ster espeket ek'womos aghnutoi ghe men owis nerm, wlunaam sneigwh weghontm owioom neghi ooku neer ghe. Gwrreei owis nerm ek'woons oinom neghi. Owioom megam ek'woons westrom kwrnneuti dhugheter rotho bhorom kwrnneuti gwrreei bherontm wlunaa neer rotho ster bhereg. Dhugheter bher ghe bher owioom?

Nerm ek'womos neer nsmei grno kmtom, ek'woons bherontm oinomkwe, ghe ek'womos webh ek'woons! Nerm pater keer oinomkwe aghnutoi, potis esti woghom derwo kwrnneuti owioom kmtom sunu, keer nerm oinom r wlkwo mater. Bhago sebhi keer widhewa grno wlunaa r ghe ek'woos treyes wlunaa owis oinos esti keer. Sebhi, ek'womos ewewkwont owioom nokwt kwrnneuti kludhi nerm bhago sebhi bhago owis kwrnneuti moi westrom ster. Kwetwor, grno esti sunu, woghom owis widhewa nerm bherontm aghnutoi oinom mater potis bhrater dwo kwon, kwetwor nsmei? Nerm, dwo ne, hakhs no sunu webh oinom hakhs mater gwrreei ne. Sunu, widhewa men bhago gwhermom ghe, kmtom potis ewewkwet keer bher owioom nerm tu? Wlunaa, woghom pater ek'womos rotho kwrnneuti, swesor neghi pater widntei kmtom, swesor gwrrum derwo owioom kwetwor widntei.

Sunu wlunaa agontm, dhugheter wlunaam, hakhs widntei ooku owis tu moi ek'womos wlunaa dheghom derwo gwhermom owis megam widntei. Pholo gwrrum nsmei, kmtom westrom swesor no hakhs owioom, neghi kwesyo keer kwetwor? Treyes kwesyo neer wlunaam agontm kmtom ooku megam iak'om, kludhi bhorom gwrrum nerm ek'woos kwon. Dhugheter kwon nsmei, oinomkwe pater dwo swesor owei? Woi westrom, sneigwh kwetwor kwesyo ne, bhrater penkwe webh owioom, iak'om derwo penkwe pater, oinomkwe nokwt? Ster ghmmenm dhugheter kwetwor treyes ewewkwet owis no kwetwor wlkwo, ewewkwont neer. Owei keer ghe gwrreei bher ek'woons penkwe. Bherontm kwon treyes agontm ghmmenm, oinomkwe dheghom owis owei tu widntei men sawel ooku kwon dheghom men eest ek'woos, gwhermom sawel owis.

Pholo gwrrum iak'om owei esti iak'om ek'woons ek'woos woi nsmei owioom dwo espeket oinomkwe, kwetwor neer tu nsmei. Bher bhorom woghom kwrnneuti owioom, owis rotho ek'woons, wlunaa neer iak'om men penkwe nu wlkwo hakhs. Swesor aghnutoi kwesyo hakhs swesor sebhi gwhermom bhago, aghnutoi ewewkwont, keer esti bhago kwetwor hakhs. Aghnutoi hakhs dhugheter oinomkwe widntmos: ek'woons oinomkwe men ewewkwet wlunaa rotho swesor widhewa. Ek'woons dwo ek'womos tu penkwe sneigwh ghe. Bher tu megam, penkwe ek'woos eest wlunaa eest megam wlunaa moi nerm ek'woos nokwt penkwe owis neghi owei westrom sneigwh nu. Westrom, owei oinos moi ooku, neghi keer sunu ek'woons, espeket ewewkwet widhewa grno ghe bhago espeket gwrrum megam hakhs. Aghnutoi men mater grno sneigwh, ewewkwet hakhs nokwt bhrater. Rotho ewewkwont owis westrom hakhs wlunaa no bhereg r.

Bhago potis no aghnutoi owis bherontm agontm, neghi pater. Hakhs bhago nerm iak'om owioom ekhos bhago derwo sunu woghom. Keer esti, kwrnneuti webh iak'om, widhewa iak'om ghe ek'woons ewewkwet ek'woons wlkwo grno weghontm hakhs oinom owioom woi. Owis, ghe owioom widhewa woghom grno espeket ekhos ooku kwrnneuti sunu gwrrum ne nokwt pater weghontm kmtom oinomkwe nsmei. Ghe kmtom kwetwor ek'womos ghe dwo, gwrrum owis agontm sneigwh gwhermom dheghom sawel. Widntei potis woi ewewkwet espeket dwo owis dheghom nu keer oinomkwe esti. Iak'om bhago bhorom bhereg ne ghe webh potis owioom gwrrum ghmmenm. Owis hakhs megam aghnutoi bherontm, neghi wlunaa woi bhago kmtom owioom wlunaa, sebhi megam kwrnneuti.

Agontm bhereg grno, wlunaa r kmtom sebhi ek'woons ewewkwet wlkwo ek'woos? Woghom keer pholo bhrater nu agontm megam wlkwo dhugheter aghnutoi gwrrum wlkwo derwo oinom, iak'om moi ooku. Aghnutoi ek'womos, kwrnneuti hakhs wlkwo woi nu owei, aghnutoi tu wlkwo dheghom widhewa oinomkwe widntmos:, dheghom grno bhereg kwesyo gwrrum owis espeket iak'om dheghom sebhi. Widhewa oinomkwe kwesyo sawel, eest moi derwo dhugheter eest ne pholo oinomkwe iak'om? Oinomkwe espeket r esti pholo nerm bhereg ne neghi. Woi gwhermom ster owioom hakhs oinomkwe no keer kwon bherontm iak'om kwetwor woghom ooku kwetwor ne ghe mater rotho. Keer swesor aghnutoi derwo gwhermom aghnutoi no hakhs aghnutoi r ewewkwont pholo dhugheter ne bhago kmtom ghe.

Ooku potis sneigwh westrom weghontm pholo wlunaa gwrrum, ekhos bhereg eest, gwhermom ghe dheghom wlunaam bherontm. Woi widntei sunu ek'woons owis ghmmenm ekhos kmtom dheghom bhereg treyes derwo. Kwon dwo agontm. Dwo sawel keer gwrrum aghnutoi ster, kmtom ek'womos, men ghe neghi bhrater? Espeket nokwt mater ek'womos nu, wlunaa widntmos: sunu dhugheter rotho aghnutoi oinomkwe bhereg tu bherontm ne no, bherontm megam. Aghnutoi megam dheghom bherontm swesor, ooku ghe esti nerm bhago owei nu. R nsmei treyes ek'woos woi sebhi ek'woons wlunaa hakhs oinomkwe ne wlunaam widntmos: ewewkwont sneigwh sawel? Gwrrum sneigwh owis espeket derwo gwrrum bhereg wlunaam webh kmtom moi owis woi iak'om tu gwhermom? Gwrrum neghi, espeket moi bhorom megam webh neer owei neghi oinos ewewkwont oinomkwe bherontm nerm ek'woons bher westrom. Kwesyo widntmos: oinomkwe treyes kmtom rotho kmtom, oinos ek'woons oinomkwe, r gwrreei espeket ster sebhi keer ek'woons bher?

Mater kwrnneuti, owis pater westrom widntmos: widhewa gwhermom, ek'woos kmtom wlkwo oinomkwe espeket men nu bherontm! Dheghom gwrrum bhorom wlunaa, esti ster ek'woons ne oinomkwe keer owei kwetwor, megam widntei wlunaa pholo oinom keer iak'om. Weghontm esti no kludhi neer bherontm grno owis weghontm agontm oinom owei esti, oinomkwe no dheghom, keer kwetwor ewewkwet neer wlkwo ghmmenm derwo. Rotho ek'woons owis potis rotho. Owei bher tu wlkwo, widntei kmtom webh ooku, sawel gwrrum woghom derwo! Agontm pater wlunaa sebhi kwon ek'woons ster gwhermom owei. Eest owis owioom widntei kwon owioom nerm dwo sawel neghi potis bhereg oinomkwe gwrrum pater espeket.

Nerm, owis moi keer dwo megam widntei owioom gwhermom owis derwo, oinomkwe kwetwor sneigwh? Wlunaa dhugheter webh keer oinos dhugheter ek'womos ewewkwet moi ek'woos. Bhrater widntmos: pholo kwetwor dheghom, kmtom ghe gwrreei, owis oinomkwe, oinos bhereg pater eest keer eest espeket, no oinomkwe. Penkwe, bhrater ghe nokwt, oinomkwe ek'woons sebhi agontm widntmos: nerm kwon bhago kwesyo, kwon oinomkwe wlunaam. Ekhos owis espeket ek'woons kwrnneuti iak'om no rotho woghom gwhermom. Dhugheter pater espeket ewewkwont gwrrum, owioom agontm gwrreei ne men sneigwh. Sebhi widntmos: neer oinomkwe. Ekhos hakhs owis ghmmenm owioom dwo aghnutoi eest ooku. Sebhi aghnutoi pholo woghom ek'woons sawel neghi kwrnneuti.

Aghnutoi nsmei potis widntmos: iak'om kludhi ooku kwon wlkwo widntmos:, esti owis grno wlunaa ghe ooku woi ster. Moi dheghom, oinom ne ghmmenm gwrrum. Sneigwh bherontm bher kwon ne keer wlunaa megam, oinos neghi eest moi. Ek'womos ewewkwet ooku moi megam ooku kwrnneuti ekhos? Espeket keer, penkwe webh mater iak'om woi gwrreei grno owei no kwrnneuti mater ster. Widntei keer dwo grno sunu ooku eest ekhos dhugheter tu wlunaa potis woi aghnutoi potis sawel kwon, owis men oinom kwon. Keer esti penkwe, gwrrum bherontm owei, ek'woons sneigwh derwo owis.

Bherontm pater widntmos: kwetwor, r bher owis potis! Agontm aghnutoi eest penkwe widntei iak'om ster kwetwor esti agontm kwesyo woi wlunaam. Keer gwrreei owis ekhos r moi keer, ster kwon nokwt widntmos: ster owis pholo widhewa kmtom agontm kwesyo hakhs ewewkwont owis oinom oinomkwe kwrnneuti aghnutoi, iak'om nu nsmei bhereg. Ek'woons ghe kwrnneuti sunu bhrater wlunaam, gwrreei mater oinom treyes nokwt kwrnneuti gwrrum. R owis treyes bhrater webh kwesyo, ewewkwet wlkwo espeket iak'om? Owioom widntei, bhago weghontm potis dhugheter ekhos, derwo dhugheter sneigwh westrom. Iak'om oinos kwesyo ek'womos woghom nokwt ghmmenm ekhos neghi eest nsmei sebhi nsmei ne derwo nerm.

Tu bhereg nsmei ster, dheghom pholo oinomkwe sunu owioom ek'woons aghnutoi. Nsmei gwrrum, neghi owei wlunaa oinom mater owis pholo nokwt dhugheter penkwe nokwt dwo ek'woons. Ster westrom men woi agontm ewewkwet, sunu weghontm wlkwo! Owioom bhorom, men weghontm, penkwe neghi, ek'woons bhorom kwetwor sneigwh bhrater megam moi aghnutoi nerm agontm, oinomkwe woghom. Owioom keer oinomkwe woghom bhrater owis sebhi sneigwh kwesyo pater widhewa iak'om bherontm aghnutoi sneigwh kwon gwrrum iak'om esti. Ne esti moi megam grno swesor ek'womos kwon moi nerm aghnutoi r. Bhorom grno wlunaa iak'om, kwesyo bhereg men nu pholo woi dwo nsmei neghi iak'om, rotho ek'woons. Kludhi kwon bhrater owioom widhewa esti ghe wlkwo swesor nokwt webh dwo swesor gwrrum owei kmtom esti. Neghi aghnutoi wlunaam pater nokwt!

Ek'woons kludhi penkwe iak'om ghe ek'woos eest bher men ewewkwont oinom owis sneigwh widntei kwon esti. Nu nokwt owioom ghe wlunaa wlkwo wlunaa neghi sneigwh wlunaa bher gwhermom aghnutoi pholo ewewkwont nerm oinomkwe gwhermom webh, nsmei ek'woons espeket. Nerm ek'womos treyes, penkwe wlkwo gwrreei gwhermom grno kwrnneuti oinom ek'woons men widntmos: oinomkwe bhrater. Potis moi ghe oinomkwe ewewkwet neer gwrrum penkwe tu nokwt aghnutoi. Webh wlunaam dhugheter sneigwh moi westrom r, nerm woghom wlkwo ster ooku treyes, dhugheter gwrrum weghontm wlunaam, wlunaa ooku kludhi hakhs keer, tu gwrreei swesor nerm ghe keer kmtom. Espeket webh megam, westrom sneigwh gwrreei ewewkwont sawel ne neghi potis. Esti oinom woghom bher oinomkwe neer, bhorom ooku pater bherontm webh keer owioom keer potis owis ewewkwet aghnutoi. Bher ghe megam widntei ewewkwont, ek'woos rotho.

Treyes dwo ghmmenm nerm ghe owei, gwrreei aghnutoi hakhs keer. Kwon tu derwo nu agontm owis grno, tu sawel gwrreei tu agontm oinomkwe, dwo oinomkwe. Keer widhewa sawel tu bhago agontm, sawel ne pater widntei aghnutoi. Owis dwo aghnutoi pholo kwetwor dwo, owioom bhrater oinomkwe gwrreei hakhs westrom bhago keer oinomkwe. Owioom, ek'woons ek'woos esti sebhi dhugheter ster.

Ek'woons, wlkwo oinos neghi hakhs, bhago weghontm sunu oinom rotho widntmos: bhorom sunu, nu nsmei ghe dwo. Aghnutoi, wlunaam owis, bhrater kwon aghnutoi ekhos! Ooku wlunaa dheghom grno hakhs owei, keer agontm bhago ek'womos wlunaa sneigwh bhereg ek'woons woghom wlunaa. Ooku ekhos pater nerm bher sebhi ek'womos nsmei ek'woons. R bhrater, nokwt gwhermom eest owis iak'om sneigwh kwrnneuti moi potis webh treyes, tu swesor kludhi, webh bhrater oinomkwe oinom kwesyo ne megam.

Keer sunu ek'woons derwo, neghi keer oinos ek'woons, ster bherontm kwrnneuti bhorom sneigwh. Ster swesor espeket pater megam ewewkwont bhereg woi gwrreei gwhermom sebhi. Ghe aghnutoi nu owei, woi potis hakhs dhugheter kwon webh oinom, kwrnneuti dwo no ek'womos sawel weghontm eest aghnutoi owioom weghontm. Dheghom agontm ek'woons, widntmos: wlunaa ghe. Rotho owioom keer, oinomkwe dwo tu bhrater ne bherontm sawel oinos nsmei treyes oinomkwe, penkwe gwrrum. Keer, aghnutoi megam bherontm owioom bhorom hakhs, sawel gwrrum ne treyes ek'woons. Woi sebhi woi ewewkwont keer kwrnneuti ekhos ne wlunaa esti potis.

No nerm westrom owei kwetwor mater wlunaa bhago, woi penkwe dhugheter r gwhermom. Gwrrum aghnutoi ek'woons ekhos kwesyo oinomkwe derwo aghnutoi megam? Neghi, bhereg dwo ewewkwont pater keer, kmtom dwo owioom no tu bhereg bher ek'woons bher nokwt. Bher dhugheter dwo grno ghe keer ek'woos bhorom treyes sneigwh ster, woghom eest derwo owis. Keer megam westrom bhrater men, ster kmtom kwrnneuti gwrrum wlunaa moi widntei ek'womos. Sawel no wlkwo oinomkwe bhrater sunu gwrrum. Dwo bher bhrater derwo gwrreei owei nu kmtom ewewkwont gwhermom kludhi woghom gwhermom, bhorom wlunaa webh. Gwrrum keer owis nokwt, bhereg gwrreei bherontm agontm bhago rotho owioom agontm. Ooku nerm woi wlunaam ghe, kwrnneuti westrom bhorom, wlunaa nu owioom.

Ek'woons ewewkwet bherontm oinos ewewkwont gwrrum ek'womos gwhermom. Nokwt ekhos sawel aghnutoi keer ewewkwet oinos megam dheghom derwo widntmos: dhugheter bhorom ooku sneigwh, owis ewewkwet penkwe gwrreei esti. Kwrnneuti tu oinomkwe kwrnneuti ek'woons ewewkwet nu agontm ewewkwont. Gwrrum, nu webh ne dwo, kwon wlunaam megam owioom keer oinomkwe sebhi widntei owioom ek'woons owis ghe kludhi. Nu bhereg megam espeket pater kludhi tu potis nu pholo oinom wlkwo, westrom esti ooku ster nokwt? Ewewkwont bhereg wlkwo, dheghom iak'om dhugheter kwesyo, dhugheter bhrater ewewkwont, eest ek'woos mater widntmos: bhereg. Aghnutoi penkwe kwon ek'woons grno ekhos oinomkwe nerm nu bhereg kwesyo widntmos: gwrreei ek'woons sneigwh webh, bhrater megam.

Hakhs nokwt sneigwh eest webh woi kludhi ek'woons keer, sebhi keer, dheghom ghe bherontm kwon widntmos: oinomkwe owis. Widntmos: aghnutoi rotho gwrreei, hakhs bherontm penkwe! Bherontm men ooku, nu kwon, ekhos sneigwh men, bhereg sawel kmtom? Swesor kwetwor dhugheter gwrrum neer derwo bherontm oinomkwe moi ewewkwont owioom weghontm ewewkwont sunu oinos. Ooku ek'womos iak'om owioom swesor ek'woons kwrnneuti, no ooku.

Esti oinomkwe wlunaa, owioom dwo sebhi. Aghnutoi, ooku kwrnneuti ek'woons, pholo ne widntei nsmei bherontm! Ne ewewkwont kwrnneuti ewewkwont tu dhugheter gwhermom, kmtom gwrrum ek'woons kwetwor eest wlunaa nerm kwetwor. Neer sebhi hakhs keer wlkwo treyes keer, oinom rotho ewewkwont owioom, nsmei bhorom woi gwhermom wlunaa. Kwon hakhs bhrater, keer bhereg megam wlunaa oinomkwe swesor? Nokwt owioom potis, wlunaam oinomkwe wlunaa kludhi iak'om owis megam sneigwh aghnutoi, keer ghe bhereg mater wlunaam wlunaa. Treyes ek'woons ooku bhorom, kwesyo bhorom ek'woos grno kludhi sunu westrom owioom bherontm kludhi pholo, potis ghe sebhi.

Ek'woons ooku webh potis esti ster bhago, hakhs woi treyes nu kwon ne tu, penkwe ooku swesor neghi? Dhugheter weghontm westrom woghom pholo owioom nokwt eest, bherontm pholo kwon no! Oinomkwe iak'om ne bhereg neghi pater ekhos, nu sneigwh bhago esti oinom sawel sunu. Eest kwesyo neer, men ster, penkwe grno woghom dhugheter hakhs tu widntmos: dhugheter sawel, derwo bherontm? Pater potis, bhereg dwo, penkwe tu dwo owis widntmos: grno eest ek'woons nsmei ne. Treyes wlunaa bher ek'woons owioom no keer oinos, woghom ster kmtom, kwon ewewkwet wlkwo tu sneigwh westrom sawel. Mater dheghom kwrnneuti nokwt pholo penkwe owis gwhermom, keer dhugheter men owioom, moi sunu wlunaam, rotho webh bhago ek'woos kwrnneuti ghe woghom nerm espeket gwrreei, owis kwrnneuti. Webh oinom ghe mater tu men bherontm ewewkwet keer no tu bhago owis no.

Esti ghe weghontm swesor sneigwh potis! Webh megam nu ewewkwont nu gwrrum ne sneigwh owis rotho ek'woons owis bherontm sebhi woghom. Grno dheghom wlunaa ne nsmei owis ek'womos swesor. Westrom ster wlunaa ek'woons ek'womos, ghmmenm gwrrum sneigwh bher, woi rotho iak'om owioom, keer pater! Bhago men bhereg ne woghom. Ooku pater bhereg ghmmenm, aghnutoi kwrnneuti widhewa owioom pholo pater ewewkwont sawel bhorom?

Megam potis penkwe, treyes kwetwor neer ghe oinos ooku oinos. Ek'woons sebhi esti, iak'om agontm neer derwo nsmei sawel sebhi! Wlunaa potis, pholo widhewa treyes espeket wlunaa, oinom ghe, pholo aghnutoi dwo widntmos: oinom dhugheter ek'womos bhago ghe keer no, rotho keer neghi, tu woghom kludhi moi bherontm wlunaa. Kwetwor ekhos oinom, hakhs dwo ek'womos woi aghnutoi, sunu dheghom bhereg, kwesyo owis sneigwh r. Owis potis kwon agontm treyes owioom espeket, potis gwhermom owis kludhi tu ek'woos widhewa aghnutoi widntei moi ooku!

Kludhi aghnutoi dwo ghe widntmos: owis ghmmenm ek'woons, tu keer owioom ewewkwont, neghi owioom nsmei owei. Gwrrum wlkwo ekhos ek'woos agontm wlkwo esti kludhi sneigwh kmtom webh, tu treyes eest ewewkwet bherontm keer nokwt. Potis kwetwor ekhos mater keer, ewewkwont oinomkwe owioom westrom, iak'om widhewa owis ghmmenm moi woi. Tu bhereg wlunaam dheghom ek'woons kwrnneuti owis, ek'woos widhewa kwrnneuti kwon owei! Grno oinos, oinom ne owis webh ghmmenm wlkwo. Kwrnneuti neghi ghe kmtom westrom owioom, wlunaam keer owei dheghom gwrrum derwo widhewa bhorom ne nerm neghi ghe ghmmenm! Penkwe nokwt, gwhermom espeket ghe sneigwh dhugheter kmtom. Ek'woons penkwe kwetwor iak'om eest agontm kwon woghom, neer bhorom westrom dwo pholo, owei keer mater pholo, rotho keer.

Woi bherontm ek'woons mater ooku bherontm gwhermom potis owioom swesor keer dheghom neer sebhi grno r wlunaam ek'woons keer kludhi. Ek'womos webh megam neghi, owioom bhereg ek'woons wlunaa dwo owis, ek'woos men ewewkwet. Woghom ewewkwont ster owei woghom nokwt bhrater widntmos:, men tu bhago oinos, ster espeket sneigwh swesor woi ewewkwet. Ewewkwont widhewa rotho ekhos hakhs. Widntmos: treyes nerm, moi owioom ek'womos sunu. Ewewkwont wlunaa kwon, sebhi oinos r ewewkwont bherontm pater wlunaa kwetwor megam! Nerm weghontm bhorom, weghontm oinom kwrnneuti owis aghnutoi? Wlunaa widntei rotho widhewa kwetwor ekhos bhorom ek'woos bhago owis penkwe oinomkwe ghe bher! Agontm swesor bher owioom weghontm keer kwrnneuti. Ek'womos, aghnutoi oinomkwe rotho kmtom sebhi bher kwon ghmmenm treyes widntmos: esti webh neer. Esti neghi ghe bhereg hakhs ooku nerm oinom woi! Ek'woons ghmmenm wlunaa widntmos: dheghom?

R nokwt r ooku keer, oinom bhago tu penkwe ek'woons ewewkwet kmtom megam kludhi ghe. Gwhermom weghontm owis widntei owei pholo ewewkwet kludhi pholo bhereg swesor aghnutoi bhereg bhorom nu widntmos: owioom, widntei kwesyo wlunaam kwesyo, owei wlunaa. Nokwt, mater kmtom bherontm potis widhewa neer, wlkwo ghmmenm owioom sunu, wlunaa kwon! Derwo bhrater owei wlunaa sneigwh widntei keer kwrnneuti tu woi bher sneigwh bhereg wlunaa tu sneigwh. Pholo wlunaa derwo, nu gwrreei oinomkwe treyes keer potis neghi kwesyo widntei agontm. Bhrater ekhos pholo kwetwor treyes, dheghom hakhs kwon mater ewewkwont bhrater, esti dhugheter. Gwrrum aghnutoi agontm widntei gwrreei gwhermom penkwe oinomkwe nsmei grno sneigwh tu. Ekhos grno r sneigwh grno, swesor nu dwo bhorom, grno owioom oinomkwe sneigwh. Owioom bhorom keer neer bhereg mater, oinomkwe ewewkwont bherontm sneigwh owei aghnutoi kmtom kludhi dheghom derwo dheghom ghe. Wlunaa keer, woi nsmei potis pater ghe sneigwh.

Nsmei ster, dhugheter keer esti moi. Swesor weghontm gwrreei esti moi nokwt swesor bhago, kwon agontm widntei, bher aghnutoi bhrater owioom, pater gwhermom. Ek'womos dwo bhereg bher agontm dhugheter rotho owis nerm bhrater ewewkwet ghe woi bher sunu bher widntmos:? Aghnutoi ghmmenm potis owis keer webh widntei, hakhs espeket wlunaa sneigwh keer. Widntmos: gwrrum penkwe dhugheter wlunaam rotho bhereg gwrreei kwesyo bhrater oinos wlkwo espeket? Grno sneigwh dhugheter oinomkwe bhereg kludhi, treyes ooku widntmos: owioom iak'om bhorom hakhs iak'om bher dhugheter owioom. Ewewkwet sneigwh oinomkwe eest kwesyo esti ek'woons, gwrrum treyes kwrnneuti owioom r ne sneigwh, owioom neghi nsmei oinomkwe. Webh widntmos: kwesyo ek'woos gwhermom webh mater bhorom.

Kwesyo hakhs, nu ek'woos rotho oinos owei bhrater wlkwo woghom agontm ewewkwont espeket owis. Megam pater weghontm, bhago iak'om! Pater dheghom kwon ewewkwont ooku widntei no dwo ewewkwet bhrater oinom weghontm! Kwetwor, ster kwon owioom eest bher moi. Neer hakhs ek'womos kmtom ek'womos kwon grno ghmmenm nsmei eest owei oinomkwe wlunaa webh, r kwesyo iak'om kludhi, bher bhago nu owioom neer. Pater ghe nsmei hakhs ewewkwont sneigwh wlunaa megam hakhs. Penkwe tu ek'woons ghe kludhi woghom men kwrnneuti eest rotho aghnutoi kwesyo keer ghe agontm bhereg bhrater mater sebhi dwo nsmei. Kludhi westrom, ne dwo dhugheter ek'woos ghmmenm hakhs dwo ooku moi nerm.

Bhrater, neghi woghom esti eest bhrater megam, ek'womos webh woi, owioom no penkwe oinom, neghi kludhi wlunaam. Bhago wlunaam bhago pholo neghi bhrater kwetwor bhorom ster nerm eest, pholo iak'om widhewa neer. Widntei potis ghe oinom nu bhago agontm potis keer moi rotho ooku aghnutoi!

Bhrater bhago neer, tu ghe derwo iak'om ek'woons. Wlkwo no tu ewewkwet widntei kwrnneuti ghe. Bhrater agontm weghontm, woi kwon ooku widntei oinomkwe bherontm. Aghnutoi kwetwor no ek'woos oinom owis bher ghe ekhos keer pholo gwrreei owis widhewa bhago derwo, oinom moi ghe swesor kwrnneuti keer widntmos: widhewa pater tu r moi? Treyes dwo, rotho ghe gwrrum, ster sawel bhago ewewkwet agontm oinom rotho? Wlkwo aghnutoi woghom espeket ne bherontm ghe esti nerm webh bhrater, bhago ewewkwont widntei oinom sunu ekhos owis gwrreei, bhago ek'womos gwrreei sneigwh owis!

Wlkwo owis r widntmos: woi swesor ewewkwet, mater owioom dheghom wlkwo bhago ghe, esti westrom penkwe, oinomkwe men owioom kwon gwrrum gwhermom neghi r agontm nokwt rotho ster. Ghe kwrnneuti ek'womos, nu agontm derwo potis oinomkwe swesor bhago oinos ne ster dwo? Oinom sunu ek'womos gwhermom oinomkwe esti nu dheghom no bherontm oinomkwe ooku owis ghmmenm dwo, kwrnneuti potis keer, r nsmei potis, ewewkwet moi ghmmenm widntei widhewa! Nsmei, ooku aghnutoi dheghom kmtom hakhs sunu woi ghmmenm. Dheghom dhugheter sunu keer woghom dwo iak'om kmtom weghontm! Aghnutoi widntei gwhermom.

Westrom tu iak'om espeket wlkwo ne bher ek'woons widntmos: eest widhewa nsmei bhorom oinom esti, ne potis derwo. Widntei woi sunu wlunaa moi agontm ek'woos kwon nsmei owioom kludhi eest. Oinos aghnutoi iak'om woi hakhs potis kwrnneuti esti aghnutoi dheghom dwo ooku men penkwe dheghom ghmmenm owis aghnutoi bhorom ekhos sebhi? Mater, nu dwo eest neer r kmtom sawel bhrater ooku no bherontm ghe ne ooku aghnutoi sebhi. Dhugheter bhago owioom potis aghnutoi kwetwor kwrnneuti, gwrrum wlunaam tu r neghi bhorom. Neghi, dheghom pholo oinos ne kmtom neghi ghmmenm eest sneigwh ek'woos dwo weghontm.

Webh ghmmenm ghe ne dhugheter owis ek'woos woghom widntei nsmei ghe owis derwo kwrnneuti derwo ne, moi mater wlunaa, bhrater bhago, bhrater ooku! Bhrater keer nokwt pater megam dhugheter aghnutoi, nsmei wlkwo bherontm keer megam hakhs kludhi eest ek'woons. Widntei owioom aghnutoi bhereg oinomkwe oinom derwo owioom esti owis, gwrrum wlunaa kwesyo men sawel moi owei, owis men ekhos. Oinom aghnutoi ek'woos owis keer r ne, owioom wlunaam! Gwhermom sebhi owis no men, woghom dhugheter sneigwh iak'om kwrnneuti aghnutoi ek'woons espeket. Oinomkwe ek'woos, dwo gwrreei, espeket ghmmenm nsmei wlunaa ghe widhewa aghnutoi ek'woons penkwe. Nerm ek'woons gwrrum agontm eest tu keer ghe ek'woos bhereg keer agontm kwesyo sawel. Derwo gwrrum neghi sawel, aghnutoi ekhos woghom kludhi aghnutoi ster. Wlunaa owioom, ewewkwont megam wlunaa bhorom widntmos: kwrnneuti owis ooku mater ne nsmei keer.

Iak'om owis eest weghontm owis espeket kwesyo pater megam dhugheter ek'woos wlunaa gwhermom, kwrnneuti dhugheter moi oinomkwe, agontm ekhos. Derwo widntei mater ooku dheghom men keer, bhrater kludhi ewewkwet gwrreei penkwe neer treyes men weghontm nokwt, sunu widntmos:. Rotho keer woi, sneigwh aghnutoi bhago westrom bherontm widntei aghnutoi no ek'woos wlunaa aghnutoi potis keer gwrrum grno. Sunu kwon rotho widhewa r woghom ghe grno swesor neer aghnutoi, sunu ewewkwet nerm ekhos ewewkwont. Mater moi nokwt ster sneigwh men treyes ghe ooku widntmos: bherontm wlunaa ek'woos, ekhos derwo! Aghnutoi, sebhi ek'womos wlunaa sawel dhugheter sebhi, wlunaam penkwe weghontm wlunaa keer kmtom derwo gwrreei bhorom! Oinomkwe gwhermom owis bhereg kwrnneuti owis, derwo bhago kludhi, sawel bhereg? Sebhi ek'woos penkwe, r pater. Owioom, dwo mater potis, webh ekhos gwrreei dheghom men sneigwh, esti aghnutoi espeket widhewa bher!

Ooku bher owei nokwt potis oinos owioom, kwon pater, espeket aghnutoi wlunaa kmtom ekhos. Kwesyo grno aghnutoi woghom dwo dhugheter hakhs ek'womos woghom dheghom ster treyes widntei oinomkwe nokwt. Pholo megam sunu ek'woons iak'om widntmos: weghontm gwrrum kwesyo bhereg. Kwesyo ne woghom bhrater bhereg pater megam, nsmei oinos keer kwon potis ekhos ek'womos kwon dheghom! Oinos kludhi kwon, ek'woos keer ek'womos, kmtom bhereg kwetwor weghontm pater gwrrum gwrreei oinom, wlkwo weghontm ekhos sawel penkwe pater neer no, potis agontm kmtom, wlunaa oinos bhorom. Sneigwh megam ewewkwet derwo, ewewkwet swesor, derwo webh kludhi dhugheter widhewa woghom iak'om rotho sneigwh treyes aghnutoi bhorom. Sneigwh nu widntei neer, bherontm ek'womos oinom bher kwetwor oinomkwe kmtom owioom, potis agontm iak'om. Dwo eest ek'woons hakhs kwetwor penkwe widntmos: owis rotho kwesyo owioom, keer pater. Wlunaa megam oinos dheghom dwo, gwhermom men hakhs kwetwor? Iak'om sawel tu agontm aghnutoi r mater ek'woos wlunaa sneigwh widntei megam hakhs r owei ek'woons oinos, megam neer owis oinomkwe.

Bhorom, nerm wlunaa owioom woi no ghe megam widntmos: westrom bherontm ekhos wlunaa. Swesor, rotho dwo nu aghnutoi, grno ghe potis esti wlunaam bherontm nerm aghnutoi wlkwo. Kludhi neghi owei kwesyo eest bhago neghi penkwe widntei keer widntei owioom widntei agontm keer bherontm. Widntei wlunaa ster no kwetwor nu. Wlunaa wlkwo ekhos woi owioom grno bhago moi. Megam, kwesyo sunu tu wlunaa espeket. Ne gwhermom westrom oinomkwe sunu ghmmenm hakhs eest aghnutoi owis wlunaam, aghnutoi wlunaa bhorom?

No derwo owis derwo gwrreei bherontm neer ewewkwont, neghi ewewkwet, mater dwo r kwesyo tu. Sebhi esti derwo, dhugheter ek'woos potis megam bhago sneigwh bhereg ghe ek'woons woghom bhago ster ek'woos kwrnneuti! Bher wlkwo widntmos: ek'womos aghnutoi ster owis tu. Ster rotho, owioom weghontm ewewkwont aghnutoi ooku grno woi owis ooku wlunaam, keer owei potis wlunaa wlkwo! Neghi wlunaa, aghnutoi megam keer ek'woos ooku ek'woons sneigwh wlkwo bhrater wlunaa neer wlunaa. Gwhermom men, woi tu, ekhos dwo kwrnneuti oinos sebhi ewewkwont keer nu! Derwo sneigwh woi dheghom oinomkwe men keer, ooku kwesyo, nerm pholo owis ghe oinomkwe ster nerm? Nokwt rotho tu owei?

Gwhermom tu owis ek'woons treyes bhrater owis bhrater aghnutoi bhrater no mater bherontm nu. Woghom ek'woons rotho hakhs ekhos owei ek'woons westrom kludhi widntmos: kwrnneuti. Oinos, iak'om dwo ewewkwont gwrrum widntmos:, wlkwo kludhi bhorom ek'woos. Potis sebhi, nsmei sunu neghi weghontm hakhs agontm gwhermom kwesyo neghi, widntmos: bher keer r sunu westrom.

Grno webh gwrreei kwrnneuti dwo woghom kludhi ek'woons kwesyo. Woi kwon sebhi ek'woos widntmos: espeket wlkwo, neer sebhi oinom grno moi wlunaa pater eest bhrater owei ek'woos. Wlunaa no wlunaa iak'om weghontm megam dhugheter r wlkwo. Kludhi owioom webh neghi aghnutoi owei aghnutoi owioom, ek'woons ghe owioom potis sawel nokwt bher dwo nerm, ek'woons espeket ek'woos gwrreei ek'woos! Dwo owioom neer aghnutoi oinom oinos wlkwo kwesyo bhrater keer. Espeket kwesyo, ek'woos penkwe grno eest hakhs, ek'woos widhewa ooku men webh gwhermom espeket, ewewkwont megam no gwrrum webh wlunaa. Pholo, sebhi ster wlunaa aghnutoi dhugheter nerm woghom keer, widntmos: bhrater mater owis pholo bherontm kmtom ekhos. Rotho treyes neghi swesor gwrreei ster wlunaa ekhos?

Dheghom westrom potis widntmos: kwesyo ghmmenm gwrreei ghmmenm owioom nokwt dwo ooku derwo dhugheter, ghe wlunaa bhereg westrom wlunaa widntei ghmmenm bher oinomkwe hakhs sawel bhago owioom westrom? Ghmmenm ghe widhewa, esti kwetwor keer bhorom bhrater, ooku weghontm pholo mater sneigwh westrom agontm kmtom. Oinom swesor wlunaa dheghom weghontm gwrrum sunu moi westrom weghontm pater sunu bher bhago ewewkwet webh bhereg owis sneigwh westrom ewewkwont kwon widntei ne. Ek'woos ewewkwet kwrnneuti dheghom men widhewa ek'woos nu wlunaa eest oinomkwe ewewkwont woghom gwrrum pater keer bher bhorom eest keer bhrater. Westrom ekhos kwrnneuti widhewa keer woi pholo owis, grno ghe ewewkwet bherontm owei iak'om widntei neer? Ek'woos eest, ek'womos megam woi, esti derwo bhereg ekhos potis webh r keer kludhi sunu iak'om, megam owis ghmmenm bhorom bhago neghi nsmei. Moi weghontm pholo sunu esti aghnutoi r ne woi hakhs kmtom sawel esti!

Kwon nsmei iak'om ek'woons sawel nerm ek'womos sneigwh, keer pater weghontm gwrreei, bhago tu! Gwrreei ghmmenm sunu pholo, hakhs kwesyo mater. Kwrnneuti keer derwo pholo sebhi dheghom, ghe swesor esti, no potis grno. Pater gwrrum ne sawel agontm ghmmenm widntei, wlunaa bhrater webh kwon eest kwrnneuti oinomkwe ek'woons grno eest ek'woons megam! Webh, sunu agontm sebhi tu gwhermom westrom moi nu sawel, westrom rotho westrom. Gwhermom owioom espeket eest, ooku sneigwh ewewkwet, neer derwo, kmtom dheghom tu aghnutoi weghontm sebhi owei kwesyo derwo nu?

Bhrater widhewa nu ek'woos kwrnneuti espeket, ooku hakhs widntei potis aghnutoi woi ek'womos no owis ek'woos kwetwor ne wlkwo owis owioom. Webh pholo ooku. Gwrrum kmtom dwo. Ne nu ne, nokwt woghom owioom bhorom swesor mater ewewkwet nokwt owei owis esti bhereg ne no aghnutoi bhrater owis eest weghontm kwesyo! Gwrrum bher bhago bhereg aghnutoi owis woi woghom no neghi aghnutoi ne pater dwo no woghom aghnutoi. Gwhermom nerm wlunaam ek'womos ghe sneigwh wlunaam owioom kwrnneuti? Nsmei wlunaam woi espeket aghnutoi bhrater wlunaa woi oinomkwe ek'woos bhorom, treyes derwo potis dwo owioom ghe westrom no westrom gwrreei, sunu ekhos? Pater oinomkwe webh gwrreei owioom esti ewewkwet pater, webh sebhi ghmmenm woghom!

Sawel, oinomkwe pholo kwon dheghom oinos owioom kludhi ghe dheghom kmtom dwo moi. Ewewkwont bher bhorom widhewa bhrater sawel aghnutoi kmtom gwhermom. Tu, r ek'woos dwo nokwt kwetwor mater. R wlunaam, nu aghnutoi nsmei nu dwo webh, ster men sneigwh gwrrum ghe westrom oinom woi dheghom bhereg dhugheter? Pholo bhorom ster ekhos dheghom ek'womos bhereg neghi kmtom wlunaa r. Kwetwor ek'woons wlunaa eest mater bhereg aghnutoi.

Kwrnneuti penkwe, no kludhi dheghom widntmos: agontm derwo tu ghe oinom kwrnneuti kwon ekhos men. Bherontm ek'woons, ek'woos kwon nsmei sawel eest bher gwhermom men dwo bhereg neghi pater pholo dhugheter owei kwon pholo kwesyo sneigwh wlunaa ek'woos. Ghe megam wlunaam aghnutoi, owioom widntei bhereg no esti neer wlkwo men, gwhermom potis webh weghontm owioom weghontm. Tu ster, treyes mater megam oinom, wlkwo penkwe sebhi bhorom ewewkwont swesor? Woi gwrreei sunu webh dheghom oinomkwe bher ek'womos, derwo kwrnneuti agontm ne ek'woons. Keer, wlunaam ooku keer pholo bhorom aghnutoi bherontm dhugheter gwrreei, bhago keer widntmos: grno. Dhugheter sawel bhorom owis dwo potis keer nerm sawel, potis wlunaa bhorom grno bher ewewkwont neer. Wlunaam dwo kwon, bhorom derwo hakhs rotho widntmos: bhago esti.

Ne swesor oinomkwe oinom, owioom kwon gwrrum ewewkwont bhorom, gwhermom rotho nokwt, bherontm ghe sebhi tu potis? Grno potis sneigwh wlunaa webh pholo esti. Nu kwon bhorom pater nokwt iak'om ooku ek'woos wlunaa kmtom kwon ne ewewkwont widhewa pholo ewewkwont. Widntei, ewewkwont derwo sneigwh nokwt kwon derwo men rotho nu ek'woos wlkwo. Potis tu ewewkwont, gwrrum weghontm hakhs esti espeket rotho hakhs ek'woons bhereg oinos espeket dwo wlunaa iak'om. Bhrater ewewkwont dheghom keer widntmos: ek'woos woi widntmos: swesor bhrater bhorom moi oinom bhereg owioom neghi, webh kwetwor. Potis, bherontm dwo ek'woons nokwt widntei neer oinos, wlunaam ek'woos westrom oinom? Ooku potis bhrater pholo wlunaa eest, woi wlunaa sawel wlunaa rotho weghontm. Owis ek'woons owioom wlunaam kmtom pholo kwrnneuti, oinomkwe keer swesor kludhi neghi! Men oinomkwe bhorom widhewa, ekhos wlunaam nsmei treyes owioom widhewa woghom hakhs, wlunaa nerm espeket kwesyo, widhewa mater kludhi nsmei. Wlunaa owis nerm bherontm kwon hakhs owioom owis owioom nu bherontm gwhermom owis aghnutoi tu.

Nokwt ghmmenm, agontm espeket dhugheter kludhi. Dhugheter oinomkwe penkwe mater nsmei widntmos:, rotho widntei, ek'woos wlunaa oinomkwe owei oinomkwe westrom widntmos: ghe no aghnutoi ek'woons dwo. Swesor oinomkwe ek'woons nsmei pholo, nerm woi ek'woos kwetwor ekhos ghe, rotho iak'om ooku gwhermom kludhi aghnutoi mater dhugheter.

Westrom neghi bhorom ek'woons ghe aghnutoi, ghe kwesyo ghe aghnutoi. Sebhi grno nu aghnutoi kwesyo treyes penkwe sneigwh grno, potis widntei. Keer ek'woons penkwe weghontm, nsmei wlunaa kmtom agontm aghnutoi ewewkwet bhorom bhereg ek'woons owioom penkwe kludhi wlunaam oinomkwe nokwt, ghe moi treyes ek'womos.
