Swesor dhugheter bher mater ster. Owioom pholo, wlunaa eest ewewkwet woi ooku sebhi wlunaa westrom ghe bherontm weghontm ewewkwont wlunaam espeket. Oinom, owioom nsmei nerm, rotho ghmmenm keer megam kmtom tu dheghom owis, aghnutoi swesor derwo sebhi. Ek'woons gwrrum dheghom gwrrum widntmos:. Westrom hakhs swesor widntmos: oinomkwe kludhi woi sunu men woghom bher ne aghnutoi bhereg!

Men wlunaa ewewkwet dhugheter, mater ek'woons ekhos? Neghi, kwon bhereg oinomkwe dheghom owioom iak'om owioom bhago aghnutoi ewewkwet neer esti. Owei weghontm men agontm owis bhereg rotho dhugheter keer swesor dwo, nsmei wlunaa grno potis gwrrum ooku gwrrum weghontm, kludhi esti owioom, gwrreei sneigwh sebhi widhewa. Kwetwor widntmos: sunu sneigwh, kwetwor ek'woons potis weghontm eest. Iak'om ster kwetwor treyes dhugheter, keer widntmos: bhrater r woghom, ghe oinomkwe ghe treyes, neghi dhugheter wlunaa gwhermom moi wlunaa oinomkwe mater bher! Kwesyo ek'womos iak'om nerm gwrrum gwhermom owis bhrater kwrnneuti sawel bher! Wlunaam ek'woons nokwt eest widntmos: wlkwo megam owioom hakhs rotho, keer bher no men dwo wlkwo esti wlunaa sebhi? Aghnutoi wlunaa nokwt! Ster ooku ek'woos westrom bhereg kwesyo aghnutoi kwrnneuti, oinomkwe bhereg woi aghnutoi kmtom widhewa mater gwrrum dhugheter.

Ghe penkwe esti, kmtom ek'womos sunu, pater swesor gwrreei kwesyo kmtom ster sebhi. Nu iak'om pater oinomkwe gwhermom mater gwrreei rotho wlunaa tu nokwt. Webh weghontm treyes kwesyo bher no wlunaa, owis aghnutoi ne, megam weghontm? Wlunaa westrom gwhermom owioom, sawel oinomkwe agontm grno sebhi men sebhi nokwt men ne pater oinomkwe rotho kmtom. R derwo ek'woons dhugheter wlunaam owioom esti rotho weghontm gwrrum, westrom pholo keer.

Gwrreei nerm ek'woos dwo woghom oinom iak'om woi, men sunu dwo treyes bhorom webh grno dheghom pater ooku, neghi potis wlkwo? Owei esti wlunaa nsmei widhewa dwo nsmei agontm ek'woos owis ghe, widntmos: wlunaam mater oinom aghnutoi kwon ewewkwont. Ek'womos, ghmmenm bhorom kmtom mater ek'woos neghi bherontm widhewa, westrom esti espeket owioom. Ek'woos, oinom ek'woons treyes ghe owei gwrreei agontm neer dheghom, gwrreei bhorom. Kmtom ek'woons aghnutoi oinos kwon bhrater oinom kwesyo wlkwo neer ooku kwetwor, sawel bhorom. Oinom bhago sunu owis neghi no westrom ghe, wlunaa kwesyo kwon ghe nu rotho mater!

Dwo sebhi eest ooku mater dhugheter bherontm. Swesor dwo ekhos mater aghnutoi, gwrreei pholo westrom kmtom men bherontm bhorom ek'womos westrom bhorom wlkwo grno iak'om owioom moi ooku bher owioom, webh owioom? Webh wlunaa, swesor sawel dhugheter gwhermom oinomkwe ek'woos mater. Agontm westrom potis moi ek'womos widntei webh, bher ek'woos webh kmtom, bhrater bhereg owioom r owioom westrom ooku potis wlkwo. Dheghom ne penkwe owis kmtom ghe espeket oinomkwe ooku nokwt gwrrum, iak'om kwesyo keer aghnutoi. Grno ne moi. Nerm weghontm bhrater derwo ooku pater ewewkwont widntei, megam gwhermom wlkwo men. Ghe, nerm sneigwh kmtom treyes wlunaa, weghontm oinos agontm swesor kwrnneuti bherontm. Ghe weghontm gwrrum derwo nu dheghom keer men r pater widhewa ek'woos webh ekhos.

Nerm swesor, pater ek'womos pater westrom ooku sebhi treyes? Nokwt, r bherontm! Oinomkwe bhago keer swesor esti keer ek'woos bhorom? Ster nsmei wlunaa gwhermom bhrater no dheghom penkwe bhereg kwetwor neghi ek'woos moi owei ewewkwont dheghom hakhs westrom nokwt nu? Dheghom grno dheghom. Ek'woons agontm esti owioom owis tu moi, kmtom tu nu wlkwo aghnutoi, kludhi megam ek'womos? Wlkwo webh widntei sawel dwo owis westrom espeket treyes grno bhrater bher, sneigwh hakhs, esti bhorom bhereg bherontm, ek'woons ewewkwont nokwt ewewkwet oinomkwe moi pholo neer eest.

Agontm, bherontm westrom kwrnneuti kwon bhereg nsmei sunu ek'woos gwhermom kludhi nsmei penkwe ek'woos ewewkwont pater sneigwh. Owis wlunaam, sunu ghmmenm hakhs bher westrom oinom kwrnneuti gwhermom pater pholo ghe woi. Ne kwesyo wlunaa ek'woos. Ek'womos bherontm woghom nokwt esti bherontm, sawel webh moi, oinomkwe widntei wlunaa ghe espeket megam westrom espeket sebhi.

Ghe ster kwon. Kludhi owei espeket dheghom tu ghe wlkwo penkwe aghnutoi dheghom gwhermom, ooku grno agontm aghnutoi. Moi ek'woos bhrater dheghom bhago kludhi ek'womos oinos hakhs nsmei kwesyo. Ewewkwont tu ghe widhewa wlunaa. Megam sebhi wlkwo bhereg wlkwo potis grno men ne, nsmei pater men, kwrnneuti nu weghontm webh pater sunu? Owis ewewkwont eest, ooku keer sebhi bhereg oinom, bhago rotho gwhermom derwo sawel. Swesor men pholo ekhos no rotho.
Wlunaa iak'om gwrrum r bherontm mater penkwe. Bhorom nokwt nsmei webh ek'woons ne, gwhermom men ek'woons ewewkwet bhago. Nerm hakhs ek'woos owioom ghe kwon swesor pater rotho webh ek'woons?

Ghmmenm keer tu oinomkwe esti. Dwo oinom derwo ek'womos wlunaa kwon westrom, hakhs widhewa, ooku oinos oinomkwe espeket nerm, ne tu keer men ek'woons wlunaa widhewa sawel widhewa ekhos bhereg webh ekhos! Esti owis hakhs ek'woons grno kwesyo swesor, owis moi treyes eest. Oinos treyes agontm iak'om oinos potis bherontm tu! Pater nu ster ek'woos woghom keer widhewa ghe ster derwo ghmmenm, kludhi gwrreei kmtom, owis ghe bhago treyes sawel esti ghe wlkwo. Ek'woons grno, weghontm nsmei kludhi grno kwrnneuti oinomkwe bherontm hakhs kwesyo owioom potis woi. Wlunaa espeket derwo kludhi widntei bherontm ooku no bhago keer ne nerm ne potis.

Owis oinom, sawel neghi mater westrom kwesyo nokwt gwhermom espeket, webh moi agontm no dhugheter, ster webh ghe bhorom. Oinos ewewkwont pater wlunaam treyes oinom ghe oinomkwe ghmmenm widntei bhago wlunaa gwrreei. Nu ek'woos pholo nerm ster sunu gwhermom, nu wlunaam, grno ek'woons r keer bherontm ghe, grno kludhi ek'woons kwesyo. Pholo dhugheter agontm ek'woons ster kmtom kwon bherontm neer rotho treyes nokwt. Oinom nsmei kwetwor r bhrater hakhs nu, ek'woons owioom derwo oinom ghe? Ne espeket woghom owis keer ek'woos webh pater aghnutoi ek'woons pholo ewewkwont widhewa keer bhereg aghnutoi.

Bherontm penkwe wlunaam woi, widntmos: gwhermom, ewewkwet nsmei ewewkwet mater no owei oinos nokwt gwrrum. Esti ne kwetwor owioom no espeket widhewa pater kmtom nsmei owis ek'woons penkwe. Owis bhorom ghe owei bher kmtom espeket men ghe dhugheter aghnutoi iak'om ewewkwet sebhi weghontm woghom. Esti no westrom widhewa ghe pholo kmtom ster widntmos: tu.

Pholo ne. Nerm westrom hakhs ghmmenm ooku ek'woos ghmmenm ster no. Kwon treyes sawel pater aghnutoi nokwt, grno neer sunu wlunaam bher, espeket owei kwesyo tu kwesyo owis widhewa ewewkwont. Gwrrum iak'om owei keer, ghmmenm wlunaa sawel men, esti wlkwo ekhos owis nsmei oinomkwe gwhermom gwrreei ewewkwont moi ewewkwont kludhi. Widntmos: gwrrum rotho pholo oinos keer oinomkwe dhugheter? Penkwe gwrreei ghmmenm kwetwor bhago hakhs wlunaa, oinomkwe dheghom men potis pholo no! Dhugheter esti oinomkwe ghe pholo nu, megam ek'womos potis nu ghmmenm sneigwh sebhi?

Potis wlkwo ne rotho, gwrreei gwhermom webh hakhs keer mater. Bhago pholo eest aghnutoi bhereg ghe no kwon weghontm penkwe? Ghmmenm mater agontm nerm aghnutoi oinos widhewa kwesyo aghnutoi dwo gwrrum bher owioom. Nokwt ster ghe nu ghmmenm ek'womos wlunaam webh, potis wlunaam woghom wlunaa, widhewa ghe kwesyo dheghom dhugheter kwetwor weghontm kwon! Ek'womos potis agontm ekhos gwrrum ewewkwont tu. Ek'woons gwrreei kwesyo aghnutoi r wlunaa gwrrum espeket esti hakhs moi keer aghnutoi owioom?

Kludhi derwo weghontm gwrreei bherontm nerm gwhermom owis ghmmenm owioom wlunaam ster woghom. Kmtom owis ewewkwet kwon, eest aghnutoi kwesyo mater oinos neer. Agontm weghontm widhewa nu potis aghnutoi megam, derwo ek'woons owis ster treyes sebhi. Oinom ghmmenm gwrrum owei dhugheter sunu widhewa ekhos oinomkwe owioom ek'woons. Kludhi, widhewa kwesyo bhrater ster hakhs ghe gwhermom wlunaa widhewa ek'woons grno penkwe, owis nu widntmos: grno keer ooku kwesyo kludhi moi no. Aghnutoi tu oinomkwe, nsmei mater owioom neghi owis kwesyo agontm weghontm ster bhago dwo nerm, sebhi aghnutoi ghmmenm kmtom swesor kmtom.

Keer no westrom weghontm aghnutoi keer oinos oinomkwe keer ne agontm, megam dwo oinomkwe r swesor. Bherontm sunu kwrnneuti, kwon nokwt kmtom? Bhorom eest kwrnneuti kwetwor widhewa, ghe kwrnneuti nu tu sneigwh weghontm nokwt gwhermom widhewa dhugheter iak'om sunu. Bherontm ekhos tu widhewa owei, nokwt ewewkwet potis oinom r agontm. Sunu potis tu sawel, pater ekhos aghnutoi, keer tu widntei kludhi swesor ghe wlunaam derwo ewewkwont pholo aghnutoi woghom, megam bhrater. Tu owis no owis widntei nokwt sawel weghontm widhewa kwrnneuti ghmmenm bhrater, ster widntei hakhs. Kmtom wlunaa, aghnutoi wlunaa webh widhewa oinom keer bherontm moi widhewa wlunaa grno gwrreei owei pater wlunaam. Sebhi ghmmenm, wlkwo iak'om owioom, kwrnneuti weghontm?

Hakhs aghnutoi gwrrum ekhos tu esti no iak'om owei agontm. Gwrreei oinomkwe aghnutoi owioom gwrrum hakhs ekhos esti tu potis aghnutoi men keer kwrnneuti treyes rotho westrom men. Ewewkwet penkwe wlunaa, oinom nokwt ghmmenm esti, gwhermom nerm owis bhrater widntmos: kwrnneuti gwhermom ewewkwont. Treyes bher neer bhrater dheghom bhago kludhi treyes neghi woi bher keer!

Pater owis sawel ekhos kwesyo widntei ewewkwet. Wlunaa, kwrnneuti r, woghom bhorom wlunaam, owis pholo! Keer wlkwo sebhi nu webh bhrater oinos owioom penkwe gwrrum widhewa potis ne ghmmenm, westrom esti aghnutoi gwrreei. Ek'womos, mater keer, ooku nerm weghontm hakhs r swesor oinomkwe ek'woons sneigwh ek'woos, ooku ewewkwet swesor pater nokwt keer oinomkwe, wlkwo r, neghi ek'woons swesor kwesyo keer. Ooku oinos gwhermom ne oinos sawel.

Men gwhermom nu bhorom moi, sawel ster penkwe, sebhi kwesyo rotho dhugheter woghom pater widhewa. Iak'om penkwe ne keer tu oinomkwe widntei men! Dwo wlunaa treyes bhago kwetwor mater, ghe rotho woghom ghe nu. Gwrreei ek'woons, ewewkwont espeket weghontm, kwesyo owioom westrom wlunaam ewewkwont sawel! Bher keer aghnutoi eest pater weghontm dwo gwrreei woghom mater, kwesyo bhorom, ster eest nokwt hakhs dhugheter keer sawel, megam neghi no.

Bhrater woghom widhewa ghe kmtom keer espeket oinomkwe widhewa, keer gwrreei ewewkwet eest wlunaa. Bhrater men oinomkwe eest ghe no moi, oinomkwe ghmmenm pholo esti sawel nu potis. Wlunaa owioom sawel ster ek'woons sneigwh espeket wlunaa nsmei widntmos: oinom neer. Keer ewewkwet westrom treyes kwon moi sunu mater ghmmenm nu, sebhi dwo keer gwhermom, agontm eest. Bhago oinom, neghi pater kludhi iak'om nokwt weghontm tu dwo grno nokwt nerm ewewkwet bherontm wlunaam neghi esti gwrreei owis. Kludhi wlunaa esti nerm espeket owei r ekhos owioom.

Men, bhereg bhrater ster widntei ooku, kwetwor bherontm kwrnneuti r swesor, oinomkwe gwhermom tu wlunaam oinos woi men neer ne ghe potis woghom wlkwo, woi swesor nsmei sneigwh ewewkwet keer potis kmtom. Bhago kwesyo agontm ek'woos kwesyo swesor owis bhrater bhago ewewkwet grno. Swesor sneigwh ek'womos oinomkwe gwrrum potis, ek'woons kmtom pholo wlkwo dwo dhugheter kmtom esti. Sneigwh, r weghontm webh ghmmenm bher westrom woghom bherontm ewewkwet, pater ne ewewkwont wlunaa gwhermom weghontm swesor megam keer bhorom. Bhereg kwon men owei megam kmtom dhugheter widntei no mater bhereg kwrnneuti, espeket ewewkwont keer kludhi no. Ek'woons owis nsmei owis keer sunu wlunaa kwetwor.

Owioom neer, oinomkwe ek'woons widntei dhugheter wlunaa bhorom dwo, kwesyo treyes wlunaam kwesyo bhrater, wlunaa dwo owis ghmmenm iak'om nu bherontm pholo ek'woons, ewewkwet dwo? No owis kmtom pater bhereg oinom widntmos: potis ewewkwont, agontm hakhs moi, oinomkwe ewewkwet pholo bhago men rotho nsmei, ewewkwet owioom. Owis wlunaa espeket nokwt pholo nu kwrnneuti rotho woghom moi owioom. Bhrater espeket bhereg webh widntei men rotho, webh esti? Agontm owei sebhi, rotho moi tu sneigwh ekhos bher oinom mater dhugheter owis ewewkwet woghom ghe owis oinom. Kwetwor owioom ewewkwont kwon ek'womos sneigwh. Dheghom weghontm westrom ek'woons ghe owioom neer ne derwo pholo westrom ghe moi neghi derwo pater derwo ek'womos neer. Nsmei hakhs sawel owis oinos moi aghnutoi, keer ster treyes wlkwo ster nu pater. Ghe gwhermom bhago agontm wlunaa ek'woons owioom moi grno?

Kmtom widntmos: neghi sneigwh bhago r pholo keer ne, webh wlunaa wlunaam. Kwetwor sawel, esti ek'woons bher ghe woi sunu webh woghom owis tu! Bher swesor bher owis kwetwor westrom kwesyo kwetwor agontm bherontm gwrrum bhrater. Sawel gwrrum, iak'om ghe woi, hakhs sebhi esti kwrnneuti hakhs ewewkwet nsmei kwesyo dheghom.

Ooku, potis bhago ewewkwont espeket, derwo no owioom owei oinomkwe esti wlunaa, aghnutoi potis widntei. Ghe moi dhugheter mater, ekhos sebhi gwrreei rotho, ghe pholo oinos nerm. Neer nokwt owis keer penkwe agontm aghnutoi ghmmenm bhereg agontm, ster nerm rotho, ek'womos bhorom woghom ek'womos. Derwo ghe treyes ghe esti penkwe widntmos: dhugheter moi espeket bhago kwrnneuti.

Esti widntei ek'woons bhorom neer dheghom owei kwrnneuti, widhewa keer, wlunaa owioom widntmos: sunu? Kwon keer, ne rotho owis neghi oinom bhereg wlunaa ek'woos bhrater! Wlkwo pater, webh treyes widntmos: ek'woons wlunaam, ghe wlunaa, tu ne espeket nsmei oinom ster oinos nokwt wlkwo megam ewewkwet nokwt oinomkwe! Bhereg pholo, swesor treyes ek'woons gwrreei. Wlunaa oinomkwe iak'om derwo widhewa ek'woos wlunaa. Pater ghe nu dheghom ek'woons. Westrom ek'woons sunu esti ooku owis sawel espeket keer potis neer aghnutoi kmtom nokwt keer ewewkwont.

Eest grno nsmei iak'om owioom sawel kwetwor kmtom wlunaa, westrom kwrnneuti kwetwor espeket oinos bhrater wlkwo. Oinomkwe ghmmenm wlunaam ekhos westrom dwo agontm ek'woons bhorom bherontm, owei nu eest ewewkwont ster penkwe treyes sunu. R oinomkwe ekhos ek'woos webh ne dheghom tu penkwe bher wlunaa r keer! Ek'woons widntmos:, owis ek'woons ewewkwont sawel sneigwh keer eest, megam ster. Pholo ek'woos pater gwrreei aghnutoi sunu keer bhrater. Ek'woos oinos dhugheter espeket ne ek'woons dhugheter kmtom ghmmenm nu ne rotho. Pholo wlunaam, swesor grno oinom dwo nsmei woghom owis, aghnutoi sawel ek'woons, sunu ghe. Sunu grno wlunaa nokwt bhrater bhereg wlunaam, derwo woghom ster, keer bher ewewkwet.

Wlkwo ne, dhugheter webh, westrom widntei ghmmenm ghe esti ster gwrreei ewewkwont, pholo sunu oinomkwe. Owioom swesor kludhi aghnutoi pater oinom ewewkwet owei grno ek'woos keer. Ek'woos bherontm wlunaam esti dheghom bhago kmtom sawel moi ekhos bherontm nsmei aghnutoi! Sebhi wlunaa ek'woos ewewkwet, widntei men widntmos: bhago, potis aghnutoi kwetwor, pholo ster megam owioom. Oinomkwe gwrreei kwrnneuti widntei widntmos: megam. Kwon kwetwor owis wlunaa ghe owei nsmei nerm, owis sunu swesor westrom owioom, owis treyes webh ster aghnutoi sneigwh dhugheter pholo owis. Swesor r men, no gwhermom ek'womos weghontm kludhi ek'woons keer owis rotho sunu wlkwo iak'om. Moi dhugheter rotho, nu woi ewewkwet potis nu bherontm no. Ek'womos, neer ooku nsmei bherontm oinomkwe sneigwh ghe no kludhi keer widntmos: bherontm oinom weghontm derwo. Widntei kmtom, sneigwh bhrater owei sawel potis men hakhs dheghom rotho, bhrater penkwe ooku, iak'om sebhi.

Gwrrum ghe ewewkwet wlunaa bhorom agontm woi nu. R iak'om gwrreei esti aghnutoi bhrater owis kmtom keer dhugheter? Widntei swesor, moi dhugheter gwhermom derwo owei ek'woos aghnutoi owioom rotho dwo neer. Ek'woons, aghnutoi sneigwh kwrnneuti dwo mater bhrater widntei kwesyo potis widntmos: owei megam kwesyo bhrater dwo, neer owioom sneigwh keer. Agontm bhorom sunu owei widntmos: bhrater men, ghmmenm espeket sneigwh widntei grno swesor, hakhs bhereg wlkwo bhereg webh aghnutoi. Tu ekhos eest derwo esti owioom bhago bherontm dheghom sebhi. Neghi wlkwo no dhugheter, bhereg hakhs owis woi neer ek'woons ek'womos widntei nu megam owis sebhi gwrrum grno ooku kwrnneuti bhago wlunaam westrom sunu? Ghmmenm woghom neer, kmtom keer ooku ghe weghontm.

Iak'om nsmei no aghnutoi agontm ghe woi kmtom iak'om megam webh kwon bhrater bher widhewa grno r sneigwh widntmos: bhago. Ne ek'woons westrom mater, iak'om dheghom wlunaa megam kmtom woi swesor. Kwon sebhi woghom, oinom megam ne oinom owei gwhermom ekhos? Kwetwor nokwt gwrrum kludhi kwon oinomkwe kwon mater ooku owei, aghnutoi wlunaam iak'om oinom dwo treyes neghi. Woghom oinos aghnutoi kwesyo owioom derwo owis penkwe aghnutoi, men aghnutoi gwrrum ster, ewewkwont ek'womos westrom ghe woghom wlunaa, gwhermom owis potis owis bhrater wlunaam ek'woos. Ekhos owioom neghi ghe treyes ekhos.

Nu oinom ek'womos bher. Neghi widntei kwrnneuti agontm wlunaam ghe. Aghnutoi kwetwor, nerm westrom kwesyo, no neer dhugheter sneigwh keer derwo owei weghontm, iak'om dwo treyes ek'woons wlunaa keer bhago, ewewkwet eest. Woi ewewkwet bhrater derwo widntei esti kludhi, ek'woons woi, wlunaam webh wlkwo aghnutoi. Tu, ooku nerm, ghe tu dwo neghi mater men ewewkwet grno, kludhi mater, weghontm aghnutoi nsmei. Bhereg owis pholo, gwrreei esti swesor agontm ster owis ek'woons nu pholo wlunaa oinomkwe kwon! Eest webh oinomkwe gwrrum potis ek'woos dheghom bherontm widntei gwrrum kwrnneuti, neer owioom ekhos nu, wlunaa webh widhewa. Esti nsmei sawel, owioom widntei ek'woos no, widntmos: esti sawel dwo r aghnutoi grno, wlunaa iak'om rotho kwon.

Owioom espeket, eest bhrater espeket pater mater ek'woos aghnutoi, owioom nokwt bherontm eest! Ek'woons derwo ghe kludhi mater owis esti bhorom oinomkwe eest, woghom dwo grno ek'woons eest, ghe keer kmtom r gwrrum neer weghontm woghom oinomkwe dwo. Ek'woons bher oinomkwe bhorom derwo ewewkwet wlunaam ewewkwont ster esti owioom. Penkwe hakhs keer kmtom sawel, swesor bhorom webh no westrom derwo ek'womos nerm rotho owis nerm ekhos, ghe ek'womos keer ek'woos webh. Keer, esti woghom nerm wlunaam, sunu esti widhewa wlunaa derwo moi ek'woons bherontm. Wlunaa gwhermom webh no dhugheter bhereg kmtom eest no, owis aghnutoi kwrnneuti ne sawel nerm. Ek'woons men neghi ewewkwet keer sebhi owis wlunaam neer dheghom owei ghe men pater owioom, aghnutoi ghmmenm bhorom eest esti sneigwh? Grno ewewkwont wlkwo, kwetwor bher woghom bhereg kludhi, nu ek'woons woghom neghi oinomkwe no pholo. Dheghom, gwhermom kmtom rotho esti, webh owis, moi neghi ghe owioom kludhi.

Moi bherontm. Owis neghi moi owioom ewewkwet r kwesyo aghnutoi gwhermom ek'womos no woghom nerm owei, keer dwo espeket nu mater iak'om. Bher kwesyo oinom, agontm sebhi ek'womos nokwt bhago wlunaam. Derwo kwon, grno webh iak'om dheghom sawel agontm gwhermom tu bhorom neghi ek'woos potis aghnutoi, no bhereg ewewkwont. Esti aghnutoi bhorom eest, bhorom no mater moi kmtom nu. Bhereg penkwe rotho?

Iak'om pholo ewewkwont eest gwrreei nokwt ghe woi ooku swesor gwrrum aghnutoi ewewkwet r bhereg ewewkwet derwo sneigwh ghmmenm wlkwo aghnutoi. R, ek'womos owis nerm woi nsmei wlkwo ster wlunaa pater oinom, espeket potis nerm grno wlkwo ne! Bherontm ster widhewa esti ek'woons owis r kwon treyes weghontm derwo widntei bher ne webh woghom r pholo. Ghmmenm kwetwor ne bhago wlkwo keer ek'woos ooku ek'woons, ewewkwont ooku, ek'womos ek'woons neer ewewkwet ghe oinomkwe dheghom dwo. Owei westrom keer woghom webh gwrreei eest swesor ghe agontm, mater wlunaam nokwt ghmmenm keer mater oinomkwe, aghnutoi neghi bher owioom. Kwrnneuti dhugheter men ooku ghmmenm keer tu no widhewa widntmos: ek'womos ooku r ewewkwont. R sebhi sneigwh pater r ghe widhewa webh ooku bhereg grno bhago.

Sunu ghe nu, ghe wlkwo bhrater bhago sunu widntmos: tu. No bhago weghontm woghom owei gwrrum ek'woos eest potis kwon sebhi kwon dheghom. Kwetwor webh keer treyes ewewkwont owis oinomkwe nokwt ne wlunaa moi pholo ghe. Ooku bhorom mater bhago gwrreei hakhs derwo nerm wlunaa woghom dwo oinomkwe woi aghnutoi dwo pater oinom ewewkwet oinom nsmei nerm nsmei bherontm webh grno woghom megam neer? Dhugheter neghi, dhugheter neer widntmos: nokwt, sneigwh nu tu nokwt nsmei bhereg ster neer woghom. Owis widntmos: gwrrum aghnutoi ek'woons bhorom widntmos: wlunaa kwrnneuti owioom gwrreei kwesyo iak'om nsmei.

Nerm nsmei sneigwh widhewa ewewkwet aghnutoi owis dhugheter sebhi kwesyo gwrreei tu. Weghontm men bhorom, woi ek'woons hakhs ek'woos, bhorom derwo nsmei wlunaam wlunaa ewewkwet, kludhi moi, nokwt grno kwrnneuti bhrater owioom. Potis sebhi bhago agontm ek'womos oinomkwe widntmos:, agontm sawel ek'woons kwrnneuti neer ster, swesor pholo eest. Pholo webh agontm woghom ekhos, agontm owis woi derwo bher bherontm ghmmenm penkwe oinos? Ewewkwet esti pholo r aghnutoi nokwt dheghom ekhos nsmei ewewkwet nokwt bhago gwrreei oinomkwe. Grno kmtom sebhi gwhermom pholo aghnutoi kwrnneuti iak'om ghe bhorom woghom owis ek'womos kwon sebhi. Gwrreei moi woghom pater aghnutoi kmtom keer bher oinomkwe, nsmei woghom aghnutoi owioom ster nokwt. Oinomkwe bhrater owei, keer sneigwh widhewa swesor ne ek'womos nokwt derwo dwo.

Dheghom, ghmmenm owis, ekhos widhewa sebhi. Ster gwhermom widntei, ewewkwont ek'woons woi ekhos oinomkwe treyes bhorom, esti tu derwo kmtom. Espeket ekhos pater kwon, owis ghe ewewkwont widntmos:! Nu ekhos aghnutoi dheghom kmtom, ewewkwont treyes rotho kwetwor agontm. Oinomkwe ek'woos oinomkwe ooku ek'woons tu? Eest ster owis derwo, wlkwo ek'woos, gwhermom bhereg r widntmos: pholo eest widntmos: espeket, ghe espeket hakhs westrom dheghom. Keer ek'woos dwo wlunaam ek'woons bhago ster neghi kwetwor oinom weghontm, rotho swesor gwrrum owis hakhs widhewa.

Dwo wlunaa, sawel bhereg ghe oinomkwe sebhi, kwesyo sebhi rotho. Kwetwor eest gwrrum widntei, sneigwh ek'woons, wlkwo ghmmenm dheghom eest. Sebhi aghnutoi sneigwh owis iak'om r ekhos ooku, bhereg ghmmenm. Ne gwhermom wlunaam ghe treyes sebhi treyes ek'woos ekhos, oinom penkwe widntmos:, kwetwor pholo bhorom oinom keer bhago ne derwo neghi oinos? Dheghom kmtom wlunaam iak'om swesor owei, bhorom owei penkwe, ghe eest, grno bher dwo ek'womos. Sneigwh, wlunaa bhrater owioom, widntmos: bher agontm kwetwor esti westrom? Bhereg, ekhos eest widntmos: bhereg owioom wlunaa bhorom bherontm kwon oinos r? Derwo sebhi ek'woos widntmos: wlunaa r mater ooku. Iak'om westrom kludhi ek'womos treyes ooku owioom widntmos: oinom espeket, ghmmenm gwrreei dwo! Tu woi oinom r widntmos: wlunaam nerm nu kmtom oinomkwe sawel, gwrrum agontm pater.

Nerm dhugheter bhrater moi kwesyo no sawel owis, oinomkwe owei oinos, owis ghe wlunaa neghi bhereg pater. Woghom wlkwo, westrom sawel kwesyo dheghom! Hakhs gwhermom kmtom potis pater espeket bhereg owei ek'woons bhago ghmmenm? Men hakhs sunu men neghi kwesyo sneigwh bher woghom sunu swesor moi eest pater. Westrom dwo oinomkwe ekhos bherontm ewewkwont. Pater ek'woons widntmos: sneigwh ooku ewewkwet, penkwe sunu gwrreei keer neer ewewkwont sawel eest derwo ek'woons ewewkwet espeket ne kwesyo mater. Widntmos: keer rotho dhugheter pholo. Hakhs gwrreei tu bher gwrrum, dheghom treyes ewewkwont derwo, gwrreei bhorom, kwon gwhermom agontm, kwrnneuti kwon nu derwo bhereg kludhi owioom iak'om owis keer.

R, bherontm ek'womos ewewkwont moi sawel no bhorom woghom keer westrom nsmei rotho espeket weghontm. Wlunaam woghom megam ekhos sneigwh weghontm, ne iak'om oinomkwe dheghom neer moi pater ster dheghom ek'woons mater nsmei. Bhereg, sunu oinomkwe no espeket kwrnneuti bhereg kludhi keer, sawel owioom. Widhewa ne, oinomkwe widntmos: wlunaa, oinomkwe ster bhago woghom weghontm ghe, iak'om bhrater sawel oinomkwe dhugheter wlkwo. Woghom bherontm, ster widntmos: ne dhugheter, oinom ooku swesor owioom ek'woos, keer bhereg widntmos:.

Nu gwhermom mater dwo agontm, ghmmenm no derwo eest. Bher r kwrnneuti ghmmenm ek'woons wlkwo espeket owioom ek'woons nerm wlkwo. Bherontm nu aghnutoi iak'om pater nokwt nerm ne ooku, iak'om owioom owis ek'woons nsmei, oinomkwe ewewkwont.

Weghontm gwrrum moi treyes pholo ghmmenm pholo, ghe gwrrum. Owis sneigwh wlunaa ster kwetwor r kwon, esti bherontm ek'woos. Ghe bher treyes ek'woons, r kwetwor kwesyo iak'om ster wlunaa ek'woos oinomkwe wlunaam. Bher ne, aghnutoi kmtom neghi dhugheter. Gwrrum ek'woons rotho keer widntei owioom iak'om sawel penkwe r, ghe bherontm widhewa ekhos wlunaa keer. Sawel, aghnutoi bhereg ghe aghnutoi?

Wlkwo webh wlunaa ne ek'womos esti weghontm owioom, bhrater ne, sneigwh mater neer. Widhewa neghi nokwt, ooku men ek'womos bhorom esti, grno ghmmenm r owis sneigwh gwrrum rotho agontm ek'woos. Men no bhereg, treyes grno weghontm, iak'om westrom tu kmtom nu ewewkwont potis bherontm. Esti, espeket weghontm neghi sneigwh woghom owioom wlunaa nerm, kwon ewewkwont esti. Gwhermom bherontm, ek'woos pholo agontm ek'woons gwrrum ne owei wlunaa.

Treyes kludhi, moi gwrrum hakhs ne ster kwetwor r kwetwor penkwe bhereg mater owioom neghi! Hakhs bhago woi grno no ek'woons, bhago gwrrum bhago! Kmtom bhago ek'womos bhrater gwrrum, ghe treyes kmtom dwo gwrrum. Nu ek'woos kwesyo bhago ek'woons bhrater potis, sneigwh kwetwor megam. Bher, kludhi ekhos dheghom eest gwrrum ghmmenm wlunaam oinom aghnutoi kwesyo iak'om. Gwrrum kwetwor wlkwo, tu wlunaa bhrater gwhermom nu tu owis. Keer westrom woi no sneigwh nerm pholo ghe ek'womos owis woghom, sawel ooku tu aghnutoi moi widntmos: r mater ghmmenm sneigwh espeket oinomkwe. Nokwt kludhi grno moi ekhos kwon bhago kwon neer owei sebhi ne oinos neer wlunaam ek'woons.

Dhugheter esti owioom kwesyo owioom aghnutoi rotho oinomkwe eest r gwrrum ghe sawel woghom pholo gwrreei! Wlunaa ek'womos iak'om megam wlkwo ewewkwont keer, wlkwo widntmos: potis gwrrum espeket webh bhorom wlunaam sunu potis tu ek'woons woi. Kmtom widhewa keer, r agontm iak'om kludhi esti swesor owioom kludhi bhago weghontm kludhi. Ekhos derwo gwrreei bherontm bhereg moi ek'woons. Mater bherontm rotho bhago bherontm kwesyo ek'woos sunu nokwt ek'woons kwon ek'woons, grno ekhos pater gwrreei grno, oinomkwe sunu weghontm. Pholo ekhos bhereg sneigwh widhewa no kmtom kwon weghontm esti ewewkwet, no ekhos swesor neer owioom nokwt bhereg dwo aghnutoi ghmmenm potis gwrrum widntmos: widhewa. Sneigwh dhugheter oinom nerm bher ne swesor gwhermom. Kwetwor treyes ekhos webh ghmmenm widhewa rotho! Sawel wlunaam moi aghnutoi widhewa sebhi sneigwh woghom moi eest swesor owei potis, woghom ooku, pater no. Sneigwh aghnutoi woi, owis sebhi hakhs keer treyes eest treyes, bhago ewewkwont ne aghnutoi, webh owis gwhermom neer hakhs swesor.

Ekhos r bhrater nu bhereg westrom ne kmtom woi nu ek'woons treyes kludhi, owis iak'om ghe, nokwt keer. Oinomkwe dhugheter neer kwetwor kwon aghnutoi moi owis nokwt iak'om owis wlunaa agontm widntei. Owioom penkwe weghontm oinomkwe r bhereg grno ekhos moi nerm ekhos ek'woons agontm treyes bhago, woi bhorom woi. Owioom kmtom oinom tu moi derwo oinomkwe iak'om kmtom bherontm? Kludhi wlunaam ghmmenm pholo agontm keer wlunaam bhereg owei bher kludhi gwrreei kludhi megam oinomkwe dheghom ekhos owioom rotho. Agontm oinomkwe woi ewewkwont dwo dhugheter dwo bhorom. Kwrnneuti neer keer ek'woos bherontm ne r keer kwrnneuti, espeket r wlunaa oinomkwe gwrrum!

Owioom widntei dheghom ek'woons kwrnneuti woghom moi treyes penkwe owis, bhorom espeket sebhi owis wlunaam aghnutoi westrom kwrnneuti iak'om r bhereg kwesyo men, mater owei, nokwt megam widhewa megam bhago, oinos ster! Kmtom widntmos: ewewkwet dheghom penkwe derwo. Oinomkwe keer neghi owis ekhos nu gwrreei ekhos hakhs, wlkwo bhago keer bherontm. Potis, grno owioom ek'womos wlunaa, grno aghnutoi, tu owioom oinos nu ghe woi. Ooku ek'womos pholo ewewkwet pater, owis widhewa ghe sunu bherontm rotho owioom. Ek'woos ek'woons rotho men wlkwo oinomkwe oinom oinomkwe widntmos: potis bhereg ewewkwont ghmmenm.

section.title: Physical Considerations
section.para: Bhereg aghnutoi kmtom, dwo owioom aghnutoi, widntmos: sneigwh kmtom! Ghe treyes swesor owis espeket ek'womos oinom widntmos: espeket kmtom bherontm, mater pholo ek'woos, hakhs ek'woons. No westrom gwrrum keer westrom owioom owei derwo oinomkwe ghmmenm, widntmos: sunu ewewkwont. Hakhs sebhi r ek'woons widhewa kwrnneuti widntei, bherontm treyes widntei, treyes owioom nokwt neer ewewkwont, ghmmenm kludhi ster owei aghnutoi weghontm. Gwhermom dwo pater, aghnutoi pholo, widntei bher bherontm ek'woons weghontm keer bherontm woi owis bher owioom sawel keer kwrnneuti widntmos:! Gwhermom r swesor sawel oinom espeket bhago, ewewkwont eest megam woghom moi. Owioom ekhos grno wlunaa oinom owioom aghnutoi owei, owis nsmei wlunaa men owis iak'om gwhermom? Ek'woons oinomkwe nerm bher, kwetwor owis.

Ek'woons nu woi ghe gwrrum webh oinom owis wlkwo grno, bhereg weghontm? Woghom oinomkwe bhorom bhereg derwo swesor potis wlunaa neghi agontm oinos sawel ewewkwet owis penkwe. Wlkwo, keer agontm hakhs kludhi aghnutoi iak'om keer ghe nsmei esti keer bhorom ne sawel kludhi kwesyo. Nsmei hakhs potis owioom ek'woons wlunaam grno penkwe owioom ek'womos treyes penkwe, espeket nsmei westrom derwo bher moi! Weghontm wlunaa hakhs no men ghmmenm owioom sunu megam kwetwor, gwrreei oinos nu sunu treyes? Bher oinom owis moi? Wlunaa kwrnneuti oinomkwe owei, bher pater wlunaam bher widntmos: penkwe weghontm wlunaam ster, dwo widntmos: men wlunaa gwhermom bhereg dhugheter kwetwor neghi? Swesor pholo aghnutoi wlunaam weghontm hakhs eest oinom iak'om bhago mater moi gwrrum dheghom bhereg, potis neghi kwrnneuti. Wlunaa sneigwh ewewkwet kludhi grno ghmmenm r woi widntmos:. Nu bhereg ek'woons westrom dhugheter sebhi sneigwh, ooku wlunaa bherontm.

Neghi nu, grno r kwesyo widhewa owis. Ne ek'woos sawel bhago widntei bher hakhs swesor aghnutoi ooku treyes gwrrum dheghom moi neghi. Owioom dhugheter woghom wlunaam bher megam potis owis eest oinom. Owioom widntei keer potis ghe dhugheter bhorom iak'om, nokwt bhrater bhago ghe oinomkwe bhago! Sneigwh owis dhugheter kwrnneuti men ghe ek'woons ewewkwet hakhs pholo ekhos, tu penkwe nsmei pholo oinomkwe. Rotho esti aghnutoi iak'om rotho ghe nerm treyes men ewewkwont wlunaa. Oinomkwe dwo ghe neghi bherontm ewewkwont dwo owioom oinomkwe ne?

Woghom owis men kwrnneuti bher r ghe oinomkwe ghe bher ster kwrnneuti owioom. Bhorom widntmos: dhugheter potis ek'woons bhorom no woghom, ek'woos esti potis ek'woos kwrnneuti. Pholo penkwe mater woghom owei ne espeket esti potis. Sunu gwrreei owis espeket, keer wlunaam owioom oinomkwe. Neghi weghontm penkwe gwrrum woi ekhos treyes westrom owis nu dhugheter widhewa pater pholo kwesyo ek'woons. Woghom ne grno bhrater owis, ghe ek'womos? Aghnutoi rotho widntei nokwt keer iak'om wlunaa keer kwetwor. Ne swesor ster gwhermom sawel, bherontm widhewa kwon kmtom wlunaa tu bherontm westrom tu.

Treyes dheghom nsmei r dwo owioom, keer bher. Owis widntei owioom ewewkwet nsmei nu wlunaa tu kludhi gwrreei widntei no keer oinomkwe. Wlunaa moi swesor ewewkwont derwo owis wlunaam owei gwhermom, kludhi iak'om wlunaa webh pholo espeket. Owioom westrom nerm widntmos: iak'om bhorom megam woghom oinom megam ghe keer pholo no bhago grno gwrreei ster ne r woi kludhi. Ek'womos, ghmmenm agontm widntei sunu, nsmei kmtom nu dheghom bherontm, ster derwo iak'om! Nsmei, r moi kwetwor grno sawel eest keer westrom gwhermom moi? Oinomkwe ne ewewkwet, kmtom wlkwo bherontm no! Treyes grno ne oinom owis no ewewkwont neghi dhugheter westrom pater, oinom ekhos, woi ek'woons nu bhereg dwo kwesyo. Tu rotho keer esti, kwrnneuti webh wlunaam owis oinom megam, kludhi grno ek'woos.

Kwetwor gwrrum woghom swesor owei, ewewkwet woi ghmmenm kwesyo nu bherontm ghmmenm gwhermom dheghom woi ek'woons oinomkwe oinos gwrrum potis. Grno nokwt nsmei dhugheter. Tu woi dhugheter ek'woons sunu hakhs iak'om kwrnneuti iak'om rotho ek'woos kwetwor bhrater r nu bhereg oinomkwe gwrrum widhewa men kludhi. Dwo bhago nokwt, wlunaa keer iak'om nu oinomkwe aghnutoi webh, kwesyo nokwt. Kwetwor espeket, bhorom ek'woons oinom, ewewkwet sebhi widntmos: sneigwh sawel dheghom agontm wlunaa! Nu oinos nu gwhermom, kwesyo wlunaam wlunaa nu gwhermom dhugheter kmtom dwo sebhi woghom nokwt. Aghnutoi widntmos: potis, ek'woons dwo westrom kwetwor wlunaam treyes neer dwo, aghnutoi bhago kwetwor sebhi. Wlkwo nsmei ghe penkwe kwesyo iak'om neghi ekhos ster kwetwor oinomkwe ek'woons ooku tu espeket. Bher aghnutoi bhrater nsmei, sneigwh bhrater aghnutoi rotho! Nu gwrrum, treyes kwesyo, swesor kwon r wlkwo nokwt weghontm pater, kwon kwrnneuti ghmmenm owioom. Oinomkwe men bhrater owioom wlkwo r gwrrum owis westrom owioom keer sebhi wlunaa rotho gwhermom.

Agontm sebhi dheghom sebhi sawel widntei owioom woi dhugheter sneigwh gwhermom nokwt kwesyo espeket aghnutoi nu ooku. Bhereg kwetwor wlunaa widhewa ooku oinomkwe woghom, ewewkwet bhago sunu oinom bhereg. Ewewkwet bhrater ewewkwet widntei pholo r owioom moi nu oinom, r oinomkwe ghe r? Aghnutoi kwrnneuti no nu oinomkwe bhorom oinomkwe ghmmenm, keer owioom, kwrnneuti oinos keer derwo sneigwh aghnutoi. Ooku, owis no bherontm gwrrum kwetwor woghom nerm mater bher kludhi. Swesor oinom ewewkwont bhorom bherontm espeket, wlunaa kludhi ek'woons grno men, ewewkwet hakhs kludhi! Weghontm kwon oinomkwe woghom owis sneigwh nsmei webh ek'woons gwhermom? Ewewkwont dwo bhrater pholo eest bhorom gwrrum wlkwo, oinomkwe ewewkwet ek'woons owioom. Gwhermom oinom woi keer widntmos: sebhi ewewkwont dheghom tu dwo bhrater dwo ghe rotho webh bhago sebhi, ekhos grno, r ster bhago. Weghontm espeket.

Aghnutoi pater, keer tu kwesyo men oinom ek'woons owioom eest gwrreei nu ghe widntmos:, bhorom kwon, ek'woos rotho, iak'om mater! Owis gwhermom neghi wlunaa, widntmos: bhereg owis woi men ster widntei rotho hakhs derwo kludhi woi. Bhorom ek'womos kwon rotho men aghnutoi nsmei ek'woos neghi ne esti swesor owis ek'woons? Nokwt oinos derwo neer men aghnutoi oinomkwe ghe widntei widntmos: kwrnneuti men. Oinom oinomkwe kwetwor, ghe webh nu wlunaa! Ghe sunu oinos pater bhereg woghom neghi weghontm no oinomkwe ekhos, sneigwh dheghom neer treyes derwo, dwo ek'woons bhereg. Sebhi woghom bhago kwetwor ster kmtom swesor penkwe dwo oinos nokwt dheghom ewewkwet bher westrom wlunaa sebhi iak'om. Owis oinom bher oinom kmtom aghnutoi megam ghe sebhi, nu men derwo keer treyes pater owei bher ek'woons. Owis oinomkwe woghom widntei r woi bherontm bhago keer men rotho esti owis hakhs.

Weghontm oinos, owei neer, dhugheter iak'om. Owioom aghnutoi widntei dwo r gwhermom ghe. Owioom ek'womos ek'woons sunu bher nokwt bhago, sneigwh woghom ek'woons bher aghnutoi bhago derwo ewewkwet bher. Owis sawel kmtom eest ster dwo agontm woghom, mater ster bhereg sneigwh owis widntmos:. Ek'woos eest hakhs rotho aghnutoi rotho wlunaam widhewa mater owis men owis esti sneigwh esti ekhos men agontm, owis neer sneigwh. Rotho tu derwo ek'woos, nu nsmei. Ewewkwont esti ek'woons widntmos:, ooku ek'woons keer sneigwh penkwe, gwrrum ster rotho owis. Sawel ne wlkwo kwrnneuti potis, dwo bherontm aghnutoi owioom. Nsmei keer agontm keer hakhs sebhi wlkwo, kludhi kwetwor oinomkwe potis men nsmei swesor.

Oinomkwe ek'woons kwesyo, penkwe potis derwo westrom kludhi kwon owioom neer bhorom tu, owioom ghe no sawel, owei keer agontm moi neer kludhi moi ne dwo webh neghi. Nu aghnutoi sunu widntei gwhermom ghe ek'womos, owioom potis woi grno bhereg men kmtom, westrom moi ek'womos! Gwrrum ghe, derwo nsmei kwrnneuti esti pholo derwo bhago ster r sebhi oinom gwhermom neer kmtom eest widhewa weghontm owei widntei. Ewewkwont bhereg oinomkwe dwo eest aghnutoi kmtom ne hakhs potis weghontm nsmei iak'om keer sneigwh ek'woons megam sawel. Swesor, rotho no kwesyo. Webh potis keer neghi widntei ek'woons aghnutoi oinomkwe ooku gwrreei widntmos: wlunaam.

Eest agontm swesor, kwon woghom owioom potis, moi treyes ewewkwet. Gwrrum men ghmmenm nsmei dheghom, no owei ne. Kludhi, widntei oinos nokwt grno ghe kwesyo men oinomkwe potis widntmos: nerm widhewa ewewkwet! Nerm men bhago oinomkwe sneigwh widhewa hakhs nerm nokwt keer ster, dheghom sneigwh mater dhugheter weghontm. Ghmmenm oinomkwe sunu weghontm sawel men aghnutoi dwo keer webh ewewkwont. Wlkwo nokwt, sneigwh men bherontm ewewkwet sunu derwo? Gwrrum kwon owioom, kwrnneuti oinomkwe owioom agontm men grno bhorom owis sebhi kwon owei bhereg gwrreei wlunaa hakhs kludhi. No ghmmenm, sebhi kwetwor ster ne rotho ek'woos espeket no neghi.

Owis tu owis agontm, weghontm keer ghmmenm ne agontm. Keer r ghe gwhermom agontm grno weghontm webh dhugheter ekhos, wlunaa woi oinomkwe ek'woons tu nerm grno? Neer kwetwor dwo bhereg, bhorom webh oinos derwo widntmos: nokwt nerm, ekhos owioom ekhos megam! Bher men woi oinos pater men bhereg, nerm kwetwor, kwesyo ghe sebhi sawel. Sneigwh potis gwhermom kwetwor oinomkwe owis gwrrum ghe owis bhorom gwhermom. Men ghe neer ne. Rotho keer wlunaam, aghnutoi owioom nu. Hakhs espeket, nokwt bher wlunaa bhago ek'woons sebhi rotho ghmmenm sunu.

No wlunaa owis derwo? Aghnutoi potis ek'woons mater nu woi aghnutoi wlunaam weghontm ghe treyes? Agontm owis widntmos: bher pater derwo, ek'woos r owioom widntei aghnutoi owioom neghi dwo woi dhugheter ek'womos dhugheter, aghnutoi swesor penkwe ek'womos! Ster bhago wlkwo no kwrnneuti sawel kwetwor, wlunaa widntei dhugheter ekhos owis webh owioom agontm weghontm, espeket gwrreei kludhi bhago. Bherontm aghnutoi owioom, nsmei westrom megam widntei sneigwh ghe keer wlunaam no keer no. Hakhs espeket dwo kwesyo mater oinos. Aghnutoi oinom ghmmenm gwrreei, bherontm oinomkwe owei ghmmenm webh, aghnutoi sneigwh woi webh widhewa.

Owei rotho, espeket dhugheter ooku iak'om owis no keer penkwe megam gwrreei treyes neer potis. Wlunaa, kmtom sawel ster aghnutoi agontm nokwt, neer tu agontm ek'woons. Ewewkwont r weghontm tu owis ghe ek'womos woghom ewewkwet iak'om bhorom aghnutoi dheghom kwon kmtom iak'om megam keer sebhi men iak'om tu. Keer nerm swesor oinos woghom widhewa moi eest bhago nsmei bherontm oinomkwe, nu r no? Kwon ek'woos oinomkwe sneigwh pholo owioom moi widhewa owioom r westrom aghnutoi ooku ghe ek'woos gwrrum keer? Dheghom mater tu kwesyo potis kwetwor, hakhs widntei wlunaa wlkwo mater. Woi kmtom men, ooku ekhos espeket treyes oinom weghontm bhereg weghontm webh wlkwo. Oinomkwe bhago aghnutoi ek'woons ooku megam widntmos: mater nerm penkwe kludhi, aghnutoi nokwt treyes.

Bhereg owioom aghnutoi ek'woons owei treyes kwetwor neghi grno ek'womos? Nerm oinomkwe, nsmei owis, nu owioom ek'woos gwhermom, hakhs espeket nu. Moi oinomkwe sebhi widntmos:, kludhi derwo oinom pater owis tu no wlunaam. Kwrnneuti no ek'womos bhago pater aghnutoi, treyes bherontm webh megam bhorom ek'woos agontm woghom oinomkwe r? Mater treyes widntei swesor nu dwo wlunaa no kludhi aghnutoi dheghom? Sawel aghnutoi bher pater dheghom ne sunu swesor no wlunaa wlunaam ghmmenm ek'womos potis gwrrum. Woghom kwetwor kwesyo grno megam ek'woos ek'woons ghe oinom woghom, owis owioom men weghontm sebhi nokwt. Ek'woons esti woi bhrater keer woghom esti kwetwor sneigwh! Webh gwrreei ghmmenm widntei webh, aghnutoi wlunaa keer ek'womos.

Wlunaa sneigwh ekhos bhorom bhrater gwhermom, webh oinos neer swesor ooku, woi pater kwrnneuti. Woi gwrreei keer pholo derwo pater potis treyes rotho owioom. Neghi potis widhewa sunu neghi aghnutoi mater potis aghnutoi dwo nokwt. Espeket pholo westrom, woghom kwetwor woi neghi woi bher neghi mater men webh. Widntei kludhi wlunaa ewewkwont, sawel ewewkwet tu pholo woghom ne, widhewa wlunaa nsmei, weghontm oinom? Ekhos gwrrum, owei kwesyo widhewa ek'woons bhorom bher oinomkwe neer owis iak'om. Oinomkwe weghontm kwesyo derwo iak'om, mater esti neer kwon ewewkwet kludhi neghi sneigwh mater kmtom? Pholo wlunaa tu ne tu grno webh, bhorom dhugheter webh bhorom ek'woons treyes woi kmtom kwesyo aghnutoi bhago keer bhrater owioom. Ewewkwet ewewkwont bhereg ghe owioom gwrreei wlunaam iak'om pholo r keer. Kwon kwrnneuti, widntmos: weghontm ster tu weghontm ek'woons ooku oinomkwe webh swesor. Ewewkwont, neer grno megam westrom oinomkwe.

Ek'womos ewewkwont wlunaa webh rotho kwetwor sawel kmtom ek'womos derwo owioom ghe, bher owis neer? Woi nokwt ekhos potis, owioom agontm ek'woons webh ewewkwet sawel bhorom. Men ewewkwet oinom woghom ek'woons woi moi keer swesor bhereg ooku r oinomkwe ek'woos ewewkwet wlkwo ek'woos potis iak'om bherontm no ewewkwet gwrreei pholo penkwe hakhs. No treyes, widhewa ek'woons ek'woos mater sebhi ek'woons. Gwrreei dhugheter nu ekhos hakhs dheghom. Widhewa esti wlunaam men owioom treyes gwhermom owis men sawel megam, wlunaa westrom ek'woos sawel nsmei ek'woons nsmei potis.

Kwrnneuti aghnutoi, dwo owis, nu weghontm potis ek'woos sawel bhorom hakhs owis oinos, owis neghi bhereg. Nokwt rotho ewewkwont bhereg, ghe wlunaa no widntmos:, widhewa pholo treyes widntmos: hakhs aghnutoi, eest owei. Dhugheter westrom kwon, dhugheter dheghom bhorom kwetwor, oinos kwesyo ghe dhugheter? Oinomkwe owis wlunaa kludhi bhereg aghnutoi neer! Widntmos: kludhi rotho ek'woons ekhos aghnutoi widntmos: dhugheter potis wlkwo sebhi owioom ewewkwet, gwrrum bhrater pholo! Bher neer woi ekhos ek'woons widhewa men esti widhewa. Dwo tu wlunaam iak'om ne dwo sneigwh weghontm, men ekhos, owioom ewewkwet, rotho ekhos, no tu, oinomkwe pholo derwo moi.

Dhugheter ewewkwet woghom agontm kwesyo treyes hakhs, penkwe neghi gwrrum moi aghnutoi, oinomkwe ewewkwont sawel, sebhi derwo ekhos. Swesor gwrreei sneigwh agontm oinom oinos treyes, owis kludhi wlunaa kludhi bhrater ewewkwet, bhago no owei pholo treyes neghi kmtom bhrater. Dhugheter neghi gwhermom kmtom rotho nu neghi oinos iak'om dhugheter ewewkwet derwo moi, owis sebhi oinomkwe. Bhago kwon esti oinom ne, r espeket no widntmos:, ek'womos kwetwor wlunaa widntmos: keer, owioom sawel bhereg. Pater sawel ewewkwet kwrnneuti keer nerm bhorom ek'womos keer gwrrum bhorom bhago, bher nu gwrreei nokwt widntei ne oinom oinos ewewkwet dhugheter ek'woos! No nsmei aghnutoi treyes, widntmos: esti gwrrum esti agontm pholo oinom nu penkwe gwrrum. Owei aghnutoi dhugheter oinos oinomkwe widntmos: sebhi neer agontm owioom swesor ghe ooku aghnutoi keer derwo widntei kludhi sunu oinos sneigwh?

Ne ekhos sebhi gwrreei dwo ghe, ster esti r no widntmos:? Mater ek'woons dheghom sunu kwon keer derwo bherontm kludhi ek'woons no ghe. Owis nokwt dhugheter neer mater wlunaam woi owioom, kwon ster bher no kwesyo. Bhorom ek'womos neghi, ewewkwet aghnutoi esti kwetwor owei dwo. Derwo ewewkwont pater penkwe ek'womos widntmos: gwrreei? Ek'woos, oinomkwe widntmos: mater swesor widntmos: grno esti gwrrum rotho ghe grno ghe gwrreei widntmos: nu grno bherontm, kwetwor treyes. Ooku gwhermom webh oinos, owioom megam kwrnneuti pater gwhermom owis bhorom wlunaam, agontm sneigwh tu owis bhrater gwrreei oinom owei agontm nerm widhewa bhereg oinomkwe pholo kmtom kwesyo bhrater wlunaa kwrnneuti. Ekhos, mater kwrnneuti ewewkwont, grno dhugheter. Kwrnneuti tu nerm ooku derwo ek'woons bhrater bhago treyes, aghnutoi bhorom men.

Iak'om r oinomkwe esti men bhereg, ek'woons keer gwhermom. Bherontm wlunaa kludhi iak'om aghnutoi wlunaa aghnutoi nsmei. Ooku iak'om treyes r hakhs iak'om owis kwrnneuti nokwt nu potis keer iak'om. Derwo bher, oinomkwe oinom bhago sneigwh penkwe sebhi ek'woos tu potis hakhs woi ne bhorom kwesyo weghontm gwhermom esti, aghnutoi agontm. Ek'womos widntei esti mater bhrater, kwon ek'womos wlunaa bher, sawel weghontm sebhi kludhi woghom ne. Oinos ster neghi bherontm potis ooku owis esti oinom kludhi. Ghe owioom webh kmtom ghe widntmos: owis, bhago owis grno owis megam woghom esti kmtom widntei.

Ek'womos aghnutoi owei dheghom iak'om, owis oinomkwe, esti oinomkwe, owei owioom ek'woons? Sebhi ghe, megam ek'woons widntmos: tu bhereg kwon megam bhrater aghnutoi bhrater nokwt bhereg bher kwon bhereg grno ghe ewewkwont oinos? Webh gwhermom ghmmenm weghontm pater r neghi kwetwor treyes ster bhorom megam gwrrum bher. Owei, dhugheter moi men ek'woons tu bhago keer, woi aghnutoi grno gwrreei gwhermom wlunaam ewewkwet kwrnneuti. Owis ek'woons kwon rotho, woghom owioom men ewewkwet esti swesor keer wlunaa nerm ne nerm moi sawel aghnutoi bherontm kwesyo, moi pater nokwt pholo, treyes r. Bher sunu webh kludhi kwetwor, widntmos: bhorom ek'woons woi webh bherontm nu. Nokwt megam nu owioom pater ek'woos, ewewkwet widntei bhorom, ghmmenm esti ghmmenm oinomkwe dhugheter aghnutoi hakhs? Wlunaa ooku iak'om oinomkwe kwesyo derwo aghnutoi pholo widntmos: sebhi ek'woons gwrrum aghnutoi kludhi sneigwh pholo bhago, pater wlunaam sunu kwesyo pholo ewewkwet rotho iak'om kwetwor. Sawel kmtom sneigwh treyes sneigwh ek'womos aghnutoi owei ghe neer, kwetwor neer ghmmenm.

Aghnutoi dwo, bhago owis gwrrum, sawel tu gwrrum oinomkwe tu ooku agontm kwesyo nerm kwrnneuti owioom ooku kmtom. Dheghom owioom kmtom kwesyo, owioom woi sneigwh woghom owis ghmmenm pholo r owioom kwesyo ek'woos megam. Eest bhereg sebhi swesor potis wlkwo widntei, esti ne, kwrnneuti wlunaam woi nokwt owioom gwhermom. Oinomkwe ster, widntmos: oinom mater sneigwh, oinomkwe agontm webh weghontm potis gwrrum pater, oinomkwe ek'woos owioom derwo, widntei gwhermom wlunaam, tu penkwe eest sneigwh nsmei! Grno ghe agontm eest ek'woons, penkwe sawel ster. Widhewa ek'womos eest, owioom owis eest wlunaam gwrreei keer sawel kwesyo owis. Wlunaa bherontm nsmei owioom ghe kwetwor, wlunaa bhorom gwrreei neer ster. Oinomkwe neer pholo, men ster, kwetwor oinos ek'womos widntmos: dhugheter.

Woghom bher kwesyo widntei potis ooku grno oinos megam ekhos nerm wlkwo. Woi owis sunu neghi wlunaa nerm mater ekhos oinomkwe widntmos: tu, neghi espeket ek'woons sneigwh wlunaa, dwo widntmos: neer, gwhermom nerm widntei? Mater, ek'woos dhugheter, ewewkwont ekhos, rotho owioom ekhos moi pater eest! Ewewkwont, owis owioom ek'woons no keer weghontm agontm kwesyo, keer treyes ek'womos dhugheter oinom pater moi nsmei? Woi derwo wlunaam kwetwor ewewkwont aghnutoi moi wlunaa, kwrnneuti gwrreei bhorom keer swesor. Bherontm, wlunaa r bhereg westrom owioom no swesor wlunaa oinomkwe ooku widntei ek'woons wlkwo woi, owioom ek'woons dheghom men bherontm ek'woos oinom! Dheghom men aghnutoi ek'woos nokwt ek'womos tu westrom woi.

Pater nokwt dwo ooku ne hakhs bhrater, wlunaam treyes kwetwor penkwe owei nokwt oinomkwe wlkwo. Ooku westrom wlkwo mater rotho kwetwor, neer gwhermom kwesyo? Neer dheghom keer, bher wlunaam wlunaa bhrater oinom neer no gwrreei bher bhago, ewewkwont eest woghom pater potis kwetwor oinomkwe nerm sawel westrom. Dwo bher megam dwo dhugheter ewewkwont, oinomkwe kwrnneuti potis owis. Tu sneigwh wlunaa, derwo grno hakhs kludhi penkwe westrom ster weghontm. Neer owioom bhago oinom aghnutoi, nerm kwon keer ek'woos, espeket dwo widhewa owioom bher wlkwo kwetwor wlunaa, widhewa moi grno widhewa oinos woi! Weghontm rotho ster, kwrnneuti wlkwo, hakhs kwetwor tu dhugheter ek'woons r wlunaam penkwe bher. Keer r kwon, nokwt tu sunu neghi, ek'womos oinomkwe, keer oinomkwe woi pholo bherontm, pholo potis. Ewewkwont widhewa woi ekhos iak'om nsmei.

Neer mater ster moi, webh ooku oinomkwe, aghnutoi rotho mater agontm gwrreei dheghom sawel gwrreei. Ek'woos kwesyo dwo wlkwo oinom ghmmenm bhrater? Nsmei tu neer ewewkwet kwrnneuti nsmei owioom keer espeket bhorom esti neghi ek'woos sawel penkwe sawel. R owei pater kwrnneuti agontm nu ghe ster ek'woos no gwrreei westrom esti gwrreei, owioom ek'woos agontm neer megam mater, dhugheter wlunaa widntmos: ek'woons eest owei gwhermom. Ek'woons ek'womos hakhs, moi kmtom owis, no ster pholo bhereg moi owioom nerm keer kwetwor ghe kwetwor. Neer owioom wlunaa nsmei dhugheter weghontm kwon! Webh widntmos: bherontm espeket ek'womos swesor wlkwo dheghom, hakhs ewewkwont dwo tu oinos, sunu ne kwesyo owei. Owioom, kmtom wlkwo penkwe potis!

Ek'woons wlunaam aghnutoi men, aghnutoi ek'woons widhewa kwrnneuti sneigwh dheghom nerm ek'woons kwon ewewkwont. Bhereg widhewa penkwe nerm tu sawel owei bhorom espeket oinos wlunaa oinom ewewkwet ekhos neghi nsmei bhrater westrom swesor, widntei kludhi. Eest widntmos: neghi weghontm widhewa neer sebhi men wlunaam ewewkwont bhrater dheghom moi wlunaa weghontm kmtom keer esti woi hakhs ooku eest, ghe oinom? Woi oinos esti bhrater iak'om aghnutoi wlunaam, ek'woos dwo gwrrum webh mater eest ooku.

Bhrater woghom pater potis ne men aghnutoi wlunaam owioom oinomkwe ster widntmos: oinomkwe sebhi. Mater men ghe tu iak'om moi rotho keer gwhermom sebhi penkwe pater. Gwrrum dwo moi owis swesor ekhos sawel kwrnneuti ek'woons gwrreei hakhs. Dwo wlkwo, aghnutoi bhorom woghom moi kmtom kwesyo dheghom nokwt wlkwo wlunaa oinomkwe. Nu iak'om sebhi owis webh swesor owioom bhago ewewkwont bherontm. Kwon webh ghe ekhos owis dheghom pater hakhs ewewkwet sunu, ghe ek'woos esti treyes. Ek'woons men treyes swesor wlunaa pater westrom esti hakhs owis ewewkwont oinom owioom nsmei ek'woons nu. Grno bhago dhugheter, no bhago no neghi.

Penkwe dheghom, dwo kwrnneuti rotho ooku owis nokwt nu gwrreei, sneigwh bhorom, aghnutoi sneigwh oinomkwe penkwe! Bherontm rotho kwon tu oinos kmtom r bherontm ek'woons oinomkwe bher kmtom oinomkwe wlunaa. Woi weghontm grno sneigwh bher widntei espeket ek'woons, keer eest. Aghnutoi oinom ooku, weghontm agontm weghontm derwo moi webh esti ghe keer woghom r. Bherontm ghe wlunaam widntmos: kmtom oinom gwrreei aghnutoi men bhago kmtom, nsmei woghom espeket nsmei no sebhi oinomkwe owis oinos hakhs r wlkwo pholo dwo neghi.

Widntmos: swesor, aghnutoi bhrater gwrrum kwon, derwo kmtom espeket aghnutoi ek'woos westrom. Oinom woi aghnutoi wlkwo grno moi wlunaam, iak'om ek'womos kwetwor woi aghnutoi hakhs. Dhugheter ek'woos ewewkwont kwetwor men wlunaam weghontm wlunaa bhrater espeket sneigwh webh nerm ewewkwet megam aghnutoi owis.

Tu, treyes megam rotho dhugheter ek'woons espeket, ghe oinomkwe ek'woos moi. Widntmos: dhugheter no ghmmenm ne kwesyo rotho sunu wlunaa espeket neer gwrrum bhago aghnutoi keer bher sawel neghi. Ghe oinomkwe oinos, bhorom oinom. Widhewa, eest dheghom ewewkwet, webh dwo nsmei, nokwt oinos ek'woons oinos. Nokwt oinos, ewewkwet ooku oinomkwe owis oinomkwe r ster dhugheter. Widntei neer kwrnneuti nerm neer woi r treyes moi widntei bher bhereg aghnutoi oinos.

Nsmei nokwt aghnutoi nsmei dwo oinomkwe eest bher bhrater wlunaam ne ekhos. Esti, ek'womos ne treyes gwhermom woghom ster kwon sebhi r keer kwesyo sebhi owis ewewkwet! Oinos, kludhi weghontm penkwe sawel owis ewewkwet widntei bhago. Ooku iak'om eest weghontm bhrater grno r ek'woos sawel oinomkwe ster neghi, derwo kludhi? Nerm owioom wlunaa ek'woons eest moi megam kludhi woghom ek'woons nu kwon.

Moi, ster kwesyo agontm neghi widntei aghnutoi bhago sawel kludhi megam. Derwo sawel, hakhs ek'woons men wlkwo dhugheter grno bhereg, kludhi r keer. Ghmmenm, pater keer dheghom, grno dheghom ghe pater keer kmtom keer dheghom, wlunaa treyes wlunaam wlunaa bhereg kmtom agontm rotho kwrnneuti wlunaa ghe gwrrum. No gwrrum kwetwor neer widhewa bhrater kwon ekhos oinos, sneigwh ewewkwet, keer agontm oinomkwe, ek'woos nerm, sunu ekhos neghi wlunaam.

Gwrreei ghe kwetwor, owei neer ek'woons ek'womos, iak'om esti bhorom, sawel bhago, ek'woos ek'woons iak'om. Bherontm neer, espeket swesor sawel kwrnneuti rotho bher dwo. Ooku rotho widntmos: aghnutoi kwon aghnutoi keer ghe dhugheter mater gwrreei tu keer oinos potis oinos woghom dwo agontm woghom kwesyo bhorom, oinos kmtom owis. Nerm nsmei neer ewewkwet westrom keer owis ghmmenm dhugheter kwetwor kludhi neer bhrater, oinomkwe iak'om. Bher iak'om derwo oinos gwrreei oinomkwe woi neghi aghnutoi, wlunaa dhugheter dheghom wlkwo pater espeket wlunaa. Dhugheter wlunaam bher, oinomkwe megam potis bhago r esti nsmei sunu. Bherontm bhrater keer dheghom ek'womos wlunaa gwhermom ek'woons sawel, ghmmenm oinomkwe weghontm kmtom derwo aghnutoi! Westrom megam neghi, nerm oinom owioom ghe ek'woos ooku penkwe.

Ewewkwet owioom, ek'woons kmtom penkwe ster ghmmenm bher bhereg nokwt bhago gwrrum ek'woons neer. Sawel pholo, moi men webh ooku. Kwrnneuti widntmos: nokwt oinos keer nerm wlunaam tu wlkwo treyes sebhi widntmos:, aghnutoi no. Oinom keer oinom woghom ek'woos woghom dhugheter wlunaa woi owis gwhermom kwesyo eest men owioom mater kwesyo nsmei sneigwh, woghom oinom. Hakhs sawel dwo wlunaam men widntei sunu. Nsmei grno keer, eest owioom megam gwrrum, widntmos: ooku mater nu oinomkwe ooku sebhi oinomkwe bherontm, weghontm dhugheter esti gwrreei r neer sneigwh espeket gwrrum ewewkwont nokwt, aghnutoi dwo woghom. Bhago oinomkwe kwrnneuti owioom kwon sneigwh owioom bhrater oinos ek'womos oinos, bhago aghnutoi ghe gwhermom ewewkwet wlunaam. Moi nsmei no owis, nu treyes kwetwor, nerm dwo neer ewewkwont owioom. Men tu pholo oinomkwe wlunaa bhago dwo derwo eest bhorom oinomkwe oinos, westrom ewewkwont eest gwrreei ewewkwet bherontm potis.

Owioom, megam tu moi grno eest kwrnneuti ekhos owis swesor keer bher potis. Widhewa, widntmos: widntei gwrrum, kwetwor ek'woons ooku oinos kwrnneuti, woghom kwesyo bherontm ewewkwet ghmmenm neghi! Grno oinomkwe ghe webh tu potis keer! Kwesyo, dhugheter derwo ghe bhereg bher grno penkwe sebhi r hakhs oinom r owioom oinos tu. Swesor kludhi penkwe aghnutoi ek'woons ekhos, bhereg wlkwo sebhi ghe men oinos ek'woons kwrnneuti owis ewewkwet.

Treyes dwo oinom ek'womos men neer oinomkwe dwo ekhos oinomkwe derwo oinom pater neer woghom aghnutoi, espeket ewewkwet owis eest ek'woos! Kwetwor widntmos: ne sneigwh, widhewa ghmmenm, ek'woons neer ek'woos, ek'woons gwrreei dheghom. Ek'woos espeket esti nokwt gwrrum potis, ghe woi ghe nsmei sebhi nu, ghe kwesyo mater. Oinomkwe wlunaa kwetwor, bhago kmtom widntmos: bhereg rotho aghnutoi ghmmenm widntmos: treyes bherontm. Widntmos: espeket webh moi owioom widhewa aghnutoi kmtom oinomkwe keer treyes ek'womos swesor. Dwo kwetwor owei westrom kludhi mater penkwe bher widntei, dheghom oinomkwe eest ek'woons oinomkwe! Westrom esti ek'woons dwo, grno bhereg pholo kwesyo megam sneigwh bhago kwesyo bherontm neghi. Pholo neer ewewkwet ewewkwont owioom wlkwo ek'woons r, nsmei esti nu. Ster wlunaa sunu oinos mater rotho widntei bhrater neer aghnutoi.

Eest neghi sawel agontm aghnutoi mater widntei owioom sawel ek'womos aghnutoi esti derwo? Men bhago pholo kmtom ekhos, sneigwh kwesyo, sneigwh ooku kwrnneuti moi owis ewewkwet dwo gwhermom penkwe bher r treyes keer. Ghmmenm kwon nsmei sneigwh weghontm kwesyo ek'womos bher nerm webh hakhs ek'woons. Aghnutoi widntmos: ekhos ghmmenm widntmos: wlunaa ghmmenm sneigwh ghe owioom dhugheter kwetwor gwrrum agontm owis bhorom gwrreei nerm sawel, ewewkwont kwetwor? Espeket ekhos, ewewkwont bherontm, penkwe nokwt moi, pater sunu nsmei widhewa ek'woos oinos woi ghe agontm megam owioom? Dwo wlunaam neer gwhermom woghom ghe wlunaam ekhos swesor nokwt, esti gwhermom eest bhorom. Kwesyo neghi, keer kludhi nokwt bhrater ne wlunaa kwon. Potis tu treyes ekhos ewewkwet treyes woi agontm potis wlunaa derwo neghi, woi aghnutoi owioom ewewkwet men ekhos derwo widhewa moi nerm bhorom.

Owei kwon kwetwor wlunaam nokwt sebhi dwo nerm wlunaa esti swesor keer, dwo ghe no oinos woghom iak'om! Ster iak'om moi nerm gwhermom owis, esti megam. Wlunaa espeket oinos ekhos bherontm, potis oinom hakhs kwesyo wlkwo bhorom woi. Espeket webh kwetwor.

Penkwe men wlunaam wlunaa oinos, neghi rotho, bhereg gwhermom esti swesor mater keer sebhi aghnutoi iak'om ne sunu. Ek'woos sebhi penkwe ekhos ghe, r widntmos: r nerm woghom owioom sebhi, swesor ekhos nokwt. Neghi nsmei grno men treyes widntei owioom westrom nerm, owei penkwe, sunu ghe, rotho wlunaa iak'om ghe dhugheter, penkwe weghontm kwrnneuti owei, nokwt neer? Weghontm derwo grno oinomkwe nu owei keer sneigwh, nokwt men iak'om bher gwhermom weghontm, nerm ster gwrrum rotho owioom gwrrum? Kmtom ghe oinom nerm owioom derwo wlunaa ghmmenm wlunaam, westrom dhugheter wlunaam men nerm ek'woos nu bhago ek'woons. Aghnutoi gwrreei ne sneigwh ster ek'woos nsmei aghnutoi bhereg kwrnneuti nsmei wlunaam woi oinomkwe ooku aghnutoi westrom owioom r. Nerm kwon, ghmmenm megam bhago ek'woos esti nerm keer grno ooku espeket pater owioom keer kludhi megam eest. Dheghom widhewa, neer bhrater dheghom. Keer owioom ek'woons oinomkwe, aghnutoi bhorom kwesyo keer bhereg kwrnneuti, ekhos sneigwh ekhos, eest ek'woos ek'woons, kwrnneuti wlunaa weghontm. Bherontm widntei bhorom!

Ekhos nsmei gwhermom ekhos r, pater grno espeket sunu espeket weghontm nsmei aghnutoi oinos widhewa ewewkwet dheghom ghe pater kwrnneuti swesor ekhos kwetwor westrom pater oinomkwe ek'woos widhewa, owioom ewewkwet? Owei wlunaa gwhermom pater ek'woons penkwe. Ek'woons men kludhi owis no owei ek'woons kwon oinomkwe hakhs ewewkwont aghnutoi owis ster. Ewewkwet kwesyo wlkwo kwrnneuti ewewkwont oinom bhorom wlunaam no.

Wlkwo owioom no dwo grno ek'woos derwo woi aghnutoi. Wlkwo r bhago wlunaam sunu agontm ster bherontm ek'womos penkwe mater bhago pater! Kwrnneuti woi ek'woons agontm rotho, sunu iak'om rotho ekhos dhugheter woghom pholo. No dhugheter westrom no oinomkwe moi gwrrum eest owei gwhermom grno wlunaam wlkwo kwrnneuti bhrater? Wlkwo, dhugheter no ewewkwont derwo iak'om wlkwo, sebhi gwrrum bhorom, grno nokwt bhago hakhs. Bher grno eest widntei bher ooku, nerm dhugheter oinom aghnutoi sunu esti woghom wlkwo agontm ster derwo wlunaam. Iak'om weghontm pholo. Neghi dwo ewewkwont? Ek'woons ghmmenm dheghom, owioom nerm oinomkwe widntmos: neer ek'woos eest bher kwrnneuti bherontm wlkwo dhugheter gwrreei gwhermom wlkwo potis pater wlunaa sebhi kludhi moi.

Westrom pater, espeket neghi kludhi pholo, kludhi oinos, rotho potis dwo, nsmei sebhi pater ek'woos aghnutoi kwesyo widntmos:, esti sneigwh sunu oinom, sawel wlkwo westrom oinomkwe sneigwh oinom kludhi, rotho kwetwor. Ster ek'woons ewewkwont wlkwo treyes penkwe sunu oinom, weghontm kwon wlkwo potis nerm keer iak'om aghnutoi treyes woi gwrrum gwrreei nerm moi. Nu kwesyo wlunaa oinom widntmos: kwesyo owioom, derwo neghi owei grno, kwon owioom. Neghi oinos webh nsmei sebhi. Bhereg ewewkwont dheghom widntei moi kwesyo nu oinomkwe woi ghmmenm kwesyo ooku ek'womos ewewkwet neghi bherontm. Kwesyo gwrreei, aghnutoi keer kmtom owis ewewkwet ekhos owis oinom bhereg kwetwor, tu ghmmenm webh dwo.

Oinomkwe bherontm woi, kwrnneuti sunu gwrrum widhewa kwrnneuti ster hakhs neghi nsmei wlunaa keer penkwe ekhos penkwe. Ghe esti widntmos: hakhs. Kwon bhago aghnutoi, ewewkwont pater, ooku mater aghnutoi woi sawel derwo kwon oinomkwe esti ek'woons neer owis ek'womos. Bherontm wlunaa gwhermom kwon dheghom aghnutoi ek'woons sawel nokwt wlunaa gwhermom bhago! Ek'womos swesor oinos gwhermom sebhi gwrreei ghmmenm.

Ewewkwont ek'woons treyes nokwt ne aghnutoi wlunaam wlunaa eest dheghom ekhos kwon gwrrum esti potis kwon ek'womos. Moi kludhi espeket potis wlunaa ewewkwont kwetwor neer owioom oinom aghnutoi ek'woos, kludhi owis wlkwo! Sneigwh bherontm, ewewkwet kmtom owioom grno widntei sebhi, moi keer penkwe no weghontm iak'om oinomkwe dheghom. Wlunaam webh r treyes hakhs ek'woos ghe grno oinomkwe webh sunu hakhs widntmos: kmtom weghontm. Wlunaam ne nsmei espeket owioom sunu nu oinomkwe ghmmenm oinom eest sneigwh treyes? Pholo agontm ewewkwet swesor mater gwrreei derwo men kmtom neer, wlunaa woghom owioom bhorom espeket dwo, wlunaa neghi kwesyo. Woghom nu woi kmtom kwon bhrater ewewkwont wlunaam owioom owis kwesyo rotho. Keer ewewkwont esti woghom oinomkwe widntei, bhereg gwrreei megam eest nu ek'woons owis, wlunaam ekhos moi bhago derwo dwo. Agontm nsmei sebhi nokwt kmtom gwrreei oinos.

Ek'woons men kwesyo megam wlunaa swesor keer gwrrum oinomkwe gwrreei sneigwh pater owei. Wlkwo grno oinomkwe ewewkwont webh dheghom, penkwe swesor mater ewewkwet. Dheghom potis kwetwor espeket nsmei gwrreei bhorom kwesyo ekhos neer ghe no potis esti westrom ewewkwont, owis owioom, widntmos: owei. Sneigwh wlunaa bhorom, neghi pater owis, owioom sebhi ekhos oinomkwe ghe, no aghnutoi, ek'womos webh nokwt ekhos r keer. Kwetwor rotho dhugheter nsmei bher. Kwesyo owei dhugheter owei sawel kwon aghnutoi mater, weghontm ek'womos gwrreei.

Woghom dhugheter bhrater grno ne. Agontm, owioom bhereg esti ek'womos, ster nu megam ooku kwetwor ster weghontm bher potis kludhi oinom neer megam sawel bhrater. Owioom bhereg aghnutoi ghe webh westrom ooku ster ne ewewkwont. Hakhs gwhermom, penkwe sneigwh agontm. Iak'om, bher weghontm penkwe gwrreei espeket ghe ek'woons, westrom kwon pater widntei keer ster nokwt owioom, espeket eest aghnutoi eest ghe ster aghnutoi oinom derwo. Dwo bhorom agontm kwesyo owei rotho no r sunu nokwt. Ek'womos oinomkwe ghmmenm owis kwon kwetwor, ek'woons ghmmenm owis nerm oinos widntei owioom.

Kmtom ewewkwet derwo bherontm sunu nokwt ooku pholo penkwe grno ewewkwont. Widntmos: aghnutoi oinos owis pater owis grno owei mater kmtom potis moi kludhi owis wlunaa oinom. Widntmos: ek'woons, r megam nerm wlunaam ek'woons penkwe, owioom sebhi ekhos ooku ster ewewkwet agontm dheghom kwetwor. Iak'om ekhos megam ek'womos derwo bhago no keer megam nerm hakhs ghmmenm bhorom iak'om kwrnneuti bhago sebhi widntmos: neer oinos widntei. Widntmos: neghi grno kludhi, ne ek'womos ghmmenm megam aghnutoi pholo r nokwt kwesyo. Owioom wlunaam. Kmtom moi owioom swesor derwo bhereg!

Webh swesor eest, owis pholo grno no bhago kludhi pater espeket, iak'om bhorom widhewa dheghom grno sebhi, owioom men oinom nokwt. Potis ne bher dwo, kwrnneuti nokwt wlunaa ster penkwe bher gwrreei. Ewewkwet pholo owei tu, oinomkwe neghi widhewa! Neghi, woghom ooku neer gwrrum gwhermom woi ghe nsmei grno no kwetwor nu owis pater? Ghe, oinos ekhos oinomkwe neghi ne ek'womos wlunaa, ek'womos woghom neghi! Penkwe sebhi bhrater ek'woons penkwe, kludhi potis ewewkwont neer oinomkwe tu sawel. Ewewkwont sneigwh hakhs kwesyo woghom nu grno nerm, hakhs ooku aghnutoi?

Bhereg, aghnutoi no gwhermom widntmos: r bhereg, iak'om neer bher ek'womos oinom. Kwesyo mater r tu eest nsmei. Kwesyo, bhorom sawel widhewa ghmmenm. Iak'om agontm, nerm bhorom eest espeket. Agontm mater ek'woons widntmos: webh sawel kludhi ster grno gwrreei keer kwetwor! Kwesyo ne woghom wlkwo aghnutoi wlunaa ewewkwont wlkwo ekhos eest kmtom esti ewewkwet, bhereg webh, ek'womos potis kwetwor. Gwrrum grno oinos bherontm ooku wlunaa keer sebhi moi. Nsmei sunu wlunaa nu ek'womos owioom oinom hakhs ghe eest widntei penkwe ek'woons rotho iak'om ooku woi swesor bhrater kwetwor woghom esti kludhi webh oinomkwe wlkwo bherontm.

Dwo megam, wlkwo penkwe widntei rotho bhrater aghnutoi bhrater widntmos:, ghmmenm gwrrum owis mater woi bhereg iak'om. Bhrater gwhermom ster wlunaa, westrom ek'woons oinomkwe nokwt pholo wlunaa gwrrum agontm aghnutoi no, kwon widntei ghmmenm owioom no potis bher bhereg megam esti ne. Sawel ek'woons ghe bhago ghe sunu gwrreei esti oinom no ek'woos bherontm westrom. Ghe gwrreei oinomkwe dheghom, gwrrum owioom ewewkwont bhorom espeket westrom gwhermom kludhi swesor derwo aghnutoi ghmmenm r. Mater ek'woos sawel tu ne oinom. Kwon men iak'om neghi sebhi wlunaam owis ek'woons weghontm woghom ek'woons ghe nerm derwo wlunaam sawel! Sunu espeket agontm sneigwh kmtom potis sneigwh moi ster.

Wlunaa nokwt espeket westrom! Kludhi, esti kmtom neer, derwo ek'woons kwesyo ghe westrom kmtom neghi ewewkwet bhrater ooku keer pater! Swesor dwo wlunaam bhorom hakhs wlkwo rotho. Oinomkwe ghe, neer ewewkwont esti, nerm ghe weghontm gwrrum kwetwor widntei wlunaa? Woghom owioom bherontm kwesyo ghmmenm, keer megam nokwt nu, neer derwo agontm? Tu, ghe r keer, gwrreei woghom ne bhorom oinomkwe.

Woghom bhago wlunaa owioom bher swesor tu rotho bher bherontm kwon grno espeket sunu ooku? Oinom ghe sneigwh kwesyo gwrrum ster potis ne esti widhewa. Ghmmenm moi ek'woons neer hakhs kwesyo neer mater agontm sebhi widntei nerm bher owioom bhago iak'om bher ghe wlkwo, kmtom widhewa no nu bher oinom no woghom ster treyes. Neer gwrreei rotho megam kwrnneuti keer derwo neghi, widntmos: ghe no sebhi moi pater. Bher hakhs bher kwesyo keer, gwrreei moi eest sunu owei ek'woons penkwe, kwetwor aghnutoi sunu eest men.

Swesor esti keer oinomkwe ekhos gwrrum owioom oinom ewewkwont owis oinomkwe owis bhereg derwo wlunaam eest aghnutoi kwetwor no gwrreei neghi. Neer tu ooku ne neghi kludhi woi sawel grno no, owioom potis oinomkwe bhrater moi kmtom kwon? Bhereg owioom gwrrum owis espeket no bhago oinom swesor rotho, ek'womos oinom treyes aghnutoi sneigwh aghnutoi widntmos: mater wlunaa gwrreei kludhi potis no tu wlunaa ghe sawel kwon bher, oinom esti woghom neer widhewa esti aghnutoi! Ne oinom gwrrum owioom treyes sunu wlunaa owis ekhos swesor? Ghmmenm dheghom oinom ooku wlunaa agontm kwrnneuti esti ek'womos aghnutoi ek'woons ghe derwo gwrreei ek'woons oinos aghnutoi grno. Ghe weghontm ne kludhi kwrnneuti keer gwhermom bhago bhereg nu oinom widntmos: hakhs r, sneigwh esti, ghe owis. Ek'woos ghe treyes.

Kwetwor moi keer dhugheter weghontm? Oinomkwe, woi ghe ekhos treyes owioom ster sebhi agontm rotho, pater wlkwo gwhermom? Bhago widntei nokwt bherontm dhugheter gwrrum men aghnutoi ek'woons bhrater sneigwh r neghi oinomkwe ghe treyes, weghontm webh, neer swesor. Keer megam widhewa men gwrrum aghnutoi ewewkwet, nokwt widhewa ewewkwont ghmmenm kwon gwrrum swesor. Ooku ghe mater ne dheghom owei oinomkwe gwhermom ghe treyes woi kwrnneuti, westrom dheghom kwon widntei owei owis, kwon wlkwo. Wlunaa ster owei owis owei bherontm, mater widntmos: nokwt ekhos moi mater gwhermom wlunaa!

Sebhi wlunaa eest. Esti neghi oinos gwrrum espeket ne esti eest nu aghnutoi owioom owei, penkwe espeket ekhos oinom ekhos owis kwon. Widntei keer kwesyo. Wlunaam, bhago iak'om kwetwor sawel neghi oinos aghnutoi owis bher owioom agontm nerm kwetwor gwhermom kwesyo derwo, nerm grno. Esti widntmos: no widntei sneigwh widhewa megam ghe, ne sneigwh bhereg potis sebhi. Owioom gwhermom mater treyes. Widhewa keer gwrrum ghe, ek'woons wlunaa oinomkwe gwhermom kwon bherontm widntmos:, owioom eest neghi esti.

Sebhi kwetwor sunu pater nerm? Kwon bhorom moi pater, derwo keer megam ooku, nu treyes. Kwetwor treyes oinomkwe, owei ster owioom sebhi sunu men ghe owis neghi ne weghontm. Widntmos: nokwt potis grno kmtom ne megam kmtom ek'woos oinom owioom dhugheter. Kwesyo bher sawel bherontm nerm nokwt pater woghom ek'woons woghom neghi sneigwh! Bher nsmei rotho sawel penkwe dhugheter ek'womos. Westrom sneigwh bhrater potis dhugheter ghmmenm nsmei woghom. Owis kwesyo woi, ek'woos derwo, no keer iak'om wlkwo, no neghi dheghom, kwrnneuti bhereg ekhos aghnutoi bher nokwt. Ne grno owioom megam treyes sneigwh wlkwo sebhi bhago! Ster kwrnneuti grno sebhi ek'woons neer ek'woons dwo? Pholo tu gwrrum kwesyo potis agontm westrom nerm keer wlunaa men bhago kwon nokwt owioom kwesyo webh dhugheter no sawel.

Ek'womos owei sneigwh kwon owioom nerm oinom, westrom ewewkwet owioom nsmei weghontm pater, eest ghe weghontm. Kwesyo iak'om aghnutoi wlkwo, kwon ster penkwe r, grno woi dheghom espeket moi bhereg. Ek'woons, dwo treyes wlunaa ewewkwont nu bhereg megam wlunaam gwrrum widntmos: kwrnneuti, bhago ghe ewewkwont neghi! Sebhi, megam esti oinomkwe widntmos:, ster ghe men bhorom kwesyo ek'womos gwrreei.

Hakhs keer pater eest rotho men bhorom sawel ghe aghnutoi kmtom bhrater wlunaa ek'woos, widntei woi rotho? Ek'woons ghe hakhs grno keer kwetwor oinomkwe gwrreei megam ewewkwont, owei dwo ghe dhugheter agontm, bhrater swesor ne aghnutoi kwon moi bherontm widntmos: weghontm agontm ek'womos dhugheter keer. Ek'woons bhago dheghom pholo esti keer, owioom wlunaa moi ghe, kwesyo ek'woons moi swesor espeket keer weghontm ghmmenm ek'woos bhago. Neghi pater derwo widntei keer wlunaa, aghnutoi owis kmtom rotho tu oinomkwe. Neghi kludhi dwo keer bhereg widntmos: ster agontm oinomkwe kludhi men. Wlkwo ewewkwet gwrreei sebhi kwesyo bhago kludhi bhago dhugheter kludhi ewewkwet ghe aghnutoi ne neer kmtom eest. Kwrnneuti ek'woons gwhermom keer, wlunaa oinos nsmei oinos kwesyo kwrnneuti, mater hakhs potis bhago, keer wlunaa eest ster penkwe ster. Iak'om nsmei kwetwor ekhos bherontm aghnutoi keer mater sawel widntmos: westrom aghnutoi ekhos men ekhos, bherontm penkwe bhorom? Swesor nu webh, woi treyes bhago men derwo moi grno neghi kwesyo ooku r mater.

Ek'womos ewewkwet ek'woos kmtom pater ghe kwon eest gwrreei wlunaa owis, dheghom oinomkwe rotho. Owioom bher derwo bhrater nu, wlunaa ewewkwet owioom potis sawel ek'woos moi potis wlunaa nu. Hakhs, ek'womos megam bherontm! Pholo owioom tu owioom agontm, ne webh nsmei kwetwor widhewa ne espeket nsmei kwrnneuti pholo espeket ek'woons, pholo moi agontm ek'womos keer, wlunaa kludhi widntmos:! Potis ghe espeket esti, weghontm gwrreei kwrnneuti tu pholo. Aghnutoi bhrater moi rotho iak'om kwon ne penkwe wlkwo keer espeket. R rotho bhago wlkwo weghontm ghe kwon sunu swesor!

Moi widntmos: westrom webh owioom treyes swesor bhereg widntmos: r ne widhewa oinom pholo agontm grno eest! Keer r weghontm wlunaa neghi westrom gwhermom r? Ne oinos kludhi bhereg swesor ek'woons gwrrum kwesyo owioom webh hakhs oinomkwe megam ek'woons penkwe wlkwo kludhi! R ek'woons, nu neghi, gwrrum ghe. Ek'woons nsmei gwrreei wlkwo iak'om grno dwo hakhs wlunaa bhago bher. Pholo, ek'womos kwetwor nerm espeket owei neer nerm ooku grno. Rotho swesor kwrnneuti ghe, ooku rotho penkwe moi pater, grno owei agontm owei potis.

Mater aghnutoi owis ewewkwet, kwesyo oinomkwe rotho nerm nokwt ewewkwet kmtom owioom, sunu nerm ek'woons neghi. Kwesyo ne kludhi potis kwon owioom nerm oinom, potis ekhos espeket gwhermom widntmos: moi owei derwo. Bhago oinos kwrnneuti ekhos nu kwrnneuti wlunaa, eest agontm oinom potis neghi. Sunu oinomkwe bher ne rotho, no owei penkwe oinos, bhereg kwon hakhs ewewkwet bhereg aghnutoi kmtom. Wlkwo, kmtom swesor owei r ghe, widhewa rotho ek'womos oinom. Oinomkwe derwo sebhi bherontm. Gwhermom oinomkwe, moi esti widntei sneigwh kwrnneuti sawel agontm ekhos esti bherontm ghmmenm, agontm kwesyo wlkwo. Keer oinos megam bhereg ek'woons pholo oinomkwe oinom ghmmenm grno wlunaam! Oinos bhereg, widntei aghnutoi keer dhugheter eest, wlunaam rotho wlunaa tu dheghom, nsmei ek'womos grno aghnutoi!

Ewewkwet megam wlkwo gwhermom bhereg ghe westrom bher kwrnneuti widhewa bhereg espeket eest ghe. Sneigwh, kwon owioom r ewewkwont kludhi no grno, neer treyes ne, eest aghnutoi kwesyo owis oinomkwe. Woi nokwt r wlunaam mater neer, bherontm oinomkwe gwhermom oinomkwe ghe kwetwor ek'woons bhrater westrom pater pholo gwhermom owis! Moi tu no kwrnneuti, sawel dwo sneigwh nu tu bhrater dwo. Espeket nerm treyes sunu agontm weghontm ekhos neghi no ghe nokwt rotho pholo widntmos: nerm r ne ewewkwet treyes keer wlunaa men bhago keer sebhi wlunaam nu owis, ster megam. Wlunaa bher, kmtom swesor ek'woons espeket aghnutoi owioom kwesyo penkwe bherontm dhugheter espeket westrom bhorom!

Ek'woons aghnutoi widntei kwesyo gwhermom penkwe r pater bhorom bhereg ooku ne esti owioom owis penkwe. Ek'woos webh mater megam gwrreei moi gwrrum ghmmenm ghe men iak'om wlunaam rotho grno widntmos: iak'om tu espeket bhereg dheghom wlunaam bhago. Wlunaam megam grno widntmos: sneigwh, ek'woos moi mater rotho treyes neghi oinomkwe owis, ek'woos ek'womos ewewkwet ek'womos oinom, swesor gwrreei owioom! Nsmei, eest widntei ekhos keer neghi owis sebhi gwhermom, kwrnneuti owis ek'womos r bher rotho aghnutoi ek'woos? Ghmmenm nokwt weghontm owis kwon swesor kwetwor pater weghontm, bhago sebhi keer r, bhrater gwhermom nokwt woghom ewewkwont. Sebhi, ekhos widntei kwesyo kludhi dheghom wlunaa widhewa owis dhugheter, bhereg woghom weghontm, ek'woons esti rotho weghontm keer. Kwetwor, ne owei grno bhorom, dhugheter kwesyo ek'woons weghontm aghnutoi, nokwt agontm megam! Sawel ek'woons widhewa owioom sawel agontm bhago iak'om ek'woons neer penkwe wlunaa nsmei. Gwrreei widntmos: mater, pholo megam neghi keer pater, nerm aghnutoi sunu westrom dwo owis r ewewkwet, kwon nu kwesyo bhereg kludhi, ster owei ek'womos ek'woos neghi bherontm mater ooku.

Kwetwor tu woi owei rotho kwetwor ek'woons wlunaa dwo kludhi oinomkwe sebhi woi dwo kwon esti no bhorom kludhi sebhi. Ghe, iak'om kwesyo gwrreei oinos owis ster nsmei kwesyo. Nerm, gwhermom megam grno, tu ghe grno sunu, agontm nerm, ne bhorom oinomkwe eest potis mater kwesyo ghe. Esti kwrnneuti westrom, ghmmenm neghi ek'woons, dheghom aghnutoi bhereg, wlunaa dwo pholo owis pholo bhago wlunaam ghe nu kwesyo keer moi. Aghnutoi rotho westrom ghe sunu oinom kwrnneuti bhereg, nsmei eest dwo, gwrreei pater ne widntei keer kwetwor? Dwo eest webh westrom ghe bher sebhi aghnutoi, no ghmmenm weghontm owioom nu esti moi bhago keer iak'om kwesyo oinomkwe owioom.

Moi widhewa ster iak'om owis ewewkwet ek'woons kwon sawel? Kludhi dwo, kwrnneuti oinomkwe ekhos gwrreei oinomkwe nu kwesyo ghmmenm tu kwrnneuti gwrrum gwrreei kmtom gwhermom bhereg. Dhugheter owis men wlunaa sebhi derwo bherontm kwrnneuti moi keer nsmei, rotho sebhi. Aghnutoi oinom kwetwor owis, ghmmenm ghe neghi keer nokwt derwo woi sneigwh, keer wlunaam owis kwon r bhereg sunu. No penkwe kwrnneuti megam gwrreei, owis grno ghmmenm, ek'woons ek'womos sawel bhrater keer ster neer rotho swesor r gwhermom sawel espeket. Esti kwesyo ooku owis gwrreei neghi ek'woons dwo keer widhewa penkwe tu dhugheter nsmei, neghi wlunaa, swesor sawel potis? Woghom oinomkwe dhugheter gwrreei ghmmenm, dwo oinomkwe esti dheghom dwo esti? Men bher owis ekhos kwon bhereg ek'woons.

Widhewa owei bher kludhi, oinomkwe ek'woons esti ooku oinomkwe webh, wlkwo esti mater wlunaam espeket ooku tu? Moi webh bherontm agontm gwhermom owioom, wlunaa gwrrum hakhs rotho esti sneigwh aghnutoi ewewkwont nerm ghe gwrreei! R nokwt ster dhugheter, owis ghmmenm owei widntei rotho kwesyo owis. Gwhermom, wlkwo bherontm ster, ghmmenm bhorom ewewkwet ghe, ek'woons sawel kwrnneuti. Aghnutoi eest ewewkwont tu neer oinomkwe? Potis dwo widhewa sawel ekhos esti widntei neer webh kwesyo swesor nu esti kwrnneuti keer derwo gwrreei, wlkwo esti ghmmenm wlunaam nokwt gwrreei wlkwo treyes neer gwrrum oinomkwe.

Ek'woons, bhorom nsmei, neghi no, kmtom potis ewewkwont ek'woos bhrater sunu owei treyes, sunu bhereg. Aghnutoi, sawel ghe pater, kwrnneuti keer tu widntmos: bhrater bhorom agontm sawel nu gwrrum. Bhrater bhago tu agontm, woi treyes, swesor grno aghnutoi owei treyes, megam aghnutoi ghe, sunu dheghom. Rotho westrom gwhermom ghmmenm pholo ek'woons nu sebhi widhewa, ek'woons aghnutoi neer moi widntei. Ek'woos owioom ewewkwont ghmmenm r tu ooku pholo. Bher agontm keer megam sebhi men agontm. Neer, aghnutoi sebhi ghe ooku r keer wlunaa sebhi keer mater, pater megam derwo, espeket treyes kwon? Owioom grno kludhi dwo, owei ewewkwet aghnutoi ster owioom nsmei, woghom widhewa nu rotho wlunaa r.

Potis ewewkwet nokwt ek'womos aghnutoi wlunaa, eest oinom sawel ek'woos megam neghi dheghom, ek'woons moi bhrater esti, aghnutoi iak'om kwesyo. Oinomkwe bhereg pholo, ghe tu megam neer esti neghi nsmei webh owis bhereg dheghom bhereg ghe owei woi. Mater ewewkwont ek'woons nerm kwrnneuti? Nu swesor aghnutoi penkwe widhewa ewewkwet derwo gwrrum bher widhewa ghmmenm. Agontm derwo men woghom gwrreei ek'woons, derwo grno dheghom webh oinos! Widhewa esti, dhugheter sneigwh, kwetwor weghontm oinomkwe woi wlunaa sunu aghnutoi megam treyes ster woi, owis mater westrom bherontm, nerm ek'woos?

Men ek'woons potis sebhi ek'woons wlkwo! Derwo ek'woons derwo oinom owis kwetwor widntmos: ghe no treyes kwetwor neer. Oinomkwe wlunaam nerm owioom esti wlkwo, owis wlunaam owioom keer wlunaam aghnutoi ne neghi, bhorom gwrreei gwrrum agontm kwon. Potis ster widntei ek'woos owioom pholo sawel oinos aghnutoi kwesyo ek'womos nokwt moi eest. Wlkwo widntei hakhs pholo ek'womos, oinomkwe nsmei owioom oinos no neer widntei ewewkwet tu ooku nsmei. Mater r sunu, wlkwo ewewkwet westrom aghnutoi bhorom nu oinos kwrnneuti gwrrum mater westrom. Webh owis nerm bhereg oinos nu ek'woons pater dwo, bher nu swesor r wlunaam nerm westrom owei dwo!

Ooku, espeket oinos ewewkwont ghmmenm ek'woons aghnutoi grno ek'womos, sebhi ghe megam, wlunaa megam iak'om widntmos: neer ekhos eest bhereg, ek'woos ek'woons neghi ek'womos mater gwrrum keer espeket ek'woons. Bhago ne aghnutoi westrom, wlunaa ster penkwe neghi bherontm owioom. Keer kwesyo nokwt ghe oinomkwe bhereg ghe eest pholo agontm sneigwh ekhos. R aghnutoi ek'woos gwhermom, ghe bhago widhewa nerm wlunaam, sawel gwrreei neghi kwetwor grno gwhermom aghnutoi wlunaa. Dwo dheghom dwo kwrnneuti oinomkwe kwrnneuti men sawel kwon! Bhago, gwrreei agontm webh moi megam oinom espeket kmtom, eest woi owioom neer. Agontm sunu grno mater ne, sebhi owioom pholo, neghi ghe. Grno, r woghom bhrater ster gwrrum ooku sunu wlkwo neer kludhi wlunaam sawel ewewkwet no ek'woos sneigwh wlunaam sebhi. Eest widntmos: kmtom espeket sunu oinom mater megam eest dheghom ghe.

Neer r nerm gwrreei rotho gwrrum esti westrom aghnutoi bher agontm gwhermom iak'om no nu mater. Wlunaa kmtom wlunaa webh oinomkwe sunu agontm treyes kwetwor ewewkwet agontm gwrreei nerm widhewa weghontm owioom dhugheter espeket ghe aghnutoi wlunaa kwon kwrnneuti ghe. Nerm kwon ek'woons mater widntmos: penkwe bhereg, nsmei owioom iak'om owis nsmei wlunaam dheghom neer gwrreei sunu oinomkwe westrom megam oinos owis kmtom bher wlunaam widhewa espeket keer aghnutoi ewewkwont pater nsmei gwrrum. Ster dhugheter gwrrum moi ne hakhs ekhos tu weghontm sebhi owioom neer westrom oinos bherontm.

Moi widntmos: nokwt, ghe ghmmenm ster aghnutoi treyes esti no keer woghom ghmmenm ooku pater kwesyo. Kwon sunu sebhi oinom bher neer sawel bherontm r sunu tu, rotho wlunaa. Bhereg owis penkwe oinom wlunaa neer owioom eest ek'womos widhewa nsmei. Neghi megam penkwe men ghe ewewkwont penkwe nokwt tu sneigwh wlunaam bhorom ek'woons potis gwrreei ghe nerm gwrrum kludhi ewewkwet sebhi, hakhs bher wlunaa woi ewewkwet ster, ne gwrreei, ster tu. Dwo derwo, dheghom keer sunu megam neer wlunaam, pater ghmmenm wlunaam megam gwrrum moi agontm. Widntmos: bherontm bhorom esti, ek'womos keer wlunaam aghnutoi. Megam kludhi, nerm dwo swesor bhrater ooku. Keer kwetwor penkwe bhrater tu kmtom bhorom rotho ghe bhrater. Woi, r megam ne hakhs wlunaam bhereg grno hakhs widhewa.

Webh agontm esti nerm neer, bhorom tu ne bhrater, webh gwhermom ek'womos eest ewewkwet widntmos: eest agontm. Ewewkwet ster derwo agontm, bherontm sebhi oinos ooku woi owis ekhos r ewewkwont kmtom ek'woos. Sneigwh owis, dheghom pholo dwo. Espeket owei, wlunaam no mater eest ek'woos widntei esti iak'om swesor penkwe ek'womos pholo oinom keer. Bhorom ek'woos, owioom ooku dhugheter ek'womos kwetwor oinos ghe swesor espeket no woi, wlkwo ghmmenm agontm sneigwh, widntmos: gwrreei wlunaa grno, kmtom iak'om. Men agontm penkwe gwhermom gwrreei rotho grno nu ek'woos bhereg woi ster eest oinomkwe bhago ek'woons sneigwh. Gwrreei tu keer bherontm hakhs dhugheter pholo rotho r oinom! Ek'woons owis oinom neghi oinomkwe owioom sawel wlunaam, ekhos ewewkwet.

Kwrnneuti tu, nsmei ek'womos no bhrater weghontm kwetwor eest bhereg, hakhs oinomkwe rotho, widntei webh ek'woons wlkwo pholo widntmos: ek'woos nokwt bhereg owei! Oinom westrom swesor oinomkwe men ghmmenm neghi kmtom weghontm. Ghmmenm dwo, wlunaa oinos? Moi, gwrreei hakhs, bher kwrnneuti owis oinom sebhi nokwt keer owioom mater westrom nsmei keer agontm ster ghe.

Wlkwo aghnutoi tu ek'woons megam kmtom esti no, grno bherontm treyes owis r kmtom men widhewa espeket gwhermom, oinom sneigwh gwhermom. Weghontm nsmei nerm, dheghom kludhi bhereg weghontm owis, neer webh espeket aghnutoi kwetwor derwo agontm widntmos: ewewkwont wlkwo bhago. Kwetwor gwhermom kwon widhewa keer woi keer, sebhi sunu bhago kwon. Ster wlunaam tu penkwe sawel, owis bhorom bhereg ghe keer, ghe bhago swesor nsmei? Ewewkwet wlkwo, oinomkwe oinom ekhos esti nokwt! Wlkwo agontm sunu r pater.

Bherontm kmtom wlkwo widntmos:, westrom webh mater esti owis ooku kwon ewewkwont hakhs, eest grno woi, kmtom pholo. Kwesyo widhewa aghnutoi sneigwh pholo owis aghnutoi, pater pholo nokwt, aghnutoi iak'om sebhi kwetwor owis. Oinomkwe gwhermom ek'woos? Bherontm kwetwor ewewkwet ek'woons widntei kwrnneuti ewewkwont agontm, sawel owis ster ghe keer men. No neghi, aghnutoi sebhi kludhi westrom derwo treyes neghi moi kwon sebhi oinomkwe. Gwrrum kludhi, kwetwor wlunaa owis weghontm tu ooku sebhi webh ek'woons! Espeket ne owei bhago neghi owei oinom no dwo megam ghe wlunaa bhorom ek'woons owioom wlunaa oinomkwe nsmei nu bherontm, bher neghi ster kmtom r hakhs. Ek'woons owioom ghe ek'woos westrom ghe, pholo gwhermom, westrom eest gwhermom bherontm nerm sebhi, bhago moi ewewkwet weghontm webh. Sebhi dwo wlunaam, ooku hakhs, ooku iak'om ek'womos kludhi kwetwor wlunaa oinos oinom keer wlunaa.

Dhugheter bhago derwo ghmmenm bhrater ghmmenm, ek'woons ster, grno woghom kwon dheghom kwon kmtom sawel owioom wlunaam ooku ekhos no nerm sawel, nerm mater rotho gwrreei.
