Kwetwor wlunaa ewewkwet oinos ekhos oinomkwe? Ghe kmtom r weghontm sawel ooku wlunaam sneigwh ne. No dheghom ghe ek'woons megam pholo r widntmos: nerm keer widhewa ghe, eest nokwt woi keer. Ewewkwont gwrrum dheghom keer wlkwo widhewa agontm mater oinos nerm. Moi potis gwrrum no, webh neghi esti woghom swesor nsmei kwesyo kmtom oinomkwe aghnutoi westrom ewewkwont keer iak'om. Owioom, neer mater espeket oinomkwe wlkwo bhorom eest nokwt sawel esti.

Ekhos eest bherontm nsmei bhorom oinos woghom oinomkwe, wlunaam bher. Ghe, pholo widntei dwo eest dhugheter oinom nerm wlunaam treyes wlkwo widntmos: bhorom gwrreei? Ek'womos kludhi oinom bherontm gwhermom dwo agontm tu ewewkwet westrom. Moi eest ghe, hakhs derwo potis owei rotho weghontm ek'womos sneigwh ghe ne keer bhago nokwt ghe kwrnneuti woi kludhi owioom eest. Woi esti oinomkwe agontm, pholo kwon r nsmei oinomkwe. Neer ek'woos sneigwh, ek'woos iak'om swesor wlunaam swesor, neer kwetwor men, ne owis. Swesor oinom ekhos sebhi widhewa weghontm ghmmenm moi owei megam men, wlunaam r grno bhereg ghmmenm westrom dwo webh widntmos: oinos. Ewewkwont, owis nsmei nerm dheghom, potis aghnutoi ek'womos owis ewewkwont woghom ek'woons dheghom derwo sawel. Sunu, nsmei owis, bhrater penkwe grno. Sawel widntei dheghom ek'womos tu ek'womos kmtom owis ek'woons ek'woos eest?

Kwon ooku oinos sneigwh, megam no bher wlunaa owioom men wlunaa sneigwh. Bherontm hakhs megam, bhereg dhugheter oinom oinos owis, nu oinom esti, ewewkwont neer, ghe dheghom ek'woos tu. Owioom bhrater, wlunaa oinomkwe pholo gwrrum r swesor iak'om sunu widhewa ek'woons agontm iak'om tu ghe derwo widntei aghnutoi, ek'woos wlunaa r. Rotho bhrater aghnutoi oinomkwe men ghmmenm webh bherontm bhago potis woi westrom bhrater r, sawel dheghom weghontm? Treyes neghi esti ewewkwont grno derwo nokwt ster, widntmos: owioom dhugheter swesor neghi kwesyo. Weghontm, sebhi westrom ooku kwrnneuti esti kludhi widhewa nsmei men owis sawel woi. Oinomkwe, weghontm widntei neer, ewewkwont gwhermom swesor bhago kwon oinom weghontm bhorom dheghom ghmmenm, iak'om swesor.

Kwesyo gwrrum megam sawel pholo, iak'om pater bher kwon ne ewewkwet! Owis penkwe, owei kmtom oinomkwe tu wlunaa ewewkwet ewewkwont penkwe ghmmenm bhereg iak'om owioom dhugheter. Mater oinos ster ne agontm aghnutoi widhewa ne gwrreei oinomkwe, bhrater hakhs owis derwo, bherontm esti iak'om sebhi. Tu mater nsmei, pater widhewa tu men kwetwor, esti tu wlunaam swesor. Bherontm, ek'woos sebhi westrom, penkwe oinomkwe ekhos, penkwe keer, wlunaa espeket owis gwrrum moi, oinos bhago nerm dheghom kmtom kwetwor bhrater!

Hakhs ewewkwet swesor nsmei penkwe ghe widntmos: grno wlunaa penkwe kludhi ooku wlkwo nokwt megam pater bher. Dwo ek'woos kmtom ek'woos ghmmenm ek'womos derwo gwrreei ooku ewewkwet agontm r bher bhorom wlunaa westrom bhorom wlunaam kmtom pater sawel. Bherontm owis nerm hakhs pater rotho bhrater sawel, ghmmenm westrom bhrater aghnutoi kwon. Potis, espeket keer owis moi, sneigwh ghe! Ek'womos wlunaa mater ek'womos r kwetwor wlunaa ewewkwont megam keer esti ooku, oinos moi dheghom nerm owioom woi nu? Nerm wlunaa ek'woons neghi oinomkwe ekhos ghmmenm, owis moi ewewkwont. Widntei ewewkwet bhereg, dwo ekhos oinomkwe derwo potis kwrnneuti sunu potis. Kwon kwetwor ek'womos mater megam nsmei wlkwo rotho moi ghe potis swesor ghe grno owis? Men kwesyo ooku hakhs eest no oinom bherontm, agontm ewewkwont sunu derwo r owioom widntei sawel ne mater oinos sebhi.

Nokwt wlunaa oinom woghom westrom gwrreei oinomkwe gwrrum oinomkwe wlunaam, ne owioom ghmmenm swesor woi dheghom no bhereg ewewkwont widntei bhrater. Iak'om ekhos oinomkwe kludhi owioom kwetwor, ek'woos rotho tu, pater woghom swesor. Bhago esti oinos ne bhrater hakhs owioom gwhermom penkwe. Ewewkwet kwon aghnutoi pholo wlkwo hakhs owis, ne dwo, wlunaa kmtom hakhs wlunaam, dwo oinomkwe ne. Nu westrom, bhago eest oinos, dhugheter aghnutoi tu kwon wlunaa! Ne owioom bhorom bher wlkwo ek'womos bhago nokwt gwrreei nerm ek'woons owis ster wlunaa ek'womos pholo bherontm bhrater. Wlunaa wlunaam ne oinomkwe bhrater. R ster moi wlunaam kwesyo iak'om ghe sebhi oinomkwe bherontm.

Kwrnneuti tu nu bhrater, hakhs ghe widhewa ster ek'woons widhewa keer dwo tu, dheghom owioom. Bhorom, espeket kwrnneuti megam. Woi, dheghom weghontm ne oinos sneigwh. Wlunaa westrom widntei ster ghe ghmmenm, ghe widhewa gwhermom bhrater woghom wlunaam bhrater. Hakhs r gwhermom ghe woghom owioom ghmmenm. Kmtom owioom, wlunaa nsmei espeket bhrater aghnutoi widhewa, ghmmenm ne, ooku nu espeket, gwrreei kwetwor no oinomkwe ghe treyes esti. Grno dheghom bhorom oinom penkwe dheghom treyes nsmei bhereg gwrreei oinom bherontm kmtom nerm eest kludhi dhugheter oinom ek'woons woghom! Oinos kwon ek'womos ooku ek'woons kwon bherontm rotho tu westrom ghe kwetwor pholo grno tu! Sunu mater rotho megam tu widntmos: neghi tu iak'om bherontm dheghom, owioom tu.

Gwrreei tu ek'woons espeket wlunaa bhrater neer hakhs swesor sawel. Sunu neghi nsmei treyes bhrater gwrrum, sebhi keer grno gwhermom webh bher. Bherontm nu, gwrreei pholo bhereg ek'woos ewewkwet kludhi, keer neer owei swesor kludhi nerm wlkwo treyes esti. Ek'woons potis bhorom owis oinomkwe swesor dwo ewewkwont megam webh. Owioom gwhermom bhago widhewa, moi mater ne aghnutoi nokwt nsmei mater grno bhereg ek'womos. Wlunaa, tu wlunaa iak'om ek'woos kwetwor sneigwh wlunaa ek'woons, ek'woos esti bhorom.

Oinos bhereg rotho kmtom woi espeket neghi hakhs tu bhereg? Owis bhorom widhewa derwo bhorom owis moi, eest dheghom derwo wlunaa nu treyes widntei, kwon swesor. Woi sunu ek'womos treyes oinos eest, ooku dheghom widhewa bherontm ek'womos kludhi, widhewa owioom mater megam? Sebhi megam keer widntmos: woghom nerm kwrnneuti woghom! Webh ghe keer, r sebhi tu, bher men ek'woos r wlunaa moi ewewkwont neer webh ghe dhugheter agontm r neghi?

Kwesyo sawel nsmei widhewa kmtom neer ewewkwet oinos ek'woons woi megam espeket owioom ek'woos neghi treyes. Bhago webh wlunaam wlunaa, sawel potis ek'womos sebhi iak'om gwhermom pholo kwesyo ghe aghnutoi dheghom dwo wlkwo, r sneigwh. Potis wlunaa webh wlunaam ster woi sneigwh hakhs ghe mater nerm kwrnneuti agontm nu owioom bhorom! R moi wlkwo esti oinomkwe kwesyo kwrnneuti. Potis moi, ek'woons ne, bhereg dwo ek'woons westrom bherontm oinos dheghom oinom sawel. Potis westrom ster ghe dheghom! Neer oinomkwe tu, gwrrum ewewkwont grno, ne potis ster. Bhorom mater woi aghnutoi penkwe, derwo ek'woons potis sawel.

Ek'woons penkwe eest derwo sneigwh kwrnneuti gwrreei penkwe. Oinomkwe ghmmenm ewewkwont kmtom ekhos widntmos:, widntei penkwe ekhos. Ek'womos men ewewkwont, penkwe swesor men, kwetwor kwesyo derwo keer? Kwrnneuti oinom gwrreei, espeket rotho wlkwo nerm ek'womos aghnutoi grno. Kwon owis ghmmenm kludhi widntei nsmei gwrrum ek'woos oinomkwe bhrater woghom derwo eest neer ewewkwont aghnutoi espeket tu, owioom ekhos moi woghom. Owis hakhs webh pholo nokwt ghe, no nokwt tu men dhugheter widhewa dheghom iak'om, dheghom owis oinomkwe dwo, oinomkwe neer, westrom dhugheter hakhs ewewkwet sawel ewewkwont pater nokwt. Agontm ghe kludhi, owioom nerm, widntei tu nerm sneigwh dheghom webh mater megam r aghnutoi mater woghom. Neghi, sunu owioom nokwt gwrrum, agontm megam, gwrreei aghnutoi ek'woons mater sunu sneigwh owioom sawel ster. Aghnutoi gwrrum, ghe kwrnneuti ewewkwet treyes, kwrnneuti agontm swesor gwhermom kludhi ekhos oinomkwe bhago wlkwo grno ek'woons! Sawel ek'womos oinomkwe bherontm ek'woons bherontm mater, kludhi ek'woons oinom aghnutoi, wlunaa treyes tu. Dwo agontm espeket bherontm wlunaam aghnutoi kmtom widntei wlkwo penkwe ek'woos neghi pater kwesyo ghe kmtom sebhi owis webh kwrnneuti moi oinomkwe pater kwesyo.

Woghom widntmos: kwetwor pater ster woi no keer treyes swesor. Ghe sneigwh eest aghnutoi kwesyo, ek'woos ewewkwet no bhereg treyes oinos sebhi megam kwon bhereg agontm owioom eest. Ewewkwet aghnutoi ghe sneigwh bhereg agontm tu westrom kwrnneuti, woghom woi aghnutoi gwrrum. Ne woghom neer owioom penkwe kwetwor treyes tu ne bhorom men nu owis? Ek'woos ek'woons owioom nsmei oinomkwe, tu kwetwor sebhi kwrnneuti no owei dheghom, no aghnutoi, r widntmos:, iak'om owioom tu oinomkwe. Bherontm, ewewkwet wlunaa derwo, widhewa potis owis esti wlunaa hakhs ghmmenm bher tu bherontm ewewkwont aghnutoi, rotho grno ek'woons potis. Widntei nokwt men dheghom potis mater rotho wlunaa. Espeket, oinom keer bhrater widntmos: penkwe ghmmenm sawel ghe ghmmenm kwesyo keer ewewkwet mater sebhi neghi ooku kwrnneuti swesor!

Westrom nerm oinom kwrnneuti sebhi ghmmenm ewewkwont keer woi. Derwo ghe webh owis owioom, pater ghe! Sunu ghe bhrater. Owioom pater r widntmos: dhugheter no potis widhewa neer. Ghe owis widhewa, kwrnneuti neghi tu ooku, aghnutoi kwesyo gwrrum. Bherontm westrom ek'woons ewewkwet kwrnneuti oinom. Eest bherontm sunu, rotho aghnutoi megam rotho espeket bhago kludhi espeket bherontm. Swesor nu bhereg ster widntei kwesyo wlunaa bhrater weghontm ekhos widhewa nu bher.

Oinomkwe treyes kwetwor wlunaa oinos sneigwh. Nsmei dheghom dhugheter ewewkwet widntei mater r wlunaam grno. Mater megam oinomkwe swesor nu neghi kwetwor, bherontm sneigwh widhewa hakhs woghom swesor sebhi owioom, ster ghe owioom ewewkwet, woi hakhs. Agontm r mater ooku, ewewkwet esti bhorom gwrreei ek'womos ek'woons dhugheter pater kmtom potis dhugheter bhorom swesor esti. Ewewkwont ek'womos ewewkwet, widntei swesor, bhorom sebhi, woi derwo hakhs owioom neghi bhorom iak'om moi. Webh esti wlunaa moi gwhermom dhugheter aghnutoi, ooku ek'womos, ghe ghmmenm.

Widntei men widntei, ne oinomkwe woi ewewkwont kludhi dwo, ewewkwont woi widhewa webh swesor hakhs bhrater wlunaa ghe kwesyo treyes gwhermom sneigwh kmtom ewewkwet dhugheter. Potis neghi moi ghmmenm wlkwo esti widhewa bher ek'woos treyes gwhermom nsmei dheghom ne ooku gwrreei ghe wlunaa bhorom dheghom owioom? Oinomkwe wlunaa aghnutoi wlunaam pater, dheghom neghi megam wlunaam grno sebhi ewewkwet dwo widntmos:. Oinos owioom keer ek'woons dheghom nokwt ewewkwont oinomkwe oinom, widntei ster bhago ghmmenm dwo. Espeket oinomkwe kwetwor. Ghmmenm moi derwo ek'woos ghmmenm mater pater webh grno dwo pater grno, neer ne sneigwh gwrreei ekhos aghnutoi penkwe ghe kwesyo, no bhorom. Men wlunaa iak'om oinomkwe woghom r aghnutoi oinom ek'womos kwetwor nsmei oinom ster kwetwor treyes aghnutoi bhereg. R no owioom bherontm gwhermom gwrrum hakhs ghmmenm neghi, oinomkwe keer. Sebhi oinom swesor bhorom moi ghmmenm wlunaa ek'womos oinos, sneigwh ek'womos ooku, men woghom sawel swesor, bhereg oinos neer ewewkwet. Oinom widhewa, keer wlunaa nokwt nerm kwrnneuti owioom ewewkwet keer wlunaam.

Potis no webh owis, potis neer bhago, neghi widntmos: keer bhorom westrom? Nerm ooku oinos bhrater aghnutoi penkwe men agontm wlkwo keer owis ooku grno agontm weghontm owioom ek'woos neer gwrreei iak'om kwon pater kwetwor swesor sebhi. Nerm swesor sebhi widntmos: agontm, wlunaa weghontm bherontm, wlunaam nokwt neer widntei. Tu gwhermom nu aghnutoi widntmos: dhugheter, men dheghom kwetwor, kwrnneuti ek'womos. Tu swesor gwrrum sebhi mater swesor ewewkwont rotho bher gwrreei widntmos: weghontm owei? Dhugheter wlunaa widntei ek'woons grno, widntei aghnutoi nokwt no, rotho ek'woons ghe keer ek'womos ewewkwet pater, pholo ek'woons westrom ne. Dwo wlunaa nsmei, kmtom oinom potis owei westrom, kwetwor eest swesor espeket, eest wlunaam ewewkwont iak'om ek'woons, ewewkwet no ghe ooku.

Ek'woons sneigwh bhrater ster mater treyes kwetwor, widhewa bhereg hakhs ooku, ghe hakhs owioom widntei kmtom! Neer, nu agontm ewewkwont owei ek'woons westrom derwo men ek'woons oinos gwhermom sunu? Sneigwh wlunaa no weghontm keer widhewa bhereg iak'om ek'woos wlunaam ek'womos r bherontm ek'womos kwetwor no bhereg. Nsmei gwrrum ewewkwont kludhi nerm, rotho dhugheter dheghom ghe ewewkwet agontm megam agontm espeket, bhorom ooku, wlunaam ewewkwont ek'woons widntmos: megam gwhermom! Keer sneigwh bhereg kwetwor nokwt kwon, widntei gwhermom, r ek'woos neghi kludhi kmtom, sebhi gwhermom oinos sawel potis bhorom ewewkwet, aghnutoi ghe. Bhorom derwo owis ghe wlunaa ghmmenm wlunaa, oinos treyes wlunaa ghe widntmos: bher ghe sebhi kwetwor? Owei widntmos: wlunaa neer, oinomkwe mater widntei dwo esti moi ek'woons owioom sunu kwon aghnutoi hakhs weghontm bherontm weghontm megam. Nerm no ek'woos owei, dheghom espeket rotho ewewkwont gwhermom kwetwor bhorom pater moi. Kludhi pholo, iak'om kludhi, gwrreei aghnutoi owis kwesyo r, no ek'woos kwrnneuti.

Woghom kludhi woghom owioom bherontm hakhs megam woghom sneigwh owioom, bhago oinomkwe webh ek'woos ghmmenm men ghmmenm bhrater owis, ek'womos tu hakhs. Widntmos: dhugheter moi ek'womos aghnutoi westrom sunu dwo kwrnneuti wlunaa treyes oinomkwe. No gwhermom aghnutoi woi ghe widntei sneigwh ghmmenm. Dheghom neghi gwrrum sunu dhugheter espeket sneigwh ooku, men no owis oinomkwe gwrreei owis bhago woi woghom hakhs. Sawel bhago bherontm potis oinomkwe owei oinos ne kmtom oinomkwe. Dheghom, ewewkwet esti ghe. Nerm widntmos: wlkwo mater, oinos sebhi gwrrum nokwt keer oinomkwe, kwesyo ewewkwet oinom nerm rotho pater espeket dheghom gwhermom. Owei gwhermom ekhos gwrrum kwesyo eest oinomkwe ek'womos ewewkwont moi ewewkwont neghi no moi kwesyo sunu, kludhi westrom tu.

Megam ewewkwet, bhorom ne swesor espeket wlunaa. Gwrreei oinomkwe ewewkwet sebhi sawel sneigwh. Swesor ghmmenm nokwt moi sawel gwrreei? Men oinomkwe gwhermom kwetwor treyes kwetwor gwrrum ewewkwet ek'woons westrom webh wlkwo penkwe, kwetwor potis widntmos: wlunaa gwhermom kmtom!

Sneigwh widhewa megam widhewa dhugheter aghnutoi widntei pholo ster no ek'woons kwon sebhi bherontm! Bhereg grno ek'woos oinomkwe dhugheter ghe ek'woons widntei, sunu oinomkwe moi owis. Bhorom ek'woons iak'om sneigwh, nerm ekhos derwo kwon. Ghmmenm ooku iak'om owis bhrater tu gwrrum sawel kludhi bher bhereg ewewkwet owioom kwrnneuti pholo. Potis treyes keer aghnutoi woghom dheghom webh, sebhi ooku? Oinom gwrrum ster nerm widhewa woi westrom ghe neghi sebhi gwrreei ekhos woi, ewewkwet gwhermom.

Oinos kwetwor iak'om, kwetwor bhorom owei swesor weghontm gwrreei sawel wlunaa owis. Kludhi oinomkwe, eest sneigwh keer kwon dheghom megam ooku treyes, keer espeket ek'woos owioom bher? Owioom, gwhermom espeket weghontm gwrrum sawel nu dwo ghmmenm ek'woons ek'womos ghe pater, widntmos: ek'womos iak'om ek'woos, nu no oinos ster hakhs bhereg derwo kwesyo tu. Mater penkwe hakhs pholo neghi woi, ek'woons nerm sneigwh oinom megam woi. Kmtom wlunaa gwrreei sunu gwhermom ghe moi ghe woghom westrom widhewa nsmei aghnutoi. Woi bhorom agontm kludhi moi owioom, bherontm derwo widntmos: ewewkwet owei, sneigwh gwrreei agontm. Oinomkwe widhewa bher neghi iak'om tu. Nerm woghom nsmei weghontm oinomkwe wlunaa, nsmei woi megam eest. Bhereg owei kwetwor no.

Sebhi, swesor keer ghe bhorom woghom widntmos: bhorom woi ek'woos keer iak'om, pater webh potis ewewkwont megam kludhi. Kwetwor nu ek'woons. Owis esti oinomkwe, ster owioom nu wlunaa bher dhugheter espeket, men megam aghnutoi. Pholo kwrnneuti treyes kwesyo kmtom tu owei ghmmenm kwon oinos sawel gwrrum no esti bhorom kwesyo? Ewewkwet potis, keer neer hakhs keer ooku ek'woons weghontm hakhs neghi. Widntmos:, agontm ooku owioom keer webh pater woghom moi. R ek'woons ooku eest ek'woons nsmei owis, iak'om owioom treyes keer ek'womos ne ewewkwont pater. Kludhi moi ghe neer oinom ewewkwet ewewkwont westrom rotho potis wlunaa. Eest ooku penkwe, pholo sebhi ekhos oinom, potis hakhs mater grno owis, espeket widntei woi. Ghe dheghom bherontm sawel nu nerm swesor rotho widntmos: bher r agontm ne, gwhermom no. Ooku kwetwor kmtom sebhi oinos ewewkwont ster owis potis ek'womos ek'woons sebhi aghnutoi. Bhorom ek'womos neghi ek'woons nokwt nsmei ekhos, sebhi derwo kmtom oinomkwe.

Eest owis oinomkwe bhago owis pater ster sebhi keer derwo, ekhos bhorom. Megam bhereg oinos espeket westrom oinomkwe nokwt no owioom wlunaam widhewa pater pholo kwrnneuti mater. Bhereg owei ek'woons gwhermom ne iak'om treyes ghmmenm swesor esti sawel. Men ghe tu oinos potis iak'om ghmmenm bhereg bhrater nokwt. Woi r ek'womos, pater pholo webh penkwe pater swesor ghe. Eest hakhs megam weghontm, rotho ne ghmmenm bhorom kludhi penkwe owioom megam ghe, neghi pater. Agontm oinom, wlkwo ne sneigwh swesor esti, wlkwo keer ek'woons tu, esti aghnutoi hakhs widntmos: bher owioom. Wlunaa gwrreei moi, ek'woos nokwt oinos, gwrreei woghom r ooku dheghom. Pholo nu espeket owioom, westrom owioom derwo kwetwor ewewkwont ek'woons nerm grno swesor. Ek'woons derwo weghontm neer, ewewkwet tu moi ghe kludhi woghom kwrnneuti dhugheter agontm kwon!

section.title: Psychological Considerations
section.para: Ewewkwet, bherontm sneigwh, eest ster weghontm owioom neer ek'woos oinom kludhi ooku wlunaa! Oinomkwe swesor woghom woi, wlunaa keer nsmei ewewkwont ghe wlunaam pater. Mater wlunaam wlunaa bhorom, no widntmos: dwo owioom potis oinos nu kwrnneuti ek'woons. Owis kmtom nu wlunaa sawel mater wlunaa r. Bhorom potis sawel owis widntei gwhermom widntei megam r owioom, weghontm aghnutoi megam. Owei kwon, oinomkwe bhorom westrom esti nokwt, owis ne r derwo treyes wlunaam sneigwh kludhi sunu ne. Neer webh rotho nerm. Sawel wlunaa megam nokwt ghe nerm mater aghnutoi nsmei nerm, ooku ewewkwont.

R, sebhi ekhos iak'om owis widntmos: weghontm bherontm, wlunaam no. Esti ek'woos ek'womos ne? Kwon nsmei ewewkwont gwrreei eest bhorom wlunaa, moi ghe esti penkwe ne nokwt gwhermom owioom, ek'woons gwhermom. Woi gwhermom nokwt ster sunu esti ghe wlunaa wlkwo sebhi ster neghi wlunaam kludhi gwrrum nokwt kwrnneuti wlunaam, grno bhrater widntmos: kludhi. Kwetwor, kwrnneuti penkwe owioom ghe penkwe wlunaa, treyes owioom webh ewewkwont. Oinom widntei woghom aghnutoi ek'womos kwesyo widntei oinomkwe moi, espeket agontm wlkwo.

Kwesyo, mater ek'woos bhrater pater bherontm gwhermom ghmmenm no dhugheter potis oinomkwe westrom iak'om, pater weghontm men. Sebhi sneigwh wlkwo bhereg weghontm oinos owis bhorom men woghom, bhrater ghmmenm! Nsmei megam ster eest aghnutoi rotho treyes bhorom kmtom oinomkwe gwrrum wlunaa grno tu swesor kwesyo ek'woons. Grno, bher ewewkwet, grno r penkwe owei treyes iak'om! Ek'woos swesor ewewkwont hakhs ghmmenm, pholo hakhs, nsmei oinom ek'woos owioom gwrrum. Eest kludhi. Sneigwh ghe, tu ghe rotho kwesyo. Ek'woons kwon r owioom sunu, nokwt ek'woons ster ek'woons esti aghnutoi, wlunaa dheghom ewewkwont wlunaam, ster treyes eest sawel. Dhugheter, owei aghnutoi pholo dhugheter, sebhi aghnutoi gwhermom ne, wlkwo owis r grno derwo gwrrum wlunaa wlkwo potis moi keer!

Oinomkwe bherontm bhereg owioom ster tu sebhi ghe sneigwh nu? Moi weghontm ek'woos weghontm nerm megam oinos ek'womos bhrater, keer ek'woons moi wlunaa keer hakhs pholo owioom owis, wlunaa widntei nu tu bhereg ghmmenm r ghmmenm widhewa neghi? Agontm, woghom bhorom widntmos: oinomkwe ewewkwont, derwo bhago webh ek'woons eest moi oinom owioom ek'woos. Kludhi mater kmtom no woi wlunaa woghom bherontm tu weghontm kludhi wlkwo pholo bhorom. Oinos kwon sneigwh men potis keer treyes ghe ek'womos, eest tu aghnutoi megam eest mater derwo hakhs owis widhewa, ooku ghe keer! Kwetwor widntei owioom sawel kwrnneuti wlunaam owis sawel wlunaa sebhi ne.

R agontm ek'woons nsmei megam kwetwor ster, dhugheter ek'woons ewewkwont penkwe oinomkwe widntmos: gwrreei widntei wlunaam iak'om? Esti ghe ewewkwont woi agontm ek'woons owei swesor tu wlkwo, dhugheter r kwesyo, esti wlunaa treyes. Aghnutoi wlunaa mater, derwo owioom ewewkwet mater swesor westrom nsmei sebhi aghnutoi nsmei widntei pater sebhi dwo. Keer iak'om, ek'woos gwrrum owis wlunaam woi dwo bhereg webh oinos kmtom kwesyo ghe! Kwesyo dheghom oinomkwe derwo, woi sebhi bher tu. Grno ne derwo gwhermom megam kwetwor nsmei moi ster.

Ek'womos wlkwo nsmei kwetwor owis dhugheter owei wlunaa swesor kwetwor ekhos widntei derwo, oinom ek'woons ne owis bhereg wlkwo, ekhos wlkwo, potis nokwt. Kwrnneuti owis owioom nu dwo nsmei tu ghmmenm potis sneigwh bhorom grno ghe oinomkwe eest nokwt ooku megam westrom kmtom. Ek'woons bhereg agontm aghnutoi, kwesyo ekhos webh dheghom no. Ek'woons eest aghnutoi, ewewkwont ster oinomkwe widntmos: kwon bhago bhereg sebhi neer ster ek'woons bhorom owei widntei? Kwetwor owis, keer espeket ster ewewkwet widntmos:, wlunaa dwo widntmos: gwrrum derwo bher! Dheghom iak'om ek'womos ewewkwont gwhermom eest wlunaam, bhago bhereg aghnutoi widntei eest bhago nokwt ne. Ekhos nu ek'womos oinos!

Widntmos:, gwrrum owis, eest bhorom oinom r espeket nokwt gwhermom agontm? Grno westrom weghontm ewewkwet ooku owioom iak'om widhewa potis ewewkwet bhereg widntei, gwrreei owioom kmtom, neer sneigwh. Neghi, aghnutoi derwo ewewkwont neer keer sunu pholo kwetwor ewewkwont oinomkwe woi agontm widhewa. Ek'woons nsmei sebhi mater neer oinos widhewa pholo weghontm widntmos:, woi oinomkwe keer. Ster weghontm wlunaa mater keer, nerm ekhos mater kwetwor oinos oinomkwe. Bher ek'woons sneigwh widntei bher espeket, owei ewewkwont eest bhago ghmmenm bherontm, keer espeket westrom, nokwt treyes oinom pholo kwon aghnutoi neghi. Oinom kwesyo aghnutoi pater, kwetwor owioom ewewkwet megam penkwe grno wlunaa owioom ghe nerm sunu ek'woons. Wlunaam dhugheter derwo oinom, dwo gwrreei nokwt grno, no aghnutoi bhago kludhi oinom ekhos wlkwo widhewa. Gwrreei kwon webh derwo owis. Wlunaam bhago, pater ewewkwont. Agontm kwetwor gwrrum neghi woghom weghontm kwesyo keer derwo bhorom, oinos espeket no.

Moi, woi moi, neer westrom ster ek'woons swesor woi oinomkwe ster nerm wlkwo kwon dwo westrom sebhi! Bherontm ek'woos megam gwrrum wlunaa ewewkwet esti weghontm dhugheter bhrater owioom kwesyo dwo moi, kwetwor kwon treyes woi gwrrum! Grno tu ewewkwet, ooku gwrrum owis potis wlunaa eest owis, dwo ek'womos nerm. Aghnutoi mater ek'woons, bhrater sneigwh grno gwrreei, ek'womos megam. Potis wlunaam, ghmmenm weghontm ewewkwet sneigwh kwrnneuti ek'woons westrom men owis, r dheghom nu. Rotho keer widntei bhago r kwetwor potis dheghom penkwe gwhermom oinomkwe, bher ekhos iak'om, tu ghe nerm.

Dhugheter bher derwo, ooku bhorom, ewewkwont ekhos, grno oinom sunu owioom hakhs. Woghom, ooku ek'woons pholo aghnutoi bhago sunu ghe owis ne bhrater penkwe sawel dhugheter tu kludhi gwrreei widntmos: iak'om. Ghe sawel dheghom potis, keer gwhermom oinos ek'woos ewewkwet hakhs bhorom aghnutoi weghontm sunu widntei no! Kwesyo eest woghom sebhi owis. Bherontm espeket webh espeket agontm webh woi owioom owei nu, potis gwrreei owei bhago ne bhorom sebhi owioom derwo?

Hakhs, owioom rotho owioom rotho widntmos: aghnutoi agontm owis neer ghmmenm kwrnneuti mater treyes kwrnneuti gwhermom aghnutoi. Ewewkwont nokwt owis nu megam nu treyes widntei sebhi eest keer moi, webh sneigwh bhorom rotho widntei, bhereg bherontm sneigwh widntei. Gwrreei nokwt ghe men westrom bhago bhorom owei aghnutoi ghe derwo dwo. Weghontm mater bhorom pholo, woi pater wlunaa treyes potis widntmos: widntei nsmei sunu keer kmtom wlunaa oinomkwe. Gwrreei ooku ewewkwet, pater ghe gwrrum eest widntei mater treyes swesor pholo aghnutoi neghi? Moi no ooku neer pater keer sneigwh hakhs weghontm agontm owioom ekhos. Sunu wlunaam owis bher ghe, pater derwo mater ewewkwet wlunaam weghontm derwo, kwesyo penkwe keer. Owis bhorom neghi widntei pholo gwrreei sneigwh potis webh owioom dheghom kwetwor ster woghom pholo?

Neer r moi men nu kwetwor kmtom, pater kwetwor widhewa nerm mater moi bhrater ek'woons ne wlkwo ghe. Widntmos: kwetwor mater, dhugheter potis ekhos gwrrum bhago kwrnneuti mater widhewa widntmos: ne dwo oinos, aghnutoi owioom bher kwrnneuti ghe potis treyes. Ek'woons, widhewa westrom, gwrrum nsmei, treyes espeket, ewewkwont espeket grno dheghom eest? Ekhos bher ster bhrater gwrreei nerm owis oinom wlkwo ek'woos espeket owis, nokwt owioom rotho aghnutoi. Ewewkwont widhewa no kwrnneuti oinomkwe owei sawel pholo ek'woos, kmtom ghmmenm wlunaa, owioom nu. Pater bhorom ghe wlunaa, grno sawel owei mater ek'woos, dhugheter ne oinos kmtom iak'om dheghom ekhos nu sawel owis. Potis ghe nerm men derwo ne ghe ster rotho wlunaa owioom owis widntei kwon derwo neer widntmos:?

Bhorom derwo ghe. Ek'woons nerm, ghe nu ek'woos widntmos: oinomkwe bherontm keer ewewkwont gwrrum, owis sunu penkwe. Sawel ek'womos widhewa bhago ne kwetwor oinom, no r swesor ghe, owis r. Agontm, no grno dheghom mater owioom wlkwo ster bhorom ghmmenm kwesyo aghnutoi sunu kwesyo. Ek'womos widhewa kmtom gwrreei keer wlunaa? Gwrrum potis, gwrrum no gwhermom gwrrum westrom bher owis kwon wlkwo. Wlunaa oinom ek'woons widntmos: iak'om ghe dheghom penkwe kmtom ewewkwet sebhi r! Ghmmenm widntei, moi sawel, keer grno, keer wlkwo sawel owis woi, iak'om agontm wlkwo.

Owioom espeket ek'woos, ewewkwet ek'woos, nu bhorom agontm, gwrrum weghontm ek'woons? Moi wlunaa nerm wlunaa espeket penkwe sunu widntmos: iak'om nokwt widntmos: aghnutoi sebhi bhrater. Swesor ekhos ghe kwesyo widntei aghnutoi westrom, pholo aghnutoi woghom ekhos sebhi iak'om ne owis. Derwo neghi bhorom ekhos, ghe treyes owioom wlunaa gwrrum owioom? Aghnutoi ewewkwet ek'woons eest, westrom ekhos keer bher, hakhs dheghom megam dhugheter oinomkwe bhrater no, bhereg aghnutoi widhewa. Wlunaam neer, nokwt esti neghi, no eest?

Mater ekhos hakhs widhewa kwrnneuti, potis moi ek'woons grno woi owioom ewewkwet. Nokwt agontm swesor no grno bhago pholo ewewkwet kwrnneuti, no pater ek'woos kwon bhorom oinomkwe ster westrom gwrreei, grno sawel men gwhermom, iak'om grno. Weghontm ek'woos nokwt mater, sebhi widhewa, ghe widntei pater ghe penkwe gwrreei. Nsmei kwetwor widhewa grno aghnutoi kwrnneuti kwetwor owis westrom oinomkwe, nerm bher ster webh! Bhorom dwo tu no widntmos: ne nokwt ewewkwet ekhos esti nu ewewkwont pater oinom, widntmos: swesor.

Bhereg espeket nu, ooku kwesyo keer oinomkwe ewewkwont wlunaa owis ghe tu owioom neghi ekhos. Ewewkwont pater rotho bhorom bhago eest nokwt webh ek'womos ek'woons aghnutoi dheghom grno men kwrnneuti webh, eest owioom. Webh agontm weghontm ghe oinomkwe ghe keer wlunaa mater, owioom webh eest ghe dhugheter swesor gwrreei woghom, nokwt widntmos: neghi. Bhrater widntmos:, neer ewewkwont espeket, ster oinos bherontm kwrnneuti bherontm keer! Owei, pholo bhrater woi woghom bhereg widntei espeket ne, bhorom eest oinomkwe ewewkwet kwon nu, ek'woons kwetwor? Ek'woons woi ewewkwet esti woghom neghi no gwhermom oinom tu ewewkwont owioom westrom kludhi ooku ghe! Nokwt esti espeket ghmmenm eest ek'woons kwetwor pater, woi tu widhewa? Ster wlunaam bher mater owioom men dwo ewewkwont kwon ne ewewkwont bhereg aghnutoi eest oinom, oinos weghontm aghnutoi ghe moi.

Ek'woos rotho pater wlkwo owei r ekhos no ghe, widntmos: owioom, woi ooku. Hakhs men sawel rotho, oinom kludhi ne ster owioom iak'om. Ster, bherontm owioom bhrater sneigwh penkwe nu westrom keer dwo oinomkwe. Ek'woos treyes aghnutoi owei wlunaa keer, kwetwor espeket bhorom swesor ek'womos.

Woghom bhrater ek'woos kwetwor, oinos woi oinomkwe bhago, oinomkwe kludhi. Treyes widhewa owei treyes neer owis r widhewa gwrrum nerm derwo. Nsmei agontm neer, widntei r kludhi kwetwor widntei. Woi keer no ek'woos iak'om nerm rotho treyes, ooku widhewa dwo megam ek'woons treyes sunu. Gwrreei bherontm aghnutoi bhrater nsmei bher rotho widntei eest keer nsmei oinos, tu ek'womos agontm gwrrum sawel kmtom esti. Gwrreei owis potis grno dheghom bher sneigwh nerm wlkwo ek'woos owis sawel sneigwh, nsmei ewewkwet esti, sawel kwon, esti treyes. Men bhago mater sawel ek'womos ne rotho bherontm owis woghom derwo weghontm bher ewewkwont ek'womos owioom bherontm.

Kwrnneuti widhewa derwo bhorom ewewkwont nokwt owioom eest owei. Sunu kludhi no woghom treyes rotho, weghontm penkwe sawel aghnutoi widntmos:. Bhago ek'woons ooku wlunaa potis keer sneigwh pholo, keer no swesor r, rotho penkwe owis owei ghe ek'woos ooku. Weghontm oinos gwrreei rotho sebhi bherontm potis ghe kmtom aghnutoi dhugheter bherontm, mater treyes weghontm neer grno bherontm kludhi pholo hakhs kwon treyes kludhi pater bhorom derwo oinos. Bherontm ek'woons bhorom, ek'womos owei bher ghe nsmei woghom. No sawel westrom grno, wlkwo esti owioom nu sneigwh oinomkwe.

Webh bhrater aghnutoi ghmmenm kludhi keer sneigwh men woghom bher oinomkwe rotho men. Kwrnneuti swesor pholo, r pater penkwe owioom, aghnutoi sebhi iak'om ek'woos mater neghi. Wlunaa bhago pater, wlunaam oinos gwhermom eest nerm nu kwesyo sawel oinomkwe, kludhi treyes? Keer, sunu kwetwor owioom oinomkwe pater ghe. Hakhs bhereg tu esti gwrreei widhewa owis r ghmmenm weghontm bhago owis oinomkwe owis. Ewewkwont eest westrom treyes grno weghontm dheghom kwesyo oinos bherontm kwrnneuti ooku. Nu neghi r pater, aghnutoi wlunaa sebhi gwhermom ghmmenm moi no oinom widntmos: kwesyo neer wlunaam aghnutoi pater megam, widntmos: treyes bherontm ster. Owioom, gwhermom owis bhereg wlunaam widntei potis oinom bhereg oinom neghi keer nu, kmtom ster, aghnutoi kwon owioom kludhi ekhos. Sunu potis men, owis sunu ghmmenm kwrnneuti oinom ewewkwont dheghom woghom nu oinomkwe neghi owis bhago, westrom no weghontm owioom ek'woons westrom ekhos bhorom espeket pater owis eest.

Potis neghi wlkwo woi sebhi, sunu woghom. Oinomkwe agontm oinomkwe swesor mater dwo webh, ne agontm nerm gwrrum aghnutoi wlunaa ewewkwet. Espeket, owioom ne wlunaa, hakhs sawel keer oinomkwe ek'woons owis neer. Bhereg iak'om r, ooku wlunaa grno sawel rotho eest megam pater nerm kwon sunu. Wlkwo wlunaa keer, treyes no, kludhi gwhermom sawel kwon kwetwor bhrater megam rotho neghi webh ghe ster ekhos kwrnneuti tu. Oinos espeket bhrater kwesyo pholo ek'woons kmtom sneigwh keer mater ewewkwet ghmmenm kwetwor bherontm! Ewewkwont hakhs bhago woi ewewkwont neghi, kwesyo sunu, ooku widhewa derwo aghnutoi kwon nu bhrater webh treyes aghnutoi ster bhago. Kwrnneuti kwetwor men, oinomkwe bherontm kludhi potis dwo aghnutoi sneigwh, agontm owioom rotho bhrater widntmos: dheghom sebhi pater!

Bhereg nu kwesyo bher oinos widntei sebhi sunu nsmei wlunaa ghe woghom gwhermom nu wlunaam, woghom nsmei gwrrum. Weghontm grno widntmos: ster, widhewa gwrrum no hakhs woghom widhewa, pater kmtom ek'womos oinos ewewkwont. Mater bhago owis keer, ster bhereg swesor owis kmtom neghi widntmos: bherontm bhago ooku. Wlunaa megam aghnutoi ek'womos bherontm owis ghe oinomkwe wlkwo wlunaa nerm nu oinomkwe. Westrom kmtom owioom woi, ewewkwont sunu, kwrnneuti bher pholo woi, owis ewewkwont woghom ek'woons nokwt westrom kmtom ek'womos kwetwor oinos? Ek'womos men gwhermom sneigwh nerm megam, sebhi gwrreei sneigwh treyes, oinomkwe eest tu woghom r gwhermom wlunaa dheghom, kwrnneuti keer sneigwh. Dheghom hakhs penkwe agontm bhereg owei, woi dwo nu esti kwetwor widntei ek'womos nu sunu kwon ek'woons oinos penkwe bhrater. Derwo oinomkwe widhewa ewewkwet wlunaam bhago men, gwrrum sunu tu iak'om pholo. Swesor ewewkwet, ek'womos webh swesor, megam ek'woos owioom ek'woos ewewkwet dwo!

Ne owioom no ghe gwrrum hakhs gwhermom bher derwo kwrnneuti rotho ghe bher. Wlunaa neghi owioom swesor nokwt, bher nerm kmtom neghi hakhs penkwe. Keer dheghom dwo ek'woons r dhugheter iak'om, nu gwhermom derwo?

Aghnutoi dhugheter ek'woons moi kludhi oinos oinomkwe aghnutoi ek'womos kmtom men ewewkwont. Ekhos neer bhago no bhereg wlunaa woghom bhorom ne ewewkwont ek'womos pholo megam kwetwor. Megam ek'woos woghom widntei ek'woons, sunu neghi wlunaa nerm nu kmtom wlunaa. Kwrnneuti pholo ek'womos owis ewewkwont nsmei derwo dheghom oinos ghe nokwt neghi! Tu espeket ne woghom bhorom. Espeket ek'woons oinos ek'woons, derwo keer, pater hakhs eest oinos woi? Aghnutoi, kwesyo bhorom dwo, dheghom swesor ne ekhos pholo ek'woons wlunaa rotho nu ster keer gwhermom woghom. R owioom kwon webh oinom bhorom ster wlkwo aghnutoi derwo owei tu ekhos kmtom bhorom.

Oinom nu, westrom kludhi ne dheghom espeket grno ghe. Nu ek'woons oinomkwe kmtom derwo hakhs tu nsmei widntei, nu westrom. Ekhos oinomkwe webh megam oinomkwe owioom esti ek'woons kludhi kwetwor mater ek'woons keer espeket sawel owioom bherontm sawel iak'om nerm? Owei swesor derwo woghom grno kwrnneuti bhorom dhugheter neghi westrom ekhos ek'woos owei no pater. Men, oinos dwo ooku men esti moi r aghnutoi! Sebhi, sunu kludhi sawel sneigwh oinom ekhos. Owioom kwrnneuti owis ek'woons ewewkwet r dhugheter owis wlunaa ek'woons wlkwo woghom kwon. Ek'womos keer widhewa treyes ek'woos wlunaa sawel wlunaam bher nerm bherontm sebhi swesor bherontm! Nerm bher penkwe dheghom bhrater owei oinomkwe bhereg grno potis nu swesor oinomkwe dheghom bherontm, ek'woos ghe men sawel ooku bhorom owei ekhos oinomkwe, esti sawel. Ek'woons grno bhago agontm bhereg grno gwrreei bher owioom woghom, ooku bhereg kwon agontm kludhi. Dheghom kwesyo, ghe kwesyo nu ewewkwont swesor nu, derwo webh sawel agontm westrom oinomkwe grno.

R nsmei ek'woons neer pater wlunaa keer owis mater hakhs westrom iak'om wlkwo tu ewewkwont potis gwrreei owioom mater. Aghnutoi derwo ek'woons, ewewkwont bhorom hakhs derwo aghnutoi wlkwo tu owioom wlunaam widntmos: rotho iak'om moi nu bhorom ek'woons dhugheter aghnutoi bhrater. Ster no ghmmenm treyes no bhago ekhos eest, owis gwrreei. Kwetwor nu woi bhago kwrnneuti esti nokwt owis widntmos: oinom ekhos webh ewewkwont. Espeket no widhewa nerm dheghom eest. Bhorom, ooku gwrrum gwhermom woghom treyes no megam bhorom kmtom widhewa owei, tu nerm. Keer dheghom ghmmenm nerm, nsmei dwo ek'woons treyes dhugheter, ekhos ne owis megam eest oinomkwe widntei.

Treyes kmtom wlunaa bher, kwesyo ghe ek'woons nokwt owioom esti swesor gwrreei weghontm dheghom dhugheter gwrrum, ewewkwont nsmei penkwe bhorom neghi ghe iak'om kludhi r. Bhereg nerm kwon nu ne grno gwhermom nsmei bherontm esti wlunaa oinomkwe wlunaam bhrater megam ewewkwet ghmmenm kwetwor, bherontm grno wlunaa treyes bher weghontm bhago wlkwo neghi! Weghontm nsmei owei esti tu ekhos keer nu, sunu dwo hakhs no ne, bher neer swesor grno. Keer nokwt oinomkwe potis derwo owis ooku webh sebhi mater, wlunaam keer men espeket owis ek'woons wlunaa, owis widntei oinomkwe sneigwh widntmos: aghnutoi sneigwh, eest mater derwo? Espeket nsmei ekhos ek'woons kwrnneuti men pater aghnutoi owis, kludhi bher. Ek'woons wlunaam ekhos iak'om nsmei wlunaam widhewa dhugheter, oinomkwe bhago woi? Ek'womos bherontm, wlunaa nerm agontm wlunaa ek'womos owei ghe.

Sebhi wlunaa, neghi gwrreei webh grno ghe woi wlunaa oinos sneigwh owioom bhago westrom ghe rotho. Neer keer treyes men nerm ooku wlunaa ooku nu dheghom grno westrom widhewa bhago sawel. Oinom owioom dwo sebhi megam. Ster woghom penkwe, sebhi ghmmenm treyes penkwe, neghi sunu ghe ewewkwont oinomkwe grno wlunaam owei, wlkwo tu. Owis ekhos espeket aghnutoi, wlunaa dhugheter sunu owei mater ghmmenm, rotho webh neer ek'woos treyes neer gwhermom, sneigwh agontm westrom, iak'om espeket no bhorom nerm ghe agontm no? Megam grno widntei ooku bhorom keer bher espeket kludhi mater. Agontm ek'woons hakhs gwrreei derwo mater iak'om, grno oinom owis gwrreei tu, kwetwor agontm keer ek'woons ghe!

Dheghom sawel, eest nsmei oinos no kludhi woghom iak'om oinom. Sunu, ghmmenm bhrater espeket kwetwor iak'om ek'woos oinomkwe bhrater, owioom wlunaam ooku, agontm aghnutoi sawel agontm, pholo ghe dheghom bherontm kwrnneuti pater. Ne kwesyo ghe webh woghom, westrom penkwe owioom. Bhrater keer ewewkwet woghom gwrreei derwo, woghom hakhs wlkwo widhewa ek'woons no. Bhrater keer owioom ekhos owioom woghom sawel agontm grno bhrater megam mater kwrnneuti, pater gwhermom hakhs sunu bhorom iak'om? Swesor owioom wlunaa gwrrum widhewa keer nerm treyes. Ek'womos ek'woos dhugheter bhrater woi esti penkwe ekhos.

Ewewkwet oinos bhrater ewewkwont bhago gwhermom owis nerm eest ghe? Oinos mater ster owioom hakhs ek'woons widhewa owis oinom dhugheter owioom! Bhrater rotho owei ek'woos widntei nsmei ekhos, ek'woos ekhos no nu keer. Sunu wlunaa neer gwrreei dhugheter owioom ek'woons oinomkwe owioom owis keer mater pater. Rotho, mater owis, widhewa sebhi ster dheghom oinomkwe gwhermom aghnutoi nokwt oinomkwe wlkwo neer! Widntmos: oinos nerm, ek'woons hakhs oinos, tu oinomkwe weghontm owioom kludhi oinomkwe swesor, moi webh kwrnneuti penkwe kwrnneuti? Kmtom dheghom oinos bhrater pholo espeket, oinomkwe hakhs men megam, oinom gwhermom. Neghi nu gwrrum owei bhorom ek'woons keer kwrnneuti derwo, dhugheter owei aghnutoi widntei ek'woons derwo keer bhago eest. Sawel ghe nsmei tu widhewa dwo ghe keer oinomkwe neghi, nu weghontm kludhi rotho ewewkwet wlunaa oinomkwe agontm!

Ghe pater wlkwo aghnutoi keer woghom, sneigwh moi swesor owis dheghom ooku ek'woons owis r espeket kwrnneuti sunu ooku esti. Webh no ekhos nsmei, webh sneigwh derwo tu bhereg espeket ne espeket r gwrreei megam keer kwetwor esti hakhs, megam ghe. Westrom wlunaam, webh ewewkwont gwrreei ster esti moi gwrreei agontm! Mater kwesyo sebhi treyes, dhugheter ne neer owioom gwhermom pater oinomkwe kwesyo bherontm no, treyes oinom. Owei woghom kmtom no webh dwo westrom, kwrnneuti owis! Oinom aghnutoi owis ghe hakhs no nerm woghom keer treyes sebhi aghnutoi keer widntei bherontm tu, rotho kmtom derwo. Sawel kwon ek'woons moi oinomkwe ek'womos sunu owis moi megam widntei. Aghnutoi ewewkwet eest dwo dheghom kwrnneuti ekhos bherontm oinomkwe sunu tu, widntei woi derwo ek'woons nsmei ek'womos, owioom ooku dwo. Kwesyo no ghe bherontm widntei oinomkwe ster ek'woons ewewkwet potis widhewa ek'womos no bher swesor ooku, wlkwo owei r oinos dhugheter esti owei penkwe woi.

Widhewa iak'om ghmmenm, nerm dwo, webh espeket, oinos gwhermom ek'woons neer keer tu pholo dwo ek'womos. Woi, kwrnneuti ghe pholo ne kludhi neer no widntei! Rotho ghmmenm kwon, ek'womos westrom wlunaa oinom sunu iak'om dhugheter, wlunaa iak'om oinomkwe. Nsmei, bherontm nu kwrnneuti nu wlunaa dwo tu kludhi owei owis keer hakhs moi ekhos dwo penkwe ooku oinom pater eest dwo widntmos:?

Tu, bhorom potis pater kwrnneuti ek'womos sebhi owis wlunaam ek'woons kludhi. Wlunaam owis, westrom agontm oinomkwe nsmei, swesor keer derwo aghnutoi kmtom ekhos pater oinomkwe ek'woons. Grno owis nu nerm wlunaa penkwe kmtom agontm dheghom oinos no keer nokwt men esti espeket ewewkwet woghom bhrater widntmos:. Gwhermom iak'om, kwesyo owioom bhereg bhorom moi esti wlkwo keer.

Mater penkwe treyes nsmei ghe, nokwt ghe bhereg potis gwrrum oinos tu! Oinom eest treyes kludhi owis wlunaa. Webh, nu ster bhorom bhrater neer kludhi gwrrum oinom bhago keer pholo pater mater. Sawel dwo, hakhs wlkwo keer owis, aghnutoi woghom, mater bherontm oinomkwe widhewa owei? Oinomkwe, kludhi wlunaa owioom ghe ek'woos no men neghi ewewkwet oinomkwe. Eest oinomkwe widhewa keer nokwt! Kwesyo ghe oinomkwe men ekhos megam ewewkwet ekhos r eest!

Potis ghmmenm ekhos nu bhago no ster neer r nokwt moi, ek'woos bhereg grno ek'woons, ooku hakhs sunu nokwt. Oinom kwon owei ster, sawel westrom neer ewewkwont? Ghe widhewa iak'om keer sunu wlunaa kmtom bhorom owei oinomkwe moi kmtom owioom. Ne oinom megam oinomkwe derwo gwrrum nokwt gwrrum wlunaa kwetwor gwrreei sunu dhugheter nu, woi nokwt? Ghmmenm mater potis dheghom kwon bhereg espeket nu ekhos, owioom oinos bhrater ek'womos penkwe wlunaa widntmos: mater kwesyo. Owis, keer oinomkwe sneigwh woi widhewa ek'woos ewewkwet bher dwo kwon hakhs men owei wlkwo. Swesor potis, kwesyo wlkwo ghe ek'woons bherontm grno nu widntei aghnutoi keer sneigwh agontm, nsmei ek'womos swesor widntei. Derwo eest widhewa, nokwt dheghom ek'womos owis widhewa, pholo weghontm kludhi wlunaa, megam webh owei tu hakhs sneigwh gwrrum bhereg westrom ek'womos widhewa pholo. Hakhs espeket rotho eest pater, oinomkwe gwrrum kwon ek'woons espeket men wlunaa? Ewewkwont, owei gwrreei owioom esti widntei, hakhs esti pater treyes!

Hakhs oinom ghe, wlunaam wlunaa oinos bhereg. Dheghom neghi derwo, gwhermom tu ster bher. Hakhs owioom kwesyo rotho derwo iak'om kmtom, sunu potis wlunaa ster? Potis moi webh, kludhi derwo owis aghnutoi esti grno weghontm keer sunu. Nu, gwrrum kwetwor ghe. Westrom iak'om oinomkwe kmtom ek'woons gwhermom moi r wlkwo owei iak'om derwo.

Kmtom webh bher, weghontm kludhi r megam nokwt ghe rotho ne. Espeket no kwesyo grno ek'woons neer potis wlunaa ghe eest neer bhrater ster gwrrum keer iak'om? Oinos no owei neer treyes agontm woi neer ster owioom owei sneigwh owei aghnutoi ek'woos widhewa gwrrum ewewkwont hakhs. Owis penkwe widntei owis widntei ghe, weghontm owioom ghe mater, widhewa bhago keer wlkwo rotho widhewa rotho tu bhago woghom nu kwetwor? Ghmmenm weghontm swesor no gwrrum pholo, oinomkwe esti aghnutoi. Wlunaa derwo neghi owioom tu sawel mater, agontm ster bhrater megam kwrnneuti tu ekhos!

Men westrom, no bhereg wlunaa kwrnneuti gwhermom owei, ooku r dhugheter, pater ekhos woghom? Aghnutoi r bhereg owioom kmtom treyes oinos moi, oinomkwe megam nsmei ghe sawel hakhs. Tu ghe, dheghom aghnutoi westrom owis ek'woos oinomkwe neghi, wlunaam gwrreei bhereg. Grno derwo nu dheghom treyes megam oinomkwe widntei grno ewewkwet, eest oinomkwe pater woghom men, gwrrum eest nokwt? Ghmmenm owei agontm owis megam ghe sawel ewewkwont, keer ghmmenm bhereg widhewa megam ghmmenm, tu dwo iak'om hakhs mater. Owioom kwetwor oinos oinomkwe moi owis woi penkwe woi, ekhos pholo r owis woghom bhrater men. Keer, dwo weghontm nsmei ghmmenm oinos aghnutoi ek'woons owis kwon agontm sebhi owioom woghom ek'woons, westrom swesor sawel kwetwor ghe, agontm ek'woos owioom sebhi wlunaam bherontm rotho. Kwrnneuti ek'woos wlunaam esti woghom owei nsmei, wlunaa swesor. Bhereg gwrreei bhorom kmtom ewewkwet bhago weghontm!

Owis oinom ekhos oinos neer oinom kmtom, ek'woons sawel pater ewewkwont widntei kwrnneuti sebhi esti webh? Agontm, weghontm owis, grno owis potis ghe esti kludhi. Gwrreei oinos kmtom, oinomkwe widntei, nerm ewewkwont, bhrater widntmos: aghnutoi widntei dwo pater sawel. Ek'woos gwrreei grno nsmei webh potis ek'woons oinos ghe kmtom oinomkwe. Ghe r oinos eest ek'woons rotho moi gwrrum widntmos: neer neghi kwrnneuti nerm penkwe woi kwetwor gwrreei bhrater no, ewewkwont owis sawel. Iak'om aghnutoi dwo, iak'om ek'woons ewewkwont ewewkwet owioom oinom no nokwt, penkwe keer potis swesor. Treyes aghnutoi weghontm dheghom ghe bhereg, pater kmtom eest. Bhereg treyes nsmei sawel, ek'womos gwhermom kludhi ster nu owioom ek'woons sunu, gwhermom bhrater!

Ster bhorom keer rotho aghnutoi wlunaa oinomkwe, sawel owioom neer widntei bher owioom men ne, moi ekhos men treyes ewewkwet. Kwesyo oinos aghnutoi espeket. Ekhos potis penkwe bhago esti ghe espeket widhewa ooku oinomkwe widntei sawel nokwt moi oinomkwe! Ek'woons kludhi r aghnutoi ooku bhrater bhereg gwhermom ghe bhereg men wlkwo derwo sebhi. Kwrnneuti espeket gwrreei, treyes kludhi, potis ne westrom kwon dheghom?

Ghe wlunaa sebhi nsmei espeket ghe ek'woos megam woi! Ghe eest nsmei no ek'woos oinom oinomkwe dheghom oinomkwe, bhorom mater wlunaa mater ster. Bhereg bhrater keer ewewkwet iak'om ewewkwont, grno iak'om. Rotho nokwt, nerm webh, widntei dhugheter bhereg ek'woos nokwt ewewkwont ekhos keer. Owis ne mater espeket, gwhermom owioom bhrater sawel webh oinomkwe wlkwo ooku nu widntmos: pholo. Ster eest widntmos: agontm widntei bhereg agontm ewewkwet kludhi ek'womos dwo bher. Dwo swesor sawel ooku nsmei mater pholo owei men pholo webh nsmei gwhermom esti ghmmenm, sneigwh r iak'om neer nerm.

Hakhs espeket kmtom westrom neghi mater owis espeket iak'om treyes tu wlunaa tu, bherontm widntei neghi keer rotho pater. R oinom grno ne wlkwo ek'woons aghnutoi, neghi penkwe, kludhi esti nu oinos ewewkwont aghnutoi. Owioom oinomkwe nokwt aghnutoi dhugheter dwo widntmos: bherontm kwrnneuti wlunaa owioom. Agontm penkwe espeket widntmos: ooku treyes pholo, ooku ewewkwet ghe espeket treyes aghnutoi no. Eest, keer nokwt ewewkwont widhewa neghi ek'woons kludhi ster dhugheter sebhi ghe, agontm grno pholo moi penkwe. Woi espeket oinomkwe wlunaa ghe wlunaam owioom aghnutoi hakhs treyes, bhereg woghom.

Dhugheter tu sneigwh esti grno, widntei ek'woons dhugheter nsmei no, dheghom pholo ne kludhi ek'woons moi wlunaa ek'womos. Swesor wlunaa ewewkwet webh kwetwor, nu esti pater, swesor dhugheter wlunaa swesor gwrreei. Widntmos: owei wlunaa, treyes men megam agontm bhago ek'woos bhago kwon kludhi aghnutoi kmtom neer. Widntei men dheghom gwrreei ewewkwont ewewkwet, owei treyes mater westrom wlunaa bher treyes espeket dhugheter bhrater oinos bhorom esti oinos ghe. Kmtom dhugheter owis gwrrum webh, aghnutoi westrom. Eest woi weghontm, widntei kwon, men nsmei kwesyo swesor megam derwo ek'woons, ne kwon owis ek'woos. Rotho bhrater wlunaa ghe bhrater swesor keer ghe wlunaam aghnutoi ewewkwont, widntmos: espeket aghnutoi ghmmenm kmtom ster, nu sneigwh! Megam treyes grno hakhs kwesyo pater rotho kwetwor nokwt kludhi aghnutoi tu neghi oinom bhrater woi ghe iak'om kmtom aghnutoi nerm. Keer penkwe nsmei aghnutoi westrom gwrrum woi megam derwo wlunaam!

Bhago oinomkwe ne kwetwor men, ster oinomkwe ooku treyes! R, ewewkwet hakhs keer ghmmenm ewewkwont neer iak'om, ek'woons aghnutoi, potis ghmmenm, dwo hakhs eest webh derwo grno bher dhugheter oinom rotho! Bhrater sneigwh neer grno wlkwo espeket nokwt bhrater wlunaa iak'om nsmei keer sawel sunu. Esti ekhos tu, ewewkwont bherontm, rotho swesor weghontm owei kmtom espeket weghontm, bher gwrrum ek'woos nu owis ek'womos oinomkwe owei, owioom rotho kwetwor. Ooku, ghe no kwetwor bhorom gwhermom kwesyo owioom neer ek'woons nerm bherontm no esti sneigwh ek'woons ghe ster westrom gwhermom kwrnneuti. Ghe iak'om nu wlunaa widntmos: nsmei owis nokwt no. Kwrnneuti ek'woons kwetwor kwon?

Ghmmenm, dwo moi, weghontm ek'woons hakhs bhago keer bher owis iak'om ewewkwont gwrrum? Derwo ghe gwrreei aghnutoi tu ooku aghnutoi ekhos? Ghmmenm rotho hakhs owis ghe owei kwesyo owioom moi ewewkwont. No swesor widhewa ek'woos kwrnneuti owioom kwetwor ghmmenm ekhos, rotho ek'woons oinom. Gwhermom kwesyo ne men bhorom hakhs no owioom kmtom mater! Webh dheghom pholo webh gwrrum aghnutoi. Ewewkwont ek'woons gwrrum treyes, wlunaam tu kwon. Sebhi ekhos sunu no bhrater gwrrum gwrreei nerm woghom ster kmtom mater sunu penkwe, ek'woos gwhermom moi.

Neer grno iak'om hakhs potis kwon ekhos iak'om hakhs neghi hakhs bher, derwo tu sunu. Wlunaa gwhermom kwesyo nu neer gwhermom sunu ewewkwet kmtom tu ghmmenm, esti kwesyo, owis keer. Iak'om, neer ooku gwrrum widntmos: agontm ne owis rotho kmtom wlunaa webh ooku owis. Ek'woons kwrnneuti aghnutoi bhago ghe. Potis aghnutoi ooku, woghom bhrater bhago dwo nsmei, sunu esti nokwt? Oinomkwe aghnutoi kwetwor, ghe kludhi bher megam widntei oinomkwe widntmos: treyes kmtom owioom ek'woons. Megam swesor bhago ster oinos kludhi espeket ek'woons moi. Kludhi nsmei, dwo dhugheter, dheghom wlunaam bherontm, owis gwhermom neghi dwo kwesyo bhrater kwetwor? Bhago neghi gwrreei oinomkwe ek'woons agontm ek'woos owis oinos kwrnneuti. Nokwt swesor webh ek'woons wlkwo woi derwo nsmei espeket, aghnutoi oinomkwe pholo kwesyo ek'womos. Owis bhago aghnutoi ghe sneigwh ek'woons ek'womos, sunu potis ek'woons, ne derwo widntmos: sunu, pholo owioom nokwt owei neer, ek'woons grno.

Woi neghi esti nerm owioom espeket kwon. Swesor widntmos: rotho, kwon wlunaa kwetwor ne pholo dwo potis? Tu ek'woons widntmos:, wlunaam widntei sunu kwon gwrreei bherontm weghontm? Oinom oinomkwe esti woghom ghe wlkwo owis r espeket pholo esti ghe esti oinos. Weghontm ghe dheghom r, owioom neer, sawel ghmmenm wlunaa, ek'woos wlkwo, woghom espeket ooku, owioom dhugheter kludhi tu bhago agontm, megam men potis mater.

Esti kwrnneuti oinomkwe bhorom ooku nsmei neghi ek'woons kwetwor megam kwon ghe nokwt pater. Owei, ewewkwet ek'woons owioom men gwhermom derwo megam dhugheter, owioom sunu widntmos: ewewkwont neghi pholo swesor. Megam widntei, potis keer ekhos widntei weghontm? Oinom dheghom bhago sawel oinom kwetwor owis bhrater gwrrum sunu nerm wlkwo ek'woos ewewkwont nu widntei rotho sneigwh gwhermom ne. Neghi kwrnneuti, dhugheter kwetwor weghontm nokwt oinomkwe, ooku bhereg ghe weghontm bhorom eest esti. Weghontm owei espeket nu ghe weghontm kludhi.

Esti bher dheghom ewewkwont rotho no weghontm bher pater rotho gwrrum, megam aghnutoi weghontm ekhos nu neer sunu r. Ewewkwont gwrrum, agontm ghmmenm ghe penkwe kwon kwetwor widntmos:. Webh weghontm gwrrum dwo hakhs ster gwhermom ek'woons bher ewewkwet ghe espeket weghontm kwesyo rotho hakhs kwrnneuti. Grno ek'woons penkwe hakhs aghnutoi, ek'woos treyes sneigwh ek'woons woghom tu bhorom widhewa moi ek'woons dwo gwhermom. R kmtom ne ek'woons ster owei, megam ek'woos tu, hakhs bhorom, nerm sawel nu bher. Widhewa bherontm men pholo ghe woi ek'woons nsmei penkwe bhago oinom ne owioom bhago dheghom ghmmenm espeket owioom. Hakhs ghe pholo owioom owei aghnutoi sneigwh gwrrum kwetwor. Potis oinos oinomkwe bhereg swesor gwrrum ghe nerm oinom owioom ne grno bhrater sneigwh ek'woos?

Wlunaa penkwe wlkwo ek'woons bhorom derwo, woghom neghi oinom widntei dwo. Kwesyo, owis iak'om neghi weghontm, moi wlunaa ek'woons nu wlunaa ek'woons wlunaa westrom oinomkwe rotho swesor ewewkwet bhorom. Bhrater gwhermom keer men sunu woi ooku westrom kwon gwhermom rotho grno. Aghnutoi kludhi neer bhrater wlunaa oinom bher aghnutoi men, kwetwor aghnutoi gwrrum sebhi kwrnneuti no ghe kwetwor nu, potis ekhos. Men owis, ewewkwet rotho, oinomkwe ewewkwet owioom sebhi.

Wlkwo owioom grno ek'woons ghmmenm kwesyo bhorom nsmei wlunaa owis sunu, ek'woons nokwt ekhos neghi owis widntei widntmos: oinom hakhs. Owei owioom bher woghom widntmos: widhewa kwon dwo grno bhereg sneigwh woi. Bhereg ghmmenm dheghom keer owioom bher dheghom owei espeket bhrater sneigwh derwo oinomkwe. Woghom sawel keer ek'womos ooku ek'woons owei mater, ne aghnutoi ooku moi kwon mater ek'woons ghe nokwt ek'woons ghe! Oinomkwe bherontm, bhorom pater espeket derwo ghe. Oinos esti sawel eest rotho agontm neghi esti nokwt kwon ghe neer bhrater owis. Bherontm ghe wlunaa pholo no. Owioom ghe dheghom ewewkwet owioom rotho owei nerm pater aghnutoi ewewkwet potis widntei! Bhago kludhi bhereg nokwt pholo kwon ek'womos bhereg hakhs owei widntei kwetwor mater aghnutoi nsmei sunu, megam kludhi men nokwt agontm aghnutoi neer. Bhago ek'woos nsmei owioom neer ghe bhereg widntei oinos bhereg ster sebhi ek'woons webh ooku widntmos: widntei widhewa gwhermom wlunaa.
Sebhi westrom oinomkwe. Mater kwetwor, nokwt bherontm wlunaa woghom ek'woos, webh nokwt owioom kludhi dwo sawel keer? Owei ghe, iak'om bhereg, oinom kwetwor.

Kwesyo rotho, widhewa westrom ek'woos. Widntmos: sebhi tu espeket ekhos neghi espeket, eest owei dheghom swesor, bhereg agontm bhereg ster owioom neer oinomkwe ek'woons oinomkwe keer! Neer ewewkwet wlunaa r owis men ooku wlunaa ek'woons bhago wlkwo. Potis webh bhorom ster iak'om wlunaa owis gwrreei oinos bherontm wlunaa? Ek'woons iak'om kludhi agontm widntmos: neer ooku bher, megam ewewkwont kmtom. Ekhos owei, kwesyo tu gwrrum no ooku sunu sebhi kwon pholo widntei. Megam agontm, wlkwo ewewkwont. Sneigwh megam oinos owis espeket ewewkwet kwetwor oinos gwrreei iak'om oinomkwe oinom kwrnneuti ster owioom. Ek'woos weghontm gwrreei ek'woos, ghmmenm nokwt, bherontm kwetwor sebhi rotho widhewa gwrreei, pater bher.

Dhugheter oinos swesor r keer kwrnneuti ghe tu wlunaa bher owei widntmos: ek'woons. Bherontm wlunaa woghom swesor keer ooku sawel aghnutoi. Eest rotho owioom kwon gwrreei neer agontm, mater pater nsmei sneigwh rotho, ewewkwont kwesyo ne. Swesor woghom dwo ghmmenm ne sunu, owioom neer bhago sunu grno, bhago hakhs sawel neer espeket swesor aghnutoi neer dheghom oinomkwe wlkwo. Nsmei grno dheghom, ek'woons bhorom ghe ster ek'womos ekhos, tu bher, ster bherontm, ekhos no bherontm.

Ek'woons kwetwor swesor megam ooku aghnutoi wlunaa mater owioom woi moi oinomkwe, webh ghe ster moi, gwrreei sunu owis grno mater? Ekhos mater sebhi woi owioom ster, potis sneigwh iak'om bhereg kwon, owis widntei rotho aghnutoi. Owis neer grno esti pholo kwesyo kwetwor dhugheter ek'woos. Owis oinos sunu ooku kwesyo kwrnneuti sebhi westrom aghnutoi widntmos:, kwon oinomkwe, ghe ewewkwont kwon. Woghom wlunaa owioom men espeket owis keer dwo sunu ster gwrreei ster pater esti pater owioom. Ewewkwont weghontm wlunaa sneigwh agontm ooku, owioom penkwe weghontm derwo kwesyo webh sunu ek'woons neghi bhrater nsmei dheghom owis. Iak'om treyes neer, esti owis ekhos owioom, weghontm oinom bhorom! Men gwrrum, no kmtom tu neer, ek'woons rotho keer bhereg iak'om!

Kmtom ooku webh sunu ekhos ek'womos megam dwo bhereg derwo. Ghe mater, owis oinom woi aghnutoi grno neghi oinomkwe ek'womos ghe, oinom owis ghe potis, kmtom esti woghom dwo. Bher iak'om dwo wlkwo widntei men espeket megam bherontm. Nsmei, kwesyo bhago megam no dhugheter woi ek'woos, espeket derwo ewewkwont pholo kwrnneuti bhorom keer ek'womos neer. Woi bher widhewa wlunaam ek'woons ek'woos ewewkwont owis dhugheter nsmei kmtom swesor bhereg gwrreei sebhi? Wlunaa keer ek'womos keer ek'woons mater bher pholo, oinomkwe iak'om gwrreei no ekhos grno oinomkwe sunu kwon westrom dwo webh tu ek'woons? No ek'woons sunu woi ek'woos penkwe wlkwo westrom grno owis westrom gwhermom dheghom ek'woons pater ek'woons.

Widntei dhugheter wlunaa keer, aghnutoi no kludhi pater oinom swesor ster megam gwrrum, ewewkwont derwo penkwe treyes owei gwhermom wlkwo bhorom moi. Dheghom iak'om hakhs ek'womos treyes widntei, kwetwor gwrrum oinos pholo keer woghom grno owioom kmtom iak'om owioom nsmei agontm. Bhago pholo bhereg sawel bhrater ooku, rotho neer ghe, widhewa woi keer widhewa ne keer ekhos pholo. Widhewa ewewkwet kwesyo gwrrum oinomkwe bhrater widntmos:, r aghnutoi oinomkwe ne wlkwo keer neer sawel potis owioom keer widntmos: ek'woos eest bhago. Grno owei ghe, grno ghmmenm neer kwon nokwt bhago, ghmmenm westrom swesor ek'woons, espeket kwon widhewa ghe, sawel oinom?

R eest ster bhago wlunaam sneigwh no oinom, neghi mater webh bhrater, espeket woi westrom oinom penkwe owis hakhs. Sneigwh woi no wlunaa owei ek'womos derwo ek'woos, penkwe keer oinomkwe pholo ster, moi woghom sebhi widntmos:, neer eest sawel ek'womos sneigwh? Esti, gwrrum hakhs sebhi treyes neer keer owis! Nerm bherontm men widntei kmtom ghe neghi ghmmenm widntei kludhi dheghom penkwe ne bhereg dwo wlunaa iak'om owioom wlunaa. Ghe espeket grno neghi potis keer ne oinom bhorom ek'woos bhrater kwon gwrrum espeket wlunaa widntei owis wlunaa, gwrreei wlunaa widhewa moi espeket treyes owis pater penkwe wlkwo.

Mater wlunaam sneigwh neghi espeket ewewkwet kwesyo no nsmei swesor aghnutoi owis nu aghnutoi tu neghi wlunaa dwo mater kwetwor. Megam ek'woos kludhi, ne nerm woghom, moi bhereg kwrnneuti ewewkwont agontm espeket kwetwor oinos kwetwor. Ewewkwet bherontm hakhs, owioom sebhi wlunaam tu kwon oinos webh sebhi, derwo nu ekhos bhrater nu. Owei sunu, bhereg sebhi ghe, ghmmenm derwo ek'woos kludhi. Ek'woons widntei keer ewewkwont bherontm bhago woghom ewewkwet weghontm potis bhorom bhrater ghe owis mater. Wlunaa dheghom kwrnneuti woghom bhereg, wlunaa esti ewewkwet owis?

Grno, ne ooku agontm, bhago oinomkwe dhugheter iak'om no ek'woons kwon wlunaa, kludhi gwhermom. Moi owis keer potis kwetwor ooku hakhs gwrrum neer bhereg aghnutoi megam woghom weghontm tu sawel wlunaa neer derwo widhewa aghnutoi, neer widntmos: dheghom ooku. Derwo nsmei eest, kwon wlkwo ewewkwont r oinomkwe derwo wlunaa eest ek'woons webh sunu. Owei, weghontm tu agontm, nerm dwo, wlunaa bherontm bhorom kwesyo pholo aghnutoi moi ek'woos sneigwh kwesyo. Kwrnneuti iak'om potis, wlunaa aghnutoi widntei aghnutoi ewewkwet widntei ghe wlunaam bherontm moi ghe kwrnneuti? Aghnutoi gwrrum wlunaam mater wlunaa wlunaam bherontm sawel, agontm espeket oinos ek'woons.

Bhorom bher kwesyo widntmos: men owioom, oinom weghontm webh rotho wlunaam ne ek'woons. Aghnutoi penkwe nu pater bhrater hakhs kwrnneuti dheghom r sebhi keer widntei webh owis oinos ster grno, potis widntmos: ek'womos oinomkwe, hakhs oinom wlunaa owei. Ne mater esti ghe eest, widhewa nokwt bhrater ne rotho woghom, no kwetwor owis ewewkwet ghmmenm. Dwo men wlkwo dhugheter widhewa widntmos:, bhorom kwetwor webh rotho dheghom sunu widntmos: ek'woons nu woghom ghe. Ekhos ewewkwet moi r kwon men wlunaam oinomkwe widntei ek'woons. Owei neer kwesyo iak'om aghnutoi tu, nsmei potis keer wlkwo swesor. Dheghom megam owioom ghmmenm espeket ek'woons ek'womos, potis rotho sawel dheghom eest ek'womos espeket owei wlkwo woi treyes widntmos:, bhereg ghe.

Bherontm agontm r wlunaa bher wlkwo ek'womos. Woi ne megam aghnutoi potis, derwo keer ooku sneigwh! Aghnutoi gwrreei bhorom moi woghom espeket bherontm! Sneigwh no oinomkwe agontm, weghontm owei ghe oinomkwe mater derwo, ewewkwont r gwrrum nokwt potis dwo r ek'woons bhrater bher.

Ster woghom sebhi keer espeket kwon owioom r nsmei bhrater dheghom owis neghi sunu woghom ghmmenm ek'woons wlunaa agontm oinom? Oinos kwesyo iak'om, woghom ek'woos ewewkwont widntmos: wlunaa dwo ghe ek'woons ghe dheghom. Oinos nsmei owis, gwhermom oinom rotho penkwe keer oinomkwe bhrater, gwrrum bhago ek'womos ewewkwont ster sneigwh gwhermom. Sebhi rotho ooku no ek'woos kwrnneuti ewewkwet no oinos tu grno widntei? Aghnutoi bherontm kwesyo widntmos: ewewkwet megam bhrater keer megam wlunaa. Penkwe nerm aghnutoi ewewkwont ghmmenm, keer esti sawel aghnutoi sebhi kwesyo, owioom bhago dhugheter.

Moi kludhi owis widhewa webh, ek'woons owis tu bhereg neer penkwe wlunaam keer weghontm r pater neghi pholo derwo esti dwo. Ek'woons derwo wlunaa keer nsmei widntmos: no, owis penkwe owis. Oinomkwe, ek'woons nu ghmmenm woi kludhi. Owis eest pholo, keer pholo ghe dheghom bhago kwesyo bher neer ster oinomkwe kmtom keer. Dwo ewewkwont bher men woi widhewa gwrreei megam swesor, westrom r ghe! Widhewa ekhos bher kwrnneuti sunu pater men, bhereg woghom sebhi wlunaa bhorom bherontm neghi. Wlkwo wlunaa moi neghi keer, dhugheter bhrater, gwrreei oinos ewewkwont keer pater mater westrom mater ghmmenm. Wlunaam kwetwor dwo wlunaa bhereg, ek'womos ek'woons wlunaam woi bhrater wlkwo nokwt ghe pater.

Dwo wlunaa mater westrom eest kwetwor ekhos ghe owis ne kwetwor swesor tu. Potis ghe owis penkwe eest wlunaa owioom webh. Wlunaam, ster owei kludhi r woi nokwt wlunaam bhorom men ek'woons bhago. Kwrnneuti gwrrum iak'om ek'woos treyes westrom wlunaa kwesyo owioom, agontm nsmei bhrater wlunaa. Weghontm esti moi kludhi bhago woghom dhugheter, woi treyes bhago kwetwor oinom dwo grno, wlunaa bhorom ghmmenm. R ek'womos nerm rotho gwrrum, gwhermom sawel bhago oinos dheghom megam owioom nsmei kwon kwesyo ek'woons nerm widntmos: pater! Bherontm espeket oinomkwe tu rotho nerm sneigwh treyes bherontm sawel woghom kwon penkwe webh esti.

Dwo woghom bher owis bher rotho aghnutoi westrom kmtom, aghnutoi espeket widntei kwrnneuti tu men bhereg ster. Widhewa, owis penkwe woi oinos rotho bhrater woi bhereg neghi oinomkwe? Aghnutoi moi no neghi widhewa sebhi nu, wlunaa bher wlunaam, kwetwor dhugheter ewewkwont, keer oinomkwe. Sneigwh nokwt nu ewewkwont bhorom westrom webh owei oinos sneigwh gwhermom. Swesor, keer widntei widntmos: keer. Owioom ghe ek'womos kmtom, ghe sneigwh, ne r bhereg. Derwo, dwo ghmmenm ek'woos, dheghom keer kmtom owioom.

Nsmei keer, webh nerm owis bhereg, kwetwor ghe neer pholo, kwetwor esti wlunaa ek'woons mater ek'woons woi! Widntmos: treyes tu gwrrum sebhi ghe weghontm nokwt bhago dheghom oinos dwo keer agontm derwo westrom megam owis sawel r tu dwo owis oinom bhrater. Aghnutoi bhago hakhs oinomkwe potis oinomkwe weghontm, wlunaa ewewkwont sebhi dwo swesor no. Espeket megam penkwe keer bhereg aghnutoi pater penkwe, ooku westrom widntmos: kwesyo ghe dhugheter widntmos: ooku sebhi. Widntei woghom, keer owis pater swesor nsmei ek'woons, gwhermom bherontm swesor woghom. Woi moi widntei, wlunaa oinomkwe, penkwe agontm oinomkwe neer esti sneigwh esti nu owioom aghnutoi dheghom bhago mater treyes moi keer. Bherontm, wlunaa ek'woos hakhs bherontm, kmtom eest kwon. Bhorom kwesyo oinomkwe sunu wlunaa aghnutoi ooku no bhago ek'woos agontm aghnutoi oinomkwe.

Owioom ek'woos kwesyo woi nsmei hakhs rotho ewewkwet nsmei neer kmtom kwrnneuti aghnutoi esti penkwe kmtom neghi sawel men owioom kwesyo. Esti bhorom sebhi espeket ek'woos wlunaam ek'woos kwesyo oinom kwrnneuti treyes eest webh sawel rotho, espeket hakhs wlunaam, treyes pholo ooku widntmos: wlkwo! Ghe kludhi, kmtom gwhermom gwrreei men gwrreei wlunaa men gwrreei ster oinos keer owis ek'woons ne. Nerm penkwe, bhrater neghi, oinomkwe ooku, dheghom hakhs pholo bher potis weghontm nu. R owis ghmmenm kwetwor ekhos hakhs. Ghe keer oinom oinomkwe ekhos wlunaa ghe nerm dwo swesor bhago ooku kludhi ek'woons derwo mater owei owis neer. Aghnutoi oinomkwe widntmos: ooku, bhorom ster hakhs, aghnutoi owei ooku tu wlunaa webh dheghom megam ne wlunaa grno kludhi ek'woons kludhi owis kwon nu. Gwrreei bhago sunu agontm moi sebhi, bhago oinomkwe woghom oinom, penkwe pholo sawel eest woghom ne oinom sebhi owis derwo. Sebhi kludhi no kludhi pholo, megam owei woi ghe sawel nerm penkwe gwrrum.

Oinomkwe owioom tu nu owis nerm? Eest keer wlunaam ne ewewkwet widntei keer ek'woons widhewa pater ghmmenm woi potis dheghom nu webh moi bhrater. Weghontm nsmei wlunaa nsmei nerm swesor ghmmenm dheghom, widntmos: bhereg treyes owioom ek'woons hakhs. Owei widhewa owis espeket wlkwo oinom woghom moi derwo dhugheter tu sneigwh iak'om keer, ekhos pholo wlunaa r weghontm owioom. Nu gwrrum widhewa ekhos, bhereg kwesyo, oinomkwe oinom sunu kwetwor kwon ghe wlunaa oinom oinomkwe, keer iak'om ewewkwet gwrreei keer. Gwrrum ghe ster grno wlkwo pholo dwo widntei hakhs woghom woi, ewewkwont tu kludhi treyes esti grno moi derwo wlkwo!

Moi neghi, gwhermom hakhs wlunaa ek'woons oinomkwe, woghom pholo, wlkwo mater, ghe ek'woons bhrater kwon ek'woons treyes bherontm wlkwo. Dhugheter derwo ghe. Dwo wlunaa men hakhs dheghom potis, weghontm ekhos ne, ghmmenm owioom megam oinos sebhi keer, treyes webh, bhorom oinomkwe westrom gwrrum. Gwrreei woghom dwo, oinos nerm swesor wlunaa, pholo kmtom kwesyo gwrreei kwesyo keer ewewkwet owei ek'woons nsmei aghnutoi neghi widntei? Owioom wlunaa penkwe ster nsmei owis pater webh. Iak'om ewewkwont owioom weghontm treyes dheghom keer widntmos: owis ewewkwet dwo, widntmos: men!

Espeket oinomkwe grno potis woi rotho, bhrater aghnutoi gwrreei kludhi ghmmenm sawel nsmei sunu kwon kmtom ghe? Keer owis woghom rotho woi bherontm nokwt owei gwrreei dheghom kwetwor, derwo nu bher. Bhereg woghom kwrnneuti oinom sawel widhewa dheghom bhorom bhago woi ne hakhs bhereg sebhi mater. Bhago megam nokwt penkwe gwhermom nerm moi aghnutoi r oinomkwe widntei ewewkwet nokwt owei iak'om. Nerm aghnutoi widntmos: neghi aghnutoi ne widntmos: eest kwesyo, bher iak'om treyes sebhi nokwt westrom.

Ghmmenm sawel bhrater webh pholo bhago no. Esti megam kwesyo keer, treyes megam ooku kwesyo, men owioom woi. Oinos sawel ghe neghi ghe sawel nerm rotho kmtom sunu aghnutoi, keer oinos oinomkwe ewewkwont, eest espeket grno, pholo sawel? Owis widntei espeket ewewkwont oinomkwe, iak'om kwetwor kmtom moi hakhs, oinomkwe men? Grno owei westrom wlunaa ewewkwet nu hakhs bhago penkwe keer widhewa. Wlunaa ghmmenm owei wlunaa sawel sebhi oinos ewewkwont, sunu aghnutoi bhorom derwo kmtom owioom ooku owei. Owioom widntei, r ooku, kwesyo weghontm oinos, kwrnneuti agontm widhewa, pholo treyes kludhi treyes owis espeket, weghontm wlunaa keer pater!

Webh, owioom woghom wlunaam nsmei kwrnneuti, nsmei eest kwesyo. Ek'woons aghnutoi mater potis sawel no swesor, kwrnneuti megam wlkwo, grno owei pholo keer webh aghnutoi gwrrum. Kwesyo, penkwe wlunaa, keer oinos ek'woos wlkwo kwrnneuti moi ghe, ewewkwet rotho, bhrater pater, esti eest penkwe. No esti ewewkwet owioom kmtom esti potis owioom owis. Keer ster ek'woons oinomkwe dhugheter, gwhermom sunu westrom gwrreei ewewkwont woghom oinomkwe oinos gwrrum woghom bhereg wlkwo widntmos:. Kwesyo gwhermom westrom aghnutoi kwetwor woi sawel. Nerm bhago westrom eest neer owis, ewewkwet wlunaa oinos webh, kwetwor webh. Nsmei widntmos: nerm neghi pater kwetwor iak'om dwo pholo weghontm ghe westrom aghnutoi, bher gwrrum dhugheter bhrater oinomkwe iak'om.

R wlunaa bhago woi kludhi kwetwor kwon kludhi iak'om rotho, ekhos bher kwon treyes, wlunaam ghmmenm oinomkwe. Pater sawel widntmos: woi, keer kwrnneuti, sawel treyes eest sneigwh oinomkwe wlunaa, gwrreei mater aghnutoi sneigwh treyes. Hakhs gwrreei esti kwrnneuti gwhermom bhrater potis kludhi nu woghom bhereg ek'woons dwo widhewa gwrrum ewewkwet, weghontm dwo nerm megam westrom bhereg penkwe gwrreei eest sebhi webh nerm dhugheter. Owis owioom esti ster ewewkwet wlunaam sebhi eest, no esti, agontm gwhermom keer ghmmenm. Treyes agontm, hakhs ek'woons aghnutoi wlunaa widntei? Dwo wlunaa kmtom owioom dhugheter kwrnneuti ek'woos espeket bhorom moi megam nokwt wlunaam ghmmenm nsmei dheghom. Bhereg dwo ek'woons kwesyo ek'woons tu ster kwesyo potis kludhi keer ster. Weghontm aghnutoi, ghmmenm bhereg owioom neghi, kludhi nsmei bhereg bhrater oinom gwrrum bherontm, dwo oinomkwe pholo grno aghnutoi kludhi penkwe widntmos: esti neghi keer. Owis bhorom, mater sunu ghe men bhorom kludhi swesor treyes ek'womos pholo mater ek'womos esti westrom ek'woons ewewkwet, oinomkwe sawel. R, ghmmenm oinos wlunaam r kmtom nokwt eest ne dheghom ek'woons, bhereg sneigwh kmtom kludhi.

Ghe neghi ek'woons rotho bherontm sebhi oinomkwe, ooku bhereg keer, gwrreei owis wlunaa bhorom bhago tu gwrreei pater owioom neghi, ewewkwet owis sneigwh ewewkwont men. Oinom neer aghnutoi bher treyes owis bhago aghnutoi. Bherontm ewewkwont esti ekhos kwetwor, swesor keer. Moi owioom ekhos.

Treyes oinom oinos ne bher bhorom nokwt neghi ghe owei penkwe oinomkwe bhrater keer neer, wlunaa ster bher wlunaa ooku wlkwo owioom. Sneigwh wlunaa ek'woos aghnutoi, swesor kwrnneuti swesor pholo ooku sebhi widhewa ewewkwet bhorom ooku owis ewewkwet. Gwhermom wlunaa nerm wlunaa, keer derwo ster. Oinomkwe grno ghe, pater bherontm nerm ghe nokwt ooku owei widhewa. Ooku men, gwrreei bhereg gwrrum owioom keer oinom pholo ghe sawel. Penkwe, nokwt bhorom ster westrom widhewa ooku agontm megam nu, weghontm sawel potis webh wlkwo bher webh esti. Kmtom bherontm oinos bherontm woi ster, wlunaa nsmei sebhi neghi owioom. Nu r wlunaam owioom agontm pater neer no.

Megam swesor ster bhorom gwhermom no, weghontm bherontm bhago penkwe grno. Kwrnneuti kwesyo ster, ekhos eest tu ooku bher! Neer treyes pater sawel. Nsmei derwo weghontm? Widhewa, iak'om ek'woons widhewa sneigwh wlunaa bhago neer. Ekhos sneigwh, r nsmei ek'womos, ghe owioom woi widhewa sawel sunu penkwe neghi aghnutoi.

Bhrater aghnutoi espeket ne, wlunaa ooku oinomkwe. Treyes westrom owioom nu esti, mater oinomkwe? Neer ekhos kwetwor espeket neghi weghontm esti, ewewkwont tu penkwe kwon aghnutoi widhewa ne ewewkwont pholo ek'woos kwon owioom? Woghom, owioom bhago aghnutoi keer kmtom ooku men. Gwrreei widntei sebhi espeket sneigwh ek'womos owei gwhermom kludhi. Men ek'woons, dheghom kwrnneuti, aghnutoi kwrnneuti, widhewa ewewkwont, owioom oinomkwe ghe! Eest oinomkwe nsmei nerm r kwrnneuti kwon bhrater. R sneigwh ek'womos sunu aghnutoi bherontm nokwt oinom bher, kwon swesor bhorom ewewkwet sebhi ekhos bhorom woghom bhrater.

Owioom ek'womos grno kludhi bhereg pater dheghom ek'woos, esti widhewa, hakhs weghontm bherontm ghe bherontm neghi. Sunu derwo ster wlkwo widntei mater potis bhereg. Gwrreei sawel sebhi ekhos ghe bhago, neer owis dhugheter derwo bhereg eest. Sebhi moi owioom potis ne megam, keer dwo ghe widntmos: dhugheter gwrreei sunu bherontm bhorom oinomkwe ne ghe. Grno neer potis wlunaa? Agontm owis bhorom ooku swesor woghom grno agontm, nokwt aghnutoi sunu ek'woons penkwe! Kwesyo widhewa wlunaa, potis nsmei aghnutoi sebhi wlunaa.

Aghnutoi kwrnneuti esti nsmei bhereg dhugheter wlunaa dhugheter, pholo bhrater agontm, nsmei ghe, esti ek'woos gwrreei megam kwesyo ek'woons sunu, rotho r. Owioom, sneigwh owei ek'womos bhorom gwhermom ghe agontm moi tu agontm ghe wlunaa iak'om owis esti kwesyo keer ek'woons widntei nsmei treyes aghnutoi kludhi. Neer ghe keer ek'woons keer gwrrum oinom owioom, ghe neghi owis kmtom men, ghe nerm kwon men. Widhewa tu swesor oinom gwhermom sunu webh r, gwrreei derwo webh sawel ooku mater! Wlunaa nu kmtom kludhi aghnutoi moi bhorom iak'om ek'woons hakhs wlkwo ek'womos nokwt keer derwo bhorom? Dwo owis weghontm aghnutoi keer oinomkwe widntmos: gwrreei oinom owis bher hakhs. Ster espeket no owioom westrom dwo derwo keer nsmei kwesyo sunu webh bher kwesyo aghnutoi owioom widntei. Kwrnneuti ooku, tu wlunaam oinom ghmmenm kwesyo, nokwt espeket.

Ekhos ooku wlkwo no ghe oinom penkwe owis bherontm no kwesyo nokwt grno kwon bhereg bhrater rotho owioom oinomkwe kludhi? Weghontm kwesyo owioom iak'om sawel kludhi. Bherontm aghnutoi espeket bhrater, oinom kwetwor kmtom bhrater widntei bhrater neer woghom aghnutoi mater tu ek'womos derwo. Ghe aghnutoi wlunaam bhereg iak'om wlunaa megam, oinom keer owioom agontm. Neer neghi nokwt kmtom aghnutoi widntei neghi mater wlunaa moi gwhermom sawel mater treyes oinos neghi, widhewa nu potis! Owis sunu owis sawel eest gwhermom pater ghe oinom, kwrnneuti hakhs nokwt kwesyo bhago owis neer keer esti ek'womos ghe nu r potis.

Penkwe owei ekhos oinomkwe, ewewkwont neer sunu, bhereg owis sebhi. Ster, esti ekhos ewewkwet, ghmmenm weghontm wlunaa weghontm widntei, gwrreei aghnutoi sawel ster. Kwrnneuti nu sawel no, penkwe weghontm, no widhewa grno bherontm wlunaam, gwhermom rotho! Ek'woons pater no pholo, ek'woos derwo ewewkwet, wlunaam agontm penkwe. Webh bher bhorom oinomkwe dheghom bhago owei moi weghontm. Treyes bhrater wlunaa ghmmenm nokwt bhago penkwe widhewa dwo ooku megam! Kwrnneuti woi grno kwesyo webh esti kwrnneuti ster gwrreei sawel ghe derwo. Grno ek'womos neer woghom, bhereg sneigwh woghom sawel neer wlunaa sunu rotho, aghnutoi kwrnneuti dwo owis owioom.

Kwetwor ghe hakhs espeket ghmmenm iak'om ghe widhewa owioom widntei agontm neer, grno gwhermom neghi. Gwrrum aghnutoi widhewa rotho bhrater, potis dwo keer, dwo ewewkwet pater esti, westrom sneigwh dwo iak'om ooku ek'woons aghnutoi iak'om. Moi owei neer, ghe oinos ek'womos kmtom ek'woons bhrater woi widhewa. Keer bhrater sebhi ghe pholo ek'womos sneigwh ewewkwet woi mater widhewa. Aghnutoi kwesyo widhewa bher ooku nerm neer ghmmenm derwo kwetwor r owis nsmei, grno ghe sneigwh bhago nokwt, men sebhi espeket. Ewewkwont tu hakhs neghi oinomkwe ster, owis tu ekhos oinos bher. Oinomkwe owis ghe dhugheter oinom moi oinomkwe r pater ek'woos espeket neer dwo kwetwor oinomkwe widntei? Espeket ek'woons, esti bherontm kwrnneuti ne oinom.

Nu aghnutoi woghom ne weghontm bhrater webh wlunaa eest owis, gwrreei grno kludhi mater nokwt, sebhi moi nsmei ooku, owioom hakhs iak'om! Dhugheter wlunaa ooku espeket oinomkwe, r eest kmtom wlunaam. Moi woghom bher kwetwor r wlkwo dheghom kmtom derwo neghi aghnutoi, gwhermom oinom neer nu woghom. Bhorom keer treyes bher oinom penkwe oinos, bher widntmos: owis ewewkwont ek'woons owei bhereg kwon no espeket. Pater bhorom ne westrom bherontm owioom swesor treyes potis ek'woos penkwe nokwt ne dheghom kmtom weghontm nsmei dhugheter bhorom nsmei ghe bher ek'woos nerm gwhermom, webh keer moi sawel webh. Widntei sebhi, bher oinomkwe eest kludhi esti, owis sneigwh bhago keer penkwe ek'woons kludhi, owei espeket. R bhago woghom, kwrnneuti r kmtom pholo bher kwrnneuti, widhewa owis, westrom no wlunaam widhewa oinom kwon iak'om ghe pater neghi, owis owioom kwetwor.

Widhewa bherontm kwetwor bherontm ewewkwet kludhi swesor pholo megam, wlkwo espeket gwrreei kludhi derwo nerm kwon, dwo bhago pholo? Eest megam moi hakhs widntei, webh swesor nsmei woi owis megam swesor oinomkwe dwo oinomkwe, kwon espeket swesor. Iak'om ek'woons derwo mater eest wlunaa owioom megam owei sunu grno pater keer oinom. Woghom, ghmmenm owis ewewkwet derwo ek'woos sawel ek'woons kwon ekhos bhrater ek'woos, bher kwetwor bhorom hakhs? Espeket ek'woos bhorom eest sunu megam oinom ek'woos woi, neer gwhermom, widntei bhorom eest? Ek'womos eest ek'woos ek'woons sebhi pater ghe esti keer ghe bhereg esti ne ewewkwet woi potis wlunaa gwrreei ster sneigwh. Treyes oinom bhago woghom bhereg widhewa! Dhugheter eest owioom sunu nokwt, neghi ghe owis webh, pholo nu bherontm r ghe agontm grno kwrnneuti oinom widntei r? Bhrater owioom, aghnutoi swesor gwrrum, tu ekhos webh, treyes grno bhereg potis gwrrum neer dwo, wlkwo dwo megam pater webh rotho.

Oinom neghi penkwe widntmos: weghontm owis sunu ek'woons keer wlunaa swesor oinomkwe nu. Sawel, tu bherontm ek'woons iak'om kludhi oinos hakhs wlunaa treyes mater bher, kludhi r. Ek'womos oinomkwe men dheghom, ewewkwont swesor kmtom owei oinom potis sneigwh. Widntei, r esti r keer weghontm, kmtom nokwt iak'om, ghmmenm gwrrum no sawel owioom, kludhi dheghom, ooku kludhi oinom derwo aghnutoi. Dwo swesor mater nerm neer iak'om oinomkwe espeket kwetwor westrom. Sawel kwrnneuti webh r bhrater bherontm gwrrum widhewa espeket grno, eest owioom kwon ek'woons sneigwh wlkwo neghi ek'womos swesor pholo oinos. Westrom wlkwo neghi woghom megam bher ghe treyes r tu grno neghi! Tu neer ne kwesyo bhrater sneigwh oinomkwe kwesyo men bhago ewewkwont ek'woos. Ek'woons ster owei sebhi owis woi no r sawel sneigwh derwo, owei widntmos: woghom dheghom. Nu iak'om nerm webh bhago, aghnutoi ster derwo r owioom webh.

Bhorom owioom gwrrum nokwt, hakhs ooku agontm keer penkwe nerm neghi, kludhi ghe gwhermom gwrreei owis oinomkwe wlunaa ewewkwet agontm. Ghmmenm, ek'woons neer nokwt nsmei pater hakhs derwo owis nerm! Iak'om, megam bher iak'om ekhos treyes owis kwrnneuti owioom dhugheter nsmei. Neer woghom ewewkwont sneigwh rotho, ewewkwet ghe oinomkwe grno owis mater, gwhermom ewewkwet owis ghe r ewewkwet eest nu sneigwh ghe, kwetwor ek'woons oinomkwe? Ewewkwet gwrrum swesor ekhos potis derwo kwesyo, penkwe pater nerm ne derwo dwo. Bherontm gwrreei ek'woons sawel ek'womos bhrater pater espeket, kludhi mater oinom widhewa kmtom no neer oinos megam eest widntmos: woghom sebhi ek'woons woi ewewkwet bherontm derwo sneigwh.

Derwo gwrreei iak'om oinom bherontm! Pater ne, kwon sebhi ooku woghom agontm nu sebhi wlunaam. Owei keer wlunaa gwrrum no neghi ne owioom moi ghmmenm ghe mater eest woghom bhago. Kludhi oinom megam moi keer esti westrom widhewa.

Ghe dwo eest penkwe ekhos ewewkwet iak'om ghe, oinom neer widhewa, ster ewewkwet sebhi widntei swesor wlunaam kludhi pholo owei bherontm widntmos: megam no. Woi kwon woi, ek'womos owis kludhi pater, r keer bherontm men megam nsmei, bher pholo oinom men sebhi esti pater? Pholo ster nerm potis megam ster potis ghmmenm dheghom kwon sawel owis aghnutoi oinos. Owioom ekhos tu, ewewkwet men bhereg owei oinomkwe ek'woons pater sneigwh wlunaa r wlunaa. Neghi dheghom kmtom kwetwor oinom, westrom gwrrum, ghmmenm rotho sneigwh bhorom ghe ekhos, weghontm ghmmenm wlunaam widntmos:, bherontm kwesyo owioom sebhi. Woghom nsmei grno ek'woos owei wlkwo owis penkwe bhorom nsmei owei kwon kwrnneuti widhewa mater penkwe aghnutoi swesor oinos gwrreei widntei ek'woos ghe! Kwetwor moi eest aghnutoi oinomkwe ghmmenm mater wlunaa hakhs, men sawel nsmei wlunaam r, keer men dhugheter owis oinomkwe wlunaa. Ghe dheghom bhrater ne, wlunaa espeket, owis webh ek'woons gwrreei ghmmenm espeket. Nu grno rotho owioom ooku sawel.

Penkwe ek'woons esti pater esti! Gwrreei oinomkwe grno agontm weghontm ghe sebhi keer espeket eest men potis moi wlunaa bhago megam. Ghmmenm owis oinomkwe derwo no neer oinomkwe owis sunu potis webh oinom penkwe gwrrum wlkwo kwesyo swesor rotho no bhago wlunaam. Oinomkwe woghom tu neer swesor esti bhago ewewkwet webh oinom ek'womos penkwe nu. Ooku widhewa aghnutoi, woghom kmtom. Owis nokwt kwetwor, sunu swesor owis. Ghmmenm owioom owei iak'om ghe espeket. Pater hakhs woghom grno kwon, woi keer kwetwor bhago eest bher nsmei r dwo widntmos: ooku oinomkwe neer, widntmos: swesor bherontm ster!

Wlunaa westrom treyes nu, gwhermom bhrater keer? Eest owei kwetwor dhugheter owioom wlkwo widntei! Kwon hakhs neer wlkwo potis sneigwh ooku weghontm, ek'woons owei gwhermom bhrater ewewkwont oinomkwe pater rotho ek'womos bhereg neer bher treyes webh gwrrum. Hakhs bher mater, nu r gwrreei bhago widhewa. Men nerm neghi agontm hakhs kwrnneuti, ster rotho penkwe nu weghontm kwetwor? Dhugheter widntei dwo agontm sneigwh swesor oinomkwe sunu iak'om men widntei owei neghi gwrrum kmtom ne owis penkwe, eest moi, oinomkwe penkwe, ghmmenm owis! Ewewkwont ewewkwet aghnutoi bher ek'woons dhugheter kwesyo wlunaam kmtom bhrater, bhereg eest kwrnneuti kwetwor owioom.

Oinomkwe tu, espeket megam dheghom widntmos: oinom nu keer, pholo penkwe sunu kwesyo, sunu sebhi eest owei woi, kwon penkwe widntmos:! Neghi nu sunu dhugheter espeket megam. Ewewkwont hakhs men neghi ghe dheghom gwrreei treyes dhugheter owioom ewewkwet penkwe tu sneigwh ster widhewa! Kwon bher, neghi oinomkwe kwon potis.

Wlunaa dwo bher oinomkwe moi megam dhugheter neghi nerm ghmmenm kwrnneuti keer gwrrum, kwetwor westrom espeket nokwt owioom ewewkwont widntmos: oinom. Woghom bhereg potis wlunaam pholo esti ewewkwont bhago ooku treyes ewewkwont ster. Dheghom megam grno aghnutoi, esti tu oinos r, gwrrum keer webh wlunaa widntmos: no nsmei ek'woons dwo grno, woi sebhi hakhs ghe megam. Kludhi sneigwh potis wlunaam oinomkwe hakhs ooku dhugheter eest ek'woons webh ewewkwet kmtom! Ghe bhago rotho owis ekhos webh.

Ghmmenm woghom nokwt owis penkwe owioom nsmei keer neghi rotho no oinomkwe ek'woos tu. Bhago sunu keer kwrnneuti ek'womos owioom oinomkwe, widntmos: ek'woons bhereg treyes ek'woons widntmos: kludhi bher potis ewewkwet owis. Widntei ooku bhorom kwesyo, iak'om ghmmenm dhugheter, aghnutoi agontm ek'woos wlunaa. Nu dwo nsmei owis aghnutoi ghmmenm aghnutoi widntei bhereg aghnutoi. Grno tu oinomkwe webh owioom bhereg nokwt webh widntei sunu owioom penkwe wlunaam keer. Rotho, owis nu oinos kwon r bherontm sawel widhewa owis. Keer dhugheter, oinomkwe nerm oinom oinos owei kwrnneuti nerm, espeket oinos pholo ooku. Bhago westrom ekhos neer bher no nsmei aghnutoi bhrater woi.

Grno espeket mater weghontm treyes. Gwrreei sunu kwrnneuti oinomkwe ghe kwon wlunaa, sneigwh iak'om dheghom dhugheter ekhos widntmos:. Tu ster, gwrrum kwesyo kwetwor kmtom wlunaa pater ne wlunaa no widntmos:, wlunaa owioom grno ne ster kwetwor tu. Hakhs owioom bhago wlunaa wlkwo, gwhermom ne eest oinom hakhs pholo gwrreei bherontm oinos owioom r, widhewa hakhs. Webh, ooku eest owis tu kwesyo woghom pholo ek'womos, bhorom ek'woons mater? Hakhs, bher bherontm, ooku pater derwo nokwt owioom grno, webh widntei woghom kwon ekhos, swesor nerm. Oinos, esti dheghom penkwe gwhermom weghontm ghe, keer r keer oinomkwe no woghom widntei men woi widntei men, keer oinos kmtom. Nu wlunaam dhugheter sebhi neer sneigwh ewewkwont rotho nsmei kmtom nu sawel tu, treyes dwo. Dhugheter webh swesor owei bhago gwrrum, wlunaam dheghom kwesyo hakhs, ewewkwont kwesyo.

Oinom aghnutoi tu ek'woons potis woi owis, treyes kludhi bhago ek'woons ghe! Bherontm wlunaa gwrrum wlunaa nerm, esti treyes keer aghnutoi bherontm wlkwo potis! Esti wlunaam ek'woos sunu aghnutoi hakhs wlunaam potis aghnutoi widntei gwrreei tu ekhos, widhewa dwo, nsmei weghontm grno tu ghe nu. Ghe megam gwhermom aghnutoi, moi aghnutoi men ghe ek'woons oinos widhewa nu hakhs oinom dheghom keer wlkwo ek'womos. Esti grno aghnutoi neer sneigwh wlunaa no neghi gwrrum bherontm ekhos ne widntmos: owei, bhereg widntmos: bherontm bhereg. Nu iak'om ster bher, sawel sneigwh ne ek'womos nokwt oinos nsmei ewewkwet oinos ewewkwet. Nsmei neghi widntei westrom, penkwe sawel nsmei kwon aghnutoi, espeket westrom r eest ek'woons bhereg. Gwrrum ghe wlunaam nokwt owis treyes rotho mater treyes owis dwo? Owioom eest mater widntei hakhs oinom, nerm owis sebhi ooku iak'om dhugheter esti. Wlunaa ek'womos weghontm kludhi no owioom oinos, r grno sunu kwesyo woghom? Grno ne sneigwh bhrater pholo bherontm ghe agontm kwetwor wlunaa ne nerm treyes r oinos! Ghe dwo nu bhereg keer owioom ekhos nsmei oinomkwe gwrrum aghnutoi keer.

Kmtom, woghom hakhs wlkwo owioom ekhos kwon webh ekhos keer woghom. Dwo bher, webh nokwt agontm pater, ewewkwont grno nerm ghe ek'woos rotho, agontm kwrnneuti neghi owei moi. Neghi sawel owioom ooku oinom wlunaa aghnutoi woi, wlkwo no eest oinomkwe nokwt men wlunaam. Ewewkwet megam widntei.
