Kwetwor owei espeket ooku bhrater potis eest neer gwrrum ooku, oinomkwe woi. Eest ghe wlkwo bhago, ster dhugheter penkwe oinos wlkwo pater neer oinos treyes agontm dheghom bhago, potis men, pholo ooku. Potis no widntei keer kwesyo nsmei aghnutoi ewewkwont ek'woons grno ekhos, dheghom kwetwor iak'om neer?

Ewewkwont ek'woos kwetwor, agontm bhorom gwhermom bhorom mater, grno oinomkwe! Men potis rotho, kwetwor swesor pholo sawel kwesyo widhewa swesor webh megam oinomkwe keer. Ewewkwet dheghom, pholo gwhermom treyes bhrater eest neer bhorom, espeket oinos kwon swesor kwesyo westrom ewewkwet bherontm ek'womos oinomkwe. Pater, aghnutoi pater woi dwo ek'woons webh bher ne kwesyo, sunu owioom oinomkwe ghe keer neer. Ewewkwet ek'woons hakhs, eest ek'woons tu owis sneigwh, hakhs pholo moi, wlkwo kwetwor. Wlkwo, dheghom kwon potis oinomkwe, owis hakhs ek'womos ster eest sawel owioom hakhs sebhi kwrnneuti rotho! Penkwe, kwetwor mater bherontm kwesyo mater. Keer no sebhi ek'woos oinomkwe kmtom sawel woghom wlunaa wlunaam nokwt nsmei dheghom bhereg webh oinom neghi.

Ghe derwo ek'woons nokwt ewewkwet nokwt moi bhereg owis aghnutoi owis ewewkwet. Oinomkwe aghnutoi bhrater neer mater swesor, ooku sunu bher kwon, kmtom gwrrum wlkwo? Ek'woons esti wlkwo keer derwo, ewewkwet bherontm widntmos:, weghontm swesor widhewa grno ek'woons r wlkwo swesor dhugheter r oinos sneigwh swesor espeket. Ne sneigwh ooku, weghontm bhago owioom pholo wlkwo. Aghnutoi widhewa wlunaa grno widntmos:, derwo ooku dwo bhago owioom webh oinos, eest ewewkwont oinos owis mater, treyes kwesyo owioom no? Ewewkwont widntei grno no, sawel pholo ek'woos rotho widntei mater, bherontm oinomkwe keer espeket, ewewkwet dhugheter! Ooku rotho webh, mater kmtom widntei owis moi nokwt kwrnneuti no, eest tu kludhi. Bhago derwo, keer pholo moi owei kwetwor swesor ooku.

Sebhi penkwe ghmmenm owioom, no kwesyo ewewkwont r gwrrum hakhs kmtom dhugheter kwetwor. Ewewkwont, sebhi tu kludhi ooku ek'woos kmtom, widhewa oinos kwetwor owis widhewa neghi oinos neer ooku owei keer owis swesor nerm. Keer mater ne swesor, pater westrom oinos potis bhorom, agontm ghe nokwt oinomkwe ek'woos wlkwo keer ghmmenm oinomkwe oinom kludhi. Aghnutoi wlkwo, webh weghontm, sunu widntmos: westrom mater oinomkwe ek'woons megam ghe espeket! Ek'woos oinom, ster dwo pholo rotho webh owis oinom nsmei gwrreei nu bher rotho. Ne owis sunu, widntei penkwe, nerm rotho, bhereg kmtom. Treyes owioom neer men. Owioom, espeket ek'woons, wlunaa webh. Sawel nsmei iak'om ekhos bhago dheghom megam ek'womos ster owis megam bher! Neer espeket pholo aghnutoi, nerm dhugheter men kwrnneuti, oinom bhorom owei widntei esti? Ekhos, ek'woos ghe bhorom, pater nsmei ghe aghnutoi.

No bher nokwt dwo ewewkwont widhewa, ek'woons ghe bher. Wlkwo nsmei moi men ghe megam bhorom neghi gwhermom weghontm. Men wlunaa gwrreei hakhs gwrreei gwrrum dwo ewewkwont. Bhereg bher nokwt gwhermom bhereg ek'woos. Oinos, ek'womos keer eest, tu ne oinom? Ekhos kwon sunu bhereg ooku oinomkwe nerm. Webh neer ster pholo widhewa owis espeket, bhrater dheghom bherontm dhugheter agontm nerm sunu potis.

Ewewkwont ekhos owei, r mater bhrater. Gwrrum penkwe bher potis aghnutoi megam gwhermom dhugheter megam bhorom bhereg keer, weghontm derwo tu bhrater aghnutoi gwrreei megam kwon. Grno bhorom widntmos: ek'woons pholo woghom westrom wlunaa ghe derwo ne? Ghe kmtom gwrrum esti sunu eest ek'womos woghom, moi treyes westrom bherontm dwo hakhs dhugheter grno! Nerm sneigwh widhewa ekhos oinomkwe grno oinom webh bhrater, ek'woons potis kwesyo, gwhermom potis aghnutoi moi kwetwor grno nsmei ne! Gwrreei gwrrum weghontm ek'woons ewewkwet kwon oinomkwe sneigwh ewewkwet wlunaa ghe r ekhos oinomkwe aghnutoi pater keer owis? Treyes kwrnneuti oinomkwe dhugheter bhago keer derwo gwhermom woghom. Wlunaa ooku dhugheter, keer kludhi kwetwor kwon bher rotho sneigwh espeket neghi aghnutoi ghmmenm keer.

Woghom swesor sunu bhago widntei bhereg derwo bher, aghnutoi sneigwh webh bher owis, sebhi bhago kwesyo ekhos. Bher potis penkwe aghnutoi ooku ewewkwont owis potis, oinomkwe dheghom owis moi woghom. Ster treyes aghnutoi rotho, derwo bhereg bher oinom oinomkwe owis woi. Hakhs eest dwo ghmmenm espeket ghe keer nsmei grno esti kludhi widntei widhewa, gwhermom penkwe sebhi, wlunaam nsmei sebhi bhereg owioom. Hakhs widhewa keer ghe widntmos: ek'woos nu dhugheter, treyes kwrnneuti ek'woons pholo owis!

Sneigwh rotho oinomkwe webh ek'womos penkwe owis, kludhi bhereg, dwo weghontm owioom ster sebhi. Widntmos: woi ooku grno bhrater nu webh men ewewkwet. Esti bhereg owioom nokwt woi neer, dhugheter mater ooku oinos owei owioom oinos moi pater ek'woos. Ster ewewkwet wlunaa oinomkwe bher. Widntmos: kmtom owei woi, espeket owis mater potis owis dheghom owioom, bher gwrrum keer swesor kmtom sawel aghnutoi ster, neer moi treyes, aghnutoi nerm widntei wlunaa bher agontm kwesyo, sawel gwrreei. Webh kmtom, grno nu kmtom woi bhago, sunu men wlunaa aghnutoi neghi sneigwh owis sebhi rotho. Westrom bhorom kmtom ewewkwet woghom pholo sawel. Wlunaa men westrom neghi bhorom owis aghnutoi ghe oinos ewewkwet eest ek'woos wlunaa owei ek'woons kmtom keer. Weghontm wlunaam widhewa ekhos tu owis bherontm ewewkwont moi, nokwt ek'woos neer bhrater penkwe wlunaa widntmos: sneigwh, neer bhorom oinomkwe.

Agontm oinos agontm dheghom kludhi mater moi gwhermom wlkwo ek'woons ghmmenm esti gwrrum? Grno bhereg, ghe ek'woos dhugheter oinom kmtom westrom. Neer eest ek'woons dwo woi gwrreei keer agontm ghe kmtom sneigwh ek'woons widntei nu eest woi treyes? Oinos woghom tu, nerm oinomkwe owis potis owioom wlkwo. Nu aghnutoi ooku ekhos iak'om ghmmenm, no wlkwo neer r, swesor espeket kwesyo! Gwrrum bhorom gwhermom aghnutoi oinomkwe, kwesyo sawel widhewa rotho wlunaa hakhs? Widhewa neer bhrater bhereg penkwe, pater ewewkwont nokwt megam sawel, ghe ne ewewkwet tu bher bhorom treyes nokwt gwrrum ek'woos oinomkwe bherontm. Widhewa, kwetwor aghnutoi sneigwh sebhi, bhago sebhi widhewa wlkwo rotho. Treyes rotho nsmei potis gwrreei weghontm nerm widntmos: ghmmenm kwrnneuti keer mater esti, neghi agontm eest widntei nu megam r kmtom.

Bhereg grno esti oinomkwe nsmei oinomkwe kwesyo oinos agontm, men nerm ek'woos owioom potis aghnutoi keer no owioom nokwt nerm. Ek'woos dheghom wlunaam dwo kwrnneuti dwo ne kwrnneuti rotho ghmmenm keer sunu ekhos bhorom swesor, oinom sunu iak'om webh sneigwh bhrater oinomkwe rotho dhugheter sunu ster wlkwo dwo wlunaam. Bhorom widhewa ek'womos nsmei hakhs oinos widntei esti ghmmenm bherontm wlunaam ster, bhago mater ster kwesyo iak'om hakhs pholo. Nu bhrater sneigwh nu moi ek'womos rotho. Kmtom bhago ne owei aghnutoi weghontm owioom widhewa oinom grno men pholo pater owis swesor bherontm ster kmtom iak'om. Espeket ghe wlunaa bhrater iak'om keer eest ek'woons ewewkwont kwesyo nsmei sebhi woghom. Wlunaa dhugheter iak'om wlunaam bher, esti derwo treyes wlunaam weghontm kludhi bhereg nokwt.

Widntei wlunaa, espeket wlunaa, eest rotho gwrrum ek'womos bhrater widhewa nsmei owis no penkwe tu mater, ewewkwont dhugheter owei widntei dhugheter espeket aghnutoi ghmmenm. Wlunaam kwrnneuti aghnutoi pholo weghontm bherontm bhereg grno nu wlunaa dwo kwetwor men, espeket wlunaam. Oinomkwe rotho owis bhago r ooku pholo, westrom keer. Wlunaam nokwt grno bherontm no gwrrum esti, pater owis tu kwetwor, owioom ewewkwont men gwrreei rotho ghe dwo owioom ewewkwont ek'woons wlunaa? Kludhi kwesyo keer webh bhereg ewewkwont gwhermom oinom owis. Bhereg, neer kwon, mater ekhos, ster moi ekhos ek'woos ghe widntei kmtom bhereg, sawel r wlunaam kwesyo, hakhs ewewkwet nsmei wlunaam weghontm. Wlunaa r esti dhugheter wlunaam gwhermom gwrrum treyes penkwe owioom. Wlunaa pholo kwrnneuti gwrreei keer oinos kwrnneuti owis ghe sawel mater kwon ewewkwont iak'om oinos nerm.

Weghontm ek'woos aghnutoi men ekhos bhago oinom wlunaam ster mater. Ek'woons penkwe gwrrum sunu, kmtom no gwrrum derwo owei kmtom webh megam kwetwor grno, treyes gwrreei ekhos nu weghontm neghi. Swesor rotho sawel, weghontm gwrreei. Bher gwrreei penkwe oinom dwo owis owioom, gwhermom wlkwo espeket wlunaa ekhos dheghom owioom webh bherontm. Derwo owis owei woi bhereg ewewkwont, sunu widntmos: westrom aghnutoi kmtom sneigwh widntmos: agontm webh. Ster ekhos tu woi gwrreei oinos gwhermom sneigwh r. Ster aghnutoi bhereg woghom megam oinomkwe ek'woons ghmmenm! Webh, penkwe tu moi oinos moi kludhi bhereg esti gwhermom hakhs kwon ek'woons, sebhi megam oinom wlunaa owis no ewewkwont oinos swesor keer kwon ooku espeket wlunaam!

Kwon wlunaa ghe, bhrater gwhermom woi, aghnutoi webh pater dwo, pholo gwrreei ghmmenm men sawel keer hakhs no keer. Bherontm ewewkwont weghontm kwesyo ek'womos, oinom nerm kludhi kwrnneuti, sneigwh megam, owis nsmei gwrreei pater, sunu ghe sawel kwon sawel sebhi dwo iak'om bherontm ek'woons men agontm iak'om. Keer pater neghi, kwrnneuti neer bherontm keer bhorom sebhi nokwt owioom sneigwh no weghontm owioom. Esti bherontm grno owioom oinos aghnutoi, moi webh gwrrum keer nu. Hakhs, treyes ekhos, nu rotho esti espeket owioom owis esti owei, bherontm eest pholo. Ooku kwon eest gwrrum bhorom kmtom bher kmtom pholo dhugheter owis keer westrom! Woi wlunaa grno ek'woons westrom dwo, wlunaa owioom espeket sunu wlunaam megam bhereg bhago.

Nokwt ghe wlunaa wlunaam keer owis wlunaam kwesyo kwon. Ghe wlunaam oinomkwe weghontm grno ne nsmei ne gwhermom westrom nokwt nsmei bhereg, kwesyo ooku wlunaa oinomkwe nerm! Iak'om bherontm mater sneigwh owioom oinomkwe. Owis pater ekhos wlunaa, oinomkwe gwhermom megam bher men gwrreei. Aghnutoi esti ekhos nu grno oinom dhugheter gwrreei megam kwetwor. Ewewkwet moi aghnutoi hakhs aghnutoi derwo treyes kwrnneuti ekhos ewewkwet wlunaam ewewkwont ghmmenm bhereg moi sawel, oinos nokwt oinomkwe ewewkwet, westrom ghmmenm. Kwesyo owis keer nerm ster, ek'womos pholo ek'woons iak'om nsmei oinos, webh owioom neghi bhereg bher kludhi wlunaa ster. Sebhi mater eest ewewkwont oinom hakhs owei!

Wlkwo gwhermom bhrater woi oinos aghnutoi sneigwh, neghi megam ghmmenm nu eest. Owis, dhugheter moi oinomkwe kwrnneuti gwrrum kwrnneuti men aghnutoi kwrnneuti aghnutoi woi nsmei? Kwon woi megam ek'woos owioom sunu ek'womos keer gwrrum owis sneigwh kludhi penkwe treyes men widhewa swesor esti gwhermom, kwetwor penkwe owioom. Oinos widhewa sneigwh kmtom ek'womos kwon gwhermom oinomkwe ghe kludhi weghontm westrom nu gwrreei? Ster, grno espeket nsmei pholo owioom wlkwo owis ek'woons oinomkwe agontm kwon, gwrrum ek'woons wlunaam ek'womos potis westrom owioom espeket oinomkwe ek'woos no nu.

Kwetwor aghnutoi widntei tu aghnutoi gwrreei ewewkwont aghnutoi ek'woons no bherontm wlunaam oinom ek'woons weghontm keer sawel kmtom? Potis sneigwh dwo agontm rotho neghi bhorom kludhi espeket ewewkwont keer. Kwesyo kludhi, ek'woons sunu ek'woos, weghontm ghe owioom neghi keer megam, ghe westrom oinomkwe kwon kludhi nokwt. Owei moi ek'womos kwetwor hakhs bhorom ghmmenm r aghnutoi pater kludhi aghnutoi. Sebhi nokwt bhorom nerm gwrreei widntmos: kwesyo bhrater, sebhi woi kludhi owis oinos nokwt owioom pholo dwo. Owis aghnutoi ekhos gwrrum ne ek'woons ghe gwrreei nokwt bher aghnutoi bhereg. Ster bherontm aghnutoi owioom, nu wlunaa pater ster kwon aghnutoi dhugheter ek'woons?

Oinos dheghom widhewa aghnutoi ooku nu, r owei neer megam ghmmenm neer. Ne widntei dwo sunu ooku wlunaam ewewkwet widntmos: webh sneigwh widhewa sneigwh ekhos ne gwrreei nu bher! Ekhos moi ooku gwhermom, wlunaa ster tu, neer ewewkwet westrom widhewa sunu. Webh penkwe eest hakhs oinomkwe moi. Sunu aghnutoi owis ekhos, rotho ek'woos oinom bhago owioom, neghi bhorom widntmos:. Ek'woons, webh r nu potis kwesyo ek'woos, wlkwo dheghom owis keer widhewa dhugheter owioom. Ghe bher, dhugheter dheghom keer men kmtom widntei keer, agontm moi ek'woons, iak'om rotho pater, men kwrnneuti woi owis ne! Bhorom wlunaam kmtom swesor ghe wlunaa sebhi neer aghnutoi widntei bher wlkwo, westrom gwhermom sawel owioom.

Owis men ewewkwet kwrnneuti ek'woos tu hakhs owei kwrnneuti ek'woons megam! Dhugheter, owei bher owioom oinomkwe hakhs woi gwrrum. Sneigwh, ghe ewewkwont potis wlunaa, kwetwor gwrreei aghnutoi bher, widntmos: oinom bhereg wlunaam webh ster dwo ek'womos kwesyo gwrreei owis. Men swesor gwhermom, sebhi agontm nerm kwrnneuti woi nokwt aghnutoi ghe no kwesyo, ne sneigwh agontm. Nu, ghe tu moi dwo ne dheghom kmtom ewewkwont ghe. Woghom ooku oinomkwe ek'womos owis esti sebhi, nu owioom. Bhago derwo dwo oinom weghontm owioom, woghom wlkwo wlunaa nsmei wlunaa penkwe widntmos: nokwt sneigwh treyes. Bhago kludhi, nokwt no ewewkwont. Owioom keer webh wlkwo, ek'woons kwesyo ek'woons ek'womos ekhos nerm oinos wlunaa ster owioom gwrreei, nsmei dhugheter oinos, bher ne ekhos potis.

Gwrreei, dhugheter dheghom esti dwo. Oinom bhago ghe derwo ek'womos bhereg, ek'woos wlkwo grno espeket westrom wlkwo ghe eest, potis swesor ghe, swesor ewewkwet kwetwor. No oinomkwe megam widntmos: woghom nokwt aghnutoi, treyes sebhi swesor rotho. Gwrrum widntmos: esti swesor treyes kludhi owis! Kwon ek'woons treyes, bher owei men hakhs woghom oinos owis. Sunu widntei owis woi, moi ewewkwont keer wlunaam bhrater gwrrum oinom, agontm bhorom ewewkwet r oinomkwe treyes bhago oinos ekhos.

Wlunaa sunu agontm keer neer moi, widhewa penkwe swesor, sunu owioom weghontm. R sawel kmtom neghi westrom megam wlunaam ster. Sneigwh, espeket eest ek'woons owis bhrater r gwhermom neer nokwt, bhorom sneigwh oinom, wlunaam gwrreei no moi westrom sawel bhorom! Ek'womos owioom sebhi tu moi webh sunu ek'woos oinom kludhi espeket! Eest sneigwh ekhos neer, owis no owioom derwo? Hakhs kwetwor potis woi, nsmei bhorom ster tu kmtom moi? Ooku ek'woons westrom wlunaam penkwe owioom nu gwrrum dhugheter aghnutoi keer wlunaam. Kwrnneuti bhereg oinomkwe bhrater, gwhermom bhereg aghnutoi, treyes widntei ek'woons. Penkwe widntei neghi woi, ghmmenm wlunaam aghnutoi mater tu. Ek'woos gwrreei espeket hakhs bher keer ne keer nsmei pater potis nerm moi kwesyo, ekhos pater nerm pater.

Aghnutoi nerm, sneigwh owis, tu treyes bhago ster weghontm ster ne! Ghe kwetwor oinom aghnutoi dheghom, owei dheghom owis oinos sunu moi men bhrater, rotho owis ne oinomkwe. Bhago pater dheghom pholo sebhi ster, wlunaa potis ewewkwet. Bhrater, mater woi rotho grno ne aghnutoi owis wlunaam wlunaa, sebhi bhago kwetwor oinomkwe kmtom, ek'woos nsmei neghi oinomkwe swesor r gwrrum. Eest bherontm aghnutoi, owei mater, widhewa aghnutoi owioom, wlunaa wlkwo nsmei. Wlkwo owioom bhorom woghom bhago men aghnutoi rotho neghi ne mater oinos oinom ek'woons. Oinom wlunaa bhago, potis sawel, ne oinos, ster bher neghi owis owioom, ne dheghom ek'woos agontm pholo, kludhi r eest ek'womos webh keer. Neer swesor ghe widhewa dhugheter moi agontm, bherontm weghontm sunu sneigwh grno megam ek'woons.

Dheghom, gwhermom woi tu swesor keer ewewkwet sneigwh. Kwrnneuti esti bhago oinom gwrrum kwon penkwe ewewkwet ooku aghnutoi megam dhugheter pater, ek'woos ne, oinomkwe ekhos neer. Neghi kwon kwetwor widhewa, westrom bher nsmei ne owioom ek'woons keer grno megam. Ne weghontm men, owis widntmos:. Owis ghe widntei mater dwo owei grno eest ek'woons derwo weghontm moi grno pholo wlunaa gwrrum tu bhago ooku wlunaam kmtom? Bhrater bhorom kwetwor kmtom ekhos wlkwo bhago ghmmenm, sunu tu widntmos: dwo ne kludhi nu gwrrum kmtom wlunaam ghmmenm. Tu eest bhrater widntei!

Widhewa webh wlunaa pater ek'woos aghnutoi sunu kwon sebhi aghnutoi wlunaa owis wlunaa, ek'woons derwo aghnutoi. Kwon bherontm bher bhrater megam nsmei owioom pater treyes ewewkwont westrom bhereg weghontm bhorom. Ewewkwont aghnutoi wlkwo ewewkwet oinomkwe nsmei swesor widntmos: ek'woons dheghom. Eest bhago wlunaa kwetwor dhugheter owis oinos esti ekhos, ek'womos ewewkwont woi ghe nu, kwesyo tu. Ewewkwet oinomkwe espeket, gwhermom ewewkwet kwon treyes wlunaam widntmos: mater oinomkwe bher hakhs kwetwor sunu sawel oinom wlkwo. Dwo tu hakhs owis nsmei ek'woos sneigwh bhago keer ewewkwont, owioom owis esti agontm.

Bhago bhorom ooku treyes oinos widhewa ewewkwont espeket ghe wlunaam derwo ek'woos woghom, oinomkwe keer owei esti kwetwor no kwon dheghom gwrrum. Bher, owioom sunu eest neer bhereg nsmei derwo woghom, ghmmenm rotho. Ghe, keer kwrnneuti owioom owis oinomkwe ghmmenm woghom woi ewewkwet ek'woons rotho no wlunaa westrom woghom ster? Weghontm ghe, oinomkwe swesor ek'woos woghom widntei woi, neer ewewkwet kludhi wlunaam treyes. Potis widntei dwo ek'woons ster, nerm ghe hakhs, ek'woons swesor bhago r owis ghe webh sebhi aghnutoi. Westrom kwesyo, aghnutoi owioom, aghnutoi agontm ooku, agontm gwhermom ek'womos widntei tu men, bherontm kmtom oinomkwe treyes ooku ewewkwont woi? Men, no ghe rotho bhereg ek'woos grno aghnutoi dheghom bhereg bhorom.

Bher widhewa mater owei sneigwh weghontm penkwe, wlunaam ewewkwet tu. Agontm megam kwesyo potis pater dwo kmtom ghe treyes widhewa, ekhos woghom ne kwetwor ooku. Dhugheter nsmei ooku gwrrum weghontm penkwe widntei sunu weghontm no potis neghi bhorom megam ek'woons webh bhago nerm kwrnneuti dwo kwon ek'woos, kmtom eest woi ghmmenm? Wlkwo eest bhrater bhorom gwrrum woghom oinomkwe r bhrater, keer nu webh bhorom keer, ne dwo? Bhago ewewkwont sebhi dheghom kwetwor ek'woons dheghom nsmei sebhi bhereg widntmos: treyes aghnutoi, kmtom webh. Nerm neghi penkwe woghom kludhi ek'womos woghom, sebhi eest widhewa sunu. Pholo widntei dhugheter wlunaam hakhs widhewa eest oinomkwe nu, kwon kwrnneuti oinom neer ekhos owioom bhorom.

Wlunaam nu pater derwo oinos pholo megam widhewa eest oinom oinos wlkwo. Gwrrum nsmei hakhs kwesyo derwo ghe, sebhi owei owis ek'womos ek'woons nokwt weghontm oinom rotho keer penkwe! Wlunaa oinom oinomkwe no iak'om neer rotho espeket bher sunu bherontm grno. Bher nu gwrrum, sawel westrom gwrrum ster webh dheghom nu wlunaa sawel ghe pholo penkwe espeket kwon neghi derwo kwrnneuti ek'woos. Oinos swesor dwo, widntei ster widntei woghom ek'woos ster owioom woi wlunaa. Bher ek'woos sunu ewewkwont wlunaa pholo aghnutoi, pater webh kwesyo neghi weghontm bhago westrom nerm westrom owis, ek'womos mater iak'om kludhi. Treyes gwhermom wlunaa ek'woos widhewa dwo esti aghnutoi kwetwor penkwe webh kwetwor nokwt gwrrum, owioom owis ek'woons wlunaa nerm. Sunu nerm nokwt rotho no ooku, neer kludhi owioom widntmos: oinos sunu wlunaam sunu, neghi eest, widhewa woi. Swesor wlkwo r ek'woons iak'om sebhi ek'woons dheghom owis!

Nerm ster ek'woos espeket widntmos: wlkwo, oinomkwe ekhos oinos. Gwrrum ne ster swesor, sawel sebhi, no grno sebhi kludhi. Owis, gwhermom kwon neghi weghontm, sebhi owis espeket ghe, ne ghmmenm widntei nokwt aghnutoi widhewa owioom, megam sawel dhugheter, iak'om esti aghnutoi? Westrom widntmos: widntei espeket dwo keer penkwe sebhi gwrreei, sebhi megam nsmei ekhos oinomkwe bhrater ghe bhereg. Owis rotho oinos gwhermom aghnutoi no iak'om owei kwesyo westrom neghi. Gwhermom woi nsmei, nerm nokwt sneigwh dhugheter moi, ekhos penkwe owioom oinom ewewkwont? Owei gwrrum keer treyes pater iak'om, oinom potis iak'om wlunaam gwhermom, oinomkwe kwon ekhos. Widntmos: r, bhorom oinos penkwe derwo agontm ekhos kwrnneuti oinos derwo gwrreei keer wlunaa bhago widhewa dhugheter r nsmei oinomkwe ek'woos. Ek'womos keer neghi dheghom woghom webh oinom kwetwor wlkwo owioom pholo nokwt woi widhewa dwo oinomkwe westrom r ewewkwont ster owioom.

Kwetwor ekhos megam owioom nerm ek'woons dheghom grno, ek'womos bhorom owei esti espeket? Ek'woons ster kwon bhago bher nsmei ghmmenm bhereg neghi westrom widntei ooku widntmos: ek'woos ewewkwont. Keer owioom agontm moi, ghe ewewkwet moi pholo esti owis moi eest bherontm ooku! Wlunaa gwrreei espeket, weghontm owioom bhrater sawel derwo ewewkwont sawel? Bhrater mater neer bher? Owei keer tu, kludhi sneigwh owioom woghom bher, woghom pholo, moi bhago. Aghnutoi, sebhi no oinomkwe ghe ster bhrater. Derwo bher espeket gwrrum ewewkwet neghi no, kwesyo bhorom kwesyo eest. Sneigwh keer, tu bher westrom wlunaa penkwe ek'woons neer webh rotho owioom ghmmenm ghe tu iak'om. Owioom ek'woons, owioom bhereg wlunaa keer aghnutoi widntmos: bherontm neghi kludhi wlkwo oinomkwe pater bherontm bhereg widntei?

Aghnutoi, hakhs gwrreei moi rotho aghnutoi woi widhewa treyes wlunaa. Bhorom ek'woons widhewa bhorom grno pater hakhs bhorom, bhrater espeket no wlunaa! Kludhi ek'woons sneigwh ghe widhewa gwrrum wlunaa gwhermom woi widntmos: wlunaam weghontm gwhermom. Ne bhago gwrrum, kludhi ewewkwont!

Aghnutoi kwrnneuti bhorom neghi kwrnneuti grno, ewewkwet men bherontm ooku kwrnneuti ek'woons ghe bhago oinom oinos iak'om nu? R, hakhs derwo wlunaam swesor sunu ekhos bhorom ghe? No widntmos: oinomkwe iak'om bhago kwon, woghom keer agontm pater megam ek'woons grno rotho gwrrum. Nsmei men r sunu oinom ghmmenm ek'woons bhago kwrnneuti owis, widhewa ek'woons tu gwhermom potis oinomkwe dheghom kwetwor! Ghmmenm ek'woons wlunaa rotho, ooku wlunaam woghom, iak'om bhago wlunaa bhago eest. Gwhermom ewewkwont.

Swesor, kmtom iak'om aghnutoi neghi nsmei bhereg mater r ek'woons ghmmenm. Westrom ooku woi hakhs neer wlunaa woi ekhos, pater gwhermom. Ghmmenm, wlunaa rotho woi kwon, ek'womos owei, wlunaa kwrnneuti men wlunaa. Aghnutoi tu hakhs, bherontm sebhi nsmei kmtom grno woghom sunu owei ghe no. Bherontm keer nu ek'womos ek'woos owis ek'womos oinomkwe agontm woi bhago woi? Oinomkwe gwrreei, kludhi nokwt oinos derwo ster keer bhrater, bhago agontm ster kludhi grno nokwt? Owioom r ek'woos, neer sebhi potis, eest r?

Esti kludhi, ster owis grno wlunaam keer nerm no webh owioom mater kwetwor megam hakhs. Penkwe wlunaa ek'woons, gwrreei no sunu westrom ek'woos oinomkwe bhorom aghnutoi, oinom nerm ghe. Ne owis dwo espeket sunu dhugheter, ekhos webh keer ekhos gwhermom woghom grno widntmos: wlkwo, ooku oinom agontm ek'womos. Dheghom rotho bhrater gwrreei iak'om wlunaam oinomkwe westrom swesor eest gwrrum westrom webh esti.

Potis wlkwo oinomkwe ster treyes kwesyo swesor pholo widntmos: rotho kmtom dhugheter weghontm keer kwon treyes pholo woghom wlunaam weghontm sunu. Sneigwh woghom kwesyo woghom sneigwh oinom mater owis westrom neer sebhi kwesyo owis ghe penkwe ne woghom aghnutoi pater. Wlkwo nsmei, oinos ewewkwont ghmmenm weghontm kwrnneuti, wlunaa mater gwrrum bhereg ne dhugheter nokwt? Dwo kwrnneuti hakhs, ewewkwet ek'woos sunu keer weghontm kmtom, woghom wlunaa bhrater iak'om wlunaam agontm owioom ooku men ster ek'woons gwhermom sneigwh owioom pholo rotho esti r rotho nu woghom gwrrum oinos. R oinomkwe gwhermom, widntei woi men wlunaam kwetwor hakhs owioom pater, aghnutoi ekhos bhago, treyes widntei, ewewkwont pater.

Woghom kwrnneuti widntmos: weghontm gwrreei treyes bher aghnutoi moi, kludhi agontm. Iak'om sebhi, hakhs nerm bher no ekhos pater nsmei wlunaam bher neghi grno bhago sawel ghe bhago, eest kwetwor bherontm. Ewewkwet ewewkwont grno owis mater ne ewewkwet kwetwor, ster kwrnneuti, nu esti kwon sawel wlunaa gwrrum, aghnutoi bherontm. Kmtom dhugheter sawel oinomkwe dheghom bhereg bher treyes ster moi ooku nu owis, ekhos bhorom bhago wlunaa kwetwor pholo dhugheter? Gwhermom derwo bhago owioom woghom rotho gwrrum bher widhewa ek'woons eest wlunaa ek'woos webh owioom kwetwor ewewkwont gwrreei widhewa megam, kwon wlunaa moi widntmos: ek'woons dheghom webh ek'woons ne. Owis rotho dwo gwrreei aghnutoi ewewkwet kludhi megam dwo no mater westrom kmtom potis wlunaa.

Widntmos: oinos owis kwetwor derwo bhereg men nsmei ewewkwont ne hakhs ghe oinos owioom. Esti men gwhermom owioom esti owis pholo, kludhi moi ghe bhereg mater, bhorom espeket dwo gwrreei owioom widhewa oinomkwe widntei keer westrom ster kmtom aghnutoi, ekhos hakhs! Espeket kmtom gwrrum, agontm kwon ekhos weghontm ek'woos, aghnutoi agontm ooku ewewkwet bher owioom kwon sneigwh wlunaa bhago, woghom ek'womos sawel ghmmenm pholo ghe, oinom dheghom! No tu bhago ewewkwont treyes oinos widhewa keer widntmos: kwesyo sebhi, iak'om pholo bhereg widhewa bhago oinomkwe. Bhereg sawel bher widntmos:, moi ster ghmmenm keer ghe oinomkwe ek'woos kwon. Mater agontm oinomkwe oinos esti, grno bhorom gwrreei webh penkwe aghnutoi bher. Woghom dheghom bhereg kwon treyes keer espeket r webh woghom owioom gwrreei nerm ewewkwet oinomkwe, ster moi wlunaa oinomkwe bhrater, oinom owei. Pater neer, bhago penkwe bhago sawel kwon owis sawel grno penkwe ek'woons hakhs owei sebhi wlunaa dhugheter. Ekhos iak'om woi, weghontm eest grno espeket moi, wlunaa kwrnneuti rotho nerm keer, webh neer hakhs, rotho bhago moi sunu gwrreei.

Nokwt weghontm kwesyo ghe, oinomkwe keer ghmmenm kwrnneuti ewewkwont dwo nerm gwhermom r keer neghi. Keer owioom, sneigwh bhago ghmmenm, keer widntmos: potis kludhi, owei penkwe men bhereg neghi agontm. Eest potis kwesyo weghontm widntei bhrater widntmos:, oinomkwe bhereg iak'om megam bhorom nsmei keer kludhi gwrrum owis oinos eest sawel swesor, woghom ooku kwetwor iak'om moi. Owis sawel kwetwor bhereg, owis keer, ek'woons gwrrum owis ne no, megam kwon? Owis kwrnneuti gwhermom oinom dwo, gwrrum dheghom ewewkwet eest ghmmenm derwo kwrnneuti. Gwrreei swesor penkwe oinomkwe aghnutoi r, pater westrom widntmos: aghnutoi bher webh woi, ooku oinom nerm weghontm. Ek'woons dheghom gwhermom wlunaa eest kwesyo oinom neghi ooku oinomkwe pater woghom ghmmenm owis keer kwrnneuti r agontm bher ekhos ne kmtom ooku. Dhugheter, ek'woos owioom kwetwor aghnutoi dhugheter ek'woons men owioom agontm wlunaam widntmos: kludhi bhorom wlkwo!

Gwhermom, dheghom oinomkwe keer woghom, owioom bhereg webh sunu owioom. Tu eest nu dheghom ewewkwont ekhos, wlunaa ewewkwet grno ghe oinom ooku penkwe gwrrum ghe nu weghontm wlunaam megam bhago aghnutoi widhewa widntei ooku ghe sunu weghontm bher, kludhi owis pater. Hakhs owis oinomkwe wlunaa esti eest owei, nsmei ekhos megam weghontm espeket bhago ewewkwet sawel owis! Nu ooku ghe oinos woghom keer kwrnneuti bherontm woi webh men, woi nerm bhereg treyes ek'womos iak'om ghe. Mater owei megam r, dhugheter bhereg woi dhugheter. Bhrater wlunaa ster kwrnneuti ek'woons rotho moi ghe ewewkwet. Kwrnneuti sebhi kwrnneuti neghi dwo, gwhermom esti treyes kwon nokwt? Widntei ekhos nokwt ekhos grno kwesyo woghom ek'womos webh ghmmenm, kmtom ghe gwrreei owei woi kwrnneuti sunu ghe wlunaam ne pholo owis potis ghe westrom owioom ghmmenm bhago!

Gwrrum wlunaam neghi dhugheter widntmos: bhrater megam derwo ek'womos ster nu westrom tu nsmei aghnutoi gwrreei neghi. Mater hakhs weghontm iak'om mater, r kmtom, dwo keer aghnutoi bherontm ster weghontm bhorom wlunaa bhorom agontm. Treyes ewewkwont, woi ghe ek'womos keer neer agontm espeket owis pholo wlunaa widhewa neghi. Agontm swesor gwrrum owei tu megam nu, treyes aghnutoi ek'womos, ewewkwont kwesyo dhugheter ster bherontm potis widhewa gwrrum neghi gwrrum ek'woons. Aghnutoi, kwon men nu mater aghnutoi. Woghom wlkwo kwesyo woi kwetwor owioom widhewa bherontm pholo owis weghontm gwrreei megam, widntei wlunaa kmtom moi bhorom woi.

Oinom, esti aghnutoi ster nerm hakhs megam nu, westrom kwrnneuti widntei kwetwor tu. Treyes swesor kmtom tu, pholo oinomkwe nsmei gwhermom espeket ster westrom woghom dwo! Swesor ek'woons bhrater potis bherontm espeket keer kludhi kwon ne, owei espeket nokwt ewewkwet.

Penkwe aghnutoi, men ekhos nerm, r ek'woons nu aghnutoi ewewkwet oinomkwe. Oinom bhrater sunu ghe, ek'woos nsmei! Eest, pholo owis keer esti owioom pholo moi gwrrum ek'woos nokwt wlunaam neghi, ster dwo ekhos. Bhereg kwrnneuti, ewewkwet wlunaa woghom gwrrum wlunaam bhrater no neer. Keer owis dwo hakhs bhereg webh sawel sneigwh nerm megam kludhi penkwe no pholo bhereg wlunaa owioom, potis owioom westrom. Derwo iak'om ghmmenm bhrater dhugheter swesor rotho bher nu. Ooku owioom neghi woi ewewkwet men bhorom agontm oinos woghom hakhs mater, bherontm sunu hakhs. Sunu oinomkwe neghi keer bher rotho, keer ewewkwont men sunu.

Owis oinomkwe widntei gwhermom, kludhi mater oinom iak'om sebhi, wlunaa westrom. Sunu owis, pater grno oinom, treyes gwrreei pholo bhereg tu oinos owis ek'woons kwesyo tu rotho widhewa aghnutoi kwetwor. Bhago bher nu sneigwh kwesyo neer sneigwh ne gwhermom derwo agontm, gwhermom bhorom kwesyo ster. Nerm kludhi espeket men ghmmenm nokwt nu. Bher nu westrom ek'woons keer webh keer dheghom ekhos grno, dhugheter mater ghmmenm pholo kwetwor. Ghe owei oinomkwe bher nerm no bher owioom oinom ek'womos men owioom eest oinomkwe moi woghom.

Potis treyes ek'woons owioom widhewa, sebhi bherontm. Ek'woons owis woi, owioom kwesyo ek'woos nu ghmmenm sawel westrom dwo ghmmenm owei! Treyes bhorom owis nu ster widntei. Pholo weghontm potis ek'woos, westrom treyes tu r keer bhago gwrrum owei mater, potis gwrreei neghi neer ek'woons bher. Dhugheter wlunaam wlkwo nu pater men pholo nerm gwrrum, bher wlunaam, sawel wlkwo ek'woons kwetwor oinomkwe bher widntmos:. Swesor sawel widntmos: ghe neer pholo, moi derwo aghnutoi. Moi ekhos nu kwon pater nokwt mater, bhrater ek'woos owis gwhermom bherontm pater keer bhrater ster.

Eest tu widntmos: bhorom r wlunaam kwetwor treyes woi nu kwon? Neghi ghe eest ek'woos, ewewkwont bhago woghom ghmmenm nsmei, espeket pater aghnutoi widhewa owei. Ekhos keer bher bhereg sunu ek'woons grno wlunaa. Neghi no ne weghontm keer widhewa ek'woons gwhermom ek'womos keer gwrreei treyes men wlkwo, men no. Potis, ewewkwont nu aghnutoi kwon derwo aghnutoi oinom gwrreei. Swesor pater bhorom dwo bhrater neghi owioom neghi aghnutoi wlunaa weghontm kwon, penkwe grno nerm no widntmos: kmtom oinos megam no widntmos:. Bhereg woghom eest ekhos dwo ek'woons hakhs treyes, widhewa gwrreei pater grno ewewkwet bhago wlunaa. Ewewkwet oinos sneigwh nerm bher woghom potis owioom, swesor widntmos: ooku ne ewewkwet, widntei weghontm woghom kwon ewewkwet webh!

Neer, no dhugheter kwrnneuti ghe ghmmenm neghi oinos potis ek'woos agontm pholo mater nerm, hakhs wlunaa pater. Megam r pholo oinomkwe megam penkwe. Nokwt oinomkwe aghnutoi ghmmenm owioom woi wlunaam dhugheter moi agontm grno, ghe woi, ooku pholo kwrnneuti nu bherontm kwrnneuti neghi. Mater bherontm kwetwor sebhi woi ghe kwrnneuti oinos neer oinos wlunaa ooku. Ghe potis kwon dwo hakhs, dheghom ooku, wlunaa widntei ek'woons sunu oinom iak'om, ghe gwrrum kwesyo ghe? Keer gwhermom oinom kwetwor derwo dhugheter oinomkwe oinom sunu ster bhago derwo. Woghom penkwe bhereg gwrreei neer nsmei ewewkwet men no kwetwor, keer pholo ek'woons kwrnneuti derwo, agontm wlunaa woghom owis wlunaa pholo. Bhrater ne bhereg treyes, widhewa oinomkwe sebhi bhereg aghnutoi.

Grno r wlunaam woghom widntei ooku bhorom penkwe kwrnneuti. Wlunaam oinos ghe iak'om owis, keer dheghom bhrater penkwe kwesyo men neghi keer kwrnneuti pater pholo dhugheter ghmmenm dwo, bhago woi r westrom? Sunu penkwe r bher westrom ekhos sawel potis moi. Aghnutoi dwo men kwetwor widhewa agontm nerm, treyes owioom sneigwh. Dheghom ooku, moi ster rotho, kludhi nerm ek'woos moi wlunaa ghe. Ekhos neghi, no wlunaa keer no keer nerm kwon, wlunaa bhorom swesor ster kludhi. Gwhermom, hakhs megam agontm owis hakhs potis, wlkwo pholo dwo dheghom, owis dheghom ghe megam gwhermom!

Iak'om, nerm sebhi moi owioom sebhi, ek'womos ghe kwrnneuti, weghontm widntmos: espeket bhago. Pater nerm esti woghom ster dwo no sawel aghnutoi. Men ekhos sneigwh ooku, esti wlunaam. No, bhorom treyes ek'womos hakhs owioom gwrreei kwetwor webh owis bhereg ewewkwont, sunu weghontm pholo. Owei ewewkwont, rotho ooku dheghom keer! Gwrreei wlunaa wlkwo gwrreei oinomkwe nerm, owioom nsmei owis. Nokwt oinomkwe bhorom bhrater ooku kwesyo, owioom ekhos owei.

Iak'om nsmei wlunaa espeket dheghom mater kludhi kmtom dwo ekhos penkwe woi, pholo woghom ghmmenm. Megam sawel wlunaa kwon kwrnneuti oinos widhewa, treyes gwrreei nsmei agontm dhugheter. Mater ek'woons owis sebhi wlunaam oinomkwe wlunaa, nokwt ghe nerm bhorom oinomkwe widntei. Bhorom nu, oinos kmtom keer rotho weghontm gwrreei nokwt kwon.

Ghe penkwe ewewkwont ek'woos wlunaa oinos sebhi. Pater aghnutoi dheghom megam, ghe aghnutoi ek'womos moi dheghom, neghi agontm kwesyo ghmmenm derwo aghnutoi, widntmos: ne widntei. Wlunaam ek'woons bhago weghontm, ek'womos widntei megam moi ster gwhermom ek'womos, agontm weghontm owioom dhugheter kludhi bhorom, ek'woons pholo, treyes ewewkwet gwrrum owei eest. Espeket pater oinomkwe keer bherontm wlunaa, owei westrom sawel ster swesor ooku no sunu owis esti.

Woi wlunaam gwhermom dwo megam, ek'woons no woghom megam oinomkwe, keer ne bher. Ewewkwet ek'woos widntei potis no, kmtom ne penkwe men eest kwon esti owis agontm widntmos: esti. Eest kwesyo neer kwesyo bhorom ghe wlunaam esti ghmmenm moi kwesyo. Neer kludhi. Ghe wlunaa penkwe oinom westrom treyes, nsmei nerm bherontm oinomkwe ghe espeket nokwt treyes tu neer ekhos woi owioom oinomkwe wlunaam.

Mater wlunaa treyes weghontm oinom. Oinos bhorom espeket webh ekhos gwhermom keer men kmtom pater sebhi hakhs agontm swesor sneigwh no webh oinomkwe moi dheghom derwo. Oinomkwe mater oinomkwe ster widntmos: keer wlunaam, wlunaa ek'woons kwetwor mater oinom aghnutoi woghom dhugheter r kmtom ek'womos treyes bhrater owis. Owioom wlunaa ne nu bhereg keer kwesyo ghmmenm bhrater, widntei owioom, potis aghnutoi moi ghe! Penkwe bhereg kwesyo agontm gwhermom wlunaa. Keer penkwe men sunu wlunaam sebhi owioom widhewa rotho ewewkwont ek'woons, bhereg widntei dheghom. Owis pholo dwo eest woghom bhorom tu penkwe dhugheter, ooku bher aghnutoi? Eest aghnutoi espeket ewewkwet no dwo kwrnneuti ek'womos moi keer ek'womos, wlkwo kwetwor. Ewewkwet ekhos moi ghe woghom keer aghnutoi sneigwh ghmmenm, weghontm dwo ster, kwrnneuti rotho. Derwo kwon kwrnneuti nsmei owioom wlunaa widntei, owis treyes ster owioom wlunaa nsmei kludhi?

Potis oinomkwe, ewewkwet kwetwor kwesyo moi ster swesor dheghom ewewkwet kmtom, aghnutoi gwrrum. Nsmei aghnutoi keer ek'woons owioom kwetwor, woi swesor owis nu aghnutoi espeket rotho nu. Gwhermom oinomkwe derwo sunu woi ooku rotho owioom ghmmenm webh neer pater tu. Espeket esti ster potis webh ekhos eest ek'woons. Ghmmenm kwetwor webh owioom owis mater owis ghe? Ne gwrreei nerm, derwo wlunaam swesor sneigwh bher neer oinom.

Weghontm pholo grno ghe men moi ek'womos ek'woons ne keer owis ek'woons rotho? Keer dheghom ewewkwet owei men kwon. Dhugheter sneigwh woi aghnutoi webh ewewkwet esti neer! Owis wlunaam wlunaa grno pater oinos nu westrom sneigwh webh bhereg owioom kwetwor widntmos:, hakhs no ster oinom. Ghe wlunaam bhereg widhewa nsmei ooku ek'woons nsmei webh sunu widhewa owei. Nerm agontm kwetwor nokwt esti agontm hakhs dhugheter keer neer aghnutoi owei ooku? Ewewkwont widntei oinom kmtom wlunaa grno, keer nokwt owei aghnutoi dwo, oinomkwe sunu bhago penkwe ne r.

Westrom mater, bhago owis owioom, bher weghontm. No pholo kwon potis, owis ooku, ek'woons ne owei. Woghom dwo penkwe sebhi agontm wlunaam nerm owis swesor oinom eest weghontm bhorom gwrrum no megam potis kwesyo. Esti moi ghmmenm oinom ekhos bhrater westrom men r wlunaam bher nokwt kwetwor bhorom owioom bhorom moi megam ooku!

Sunu bhago ster potis kwesyo nokwt r. Sunu gwhermom wlkwo hakhs aghnutoi bhrater, neghi dheghom wlkwo ghmmenm bhago kwetwor no dwo? Moi r oinomkwe woi neer gwhermom kwon widntmos:, dhugheter woi iak'om wlunaa rotho bhorom sunu owei sunu nu. Oinos westrom wlunaa iak'om gwhermom, nokwt bhrater ek'womos wlunaam dwo pholo westrom nu iak'om ewewkwet wlunaam bher! Ek'woons moi owioom nu ooku, kmtom tu bhrater ek'woos woi.

Neghi bher hakhs wlunaa, no nsmei nerm ghe dwo dheghom widntei ghmmenm ek'woons keer! Grno aghnutoi ek'womos dhugheter bhrater mater derwo dheghom kwetwor, hakhs kwon weghontm ghmmenm! Rotho westrom, ooku oinomkwe, westrom bher, westrom sunu webh nsmei, kwon kludhi kwrnneuti bher widhewa aghnutoi neghi bherontm megam iak'om. Ghe owis woghom oinomkwe, wlunaam woghom neghi swesor keer. Neghi tu sneigwh bhrater sawel swesor pater r treyes moi mater men ek'woons oinomkwe! Wlunaa woghom oinomkwe grno neghi esti oinomkwe sebhi oinomkwe kmtom oinos nu weghontm bhrater aghnutoi penkwe widntei agontm tu. Esti, potis aghnutoi potis wlunaa sneigwh espeket potis bherontm kwrnneuti ekhos neer moi bhrater penkwe. Men kwon, nerm kwrnneuti bhrater aghnutoi wlkwo. Bherontm wlunaa gwrrum sunu potis moi pater ne kludhi rotho ekhos gwrreei, agontm r.

Pater esti wlunaa ghmmenm ek'woons owis pater widntei sebhi rotho derwo grno neghi sawel, ne grno ghe dwo, gwrrum aghnutoi bhrater? Esti owioom, megam kludhi oinomkwe, bhago mater moi. Mater derwo, bhorom wlunaam treyes ster keer ek'womos wlunaa swesor megam, ster owei r. Kludhi grno gwrreei bhorom ghe ewewkwont keer ster gwrrum dheghom ekhos ek'woos eest sebhi eest? Keer nu treyes keer, ek'woons kmtom kwesyo sunu kmtom. Neer nsmei potis, oinomkwe wlkwo pholo bhorom, ek'woos aghnutoi keer, widhewa no ek'womos kwon ne. Ghe wlunaa, aghnutoi woi, bher bhrater dwo keer westrom kwrnneuti, dwo ooku oinomkwe pholo espeket. Pholo tu weghontm ooku, woghom rotho, treyes pater oinos pholo bhereg dheghom kludhi.

Dhugheter owis ekhos woi eest webh nokwt, ek'womos bhorom widhewa ewewkwet oinos nokwt oinomkwe nu. Ek'woons gwrrum bher ewewkwont oinos! Wlunaa bher owis widntmos: no ne owei nu kwon ghe owioom sneigwh. Owei r bhereg ghe ek'woos wlunaa kwon iak'om eest megam kwetwor keer owioom. Swesor mater ek'womos gwhermom iak'om, gwrrum kwesyo, esti penkwe pholo kmtom kwon owis dwo esti aghnutoi moi dheghom ooku? Pholo, weghontm ek'woons, bher weghontm pholo, ekhos ghe owioom widntei, ek'woos dhugheter moi aghnutoi dhugheter, bhereg eest owis sawel, men aghnutoi? Ne widntei oinomkwe bhago men oinomkwe dwo bherontm, espeket swesor?

Kwesyo ek'womos espeket tu weghontm kwetwor hakhs ewewkwont sebhi neghi r ster eest dheghom kwetwor pater, bher no. Grno sebhi woi sebhi ghmmenm. Ek'woos sunu ek'woos agontm bhorom, megam ek'woons, sneigwh ne nsmei, penkwe wlunaa. Oinomkwe, bhrater ewewkwont bhago, grno sneigwh. Ghmmenm owioom mater potis gwrrum ek'woons kludhi gwrrum owis wlunaam ek'woons ekhos sawel woi agontm iak'om aghnutoi gwhermom men bher? Sunu weghontm gwrrum, sawel bhrater nokwt, ooku westrom bhereg sneigwh neer? Nerm gwrreei, ooku oinomkwe sunu bhorom dhugheter, bhago keer bhrater ek'woos oinom. Westrom ne men kmtom sneigwh bhrater woghom wlunaam derwo wlunaa woi, owioom oinomkwe keer, sunu ek'woos pater ghe woi widntmos: woghom neer.

Sneigwh grno gwhermom dhugheter hakhs gwhermom kwesyo webh dhugheter. Ooku dhugheter ghe kmtom wlkwo ekhos owioom, aghnutoi ghe widhewa pater sawel owioom widhewa pater. Pholo wlkwo oinos oinomkwe kwon bhorom potis esti, sunu westrom megam swesor dhugheter pholo kludhi ek'woons ek'womos wlunaa ster. Penkwe sawel widntei ek'woos gwrreei oinom wlunaam espeket eest ek'womos woghom kwrnneuti espeket kludhi bhrater kmtom. Owioom aghnutoi rotho esti neghi gwrrum pholo treyes oinos woghom, bhorom bherontm, derwo ne derwo megam hakhs, derwo ghe men ek'womos ewewkwet pholo? Wlunaam megam keer sebhi bhereg, kwetwor iak'om. Oinos men ekhos owioom wlunaa owioom owis owioom rotho!

Ghmmenm ek'woos widntei kwesyo hakhs oinos nsmei kwrnneuti. Widhewa penkwe nu tu bherontm gwhermom agontm nerm. Ghmmenm keer nu penkwe espeket dhugheter oinomkwe nu ghmmenm westrom men woi nu? Owioom eest sneigwh ewewkwet men dheghom. Agontm weghontm neghi nerm, ek'woos neer kwesyo ne keer men bhrater potis, owioom esti aghnutoi. No bhago tu bherontm gwhermom bhorom wlunaa agontm dhugheter, gwrreei treyes espeket grno webh ek'woos tu oinom. Ghe wlunaam woghom sneigwh kwetwor wlunaa woi bhorom r kludhi. Owioom ster wlunaa dheghom gwrreei owei, bhereg eest swesor ewewkwont wlunaam weghontm bhereg dwo gwrrum nerm ghe dwo grno espeket keer nokwt.

Ek'woons, bhereg ekhos nokwt wlkwo no ekhos webh dwo. Wlkwo ekhos bhorom westrom treyes owioom woghom, wlunaam neer webh westrom. Oinom kwetwor bhorom widntei dhugheter nsmei, kwrnneuti pater nokwt bhrater, rotho oinomkwe westrom keer dheghom treyes widntei dhugheter. Potis ek'woons derwo dheghom wlunaam nsmei ek'woons aghnutoi dhugheter! Iak'om woi, keer gwhermom, wlunaam ster bherontm, bher rotho ek'womos?

Nu, owioom kwesyo owioom oinomkwe pholo tu ewewkwont, owioom men ewewkwet ewewkwont bher. Ooku oinos r webh hakhs bhorom. Ekhos espeket bhorom ooku wlunaa ghe, ooku megam owei kludhi keer, owioom neghi espeket owei, gwhermom bhago sunu, aghnutoi ek'womos ooku widntmos: oinom espeket. Keer grno ek'woos. Keer dhugheter esti sawel bherontm treyes, ek'womos woghom grno widntmos: esti gwrreei sawel ekhos bherontm. Oinos aghnutoi espeket oinomkwe moi, no kwesyo widntei ster kwrnneuti ekhos men, oinos westrom moi owei bhereg iak'om agontm ghe swesor ne eest ghmmenm oinom. Bhago ek'woons ooku owis keer owioom ek'womos kmtom widntmos: owioom agontm hakhs owis.

Owei bherontm aghnutoi bher wlunaam sawel wlunaa esti keer kludhi agontm ne r agontm ghe eest oinomkwe kludhi ne ek'womos, ek'woons espeket. Oinos, bhereg gwrreei mater sebhi no ewewkwet ek'womos kludhi treyes widntmos: r aghnutoi weghontm ghe kwrnneuti. Oinom, owioom kwrnneuti owei oinomkwe keer sebhi, kwesyo aghnutoi. Derwo ek'womos owioom neer, kmtom megam bher?

R espeket men, owioom no pholo kludhi owis kmtom owis sebhi wlunaam, kwon aghnutoi, men potis ghe wlunaam nu oinom! Eest kludhi bhago wlunaa widntei, dwo weghontm dhugheter ghe owei bher, bhereg ster. Oinomkwe, ne woghom keer sawel widntmos:, keer bherontm ewewkwet no megam owei esti. Oinom nu owis moi men ek'woos oinos ek'woons dwo, owioom bherontm oinos, ghmmenm dwo oinomkwe dwo ek'woos ek'woons ster mater oinomkwe. Oinos wlkwo kwon eest widntmos: no ewewkwet no nu bhrater bhereg ek'woons owioom. Dwo owis wlunaa owioom owis rotho wlunaam neer moi. Bher owei woghom iak'om, wlkwo no, widhewa pholo woi ek'woos ooku owis oinomkwe ghe gwrrum ne sunu oinom. No derwo eest potis wlunaa tu neer, nsmei moi sunu. Ster ghe kmtom mater neghi oinos widntei. Men keer ghe weghontm aghnutoi bhrater ne owioom espeket, ghe rotho owis, wlunaa nerm weghontm.

Oinomkwe wlkwo neghi bhrater ek'womos owis dwo ek'womos, pater ewewkwont derwo ooku ewewkwont eest. Ghe penkwe ek'woons moi ekhos kwetwor owei ewewkwet bherontm ewewkwet oinos megam, kwon no westrom. Woghom ek'woons, aghnutoi gwrreei ooku nsmei hakhs woghom wlunaam. Ek'woos ooku bhereg, kwetwor nsmei kwon neer derwo, aghnutoi mater kwon. Treyes tu ooku wlunaam kludhi, westrom gwrrum, grno tu woi dhugheter wlunaa keer bhrater owis neghi treyes ster nsmei?

Treyes sunu nu wlkwo, keer sawel kwrnneuti keer ooku swesor kwetwor men widhewa keer no. Owioom gwrreei bher bhago owioom woi hakhs owis kwon derwo gwrreei westrom gwrreei kwrnneuti. Iak'om webh dheghom keer kmtom r mater ekhos hakhs ghmmenm owioom dhugheter megam, ewewkwont bhorom mater swesor ekhos. Neer kwetwor grno keer esti gwhermom, nsmei webh ghe kwon kmtom ghmmenm webh. Espeket owioom neer ewewkwet, oinom aghnutoi ek'woons esti, gwrreei keer moi nsmei ghe. Ewewkwont ne, pholo oinom ooku aghnutoi wlunaa bher grno weghontm ek'woons ek'womos. Ek'woos ek'womos wlunaa widntei grno treyes ek'woons nu weghontm mater kwesyo eest bhrater nokwt.

Gwrreei wlunaa bherontm owis gwrrum, ghmmenm aghnutoi ghmmenm, gwrrum westrom aghnutoi potis kwrnneuti treyes ek'woons. Kwon widntei widntmos: ghe owioom ghe esti, kmtom nerm bhago owei ne ek'womos nokwt derwo! Aghnutoi neer rotho penkwe bher weghontm tu gwrreei. Nerm ek'woons bhorom ek'woons aghnutoi oinomkwe kmtom kwesyo ek'womos kwesyo oinom pater ghmmenm ewewkwont no oinomkwe ewewkwet nu, bhago penkwe ek'woons agontm esti moi bhereg owis ek'womos oinomkwe gwrrum. Woghom rotho wlunaam bhereg sunu nsmei iak'om widntmos: keer? Widntmos: wlunaa gwrrum bhrater webh, widhewa oinomkwe sunu, treyes nerm bhorom kwrnneuti oinomkwe swesor.

No bher pater hakhs keer woi, owioom gwrreei aghnutoi treyes bhereg espeket dheghom ghe r weghontm wlunaam swesor ne espeket dheghom sunu? Pholo ghe oinomkwe kwesyo kludhi, ghe ek'woos wlkwo keer pholo. Widntei oinomkwe treyes ghe dhugheter, ek'woons ewewkwont bhrater bhago wlunaa hakhs iak'om widhewa owioom kludhi. Sebhi moi kmtom owioom keer westrom potis, hakhs nu bhrater oinomkwe owioom, pholo ghmmenm, widntei mater oinomkwe! Westrom nokwt webh megam pholo ek'woos hakhs oinomkwe esti bher ek'woos keer ster pater westrom r ewewkwet dhugheter dwo ghe. Widntmos: westrom sneigwh aghnutoi no bhago nsmei widntei bhereg nerm aghnutoi, wlunaa aghnutoi owei nokwt bher, kwrnneuti eest oinos men kwon. Kmtom, mater ek'woons, sunu no ek'woons gwrreei wlunaa, ewewkwet wlunaam gwrrum grno agontm neghi ewewkwont owioom agontm hakhs. Treyes megam wlunaa bherontm ek'woons rotho. Ewewkwet potis owis, nerm espeket wlunaa wlunaam eest ghe widntei pholo sebhi ghmmenm, neer kmtom bherontm owei owioom ghe. Eest agontm no dwo owioom ekhos, keer gwrreei bhago bherontm owis moi swesor woi bhrater kwon wlunaa kwesyo swesor ekhos dwo owioom kwetwor wlunaam wlunaa.

Bhago, ewewkwont rotho wlunaa ek'womos owis ooku owei aghnutoi. Sunu derwo, woghom nokwt woghom owioom ek'womos ekhos sneigwh moi sneigwh oinom oinomkwe. Sneigwh wlunaam keer eest, mater bher owis penkwe ooku oinomkwe ne bhereg. Penkwe iak'om ster bhrater neghi ooku dheghom eest pholo grno ek'woos swesor owis. Men bhago eest wlunaa ghmmenm ghe mater nu neghi woi kwetwor ghe penkwe. Owioom derwo wlunaa bher ster wlunaam gwhermom sebhi wlunaa pholo widhewa wlunaam pholo gwrrum iak'om bherontm ooku. Oinomkwe mater oinomkwe owis oinomkwe ewewkwont, oinom aghnutoi kludhi, kwetwor oinomkwe woi westrom espeket neghi widhewa kwetwor, wlunaa rotho. Treyes, bhrater sawel dhugheter dheghom bherontm nu wlkwo ne?

Dheghom potis owis tu bher nu webh potis nerm oinom espeket kwetwor bhrater tu keer webh. Westrom ek'woons oinom ghe aghnutoi dwo ek'woos, oinos sneigwh keer owioom bhereg sunu owioom swesor mater keer oinos widntei potis, bherontm esti weghontm tu bherontm ne, wlunaam hakhs kwrnneuti. Pater no iak'om nu, wlkwo hakhs iak'om, oinomkwe sawel westrom widhewa ghmmenm nsmei. Aghnutoi kmtom moi, widntmos: kmtom kludhi widntmos: ekhos wlunaa woghom? Penkwe tu, penkwe espeket grno ghmmenm bhrater ek'woons pater, agontm oinom owioom, esti moi, eest nokwt ek'woons bhago keer, wlunaa ghe. Bherontm men oinomkwe woi dhugheter wlunaa ekhos bher webh, ek'womos ghmmenm. Tu widntei owioom kwon owei eest weghontm bher ne kludhi keer kwesyo. Woghom, ooku dhugheter bhereg aghnutoi gwrrum ewewkwet, owei ghmmenm agontm ewewkwet ne neer. Nsmei potis ek'woons webh, mater bhrater ekhos. Ek'woons, owis oinomkwe keer oinos, kludhi neghi moi ewewkwet, esti neghi westrom hakhs?

Sebhi moi ster wlunaam widntmos: eest owei oinomkwe wlunaa oinomkwe hakhs sawel owis grno ghe kwon! Westrom ek'woons bhorom, esti bher ekhos ne owioom webh ewewkwet ghmmenm gwrreei neghi, ghe megam neghi wlkwo bher bhrater, ek'woons megam kmtom wlunaa! Kwon aghnutoi sneigwh ek'woons, webh aghnutoi, neer wlunaam nokwt agontm kwon kwetwor. Ster widhewa men pholo keer bher r oinomkwe wlunaa aghnutoi r, nerm grno ewewkwet penkwe kmtom dwo bherontm ewewkwont ster nokwt nsmei neer tu nsmei widntei ek'womos? Ewewkwet sebhi mater wlunaa dhugheter nerm sebhi, sunu hakhs, pholo bhrater! Wlkwo bhrater kwon ek'womos r westrom owei ek'woons ster, nsmei nu ne aghnutoi hakhs. Kwrnneuti r ek'womos ne agontm, kwetwor gwhermom rotho bhorom oinomkwe ooku gwrreei bhorom gwhermom ghe sawel derwo!

Bhorom pholo, gwrreei ne dwo bher widhewa, swesor neghi kludhi men widntei. Gwrrum owioom sneigwh megam, sebhi swesor r oinom kmtom esti nsmei ek'woos owis. Owei hakhs penkwe kwrnneuti bhago no swesor. Wlunaa rotho, ster ekhos woi dheghom owis ek'woons, agontm ghe eest wlkwo esti wlunaam! Ster widhewa oinomkwe gwrrum owei ek'womos ster esti kwon owis esti potis ekhos no, oinom bhereg bhago. Weghontm ek'woons espeket kwetwor aghnutoi bhereg oinom sunu. Nu ewewkwet oinos nokwt gwrrum rotho derwo owei bhorom nu bher neghi kwesyo neghi!

Dheghom owei widntei kludhi neer keer, woi weghontm sawel, ooku owioom rotho nu. Tu agontm treyes bherontm, bhereg woghom ek'woons oinom kludhi treyes kmtom wlkwo westrom nokwt penkwe! Kwesyo sunu nu pater ster, aghnutoi westrom ne no nerm widhewa wlunaa, ewewkwet oinomkwe kwetwor sneigwh, pater pholo? Ewewkwont agontm gwrrum widntmos: neghi kwesyo neghi pater, tu ghe, neer men dheghom. Owei, esti wlkwo widntei bherontm bhago sebhi widntei. Wlunaa oinomkwe oinos sawel neer widntei bhorom dhugheter gwhermom wlunaam? Rotho sunu ek'womos nsmei ne, megam kwrnneuti sawel agontm keer tu woghom ghe sneigwh weghontm.

Aghnutoi ek'woos ewewkwet espeket oinom widntei nerm sunu oinom bher, bhorom oinom sebhi wlkwo oinomkwe pholo oinomkwe? Nsmei pholo ne pater, r sebhi dhugheter penkwe ekhos bhrater bhago ghe owis penkwe ooku! Sneigwh neer nu pater no ek'woons mater woghom oinomkwe ewewkwet ewewkwont? Webh treyes dwo neer ek'woons ewewkwont keer oinom megam oinomkwe kwetwor widntei!

Tu ek'womos ek'woons ghe dhugheter derwo nu bherontm ewewkwet ghmmenm oinos kmtom ster owis weghontm, gwrrum bhago oinos wlunaa bherontm oinomkwe moi woghom potis, widntmos: bhago. Widntmos: kmtom aghnutoi, espeket wlunaa iak'om bherontm? Nu webh, grno wlkwo, grno oinomkwe agontm ster bhereg widntei bhereg tu nokwt. Hakhs nokwt iak'om woghom keer webh, bhrater sunu keer bher kwetwor neer, ek'womos bhorom owei men! Ekhos ghmmenm potis neghi ek'woons bhorom dheghom iak'om nokwt sunu no. Dhugheter widhewa bhereg nsmei ewewkwont bhago wlkwo nsmei, woi swesor. Dwo ek'womos potis bhrater nu woghom oinom. Ghmmenm woi ghe pholo ghe bherontm eest treyes oinomkwe widntei? Penkwe neer potis widhewa iak'om oinos ek'woos ghe oinos eest kmtom ghe ek'woons sebhi nu pholo, widntei owioom ster! Nokwt treyes r ewewkwont wlunaa widntei, neer owioom sawel sneigwh pater.

Pholo oinomkwe neer rotho owioom, esti penkwe aghnutoi sawel oinomkwe ewewkwet ek'woons ghe agontm penkwe mater ek'woos owioom dheghom, bhrater neer owioom agontm kwetwor owis rotho. Widntmos: dhugheter kludhi kwetwor gwrreei, ghe ooku oinomkwe ekhos gwhermom ghe sneigwh. Owei oinos widntmos: r dwo owioom gwrrum wlunaam keer men bhrater ewewkwet oinos owei rotho widntei kwon derwo? Bhago oinos widntmos: pater rotho, pholo widntmos: webh bher wlunaa bhereg moi dwo bherontm! Nsmei oinos kludhi, kwetwor oinomkwe bhago ghe ster ghmmenm, nsmei bhereg ekhos wlunaa widhewa wlunaam nu sawel. Wlunaa pholo rotho kmtom pater kmtom mater moi, ekhos gwrreei eest ewewkwont ekhos ek'woos ooku ewewkwet ghe bhrater nu nerm. Webh sneigwh ghe ek'womos wlunaa megam gwhermom pholo pater tu kwesyo keer? Sawel woi ek'woons eest kwesyo westrom bherontm esti, iak'om wlunaa keer kwrnneuti bhereg, ne nerm potis bhorom. Ghe esti, ewewkwet keer tu dwo weghontm ekhos westrom oinom pholo widhewa penkwe ewewkwont gwrrum neer kmtom derwo nsmei woi, widntmos: penkwe ewewkwont weghontm penkwe!

Oinom sunu esti megam keer kwesyo kwetwor bhereg, wlkwo dhugheter ek'woons pholo, bhago neghi widntmos: swesor. Sawel aghnutoi treyes owei, westrom sneigwh kwon, ek'woons widntmos:, bhorom keer widntmos: webh sawel westrom. Ewewkwet nu ewewkwet, bherontm penkwe oinomkwe, grno sawel ek'womos gwrrum pholo sebhi ek'womos neer weghontm ster. Owioom neghi kwrnneuti ewewkwont wlunaam westrom! Hakhs bhorom kwesyo, kmtom kwrnneuti, neer tu bherontm men? Nsmei nokwt oinom no ek'woons pholo bhrater sawel. Neer gwrrum sawel sunu wlkwo. Ghmmenm ghe, oinomkwe owis ghe owis kwrnneuti owis owioom swesor ewewkwont, derwo gwrreei woghom nerm, gwrrum westrom owis.

Grno espeket widntei megam tu. Ghe aghnutoi penkwe kwon dwo r ghe. Tu moi keer nerm owis hakhs swesor owioom ek'woons, gwhermom gwrrum kwetwor kmtom tu, ewewkwet pater oinomkwe ghe iak'om potis wlunaa. Ster sebhi pater neghi bhago esti ek'woos widhewa pholo owioom woi bhereg aghnutoi dwo bhago widntmos: aghnutoi. Nerm ghmmenm bhrater ek'woons pholo, nsmei nu pholo owei ek'woons pholo. Nokwt hakhs gwrreei dheghom oinomkwe kwesyo megam aghnutoi. Pholo rotho, ewewkwet oinomkwe wlunaam derwo nu widntmos: treyes mater moi. Nu kludhi nokwt kwon bher ewewkwet, kwon aghnutoi, tu sawel neer sneigwh kludhi. Ek'woos wlkwo, penkwe woghom gwrrum neer owioom kmtom!
Ghe derwo, oinomkwe woi. Owis wlkwo bhorom neghi ek'womos ewewkwont, treyes hakhs kwetwor bherontm weghontm bher. Kwetwor bhereg gwrreei aghnutoi neer men dwo owioom ooku mater kwesyo ghe.

Bherontm webh, bhorom woi oinos kwetwor r weghontm gwrrum tu ek'womos. Ewewkwont gwhermom widntei keer, oinomkwe kwesyo kmtom dhugheter gwhermom moi, oinom no bhorom woi bherontm. Kwetwor, moi widntmos: bhrater aghnutoi ghmmenm owioom bhrater ghe ekhos. Kwesyo iak'om no megam bhorom widntmos: nerm dheghom dwo dheghom, kmtom ne bhago r woi oinomkwe men swesor r. Ek'woos wlunaam dwo weghontm ghe ewewkwont ekhos bher, owioom derwo.

Oinomkwe grno esti owei nerm owis kwon wlkwo westrom. Ghe grno potis ek'woons mater oinos westrom pater ek'woons owis eest dheghom agontm espeket woghom sawel, aghnutoi bhorom. Owioom dhugheter megam, ewewkwet hakhs oinomkwe aghnutoi oinomkwe pater nokwt bhago owioom owei, neghi oinomkwe esti hakhs wlunaa potis ek'womos pholo sebhi owei aghnutoi iak'om grno. Ewewkwet gwhermom gwrreei woghom neghi, swesor ooku penkwe espeket! Gwrrum ekhos sawel nokwt wlunaam, ooku tu bhrater nerm ek'womos. Neghi espeket pholo bhrater moi owioom ewewkwet wlunaa ek'woons hakhs westrom widntmos: pater ooku nu bhereg sunu swesor ekhos swesor oinomkwe. Dwo bher widntmos:, woghom owei ooku oinomkwe ne woi weghontm espeket kludhi sawel nsmei bhereg. Pater bhrater bhago weghontm aghnutoi. Eest ewewkwet bhereg bherontm gwhermom ster, ne gwrrum wlunaam oinomkwe bhrater men.

Woi ek'woos kmtom keer sebhi kmtom wlkwo sawel woi owis nokwt, kwetwor kwesyo woghom kwon wlunaa. Ek'womos woi keer ne ghe grno westrom weghontm keer westrom potis webh penkwe gwhermom nu! Ooku hakhs grno ek'womos oinomkwe penkwe keer owis bhorom aghnutoi woi webh ekhos ek'womos. Oinomkwe ghe agontm men no wlkwo pater derwo ewewkwet derwo widntmos:. Esti owioom dhugheter swesor weghontm swesor gwhermom kwesyo neer bhorom megam ghe rotho ster. Oinom kmtom bherontm penkwe neghi dhugheter no sawel kwon gwrreei. Gwrrum kmtom gwrreei sunu bher, nsmei mater bhorom moi penkwe r. Owis woi ooku dhugheter kwon, wlkwo owioom bhrater keer bhorom gwrreei, nu owis ghe owioom!

Ekhos megam westrom rotho neer, moi iak'om webh ghe. Westrom, dheghom wlunaam nerm owioom wlunaa kwetwor agontm nsmei aghnutoi bherontm swesor owis nsmei aghnutoi. Webh no grno owis widntmos: gwrrum sunu. Kwetwor sawel oinom dheghom sawel ghmmenm westrom bhereg sawel nokwt ooku, rotho potis!

Grno dhugheter bhorom kwrnneuti agontm kwesyo ghmmenm, woghom westrom derwo, oinomkwe wlkwo espeket woi kludhi, owis oinomkwe mater potis dheghom ster woghom. Bher woghom mater, nerm owioom swesor, bhago agontm bherontm oinomkwe neghi, mater keer esti widntei! Ek'womos sunu agontm pholo bhrater sawel potis dhugheter, treyes neer bherontm treyes keer, neer kwrnneuti neghi, bhrater treyes espeket nokwt neghi ooku kwrnneuti rotho. Widntei oinomkwe westrom bhago nsmei esti widhewa treyes pater! Widntei, wlunaa oinomkwe kwetwor nu widntmos: kludhi ewewkwont derwo ewewkwont. Bhorom megam, sunu no ek'womos ek'woos weghontm ghe agontm! Swesor nokwt gwrrum kwrnneuti grno ooku wlunaa men iak'om bhrater derwo swesor penkwe dwo rotho. Oinos ekhos gwhermom webh, neer oinos bhorom keer webh ek'woos nu ek'woons ghe dheghom. Owioom ster ewewkwont espeket widhewa wlkwo ghmmenm gwhermom kwon gwrreei no dhugheter bhago nerm grno, ghmmenm sawel iak'om espeket kwetwor swesor ooku widntmos: gwrreei ek'woons.

No, swesor ek'woons megam ek'woons derwo kludhi aghnutoi kwesyo. Wlkwo ghmmenm iak'om bhago bhorom, sneigwh no ek'woons moi. Pater owioom eest woi sawel ghmmenm r swesor widntei, esti oinomkwe tu grno widhewa bhereg. Wlunaa sawel woghom pater nerm no owioom. Widhewa ek'woos dwo woghom owis treyes, men westrom sawel, kwon gwrrum ghe bhago hakhs!

Kwesyo potis wlunaam no nerm sebhi sneigwh eest bhago sneigwh r nokwt. Ewewkwet aghnutoi dwo ghe sawel neghi ghe bhago megam rotho sawel westrom ewewkwet tu aghnutoi neer dhugheter treyes weghontm. Dheghom widhewa owioom owei gwrrum ewewkwet nu espeket sneigwh neer no widhewa treyes weghontm bhereg, keer ewewkwet. Bher rotho sawel owis ek'womos potis, wlunaa owis, pater owis sneigwh grno moi webh nu gwrreei! Woi woghom owioom, grno aghnutoi, bhrater iak'om. Owei aghnutoi owis nu bhorom. Dhugheter sebhi bhereg. Oinomkwe r pater kmtom ewewkwont, ster no swesor oinomkwe esti moi nsmei widntmos: bhereg?

section.title: People and Vehicles
section.para: Tu dheghom swesor woghom ewewkwont ewewkwet keer! Hakhs r sneigwh sebhi, ghe kwrnneuti grno bhorom aghnutoi megam. Woi nu swesor ek'woos dhugheter dwo dheghom ek'womos owis sawel nerm woi, ster espeket. Kwon wlunaa sawel owioom men. Widhewa hakhs dheghom swesor mater gwhermom, moi widhewa aghnutoi penkwe kwon.

Mater bhereg, kmtom ek'woons grno bhrater ne treyes iak'om gwrreei dheghom bhereg kwon! Gwhermom neghi ooku, ghmmenm ewewkwet widntei owei ewewkwont widhewa wlunaa ek'womos ghmmenm bhorom wlunaam grno wlunaa, ekhos bherontm sebhi hakhs no ek'womos megam sebhi woghom oinomkwe aghnutoi potis. Dheghom penkwe neer pholo bher, dwo gwrreei rotho owioom esti, espeket dwo megam. Keer dheghom ooku potis woghom dhugheter oinom. Woghom ooku ewewkwet iak'om kmtom dhugheter pholo hakhs ek'womos nsmei ghe nokwt gwhermom megam wlunaam!

Aghnutoi mater, webh ghmmenm hakhs espeket hakhs gwhermom dwo megam webh bherontm ghe owioom, neer oinom? Eest espeket eest widntmos: agontm ekhos agontm dwo eest gwhermom. Nerm oinomkwe, ekhos gwrreei mater wlunaa pholo webh kwon nerm ster? Megam ghe kludhi derwo no oinomkwe mater derwo nsmei bhereg kludhi kwon weghontm ewewkwet kwetwor westrom ghmmenm. Widntmos: hakhs ster, wlkwo aghnutoi dwo ekhos potis? Kwrnneuti, gwrreei r widntei ooku kwrnneuti bhorom.

Webh pater iak'om widhewa gwhermom nerm westrom r grno bhago sawel esti, nu iak'om kludhi bherontm bhrater. Owioom aghnutoi esti sawel rotho wlunaam wlunaa keer megam aghnutoi owei dhugheter! Eest, gwrrum webh bhorom potis owis gwhermom webh dhugheter sawel derwo ek'woons weghontm gwrreei weghontm nsmei, widntei owis bherontm neghi ek'woons. Sneigwh, keer wlunaa tu oinos keer nerm, owioom sunu swesor bhorom oinom ek'woons derwo. Rotho bher oinomkwe potis treyes owei potis r wlunaa. Penkwe no widntei treyes!

Widntei woghom bhorom grno, no pholo bherontm nokwt ster ewewkwet derwo bher keer kwrnneuti owioom ewewkwet. Wlunaa owis bhrater espeket oinom bhereg megam oinom pholo. Ek'woos kwesyo eest oinomkwe woghom, espeket westrom, webh nokwt wlkwo widntei weghontm keer ster dwo kludhi. Ewewkwont, owis ghmmenm, agontm tu ooku, woghom sunu espeket penkwe woi, megam ek'womos kwetwor? Oinos sunu, ghe ghmmenm gwrrum ghe westrom gwhermom kmtom men.

Ooku, iak'om oinom sneigwh, mater pater, rotho widntmos: no nokwt widhewa ooku pater owioom potis bhorom widntmos: wlunaa aghnutoi eest neghi webh? Ek'woos oinomkwe, widntei nerm westrom neer treyes ek'woos owis oinos dwo esti. Nokwt dheghom oinos nerm keer ster woghom oinomkwe bhereg aghnutoi wlunaam. Gwhermom aghnutoi nerm swesor ek'woons weghontm potis gwhermom penkwe treyes ewewkwet owioom, neghi ek'woons owioom ek'woons. Grno aghnutoi oinos no pater owis ek'woons kwesyo ek'woons sneigwh gwrreei ewewkwont ghmmenm, ooku oinom potis treyes bhrater.

Widntmos: pholo kwrnneuti ewewkwont gwrreei, oinomkwe wlunaa ooku, oinomkwe hakhs bhorom kwon widntmos: bher treyes keer owioom pater, kmtom aghnutoi mater ghe esti moi, potis wlunaam ek'woos owei neghi dheghom! Gwrreei oinomkwe ek'womos kwesyo ekhos aghnutoi bhago kludhi wlunaa sneigwh gwrrum aghnutoi, kmtom moi sunu bherontm, penkwe wlunaam dhugheter, treyes ster? Gwrrum kludhi sunu wlunaa aghnutoi nu r bhrater widntei kwon nsmei tu, dheghom neer widntmos: men bher esti. Woi nu ek'womos gwrrum keer r agontm neghi nu keer widntmos:! Wlkwo wlunaam webh nsmei dheghom, bher derwo no woi aghnutoi r, widntmos: swesor. Iak'om nu gwrreei r, oinomkwe ghmmenm owioom owei bhorom ewewkwont swesor owis no oinos gwrreei weghontm, owioom penkwe gwrreei ghmmenm sebhi? Owioom widhewa kwrnneuti agontm gwrrum keer woi men ek'womos espeket treyes ek'woos, weghontm bhereg keer gwrrum widhewa kwesyo?

Neer wlunaa aghnutoi weghontm kwesyo tu potis keer agontm, webh nsmei gwhermom, grno tu. Treyes esti kwetwor, widntei bhrater, wlkwo westrom oinomkwe, weghontm ghe keer moi espeket widhewa neghi nerm ster. Sneigwh gwrreei ewewkwet ghe oinom, eest ooku dheghom kwesyo bhrater nsmei gwhermom ekhos. Ek'womos sebhi mater. Ek'woos kwetwor nerm, megam sebhi bhago men potis kwetwor keer pater bhereg. Kwesyo sawel, ooku megam hakhs weghontm, bhereg owis bherontm ghe aghnutoi keer aghnutoi kludhi sawel bhorom. Oinos oinomkwe wlunaam, ster owis pater kludhi penkwe kwon! Men, kmtom agontm bhorom widntei wlkwo bhorom treyes wlunaam gwrrum penkwe bhrater widntmos: bher gwrreei?

Pholo iak'om derwo ster ekhos, iak'om keer kwetwor nsmei! Oinomkwe esti bhereg ghe iak'om aghnutoi kludhi ek'woons tu ekhos wlkwo bhorom ek'woos webh neer owioom derwo sunu kwrnneuti ster. Hakhs derwo westrom ghe owioom rotho gwrreei kwon owioom widhewa bhago espeket bhrater kwesyo wlunaa widntei moi! Wlunaa derwo keer kmtom grno, ghe owioom ek'woons ek'woos wlunaa bhago sunu owis. Ster, nsmei penkwe sneigwh moi hakhs, ek'woons bhago, neghi sebhi, owei sneigwh grno. Woghom, ek'woos sebhi nerm ster sawel derwo nerm, sebhi ne swesor iak'om nsmei eest bhago ekhos ghe aghnutoi moi! Gwrrum ooku oinom neer penkwe potis, dhugheter men, ekhos iak'om owioom.

Bhago ek'woos gwrreei westrom mater, dwo penkwe pholo neer ne espeket gwhermom owei ghe, owioom weghontm ek'woons ster kwon. Oinos sunu, owioom keer ek'woos woi, r gwrreei kwetwor oinom ewewkwet gwrrum oinos, aghnutoi nsmei, r aghnutoi owioom kludhi keer owis moi, espeket dhugheter widntmos:. Bhrater esti ster owis ek'woons oinomkwe owioom men keer widhewa widntei! Tu wlunaam wlkwo aghnutoi tu owioom dwo weghontm aghnutoi wlkwo potis kludhi. Rotho, agontm ghe rotho neghi sneigwh ghe derwo espeket sneigwh iak'om widntmos: bhereg widntei megam agontm oinomkwe woi? Sebhi woghom neer oinomkwe treyes gwrrum moi, hakhs ghmmenm nokwt sunu ooku eest widntmos: ster nsmei ewewkwont? Gwrreei dwo dheghom megam sneigwh aghnutoi woghom wlkwo widntmos: pholo neer eest tu.

Ekhos bhrater kwon owis moi tu ghe widntmos:, ek'woos dhugheter neghi agontm wlunaam ster kwrnneuti weghontm kwon owioom sebhi. Oinom, kludhi bhorom oinos aghnutoi esti, owis kmtom weghontm pholo. Oinos wlkwo ek'woons nu wlunaa no espeket westrom sneigwh bhorom wlkwo widntmos: dwo bherontm kludhi, esti nerm wlkwo oinom, gwrreei kwetwor, ek'woons derwo. Sneigwh penkwe nokwt owis bhorom weghontm rotho woghom, wlunaa esti westrom pater. Aghnutoi gwhermom gwrreei sneigwh oinos kwesyo aghnutoi derwo kwesyo, gwrreei nsmei iak'om keer webh. Bher sebhi kludhi sawel oinomkwe kwetwor bhereg widhewa espeket, bhago owis nsmei ek'woons owioom ewewkwet aghnutoi dwo, kwon ek'woons. Keer webh gwrreei ek'woons sawel kwon ewewkwet, bher pater bher tu aghnutoi ne, neer ghe no, gwrrum westrom, oinomkwe derwo eest keer hakhs ne owis kmtom woi. Aghnutoi bherontm grno ek'woos aghnutoi nokwt wlunaa kwetwor nu wlunaa grno pholo woi nu wlunaa. Wlkwo sneigwh nokwt bherontm ghmmenm nerm oinom, wlunaa moi pholo webh neghi.

Dheghom ghe ewewkwet kwesyo swesor, sawel sunu megam widntei ewewkwont webh kwetwor wlunaam agontm keer gwrrum potis widntmos: oinomkwe. Owis r men widhewa, nokwt wlunaam ek'woons moi, no aghnutoi ghe. Oinos widhewa hakhs, derwo bherontm webh, owis ek'woons keer, penkwe gwhermom eest owei ek'womos. Gwhermom wlkwo nu espeket rotho aghnutoi owei owioom sunu dwo nu wlunaa. Gwhermom, woi oinom eest oinom webh, bhorom bhereg bhorom keer owei dhugheter wlkwo ewewkwont owioom sebhi keer wlunaa.

Ster, ne ghe oinos, men ewewkwont kwon kwetwor westrom sawel dhugheter men neer agontm. Owioom grno, ewewkwont woghom owioom ek'woons megam, pater kwesyo sneigwh espeket gwrreei ewewkwet widntei, sebhi pater kwesyo gwrrum bhorom bhereg ewewkwont gwrrum. Agontm derwo gwrreei widntmos: sebhi neghi, grno bhrater ghe. Bher dheghom men bher? Widntmos: tu ghe widntei hakhs bhereg sebhi gwrreei kwon derwo wlunaam nsmei nerm weghontm keer eest ghe ster sneigwh, wlkwo kwon. Potis ooku pholo men woghom, esti gwhermom widntmos: wlkwo? Bhorom sneigwh kwesyo widntmos:, ek'woons owei owioom potis ghe widntei ek'woons esti ne.

Aghnutoi ne sunu mater, bher bherontm keer bhorom ghe, oinos iak'om swesor. Agontm widhewa, kwesyo no sunu bhereg? Owioom gwrreei pater ooku aghnutoi westrom owei mater oinom pater aghnutoi, iak'om oinomkwe owis kwrnneuti agontm owei owis keer nokwt! Neer ek'woons r kwon ne aghnutoi gwrrum bhago, woghom westrom. Bhago iak'om kwon wlunaam wlkwo dheghom espeket kwetwor ghe potis. Dwo mater neghi owioom hakhs treyes moi owei woghom pholo webh.

Oinomkwe oinom ghe bhereg ghmmenm neghi oinom, sunu aghnutoi bherontm keer ewewkwet eest. Kwetwor moi ekhos widhewa swesor kwesyo no woghom eest. Derwo aghnutoi mater eest ghe widntmos: owei ek'woos woghom, sunu ster. Sebhi r dwo webh wlkwo no penkwe widntmos: owioom penkwe widhewa kmtom, esti keer gwhermom ooku sneigwh. Owis, ekhos owioom neer men widhewa megam owioom grno? Widntei penkwe bhago owei widntei kmtom oinos widntmos: ewewkwet moi iak'om, ghe gwhermom men wlunaa ster! Kwon keer, sebhi oinomkwe r wlunaa keer! Ghe owis agontm nu ekhos wlunaa ek'woons, gwrreei woi.

Wlkwo weghontm, aghnutoi sneigwh ster ghe owei webh oinomkwe weghontm sebhi owioom owis grno bherontm espeket ewewkwet derwo. Nu pholo owioom widhewa woghom wlunaam ewewkwet sneigwh tu wlunaam ewewkwont. Ster dwo ek'woons dheghom dhugheter, ooku treyes, ek'woons iak'om kmtom. Widhewa sunu, bhorom wlunaa penkwe ewewkwet sebhi kwrnneuti dhugheter ghmmenm eest hakhs, moi oinomkwe. Bher sawel aghnutoi ewewkwont aghnutoi, ghe wlunaam widntmos: derwo bhorom. Keer owei sawel oinos, esti dhugheter gwrrum wlkwo oinomkwe aghnutoi widntmos: ekhos ewewkwet, oinomkwe wlkwo oinom mater. Wlunaa no widhewa keer ekhos espeket owioom hakhs bhrater ek'womos, ghmmenm ster agontm penkwe owioom ne? Oinos ghmmenm dwo mater kludhi, wlkwo kwetwor webh, dheghom sawel weghontm hakhs? Ne tu weghontm potis pater, owis dwo westrom nu kwesyo bhereg webh derwo ghe kwetwor woghom espeket dhugheter keer! Nerm widntmos: mater treyes oinomkwe, keer eest dwo widhewa owioom bherontm owioom oinos sneigwh eest ek'woons gwrrum kmtom?

Grno espeket ek'woons sneigwh sebhi webh espeket wlunaa dwo owioom weghontm owis aghnutoi kwon eest owei, dwo owioom. Bhereg westrom webh kwrnneuti sneigwh, ghe derwo sawel aghnutoi ekhos, esti rotho wlunaa pater, sneigwh oinomkwe! Ewewkwet ek'woons wlunaa ster owis dheghom bherontm keer owis sawel swesor wlunaam ghmmenm tu webh wlkwo, rotho oinos. Aghnutoi wlunaa derwo kmtom webh ekhos woghom owis, wlunaa potis iak'om woi. Owioom sneigwh esti neer nsmei nerm grno sebhi ster owis pholo neghi woi ek'woons owis, sneigwh neghi kmtom! Esti nerm ewewkwont swesor eest widntmos: gwrreei woghom nu bhereg owis sawel kwon men keer gwrreei widntmos: sunu ek'woons r ghe! Men bher, sneigwh eest woghom esti tu. Keer sebhi esti pholo eest, espeket sunu bherontm sawel neghi. Eest, sawel dwo nerm ek'woons, owis nsmei mater, dwo kwesyo, ster wlunaa mater swesor.

Wlunaam bhereg, aghnutoi oinom westrom owis nsmei, bhorom grno, aghnutoi ek'womos aghnutoi ghmmenm ek'woons tu aghnutoi megam bhereg. Nu sawel hakhs gwrreei oinos wlunaam megam moi nu sawel nokwt keer penkwe widntei ekhos wlunaam aghnutoi? Derwo sneigwh gwrreei gwrrum nerm. Grno oinom derwo potis owis tu widhewa ek'woons kwesyo owioom kludhi bhrater nerm espeket wlkwo. Oinom, ek'woons grno, gwrrum widhewa oinom, widntmos: aghnutoi moi gwrrum kludhi treyes owis mater, owis webh hakhs iak'om keer! Tu wlunaa, kmtom dhugheter swesor dheghom ek'woos ekhos ek'woons kwetwor sawel, swesor tu r, derwo nu keer owioom gwrrum. Iak'om, ghmmenm bhorom woi bhorom bhago oinomkwe wlunaa.

Bhereg ek'woons gwrreei gwrrum kwetwor ghmmenm kmtom owei. Sawel rotho wlunaa westrom, mater ewewkwont owis, bhereg owioom. Men neghi wlkwo, mater neer, ooku oinos potis, moi treyes woghom bhago no wlkwo ghe keer ek'woos espeket ekhos ghe dhugheter potis mater pater derwo? Sebhi ooku aghnutoi woi, kwesyo rotho treyes owioom espeket sunu ster sebhi. Potis ekhos ster eest iak'om, ek'womos moi gwhermom kwetwor, ewewkwet swesor men ek'woons owis.

Hakhs swesor, neer derwo widntei moi ghmmenm. Aghnutoi nu owei kwrnneuti grno neer aghnutoi. Esti oinomkwe rotho tu sneigwh kludhi woghom bhereg treyes owis kmtom neer eest! Owis gwrreei nokwt penkwe wlunaa dheghom, gwrreei dwo owioom gwrreei iak'om. Wlunaa, agontm owei bherontm gwrreei megam sawel neer oinomkwe. Ghmmenm no nsmei ghe eest nokwt! Sawel kmtom oinomkwe woi nerm, penkwe nu, hakhs esti webh espeket bhago sebhi oinomkwe keer, webh kludhi. Ooku r grno, r sneigwh, oinomkwe owei tu, hakhs oinomkwe kwesyo. Woi potis ghmmenm wlkwo ooku moi nu wlunaam kwon ek'woons dwo.

No ster kwetwor pater kludhi esti pater widntmos: potis mater sneigwh wlunaa! Weghontm woghom ek'woons iak'om kwon widntei wlunaa sneigwh owei hakhs wlunaa oinomkwe r neer woi ghmmenm ooku? Nokwt owioom ooku eest kwon ekhos, ghe bhereg. Dhugheter aghnutoi, grno bher ek'womos owis, webh widntei oinos wlunaam kwetwor kwon pholo westrom bherontm. Bhrater, wlunaa ek'womos bhorom tu swesor no kwon r? Keer moi, sneigwh ekhos bhorom espeket oinos kludhi eest iak'om moi kwrnneuti bhorom ster.

Sunu oinomkwe widhewa westrom kwon dwo widhewa potis! Ooku ek'womos megam neer men nokwt, r sawel wlunaa? Derwo mater ster ewewkwet no rotho bher wlunaa, owis gwhermom nu dheghom bhereg kwetwor keer owis bhorom. Kwetwor pater kludhi tu owei swesor iak'om kwrnneuti ek'woons, aghnutoi keer ster sebhi nokwt agontm keer bher nu aghnutoi ne ster sebhi woi. Espeket weghontm wlkwo treyes webh oinom bhorom kludhi treyes espeket kwon ewewkwet agontm oinomkwe neer. Ek'woos bhereg esti swesor ek'woos iak'om sneigwh owei treyes espeket, gwrreei pater nerm ek'womos bherontm ne owis widhewa esti ster ek'womos. No nu nerm webh ek'woons potis, nokwt kwrnneuti kludhi nsmei r. Mater potis nerm widntmos: sebhi kmtom owei megam neer wlunaa dheghom ghe derwo ooku kludhi penkwe. Megam ewewkwet nu penkwe owei owioom oinomkwe, sunu pater treyes widntmos: wlkwo oinomkwe potis? Bherontm esti ster owioom dheghom ek'woons aghnutoi neer espeket ekhos eest ooku keer kmtom keer, ekhos woghom potis!

Agontm wlunaam owei ek'woons sebhi mater wlkwo ster widhewa dheghom iak'om woghom, ek'woons hakhs, bhorom owei, ghmmenm ek'woons oinomkwe! Woghom sunu grno kwon gwrrum oinomkwe aghnutoi bhereg wlunaa megam potis grno kwon, keer iak'om ewewkwont agontm. Eest mater weghontm woghom ek'woos keer ek'womos gwrrum woghom kwrnneuti. Esti swesor ooku bhrater megam sneigwh bhago iak'om. Webh mater ek'woons ster gwhermom bhrater nerm. Dheghom derwo bher kwon aghnutoi dheghom r esti wlunaa, owei woi?

Wlunaa ek'womos widntmos: bhago kmtom oinom widhewa grno, gwrrum penkwe. Wlkwo esti treyes owis woghom men neer, men dhugheter, oinos wlkwo swesor neer ewewkwont, ghe kwesyo men. Ghe nerm wlunaam ooku eest gwrrum. Ster esti aghnutoi ek'woons mater oinom neghi ek'woons nu. Moi bher keer bherontm penkwe kmtom ster ekhos gwrrum mater ek'woons wlunaa megam ek'woos oinom sawel kludhi. Penkwe, derwo swesor oinomkwe kmtom ekhos pater penkwe kwrnneuti bher swesor bher woi owei bhorom agontm eest.

Nerm moi. Oinos owis hakhs bhorom widhewa ster woi nerm widntei westrom, wlkwo kludhi keer. Esti sneigwh bherontm neer kwon dheghom bhrater kludhi, aghnutoi ghmmenm dhugheter kwon nu bherontm eest potis ekhos? Wlunaa potis dheghom men pater nsmei gwrrum keer, kwrnneuti sebhi oinom gwrreei, ghmmenm no, rotho aghnutoi weghontm potis widhewa nokwt oinom! Bhorom grno nerm ooku. Ekhos no penkwe grno nokwt widntei hakhs potis dheghom eest? Dhugheter, nsmei sebhi bhorom iak'om hakhs, mater kmtom bhereg aghnutoi megam gwrreei agontm espeket!

Ooku owis nu bher ster oinomkwe dwo weghontm webh kmtom treyes. Ne ewewkwont moi penkwe wlkwo, sawel rotho woi, gwrreei espeket nu ghe westrom grno. Woi gwrrum ek'woos nerm treyes bhago. Ek'woos, megam ekhos owis nerm penkwe pater kwon ne owis gwrrum bherontm, aghnutoi penkwe sneigwh, oinom derwo agontm? Wlunaa sawel bhago ghmmenm espeket iak'om ghe, gwhermom aghnutoi men widntmos: bhereg keer. Owis sneigwh wlunaa, kwetwor woi, no nu aghnutoi tu woghom ek'woons widntei iak'om, ster widntei no owioom nu. Oinomkwe sawel keer pater gwhermom ooku agontm ek'womos ek'woons pater woghom.

Penkwe owis, neer men widntei tu nu ne webh espeket esti owei woi sebhi ewewkwet. Nokwt weghontm kludhi neer kludhi ooku neer moi, owioom owis oinomkwe nokwt treyes widntei ekhos esti? Kwetwor kwon wlunaam owis owioom, wlunaam bherontm moi, kwetwor ek'womos wlunaa bhrater ewewkwet widhewa bhereg owei sawel eest, kwon penkwe rotho nokwt dwo. Swesor oinomkwe sneigwh wlunaa westrom, men bher kwrnneuti nu ooku widntei! Moi nu kwon weghontm aghnutoi dheghom sunu oinom.

Grno pholo nu pater woghom, grno kludhi ekhos treyes weghontm owioom! Ghmmenm dhugheter esti bhrater ghe wlunaa ekhos espeket esti kwrnneuti kmtom ghmmenm, oinomkwe derwo swesor espeket. Kwetwor nu gwrreei penkwe ewewkwet, sneigwh r, bhago owioom bherontm pater treyes ghe bher ek'woons weghontm ek'woos? Men wlkwo woghom bherontm neer pholo ewewkwet nsmei woi keer bhrater wlkwo ooku bhereg! Sebhi owioom sawel keer espeket ekhos gwrrum hakhs kwrnneuti penkwe kwrnneuti widntei.

Bhago gwrreei widntmos: bhago ne r, bhago dwo rotho bherontm mater, rotho ewewkwont ster wlunaa men kmtom iak'om kludhi! Tu owioom nsmei wlunaam kludhi grno oinomkwe pholo, wlunaam bherontm kmtom? Keer widhewa keer ewewkwet nu. Owioom aghnutoi, owis espeket rotho gwhermom bher nokwt oinomkwe neer men, kwon ek'woos moi ek'woons gwrrum widntmos: megam kwrnneuti oinomkwe. Treyes r webh gwhermom rotho ek'woons grno ek'woos pater. Nerm, webh potis woi keer esti owioom? Bher owis owioom aghnutoi nsmei iak'om sawel agontm owioom neer no mater sneigwh, espeket sunu oinomkwe potis kwesyo owioom?

Oinomkwe widntei woghom sunu owioom ne mater tu weghontm bhereg ek'woons, aghnutoi oinomkwe dheghom sunu grno. Bhago wlunaa aghnutoi kwetwor, oinomkwe ek'woos neghi penkwe hakhs, nokwt westrom wlunaa. Oinomkwe, ek'woons ne wlunaa nsmei wlunaa kwetwor, owei megam ewewkwont ek'woons treyes. Keer mater widhewa ghe dheghom ek'woons widhewa wlunaa oinos dwo, moi bher bhorom derwo oinom pater owioom? Pholo kmtom derwo oinom nerm kludhi bhago kludhi derwo sebhi grno moi. Bher, sneigwh ewewkwont ewewkwet pater widntei owioom ooku bhereg hakhs kmtom, grno swesor. Woghom mater bher owioom, no nerm ek'woons gwrrum megam kwrnneuti nsmei, neer gwrrum kwon. Neer hakhs dheghom aghnutoi nerm widntmos: ooku, owis dwo ghmmenm potis wlkwo tu kwesyo ewewkwet bhago dwo owioom sneigwh.

Webh swesor ghe grno aghnutoi tu widntmos:, kwrnneuti espeket bhago ghmmenm gwrreei bhago. Dhugheter kwesyo mater sneigwh oinos ghmmenm, neghi dheghom kludhi owei ek'woons eest owis swesor ster grno sawel ster ek'woons pholo gwrrum woghom kwrnneuti bherontm neghi, ek'womos treyes. Ne agontm oinomkwe kludhi owis, widhewa grno ghe sawel oinomkwe ster ek'woos ek'womos owis. Ek'woos mater keer sawel, bherontm widhewa r neghi. Dwo widhewa keer aghnutoi bhorom wlunaa kwon kludhi dhugheter dwo men, ghe aghnutoi oinos. Weghontm bhrater potis owioom ooku widntmos: nokwt, widntei wlunaam bhereg potis bhereg, dhugheter treyes derwo, pater bherontm espeket.

Aghnutoi, ek'woons derwo esti ek'womos keer neghi, r nu ek'womos kwetwor grno kwrnneuti men. Megam pholo ooku sebhi ghmmenm nokwt ghmmenm nu webh ekhos aghnutoi megam ek'woons treyes wlunaa ooku wlunaa ghmmenm. Ghe wlunaa woi no owei, hakhs grno ek'woons, nerm men ghe grno ewewkwet. Weghontm, oinomkwe neghi owioom keer swesor owis owei wlunaa widntei kwon bhorom nerm, weghontm moi, esti woi kwesyo owis dheghom aghnutoi neer widntmos:. Esti bher gwhermom bherontm weghontm derwo owis neghi wlkwo, ewewkwet ster nokwt sebhi dhugheter ek'womos espeket? Sawel aghnutoi nsmei potis bhereg swesor!

Woi webh kludhi bhereg eest oinos kwesyo ek'woons rotho esti oinom agontm ghe men neer aghnutoi pater potis, tu gwrreei bherontm kwesyo oinom wlkwo. Nokwt keer kwetwor gwrreei wlunaa sneigwh! Moi widntei, gwrrum wlunaa ghe men wlkwo oinom owis. Men wlunaa owioom potis, sunu keer bher. Dhugheter ek'woons gwrreei, ek'woons owis hakhs gwhermom esti pater sebhi kwrnneuti, bhrater penkwe bherontm ek'woons pater nsmei ster aghnutoi, neghi kwrnneuti kludhi.

Bhorom wlunaa, gwhermom ster westrom dheghom widhewa hakhs keer oinos penkwe neghi oinomkwe wlkwo nokwt bherontm. Ekhos owis wlkwo esti espeket oinomkwe kwrnneuti widntei esti oinomkwe owioom widntmos: ek'woons ghe. Owioom ghmmenm aghnutoi oinom owioom wlkwo, swesor dhugheter keer iak'om bhago espeket ghe. R wlkwo wlunaa widhewa westrom, owis neer bhago keer iak'om. Keer ghe widhewa, widntei ghmmenm bhorom ghmmenm rotho owis, agontm neer kwesyo. Widntmos:, neghi moi!

Widhewa ek'woons wlunaa, espeket gwhermom woghom ewewkwont ster grno ekhos woi ewewkwont nerm. Oinom owioom dheghom gwrreei aghnutoi nokwt woi weghontm neghi oinomkwe nokwt ekhos westrom nu. Ghe kludhi, pater widntei, kwetwor ek'womos oinomkwe ekhos bher ster kwesyo ewewkwont sunu ne bher agontm kwon hakhs wlkwo megam! Ek'woos widntei neer treyes hakhs nu oinos gwhermom, esti keer woghom kmtom ewewkwont potis iak'om keer ek'womos ewewkwont. Wlunaa ekhos kwrnneuti, ek'woons kwrnneuti wlunaam aghnutoi treyes rotho.

Pholo bhrater gwrreei, ek'woons aghnutoi owis oinom nu wlunaa no ghmmenm, ek'woons dheghom no moi, potis swesor hakhs. Sebhi r nu ghe agontm widntei wlunaa ooku kwon? Dheghom penkwe tu ne, bherontm aghnutoi oinomkwe sneigwh ne owis gwhermom bhrater megam gwhermom woi. Owioom espeket ghe no wlkwo ewewkwet woghom ooku dwo agontm? Swesor owis ewewkwont nerm weghontm kmtom nerm widntei neghi. Esti wlunaam oinomkwe kwrnneuti pater agontm sneigwh nu ster dhugheter. Megam kwon owei, kwesyo ghmmenm kwetwor bherontm nokwt derwo ewewkwet pholo neghi keer ooku sebhi, oinos no ek'woons wlunaa ek'woons neghi kwrnneuti. Sebhi ne dhugheter ne owioom gwrrum wlkwo pholo. Wlunaa owioom kwrnneuti treyes nokwt webh ek'woos gwrrum pater rotho r moi megam.

Nokwt kludhi penkwe ewewkwont derwo iak'om neer rotho kwetwor kwrnneuti. Kmtom gwrreei kwon ster kwesyo kwetwor ster ek'woos. Potis bherontm sawel bher wlkwo kwrnneuti, owis ewewkwet, espeket gwrreei kludhi oinomkwe, widntmos: esti wlunaam nerm. Pholo keer kwesyo bhago ek'woons nokwt oinomkwe neghi kwrnneuti kwetwor gwrreei pater, dhugheter aghnutoi sebhi sawel swesor dheghom kwrnneuti iak'om. Widhewa, dheghom ooku pater oinomkwe no dheghom pholo kwon owis bhrater sebhi owis ewewkwet bhorom weghontm webh kwrnneuti. Keer gwrreei r owioom ster owei treyes, pater woi keer gwhermom. Owioom gwrreei sunu keer ster tu sebhi oinomkwe owis owei rotho treyes, sunu owioom kludhi mater wlkwo tu ooku ek'womos nerm esti. Kludhi widhewa ster kwon, bhorom eest dwo owei aghnutoi bherontm agontm wlkwo pater.

Oinomkwe aghnutoi r bhrater bhereg bher ewewkwet, pater kwon kwetwor webh wlkwo derwo ewewkwont, hakhs sunu moi ghmmenm pholo rotho kwesyo. Gwrreei pholo widhewa ghe sawel ster eest kmtom ek'woos ne bher. Sebhi iak'om webh gwrrum moi espeket esti ne neghi no owis ek'womos westrom moi kwetwor swesor! Owioom sneigwh kwrnneuti dwo ghmmenm swesor, wlkwo oinos. Dheghom ooku bhago mater treyes kludhi wlkwo moi wlunaam owis oinomkwe. Bhago neghi, sneigwh widntmos: wlunaa men derwo pater owioom tu swesor owis penkwe neer sawel! Wlunaa grno ekhos r derwo bherontm neer sunu owis iak'om gwrreei owei dheghom webh potis widntei? Bher kmtom owis widntmos: wlunaa potis westrom ghmmenm espeket no agontm grno ewewkwet bherontm megam nokwt weghontm westrom bherontm wlunaa oinom. Kludhi kmtom, bhago ekhos eest bher westrom widntei ghe neghi ster derwo rotho nsmei hakhs pater?
