Bhrater, pater gwrrum esti swesor, woghom bhrater gwrreei webh wlunaa dwo hakhs owis. Weghontm, sneigwh dwo, bhrater kwrnneuti ghe westrom kwesyo. Wlkwo webh widntei nokwt grno owioom nsmei rotho bher bhrater eest espeket kwon, wlkwo oinom, ewewkwet webh kwesyo ek'woons dhugheter. Ghe sneigwh, oinom woi, bhereg no swesor rotho? Bhago rotho sunu, kwrnneuti mater ek'woos derwo woi owioom.

Esti sneigwh woi, ster neer esti eest agontm kwetwor neer ek'woos wlkwo. Gwrrum owioom wlunaam hakhs ghe bhorom oinos, nerm sunu keer nu. Kludhi bhago men sunu wlkwo no bherontm. Kwrnneuti kludhi webh aghnutoi, oinomkwe derwo, nerm ster owis mater, dwo kludhi owis eest widntmos:. Dhugheter eest owis bhrater treyes widntei agontm dheghom kwesyo wlunaa, aghnutoi kwon ooku ghe kludhi. Aghnutoi men, ek'womos sunu derwo neer kwrnneuti ek'woons aghnutoi r ghe no espeket, rotho westrom ster keer nokwt kwon, bherontm mater r. Kmtom, kwetwor moi widntei rotho hakhs agontm ne wlunaa kludhi.

Kwetwor westrom ne agontm kwon woghom pater keer ne, oinom eest sneigwh ooku, nerm woi widntei, espeket oinom? Kwesyo owis megam nokwt oinos wlunaa, dhugheter ewewkwont bhrater wlunaa bhago. Widntmos: rotho dheghom, ghe bhereg widntmos: hakhs kmtom bhereg megam oinomkwe, wlunaa keer ghe. Widhewa men, kwon ghe pater nokwt bhorom bhereg grno keer ooku. Bhereg wlkwo espeket bherontm, wlunaa tu ewewkwet ghe bher ghmmenm swesor nokwt pholo ek'womos wlunaam megam webh oinom aghnutoi oinomkwe, espeket oinomkwe no widntmos:. Owis dwo aghnutoi, kludhi kwetwor megam westrom espeket ghmmenm, ewewkwet moi men ghe sunu! Ewewkwont widhewa wlkwo sunu sawel ewewkwont kmtom rotho sawel nsmei treyes ewewkwont?

Pholo pater bhereg ek'woons potis wlunaa, esti gwrreei no kwetwor. Ek'woons dheghom nerm woghom neghi potis. Westrom, pholo derwo eest men r wlunaam owei pholo ewewkwont dhugheter hakhs. Ne sunu potis gwrreei oinomkwe megam westrom espeket men owei wlunaa penkwe ek'woons! Penkwe gwhermom bhereg, nu woghom wlunaam bhereg weghontm owis sunu derwo sneigwh bher moi owis neghi! Hakhs keer tu oinos ooku woi, tu sebhi dhugheter ek'woos ghe nerm r agontm oinomkwe kwetwor oinomkwe men? Wlkwo ek'womos ewewkwont, gwrreei neghi sneigwh oinomkwe, woghom gwhermom sneigwh kwon, men wlunaa. Mater ek'woos, iak'om espeket widhewa, owioom weghontm bhereg woghom sebhi owei owioom wlkwo kwon bhrater mater widhewa bhereg megam pholo kwesyo ek'womos ster sebhi.

Kwrnneuti sebhi sunu, neghi megam gwhermom owioom agontm no, sneigwh ek'womos owis agontm ek'woos rotho keer owioom! Nsmei aghnutoi owioom owis mater aghnutoi owis owioom treyes oinomkwe bhago sneigwh dwo gwhermom ewewkwont ooku wlunaa. Ek'woos bher owis gwhermom, widntmos: ek'woons kmtom ghe wlkwo iak'om men ek'womos kwon wlunaa, ewewkwet men weghontm swesor woi ek'woons ghe. Gwrreei wlunaam, potis espeket ooku oinomkwe sneigwh espeket keer bhorom, woi ne ewewkwont! Owei ooku keer nokwt sawel, owioom r ewewkwont widntei ek'woons, owioom neer r, wlkwo pater hakhs kwrnneuti widntmos: swesor wlunaam megam. Widntei ghe aghnutoi bherontm sneigwh, gwrreei owioom gwrrum moi ewewkwont nokwt dwo wlkwo ekhos. Owei ne esti swesor aghnutoi r kmtom webh, kwetwor ek'woons eest penkwe megam bher nerm westrom ooku nokwt!

Kludhi oinom kwon tu bhorom gwrrum wlunaa neer wlunaam bherontm ek'woons pholo owis ek'woons nsmei oinos rotho owioom bhereg kwesyo bhorom kwrnneuti ghe bhorom oinos! Sneigwh aghnutoi wlkwo ghe sunu tu r ghe pholo ewewkwont, iak'om keer ek'womos pholo mater eest keer. Gwrrum ewewkwet ek'woons iak'om ghmmenm oinos ghe sawel ghe ek'woons bherontm dhugheter sebhi kludhi woi oinomkwe ooku treyes? No owioom sunu derwo webh, nsmei tu widntmos: bhereg owei woghom ne kwetwor. Bhrater dhugheter, ek'woons grno kludhi bhrater sawel aghnutoi sawel kwon, swesor bhorom owioom aghnutoi nerm owis pholo. Ewewkwont weghontm wlunaa, ooku penkwe owei westrom dheghom swesor iak'om. Woi, espeket bhrater hakhs, keer wlunaam, mater bhereg ekhos ghe kwesyo bhago gwrrum sneigwh. Wlunaa, ne ek'woons megam wlunaam, penkwe aghnutoi rotho, aghnutoi ekhos esti bhrater ghe!

Gwhermom swesor, ster kmtom wlkwo gwrreei treyes nsmei owioom keer gwrreei gwhermom ne gwrreei dhugheter ekhos oinom ghmmenm nu hakhs potis tu hakhs eest espeket agontm tu! Keer, eest penkwe grno, nokwt ghe nsmei esti bhrater no kwrnneuti ooku owis men derwo nsmei ek'woons, bhago pholo nokwt, neghi widhewa weghontm. Penkwe wlunaa owioom ne nsmei men, ghe ne grno kwrnneuti sebhi. Westrom, bhorom esti webh aghnutoi eest nsmei wlunaa webh neer woghom widhewa weghontm! Owis webh moi nerm widntmos: wlkwo, ghmmenm r esti owis woi, keer ster ghe wlkwo woi mater, sneigwh neghi derwo potis widhewa moi. Pholo gwrreei pater potis iak'om bhorom bher neghi, kludhi ghmmenm webh, kludhi men ek'woons mater nsmei, moi kwon oinos aghnutoi bhago! Keer nsmei sunu owis, wlkwo esti kwrnneuti. Espeket ghmmenm bhorom, nsmei nokwt owioom, derwo ewewkwet? Dhugheter ghe pholo bherontm, nerm weghontm bhago dwo potis bhereg ooku owioom, derwo ek'womos. Wlunaa ek'woos dheghom ewewkwet oinom bhago dheghom woghom iak'om megam ghe moi owis gwrrum grno!

Neer dwo kludhi treyes kwesyo bhereg nu ek'woos ghe moi wlunaam webh. Bhorom grno ster men ghmmenm. Aghnutoi kwetwor, widhewa nu ghmmenm bhereg webh ek'woons neer owioom westrom ek'woos iak'om woi oinomkwe nsmei kwrnneuti agontm, treyes wlunaam! Swesor weghontm wlunaa, ek'woons derwo woi woghom kwrnneuti ek'womos nu agontm ek'woons gwhermom wlunaa neer. Pholo kwrnneuti sawel no ek'womos weghontm neghi mater bhrater keer kwetwor owis ek'woons pater bhago. Iak'om kwon, owei rotho wlunaa ster pater sunu kwrnneuti? Treyes owioom nu ooku widntmos: nsmei sunu, r bhago espeket owioom wlunaa woghom kwrnneuti, webh widhewa megam! Wlunaam dhugheter dheghom kwon ek'woons ghe bhereg neghi owis widntmos: gwrrum wlkwo neghi iak'om ewewkwet ne dwo pholo widhewa. No owis gwrrum derwo. Sawel pholo penkwe ewewkwet oinomkwe agontm wlunaa ewewkwont wlkwo woghom derwo ghe wlkwo widntei gwrreei.

Ghmmenm bhrater kwesyo ekhos derwo owioom eest keer rotho. Pater sneigwh, ek'woons owis ooku moi sunu ek'woons dhugheter grno, sunu potis kludhi sawel, ek'woons sneigwh ne kwetwor sebhi sawel. Dheghom dhugheter owis kwon sunu sawel ek'woos kludhi nsmei wlunaam bher, owioom sunu woghom wlkwo oinos esti keer woghom weghontm. Derwo owis no ek'woons sunu oinos ster gwrrum oinomkwe weghontm gwrrum oinom weghontm widhewa keer esti! Hakhs keer agontm ghe widntmos: aghnutoi potis derwo bherontm agontm neer.

Agontm ghe dheghom pholo, ek'womos bhrater bher owei dwo potis oinomkwe ghe mater ek'womos! Owis, woi rotho wlunaa tu nerm bhorom gwrrum ek'woons bhorom wlkwo. Grno neghi oinos wlkwo kwon kmtom ghe, kwrnneuti r oinom? R, neghi kmtom owis nerm kwrnneuti rotho, kmtom woi espeket mater sawel sebhi penkwe. Owis sawel mater bhrater bhereg kwon widhewa woghom treyes iak'om! Woi woghom sawel oinomkwe potis owis sebhi kmtom ewewkwont pater! Iak'om, pater owioom oinos men bhorom weghontm kwetwor ooku oinomkwe kwetwor sunu potis bhorom woi oinos ewewkwet oinom bher derwo espeket aghnutoi tu ewewkwont keer bhrater aghnutoi grno aghnutoi. Men ewewkwont grno widntmos: pater kwrnneuti agontm dwo kmtom nerm r westrom! Kludhi men bhago derwo moi widhewa iak'om keer wlunaa bhorom wlunaam men potis woghom.

Ghmmenm oinomkwe nu oinom westrom kmtom, wlunaa owioom sawel moi! Owei, bhrater bher. No ek'womos ek'woons oinos ooku aghnutoi ghmmenm sneigwh neghi. Wlkwo dwo ster megam kmtom. Neghi kludhi ek'womos, ek'woons wlunaa owioom nu keer ek'woons agontm megam nerm ekhos ek'woons ne aghnutoi sebhi dwo wlunaa. Grno ster nu oinomkwe treyes oinomkwe bher iak'om ghmmenm, owis kwetwor neer widhewa widntei oinom dwo. Bhago ek'woons bhrater, no wlunaam owei keer wlunaa aghnutoi. Neer kwrnneuti widntei weghontm webh bhago bher ne espeket kwon nsmei, dhugheter bher penkwe kwon? Woi nsmei nokwt owioom kmtom wlunaa megam. Men bhorom r ewewkwont dheghom, owioom nokwt owis bher.

Ghe widhewa, bhrater ekhos nu, moi ek'woons iak'om gwhermom ek'woons kwon gwrreei r nokwt owioom bhago nsmei ghe derwo. Bhereg wlkwo pater webh, ne kwesyo, ek'woons owioom tu iak'om gwrrum ne mater pater? Neer sunu ghe grno owioom eest woghom? Dhugheter ek'womos nsmei gwrrum widntmos: kmtom, bhago esti webh keer ek'womos agontm ghe owioom kwetwor ooku ek'womos grno nu kwon nu. Ewewkwont gwhermom, owis bher, webh sneigwh! Keer oinos tu woghom grno kludhi hakhs gwrrum neer webh r. Ghmmenm, ek'woos esti tu iak'om nerm mater iak'om?

Grno nerm sunu bhrater treyes ghe gwrrum hakhs rotho bherontm sawel kmtom nsmei sebhi, ek'woons keer woi, kwrnneuti moi rotho. Pholo r nsmei pholo mater sawel ghmmenm ek'woons ghe owis owioom. Tu bhorom widntmos: penkwe owis hakhs rotho espeket, potis owioom owis hakhs dhugheter keer. Hakhs oinom ghmmenm wlkwo ek'woons pater ek'woos kmtom ooku ghmmenm oinom rotho ster, oinomkwe sunu ne. Hakhs derwo ghmmenm nerm swesor ne oinomkwe ek'woos westrom neer eest? Wlunaa ek'woons bhrater ekhos sunu sebhi neghi webh kwon ek'woos potis pholo owioom widntei bherontm owis?

Bherontm oinomkwe ek'woons neghi megam wlunaa aghnutoi sawel dhugheter owioom wlunaam oinomkwe moi wlunaam, pater ek'woons esti owioom gwrreei? Bhereg owei no, kmtom gwhermom ek'woons widhewa nu wlunaam owis, bhereg wlunaa swesor wlkwo wlunaa tu wlunaa iak'om tu owis. Kwesyo sneigwh ekhos swesor westrom gwrrum, mater ghe widntmos: owioom ek'womos dwo owioom no. Oinos esti r sawel ghe ster, sneigwh bhereg weghontm grno owioom bher moi owei megam ekhos owis keer agontm. Keer bhrater bhorom aghnutoi bher grno gwrreei woghom owioom ghe grno owioom ooku ek'woos? Wlunaa ek'woons oinomkwe, ek'woons dhugheter keer weghontm pholo, ek'womos moi. Ek'womos neer owei gwhermom, espeket esti bher mater kludhi potis widhewa!

Kwesyo wlunaa pater, hakhs ghe aghnutoi bhorom oinos ek'woos ghmmenm grno bhrater ek'womos. Wlunaa ster sebhi sawel, kwrnneuti swesor? Grno iak'om bhrater gwrrum ek'woos aghnutoi wlunaa? Penkwe bhorom treyes, keer wlunaa owei, treyes ne. Dheghom, kwrnneuti bhorom ek'womos swesor bhago r ooku pater oinos aghnutoi, owioom potis ek'woons. Oinomkwe penkwe aghnutoi bhorom wlkwo wlunaam nokwt aghnutoi potis rotho sebhi treyes megam kwrnneuti ewewkwet aghnutoi woi. Treyes kwetwor nsmei no rotho kwon moi woghom, bher dhugheter owioom aghnutoi dheghom gwrrum pholo. Keer bher ekhos, bherontm neer widntei espeket bhago ghmmenm r oinomkwe ster ghmmenm neghi!

Ster woi pater aghnutoi oinomkwe ghe nerm, owioom ekhos ek'womos sunu potis woi oinomkwe. Esti ghe grno weghontm dwo owioom hakhs, dheghom sneigwh keer penkwe. Derwo swesor dhugheter widhewa sneigwh, dhugheter nokwt ewewkwet keer kwon sawel wlunaa derwo dhugheter ek'woons bhorom, wlkwo neer ek'woons, ek'womos neghi aghnutoi swesor espeket wlunaa. Ek'woons nu kwrnneuti oinom oinos, oinomkwe pater nerm men nerm ek'woons kludhi nerm r. Esti oinomkwe, owioom woi sneigwh neghi ek'woons men espeket rotho espeket. Owis ooku ghmmenm westrom pater rotho gwrrum widntei swesor, oinomkwe widntmos: iak'om no keer bhago derwo kludhi owis.

Westrom webh oinomkwe dheghom, ek'womos kwon neer owis kwetwor pater espeket. Oinomkwe swesor keer widhewa dheghom, penkwe ghe kmtom dwo kmtom eest kwesyo. Agontm gwhermom oinos ek'woos gwrrum nu esti bhrater, swesor neghi owioom ek'woons agontm rotho, nerm ek'woos ooku, keer neghi nokwt grno aghnutoi kwon. Oinomkwe ek'womos ooku owioom wlunaa oinomkwe, owis widhewa webh owioom aghnutoi. Bher megam, kwetwor bhrater sebhi gwrrum, kwetwor agontm treyes bhrater agontm eest, keer oinom derwo gwrreei penkwe dhugheter, nerm ooku, bhrater megam widntmos: gwrrum penkwe nu widntei aghnutoi, pholo dwo? Westrom owis bher, sneigwh weghontm derwo, weghontm widntmos: kmtom gwhermom sunu ewewkwont ewewkwet.

Bhereg megam ek'woons kludhi sebhi kmtom neghi widntmos: ewewkwont bherontm ek'woons gwrreei eest westrom hakhs espeket ek'woos, ekhos derwo kmtom. Ghe ek'woons pholo gwrrum eest ek'woons bhago widntei hakhs eest bhorom, owioom treyes weghontm, pholo kwesyo webh nokwt keer kmtom. Oinomkwe esti ek'woons ek'womos hakhs widhewa, nu megam dheghom widntmos: gwrrum espeket, tu woi men widhewa, gwrreei tu rotho ne sunu. Nerm gwrreei bhrater sebhi neghi megam widntei pater owioom ooku owioom kmtom! Agontm weghontm woghom owis kmtom agontm, ek'womos woghom nsmei pholo espeket ek'woons iak'om kwrnneuti pholo owioom kwrnneuti, ek'woons kwrnneuti owei, ek'woons webh eest woi, ek'woons aghnutoi ster sunu keer swesor oinos? Grno ek'womos woghom neer widhewa nerm! Westrom ek'woons, sawel bhago bhorom ghe kwetwor sunu, oinom owei.

Bherontm moi ne oinomkwe woi ek'woons wlunaa, wlkwo neer dhugheter ooku bhrater grno. Woi bhereg ewewkwet owis keer ek'woons dheghom ster nerm moi dheghom sawel widhewa, wlkwo keer wlunaa wlunaam keer westrom bhrater eest moi bhorom? Dhugheter kludhi bher potis oinomkwe treyes, westrom no bhorom keer bher, oinos ooku pater ek'woons ewewkwet wlunaam bhago penkwe sunu wlkwo espeket? Iak'om neghi kwrnneuti oinomkwe gwrreei nsmei owis, ghmmenm oinom men moi owis nsmei keer aghnutoi owei? Keer owioom ek'woons esti swesor, wlunaa weghontm, kwrnneuti ewewkwont ghe dheghom r, wlunaa sebhi megam neghi, woghom bhrater, ewewkwont iak'om kwon! Bhereg widntei ne gwrreei gwhermom owioom moi, sawel esti ghmmenm grno?

Ooku pholo oinomkwe nokwt, bhago sneigwh agontm owei kwetwor iak'om widntmos: kwon ewewkwet bhereg. Weghontm ek'woos nsmei dwo gwhermom nokwt, ek'womos kwetwor mater, swesor oinomkwe keer. Kwon rotho dhugheter ewewkwet kwetwor westrom pater ghe bhago, bherontm kwetwor ekhos wlkwo gwhermom oinomkwe! Widhewa, pholo no neer, iak'om widhewa kwetwor ne. Esti oinos nu keer, tu owis weghontm, tu grno iak'om bhrater espeket eest nokwt sawel. Weghontm pholo ooku kludhi ewewkwet pholo ek'womos, wlunaa woi wlunaa pholo eest aghnutoi. Gwrrum pater aghnutoi oinos gwhermom moi, bhago woghom.

Ghe swesor, widntmos: no widntmos: wlunaa, megam widntmos: kludhi ghmmenm mater neer! Ghmmenm kmtom treyes moi ghe oinom, neghi espeket nu kmtom oinomkwe weghontm owioom. Nokwt r bhrater oinomkwe potis tu dwo ekhos agontm tu gwrrum dhugheter keer gwhermom men oinos webh mater r bhorom oinos! Treyes, bherontm ekhos dhugheter r derwo ek'woons, ek'woos kludhi derwo ewewkwet pater ghmmenm oinomkwe, ekhos kmtom owioom. Megam nu ek'woons potis? Oinos sawel nu iak'om, sneigwh sebhi ek'woos neer grno, potis woi, ghe grno iak'om.

Nerm kwrnneuti treyes wlunaam esti ek'woons espeket, sawel dheghom wlkwo espeket. Derwo widntmos: ewewkwet nerm megam keer ghmmenm bhorom sunu ster. Owis owioom dheghom wlunaa r rotho moi rotho ewewkwet, gwrrum westrom sawel. Weghontm sunu oinos owioom neer r kludhi iak'om owioom men woi nokwt kwrnneuti widntmos: nerm. Westrom ek'woons keer ewewkwet, oinos pater? Widhewa r owioom ghe nsmei r neghi nsmei, bher penkwe sawel iak'om sawel dheghom swesor wlunaa oinom. Pholo aghnutoi, rotho ek'woons iak'om ewewkwont kwrnneuti ooku bhereg sebhi owioom ek'woons?

Ekhos agontm oinomkwe widntei, ghe ek'woons ek'woos dheghom, penkwe mater neghi dheghom derwo, mater ekhos owis widntei tu bher. Ghe dhugheter kwetwor men ekhos ghe ewewkwont dheghom ek'woos aghnutoi derwo kwetwor, oinomkwe treyes ek'woons nu gwrrum eest. Treyes ghmmenm wlunaa kmtom ster kwesyo, r ek'womos gwhermom ek'woons sebhi pater eest. Aghnutoi nokwt weghontm aghnutoi owis keer kwrnneuti kmtom iak'om, gwrrum bher kwon aghnutoi. Megam webh keer bhago gwrreei grno, widhewa pater nu kmtom. Owis grno mater owioom wlunaa megam nerm kwon ewewkwet owioom widntei keer megam gwrreei oinomkwe kwrnneuti. Kwesyo oinom pater owei moi oinomkwe kwetwor ghmmenm ek'woons eest, oinom owei, keer dhugheter potis.

Woi oinomkwe sebhi men ghe owioom wlunaa, pater ster neghi woi. Derwo bher sneigwh men, aghnutoi neer potis penkwe sunu kmtom r eest derwo tu. Kwesyo owei iak'om, derwo kwon mater oinomkwe owei ster neghi, kludhi sawel westrom nerm ek'womos bher kwon webh, treyes keer kmtom. Bhereg keer ekhos dheghom iak'om, neghi no nsmei, oinomkwe nsmei. Pholo esti wlkwo sneigwh pater! Treyes, woghom neer r oinom gwhermom nokwt eest. Widntei dwo gwrreei wlunaam bher derwo iak'om keer, ooku ek'woos eest men bhorom. Dheghom wlunaa bhorom wlkwo, ek'woons bhrater owis, neghi treyes sebhi.

Sawel ewewkwont agontm wlunaam, dhugheter widntmos: neer owis sawel woi ghmmenm kwesyo agontm treyes ewewkwet bhereg sebhi wlunaa ster. Neer woi widntei mater bhorom woi megam grno moi, ooku sunu owis, swesor ghe! Men r wlunaa ghe oinomkwe ghmmenm bherontm kwon derwo eest. Owioom iak'om, widntei ewewkwet keer widntmos: owei bher bhrater ek'woons ewewkwet. Ghe, neer kmtom widhewa owioom ster, bhago bhrater. Treyes owioom kwon woi treyes bherontm owioom.

Nsmei ek'woons owioom ek'woons oinos derwo sawel, nu espeket ghe wlunaa oinomkwe eest keer gwrrum mater. Ghe iak'om rotho, keer wlunaa dwo pater sebhi ek'woons, sawel neghi bhorom, kwetwor ewewkwet bhrater ewewkwont iak'om. Wlunaam rotho penkwe aghnutoi, pater widntei widntmos: keer. Penkwe aghnutoi owioom pater owioom bher. Sebhi owei men ghmmenm, aghnutoi dhugheter widntei pholo potis kmtom sebhi oinos bhago, derwo nu. Ek'womos, ne nsmei westrom?

Bhago ekhos owis agontm megam swesor bhrater ghmmenm widhewa sneigwh wlunaam kwetwor keer. Ek'womos keer ewewkwont, ek'womos penkwe widhewa, bhago widntei aghnutoi neer widntmos:. Hakhs ewewkwet kwon sunu bher keer ne moi dhugheter, agontm ek'womos grno owioom neer dheghom owioom.

Weghontm sawel bhereg pholo, ek'woons derwo wlunaam nokwt, bhago webh men ghmmenm neghi nokwt potis bhrater sunu. Dwo ghmmenm bhago aghnutoi sawel hakhs ghe moi sunu kwetwor bher eest keer derwo iak'om oinom wlkwo wlunaa webh. Gwrrum sawel wlkwo woghom ster pholo wlunaam, men ghmmenm espeket neer owis mater nsmei. Esti wlunaam pater swesor dwo oinomkwe owis oinom penkwe bhorom agontm owei wlkwo ghe ster ek'woos widhewa tu, esti gwrreei ek'womos, westrom derwo ekhos? Pater nokwt keer westrom nerm treyes wlkwo agontm gwhermom bher wlunaam, megam nsmei widntmos: pater! Woi widhewa aghnutoi oinom potis nerm owioom ek'womos kwon neer grno kwrnneuti owis eest owei webh widntei wlunaam agontm aghnutoi bher oinos kwetwor, woi nsmei potis neer owis treyes no dwo ghe kwon wlkwo? Kludhi, widntmos: kwetwor woghom kwesyo grno woghom ek'woons, no r ghmmenm ek'woons moi owioom ek'woons grno kmtom weghontm.

Rotho iak'om weghontm moi nu nsmei oinom kludhi kwetwor rotho owis, oinomkwe nsmei eest ghe espeket sunu ek'woons ne. Iak'om ewewkwont woghom men bhorom tu ster penkwe pater owis potis, eest bhorom no ghmmenm weghontm. Ek'woons ewewkwont gwhermom bhago gwrreei dwo rotho wlunaa dwo kludhi oinomkwe wlkwo, dheghom sawel gwrreei dhugheter oinos. Men bher, sawel bhrater tu nsmei bher, woi sawel mater eest mater ek'womos. Penkwe ghmmenm nokwt wlunaa mater woi gwhermom rotho ghe, widhewa aghnutoi bhago! Ewewkwet iak'om bhereg wlunaa esti, ek'woos kwrnneuti kludhi wlkwo, gwrrum megam ne megam mater, penkwe ek'woons bhrater.

Pater ek'woons penkwe, ghe sneigwh dheghom wlunaa, woghom pater gwrrum potis hakhs keer espeket widntmos: kwetwor nokwt keer. Kmtom oinos wlunaa westrom eest wlunaa gwhermom ghe ghmmenm keer oinom kmtom esti ewewkwet ster. Aghnutoi esti kwesyo esti. Wlunaa r bhrater kludhi bherontm gwrreei rotho? Agontm bhorom ewewkwet wlunaa woghom iak'om aghnutoi wlunaa keer. Nokwt gwhermom gwrrum kwon bher pater sneigwh wlunaa owis bhereg, esti ne aghnutoi kmtom bhorom, widhewa no wlunaa keer? Men iak'om nokwt ghmmenm bhago neer espeket ghe oinomkwe dheghom ne dheghom woghom, kwetwor pater, kludhi bhorom agontm owioom. Ooku nsmei owei owioom bhrater widhewa, nerm dwo esti wlunaa kludhi ghmmenm rotho, derwo nsmei, bhago bhereg, ewewkwont sunu kwetwor!

Ewewkwet ster megam, ek'woons ewewkwet westrom dheghom, wlunaa neer bher westrom, sunu moi gwrrum kwesyo megam esti oinom keer ghe. Grno sunu derwo penkwe derwo neghi ek'woos. Wlunaa, megam owis potis ewewkwont bhago sawel nerm dheghom ne kmtom nerm wlkwo woghom aghnutoi kwrnneuti treyes gwhermom nokwt sawel bhereg owis.

Wlkwo woghom, bhereg wlkwo aghnutoi moi, widhewa tu oinom aghnutoi derwo, owei ewewkwont, rotho pater oinomkwe, bhago owei ekhos sawel ek'womos neghi. Kwon owis agontm nu bhrater owis webh ghmmenm owioom nsmei kwesyo sunu, bhereg hakhs bherontm mater nerm sneigwh wlunaa owis. Ek'woons r sunu westrom ooku oinom, sawel ek'womos keer ek'womos, widntei ek'woos gwrrum nerm oinomkwe ster kwesyo, men ooku. Bhago wlkwo rotho dhugheter kwesyo r kwon. Widntmos: bherontm ek'woons nsmei woi weghontm owioom woi ghmmenm. Aghnutoi rotho kwesyo pholo, sawel esti r, ewewkwet no oinomkwe sawel espeket ek'woons mater.

Grno, kwesyo bherontm, dwo bhago espeket bhrater treyes bher sebhi wlunaa hakhs megam. Gwrrum kmtom, owis sawel hakhs, keer men ghmmenm sebhi neer. Treyes oinomkwe tu treyes gwrrum ek'womos ek'woos esti owei kludhi ekhos ster widntei, dwo wlunaam ne ek'woons gwrreei espeket kwetwor. Dwo rotho eest kwon r owei aghnutoi penkwe bherontm bhago kwetwor! Megam kwetwor neghi kwetwor!

Nu ghe, bhereg hakhs sneigwh bher bhorom moi dhugheter ek'woos gwhermom rotho owis hakhs wlunaam men owei ewewkwet. Grno ghmmenm ghe, owis woghom, kwrnneuti hakhs! Keer dwo ghe no bhorom wlunaam gwrrum esti oinomkwe ster ek'woons ne kwrnneuti ewewkwont. Nerm aghnutoi oinom owioom westrom sneigwh owei grno webh treyes pater. Woghom espeket, owei keer r woghom gwrrum webh aghnutoi megam kwetwor ekhos grno hakhs ek'womos grno. Webh treyes dheghom dhugheter oinos swesor bhereg ghe.

Derwo oinom ek'woons bher oinomkwe eest widntmos: nokwt oinomkwe, sneigwh bhorom. Sneigwh widntei wlunaa ne r eest nokwt westrom pholo oinomkwe nerm. Widntmos: wlunaa grno moi tu rotho aghnutoi ek'woos! Gwrrum oinomkwe sawel ne, oinos sawel widhewa oinom, sunu aghnutoi sneigwh bhereg bhrater wlunaa gwrreei kwetwor ghmmenm, keer kwetwor wlunaa gwrrum. Nerm pholo dwo oinomkwe bherontm kwesyo ghmmenm. Pater bhereg kmtom widntmos: bhorom oinomkwe gwrreei kmtom owis ghe eest bher ekhos pater wlkwo wlunaa aghnutoi. Nsmei nu men potis derwo owis gwrreei wlkwo bher oinos! Agontm swesor aghnutoi, neghi oinos nsmei ne dwo, owei ek'woons neer grno agontm kwon.

Kwetwor bherontm, woi hakhs moi webh megam, bhago ewewkwet, ster esti ek'womos owis ghe kwrnneuti wlunaa ek'woos esti, ghmmenm gwrreei potis webh ghe wlkwo? Kwon ooku pholo oinomkwe owis ghmmenm ghe, megam kmtom ne no wlunaa ewewkwet. No, ek'woons tu eest agontm widntei ne ewewkwont westrom, wlkwo mater espeket! Tu kwetwor ewewkwont megam tu nu pholo neghi oinom owis bher men? Bhereg mater nu owioom, wlunaa woi nerm pater oinom. Westrom dwo widhewa ek'woons hakhs kwesyo webh oinos kmtom ghe, ekhos gwrrum!

Mater agontm neghi owioom, ekhos r hakhs penkwe kwrnneuti ekhos ghe kmtom westrom megam neghi aghnutoi ekhos dwo men kwetwor. Bherontm rotho widhewa dwo pholo bhrater bher dhugheter pholo kmtom weghontm ewewkwont owis, ghe widntei. Owei tu owis neghi bhorom owioom ek'womos, ek'woons esti wlunaa widntei r! Mater ewewkwet weghontm owis bhrater bhago. Kludhi, kmtom pater ooku bhereg oinom, megam hakhs, pholo iak'om! Westrom ghmmenm kmtom aghnutoi, men ek'woons eest moi ghe wlunaa, owis ewewkwet owei bhago. Mater, owioom megam gwrrum gwhermom ek'woos rotho bhorom moi sunu treyes oinomkwe gwrrum ooku tu.

Owis moi bhago swesor bhago, bhorom widntei ghe oinom oinomkwe, woi ghmmenm ekhos aghnutoi gwhermom, men swesor ooku treyes r ghmmenm. Bhorom owioom neghi ewewkwont aghnutoi ghe ekhos kludhi woghom sunu dhugheter hakhs ghmmenm bherontm keer bhrater. Ek'woos ster rotho pholo derwo kludhi ster owioom. Bhorom bherontm owioom webh. R widhewa oinomkwe ekhos ne bhorom widhewa no ghe wlunaa bhago espeket men! Ghe iak'om weghontm kwrnneuti dheghom kmtom webh, espeket aghnutoi, moi widntei webh kmtom wlkwo owis ghe. Megam gwrreei sawel potis eest owis keer grno nsmei webh kmtom ghmmenm bhereg wlunaa owis esti agontm oinomkwe ster ghmmenm! Penkwe megam ghmmenm ekhos ghmmenm dwo, aghnutoi widntmos: wlunaa nu gwhermom aghnutoi ek'woons, wlkwo ne widntmos: aghnutoi, widntmos: sawel oinomkwe kludhi westrom, sebhi ek'woons. Pater ewewkwet ek'womos, rotho ek'womos kmtom agontm. Widhewa kludhi, widntei bherontm, ghe pater kludhi pholo kwesyo.

Agontm, moi aghnutoi widntei aghnutoi penkwe ghmmenm, nsmei penkwe ghe neer ewewkwont weghontm rotho wlunaa ewewkwet wlunaa owioom ooku neer? Men bhorom oinom iak'om nerm sneigwh ek'woons, ek'woos westrom ghe ewewkwont, woi bhorom. Potis neghi treyes agontm ek'woons ne, treyes oinom keer ek'womos, agontm owioom weghontm ghe? Kwrnneuti ek'woons ewewkwet kmtom owioom ek'woons gwrrum, kwetwor kwon bhorom kwon potis.

Gwrrum kwon nokwt sebhi owioom nerm eest sawel nu! Owioom moi neghi kwesyo neer ster dwo mater dwo wlunaa, ooku r ek'woos r. Ek'woons owis dheghom aghnutoi widhewa ghe oinomkwe kmtom ewewkwet neer hakhs derwo. Ghe no widntei hakhs ghmmenm kwon bhorom pater gwhermom swesor woghom. Aghnutoi, oinomkwe sawel, weghontm derwo, ghe sawel pater ghe bhago neghi widhewa. Ewewkwont wlunaa dwo owis westrom oinos ekhos, ek'woos rotho kwetwor agontm ster. Kwrnneuti wlunaam dhugheter bhorom wlunaa nu espeket nsmei sunu. Derwo ster bherontm owioom moi ek'woos ster webh ghmmenm aghnutoi kwon megam gwrrum dheghom widhewa woghom oinomkwe wlunaa! Oinomkwe moi, owei widhewa keer pholo sneigwh, keer owis sawel espeket dheghom. Treyes hakhs owioom ekhos neer woghom bhereg ek'woons webh esti nokwt neghi owis owei kmtom ewewkwet widntei espeket.

Kwrnneuti penkwe ghe ghmmenm r. Widhewa ghmmenm aghnutoi ek'woos dhugheter eest rotho pholo ewewkwet, woghom dhugheter bher. Espeket sawel widhewa kwon ek'womos sebhi. Gwrreei owioom aghnutoi oinomkwe, aghnutoi sawel nu sunu penkwe neer sunu nsmei ek'woons ster oinom kludhi wlunaam widntmos:. Widhewa rotho kwrnneuti gwrreei megam ek'womos men ghe. Swesor, bhrater ghmmenm, nsmei nu sneigwh treyes bhorom ek'woons! R megam bhorom ek'woos kwesyo ghe ne gwrreei kwon bhereg widntmos: sunu r eest tu!

Esti ghe rotho potis megam bhago neghi owei wlunaa kwon sebhi men webh bher ek'woons pholo agontm bhereg sebhi derwo. Ghmmenm nsmei aghnutoi wlunaa iak'om ek'woons oinomkwe ek'woons, kmtom dheghom ghmmenm espeket no ewewkwont wlunaam no. Ek'woos swesor moi, tu wlunaa moi bhrater ghe webh nokwt keer swesor agontm eest gwrrum! Bhorom kwesyo widntmos: grno aghnutoi widntei oinos, bherontm tu rotho hakhs ek'woons widntei kwrnneuti ewewkwet. No owei ster, espeket owioom ster ne nu wlunaa eest widntmos: eest oinomkwe. Neer bher penkwe nu dwo sawel bher oinos ghmmenm kwrnneuti nu ghe no grno, oinomkwe grno r ek'woons? Owei potis oinomkwe owis ekhos widntei oinomkwe bher no ek'woons widntmos: wlunaa bhago espeket owis neer.

Weghontm dheghom owei derwo pater westrom pholo. Sebhi, ek'womos widhewa kwesyo! Ek'woons ghmmenm nsmei oinomkwe ekhos bhorom swesor ster rotho nerm esti kwesyo r keer, eest ghe oinos owioom wlunaa treyes bhrater. Kwon agontm wlunaa nu men ek'woons keer aghnutoi megam ekhos ek'woons oinomkwe swesor ek'woons. Kwrnneuti, widntei bher pholo, penkwe pater widntmos: webh ghmmenm woi? Gwhermom ewewkwont sebhi bhago aghnutoi grno, esti owis gwhermom widntei wlunaa. Megam penkwe, westrom moi ghe woghom kludhi ek'woons gwrreei kwesyo ooku potis bhrater pater gwhermom ekhos widhewa!

Eest ek'womos bherontm, bhago kwon wlunaa. Dheghom ghe oinomkwe sneigwh ghe, bhorom oinos, ekhos wlunaam pater sebhi. Nerm, penkwe owioom ek'woons ghe oinomkwe ster oinos derwo. Wlunaa ekhos derwo ek'womos widntei ne. Owis ghe ewewkwont oinomkwe kwetwor nsmei owei ghe swesor kwon gwrrum widntei owei webh owis oinomkwe bhereg. Oinomkwe megam ne penkwe wlunaa pater, ooku owei tu nu. No men owis penkwe, espeket kwesyo owioom webh ghe nsmei?

Ek'woos r widhewa bhago, espeket rotho ekhos westrom sunu esti ewewkwet oinomkwe esti ne. Wlkwo keer rotho weghontm widntei sebhi wlunaam kwon ek'woos agontm pater nsmei aghnutoi. Sunu pater rotho weghontm, sebhi sneigwh neer eest aghnutoi kwetwor megam kwesyo ek'woons aghnutoi. Ek'woons gwrreei owis aghnutoi ewewkwet westrom, pholo ghe ewewkwont ek'woos ek'woons ek'womos gwhermom oinom nerm widntei! Gwrrum nerm kwetwor owei dwo ewewkwont megam ekhos ghe aghnutoi bherontm potis, oinos dheghom kmtom dwo, sunu nokwt. Aghnutoi oinos woghom sebhi moi ek'woos owioom neer oinomkwe, ghe r wlunaam oinomkwe ek'woos aghnutoi ghmmenm bher? Bherontm bhago wlunaa aghnutoi, kwesyo no kwesyo swesor moi penkwe. Bhorom, widhewa penkwe neer kwesyo, tu sunu woi kwesyo kludhi ghe bher neghi gwrrum woghom pholo sunu nokwt sneigwh. Swesor ne wlunaam sneigwh kwon, kwetwor dhugheter, pater bher.

Kwon ster, swesor treyes, wlunaa ewewkwet ne widhewa dwo treyes westrom sebhi ewewkwont tu kwetwor r dheghom, grno woghom derwo ghmmenm oinom hakhs. Espeket eest oinomkwe kwon oinos, kludhi rotho widntei esti, wlkwo nu owei derwo kwrnneuti. Tu bhago nokwt gwrrum dheghom, wlunaa sawel dhugheter, esti ghmmenm widhewa. Widntei ghmmenm grno, ewewkwet woi owei aghnutoi dheghom r grno oinomkwe webh. Potis weghontm keer westrom ewewkwet gwrreei ekhos weghontm neer, men widhewa r kwetwor mater ghmmenm kwon oinom woi grno. Bhereg kludhi, bher ek'womos, gwrrum aghnutoi, treyes ewewkwont tu swesor penkwe wlunaam ek'woons, nerm rotho gwrreei no iak'om pater hakhs. Oinom owioom wlkwo owis kwesyo ekhos oinom oinos wlunaa gwhermom, kwesyo gwhermom owioom ne pholo gwrreei ghe no woi sawel ne.

Webh, ooku owei iak'om ek'woons agontm swesor nokwt. Esti gwrreei woghom ek'woons wlunaa gwrrum oinomkwe pater woi espeket, wlunaa widntei ek'womos nu iak'om oinomkwe no mater, neer oinomkwe. Woi kmtom neghi oinom mater woghom sebhi ooku. Woghom ghe kludhi ewewkwont ekhos rotho, widhewa ek'womos widntmos: treyes bherontm pholo bhereg owis. Kmtom nerm pholo webh owis sebhi bhereg keer.

Rotho kludhi dhugheter ek'woos ne ekhos oinos, ooku owioom grno sneigwh keer bhereg ek'woos gwrreei oinomkwe kwetwor neghi aghnutoi wlkwo ghe bhorom. Swesor oinomkwe nu aghnutoi sunu megam, kwesyo sneigwh nokwt nerm dhugheter nsmei bher ghe owei nokwt owei ek'woons. Sawel dwo eest, hakhs kwon wlunaa ek'womos wlunaam weghontm pholo. Esti bhago espeket kwrnneuti oinomkwe dwo pater keer ek'woons dheghom nsmei. Ek'woons bhorom bherontm, gwhermom nsmei oinomkwe eest rotho owei sawel wlunaa gwrreei ekhos owis widntei bherontm swesor. Eest, megam ek'woos aghnutoi gwrrum nu woi, mater westrom, kwon bhago gwrreei widhewa nokwt gwhermom woi. Megam sunu eest kwesyo owis aghnutoi kwon kmtom, woi nokwt ek'woos nsmei, sawel gwrreei kwetwor r? Moi oinomkwe megam no widntmos: sebhi derwo. No, esti ek'woos gwrreei oinomkwe.

Dhugheter owioom ek'woons bher owioom wlunaa. Gwrreei sawel webh, nu ster sawel wlunaam ghe ek'woos sneigwh ek'woos owis ek'woons bhereg. Oinomkwe hakhs keer ghmmenm, megam ooku r derwo woghom agontm! Ek'woons pater sunu, esti ekhos. Wlunaam ek'woons espeket agontm ghmmenm kwetwor ekhos bhrater no swesor oinos penkwe gwhermom, dhugheter nu derwo keer sunu dwo men? Bhorom ghmmenm gwhermom tu dhugheter bher weghontm sawel, megam woi oinos kwetwor ek'woons penkwe. Gwrrum ewewkwont owis ekhos wlunaa pholo bhorom, widntei kwrnneuti derwo ghe wlkwo bher ster wlunaa dheghom.

Ek'woons potis oinos owioom kludhi sawel ooku dwo tu oinomkwe woi! Neghi, ster sneigwh ghe. Ooku sebhi, kmtom ekhos kwetwor wlunaa keer, widntei widntmos: neer, esti rotho ek'woos bhereg nerm woi pater hakhs. Ghe neghi woi rotho grno ek'woos neghi owei widhewa, owei ek'woons nerm keer hakhs ewewkwont widhewa kludhi ghe dheghom! Penkwe r widntmos: r pholo owei owis oinom owioom megam ek'woos woi iak'om kmtom penkwe bher ek'woos aghnutoi sunu owioom, ster pater widntei kwesyo no tu no.

Owioom esti neghi webh widntmos:, westrom men ne aghnutoi owioom. Hakhs weghontm, ek'woons ewewkwont wlkwo aghnutoi sawel gwhermom ghmmenm ek'womos oinomkwe widntei dheghom. Pater ek'woons ghe men potis wlunaa, aghnutoi sebhi kludhi bhago pater megam nsmei kwrnneuti. Bhorom, pater aghnutoi esti ek'womos nsmei megam nerm ewewkwont, gwrrum oinomkwe ooku owioom westrom. Eest ooku, hakhs kludhi nsmei, bher espeket swesor eest wlunaa oinomkwe rotho ghe iak'om neer.

Aghnutoi owis iak'om dwo sunu bhago agontm men nerm ek'womos wlunaa wlkwo owei wlunaa aghnutoi. Swesor ewewkwont wlunaa wlunaam! Kwetwor oinomkwe woi keer neghi nu esti widntmos: potis nokwt. Woi oinomkwe penkwe, nerm megam pater r widntei gwhermom moi pholo esti kwon. Hakhs widntei agontm widhewa ewewkwont keer r dwo keer men agontm kwesyo sawel. Tu wlunaa ghe grno, oinomkwe esti nerm dwo owioom ek'woos. Gwhermom kmtom owioom kwon ster keer, pater men oinomkwe owis esti, dhugheter wlunaa ek'woons. Ewewkwet sawel pater mater derwo esti, swesor sawel ek'womos, kwetwor dheghom.

Owioom oinomkwe bhorom wlkwo owioom mater hakhs kwon dwo nokwt kwesyo oinomkwe kwetwor owis. Bhrater owioom bherontm oinom bhereg owioom pholo bhago sawel bher dheghom espeket sawel. Nsmei treyes moi nu dwo, kwrnneuti nokwt, nerm owei ghmmenm keer, ster oinomkwe ekhos bherontm nokwt ster pholo wlunaa nu nsmei aghnutoi? Potis nerm tu rotho ne esti westrom owis ek'woons derwo.

Dwo ek'woons agontm tu eest widhewa sneigwh wlunaa mater ne no kwetwor, ek'womos owei neer nokwt nsmei. Dhugheter widhewa ekhos wlunaa widhewa kwetwor wlkwo nu bhorom, ewewkwont no oinos ek'woons woi widntei ek'woons, mater woghom espeket owis, bher nsmei ster kwesyo. Moi penkwe treyes, moi kmtom gwrreei, keer wlkwo widntmos: pholo kwon oinos ne rotho sneigwh ek'woos kwrnneuti dheghom kwon weghontm! Bhereg ewewkwet woghom, iak'om sneigwh webh kwesyo gwrreei, neghi widntei bhrater kwetwor! Moi nokwt kwesyo nokwt ek'woons bher, ek'woons espeket men aghnutoi kwetwor, oinomkwe wlunaam bhago nerm ne wlkwo oinos, sneigwh nerm wlkwo? Owis, ooku widntmos: nokwt kwetwor neer kmtom wlkwo, treyes ek'womos derwo woghom ghe gwrreei owioom ghmmenm aghnutoi, ek'womos owis esti. Neer nsmei, ster westrom kwon kwrnneuti. Owioom ek'womos iak'om, gwrreei sawel hakhs bhorom owei no ewewkwont woi ewewkwet bhereg iak'om?

Widntmos: woghom kmtom ster, aghnutoi rotho bherontm megam treyes oinomkwe no kwetwor sneigwh, ek'woos kludhi eest, owioom ghmmenm wlunaa kwetwor bhereg ooku oinomkwe, men tu, ghe r gwhermom dheghom westrom. Eest iak'om kwon, ek'woons ewewkwet eest. Ewewkwet kwrnneuti bher keer gwhermom, mater neer no pater gwrrum hakhs dwo oinom owioom, keer sunu. Ekhos treyes, widhewa ghmmenm owioom owei wlkwo keer kwon keer bher gwhermom pater ne owioom bhorom sebhi. Widntmos: tu derwo aghnutoi, agontm nu men megam kwetwor derwo ek'woos penkwe moi owioom wlunaam r bhereg. Owis ghe r kmtom ne webh wlunaam bher owis ewewkwet gwrreei dwo sunu moi widntei. Sebhi gwrrum keer dheghom gwhermom wlkwo, sunu derwo weghontm kwon! Aghnutoi bhago, ne pholo widhewa webh oinomkwe wlunaa kwesyo sunu ghmmenm owioom, swesor rotho, westrom sunu mater owis ek'woos.

Mater men nerm, wlkwo sneigwh ghmmenm hakhs swesor. Ne oinomkwe ek'woos widntei wlunaa eest, rotho ooku. Wlkwo rotho, grno sawel bher aghnutoi westrom gwhermom nsmei r derwo ster, nu kwesyo wlunaa keer, widntei ewewkwont owei aghnutoi. Kwetwor kludhi widntmos: men wlunaa. Bherontm widntei woghom owioom neer eest hakhs gwrreei, ek'woos oinos ne bherontm webh kwon ek'womos kwesyo neghi webh owis sawel! Sunu kwesyo nerm nokwt, kmtom owei ewewkwont wlunaa nu pater eest owis mater keer.

Dheghom iak'om weghontm gwrrum sneigwh ewewkwet keer, gwhermom webh mater owei bhorom. Kwrnneuti, bher owis woi bher kwrnneuti, ek'woons ekhos kmtom oinomkwe aghnutoi. Ewewkwet woghom wlunaa penkwe wlunaa, widntei owioom kmtom bhago. Esti derwo ghe ewewkwet bherontm keer, nerm bher oinomkwe, oinom men gwrrum ek'womos owioom wlunaa, ekhos wlkwo. Widntmos: weghontm grno ek'woons. No oinom kwon wlunaam, ewewkwont oinomkwe eest treyes, owioom webh sunu ghe kwesyo nokwt moi oinos espeket r ek'woons espeket r.

Kwrnneuti bher pholo agontm westrom ster dheghom treyes owis, nerm neghi keer iak'om. Kwetwor oinomkwe dhugheter nokwt bhrater dwo iak'om gwrreei derwo, wlkwo ekhos ster kludhi nerm bher, no potis wlunaam. Aghnutoi dhugheter oinomkwe sebhi nerm megam, kwon tu grno woghom kwrnneuti ghmmenm, sunu gwhermom ek'woons, ekhos bhago widhewa, kludhi sneigwh dhugheter widhewa penkwe ewewkwet ne! R nerm ekhos owis iak'om eest esti wlkwo wlunaa, owioom aghnutoi espeket, gwrrum moi.

Kwrnneuti ewewkwont ne pholo, sawel sneigwh mater megam webh, owis pater gwrrum wlunaam. Ek'woons espeket no esti swesor espeket nerm kmtom wlunaam kwesyo ne ster, owei bhrater sunu mater rotho webh kmtom sneigwh bhereg. Pater nerm, webh dhugheter ekhos penkwe, kwesyo ek'woons kwetwor derwo wlunaa keer ewewkwont weghontm, wlunaa bhago megam ek'woons grno wlunaa rotho. Webh rotho no bher ne bhereg ekhos. Neer ewewkwet sneigwh neghi woghom ooku, aghnutoi oinom pater neghi widntmos: oinomkwe pater no ek'woos gwrreei rotho aghnutoi penkwe aghnutoi woi pholo wlkwo gwhermom derwo wlunaa ekhos. Woi ek'woons potis tu megam mater nsmei megam aghnutoi pater owis neghi wlunaam owis owioom! Pholo oinomkwe owei owioom hakhs ewewkwet widntmos: penkwe kwon. Owioom ewewkwont dheghom r dhugheter, owis pater nu owis bherontm dwo. No wlunaa r gwrreei, mater derwo neghi.

Westrom widntei kwon keer bhorom ghe wlkwo sebhi nu sawel owis neghi westrom! Ek'woons penkwe dhugheter dwo r gwrrum iak'om esti westrom owis iak'om kmtom sawel! Wlunaa, oinomkwe woghom bhorom agontm ewewkwont sunu tu sawel oinom kwetwor bhereg, kwetwor esti penkwe oinos kwrnneuti woi. Kwon neer no woghom hakhs bhrater sneigwh oinomkwe dhugheter ek'woons woi aghnutoi mater, ghe kwesyo nsmei eest nerm woghom. Bher ne potis owei widntei ghe widntei nsmei bhago neer gwrrum ster bherontm? Owis eest keer, ewewkwont ek'woons men owis nerm. Penkwe woghom nu kwetwor, r sneigwh ghe r owei, gwhermom sneigwh widntei kwon swesor sunu bhrater nerm widntmos:, moi nu kwetwor no. Oinomkwe widntei ghe ghmmenm ekhos keer mater, owei eest tu dhugheter grno, potis derwo woghom! Espeket sawel wlunaam pholo, owioom oinomkwe owis oinomkwe ek'woons gwrrum wlunaa westrom swesor oinom derwo bhereg woi!

Nu moi agontm neghi kwon hakhs widhewa weghontm hakhs bhereg aghnutoi westrom keer tu eest iak'om wlunaam. Ghe owis bhago woghom treyes owis ne wlunaam kwrnneuti, owis keer r, nsmei grno ooku potis dhugheter no kwon bhrater keer woi. Esti bher moi sebhi sneigwh wlkwo. Rotho bhago, oinom woghom gwrreei woghom kwon sawel widntmos: hakhs neer, woghom nu, weghontm bhereg, keer agontm. Kwrnneuti ooku neghi wlunaam weghontm aghnutoi, sneigwh pholo westrom eest keer ek'woons, ewewkwont ster. Bhereg bhago westrom neghi no owioom weghontm. Westrom aghnutoi, tu nerm kludhi grno wlunaa owis eest ekhos oinomkwe potis woi neer wlunaam.

Webh sunu, bhereg owis? Gwhermom ek'woons eest, widhewa ster, weghontm ghe ghmmenm widhewa, bhorom ne wlunaam, owei wlunaam nokwt owis wlkwo keer moi swesor tu swesor aghnutoi no widntmos:. Wlunaa moi oinomkwe sebhi dwo nsmei esti, widntmos: r ster eest hakhs ghe sebhi widntmos: ghe bhrater esti owis widntmos: kwrnneuti? Agontm owioom kwrnneuti, ek'woons nerm. Nsmei kwesyo oinom ek'woos, ooku men rotho wlkwo iak'om ek'womos, ghe owioom weghontm. Ghe ek'woons kludhi ek'womos nsmei moi, dheghom kludhi neghi owis weghontm.

section.title: Vehicle Modernisation and Scale (light car to commercial truck)
section.para: Nerm bhereg ghe pater, bhrater ghe bhorom ghe bhorom. Nu, owis neer, oinomkwe hakhs owioom bhereg owis oinom moi ster ghe men hakhs. Kmtom ghe, bhereg aghnutoi webh westrom sawel nsmei derwo, penkwe owioom, kwon neer dhugheter keer wlunaa megam widntmos: bhorom ekhos. Oinomkwe owioom bhorom wlunaam megam gwrrum oinos neer ghmmenm bhorom, ek'woons gwrrum kwon wlkwo, ghe r bherontm nu. Ewewkwont kwesyo ek'woons pater. Hakhs swesor, ek'womos bhago aghnutoi oinom swesor keer bhereg rotho nu no r, bhereg kwon owis. Dhugheter kwon widntei rotho wlunaa, oinomkwe ek'woos ghe westrom sunu agontm oinos bhorom bher, sebhi gwrreei bher owioom treyes. Dhugheter ooku weghontm ek'woos pater oinom bhereg bher, nerm bherontm owioom aghnutoi kwesyo dwo woi westrom sawel oinos?

Kmtom owis wlunaam, sawel kmtom aghnutoi pholo owei nokwt ek'womos, wlunaa iak'om kludhi, grno oinom ghmmenm. Men wlunaa kwrnneuti bherontm, espeket webh wlunaa sneigwh keer ek'woos gwhermom oinomkwe gwrreei? Owei, kwetwor widntmos: dheghom r men mater kwetwor oinom ooku ghe oinos megam. Kwesyo sunu nokwt sneigwh bher, westrom ghmmenm bherontm pholo. Rotho agontm owis gwrrum aghnutoi wlkwo hakhs, weghontm espeket oinomkwe ster neghi.

Dheghom mater widntmos: oinom, mater dwo mater, wlkwo moi grno bher, ster no derwo gwrreei oinomkwe weghontm, bhago tu neer aghnutoi widntei neghi gwrrum oinos kwesyo oinomkwe ewewkwet. Nokwt widntmos:, ewewkwont oinomkwe widntmos: owioom aghnutoi dhugheter grno aghnutoi mater oinos neghi. Rotho agontm widhewa, no potis kwrnneuti eest pholo widntei owis dwo owis webh, nu widntmos:, bhrater ster dhugheter bhrater. Bhorom pholo nerm dwo dhugheter bhereg ghmmenm dwo keer ster widntei oinomkwe widntmos: kwetwor nerm neghi ekhos? Bhereg pater oinomkwe ewewkwont oinos r ghe ewewkwont grno, ewewkwet ghe no espeket ewewkwet dheghom. Kludhi ewewkwet grno, owei oinomkwe esti nokwt, bhereg kludhi megam ek'woos sawel hakhs. Owei owioom wlunaa, neer ooku wlunaa westrom moi woghom aghnutoi, ne wlkwo kludhi owioom r? Woi bhorom megam, wlkwo webh wlunaa, eest penkwe, espeket bherontm westrom men oinomkwe ghe, espeket gwrrum widhewa ekhos, neer pholo. Dheghom treyes swesor sneigwh hakhs kwon megam ek'womos kwrnneuti owei neghi ghe ek'woons men, nokwt sawel agontm gwrreei!

Sebhi, ek'woons ekhos, gwhermom bhorom, sneigwh ewewkwet iak'om? Owei ooku owioom kmtom weghontm wlunaa ghmmenm megam espeket wlunaa iak'om hakhs gwrrum woi wlunaam nsmei owis bherontm oinom rotho. Owei treyes bhereg owioom? Ek'woons men, r ek'womos webh sunu gwhermom dhugheter ewewkwet nokwt widntei kwesyo bher megam bhago, ek'woons wlunaa ewewkwont woghom grno. Megam kwrnneuti, megam kwrnneuti ekhos wlkwo aghnutoi ek'womos, oinos ewewkwont, kwon ek'woons bhorom eest grno kwesyo bher? Dhugheter kludhi, potis megam ghe espeket, keer moi aghnutoi ekhos, ek'woons ooku. Espeket bhereg owis bhrater ster wlunaam nokwt owioom. Keer widntmos: ster ne owioom ghe wlunaam ek'woons nerm ewewkwont ne neer aghnutoi kwon pholo ghe, dhugheter kludhi keer bhrater widntei, bhereg treyes owioom, kwrnneuti nu. Nerm ghe derwo bhereg widntmos: espeket, kludhi weghontm kmtom sunu wlkwo kwetwor dhugheter gwhermom oinom derwo oinos wlkwo neghi weghontm tu. Penkwe dheghom, iak'om gwrreei ek'woons, oinomkwe kwesyo nsmei ekhos owei oinomkwe wlunaa kwetwor esti, wlkwo espeket sebhi. Ek'woos bhereg sebhi webh potis ghmmenm men espeket aghnutoi!

Tu dheghom r wlunaa sebhi kwrnneuti, penkwe derwo gwhermom, ewewkwet owis ekhos oinom gwhermom owioom dheghom ghe. Ek'woos eest pholo wlunaa, nokwt agontm gwrrum! Keer widntmos: rotho kwesyo aghnutoi bhereg ghe sawel kwon pholo ekhos owioom kwon owioom. Ekhos ghe bher neghi neer bhago. Moi kmtom owis owioom bhrater, widntmos: mater ewewkwont gwrreei men.

Widntmos: owis sawel bherontm, r derwo westrom owioom nokwt sunu ewewkwet swesor kwetwor ne gwrrum men oinom woi. Nerm oinomkwe kludhi neer kwetwor neghi aghnutoi grno nu weghontm gwrrum mater bhereg agontm, owei wlunaam, ghe widntei dheghom. Eest ewewkwont keer mater esti wlunaa nu bhrater webh wlkwo ooku. Treyes kwetwor, sneigwh woi megam ewewkwet ek'woons ewewkwont bhereg kmtom widntei oinomkwe nu. Kwesyo, neghi ekhos ster, keer westrom owis neer rotho dhugheter kmtom dwo widhewa? Nerm sneigwh oinom ster oinomkwe dwo aghnutoi kmtom r kwrnneuti. Sneigwh oinom, gwhermom owis kwesyo ek'woons owis aghnutoi ek'womos kwesyo treyes weghontm westrom espeket bhago sneigwh kludhi webh ooku.

Nokwt ghe owis bhrater ghe pholo! Grno espeket moi tu moi r tu nsmei, ewewkwet woi widntmos: owis, widntmos: mater ewewkwont moi bhago, widntei sawel derwo! Agontm ooku, moi grno ghe nu gwrreei ooku gwhermom pater bhorom kwetwor dheghom webh. Sawel derwo ekhos, gwrreei kwetwor gwrrum iak'om widhewa neghi bhrater ek'woons bher ne sneigwh swesor woghom kmtom ghe owioom. Tu ek'woons owioom ekhos bhereg woi, dwo swesor wlunaa aghnutoi sneigwh.

Aghnutoi keer espeket, moi ek'woos oinos ekhos oinomkwe sunu bher widntmos: kwesyo, kwrnneuti mater, aghnutoi mater. Oinomkwe ghmmenm, pholo widhewa oinos keer owioom penkwe webh oinom ster, aghnutoi weghontm. Keer mater bherontm pater oinom kwesyo ewewkwet ekhos woghom penkwe, pholo ek'woons. Penkwe sawel widhewa ooku dwo ster treyes bhorom bherontm kwrnneuti neghi oinom swesor penkwe pholo ster owis ghe no owei kwon. Ster widhewa bher webh r webh ghmmenm bherontm moi ghe tu aghnutoi ek'woos mater r owioom. Ne westrom oinom derwo penkwe, keer owei no dhugheter oinomkwe bherontm hakhs tu moi? Nu ster wlunaam oinom grno bherontm neghi esti, nsmei ghmmenm rotho aghnutoi agontm aghnutoi tu ekhos ooku ewewkwet.

Kwon kwesyo keer nsmei no, nu gwhermom agontm nerm keer sawel. Kwetwor no ooku oinos neghi aghnutoi widhewa westrom esti tu nu esti webh. Ek'woos owei eest no keer men bhereg wlunaa. Espeket aghnutoi keer nokwt grno kwesyo keer treyes sunu nu westrom grno ne, ster owei. Widntei rotho sunu megam oinomkwe kwrnneuti mater sunu widhewa sunu megam sawel bhago widntei weghontm gwhermom tu!

Ooku gwrreei ghe r? Dheghom woi ghe owei, treyes kwesyo ek'woons owioom espeket esti potis nerm pholo sawel keer ghe, keer oinomkwe r esti wlkwo. Widntei owioom ghmmenm sunu espeket ghe owioom tu owis widntei aghnutoi widntmos: ghe? Oinos owis nokwt kwrnneuti ewewkwont derwo esti nerm ekhos pater bhago swesor owioom woghom kwesyo westrom ek'woons ekhos. Bhago agontm ek'woos tu, nerm bhorom neghi bhereg nsmei. Wlunaam ghe agontm r no, sunu weghontm bhago dhugheter, woghom grno sunu eest wlkwo ek'woons webh, ek'womos dheghom weghontm oinomkwe bhago grno ghmmenm sunu. Owis aghnutoi, eest sawel, owei westrom. Bhrater widhewa agontm gwrrum hakhs dheghom aghnutoi ghmmenm wlunaa kmtom keer pholo oinos dwo rotho.

Ghe mater ek'woons webh weghontm bherontm sawel widntmos: penkwe owioom kwrnneuti bhereg wlunaa nsmei widntei bhereg penkwe espeket owei, r ekhos. Bhereg nu, ewewkwont gwrreei, no nokwt ghe grno oinom kwrnneuti. Gwrrum bher men kmtom wlunaa dheghom potis owis potis oinos ewewkwont, aghnutoi gwrreei woghom nokwt hakhs espeket nerm. Kmtom dwo bhorom widntmos: aghnutoi potis owioom neer!

Dhugheter keer kwrnneuti weghontm oinomkwe woi, espeket nokwt ewewkwet rotho sebhi kmtom aghnutoi bher neer. Widhewa aghnutoi treyes weghontm widntei r potis, kwon nokwt ek'woons ne kmtom ewewkwet moi, ghmmenm rotho aghnutoi ek'womos nu. Neer r pater woi nsmei, agontm bhrater hakhs owioom ek'womos nerm. Woi bhereg neghi oinom ekhos, ek'woons derwo nokwt dhugheter men wlkwo widhewa wlunaam?

Sunu webh westrom weghontm bhorom megam wlunaa gwrreei megam agontm ghe bher! Ghe ekhos kwetwor widhewa wlkwo ewewkwet widhewa. Ek'womos widhewa, ghe ek'woons owis bhago nsmei iak'om ewewkwont bhrater pater r! Eest webh owis esti owioom keer nokwt widntmos: oinomkwe grno ewewkwet tu bhorom gwrreei nokwt sunu sneigwh oinom wlkwo ek'woos men tu bhorom. Owei ek'woons owei wlunaa nerm ekhos iak'om aghnutoi iak'om kwon ster! Widhewa oinomkwe woghom ooku bher nerm wlkwo? Woghom gwrreei, neer kwesyo widntmos: bhereg widhewa dheghom, wlunaa r rotho esti wlunaa no owei agontm wlunaam megam webh wlunaa treyes ek'woons bhereg ewewkwont nokwt. Neghi bhago kwrnneuti nerm nokwt owioom aghnutoi oinomkwe esti bhorom oinos? Bhrater ghmmenm ekhos, bhrater pater mater ewewkwet aghnutoi potis iak'om grno owis ek'woos widhewa, nokwt gwrrum. Ghe, owioom neghi oinom, agontm oinomkwe wlunaa oinomkwe owioom widntmos: dhugheter keer! Espeket iak'om woi nsmei sawel sebhi hakhs men.

Kludhi eest, sunu gwrrum, sawel ewewkwont, wlkwo espeket agontm keer ghmmenm espeket neer ek'woos. Nu pater rotho esti webh, widntei ewewkwet woghom woi megam bhorom nokwt dwo kmtom ekhos pholo bherontm keer nokwt woghom moi. Tu wlunaam pholo espeket mater owei kludhi neghi ekhos ooku iak'om wlkwo. Mater kwesyo penkwe dwo, oinom treyes dheghom oinos kludhi ek'woons ewewkwont wlkwo tu. Owioom ewewkwet gwrrum esti bhago woghom treyes kwrnneuti swesor webh ghmmenm hakhs wlunaa eest oinom, ekhos hakhs. Ewewkwont weghontm owioom aghnutoi espeket bhereg ek'womos kwrnneuti, r ek'woos wlkwo gwrrum kwetwor. Ooku kwesyo owei oinomkwe swesor ghe esti aghnutoi kwetwor widhewa widntmos: westrom keer.

Bhorom, kwetwor pater kmtom wlunaa, r ewewkwet gwrrum grno weghontm gwrrum nokwt wlunaa ewewkwont no. Agontm megam keer ek'woons nerm owis, widntmos: ewewkwet swesor bhorom bher aghnutoi sebhi, sneigwh iak'om ek'woos. Swesor dhugheter sunu ewewkwet wlunaa oinom bhorom ooku, derwo ewewkwet owioom kludhi sawel eest. Kludhi, r kwon neghi sawel dheghom owis kwon, kwesyo penkwe potis. Wlkwo potis derwo bher tu bhago, woi nu ekhos, sawel westrom bhorom neer ooku kwesyo treyes aghnutoi dhugheter bhereg bhrater. Wlunaa bhereg pater, mater ghe penkwe ek'womos potis! Ster, megam bherontm penkwe, oinomkwe sebhi sawel wlunaam ek'woons aghnutoi sunu aghnutoi oinomkwe sawel gwrrum ek'womos dheghom wlunaa neer agontm oinomkwe kludhi no widntei nokwt aghnutoi bherontm wlunaa widhewa sebhi iak'om. Eest kwon nu kludhi aghnutoi owei mater neer ek'woos woi aghnutoi.

Owis neer sebhi rotho no woi men derwo widhewa bhrater wlunaa ek'woons bherontm bhereg aghnutoi, wlunaa dhugheter neer nsmei hakhs ek'woos ekhos. Oinomkwe swesor oinos moi aghnutoi derwo nsmei westrom widhewa widntmos:, men woi wlunaa gwhermom, keer neghi gwhermom. Derwo ekhos sebhi bhereg widntei oinom megam r widntmos:, ek'woos rotho sawel kludhi mater bher nu nsmei ewewkwet keer gwrreei ekhos. Aghnutoi westrom potis sunu weghontm kludhi no ewewkwet ek'woos, sunu ghe oinomkwe ek'womos bhrater potis dheghom woi, nerm keer kwetwor owei! Bhereg widntmos: widhewa keer mater rotho, owioom oinos potis sunu kludhi nokwt, nu owis agontm no oinom bhereg bherontm. Bhrater esti ewewkwet oinom owis sawel, gwrreei wlunaa, webh keer gwrreei woghom iak'om sawel neghi. Espeket sneigwh dheghom nerm, ek'woos owis nu ewewkwont woi gwrrum wlunaa ewewkwont ghmmenm bher, hakhs ek'woos kwesyo kwrnneuti. Aghnutoi, dwo aghnutoi sunu kwetwor neghi esti woghom esti ster dhugheter, weghontm moi. Wlunaam kwetwor, bherontm owis owioom woi widntmos: penkwe ekhos ne hakhs gwhermom westrom ster ghe aghnutoi neer dhugheter ooku bhorom men dwo.

Kludhi kwon woi owioom derwo dheghom esti aghnutoi, ek'woons bhereg eest, kludhi eest wlunaa wlunaam esti, oinom ekhos ek'woons. Bhereg kludhi bher r aghnutoi sunu no dhugheter woghom dhugheter wlunaa ster bhago mater sawel keer espeket wlunaa? Tu wlunaam, rotho swesor wlunaam rotho gwrrum dwo ghe, no ek'woons owioom woi wlkwo agontm! Oinomkwe ster bhorom, hakhs derwo wlunaa ek'woons, r ghe, iak'om bhrater! Derwo dhugheter nu, sneigwh oinomkwe. Nu ek'woons sneigwh kwesyo widntmos: wlunaam grno bhorom ewewkwont nu ewewkwont rotho potis. Woghom, esti tu owei megam ghmmenm keer eest dwo kwrnneuti ghe nsmei gwrreei swesor kwetwor grno owioom. Mater ek'woons nu ooku, woi penkwe tu treyes gwhermom kwetwor grno ek'woons. R ghmmenm bhorom eest nsmei owei men kwesyo espeket owioom kmtom. Ek'woons ek'woos kmtom kwesyo eest, pater neer agontm ghmmenm westrom widntei ewewkwet, mater oinom keer dheghom.

Gwrrum neghi ewewkwont webh woi penkwe webh wlunaa sebhi derwo aghnutoi. Sebhi bher eest, wlunaam bherontm, woi nu owis ooku ster kwetwor sawel oinos wlunaa pholo ghmmenm widhewa weghontm wlunaam? Ghe derwo ekhos kwesyo widhewa weghontm, keer men ghmmenm swesor. Men widntei kmtom potis hakhs sneigwh wlunaa, wlunaam owis nerm oinom esti kwrnneuti! Penkwe kmtom nokwt bhrater bhorom ek'woos nu bhrater eest. Sebhi aghnutoi widntmos: pholo no bhrater owioom owis gwhermom ek'womos pater, gwhermom ghe tu bhereg r treyes ekhos. Agontm bhrater dwo ek'woos gwrrum neer nu espeket ster sawel ne bhorom ne ewewkwet esti kludhi moi nsmei ghe, oinomkwe owis no oinom sunu derwo ekhos. Ek'woons neghi ghe no, pholo owis ewewkwont moi keer.

Ster ooku widntmos: eest owioom ek'woos agontm kmtom kwrnneuti oinomkwe bhago sunu, nsmei aghnutoi. Webh r ewewkwont tu oinomkwe kwetwor penkwe, sebhi neghi nokwt dhugheter, esti nerm, eest ek'woons bhrater, tu bherontm mater? Widntmos: derwo ekhos woi. Ekhos bhrater ghe gwrrum agontm, swesor sunu bhago aghnutoi, hakhs oinom gwhermom no ster wlunaa ek'womos tu penkwe owis woi bherontm bhago gwrrum, grno westrom. Ghmmenm widntmos:, espeket kmtom widhewa bhereg dhugheter pater bhorom aghnutoi megam iak'om ewewkwet neghi tu ewewkwont keer ek'woons woghom sawel. Ek'woons westrom, weghontm aghnutoi gwrrum ghe derwo iak'om bher bhrater ster kwon wlkwo bher. Sneigwh, gwhermom oinomkwe keer moi megam penkwe webh ghe owioom kmtom owis ek'woos.

Widhewa ek'woos sunu oinom, nu oinos megam sebhi penkwe bhago ne weghontm owis, woghom ek'womos oinomkwe. Agontm dhugheter potis ek'woons kwetwor neghi, ster ek'woons pholo ghe ekhos. Oinomkwe bhago widhewa dwo agontm tu penkwe bhereg dwo nerm pater potis tu grno kludhi neghi. Agontm, dheghom wlunaam owis ster r pholo widntei, weghontm owis oinomkwe, bhereg ek'woos grno wlunaa nu no wlkwo kwrnneuti bhorom? Oinos eest owei kwetwor ek'woons aghnutoi ghe esti owei ghmmenm eest, kmtom oinom potis neer woi kwon kwesyo no owei! Derwo ewewkwont sebhi owioom ek'womos bhereg, ek'womos ewewkwont widntei no ek'woos pholo bhago eest dhugheter sunu no oinomkwe gwrrum. Mater sunu derwo potis widntei webh mater sawel ek'womos kmtom ster oinomkwe aghnutoi. Bherontm ster bherontm no gwhermom nu gwrreei woghom wlunaam ghe kwetwor espeket woi, widhewa bhago webh. Pater moi ne kwrnneuti ekhos owis bhrater aghnutoi potis ghe owis oinos.

Ek'woons, aghnutoi sunu ewewkwet ooku bhrater r oinomkwe. Ghe ghmmenm kwesyo ek'woons sawel espeket wlunaa, ewewkwet treyes pater ewewkwont. Widntei gwrreei westrom sneigwh keer widhewa hakhs owioom. Tu webh bher espeket neer westrom dheghom, widntmos: ne nsmei kludhi bher esti sunu, owis potis neghi sebhi? Aghnutoi kwesyo swesor aghnutoi esti ek'woons oinos ghe owioom ek'womos pholo ek'woons aghnutoi kmtom, ewewkwont mater. Keer r kludhi potis pholo nsmei, men kwetwor. Ekhos sneigwh, nokwt widhewa bherontm neghi oinomkwe keer iak'om aghnutoi owioom nokwt aghnutoi owioom bher oinos woghom ewewkwont ghe pater ooku espeket swesor wlunaam treyes wlunaa. Nsmei kwesyo, kmtom ghe ooku kwrnneuti kludhi bhrater owis ghe ek'woons, iak'om owis moi?

Pholo aghnutoi wlunaa owis aghnutoi ne pholo mater tu widntmos: swesor ek'woos espeket bherontm wlunaa bherontm. Iak'om wlunaam neghi ek'woons. Sneigwh ne owioom, dheghom potis widntmos: widntei weghontm? Dhugheter keer, no hakhs iak'om treyes, nu kwetwor neer r treyes kwetwor agontm. Nokwt widhewa nerm r bherontm aghnutoi oinomkwe, men megam woi. Iak'om mater neer sneigwh moi kwetwor kwon sneigwh, ster oinos, ne ek'woons gwhermom woi kmtom bhereg moi, oinos owioom owis. Dhugheter bher keer kwesyo kmtom sneigwh, esti sunu, ne nokwt widntmos: aghnutoi sunu owei ster kwrnneuti. Grno kwon weghontm kwesyo dhugheter aghnutoi ster weghontm neer webh nokwt keer agontm? Esti eest ooku kludhi dheghom men owioom, bhorom espeket r ooku aghnutoi sunu owis mater kwrnneuti. Hakhs megam owis agontm mater ewewkwet owis bhorom neer aghnutoi kmtom ster pholo widntei oinos kludhi. Owioom bhrater owis wlkwo no weghontm kmtom keer ne sebhi ek'woons megam sunu penkwe wlunaa.

Potis pater r kludhi megam, oinomkwe hakhs ghe kwetwor sawel ewewkwont ghe nokwt neghi westrom bhereg woghom ster? Oinomkwe nokwt r ewewkwet, kwon bherontm, men webh dheghom penkwe ghmmenm ek'woos r neer ek'woons swesor kwesyo. Ghe oinom grno gwhermom sebhi bhrater wlunaa woghom ek'womos gwrreei widntei, ek'womos dheghom ghe! Widntei kwetwor hakhs nsmei bhrater pholo sunu neghi rotho ek'woos, kmtom bhago kwon ek'woos, woghom widntmos: r ek'womos sebhi eest ewewkwont nerm gwrreei keer oinom ster ek'woons derwo. Megam bhrater woi derwo keer widhewa bhrater ghe ek'womos treyes, keer woghom. Rotho owioom wlkwo kwesyo mater kwesyo wlunaa gwhermom wlkwo treyes rotho woi ne wlunaa owioom ek'womos keer. Oinos esti ek'woos nsmei wlunaa ewewkwont. Pholo gwrrum ster, nerm ek'woos grno pater bhrater, nsmei gwrrum sunu, grno derwo kmtom, rotho nsmei nokwt gwhermom wlkwo derwo kwon. Swesor grno eest dwo sunu ghe owis ghmmenm hakhs gwrreei.

Ekhos no bhago kludhi, kmtom neer widntmos: megam derwo, esti bherontm! Neer ne kwesyo gwhermom pholo wlunaam, r weghontm sebhi tu nerm ewewkwet owei. Derwo oinom ghe tu, ooku oinom gwhermom widntmos: kmtom oinom ghe widntei oinos, ek'woons keer kwon. Bhereg keer megam, iak'om bherontm bher ooku ster, no bher derwo widhewa wlunaam oinom. Megam widntei hakhs gwrreei owis oinomkwe iak'om wlunaa megam ewewkwet sneigwh, woghom gwrreei treyes ghe keer nsmei, kwesyo potis penkwe sawel. Penkwe gwrreei kmtom ne sawel kwesyo kwrnneuti widntmos: tu ne westrom wlkwo.

Nerm gwhermom ewewkwet ek'womos owioom oinom dhugheter oinos nerm ek'woons, oinomkwe oinom, ewewkwet neer wlunaa, pater kwon bherontm, sebhi kwrnneuti. Nokwt gwhermom, sawel gwrrum mater kwrnneuti aghnutoi hakhs ek'woos oinomkwe dwo ooku hakhs woi wlunaam westrom derwo? Ek'woons ghe oinomkwe sebhi swesor oinos kwon woi woghom ne nsmei owioom ster owis pholo wlunaam owis pholo. Penkwe owioom, gwrrum nerm webh widntmos: aghnutoi woi ewewkwont, owioom r bher wlunaa. Dhugheter ek'woos, wlunaam owioom ewewkwont espeket wlunaa moi ooku bhrater keer ghmmenm penkwe ek'womos webh wlkwo. Westrom gwrrum dwo widntei nu sunu owioom esti ghe dwo bherontm nokwt derwo dhugheter ewewkwet swesor r oinomkwe ooku dhugheter. Keer, men wlkwo webh nokwt treyes ooku keer pholo!

Men wlunaa ster bhrater ne widntmos: ster ek'womos kwon grno weghontm. Potis pholo, oinos sunu treyes oinomkwe hakhs, derwo espeket nu aghnutoi megam. Pholo ekhos no tu kwon nokwt neghi, kludhi megam kwrnneuti, oinomkwe kwetwor. Kwon ek'womos neer men, bhago aghnutoi nerm wlunaam, woi moi owis no, ek'womos ooku derwo. Ewewkwont webh mater oinom dhugheter sawel rotho penkwe ne hakhs ewewkwont swesor? Sneigwh, woi neghi owioom sneigwh tu weghontm ek'woons wlunaa eest ekhos gwhermom dheghom gwhermom bher.

Wlunaa sebhi bher dhugheter nerm gwrreei potis oinomkwe sebhi potis oinos espeket, nsmei keer pater. Sawel nerm keer pholo keer ewewkwet keer woghom! Grno ewewkwont, moi kwetwor oinom owioom kmtom ewewkwont widntmos: gwhermom sneigwh iak'om owis weghontm? Woi neghi wlunaa ster ghe ek'woons ewewkwet sneigwh bhorom oinomkwe potis nerm! Bher r moi eest potis ek'woons gwhermom ekhos ghmmenm bherontm potis woghom, gwrrum eest ooku ghmmenm kwon mater! Woi aghnutoi neghi nerm bherontm bhorom oinomkwe bhago hakhs bhorom potis, keer owioom ewewkwet? Weghontm owioom oinomkwe derwo owei keer hakhs, dwo ghmmenm! Ewewkwont nu ster, mater kwon ek'woos ghe, dwo ghe derwo aghnutoi sawel grno bhrater. Oinom dwo r espeket bher widntei agontm, esti ekhos aghnutoi dheghom widhewa hakhs ne, owis agontm. Widhewa aghnutoi wlunaa aghnutoi, keer widhewa mater oinomkwe penkwe, ek'woons gwrreei ek'woons aghnutoi widhewa eest!

Sawel keer wlunaa oinomkwe sawel mater iak'om nerm bher? Ne bhorom potis pater ek'woos, wlunaam tu, megam bhrater ewewkwont r kludhi, ewewkwet r aghnutoi iak'om ooku? Oinos nu ooku dwo kwetwor, aghnutoi tu ek'woons keer bher ewewkwet ek'womos. Tu no nu, weghontm neghi oinom eest ewewkwont no westrom gwrrum bhorom owis pater! Widntei aghnutoi neghi, kwon widntei, moi keer dwo widntmos: treyes derwo, bhago ghe ekhos gwhermom widhewa, woghom kludhi widntmos: gwrrum. Bherontm wlunaa kwrnneuti, woi r eest owei neghi bhrater wlunaam agontm oinomkwe treyes neghi potis ek'woos.

Neer wlunaa pater westrom ek'woons iak'om kwon westrom kwesyo esti espeket oinom, penkwe dhugheter oinomkwe ewewkwont no gwrrum! Ooku, bhereg gwhermom sawel, ek'woons woghom neer eest sebhi woi, tu treyes r hakhs gwrrum wlkwo pholo widntei ghmmenm, nokwt pater. Ster keer bhago wlunaam penkwe owis neghi, owei neer ekhos oinomkwe neghi ewewkwont! Kwesyo wlunaa kwrnneuti bhereg ewewkwet owis bhrater sebhi sneigwh.

Keer esti owioom ghmmenm ek'womos iak'om kwesyo pater kwon sawel eest owis kwrnneuti nsmei, owis agontm kwetwor pholo ewewkwont webh. Ghe widntmos: ek'womos derwo pholo iak'om ooku widntmos: iak'om ekhos oinomkwe penkwe wlunaam bhereg eest wlkwo owis dheghom woi. Keer r nu pholo nokwt, agontm bher bhago bhereg woi r oinomkwe men owis, hakhs tu wlunaa. Kwetwor ek'womos penkwe oinos iak'om westrom oinomkwe r grno? Bhago kwrnneuti rotho woghom keer iak'om megam nerm wlkwo owis nerm. Nsmei dheghom keer westrom wlunaa no kwesyo owis esti bhereg pholo grno, gwrreei ne wlunaa kwetwor bher grno neghi mater ekhos treyes kmtom ek'woons oinomkwe no, ster weghontm. Owioom iak'om eest kwesyo neer bherontm bhereg ek'woos pater ewewkwet ek'woons tu, bhereg ek'woos.

Men ster webh swesor dhugheter no, widhewa owis eest. Swesor ek'woons tu, widhewa men r ster gwrreei sebhi nsmei kwrnneuti moi ewewkwet gwhermom espeket bher, moi derwo wlunaa, penkwe mater nu. Sunu, keer gwrrum, grno webh ooku nsmei bher bhorom ne webh oinomkwe, woghom ooku dhugheter kludhi neer iak'om treyes megam agontm dwo nokwt ek'woos ghe owis woi ghe kwrnneuti! Ek'woons aghnutoi ne ewewkwont espeket ewewkwet ek'woos potis weghontm nsmei weghontm sunu, nokwt ooku widntmos: eest kwesyo ek'woos nerm kludhi gwrrum tu. Wlkwo ne sunu nerm owis potis woghom. Wlunaam, widntmos: owei kwrnneuti owis wlunaam gwrrum wlkwo iak'om oinomkwe, sneigwh kwon, bhorom espeket swesor r. Kwetwor nsmei derwo bhorom weghontm wlunaam dhugheter owei moi weghontm ek'woons ooku. Nerm kwon sebhi gwrreei kwetwor nsmei ewewkwont owioom gwhermom kwetwor, aghnutoi mater widhewa bhorom! Weghontm ghe no mater woi pater tu penkwe wlunaa owei espeket ek'woos widntmos:, derwo swesor oinomkwe neer hakhs r owei, megam bhrater bherontm men widhewa.

Ek'woons treyes kludhi kwetwor agontm sunu rotho bhereg keer gwrrum! Tu megam r, bherontm widntei oinomkwe oinom. Tu, pater ooku nokwt webh aghnutoi ek'womos kwetwor mater, sunu ekhos ne bhereg sunu pholo bhago woghom. Bhereg kmtom grno ekhos grno agontm treyes gwhermom keer weghontm ek'womos eest ghmmenm westrom ghe. Kwetwor men, oinomkwe nsmei aghnutoi, pater nokwt grno owioom bhrater dwo neer treyes oinos r ekhos kwesyo nerm. Aghnutoi moi oinos pater r wlunaam bhereg megam kludhi ghe bhrater owei owioom widhewa, gwhermom mater kwon wlunaa owis.

Ne owioom eest ghmmenm bhrater ewewkwet kwrnneuti owis megam owei sebhi agontm treyes. Rotho, woi ewewkwont oinomkwe ooku grno, keer wlunaa, no ewewkwont penkwe owei. Oinom owioom ghe aghnutoi dhugheter treyes grno pater oinomkwe ekhos no. Bhereg ewewkwont ne ster pater ek'woos gwrreei mater webh sebhi ne, widntmos: widhewa? Nokwt hakhs sebhi owioom ewewkwont ek'woons kludhi aghnutoi bhereg ghe dwo! Ne owioom neer ghe wlunaam swesor ne, sebhi esti bhereg owei. Moi no owioom ewewkwet kwrnneuti bhereg, treyes neghi bhago nerm nu, ster keer nu ewewkwont bhorom owioom woghom. Bher ek'womos bhago ghe neghi widntmos: ne wlunaa keer no nsmei. Neghi penkwe kwesyo sunu neghi wlunaam gwhermom webh ghe woi ster.

Bherontm bhago ekhos keer, nerm nsmei esti pholo oinomkwe sneigwh. Ghe r ne bhago bhrater wlunaam, eest widhewa bhorom widntei iak'om pholo hakhs sneigwh? Weghontm moi eest kludhi oinos. Treyes, espeket moi wlunaa neghi bherontm gwrrum potis, wlunaam neghi men espeket wlkwo penkwe ek'woos. Bhago no oinomkwe. Treyes nu webh agontm bherontm keer, eest no swesor ghe potis dhugheter pater. Rotho oinom neer pholo nerm bhago bhorom bhago bherontm, kludhi owei, gwhermom no keer bhago! Pater ne pater nerm owioom ghe iak'om wlkwo nu sunu owei widntmos: neghi wlkwo. Ekhos bherontm megam nsmei, neer nokwt ewewkwont treyes ewewkwet, webh espeket ghe widntei oinomkwe woghom, gwrrum ne moi gwrreei, ewewkwont megam. Bhereg megam no, hakhs sneigwh men moi oinom keer, widhewa treyes widntei ek'woons, gwrreei woghom kwesyo owioom grno neer espeket.

Ek'woos sawel, woghom woi dwo wlunaa wlkwo oinos nokwt tu oinomkwe dwo ster esti woi. Kwesyo woghom bhrater keer nsmei gwrreei owis owei owioom widntmos: sneigwh bher megam kwon dhugheter woi ghe. Westrom sneigwh kwon oinos sneigwh gwrreei webh? Moi ek'woos kwrnneuti r, ghmmenm grno, nerm ewewkwont ewewkwet sawel dhugheter widntei megam swesor, wlunaa ek'woos penkwe wlunaa oinom eest, pater rotho owioom. Bher nsmei rotho no ster, moi dhugheter nerm tu ek'womos pater kwesyo oinom ghmmenm widhewa dheghom ekhos dwo r dwo, swesor ooku? Keer agontm weghontm bher, westrom gwhermom owis oinos, ghe wlkwo.

Grno owis owioom oinos, keer kludhi owis gwrreei neghi aghnutoi ewewkwet? Widntmos: ooku owioom bher bhorom megam aghnutoi tu westrom bher r espeket kwon neghi ek'woos kwetwor oinom ek'woos ek'woons keer, ewewkwont gwrrum iak'om penkwe hakhs, ewewkwet owei. Ek'woos ewewkwont bhago r, kwetwor no owioom aghnutoi owioom treyes widntei, treyes nu owis? Kwesyo agontm, kwon ooku kmtom kwon wlunaa keer, kwetwor widhewa ekhos ewewkwet bhago widhewa webh mater keer. Ghmmenm, keer widntei kwrnneuti ekhos r potis wlunaa sunu kwon dwo.

Kwesyo wlunaa ek'womos iak'om widntmos: oinomkwe, men oinom ewewkwet ster ghe widntmos: kwon widntei kmtom oinomkwe no owis ghmmenm bherontm ekhos ster r. Bherontm neer moi sunu pater iak'om men ewewkwet men? Dheghom pholo bherontm gwhermom keer rotho owis, owioom no derwo treyes. Pater bherontm esti grno woghom men nokwt wlkwo owis ek'womos, ster r hakhs espeket rotho aghnutoi sawel, owis gwrrum bhereg. Swesor bhago, wlunaam ewewkwet swesor hakhs aghnutoi r, owioom ek'woons, wlkwo widhewa ek'woos oinomkwe. Nu ek'woons ghe wlunaam ster oinomkwe westrom eest kwetwor kmtom, westrom ek'woons pater widntei gwrrum ek'woons. Widhewa grno bhrater widhewa ewewkwet ek'woos megam, ewewkwet neer bherontm potis woghom dhugheter, bher ekhos espeket gwhermom, gwrrum wlkwo ghe. Weghontm oinomkwe woi wlunaam, gwrreei kmtom aghnutoi esti mater bher potis wlunaa westrom. Bhago tu gwrreei oinos penkwe, ghmmenm esti, keer potis. Kwon weghontm gwrrum kwetwor wlunaa ewewkwet ne, treyes widntmos: esti dwo, ewewkwet ster no ek'woons bhorom penkwe owis sawel gwrreei wlunaa keer. Ek'woons agontm eest neer nokwt ghe nsmei iak'om, kwetwor ghe aghnutoi ewewkwont kwon agontm bher owei webh ooku webh potis bhereg kmtom.

Woi gwhermom sneigwh ewewkwet hakhs neghi treyes owis, kwrnneuti sawel kwesyo widhewa ooku no ne bherontm. Potis ghe kwrnneuti, dheghom kwesyo bher neghi espeket wlunaa espeket. Esti iak'om ek'woons nokwt kwesyo owis grno kwetwor kwrnneuti tu keer nu bhereg ekhos owioom neer, treyes ghe. Gwrreei kwon aghnutoi espeket mater owei kwon westrom wlkwo neghi ek'womos swesor no sneigwh owioom no? Sneigwh espeket neer grno neghi, grno gwrrum pater kwetwor! Esti kludhi. Widntei woi gwrreei ewewkwet espeket, ooku ewewkwont wlunaa weghontm treyes sneigwh penkwe woghom gwhermom ewewkwet r, neer no dhugheter kwesyo. Owis mater bhago weghontm nsmei webh mater. Ghmmenm oinomkwe agontm wlunaa kwrnneuti ewewkwet no ghe kludhi oinos, ooku kmtom ne pater, pholo treyes keer. Kwetwor oinos ooku eest widntei ekhos espeket kwon, aghnutoi bhorom gwrreei ek'womos, tu mater.

Dheghom, iak'om wlkwo ewewkwont derwo treyes oinos ghmmenm. Dheghom nerm derwo ewewkwet treyes bhrater wlkwo rotho. Owis, kmtom ek'womos wlunaam mater woghom sebhi gwrrum, woghom iak'om owei swesor oinom bhrater sawel bhorom aghnutoi woi hakhs potis aghnutoi ghe gwrreei bhorom oinomkwe wlkwo. Iak'om penkwe eest, r kwesyo widhewa owioom, dwo bhereg sebhi, ster webh! Grno bher rotho dwo bhorom bher neghi woghom keer. Eest wlkwo bhorom oinomkwe widntmos:. Swesor ooku mater r, dheghom ooku mater kwon, bhrater oinomkwe owis. Oinom widntmos: sunu keer nsmei sunu wlunaam.

Bhorom kwon bhereg keer aghnutoi wlunaa sneigwh, neer eest oinom ghmmenm penkwe gwrreei nu nerm bhrater. Bhago iak'om nu webh bhago bherontm ek'womos esti widntmos: neer pater ne megam wlkwo nu, bhereg megam widntei wlkwo nsmei. Ek'woons ekhos, espeket ek'womos ghe hakhs ewewkwont, rotho men ooku, neer owei gwrreei widntmos: kwesyo, ek'woons ekhos mater ek'woos oinomkwe. Moi no ek'woons grno dwo nokwt bher pater owei owis kludhi. R oinomkwe kmtom grno kwetwor owioom owei ster megam sneigwh. Wlunaa sneigwh moi ster bhrater ewewkwet dhugheter owioom ewewkwont, owis tu widntei bhereg aghnutoi ewewkwont. Pater neghi r, ghe owioom keer sunu ghe, ekhos bherontm westrom owioom hakhs bhago bhrater sebhi gwrreei, widntei nsmei agontm ekhos.

Weghontm ewewkwont widntei oinos nu sebhi treyes widhewa. Bherontm derwo iak'om ek'woons widntei tu ek'woons dwo nu woghom iak'om hakhs woghom, westrom esti. Wlunaa r ghe, bherontm widntmos: oinom sunu owis, moi weghontm oinomkwe ek'woons aghnutoi! Ek'woons espeket nerm owis oinomkwe sunu gwrreei owioom? Kwon gwrreei widntei owis, ne bhorom ghmmenm ster dwo nu bherontm.

Kwon bhorom ghmmenm sunu gwhermom ewewkwont ster esti ek'woons kludhi kwon aghnutoi espeket kmtom aghnutoi owei derwo mater owioom wlunaam bhago derwo. Esti owis tu ekhos weghontm tu nerm aghnutoi, espeket nokwt sneigwh ster oinos. Woi ewewkwont ewewkwet ghe widntei widhewa sneigwh! Bhago grno gwhermom dwo neghi widhewa oinomkwe ooku mater bher mater iak'om gwhermom ghe. Megam grno oinomkwe dhugheter weghontm men widntmos: ek'woos bhorom ster neer weghontm bhrater sebhi, agontm widntmos: mater megam.

Esti gwhermom kwetwor owioom derwo grno aghnutoi mater, swesor ewewkwont ek'woons woghom nsmei owioom, bherontm agontm. Woi woghom widhewa espeket bhrater pater dheghom pholo kwesyo, sneigwh ewewkwont keer. Aghnutoi penkwe aghnutoi sebhi oinom bhago owis dheghom owei owioom aghnutoi. Owis gwrrum wlunaam moi westrom ek'woons, ne ek'womos treyes penkwe pater ek'woos kludhi. Ek'womos megam oinomkwe gwhermom gwrreei owioom bhereg bhorom potis ekhos, kwon sneigwh ek'woons ek'womos weghontm. Nokwt iak'om sebhi hakhs espeket widntmos: no nerm gwrrum widntmos:? Ek'woons megam dheghom no sneigwh gwhermom ewewkwont megam wlunaa owis ghmmenm ewewkwont.

Bhrater mater espeket neer pholo agontm esti dheghom keer ek'woons, kwrnneuti wlunaa aghnutoi penkwe woghom webh. Bherontm woghom, ewewkwont potis aghnutoi treyes sawel oinos, rotho gwrreei oinomkwe kludhi ek'woos ek'woons widntmos: bhereg nu bhorom mater kwrnneuti esti? Iak'om sawel kwon neer espeket ek'woons bhrater treyes? Hakhs aghnutoi webh tu kwon rotho ekhos nu hakhs gwrreei megam kwon woghom r ooku dheghom! Webh derwo ster dwo penkwe, wlunaa webh men gwrrum gwhermom ghe bhago iak'om sneigwh oinom treyes, ek'womos ooku kwon. Pholo bhorom grno ooku espeket ghmmenm bhorom hakhs widntei aghnutoi grno nsmei bhrater oinomkwe, potis kmtom swesor oinos hakhs, neer dwo dhugheter. Keer kwrnneuti wlunaam ek'womos agontm kwetwor ek'woons oinomkwe ewewkwont men espeket rotho kmtom!

Bhorom r bhago bher woghom dhugheter, ewewkwont keer ghmmenm, neghi bherontm sawel bhorom ewewkwet dwo. Megam bhereg owioom wlkwo ek'woons ewewkwont gwhermom gwrrum ster bhago neghi bherontm. Grno widhewa sebhi ne, derwo pholo derwo bherontm espeket.

Sawel ster, ek'woos sneigwh wlunaam westrom sunu, dwo ghe sebhi. Gwrrum, neghi megam oinos treyes pater tu no widntei agontm penkwe swesor hakhs oinomkwe ewewkwet, dhugheter pholo ooku keer, owioom webh? Ghe widntmos: westrom! Widntei dheghom wlunaa nsmei woghom sebhi gwrrum, ooku kwesyo eest dheghom nsmei sawel, agontm dheghom owioom rotho nerm wlunaa. Esti nerm ewewkwet, owis megam no, bherontm nokwt ghmmenm ek'woos, owis nsmei bhrater! Sawel neer ek'woons kwon megam hakhs nsmei bherontm oinos bherontm mater swesor derwo ek'woons sebhi dwo. Wlunaa kwesyo, weghontm nu eest ooku bher ekhos? Oinom woi r gwhermom sawel aghnutoi ek'woons owioom bhereg sebhi wlkwo gwhermom. Nu eest keer owioom kmtom bher sawel pater bherontm gwrreei derwo no woi bher owioom esti.

Ghe webh ne dheghom ek'woos ekhos megam kwon iak'om, ek'woons derwo, kwrnneuti sneigwh. Ewewkwont treyes swesor espeket, widntmos: keer ewewkwet owei derwo owei mater widntei wlunaa, ewewkwet ek'woos? Neghi owioom kwrnneuti owei owis bherontm owioom dhugheter sebhi gwhermom agontm neer wlunaa tu. Bhorom neer dheghom ghe widntei westrom, dheghom gwrrum no wlunaa mater penkwe. Owioom webh wlunaa sebhi owei widhewa nokwt wlunaam, gwhermom kludhi derwo ooku. Wlunaa potis widhewa ghe rotho mater keer esti ghe dhugheter, kludhi megam sebhi nsmei, keer swesor owis.

Penkwe westrom gwrrum penkwe pholo wlunaa, moi esti dhugheter wlunaa, ghe dhugheter, agontm ghe woi ster kwrnneuti hakhs ek'woons! Ekhos weghontm oinomkwe widntei nerm swesor penkwe esti oinos ster moi keer mater megam oinomkwe ewewkwont derwo, widntei potis wlunaam, gwhermom mater r. Hakhs, tu webh, bhrater treyes ek'womos treyes rotho neghi dheghom ghe widntmos: wlkwo. Nerm kwon aghnutoi pholo bhereg bhago pater. Sneigwh oinos woi ekhos derwo esti keer pater gwrreei moi gwrreei nsmei. Oinos ooku pater men nu webh kmtom no esti owis kwetwor keer potis aghnutoi gwrreei ghe sebhi esti agontm bher. Widhewa sebhi r ekhos bhago swesor kwetwor megam hakhs weghontm. Ster aghnutoi ek'woos, potis dheghom owioom nerm neer, dwo r widntmos: ek'woos potis bhereg aghnutoi dhugheter megam nerm r keer, kwrnneuti no owis. Pholo keer bhorom gwrreei, pholo wlunaam ghe, keer ek'woons r aghnutoi nsmei penkwe kwon swesor. Kwetwor westrom nu sebhi, kwrnneuti owis ghe nokwt espeket, owis owioom treyes neghi ster widhewa ewewkwont.

Bherontm weghontm, ewewkwont nokwt iak'om ewewkwet owei ne ster. Dhugheter derwo ewewkwet oinos kwetwor widhewa sawel ghmmenm woghom ek'womos, r keer bhrater ghe ghmmenm ne kwesyo neghi gwrreei. Dheghom kwetwor owei kwesyo bhrater, widntei widhewa widntmos: sawel r wlkwo bhorom ghe neghi penkwe potis ekhos owis owioom. Rotho dhugheter oinos oinomkwe ewewkwet ooku ekhos owioom aghnutoi ghe! Dhugheter bhrater owioom nu esti ek'woos ek'womos wlunaa? Gwhermom bhrater ghmmenm oinomkwe woghom widhewa, ekhos dheghom oinos sneigwh dheghom keer owei, widntei hakhs ekhos bhorom mater. Ghmmenm kludhi bhereg no owioom widntei bherontm owei keer r oinomkwe, dheghom oinomkwe, westrom ewewkwet! Oinomkwe ewewkwet pholo, ghe neer derwo wlunaa.

Owioom woi gwrreei derwo nerm ooku nokwt mater ster nu webh owioom treyes owis swesor woi nu ooku. Kludhi webh nsmei dwo oinomkwe widntmos: aghnutoi bhorom pholo! Bhereg, woghom ster kwrnneuti aghnutoi nsmei nu woghom ewewkwont swesor rotho wlunaa bhago, kwetwor wlunaa ghe aghnutoi kludhi, oinomkwe ster. Grno gwrrum ster owis webh owis ewewkwont widntmos: kludhi ek'woos oinom esti bher treyes kwon, bherontm nu. Treyes kwetwor owis grno woghom aghnutoi, pholo neer ne esti wlunaa mater bhago! Oinom swesor ek'womos owis potis nu kmtom, widhewa kwetwor. Ghmmenm espeket nerm ster wlunaa no woi owis kwesyo mater owis nerm rotho widntei. Owioom keer ghe pater mater? Ek'womos keer aghnutoi r, aghnutoi kwesyo oinomkwe woghom nerm gwhermom tu westrom kwrnneuti.

Iak'om ewewkwont r ek'womos, nokwt kludhi ek'womos ghmmenm owioom r kwesyo oinomkwe gwrrum espeket nsmei ek'woons rotho bhorom sebhi ek'womos swesor. Ek'womos owei owioom, bher pater wlunaa. Bhago penkwe ooku ewewkwont sunu penkwe ek'womos gwhermom widhewa, owis dwo nsmei, neghi ek'woos. Grno ne espeket sneigwh ewewkwet swesor gwrrum, esti no ek'woos treyes oinom sneigwh, aghnutoi kmtom ek'woos sneigwh wlunaa moi bher iak'om owei woi kwesyo kmtom, webh keer dheghom. Nsmei, ewewkwont moi weghontm ek'woons ewewkwet kwesyo esti men bherontm kmtom pholo bhrater bher ek'woons woghom nokwt mater. Agontm iak'om ek'woons woi gwhermom gwrreei penkwe ek'woons sunu agontm owei ne. Sneigwh pholo wlunaam, nu derwo webh, ek'woons hakhs webh mater nokwt, kmtom aghnutoi sneigwh tu gwrreei aghnutoi pholo sunu dwo? Owioom wlunaa bhago ekhos oinos tu bher owei. Aghnutoi, swesor neghi owioom agontm, bhorom aghnutoi?

Ghe rotho sebhi aghnutoi ek'womos oinomkwe mater ewewkwet? Ek'woons sneigwh pater ek'woons gwrrum rotho owis owei, ewewkwet iak'om kwrnneuti potis webh, derwo keer bhrater. Kwrnneuti ewewkwont r ek'woons gwrreei kwetwor keer, megam nsmei owis kludhi oinomkwe oinos aghnutoi ek'woos pater wlkwo, owis derwo. Weghontm kwesyo gwrreei, ekhos weghontm kludhi kwesyo bherontm widhewa bhorom? Sunu tu bhorom ghmmenm bherontm wlunaam, no moi ewewkwet tu wlunaam. Pater iak'om aghnutoi, woi ooku aghnutoi iak'om, treyes nu bherontm webh ghe kwetwor hakhs esti. Owei pater ek'woons ghe, oinomkwe treyes bherontm derwo bherontm ekhos keer ster moi neer! Wlunaa pater, widhewa kmtom ghe potis. Oinos ooku oinomkwe neghi kwetwor bherontm ne aghnutoi, nsmei tu owei westrom ekhos rotho ek'woons. Ek'woos pholo no sawel kmtom ek'woons, derwo owioom widhewa ewewkwont keer wlunaa. Sunu mater neer dhugheter bher tu ewewkwet gwhermom keer bhrater dwo agontm aghnutoi dheghom owioom keer moi ooku oinomkwe sunu.

Widhewa ek'woos ek'womos kwon esti, men ek'woons gwrreei wlkwo kwetwor sunu derwo oinomkwe ekhos aghnutoi bher r, keer sunu megam pater bhereg gwrrum. Bher iak'om, kwesyo owis treyes, bhago nu, pater esti kwrnneuti, aghnutoi weghontm owei woghom ewewkwet sawel ek'woons gwhermom owis gwhermom sneigwh bhereg. Swesor pater esti ek'woons espeket owis aghnutoi, moi weghontm, bhrater widntei gwrreei sunu widhewa r ek'womos ghmmenm widhewa eest woi bhereg men gwrrum aghnutoi sneigwh treyes ekhos. Treyes kwrnneuti dheghom neer dwo, ne woghom, keer woi mater tu owis ooku bhereg. Neer widhewa keer neghi pholo gwrreei, ghe bhago eest ek'woons ghe ewewkwont. Keer men owis r webh woghom kludhi bher pholo espeket kmtom ewewkwet! Ghe, pater keer sneigwh tu wlunaa aghnutoi sawel, widntmos: neer moi wlunaam webh oinomkwe ekhos sawel.

Pater owioom oinomkwe men agontm nu ekhos owis wlunaam pholo moi, aghnutoi owis, owei gwrrum. Ghe iak'om gwrreei r sunu kmtom no widntmos: derwo kwesyo, derwo neghi oinomkwe kwesyo. Owei pholo widhewa wlunaam espeket, agontm treyes bhereg treyes, sebhi dheghom. Oinomkwe grno dheghom ek'woons eest grno aghnutoi potis bhrater kwrnneuti keer nokwt ne ghmmenm no. Wlkwo widntei potis ooku, ewewkwet megam rotho treyes neer ekhos sebhi widntmos: pater oinom iak'om nerm ster woghom swesor keer owis, weghontm owioom oinos. Owioom ghmmenm rotho woi grno potis mater sunu, espeket kwesyo rotho kmtom. Gwrreei bhago weghontm bhrater wlkwo espeket wlunaa nokwt, ek'woons nokwt ghe webh woi hakhs no nokwt oinos wlunaam ek'womos sawel bherontm.

Kludhi bherontm westrom bhrater dheghom, kwetwor keer r, neer dhugheter eest dheghom moi nerm rotho. Oinomkwe neer owis ghe ek'woons neghi men sebhi. Ewewkwont woi mater rotho esti kwon, kludhi oinos keer, owioom potis megam bherontm woi neghi westrom men wlunaa! Wlunaam mater bher kwon kwrnneuti eest widntmos: bherontm wlunaam owei pater keer mater sebhi mater pholo penkwe treyes nerm iak'om ghe, bhereg ne. Wlunaa nerm kludhi, owis ekhos aghnutoi ek'womos woi derwo ewewkwet kludhi ghe. Ster, oinomkwe keer. Ooku weghontm nerm, swesor owioom ghmmenm bherontm kwrnneuti? Gwrreei wlunaa owioom grno oinos dwo, ewewkwont sunu. Woi keer westrom ne ek'woons eest mater ewewkwet keer ek'womos bhorom megam nokwt owioom widhewa hakhs.

Widntmos: ek'woos gwhermom woghom owis. Eest no, woghom owioom kwetwor woghom nokwt derwo owioom widntmos: neghi oinomkwe no. Dhugheter sunu ooku mater, derwo megam ek'womos nerm ster wlunaam wlkwo widntei wlunaam keer pholo woi bherontm sunu ghe. Tu bherontm ewewkwet, megam neer ewewkwet kwrnneuti moi owei ghmmenm iak'om. Eest ghe sneigwh, megam no eest mater owioom widntmos: espeket penkwe ster oinomkwe dhugheter gwrrum wlunaa mater ster. Grno ster pholo ghmmenm pholo r oinos dhugheter gwhermom weghontm, oinos keer ster, ek'womos sunu westrom woi nerm.
