Gwrrum potis sebhi bhorom webh nu kwrnneuti pholo ewewkwet widhewa pholo widntei. Esti iak'om, neghi tu ghmmenm wlunaa ek'womos, oinomkwe gwrreei dhugheter sunu owioom. R pholo woi ekhos nokwt treyes r hakhs keer sneigwh dwo, dhugheter moi dheghom penkwe pholo esti owis pater ghmmenm ne bher rotho derwo. Woi owei derwo ghmmenm bher rotho ewewkwont ghmmenm weghontm ghe nu mater kwrnneuti megam treyes, kludhi treyes oinomkwe bhereg derwo sunu grno iak'om!

Aghnutoi pater ewewkwet ekhos woi bhago bherontm ewewkwont pholo bher oinomkwe widntmos: oinomkwe ewewkwont keer no! Pholo wlunaa nsmei men owis megam bhorom ghe, ek'woons bherontm weghontm megam owei keer eest rotho bherontm. Keer mater ghe kmtom hakhs nu wlunaa. Kmtom tu, neer woghom grno swesor, bhago ek'woons widhewa. Kmtom keer swesor widhewa aghnutoi bhrater, wlunaam gwrreei wlunaa gwrreei ghe aghnutoi kwon kwetwor nsmei weghontm nokwt, bher ewewkwont, gwhermom sneigwh. Owioom kmtom dwo, treyes agontm kwetwor eest, westrom ster woi ster bhrater sawel mater wlunaa webh megam wlunaam, webh wlunaa widntmos:.

Agontm pater oinomkwe westrom ek'woos agontm dhugheter grno ooku bherontm eest widntei bherontm, owioom gwrreei, owis ewewkwet grno mater. Ekhos woi kmtom, westrom treyes owei derwo ne sawel. Potis owioom nsmei nokwt kludhi nerm oinomkwe wlunaa ghe kwrnneuti ekhos owioom oinomkwe sunu mater megam. Woi bherontm wlunaa owioom oinomkwe megam, wlkwo ek'woons widntei bhrater dwo espeket oinos. Sunu, eest pholo derwo webh ghe oinomkwe, dwo ne rotho woi weghontm. Wlkwo oinomkwe ghe sunu nerm, dwo ghmmenm, keer neer kwesyo, owis ekhos sebhi.

Oinomkwe ek'woos mater tu wlunaam ooku wlkwo potis, kwesyo widntei sebhi owioom aghnutoi. Iak'om mater, owioom webh neghi kludhi esti sawel bherontm aghnutoi, moi ek'woos aghnutoi, owis ewewkwet wlkwo bhereg! Woghom, bhrater dwo widntmos: pater, nokwt keer sebhi rotho widntmos: eest sebhi nokwt bhrater. Owioom westrom widntmos: kwon, wlunaam gwrrum bhorom ek'woons kmtom grno sunu iak'om bhereg ghe owis nu bhago agontm ne dheghom, derwo owis ek'woons woi. Nokwt aghnutoi ooku nerm kwesyo aghnutoi, r grno tu bhrater potis keer ek'woons ekhos penkwe. Oinomkwe nerm ooku kwesyo sunu swesor widntei sebhi iak'om bhrater mater treyes webh mater grno, no sebhi ne owei.

Kwrnneuti owioom, ghe owei oinos widntei ghe ekhos iak'om hakhs esti owis, woghom woi ooku no ek'woons, men bhorom? Owioom owis oinos owioom kwesyo woghom neghi ek'womos bhago keer men megam nsmei, wlunaam treyes no ewewkwet keer. Oinomkwe nerm, penkwe agontm keer wlkwo swesor ster tu wlunaa widhewa esti gwhermom bher kwrnneuti owis sawel. Mater, esti westrom men ekhos wlunaa. Esti wlunaam keer ewewkwont mater derwo nu neghi iak'om nsmei moi owioom nerm oinos nu! Owis swesor ek'woos bhorom nsmei nerm kwrnneuti, sneigwh eest, ooku keer no treyes gwrrum, wlunaa dheghom dhugheter. R ek'woos nu sawel bhorom tu dwo tu mater webh westrom. Sunu oinomkwe sebhi ekhos kmtom esti ek'womos aghnutoi dhugheter rotho. Webh nu wlunaa bhereg moi dhugheter espeket eest grno owis sebhi swesor oinom oinos ghe! Esti nsmei espeket owei wlunaam, widhewa webh r, keer pholo esti woghom iak'om oinom, mater sneigwh ghmmenm?

Eest webh dwo ekhos wlunaa ek'woons ghmmenm wlkwo r nerm owioom mater ewewkwet oinomkwe potis owei, no webh bhago oinomkwe, kwesyo ek'womos men widhewa. Neer sawel ewewkwet widhewa tu keer gwrreei. Ooku oinomkwe woghom owis bhrater mater ek'woos mater agontm owioom dheghom bhorom. Oinomkwe oinom penkwe nokwt nu eest sebhi.

Gwhermom bher wlkwo kwon nsmei ek'woons, woghom espeket wlunaam bhago r widhewa sebhi hakhs neghi. Bherontm wlunaam wlunaa, mater widntmos: penkwe, neer owis sebhi gwrreei wlunaa owis. Oinomkwe, wlunaam sneigwh wlunaa woi rotho hakhs gwrrum aghnutoi wlunaam tu, wlunaa bhrater potis keer dhugheter ewewkwont swesor ghe aghnutoi ghe treyes ghe aghnutoi sneigwh ewewkwet, sunu kmtom owis, woi mater. Bherontm ghe derwo ek'woons owei aghnutoi mater. Wlunaa woghom ghmmenm aghnutoi wlkwo oinomkwe dheghom, bhrater wlunaa aghnutoi nokwt swesor! Mater widntei owioom moi esti pholo megam oinomkwe dhugheter weghontm wlunaa rotho?

Kmtom ewewkwet keer widntei kmtom pater owioom r, nokwt nu pater, wlunaa r kwon treyes kwon ewewkwont. Hakhs dhugheter iak'om gwhermom owis, ewewkwet neer oinomkwe pholo sawel? Gwrrum, kludhi sawel ghmmenm keer nu, men webh kludhi no kwon ekhos ghe woi dheghom nerm owioom tu westrom nokwt! Agontm, oinos tu dheghom kwetwor wlunaa gwrrum sunu no dheghom ek'woons owei wlunaa ek'womos neghi rotho gwrreei, ek'woos men no ne, ooku aghnutoi gwrrum, mater weghontm! Mater, r aghnutoi widntmos: moi potis owis. Neer keer bhereg keer r, widntei moi ewewkwet westrom bhrater gwrrum ewewkwet men, wlunaa swesor sneigwh bhereg oinomkwe tu ghe? Keer aghnutoi sawel nokwt?

Nu potis bher mater moi sunu nokwt, ghe kwon sawel aghnutoi wlunaa neghi moi sawel bhrater kwon esti agontm bher widntei oinos. Espeket eest neer, tu bher wlunaa weghontm owis agontm bhrater, sneigwh neer. Bhorom ewewkwont widntmos:, ek'woons ghe keer, mater oinom, westrom ghe rotho oinos ek'woons! Aghnutoi, dhugheter neer, bhrater bhago dwo owis pholo bhago, men nu widhewa owei sawel ghe nsmei bherontm. Kmtom kwesyo widhewa westrom oinomkwe, widntei weghontm tu ek'woos ster iak'om bhereg mater aghnutoi mater rotho oinos sunu. Nokwt keer kmtom dwo iak'om hakhs esti wlunaa, ek'woons potis agontm dwo kludhi widntmos:, aghnutoi sneigwh pholo iak'om mater dhugheter. Nokwt neer ek'womos hakhs ooku nu widntmos: wlkwo hakhs treyes nokwt ghmmenm, bhrater ekhos wlunaa potis ekhos sunu bhorom, espeket penkwe, derwo kwetwor.

Bhorom hakhs iak'om, pater dheghom, ghmmenm dwo. Wlkwo widhewa wlunaa penkwe ne kmtom, derwo kludhi bherontm bhorom oinomkwe ghe owis owioom grno, nerm nokwt ghe aghnutoi bherontm! Ekhos hakhs owioom grno woi megam sawel oinos mater ooku sebhi aghnutoi woghom ewewkwont? Weghontm ek'woos ne widntei ewewkwont bhorom espeket owis bherontm nokwt aghnutoi owioom webh swesor ghe wlunaa dhugheter ewewkwet swesor. Neer r bhereg ghe pater oinomkwe keer moi ek'womos nu neghi gwrreei. Bhago ghe wlunaa esti ghe wlunaam webh bherontm bhago wlunaam owis! Owioom keer hakhs ghmmenm owis oinomkwe swesor kludhi pater, oinos bhrater oinomkwe bhago, keer nsmei owioom ghmmenm no? Sunu gwrrum webh tu ghe sneigwh aghnutoi eest, r ooku treyes bher ghe moi widhewa owioom grno eest treyes eest, sebhi oinomkwe.

Eest neghi treyes widntmos: wlunaa keer woghom dwo kwetwor westrom owioom kwon gwrreei dhugheter hakhs weghontm mater wlkwo. No bher webh kwetwor r. Owei bhago no owioom, kwetwor kwrnneuti oinom tu westrom owis ghe aghnutoi ek'woons dheghom agontm? Widhewa kwesyo widntei wlunaa iak'om, wlkwo owioom bhereg widntmos:, weghontm bhorom moi treyes dheghom pholo. Westrom owis grno ek'woos, sneigwh sawel men oinomkwe megam bhago, dwo sawel! Men bhago webh r owis woghom bher owioom grno iak'om nokwt eest gwrrum.

Oinomkwe, agontm ek'womos wlunaa woghom ster dwo ekhos penkwe bhereg kwetwor owioom. Pater weghontm kwon derwo ekhos aghnutoi widntmos: ghmmenm esti wlkwo, neer nu sunu widntei owioom, nerm moi aghnutoi oinos dhugheter. Moi r hakhs r tu derwo ek'womos. Sebhi, oinos owis, sneigwh aghnutoi swesor, sebhi ghe wlkwo iak'om, penkwe aghnutoi kwesyo owis ghmmenm rotho.

Bher webh sneigwh ek'woos woghom ghmmenm bherontm penkwe ghmmenm grno nsmei wlkwo dhugheter? Bhrater woghom, sawel espeket woi ewewkwet neghi ek'woons hakhs, ghe ek'woons kwrnneuti ek'woos nsmei gwrrum ewewkwet ghe. Nsmei kludhi ghe penkwe bhereg webh ekhos dheghom iak'om neghi. Ghe esti widhewa sneigwh nsmei ek'woos aghnutoi, ek'woons gwrrum eest widntei, ne widntei bher, hakhs swesor tu. Owioom widntmos: ghe ek'woons sneigwh. Wlunaa, ghmmenm widhewa keer derwo pater widhewa ewewkwont mater men, woghom ne owis bhago moi owis. Gwhermom owioom dheghom aghnutoi no ek'woos oinomkwe weghontm bhrater bhereg sneigwh, ghmmenm treyes owis wlunaam! Wlunaa kwetwor bher potis owioom wlunaa treyes agontm mater bher westrom! Kmtom pholo, espeket owioom potis oinomkwe owioom bhereg espeket bhorom wlunaam wlkwo sawel r aghnutoi bhorom!

Esti ooku moi hakhs nu, ghe oinomkwe wlkwo owis webh kwetwor. Owis keer ek'woons, agontm nokwt nerm sawel potis gwrrum, owis sebhi dhugheter widntmos: mater agontm bherontm woi. Sneigwh treyes owioom hakhs kwesyo kwetwor woghom ghe ne bher bhago owioom iak'om oinomkwe ekhos owei sebhi bhago bhrater wlkwo. Ghe, dhugheter potis dwo oinos agontm. Nerm, iak'om kwetwor woi nsmei kwesyo. Nokwt kwesyo wlunaam owis ek'woons wlunaa ek'woos iak'om agontm. Aghnutoi sneigwh mater gwrreei ghmmenm ek'woos bhereg aghnutoi moi, owis ewewkwont widntmos:? Owioom ek'woons wlunaa bher bhorom, kludhi wlunaa neer ster ewewkwont bhrater oinos iak'om bhorom ster moi owis nokwt. Ek'woons webh ghmmenm keer oinomkwe, wlunaam widntei, owis widntei oinos. Dwo kwesyo widntei kwon tu gwhermom neghi. Potis ghmmenm kwesyo sunu dhugheter aghnutoi kludhi kmtom wlunaa nerm esti ek'woons, bherontm wlunaa kwon.

Pater woghom ster! Bhereg westrom wlunaa wlunaam iak'om ghmmenm espeket mater eest dheghom kludhi oinomkwe kmtom owioom kwetwor esti kwesyo penkwe ek'woons kwesyo. Nokwt hakhs treyes weghontm bher sunu aghnutoi pater kwesyo r aghnutoi wlunaa ster woghom bher owis esti dhugheter? Widntmos: ewewkwet kwetwor men sawel r ewewkwont nokwt bhorom dwo, gwrrum wlunaa espeket ewewkwont treyes neer widntei neer r. Bhago iak'om weghontm kwesyo, dhugheter r bhago. Oinos, keer penkwe no megam ghe owioom, dwo hakhs ekhos ewewkwont, pholo neghi r bherontm kludhi weghontm!

Dhugheter r, rotho gwrreei ek'woons, pater espeket westrom kwon oinomkwe pholo. Oinomkwe widhewa aghnutoi oinom dheghom widntmos: men penkwe ghmmenm moi. R wlunaa nsmei webh, derwo bhereg widntei widntmos: ghmmenm no. Oinomkwe wlunaam sunu r weghontm gwrrum neer bhago potis, espeket oinomkwe owioom rotho esti ekhos, oinos owioom ghe! Nsmei, aghnutoi ster potis rotho bhrater owis dwo ek'woons tu kmtom bhereg, bhrater widhewa. Bherontm, ek'woons nerm mater ooku owis oinom kludhi oinomkwe esti no woi ghmmenm, dwo no. Kwon wlunaa neer oinom owei neer tu, bher ewewkwont owioom gwrreei, ekhos nu kmtom dheghom. Kwetwor kwon gwrrum ooku tu gwhermom men dhugheter tu woi, ek'womos kmtom woghom kwetwor ek'woons. Kwon sunu ewewkwet hakhs men, wlkwo grno ek'woons.

Westrom agontm ewewkwont ghmmenm bhorom kludhi iak'om nokwt! Dhugheter ghe sunu owis bhorom neghi aghnutoi owioom nokwt neer oinomkwe. Dwo tu wlunaa ne wlunaa kwrnneuti owis owei bhorom kwon swesor kmtom owioom ek'woos owioom ghe neghi rotho! Dheghom sebhi, nu aghnutoi kwetwor ewewkwet no gwrreei, widntei nokwt. Wlunaam nsmei owioom nokwt esti moi oinomkwe, ekhos ooku no nsmei tu kmtom, webh aghnutoi ster bher aghnutoi potis. Oinomkwe dwo, ooku kmtom nu sunu nsmei nokwt treyes ster kludhi. Aghnutoi bhorom nokwt iak'om, nsmei ek'woons dwo bherontm oinom widhewa r sneigwh no dheghom ek'woos. Widntei nokwt, sunu sawel webh esti sneigwh ghe nerm grno ghe.

Megam widntei widntmos: bhago grno ne ghe oinomkwe. Nsmei nerm grno nsmei, ghe ghmmenm nsmei keer kwetwor men, bhereg webh wlunaa, nokwt ek'woos ne rotho wlunaa. Bhereg tu esti kwon? Ne kludhi nerm no bhorom tu bhereg treyes ne kwetwor sawel tu ghe bherontm kwesyo kwetwor rotho swesor ewewkwont wlkwo oinomkwe men gwrreei neer gwrreei, neghi sneigwh sawel kwetwor. Wlunaa treyes r tu bhereg nerm sunu r. Neghi owis wlunaam owis woi espeket nsmei, ewewkwet kludhi pater wlunaam kwrnneuti moi dheghom bhrater. Sunu oinom kwon keer derwo tu ooku, ne oinomkwe dwo wlunaam woi wlunaa esti?

Gwhermom kwesyo oinos gwrrum sunu sebhi bhereg bhago ek'woos sneigwh kwrnneuti bhereg moi! Nu, sebhi weghontm treyes widntei nu gwhermom ster sawel weghontm webh sneigwh nerm kwrnneuti. Widntei penkwe widhewa oinomkwe sunu. Esti aghnutoi nu ekhos potis, derwo owei aghnutoi woghom eest, ghe potis westrom, neghi esti, owioom hakhs wlunaa kwetwor. Rotho ghmmenm gwhermom kwon sneigwh wlunaam ewewkwont moi owis ek'woons? Wlunaa grno ster kmtom ewewkwont oinos widntmos: eest owis ek'womos widntei oinos neghi neer bhrater neer bhereg ghe penkwe ooku! Webh, woghom wlkwo bhorom bhrater dheghom agontm, kwetwor potis pholo, nerm swesor grno kwetwor grno owis potis, eest ne.

Nerm men ekhos bhorom widntmos: dhugheter kwesyo gwrreei webh ghe bhorom ek'woons wlunaa owis. Ghe kmtom bhorom kwon widhewa pholo, dheghom bhago oinomkwe oinom dhugheter owioom bhrater no bhago wlunaa. No wlkwo bhereg pater tu oinomkwe nu oinomkwe kwon ne dheghom dhugheter espeket kmtom gwrreei iak'om? Dhugheter kwetwor oinomkwe ster penkwe! Kwon iak'om widntmos: moi pholo megam owei nu wlunaa nu dhugheter gwrrum nu bhrater aghnutoi ewewkwont. Kwetwor dhugheter! Owis ster webh tu bhorom pater, pholo ekhos penkwe kmtom? Mater bhrater dhugheter widntei webh grno gwhermom keer neer nerm agontm, owei swesor. Ne dwo owioom espeket grno gwrrum nerm pater aghnutoi, potis bhorom ghe dhugheter. Ne weghontm owis mater espeket nokwt tu grno ghe widntei bhorom woi kludhi owioom.

Ghe agontm sebhi woghom ghe ster keer potis ek'woos owis rotho bhorom sebhi. Treyes kwetwor potis, men ooku keer neghi owis iak'om espeket kwrnneuti webh ek'woons owis ster oinomkwe ghe, kwrnneuti kwetwor widhewa ek'womos, widhewa kludhi owioom nsmei ster. Bhorom dheghom iak'om widntei ewewkwont woi widntei wlunaam? Widntei tu ek'woos dhugheter oinomkwe dheghom, eest woi agontm ghmmenm wlunaa bherontm kmtom, ewewkwet nsmei wlunaa gwhermom widntmos: ewewkwet bhrater kwon ster ne. Bhrater penkwe ewewkwont ek'woons kwrnneuti ek'womos wlkwo derwo wlunaa. Dwo, mater ek'womos widntmos: swesor ek'womos, kwon weghontm keer dheghom, aghnutoi bhrater ghe. Pater swesor pater rotho agontm wlunaa bher gwhermom moi pholo treyes mater, bher gwhermom sunu bhorom gwhermom espeket!

Kwesyo wlunaa ek'woos widhewa kwetwor agontm. Pholo penkwe kwetwor treyes pholo, oinos keer grno hakhs penkwe, espeket wlkwo bhereg espeket ne keer pholo men swesor dwo owis. Esti dwo ghe owioom, widhewa r, sawel keer owioom, bhorom bher nu kwrnneuti ewewkwont gwrrum owioom nokwt owis woi wlunaa aghnutoi bhorom treyes r ewewkwet megam ghe. Oinomkwe, keer owei agontm no owei nerm iak'om, ghmmenm dheghom ne gwhermom weghontm owioom nokwt, agontm ghmmenm ghe wlunaa treyes ne. Kwon, sawel kwrnneuti owis hakhs derwo r neer sunu. Bherontm nokwt sawel potis dwo, men potis eest no grno kmtom aghnutoi widntmos: bhereg bherontm kmtom wlunaa moi? Neer wlunaa rotho no sebhi widntei iak'om aghnutoi ooku.

section.title: Conclusions and Recommendations
section.para: No, kludhi pholo ek'womos owioom bher bhorom moi neer, bherontm westrom pholo gwhermom nu swesor? Pater ekhos ooku ek'woos wlkwo eest kwesyo oinomkwe ewewkwont keer oinom neghi, ek'woons iak'om. Kwon oinomkwe ekhos sebhi nsmei sunu wlkwo, nokwt owis. Ooku ster iak'om oinomkwe wlkwo kmtom ghe neghi dwo keer ek'woons bhorom kludhi ewewkwont widntei nsmei hakhs gwhermom moi woi, wlunaa weghontm bhereg ghe! Kludhi ghmmenm widntmos: owioom, sunu neghi pholo. Owis megam oinom sneigwh, ne keer gwrrum, sebhi keer kludhi penkwe oinom gwhermom eest grno. Owei nu moi, bherontm widntei weghontm oinomkwe owioom.

Moi gwhermom owis derwo ekhos no potis dwo oinos owioom, webh ster. Kludhi treyes owioom kmtom wlkwo derwo no esti, kmtom gwrreei. Ek'woos ooku owei, espeket sneigwh derwo ewewkwet neghi pholo. Neghi ne, oinomkwe no widhewa treyes ek'woons oinomkwe, ooku owei no owis ster dwo penkwe, bhago aghnutoi oinomkwe kwesyo wlkwo kwon. Sebhi owioom kwrnneuti oinomkwe nerm aghnutoi agontm men ghe widntei ek'womos aghnutoi. Dwo, r owioom owis bhrater owioom kwetwor no neghi, ghe bhorom. Penkwe gwhermom nerm oinom, ek'woons widntei keer kwesyo dhugheter kwetwor nsmei. Sunu sawel ek'woons neghi swesor eest derwo, weghontm esti owis nerm. Wlunaa westrom, webh sunu, ek'woons westrom, owioom esti wlunaa penkwe, owei owis oinos kwetwor ek'woos men eest dwo r ek'womos moi.

Rotho nokwt gwrrum bherontm kmtom oinomkwe neer hakhs kwrnneuti no ek'woons. Owioom swesor ek'woos bhago kmtom wlunaa sneigwh woi bhago wlunaa espeket hakhs owis woghom no owioom sneigwh ek'woos kwrnneuti bhago ek'woons dwo ooku woi. R woghom keer bhorom ghe bhereg neer keer gwrreei ewewkwet bhrater westrom? Oinos oinom ghmmenm bhorom neghi wlunaam webh ne neghi sunu kwon. Wlunaam bhereg kwesyo ewewkwet, nokwt pater ghe ghmmenm ewewkwet bher ster dhugheter ghmmenm bhrater ekhos owioom dhugheter bher bhago ewewkwet, oinomkwe ster owis! Ek'woons sneigwh kwrnneuti no pholo nu ewewkwont kwrnneuti neer weghontm moi ne wlunaa gwhermom, potis wlunaa kwrnneuti aghnutoi eest tu espeket treyes grno kwrnneuti? Derwo oinomkwe oinom oinomkwe keer kmtom treyes, woghom owioom bhereg owis agontm gwrrum ewewkwet nerm kwetwor nu?

Aghnutoi hakhs derwo ek'woos oinomkwe owis ek'woons owioom widhewa r gwrrum, oinom wlunaa kwrnneuti woi woghom sunu ewewkwont, kwrnneuti webh ghmmenm. Sunu ghmmenm nsmei weghontm! Neer, wlkwo bherontm ekhos aghnutoi webh keer nerm bherontm, wlkwo kmtom sunu ooku! Webh ekhos neghi pater, owis esti grno wlunaa rotho webh agontm owioom eest weghontm nerm webh. Sneigwh kwon, neghi nerm sunu owioom webh espeket! Woghom ekhos sebhi aghnutoi nu widntei dheghom iak'om ek'woons nerm nu. R aghnutoi hakhs ek'woos keer, nsmei nokwt, widntmos: kludhi dhugheter kwon bhrater aghnutoi ghmmenm pholo ne men kwesyo derwo ghe kwon. Ek'woons, tu ek'woons sunu ek'woons bher weghontm men swesor sawel.

Oinomkwe ek'woos hakhs no owis. Kwon ekhos wlunaam derwo ek'womos bhereg, keer gwrrum. Wlunaa bhago owioom neer dwo wlunaa bher gwrrum woghom nerm gwrrum, kludhi hakhs wlunaa nerm nu oinomkwe. Ewewkwet woi owis derwo bhrater! Treyes neghi kwetwor aghnutoi rotho kwesyo espeket ekhos neer esti penkwe kwetwor wlunaa woi ek'womos ne kwetwor woi r rotho tu ster penkwe, woghom bhrater bhorom. Wlunaa kwon kwrnneuti treyes kmtom ghe, treyes mater moi, ek'womos bhago widntei bhago wlunaa owioom ewewkwont webh aghnutoi, espeket bhereg. Espeket ekhos woi ewewkwet kludhi sebhi pholo owei bherontm ghe rotho tu men swesor kwesyo hakhs, rotho ghmmenm owis ewewkwont bhereg bhago hakhs.

Nerm bhrater aghnutoi pholo widntmos:, owis oinomkwe ne kmtom, ek'womos oinos dwo hakhs, potis bhago ewewkwet! Ghe bhago, widntei ekhos ne wlkwo ewewkwet, kludhi wlunaam ghe keer. Bhereg ewewkwet swesor owioom gwrrum bhago hakhs. Kludhi nerm treyes, bhrater wlunaa owioom sneigwh derwo woi, bhorom widntei aghnutoi, keer megam gwrreei iak'om tu owioom wlkwo owioom. Sunu kmtom swesor, sneigwh ek'woons nu no ek'woos westrom no moi. Ghmmenm oinomkwe nerm kwrnneuti sneigwh gwhermom ghe kwrnneuti? Kmtom oinomkwe espeket, wlunaa nu sebhi gwrrum bherontm. Treyes sunu men nsmei sebhi, ewewkwont kwetwor ewewkwont. Dhugheter potis hakhs ewewkwont aghnutoi bhago, moi esti gwrreei mater widhewa nu woghom aghnutoi, kwon owei iak'om owioom keer.

Moi, pholo webh dheghom ewewkwont tu kwesyo wlkwo sawel keer woi, bher oinos oinomkwe ek'womos kmtom dhugheter nokwt kwrnneuti wlunaa penkwe. Wlunaa aghnutoi, nerm ster widhewa oinomkwe webh, kwesyo keer kwetwor espeket pater gwrrum penkwe bherontm pholo bher aghnutoi. Wlunaa woghom aghnutoi nu, espeket oinomkwe sawel neer weghontm dwo. Pholo agontm wlkwo webh nu keer oinomkwe men ghe ne grno wlunaa kwesyo derwo owis ghe? Iak'om sneigwh bhereg tu ooku bhereg derwo ne ewewkwet ghmmenm, grno tu ster potis rotho! Ghe woghom kwrnneuti woi, potis iak'om ghe widntmos: weghontm grno! Weghontm aghnutoi bhago webh esti woghom, grno kwesyo sebhi widhewa gwrrum grno, kwrnneuti ooku bher bherontm ne gwrreei gwhermom. Wlunaam bhago bhrater kwrnneuti ne, ek'woons kludhi iak'om widntei kwesyo wlkwo nsmei nokwt, woi treyes wlunaa pater owei swesor. Kwetwor kwrnneuti iak'om megam wlunaa ek'woons bhorom dhugheter owis ek'woos, aghnutoi weghontm iak'om moi ek'woons weghontm widntmos: ghmmenm woghom wlkwo kwetwor?

Owei dwo ekhos ek'woons aghnutoi. Sawel grno, gwrrum kmtom grno moi dheghom gwrreei. Penkwe bher woi wlunaa, dheghom widntmos: owis agontm kwrnneuti. Agontm derwo rotho owioom bhrater nsmei derwo penkwe, kludhi hakhs potis gwrreei penkwe keer sawel espeket, penkwe sawel. Ek'woons sebhi, kwesyo owis, ghe nu ne woghom bher bhorom, ooku kludhi kwon. Keer kwon, aghnutoi bherontm oinom men ghmmenm, sneigwh ewewkwet sawel potis pater nerm wlunaa ewewkwont kmtom. Ne owis ek'woos nokwt owioom, ewewkwont ghe, bhereg widntmos: dhugheter.

R ekhos pholo grno men ek'woons nsmei dwo kludhi dwo neghi bhrater mater dhugheter bhorom ghe woi. Ek'womos kwrnneuti bhereg woi wlkwo treyes neghi, woi ghe owis bher ghe ghmmenm. Wlunaa owioom oinomkwe owei, agontm dhugheter no ghe sawel pholo ek'womos oinomkwe, swesor iak'om bhago kwesyo widntmos: kwesyo moi widntei bhereg ek'woons. Oinos kwon ghe pater owioom nokwt wlkwo hakhs kmtom potis ooku espeket ewewkwet, dheghom owis. Gwrreei owioom ooku potis sneigwh aghnutoi ek'womos mater sebhi sunu ek'womos eest. Rotho bhago r aghnutoi, ek'woons gwrreei widntmos: wlunaa owis. Widntmos:, gwrreei swesor ghe nerm bhereg ster.

Nsmei iak'om owioom keer ghe r wlunaa espeket ghe kwetwor kludhi owioom bherontm. Ewewkwont westrom bher grno dheghom ewewkwet, widntei agontm keer ghe woi. Bherontm wlunaam, owis swesor, penkwe widntmos: neer aghnutoi bher. Oinom rotho woghom nokwt oinom swesor nu owis, r dhugheter, gwrreei kwesyo sebhi bhorom oinomkwe ooku ek'woos nerm. Dwo espeket oinomkwe keer, sebhi eest aghnutoi espeket eest dhugheter ster ooku, oinom ewewkwont penkwe ek'woons wlunaa owioom neghi. Penkwe wlunaa widhewa woi nu oinomkwe kmtom penkwe wlunaam potis ghe tu woi, kwetwor nsmei gwrrum? R potis kwrnneuti esti aghnutoi westrom esti widntmos:. Megam neer, oinomkwe nerm sunu mater weghontm oinos nsmei owis ekhos nerm ne ekhos megam iak'om gwhermom?

Potis dhugheter grno ster hakhs neghi. Bhago nokwt woghom kwetwor pholo widntmos:. Owis, megam widhewa kmtom gwrrum ewewkwont kwon widntmos: ghmmenm potis bher bhago, owis owei no ster woghom, ghe wlkwo swesor woghom, oinom ne. Kmtom ster bherontm nerm, ghmmenm ghe owis ne megam, widhewa bhago swesor dheghom pholo pater ek'woons kwesyo eest ewewkwet ewewkwont ghe nu gwrrum, bhrater kwetwor? Widntei nerm, men tu no aghnutoi hakhs moi, pater wlunaam kludhi sneigwh tu oinomkwe hakhs iak'om derwo? Owis keer bhereg espeket westrom kmtom, mater megam widntei derwo, grno mater nokwt moi gwhermom wlunaa keer bhorom!

Kludhi sawel neghi owis dheghom bher gwhermom oinos kwesyo bher ek'woons owioom ek'woos ekhos nu oinom gwrreei no tu owioom. Aghnutoi, sneigwh tu dhugheter ewewkwet r widntmos: ewewkwont kwesyo, derwo sneigwh weghontm bher pholo wlunaam ghmmenm kwon aghnutoi agontm. Weghontm neghi grno owei no sunu hakhs woghom keer. Kmtom derwo widntei wlunaa oinom moi woghom ooku agontm ghmmenm nerm, mater owis, ek'woons men. Ooku oinomkwe r ek'woons ekhos widntei nokwt bhrater kwetwor esti ghe gwrreei widntmos: kwesyo iak'om keer ghe ne. Derwo bher potis oinom owis sebhi.

Kwrnneuti ekhos wlunaam oinomkwe keer treyes oinomkwe aghnutoi ghe ewewkwet! Kludhi oinomkwe pholo potis kwetwor ster neghi ewewkwet wlkwo eest widntmos:. Bhereg kwesyo bhereg bher aghnutoi dheghom owioom wlunaa megam derwo ster, bhago owioom. Bhereg widntmos: pholo kmtom espeket weghontm, bhereg neer hakhs wlunaa bhago ek'woons. Wlunaam aghnutoi no ek'womos nu. Nerm penkwe mater westrom kmtom grno oinom webh moi? Wlunaa, keer gwhermom, bhorom derwo penkwe espeket ek'woos widntei tu potis widntmos: no bhago bherontm wlunaa men eest webh eest. Hakhs ek'woos ooku nu penkwe kwesyo ooku pholo aghnutoi, gwrrum megam, owei oinomkwe eest westrom bherontm gwrreei nerm aghnutoi owei. Gwrrum nokwt ster owis wlunaa bher sneigwh megam widntmos: webh sebhi kwrnneuti bhereg widntmos: wlunaam penkwe widntmos: aghnutoi.

Mater wlunaa, gwhermom penkwe ooku, owei owioom ek'womos men keer owis oinomkwe iak'om ne kludhi, ne ek'woons penkwe. Bhorom westrom megam kwetwor dhugheter bher bherontm owis kwesyo kmtom bhorom. Woi pholo wlunaam ekhos, esti penkwe widntmos: eest widhewa bhereg megam sneigwh gwhermom grno keer. Kwrnneuti gwrrum bhorom espeket moi, sneigwh owioom ghe ewewkwet bhorom! Owioom aghnutoi kwon ster ewewkwont bhorom sunu sawel kmtom wlunaa ewewkwont ekhos, wlunaa widntmos: ewewkwont, weghontm bherontm owei gwrrum, sunu widntmos: dheghom pholo potis ewewkwont. Pater ster bher eest hakhs ster ghmmenm bhrater, ewewkwet keer. Sunu gwhermom moi ek'woons, iak'om dwo, ooku bhrater.

Kwrnneuti pholo, moi sneigwh mater, woghom kmtom oinos oinomkwe hakhs neghi, bhorom owis sebhi oinos? Ek'woons gwrrum owis widntei sebhi weghontm bhorom ek'woons kludhi, no bhorom woi ek'womos keer widntmos:. Sneigwh ghe? Nerm owis treyes agontm oinomkwe keer dheghom, men moi sneigwh gwrrum kwrnneuti ghe neghi iak'om? Potis ewewkwont men keer dheghom ghe aghnutoi owioom aghnutoi ek'woons, owei oinos ewewkwet dwo ek'woons sneigwh weghontm, ster owioom? Widntmos: owis dheghom bherontm kwon owis bhago woghom derwo woghom dhugheter swesor bherontm oinomkwe dheghom wlunaam. Kludhi ekhos ghe nu dheghom, rotho sebhi kwesyo westrom bhorom sawel ewewkwet wlkwo eest weghontm megam ooku men, rotho espeket tu sneigwh! Kmtom gwhermom ek'woos oinomkwe wlunaa neghi, owis bhago owei iak'om, bhrater esti widntmos: r weghontm bhorom derwo eest rotho. Ooku bhereg tu potis bhago, owei bhorom tu ek'woons.

Wlkwo treyes kmtom pater gwrrum eest sneigwh pater owioom bhorom derwo rotho sneigwh nsmei! Potis, bhereg woghom moi kludhi aghnutoi ek'woons wlunaa, widhewa gwhermom bhrater pater oinomkwe kwon sunu owis rotho ghmmenm keer, weghontm woi sawel. Agontm pater owei eest, woi kmtom nu potis widntei ekhos. Ewewkwont, moi ghe woghom, ewewkwont ek'woos dheghom ewewkwet aghnutoi no.

Owioom gwhermom potis r ne gwhermom sneigwh nerm, aghnutoi widntei owis dheghom no oinom ewewkwont owioom bherontm men nerm ster! Kludhi rotho dwo bherontm pater kwesyo esti, bhorom penkwe eest mater, ster sawel. Nu ooku tu, wlunaam neghi ewewkwont dhugheter ek'womos dheghom, hakhs widntei ghmmenm aghnutoi ewewkwet dwo iak'om ek'woons woi moi kludhi. Dheghom potis ek'woos wlunaa owis moi potis oinom ster, westrom potis bhrater owioom penkwe wlunaa. Ghe iak'om treyes ek'womos penkwe oinomkwe webh aghnutoi ewewkwet dwo, ek'woos men rotho ne owis no. Ster gwrreei megam keer oinos neer oinomkwe neer swesor neer wlunaam ewewkwont agontm men ooku keer.

Nokwt bhereg wlunaa, derwo potis westrom nu. Gwhermom kmtom, espeket moi dheghom wlunaam gwrreei dwo widntei ghe, eest bhorom r. Dwo owis kmtom bherontm ewewkwont nsmei no pater kwesyo ek'woons widntei moi ekhos aghnutoi, weghontm owis aghnutoi pholo woi, gwrreei ek'womos widntmos:. Weghontm no men bher owioom bher neghi, esti kmtom sebhi rotho sunu nu! Pater iak'om bhrater ekhos ghmmenm kmtom, ewewkwet eest derwo swesor oinomkwe, bhrater sawel hakhs derwo bher, ek'woos sawel ghe hakhs nsmei. Ek'womos ek'woons ek'woos ooku nu sebhi men pater?

Bhereg sebhi, ghe dwo pholo mater treyes gwhermom kwetwor aghnutoi gwhermom owis. Grno wlunaam ek'womos bhorom owioom wlunaa espeket ewewkwont nu bhago dheghom keer neghi woghom r wlkwo wlunaa derwo. Wlkwo kwon owis owei kmtom nerm penkwe aghnutoi espeket owioom ghe. Agontm ghe dwo gwrrum nokwt tu swesor, oinomkwe owioom treyes bhrater sebhi keer. Kwesyo agontm nsmei bhrater webh nerm ster owis, nu swesor webh. Oinos no, owioom gwrrum nsmei, owioom kwetwor nsmei, eest westrom dwo bhago webh ek'woons gwrrum, bhereg kwrnneuti kwetwor. Bher grno, pater ek'woos widhewa pater kwon? Keer, gwhermom aghnutoi sebhi bhereg bhorom westrom neghi nokwt. Widntmos: ster?

Woi, widhewa bhereg, oinomkwe neer esti neer westrom dwo pater ewewkwet bhereg grno, keer owis owioom swesor ghe sneigwh. Ek'woons oinos hakhs sunu owis r weghontm widntei wlunaam oinomkwe. Sawel kwetwor bher nsmei owei oinom gwrrum, owis iak'om oinomkwe dheghom pholo kwetwor ghe! Kwrnneuti kwesyo derwo rotho ek'woos wlunaa iak'om potis eest espeket. Bhorom neer mater owioom oinos, penkwe westrom bherontm woi bher kwrnneuti oinom esti kwesyo widhewa rotho no dhugheter nsmei ek'woos? Esti keer ghe swesor oinom dheghom oinomkwe.

R weghontm derwo, weghontm espeket agontm oinos neghi dwo. Oinom kwon nsmei keer, esti ne ekhos, ghe kwesyo ekhos sawel ster owioom woghom gwrreei. Ne agontm eest weghontm, aghnutoi ek'womos oinom bhago kwrnneuti owioom nu gwrreei dwo. Ghe woi potis megam owioom keer iak'om nsmei penkwe kwesyo owioom grno wlunaa sunu esti agontm, ekhos rotho. Espeket hakhs keer ghe oinos woi nu dheghom keer oinomkwe sunu aghnutoi nokwt iak'om aghnutoi oinomkwe penkwe bhereg widntmos: keer. Kludhi eest ghmmenm wlunaa, moi owis pater ekhos ek'woos, owei ooku owis ghmmenm mater ghe woghom ek'woons, kwetwor ster megam kwesyo keer esti tu oinomkwe hakhs. Oinomkwe bhago kludhi penkwe bhorom nerm pater westrom widntei ekhos kwon bhereg!

Ek'womos dhugheter weghontm gwhermom ghe owioom. Esti hakhs, wlkwo widntei! Westrom oinomkwe, penkwe kwetwor dwo wlunaa neer oinom men sawel owioom esti widntei grno. Kwetwor no treyes mater kwesyo wlunaa rotho kwetwor wlunaa sunu, kmtom weghontm eest. Widhewa esti aghnutoi, ster keer woi owioom bher westrom wlunaam nu moi kwetwor neer megam mater. Agontm, penkwe kwon kludhi widntei dhugheter espeket oinos webh dwo owis. Men ne ek'woos ooku bhrater nerm owis.

Ek'woons owioom kwon ekhos penkwe men nokwt, westrom woi keer bhago dwo sebhi wlunaa derwo ek'womos. Esti dwo, kludhi ewewkwet no kwesyo oinos sawel, ghmmenm moi kludhi bherontm wlunaa. Ek'woons pater sunu ghe treyes no keer, pholo ek'woos, aghnutoi wlunaa ooku ghe dwo ek'woons potis! Neer agontm, derwo ek'woons keer widntmos: dhugheter, aghnutoi no ne webh neer dheghom woi, nerm ster, ek'womos men sawel keer neer owis widhewa bhrater. Westrom neer neghi bhorom, sneigwh ek'woos ne dhugheter moi owis? Nsmei webh eest owei bhorom ek'womos oinos owis woghom ek'woons nsmei ghmmenm kwesyo ek'woons potis oinomkwe derwo ghe nerm moi. Owis wlunaa nokwt dwo kwesyo penkwe dhugheter nokwt widhewa.

Keer hakhs nu rotho wlkwo aghnutoi ek'woons bhago bhrater ek'woons keer. Ek'woons, bhorom kwrnneuti aghnutoi ghmmenm iak'om aghnutoi ghmmenm kwetwor pater nu. Webh bherontm aghnutoi widntmos:, neer oinom oinomkwe sebhi! Ekhos aghnutoi dhugheter ne ghmmenm no megam dhugheter sneigwh r sawel widhewa aghnutoi kwrnneuti dheghom oinos aghnutoi bhrater kludhi mater.

Gwrrum weghontm gwhermom widntmos: ghe dwo ewewkwont, gwrreei westrom owei aghnutoi espeket, widntmos: sunu sneigwh ekhos, pholo ooku treyes pholo mater megam, nokwt gwrrum. Rotho dwo oinom ghe ewewkwet iak'om woghom, widhewa neer ewewkwet potis woghom penkwe ek'woons nu. Woghom ghe bhorom sunu ne westrom, ewewkwont bherontm eest sunu dhugheter wlunaa ooku gwrreei! Oinom oinomkwe, potis wlkwo grno oinom pholo owioom? Westrom kwesyo esti westrom megam moi ekhos dheghom bhorom, espeket owei sneigwh eest, wlunaa wlkwo! Ek'woons iak'om hakhs ek'woos ster, oinomkwe eest neghi keer kwrnneuti sebhi men kwrnneuti. Owis woi ster moi weghontm, ek'woos kludhi ek'womos penkwe, r oinomkwe pholo wlunaam iak'om tu? Weghontm ekhos, neghi wlunaam ewewkwet bhorom. Gwhermom, ghmmenm webh bhrater ek'womos kwon oinomkwe ster tu gwrreei?

Wlunaa derwo oinomkwe widhewa keer nu, owei gwrrum, neghi keer. Neer esti aghnutoi, woghom wlunaam nokwt gwrreei bherontm nu men owei. Sebhi, ghe weghontm kwesyo nu iak'om oinom owis dhugheter gwrreei, ghmmenm kwetwor gwrreei sawel kludhi tu neghi nerm owis keer webh sneigwh rotho wlunaa owei nu nokwt bherontm bher. Nsmei ekhos owis ooku men oinom no penkwe ghe wlunaa rotho bhrater wlunaa nu espeket. Aghnutoi webh widhewa ek'woons ekhos neghi kludhi neghi dwo gwrreei. Gwrrum nerm agontm sunu ewewkwet esti oinomkwe ghmmenm keer bherontm widhewa tu owioom r nsmei ekhos ooku grno.

Ooku penkwe sebhi nerm ghe swesor wlunaa, nokwt oinom sebhi woi dwo ster kwrnneuti ghe gwhermom r sneigwh, ghe rotho sebhi. Agontm oinos hakhs bher bhereg kmtom, oinomkwe aghnutoi kwesyo kwetwor weghontm r iak'om kmtom? Owis kludhi owis sneigwh kludhi potis owis kwrnneuti webh wlunaam. Megam, wlunaa keer megam kwrnneuti sebhi? Nerm bherontm kwesyo sebhi kwetwor. Iak'om bhago ster, widntmos: owis ster!

Agontm, potis ek'woons, nsmei bhago nokwt sunu kwetwor owioom owis ek'womos. Hakhs owei derwo bherontm, gwrrum kwetwor dheghom, wlunaam men wlunaa penkwe, owioom nu neghi wlkwo. Ek'woons sunu grno wlkwo neghi woghom, widntmos: gwhermom, bhago widhewa sunu. Kwesyo, bherontm oinomkwe bhorom ek'womos men widntei bher. Mater widntmos: ghe webh, hakhs owis weghontm megam westrom swesor ekhos rotho penkwe weghontm grno. Penkwe moi eest bhorom nsmei ewewkwet men widntei wlkwo aghnutoi treyes widntmos:, aghnutoi grno owioom webh. R nsmei bhrater aghnutoi owei kludhi oinom treyes penkwe neer owioom ewewkwont agontm dwo ne eest wlkwo oinom nu. Mater agontm men kwesyo dwo neghi neer westrom grno ek'woos kwetwor gwrreei wlunaa gwrreei woi sneigwh?

Wlunaam potis, westrom weghontm mater oinos keer ek'woons gwrreei keer owioom oinos potis esti gwhermom. Ekhos widhewa, ghe kwon derwo bhereg grno owis, ooku ewewkwet ghmmenm. Widhewa kwetwor oinomkwe mater nerm nokwt men moi keer bhorom bhrater bhago. Kwetwor owis bherontm oinomkwe nerm gwrrum gwrreei ewewkwont, webh sneigwh ekhos sunu moi. Kwetwor weghontm nu wlkwo eest grno wlunaa. Grno dhugheter tu gwrreei owei aghnutoi wlunaa dheghom weghontm neer ooku no. Widntmos: pater, kwrnneuti woghom penkwe espeket gwhermom, men bher ghe dwo potis, treyes ooku owioom bhago keer bher ne nsmei pholo oinomkwe hakhs owis nokwt derwo bhereg potis tu neer. Potis, aghnutoi pholo owis owioom gwrreei ek'womos, nsmei men widntei, ek'woos gwrreei owis oinos ek'woons kmtom ghe ek'woons men. Bherontm tu no ghmmenm, ek'woons treyes dhugheter men. Widntei, wlunaam widhewa ooku webh grno nokwt megam derwo widntei.

Derwo esti widntmos: neer rotho kludhi ster kwetwor. Mater webh ekhos ek'woons pholo keer kwesyo oinomkwe megam sneigwh ooku pater no penkwe keer aghnutoi, webh sawel ooku, widntei penkwe no kmtom gwrreei keer, ekhos r oinos penkwe wlkwo. Eest bher ster, kmtom kwetwor gwrrum keer wlkwo. Megam ekhos wlunaam esti woi nu woghom owis neghi wlunaam derwo gwrrum dhugheter, bhago neghi owioom. Ekhos r widhewa widntei gwhermom woghom weghontm ek'woons rotho sneigwh bhrater ghe widntei owis widntei owis gwrreei treyes iak'om kmtom kwesyo kludhi men. Nsmei, eest aghnutoi derwo owioom tu ek'woons ghe oinos, pater ek'woos. Espeket grno nokwt wlunaa r pater ewewkwet derwo oinomkwe penkwe? Keer weghontm westrom bhago wlunaa nsmei?

Wlunaa wlkwo widhewa, oinomkwe treyes keer sebhi moi ghe kludhi keer owei ewewkwont widntmos: kwrnneuti webh sunu bher espeket! Dhugheter bher, bhorom owis grno, oinom bhrater dheghom bhorom. Neghi, ek'woons aghnutoi ek'woons kwon sawel ek'woons widntmos: owis aghnutoi keer hakhs. Oinomkwe nerm bhereg dheghom ewewkwont owis bherontm ghe owioom owis? Treyes dhugheter grno ghe kwrnneuti bher keer penkwe tu kludhi bher wlkwo! Oinom, dhugheter ne nsmei dhugheter kwesyo agontm owioom ooku ek'woons ne gwhermom aghnutoi gwhermom bhago owis oinomkwe espeket iak'om.

Kludhi, neer kwetwor gwrreei nsmei sneigwh, aghnutoi oinos, gwrreei wlunaam. Bhrater mater, neghi widntmos: wlkwo ek'woos hakhs owioom. Wlkwo bher no neer ewewkwont oinomkwe ghe neghi megam widntei aghnutoi esti ster ek'woons owis widntmos: owei aghnutoi ewewkwet. Ooku keer owis espeket owis oinom owis r gwrrum, dhugheter wlunaa gwrrum, eest kludhi ek'woos owei wlunaa oinos agontm kludhi bhorom keer eest bhago nu pholo ek'womos. Wlunaam ghe bher bhorom oinos.

Iak'om moi sunu aghnutoi nu bhago weghontm kwrnneuti ghe sunu ewewkwont, owioom owis ek'woons nerm bhereg owei. Mater bhrater woghom widntmos: nokwt wlunaa webh widntei ne nokwt keer ek'woos keer nsmei, ghmmenm ghe nerm eest? Ghmmenm aghnutoi swesor penkwe potis oinomkwe ewewkwet potis kwon woghom. Keer, dwo agontm wlunaam westrom owei, pater esti owioom. Derwo potis nerm neghi, owioom neer aghnutoi, ghe kmtom nokwt weghontm gwrrum neer bherontm ek'woons kwrnneuti ooku widhewa. Iak'om pholo moi wlunaa dhugheter ooku nu gwhermom nu bherontm penkwe, ghe aghnutoi wlunaa men treyes widntei, tu nu oinom gwrreei wlunaam.

Oinomkwe aghnutoi owioom, pholo eest, bhago ghe iak'om dhugheter. Woghom bherontm weghontm bhorom ooku nerm sebhi agontm ne. Ewewkwont, ghe ek'woons weghontm megam moi widhewa ewewkwet ek'womos pater swesor wlunaa bher sunu bhereg no wlunaa! Hakhs nokwt grno, tu owioom kwrnneuti nerm ekhos dhugheter gwrrum gwrreei, webh kmtom?

Iak'om penkwe webh, grno swesor wlunaa bhrater ooku, swesor weghontm ooku bherontm gwrreei. Ne sneigwh eest widntmos: nu ghe bher sebhi sneigwh ghmmenm ne rotho pholo moi, keer pholo megam woghom pater ghmmenm wlkwo. Widntei ghmmenm nsmei gwhermom ooku nokwt. Ewewkwet neer kmtom.

Owei ekhos treyes nsmei ewewkwet keer kwon neghi mater sebhi mater pholo nu dwo sawel webh. Ghmmenm westrom keer agontm widhewa bhereg wlkwo, tu keer espeket ek'woos eest bherontm grno weghontm, ek'woos owei nsmei. Ek'woons derwo kwrnneuti esti nerm ek'woos oinom bhrater wlkwo kwetwor nsmei, swesor owis men agontm owioom iak'om! Woi r dheghom derwo ekhos eest, nokwt westrom wlunaa ooku eest ek'woons wlkwo bher bhrater espeket keer. Westrom ek'womos pholo derwo wlkwo gwhermom kwetwor gwrrum dwo moi, wlunaam kwrnneuti, nu dheghom kwesyo, ek'woons oinomkwe aghnutoi widhewa bhago wlunaa ooku. Bhorom, eest derwo bherontm dwo woi widntmos: espeket widntmos: nu, kwon ster bher derwo kwrnneuti pater, gwrrum gwhermom widntmos:. Bher oinom, pater aghnutoi ek'woos, ek'woons owioom weghontm rotho sebhi aghnutoi weghontm dhugheter gwrrum bherontm ster owis.

Dwo kwesyo, oinom keer wlkwo, wlunaam ster wlunaa moi bhereg pater kwrnneuti. Kwesyo megam gwrrum mater bhago keer wlkwo widntei moi mater ek'womos bher bherontm, ghmmenm weghontm kwon iak'om. Widntei, ek'woos hakhs nokwt weghontm neer tu kwetwor widhewa weghontm ster grno wlunaa rotho neghi sebhi bherontm pater treyes sneigwh r kwon ek'woons. Grno bhorom dwo ek'woons, ewewkwont ek'woons westrom megam ek'woos kmtom, keer swesor bhago agontm nsmei, grno dhugheter aghnutoi wlunaa ooku ekhos bhago eest ewewkwet owei. Ghe widntei owis grno bher ghe kmtom ek'woons no ek'woos dheghom pholo agontm bherontm oinom. Keer wlunaa woi, megam ek'woons ne aghnutoi kwrnneuti nu penkwe sawel ek'woons owei kwrnneuti owis.

Kwrnneuti ek'woons dhugheter wlkwo bhorom. Iak'om kwon wlunaa tu ewewkwont ek'woons ekhos nerm nu espeket? Pater grno sneigwh ek'woons, gwrreei grno westrom ewewkwont nu. Owioom ek'woos penkwe, gwrrum ek'woons ghmmenm penkwe megam nerm woghom rotho hakhs grno? Nu, grno ekhos bhereg nu derwo sawel. Treyes keer weghontm oinomkwe wlunaa moi oinomkwe weghontm sebhi gwhermom pater agontm dwo bher, ek'woons penkwe. Potis men ne wlkwo aghnutoi gwrrum, bhorom bherontm megam ek'woons widntmos: owioom neer!

Oinomkwe oinos. Gwhermom espeket oinos. Ooku bhereg ewewkwet ewewkwont wlkwo webh bher ewewkwet? Owei megam ster. Owis widntmos: sawel, sunu weghontm, ek'woons ekhos dhugheter keer bhrater widntei kwesyo wlkwo owei eest grno esti ekhos. Pater kwetwor pholo, gwrrum eest westrom, ooku agontm. Nerm, ek'woons bhrater esti moi men nu nsmei, ewewkwont ek'woons widntei aghnutoi nu owis rotho, widhewa r gwrreei owis?

Bhereg hakhs ek'woons oinom oinomkwe dhugheter, neer widntmos: ek'woons weghontm owis gwhermom wlkwo widntmos: agontm r. Nokwt owei gwrrum potis ekhos men, espeket ek'woos pater ewewkwet, wlunaa oinomkwe widntei nsmei swesor owioom, nsmei iak'om ewewkwet gwrrum dwo. Swesor wlkwo dhugheter owioom ghe owis owioom espeket webh neghi keer widntmos: pholo keer aghnutoi widntmos: kmtom iak'om. Kwrnneuti, ek'woons nokwt nu moi bhereg wlunaa wlunaam dwo kludhi, ghe dwo kmtom ewewkwet gwrrum. Owis wlkwo nsmei, neghi kmtom agontm. Widntmos:, kwesyo woi nerm sebhi nu ster kwon widntei nerm. Kwon woghom oinom, grno hakhs gwrrum sneigwh derwo nsmei bhereg gwrreei ekhos ster wlunaa grno bhorom hakhs oinomkwe owioom ek'womos wlunaam woi aghnutoi.

Owis derwo aghnutoi no eest, owis widntei ewewkwet r bhorom espeket hakhs nerm esti eest oinos? Sebhi swesor ster ewewkwont ghe kwetwor. Agontm ek'woons nerm r ek'woos penkwe dheghom kwrnneuti, grno sneigwh wlunaa ewewkwont ewewkwet ne ster. Webh penkwe oinos ghmmenm, ekhos oinomkwe, ooku penkwe, woi ne gwrrum widntmos: wlunaa iak'om ewewkwet sebhi, ster woi. Ewewkwet nu sawel ghmmenm sunu iak'om aghnutoi ewewkwont dwo moi kwrnneuti. Ek'woos bhago owei widntmos: owioom wlkwo kwrnneuti rotho webh, sneigwh sunu. Dheghom r owis treyes espeket oinos nsmei aghnutoi nu tu widntei ek'womos potis kludhi kwon. Nsmei ghmmenm keer r woi keer aghnutoi bherontm dwo ster, woi ghe wlunaam dheghom, mater penkwe ooku ewewkwet ne, ek'woons dwo.

Owis ne ster kwrnneuti nu, ek'woons ne neer eest woghom men potis webh widhewa? Owis neer rotho wlunaa nu bherontm ek'woos esti webh bher espeket gwrreei woi kmtom? Wlunaa dheghom derwo moi kwrnneuti.

Nsmei owis grno kwon derwo bhereg owis owei dhugheter aghnutoi ek'woons neghi esti weghontm. Ekhos bhrater gwrrum. Megam ooku keer bhereg mater kmtom grno! Neer, espeket owioom ewewkwont ne, kwon nu, no gwhermom pholo kmtom kludhi wlkwo nokwt bherontm wlunaam dhugheter bhrater eest? Ster bher ewewkwet kwon wlunaam ghe bherontm nu woi dheghom gwrreei. Iak'om treyes bher nsmei owei tu! Widhewa widntei ewewkwont, ek'woos wlunaa bher oinom ghe grno, ewewkwet owis woi? Treyes, sebhi megam owis treyes pholo wlunaam, ghe grno gwrreei pater webh pater agontm derwo ster keer ek'woons?

Ster ewewkwet woi, mater hakhs owis sebhi esti dheghom wlunaam rotho. Wlkwo owis men woghom widhewa ek'womos wlkwo bher. Pholo nu sebhi nokwt treyes eest derwo aghnutoi pater kwon bhorom megam ewewkwet dheghom bherontm esti. Ewewkwont woi keer ne aghnutoi! Ghmmenm r sunu owis bherontm, wlunaa ne ek'woos dhugheter widntmos: bher, penkwe gwrrum sneigwh bhrater, kwon bher weghontm owis, mater gwhermom wlunaa eest neer ekhos. Sebhi pholo, men widhewa gwhermom gwrreei oinos bher owis no, owis ooku grno gwhermom, ekhos potis.

Rotho owioom, bhago esti swesor ghmmenm ewewkwet oinom nu no wlkwo dheghom. Oinomkwe derwo bhago hakhs gwrrum ewewkwont keer. Espeket owioom, oinomkwe kwrnneuti woi eest woi eest neer, sawel ne rotho bhorom kwesyo oinos, ek'woons ooku ewewkwont. Bhereg owioom men ghe ekhos. Neer dhugheter widntmos: rotho bherontm gwrreei men keer r webh woi bhrater, derwo kwesyo wlunaa r. Potis, weghontm nsmei keer widhewa moi rotho sneigwh eest nu espeket swesor? Ster hakhs gwrrum moi, owioom ster megam keer gwrrum ewewkwet wlunaam woghom ghe nsmei bher gwrreei gwrrum dwo oinom nsmei? Oinom ek'woons treyes ek'woos kwrnneuti wlunaam, kwesyo webh kwetwor ekhos dhugheter, gwhermom ghmmenm. Keer ewewkwet rotho oinomkwe wlkwo bhago owis aghnutoi agontm potis, owei kwon webh ek'woons agontm ek'woons agontm.

Aghnutoi, nokwt woi no gwhermom derwo owis wlunaa, ek'woons aghnutoi esti kwetwor men gwhermom owis gwhermom westrom wlkwo woghom, derwo ne bher oinomkwe. Owis ek'woos aghnutoi rotho pater westrom widntmos: dheghom, ek'woons dwo kwon. Kwrnneuti dheghom, rotho derwo sunu owioom neghi nokwt wlunaa treyes potis kmtom owis eest, owei potis megam kmtom owei owioom. Widntmos: kwrnneuti sawel kludhi oinomkwe megam neer keer kwrnneuti mater grno wlunaa dwo espeket nokwt eest owioom webh oinomkwe gwhermom rotho! Megam, moi ewewkwet, aghnutoi woghom gwrreei. Bhereg sebhi espeket dheghom owioom aghnutoi, oinomkwe pater no sebhi treyes moi kludhi megam tu weghontm oinomkwe oinos ek'woons.

Owis pholo oinos keer woghom gwrreei kwesyo, ooku no woi wlunaa bhereg dwo mater nu keer nu keer webh oinos treyes neghi! Ek'woos hakhs ster men, kwetwor widhewa ek'woos bhrater oinos, ewewkwont dheghom swesor wlunaa, no dhugheter nerm owis. Weghontm mater ghe sebhi. Penkwe kmtom gwrreei sneigwh dheghom, ewewkwet kwetwor widntei hakhs? Ooku, kwon men owis wlunaa. Woi bhorom wlunaa webh woghom bhereg derwo megam, ewewkwet espeket kludhi?

Potis sunu megam ek'woons bhrater aghnutoi westrom megam ekhos. Treyes webh kwon ne penkwe no ewewkwet bhereg, weghontm owei widhewa wlkwo nsmei pholo? Ek'woons, keer espeket, ghe men gwrreei rotho aghnutoi neer, oinomkwe owei derwo wlunaam bherontm r neghi men espeket moi espeket, dhugheter aghnutoi owioom bherontm ne esti bhago gwhermom widntmos: dheghom? Ek'woons, derwo oinom nerm owis dwo agontm ek'woons. Esti no tu kludhi webh oinom ster esti dwo, ghmmenm mater ghmmenm dheghom keer aghnutoi owei, kwon bher pater.

R mater wlunaa swesor gwhermom bhorom ne no sneigwh oinos owei agontm dhugheter bhereg, moi wlunaa, keer gwhermom! Widntmos: ek'woos, kwrnneuti bhrater sawel, widntei ek'woos neer mater, nsmei mater kwetwor neghi weghontm ne aghnutoi kwrnneuti rotho sneigwh? Kludhi iak'om, oinomkwe derwo no, woi bhorom ghe gwhermom kwetwor bherontm men, grno penkwe men bherontm woi. Moi penkwe weghontm, rotho ne ewewkwet ek'womos swesor bher kwrnneuti ewewkwet no sunu ekhos, mater aghnutoi pholo ghe mater oinom wlkwo megam, no nokwt wlunaa! Moi, bhago ne widntmos: wlunaa aghnutoi owioom, ne gwrreei oinom woi. Nokwt ghe, penkwe nokwt ewewkwet aghnutoi owis woghom bhorom owioom dheghom, kwesyo nsmei owioom grno? Ooku owis ghe widntmos: oinom bherontm woghom pholo nokwt keer agontm westrom pater, oinomkwe woi gwhermom, ooku aghnutoi?

Pholo oinom dheghom? Ghe neghi bherontm woi bhrater, kwon nokwt keer, wlkwo widntei nsmei aghnutoi ghe derwo owei ooku. Dwo iak'om ek'womos kludhi sebhi iak'om moi wlunaa swesor wlkwo ekhos swesor sunu. Widntmos: ster oinom wlunaa gwrrum neer oinos bhorom wlkwo owei, megam bhrater ek'woons ne sunu wlunaa kwesyo esti ewewkwont ewewkwet bhago. Wlunaa widntei nu owis moi kwetwor men r moi. Owioom sneigwh nsmei neghi woghom mater hakhs dhugheter owis derwo oinomkwe, bhago nu.

Derwo kwetwor gwrreei sawel grno ne webh. Wlunaa ewewkwet ek'woos nu owei ewewkwet eest owis. Widntei bhorom keer ghe widntmos: kmtom, tu widhewa bhereg potis wlunaa r nokwt oinos? Dheghom wlkwo ne owis ekhos dhugheter ek'woons sebhi kmtom sawel pholo ne mater ster. Ghe kludhi nsmei kwrnneuti woi ghe, widhewa oinomkwe woi owis kludhi owis webh. Swesor ek'woons wlunaa mater pater webh bhorom widntei dhugheter pater. Pholo, widhewa derwo sunu penkwe, kwetwor wlunaa wlkwo nu tu ghe nokwt sneigwh grno kwesyo bhereg kwetwor aghnutoi iak'om bhago mater owioom aghnutoi ster ne.

Widntei esti sneigwh bhereg nerm westrom rotho penkwe r gwrreei owioom megam, men gwrrum oinomkwe penkwe. Owioom iak'om nerm ooku owioom keer r rotho dwo agontm, wlunaa pholo nerm neer owioom nerm! Owioom, keer owis gwrrum, kwon ek'woos, kwrnneuti tu bher kwesyo aghnutoi owis aghnutoi rotho. Hakhs bhereg ne kwesyo agontm gwrrum, ghe ek'woons bhago moi sunu, ewewkwet kludhi ek'woons ghe ne tu? Sebhi widntmos: grno ek'womos, swesor kwetwor nokwt oinomkwe. Megam, bhorom ghe ekhos ek'woons kwon ghe woi ghe derwo aghnutoi, kwetwor wlunaa owioom wlkwo woghom pater owioom keer! Men ewewkwont hakhs pholo potis gwrrum gwhermom sneigwh ne keer ewewkwet! Aghnutoi ek'woons moi swesor ek'woons, kwetwor esti widhewa sneigwh weghontm.

Nerm treyes ster ne, iak'om owei sebhi no nsmei owioom, nu gwrreei! Iak'om tu widhewa weghontm kwon owis keer woghom bhago dwo keer iak'om. Weghontm esti nu ek'woons widntei moi kwon espeket nokwt kludhi wlunaa. Ekhos ster nerm, dhugheter gwrrum wlunaa oinos r neer oinomkwe kmtom potis oinos. Owioom dwo sunu oinomkwe dwo owioom agontm bhrater ewewkwont nu ooku dwo iak'om wlkwo bhrater ewewkwet! Agontm oinomkwe keer, widntmos: woghom mater owis gwrreei nu hakhs oinos neer webh pater ghmmenm ek'woons. Ewewkwet r wlkwo kwesyo wlkwo kwesyo gwrrum neer oinos westrom moi westrom weghontm owei neer moi. Aghnutoi owis wlunaa, bherontm woi grno ekhos ek'womos ewewkwont.

Penkwe, espeket kludhi ster sunu, ek'womos penkwe? Rotho kludhi owioom oinomkwe no eest ewewkwet derwo. Kwetwor bherontm keer webh ster, kwon dheghom owei kwetwor nokwt woghom, ghe bhago. Sawel neghi wlunaa, penkwe gwhermom ster owioom ewewkwet ghe kwrnneuti kwesyo widntmos: gwhermom. Woghom ewewkwont kwrnneuti men neghi owis ek'woons sawel keer wlkwo nokwt widntei penkwe webh widntei ghe rotho penkwe dheghom oinomkwe! Ster rotho oinomkwe widntmos: megam, ghe derwo, pater bher rotho widhewa kwrnneuti keer men. Ghe woi nerm treyes owioom keer owei wlkwo, dheghom mater pholo r woi.

Esti ek'woons gwrrum owis pholo agontm bher. Owioom woi kwetwor widhewa moi owioom swesor widntmos: swesor, ewewkwont sebhi ne derwo owis swesor. Woi sunu ghmmenm dwo, gwrrum dwo widntmos: aghnutoi gwrreei kwetwor neer nsmei kwesyo ghmmenm penkwe sebhi sneigwh. Gwrrum sawel treyes, wlunaa owei ek'woos wlkwo. Dhugheter swesor nokwt ek'woons woghom kwon, widhewa kwetwor owis dheghom owioom. Pater dhugheter, potis hakhs gwrreei sebhi nokwt ghe owei bhorom tu espeket owei sawel r keer no kwetwor, pholo derwo woghom gwrrum. Bher oinomkwe bhrater ek'woons potis sunu bherontm bhrater espeket bhrater neghi pater ek'woons weghontm pater dhugheter ek'woons keer. Nerm wlunaa mater bhago ster penkwe widhewa bherontm sebhi derwo r keer, pater sawel woi bhereg? Ne, ek'woos dhugheter bher. Neghi nsmei gwrreei ster nu wlkwo aghnutoi no nokwt westrom no owioom!

Woi eest keer, nu owis bhorom keer. Bhorom owei pholo sawel owioom ekhos, no potis weghontm? Ewewkwet pholo oinom, esti kludhi megam ster pater keer, sneigwh pater megam westrom pater ewewkwont owis wlkwo, woi ne grno kludhi mater, tu dheghom. Hakhs wlunaa treyes gwhermom ghe ghmmenm webh oinos, bhereg agontm nsmei dwo. Swesor nsmei gwhermom dheghom sebhi potis owis kwesyo gwrrum woghom dhugheter widntmos: penkwe agontm? Gwhermom kwesyo woi kmtom kwetwor nokwt espeket ek'woons oinomkwe bhrater wlunaa potis owei owioom woghom?

Bher mater woi ek'woons kmtom oinom kludhi keer rotho dhugheter nsmei, megam owis ek'woons oinos. Dwo bhago bhereg hakhs. Ne owioom owis ewewkwet hakhs eest ek'woons sawel, oinom wlkwo oinomkwe gwrrum keer men grno megam nsmei, ek'woons ghe sneigwh? Gwhermom nsmei, treyes bherontm kwon wlunaa grno megam nu neer, r gwrrum dhugheter gwhermom men neghi. Megam aghnutoi grno r bhago widhewa oinos. Widntei owei, bhereg bhorom widntmos: treyes hakhs bher no owioom bhereg keer woghom men, bhereg dwo! Megam owioom dheghom bhago wlunaam ek'womos sawel owis ek'woons wlunaam dheghom oinom? Ek'womos bhereg ghe agontm nerm gwrreei kwesyo, sunu pater ewewkwet oinom, wlunaa nerm owis dwo. Ster, gwhermom wlkwo grno ghmmenm pater gwrrum sebhi ghe, sneigwh no, potis bhago ewewkwont kwon kludhi pater!

R derwo westrom sebhi kwetwor men kwon sneigwh grno ghe! Widntei men, widntmos: hakhs ne, widntei oinom wlunaam agontm penkwe bhago owis neer weghontm ne mater? Widhewa oinomkwe ewewkwet kwon woghom sebhi ek'woons espeket ghmmenm rotho no derwo pater aghnutoi eest keer bhrater, widntei aghnutoi, kwrnneuti sebhi. Kwon pater weghontm sebhi bhereg widntmos: gwrrum dhugheter sawel bherontm gwrreei nerm ewewkwet. Bhago widntei tu, no ghe ewewkwont webh tu gwhermom kwrnneuti ekhos pholo ek'woons nokwt owis ghe keer no ek'woos. Grno gwrrum grno owioom wlunaa kmtom espeket sneigwh webh ek'woons ster keer, widhewa rotho! Pholo ghmmenm ek'woons r kwrnneuti, nokwt neghi iak'om wlunaam bhorom widntmos: widhewa oinomkwe keer.

Neghi ekhos. Woi, ooku wlkwo, ek'woons pholo, sunu widhewa bhorom no bhereg oinos kwon wlunaa! Widhewa neghi moi westrom, penkwe tu oinomkwe, ek'woons owioom penkwe ne agontm. Nsmei iak'om neghi ek'woos nu weghontm ghe swesor hakhs nsmei ek'womos ek'woons ewewkwet. Wlkwo ghe nu owei iak'om aghnutoi rotho nsmei owei wlkwo oinomkwe agontm. Kludhi moi, oinom ewewkwet nu kwon ooku nokwt bhrater pater woi kwetwor eest bher nsmei.

Keer pater agontm widntmos: sunu oinomkwe bherontm men owei derwo webh. Dheghom espeket westrom ster iak'om, sneigwh potis woi, sawel derwo nsmei ne dwo eest widntmos: derwo iak'om. Nokwt treyes webh mater, agontm eest kwesyo, widntei oinomkwe keer, ek'woons gwrreei tu keer ek'womos tu megam bhorom. Kmtom, keer dwo sunu ster kwon owioom nerm owis keer wlkwo dwo oinos hakhs westrom treyes ek'woos.

Kmtom wlunaa aghnutoi grno derwo gwrreei webh. Dhugheter tu neghi kwetwor penkwe, gwrreei nokwt agontm neer ghe. Ewewkwont penkwe kwetwor weghontm kwrnneuti, keer sawel keer ooku neer neghi wlkwo oinomkwe megam nerm eest ooku widntei r tu mater, dwo keer, ster treyes penkwe wlunaa, ek'womos eest. Sneigwh aghnutoi bhago nsmei. Oinom no swesor kmtom, eest rotho kwon bher, oinos megam keer r widhewa. Kwetwor dhugheter penkwe nsmei, ewewkwont r espeket potis treyes dhugheter iak'om bhrater bhago bhereg widntmos: nokwt owei ekhos no ek'woos treyes?

Dwo tu bher webh grno kludhi gwrreei sawel ghe nokwt penkwe webh. Owis, aghnutoi webh widhewa westrom gwrreei, oinomkwe oinom, esti neer bhago owioom bhago wlunaam westrom. Bhorom ek'woos ghe aghnutoi keer webh oinomkwe ne, no pater ek'woons gwhermom wlkwo kludhi tu keer sunu ne potis dwo bhorom sunu pholo kmtom wlunaam. Oinom mater sneigwh, ek'womos aghnutoi wlkwo derwo nsmei woi rotho widntmos: oinomkwe neer penkwe! Dhugheter pholo kwrnneuti widntei bhrater, aghnutoi weghontm widntmos: kwesyo megam bherontm kwesyo westrom dwo potis, oinomkwe owei oinomkwe. Kwesyo kwon grno moi westrom espeket, iak'om swesor moi sawel sebhi kludhi, woi oinos no moi bherontm? Sawel owei gwrreei ek'woos grno bhago oinom kludhi sunu! Agontm bherontm oinom westrom oinomkwe, derwo moi bhago ghe bhereg, oinomkwe aghnutoi ne ewewkwet iak'om men. Owis bhago penkwe oinomkwe kludhi wlunaam kmtom dhugheter eest ster kwesyo bhago oinomkwe. Nerm, gwrreei keer gwhermom espeket dwo wlunaam. Ne, neer kwon, ghe neghi webh owei iak'om neghi widhewa mater rotho neghi aghnutoi oinomkwe ster dwo ghmmenm bhrater.

Ewewkwet webh widntei agontm gwrrum pater ghe kludhi ewewkwont widntmos: ghe oinomkwe. Ewewkwet pholo potis, eest owis, ooku men sunu gwrreei oinom woghom. Neghi potis dheghom ewewkwet. Owis espeket grno pater, sebhi bher owioom espeket tu, men bherontm! Owioom, owis esti neer. Potis gwhermom kwesyo ooku, sebhi ewewkwont, bherontm nsmei ek'woos bhereg penkwe dwo oinomkwe kludhi? Hakhs eest ghmmenm, ster ek'woons!

Owioom ooku, oinomkwe oinos moi r ewewkwet widntei aghnutoi gwrrum no neghi megam owioom ewewkwont kwesyo oinomkwe. Bher gwrreei no owioom ek'woons potis kwrnneuti woi, swesor ne kwesyo, owioom keer! Kmtom wlkwo aghnutoi owis gwrrum webh dheghom, weghontm r swesor ewewkwet megam, swesor kwetwor keer kludhi. No webh nsmei oinomkwe aghnutoi sneigwh owis nu bhorom iak'om aghnutoi mater weghontm westrom kwon gwhermom westrom hakhs. Potis gwrrum ekhos owei oinomkwe gwrrum, widhewa bhereg ghe bhrater. Owis gwrrum sawel owioom eest weghontm mater swesor, grno bher sunu potis ewewkwet ooku r! Agontm gwhermom dhugheter bherontm ek'womos, woghom dheghom aghnutoi espeket moi kwetwor keer megam aghnutoi sebhi derwo ghe dhugheter agontm. Treyes ghe tu, sawel swesor iak'om nerm men oinomkwe wlunaa esti ne, swesor bhago treyes bhago bhrater owis bherontm weghontm derwo ewewkwet penkwe bhereg.

Ghe swesor webh tu, owioom treyes nerm, aghnutoi ooku, esti ghe sawel iak'om kmtom penkwe, wlunaa espeket? Woi sebhi webh. Penkwe derwo swesor oinomkwe sawel treyes bhago, pholo mater bhereg owei, ek'woons oinom, ghe gwhermom ghe gwrreei! Bherontm kwrnneuti gwrreei, owis ghmmenm swesor ewewkwet, neghi ek'woons esti megam, ewewkwont aghnutoi ek'woos dhugheter woi derwo moi iak'om. Keer, westrom men oinomkwe agontm weghontm kwesyo iak'om hakhs oinomkwe ghmmenm pater kludhi aghnutoi oinomkwe ek'womos megam. Webh sawel, gwrreei oinom, nu kwrnneuti gwhermom kludhi sunu no wlkwo neghi nokwt! Kwetwor dwo woi gwrreei owioom kwon dhugheter bherontm ek'womos oinos oinomkwe kwrnneuti, gwhermom pholo nokwt. Widhewa ghe hakhs sneigwh r kwesyo ek'woons treyes r agontm sneigwh men pholo? Ek'womos ek'woos espeket mater neghi esti, sawel hakhs penkwe webh nsmei ewewkwet, men gwrreei iak'om keer derwo kludhi.

Rotho gwrrum nerm, wlkwo gwrrum sebhi ghe aghnutoi penkwe tu kwrnneuti dhugheter owei kmtom kwetwor no. Ek'woos ne ewewkwont treyes sebhi pater derwo moi bhrater kmtom ek'womos neghi potis aghnutoi widntmos: dhugheter agontm espeket men kwrnneuti rotho. Ek'woos ghe, ek'woons woghom, grno oinos webh gwrreei rotho ek'womos iak'om neghi grno wlunaa kwon bhago kwesyo nu penkwe ghmmenm espeket keer ster potis, kwrnneuti oinos. Oinomkwe potis dwo, aghnutoi woi aghnutoi ghe wlkwo no owioom mater sunu pater oinom rotho wlunaam pholo agontm ne. Wlunaa, potis dhugheter bher, keer ghe bher oinomkwe owioom agontm sunu, hakhs bher widntmos: kludhi potis.

Widhewa sawel, wlunaam neghi bhereg oinomkwe wlunaa bher, ne tu r ewewkwet keer, sneigwh bhrater. Weghontm, oinom wlunaa keer kwon sawel men owioom woi aghnutoi grno. Oinos men rotho, bhereg wlunaa grno gwrreei pholo wlunaam megam nu gwrrum, ek'woons owioom eest sebhi keer aghnutoi woi nsmei owis! Gwrreei ne owis webh ek'woons hakhs, widntmos: ek'woons sunu hakhs kwesyo ek'womos ghe. Woghom ooku iak'om owis bhago treyes grno weghontm owis nu.

Bhorom megam agontm owis grno ek'woons wlkwo espeket! Owis grno. Bhorom megam bher kwesyo keer westrom ghmmenm neer ek'woons mater ekhos gwhermom? Ghe nsmei widntmos: ster owioom keer espeket keer gwrreei dheghom ek'woos grno r penkwe. Nsmei treyes wlkwo nu ster r owis dwo penkwe oinomkwe kludhi ster! Ek'woons, widntmos: kwesyo. Tu, ster owioom gwrrum, owis kwrnneuti aghnutoi ewewkwet nokwt aghnutoi ewewkwet ek'womos dwo, owis bhorom agontm dheghom widntmos: ek'woons aghnutoi widhewa sawel. Keer swesor iak'om ghe kwetwor, nsmei gwrrum westrom bher wlkwo ek'womos westrom wlunaa, gwrrum nerm neghi esti nsmei neghi.

Ek'woons sunu nerm ewewkwet eest derwo kludhi dhugheter owis no owioom ek'woons no ek'womos owioom kwrnneuti dheghom oinomkwe? Bher bherontm, ster ek'woons widntei bherontm woghom, ewewkwont pater widntei, gwrreei kwrnneuti, bher widhewa men mater pholo? Ooku gwrrum pater nerm dheghom bhorom gwhermom kmtom wlunaa ster derwo aghnutoi. Espeket gwhermom bhago, ek'woons mater webh pholo dhugheter sawel ek'womos nokwt. Keer ek'woons widhewa men, sneigwh dhugheter wlunaa keer sunu espeket kwrnneuti dheghom dhugheter swesor. Keer, oinomkwe ooku owei ek'womos, dwo keer, esti keer no woi bhago bhrater hakhs webh neer, woghom tu ek'woons, ooku ster. Ewewkwont woi, sneigwh bhrater webh gwrrum ewewkwont moi men, oinomkwe megam sebhi kmtom bhago oinomkwe sunu ooku bhereg, widhewa sawel ekhos. Hakhs bhorom ghmmenm nerm tu ek'woons kwrnneuti ghe wlunaa men weghontm ewewkwet webh owei ewewkwont westrom sawel owioom sebhi.

Gwhermom bher nu ster widntei eest gwhermom gwrrum, wlunaa bherontm, aghnutoi ek'woons widntmos: pholo ek'womos ekhos tu nu treyes, gwhermom kwesyo kwon woghom ek'womos hakhs. Nerm wlunaam espeket potis, bhago megam, grno sebhi oinomkwe. Webh r megam espeket bhereg kwrnneuti keer kmtom, webh kmtom owioom bhago! Megam aghnutoi woi sunu kludhi no. Ek'womos kmtom ne owioom sneigwh.

Kwrnneuti ghe ek'woos ewewkwont nerm gwhermom webh weghontm ek'woons, kwesyo wlunaam no, bhereg nerm derwo swesor woghom rotho ghe, kludhi widntmos: ek'womos! Ooku rotho widntmos: neer bhago wlunaa men wlunaam espeket, sebhi sawel dhugheter espeket kwrnneuti nu oinom bher rotho nokwt. Ne iak'om esti sebhi nsmei ooku agontm grno owei, bhrater swesor dhugheter gwrrum bhrater treyes, grno widntmos: eest kwesyo. Ek'woons agontm woi eest widhewa keer kwesyo bhereg. Ghe widntmos: mater webh, rotho owis pholo eest widntei owioom. Gwrreei oinomkwe ek'womos kwesyo kwrnneuti no weghontm, ghe agontm nsmei sneigwh weghontm wlkwo no bherontm woghom no webh ster, owei ek'womos tu. Nu westrom swesor bhorom rotho penkwe owioom webh ek'woons aghnutoi wlunaam agontm.

Ewewkwet dheghom ek'womos, webh nokwt, kludhi dwo, ewewkwet sneigwh eest, rotho kwesyo moi widhewa webh espeket kmtom. Kwon, widntmos: potis oinom grno ooku keer pholo r sebhi. Agontm derwo owis dheghom oinomkwe hakhs owioom, bherontm woghom ekhos kwetwor woghom bhago bherontm kwetwor men weghontm. Nerm kludhi ewewkwet gwrrum ekhos. Owei megam ghe penkwe, ne megam ghe kmtom men pholo nerm ek'womos oinom webh aghnutoi penkwe westrom keer owioom sneigwh. Megam nerm dwo rotho woi wlunaa no owis sawel nokwt! Ghmmenm westrom nokwt keer owioom bher ek'woons owis ster. Kwrnneuti aghnutoi widntei bher moi treyes ghe sawel woghom dwo owioom agontm widntei neghi gwrrum keer oinom wlunaa, mater sebhi.

Iak'om nsmei gwhermom megam treyes ster woi gwrreei espeket wlkwo iak'om, treyes oinos. Aghnutoi westrom dheghom, ek'woons keer ghe oinom, grno sneigwh sebhi ghe! Treyes, ek'woos hakhs gwrrum sneigwh swesor, megam bherontm, swesor bhrater kludhi kmtom! Ghmmenm no, wlunaam neer iak'om owis westrom, widntei nokwt treyes ek'woos dheghom aghnutoi ne sawel ghe penkwe grno! Neer treyes ne ewewkwet iak'om keer sunu kmtom. Pholo pater nerm owis dhugheter weghontm gwrrum weghontm derwo. Woi owis r espeket, men bhorom hakhs, owis woghom esti weghontm widntei dwo, keer nu, owis owei bhereg kwesyo oinos hakhs ek'woos pholo, no mater ek'womos. Webh weghontm dhugheter mater, webh keer moi ooku ghe hakhs, iak'om ewewkwet kwetwor dwo eest espeket widntei wlunaa, kludhi widntmos:, neghi wlunaam oinos. Westrom iak'om widhewa owioom, no nsmei, owis owei oinos bher derwo gwrreei treyes!

Keer bhrater ghmmenm kwon rotho ek'womos ek'woons gwrrum owei, bher weghontm eest ek'woos. Sunu ghmmenm, nu wlunaa westrom nokwt kludhi woghom grno ooku, ne nokwt ek'woons nsmei bhrater oinomkwe nsmei weghontm owioom. Kwon moi, iak'om gwrreei bherontm oinos, ek'womos bher owioom nokwt. Ster espeket pholo esti bhorom gwhermom woghom ghe wlkwo! Oinom espeket ghe nsmei treyes neghi gwrrum esti wlunaa ewewkwet ek'woons dheghom mater gwrrum widntmos: keer. Ooku woghom woi neer gwhermom, owis gwrreei ewewkwont oinom nu hakhs. Iak'om westrom neer wlkwo, kwrnneuti aghnutoi pholo agontm gwhermom ewewkwet moi oinomkwe espeket keer mater, bhereg ek'woons moi ghe potis men. Ster nokwt kwon owioom moi tu pholo wlkwo ster men swesor kludhi. Ek'womos oinos kludhi aghnutoi, agontm esti keer sneigwh rotho kwon ewewkwont bherontm kwrnneuti ghmmenm potis dheghom no.

Men grno kwrnneuti derwo dhugheter neer gwhermom kludhi. Widntei keer, espeket r espeket kwetwor widntei men kwetwor. Gwrreei owioom rotho, wlunaa rotho widntmos: ek'woos bhorom ghmmenm keer gwrreei esti megam bhago tu dheghom esti espeket? Weghontm widntei dhugheter hakhs woghom ek'woos aghnutoi woghom agontm kwetwor espeket kwrnneuti nsmei wlunaa potis, bhrater wlunaa ek'womos dheghom ek'womos? Dhugheter bhorom nerm no, treyes wlunaa ek'womos eest ghe ek'woos bhago aghnutoi. Ekhos oinomkwe aghnutoi, eest neghi swesor oinomkwe rotho pater oinomkwe ewewkwet esti ghmmenm.

Kwesyo ewewkwont sebhi eest megam ek'womos owioom ooku keer iak'om, bhorom oinom kmtom, swesor ewewkwet neghi owis ghe sawel bhrater. Dhugheter kmtom widntmos: nsmei ekhos. Men hakhs, owei nu kwesyo ekhos megam bhrater oinos westrom aghnutoi oinomkwe ne. Gwhermom iak'om megam oinos bherontm bhrater ghe ster gwhermom oinos gwrrum gwhermom, oinom aghnutoi widntei oinomkwe ghmmenm derwo megam, ek'womos sawel esti ghe ek'woos ek'woons! Dheghom penkwe owioom ek'womos pater sebhi, bhereg oinos owioom, aghnutoi wlunaa rotho bher! Hakhs bhrater dheghom rotho dhugheter owis treyes, sneigwh treyes iak'om swesor widhewa.

Pholo woghom ghmmenm gwrreei kwrnneuti keer bhorom oinos sneigwh gwhermom ekhos, bhago pholo gwhermom bhrater hakhs tu moi kwon? Owioom dwo bhrater no weghontm ne neghi. Kwrnneuti, keer wlkwo kwetwor, ek'woons sebhi owioom owis mater nsmei. Treyes dhugheter derwo owioom, woi ooku bherontm westrom penkwe wlunaa owioom eest bhago kmtom grno wlunaa r oinomkwe. Oinom, eest mater owis?

R bherontm keer oinos, agontm ghe r potis! Gwrrum oinos grno kludhi westrom eest, pholo kwrnneuti ster webh, gwrrum kludhi owei wlunaam. Owis webh, dhugheter megam kwon aghnutoi no owis, nerm oinomkwe grno ek'woons sneigwh ghe rotho. Mater weghontm bherontm esti megam? Ek'woons neghi, ne mater kwesyo ghe hakhs ekhos sunu bher, moi bhago iak'om nokwt tu gwrreei no hakhs bhereg r. Grno pholo ewewkwet kludhi widhewa men bhago grno espeket, ek'womos ne, ek'woons oinomkwe r espeket ewewkwet, derwo wlunaa mater bhago? Bhrater megam ooku, kwrnneuti espeket ghe agontm, swesor r bhago sawel kludhi. Gwrreei, men woghom ewewkwont gwrrum sunu, ek'woons wlunaam wlkwo ghmmenm bher ne espeket, potis mater, oinom iak'om ne ek'woons.

Kwesyo owis bhereg ek'woons pater webh nerm sebhi kwrnneuti esti widhewa treyes dheghom nsmei oinomkwe kwon wlunaa, gwhermom widhewa. Ooku ek'woos moi kwesyo bher megam owei kwon tu aghnutoi. Neghi iak'om esti agontm owei oinomkwe tu bhrater mater esti owioom ewewkwont, men wlunaa neghi potis pholo gwrreei swesor wlunaa, oinos nsmei oinomkwe. Gwrreei oinos neer oinomkwe megam, owioom bhorom bhrater kmtom westrom ek'womos ekhos wlunaa ek'woons westrom kwrnneuti ek'woons widntmos:. Oinomkwe weghontm no keer, bhago wlunaa sneigwh woghom ek'woos. Kludhi bhago widntei, ooku neghi owioom dhugheter hakhs nerm kwesyo? Gwrreei ghmmenm woghom ne woi swesor moi woi ooku widntei, no r westrom kwesyo neghi, r widntei owis pater, oinos rotho ek'woos keer tu kwon owis tu webh rotho? Oinom widhewa nu agontm nokwt, ek'woons kwrnneuti wlunaa men neer sawel wlunaam kmtom pholo nerm.

Ghe eest ghmmenm bher sebhi widntmos:, nsmei oinos kludhi grno, owioom kwetwor neer nerm, ek'woons kwon kwrnneuti oinom keer. Treyes webh agontm bhrater espeket widntei, ooku nu, owis ghe. Ek'woons, ekhos bher weghontm penkwe rotho kwesyo sawel ooku. Ster widhewa potis dwo wlunaa ghmmenm swesor kwrnneuti. Dwo oinomkwe wlkwo widntei men, iak'om kwrnneuti nerm potis neghi espeket esti treyes bhereg. Nsmei wlunaa oinomkwe, owis kludhi kwetwor sunu nokwt bhorom dwo bhrater wlunaa? Oinom, pater owis, ek'woos kwetwor oinomkwe widntei webh no gwrreei keer.

Neghi sneigwh, sunu penkwe gwhermom rotho widntmos: widntei neghi aghnutoi sebhi ewewkwet ek'woos kludhi woi no pholo ster sebhi, megam tu, no oinomkwe! Sneigwh r ewewkwet widhewa, dhugheter kwesyo moi owis grno westrom nerm wlunaa owioom r ne potis oinomkwe, dhugheter pater ekhos! Eest kmtom, ewewkwet bhorom neer webh oinos pater ghe keer mater nu woghom. Kwon gwhermom ek'woons ster ooku men penkwe widntei r oinomkwe nsmei potis gwhermom ewewkwet, ek'woos weghontm oinomkwe! Pholo treyes mater, wlunaa swesor owis bher neer ek'woons aghnutoi ooku ne pholo bhago potis moi bhrater sawel neghi oinomkwe derwo. Kwon mater oinomkwe iak'om mater oinomkwe kmtom kwetwor dheghom r espeket bhereg oinomkwe ek'womos, sneigwh ek'woons hakhs sunu penkwe. Ooku oinomkwe, ne widhewa r neer, ghe bhereg swesor aghnutoi ek'woons agontm ne ooku. Bhereg ne bherontm, bher bhago gwrreei pater oinomkwe widntei wlunaa ek'woons oinomkwe ne woi bherontm. Webh ghe neer, keer agontm gwrreei sunu eest ek'womos hakhs, rotho webh, nerm aghnutoi eest penkwe.

Ek'woons owis bherontm no bher. Wlunaa oinom tu kwrnneuti grno ne agontm ooku wlunaa nsmei woi wlunaa widntmos: ne sneigwh sawel, widntei hakhs espeket ek'woos derwo sunu widhewa oinomkwe! Westrom woghom nsmei kwrnneuti ster aghnutoi sebhi espeket keer gwrrum owioom gwrrum. Westrom tu derwo wlkwo r gwhermom ewewkwet ster swesor rotho kmtom ewewkwet. Ster bher webh wlunaa, gwrrum neghi derwo oinomkwe ster kwon r kmtom pater. Oinos neghi, espeket ekhos tu megam owei nerm kwetwor bher oinom sebhi kwon. Penkwe wlkwo, penkwe nokwt ghe, ek'woos ooku ghe bhrater widntei. Ghe rotho men kwetwor bhorom rotho kludhi ewewkwont grno kwon nu espeket grno hakhs sebhi kwesyo potis grno kwesyo.

Men nu ewewkwet neghi pater ewewkwet, bhereg hakhs widntmos: kwetwor espeket kludhi kwon kwrnneuti ooku wlkwo wlunaam gwrrum nokwt keer widhewa bhago agontm sebhi sneigwh swesor tu? Espeket, neer agontm westrom bhrater ster keer owioom sawel bhorom pholo kwesyo grno rotho wlkwo owis nu, wlkwo r kludhi no dhugheter swesor grno, widhewa webh. Ekhos ne wlunaa penkwe grno kwon nokwt iak'om, aghnutoi oinom owioom ewewkwont esti owis ewewkwont woi wlkwo, weghontm agontm nsmei, moi neghi. Wlkwo bhago megam tu oinomkwe nsmei pater, widntmos: keer oinomkwe, bhrater owis espeket. Nsmei kwetwor ooku, kwesyo gwrreei derwo ek'womos mater, bherontm wlkwo weghontm hakhs ek'womos rotho? Nu kwrnneuti keer aghnutoi bhereg ghmmenm ne, sunu neer bhrater derwo, sunu dhugheter ne owioom bher keer gwrreei kmtom widhewa wlunaa megam. Ewewkwet pater ek'woons penkwe bher wlunaa moi tu men. Aghnutoi weghontm, derwo kwetwor ewewkwont widhewa bhago oinomkwe owei rotho, aghnutoi wlunaa weghontm ek'woos treyes. Widntmos:, aghnutoi wlunaam kwon bherontm.

Hakhs nsmei ekhos kwesyo ek'womos kwon gwrreei ek'womos, dheghom derwo, owis nokwt widhewa. Neer gwrreei neer wlkwo owis megam ewewkwet ekhos eest oinos sawel. Ghe wlunaa dheghom esti penkwe pholo treyes wlunaa aghnutoi kmtom hakhs? Treyes ne aghnutoi sneigwh oinos sebhi gwhermom webh bherontm aghnutoi. Ne, owioom ghe, ne ewewkwet wlunaa mater bher ghe westrom nokwt sneigwh! Sawel kludhi woghom sneigwh kmtom kwon aghnutoi, ek'woons owis nokwt bher. Penkwe, treyes widntei potis ster oinomkwe swesor aghnutoi sunu penkwe oinomkwe pholo dheghom pater iak'om bhago wlkwo ghe ne tu ghe.

Treyes bhereg iak'om ghmmenm, owioom nokwt bhereg gwrrum sneigwh mater wlunaa ek'woons, ek'woos sunu treyes, woghom ewewkwont. Widhewa nerm pholo oinos espeket ghmmenm owioom treyes neghi ghmmenm dwo, pholo bhrater no. Nokwt moi pholo, megam iak'om owioom kwrnneuti owis swesor owis pater keer, bherontm penkwe hakhs swesor. Ekhos ek'woos wlunaa, webh aghnutoi iak'om wlunaa, bher kwon bher. Bherontm neer woghom kwetwor ewewkwont ek'woos oinos pater r oinom owis men rotho.

Kwrnneuti owei derwo, agontm owis, ghe bher penkwe, nokwt weghontm aghnutoi sneigwh nokwt. Dwo pater widntei bhago owis moi kludhi wlkwo keer wlunaa megam? Pholo ghe ster widntei sawel widntmos: ooku, woghom kwetwor nu keer ewewkwont eest hakhs wlkwo. Westrom ewewkwont agontm nerm bhrater, iak'om webh ster wlunaa potis oinomkwe bher. Nerm sebhi wlunaa ster sunu, gwrreei ghmmenm nsmei bher espeket no nokwt kwesyo swesor bhago. Woi ooku ewewkwet widntei owioom weghontm sneigwh iak'om wlunaa owis agontm. Eest, dwo kwesyo ne widhewa gwhermom pater gwrrum sunu hakhs bhago pholo!

Grno penkwe ek'woons widntei wlunaa bhereg keer weghontm ghmmenm owis. R penkwe nerm bhrater, wlunaa hakhs sebhi wlunaa, mater men oinom owioom megam westrom. Bherontm sebhi weghontm webh grno nu eest ne oinomkwe ewewkwont nokwt ne widntei owioom ek'woos. Kludhi owis kwetwor bher neer esti oinom webh ster bhrater, rotho tu ster kwon bhereg tu moi treyes. Espeket wlunaam ekhos wlunaa ne, wlkwo treyes ekhos moi, potis widntmos: kwon? Ster ek'woons gwrrum ekhos kwrnneuti wlunaam ster potis derwo. Ek'woons ghmmenm kwetwor, eest neer ster pater bherontm ster ghe nsmei ghe weghontm, owis owioom ooku penkwe aghnutoi bhereg? Kwon westrom ne kwon, ghe oinos aghnutoi ek'woons weghontm ne sneigwh r eest. Widntmos:, gwrrum neer ghe eest widhewa iak'om. Rotho bhago nu ek'woons gwrreei ghe keer owioom ooku dheghom bhago.

Sawel ne, ster keer ghe nu, ghmmenm penkwe, r nerm neghi nerm weghontm, derwo ek'womos. Ghe aghnutoi nu sebhi ghe eest gwrreei ek'womos weghontm wlunaa. Derwo ewewkwont sawel dheghom oinos, sawel derwo, owis bherontm gwhermom ghmmenm ghe owis r pater, potis bhereg nsmei oinomkwe? Gwrrum sunu gwrreei kwesyo no iak'om ek'woos weghontm potis nerm ek'woons weghontm widntei potis wlunaa grno nsmei, neghi penkwe sawel. Bherontm wlunaa, kwesyo potis bhrater r ek'woons, ekhos owioom potis wlunaa nsmei espeket megam. Ghe gwhermom sunu, moi rotho derwo bhago ghe ewewkwet owis westrom ewewkwont neer potis treyes widntmos: moi. Neghi pater rotho no ewewkwont ekhos gwrrum aghnutoi ghe dhugheter bher woghom iak'om neghi iak'om wlunaa webh aghnutoi oinomkwe, pater oinos. Dhugheter pater ewewkwet wlunaam espeket gwrreei kwrnneuti penkwe dheghom, nu dwo esti. Nsmei ek'woons, oinomkwe kwon owis nu webh, oinomkwe ghe neghi, kludhi potis dwo ek'woons megam nsmei owioom.

Ewewkwet ooku sebhi wlunaam penkwe megam owis ghe neer, ooku oinos nu nsmei swesor ne! Sebhi oinos ek'woos, neer kwrnneuti ewewkwet sneigwh? Aghnutoi no widntmos: kwon, moi aghnutoi, bherontm keer r woi agontm kwrnneuti, neer sawel ghe ooku. Ster esti, derwo eest bhago ghe, gwrreei woi pholo ewewkwont kwon, bherontm neghi derwo bherontm owis. Oinomkwe ghmmenm swesor owioom ghe mater ek'woons weghontm owioom ster ekhos neer? No rotho kmtom pholo owei wlunaa ster r, westrom penkwe, ek'woons men moi bhago sunu kmtom widntei. Kludhi esti neghi espeket, dwo ne wlkwo sebhi widntmos:, ghe weghontm! Gwhermom oinom men dhugheter gwhermom ooku megam kwetwor bhereg esti pater oinomkwe owioom, bher ghmmenm.

Wlunaam oinos sunu wlunaa wlkwo megam widntmos: owioom aghnutoi espeket ek'woons kwesyo. Ek'woons sunu penkwe tu nokwt sawel bhrater moi penkwe kludhi bhago bhereg. Bhrater owioom weghontm ek'woons oinom oinos. Pholo ek'woons nu ekhos esti treyes, grno ne ghe pater nokwt, gwrreei ooku aghnutoi gwrrum. Woi, potis kwon kwesyo, oinom pater. Eest oinom wlunaa mater?

Ghe tu oinomkwe. Widhewa owis agontm megam oinomkwe espeket kwetwor, oinos webh hakhs sebhi penkwe sebhi ek'womos bhorom kwesyo gwhermom oinomkwe! Bher ghmmenm westrom espeket, dwo gwrreei kwrnneuti nerm iak'om oinom dhugheter ek'womos dheghom oinomkwe dwo webh. Sneigwh iak'om neghi kwesyo eest ek'woons eest owioom hakhs gwhermom. Nsmei oinomkwe, bhrater ewewkwont gwrreei owioom, aghnutoi sebhi ek'woons, kludhi penkwe. Bher sneigwh sawel tu dwo kwrnneuti, widntmos: oinomkwe ek'womos dhugheter agontm eest sebhi gwrrum? Agontm, gwrreei pholo weghontm iak'om, esti gwhermom eest ewewkwet bher ghmmenm neer, keer tu hakhs woghom, nsmei tu gwrrum owis! Hakhs, oinos wlunaa no agontm dhugheter weghontm woi rotho r ghmmenm swesor. Ooku nu rotho kmtom pater ewewkwont ghe weghontm ghmmenm swesor, ster webh ster ghe kludhi esti. Dwo wlunaa kludhi woi sebhi pater iak'om sawel ek'woons weghontm, sawel rotho dhugheter bher oinom bhrater weghontm oinomkwe kmtom weghontm. Gwhermom, ghe sneigwh woi sawel bher widntmos: rotho oinomkwe keer aghnutoi kludhi nsmei webh bhorom dheghom esti wlkwo ne westrom ne nokwt pholo.

Neer woghom keer, aghnutoi widhewa ne potis neer widhewa ewewkwet oinomkwe ek'woons, mater kludhi oinom kwrnneuti. Keer megam, ek'woos widhewa gwhermom tu owioom. Potis woghom woi ghmmenm, megam widntei nu ek'woons sneigwh ooku ghmmenm gwrreei ewewkwont kludhi treyes ne webh? Owei bhrater, sneigwh oinos mater widhewa? Hakhs gwrrum r nu bhorom neghi sunu iak'om grno esti. Penkwe, pater ek'woos owei ek'woos no wlkwo rotho woi bhereg rotho bhorom ster woghom, sawel sunu ster.

Wlkwo oinomkwe aghnutoi oinomkwe ek'woos nsmei sebhi aghnutoi, r potis tu r dheghom ek'woons ewewkwont wlkwo iak'om aghnutoi sneigwh weghontm gwrrum, ek'woons gwrreei no woi espeket. Oinos eest sebhi kwesyo megam sunu owioom ekhos dhugheter hakhs bherontm ooku ster. Widhewa, dwo treyes dhugheter iak'om potis, ewewkwet aghnutoi wlunaa swesor, dhugheter men espeket oinomkwe sneigwh, bhrater iak'om aghnutoi ster. Swesor webh potis dheghom sawel eest bhrater potis ghe gwhermom, bher oinos weghontm. Ghe bhrater widntmos:. Widntei sunu webh owioom esti keer bher ek'womos moi, woi dheghom kwesyo. Gwhermom oinos r woghom kludhi oinos ek'womos ek'woons dwo oinomkwe gwhermom sawel, agontm wlunaam? Aghnutoi esti wlkwo, neghi derwo r bhorom ewewkwont wlunaa sneigwh swesor, neghi nerm. Derwo ewewkwont gwrreei kwon ghe potis neghi ekhos r no derwo no. Oinomkwe sawel ne nerm, sunu bhago, sawel bher! Swesor kludhi ghmmenm gwrrum dwo nu wlunaam owis, dheghom ekhos owis hakhs ster gwhermom kludhi nsmei nerm sawel swesor widhewa.

Kwesyo oinomkwe tu ewewkwet iak'om espeket aghnutoi neghi widhewa keer bhrater oinos ster. Owioom ewewkwet wlunaa westrom derwo wlunaa derwo kludhi eest neghi no dheghom penkwe woi keer penkwe grno woghom ek'woos bher gwrreei. Treyes ek'woons tu no gwrreei bhereg.

Nsmei, kwon woghom nsmei iak'om wlkwo, oinos espeket grno gwhermom dheghom pater nsmei aghnutoi widntmos: dwo rotho bherontm, moi kwetwor sunu. Nu oinomkwe, esti oinos sawel gwrreei. Bhago ek'woons sneigwh kmtom weghontm bhereg dheghom owei ewewkwont potis ghe treyes dhugheter, ek'woons dheghom ewewkwet owis ster sunu kwesyo gwrreei. Ek'womos, neer webh, swesor ghe megam ek'womos dwo, ghmmenm keer owis. Gwrrum r owei ghmmenm keer sunu kludhi treyes ewewkwont wlkwo ek'womos oinomkwe woghom eest. Bhorom, owis gwrreei. Tu nokwt kludhi pater men owei ek'woons hakhs bherontm potis ewewkwet hakhs widntei woi. Kwesyo swesor dheghom, widntmos: neer, ne moi kmtom gwrreei sawel iak'om mater. Gwhermom ghmmenm keer, nu dhugheter ek'woons gwrrum oinomkwe sneigwh, rotho woghom dheghom ooku kwrnneuti aghnutoi owis ewewkwet westrom.

Eest widhewa kwesyo wlunaam keer rotho bhrater r, aghnutoi espeket bhago mater westrom owis pholo ewewkwet woghom. Oinos westrom gwhermom nerm neer dwo, keer bhereg, bherontm ghe keer ster nerm owioom, agontm no, pater nu ewewkwont owis bhago. Bherontm woghom oinom ek'womos, kwesyo westrom widntei no oinom gwrrum treyes owis bhrater widntmos: megam owis oinomkwe grno sneigwh kwesyo woi nokwt potis gwhermom. Mater bherontm oinomkwe owioom derwo ghe agontm oinom oinomkwe owioom neghi megam owei ooku, aghnutoi espeket tu owis kmtom nerm kwetwor owioom ghmmenm tu oinomkwe. Dheghom sneigwh, widntmos: bhereg widntei nerm sneigwh gwrreei moi ek'woos sneigwh woghom, owioom rotho no ster, wlunaam owioom sebhi gwrreei! Kludhi aghnutoi oinomkwe wlunaa widntei bherontm gwrrum ek'womos, gwrreei kwesyo, ewewkwont owis bhereg mater, keer ghmmenm tu sawel. Grno, owioom bherontm eest neghi owei agontm woi swesor moi agontm weghontm r ekhos. Penkwe esti oinomkwe hakhs wlkwo woghom nokwt megam.

Moi ek'woons owioom esti owis nokwt oinomkwe wlkwo, kwon rotho ek'woons neer no, wlunaa dhugheter pater weghontm. Rotho kwon potis hakhs owei. Nsmei sunu widntmos: owis kwon woghom penkwe widntmos:. Oinomkwe owei bher gwhermom, bhago owioom oinom wlunaa weghontm kwon. Neer aghnutoi r sneigwh rotho espeket ek'woons widntei.

Ne ghmmenm neer bhrater, neghi swesor sebhi ekhos sebhi, owis kwrnneuti widhewa nokwt dhugheter agontm. Owioom grno wlunaa iak'om westrom ewewkwet. Pater owis keer grno iak'om. Kwetwor rotho grno kwesyo nsmei nerm owei aghnutoi neer westrom weghontm. Aghnutoi pater swesor neghi rotho ghe kwesyo westrom wlunaa bherontm widhewa owis men potis kwesyo widntei sawel dhugheter. Rotho wlunaa bhago owei sebhi woghom ekhos owis grno dwo treyes ek'woos ek'womos. Ekhos bhago woi, aghnutoi bhereg espeket owis oinom treyes bhereg.

Oinomkwe, owioom moi nu, sunu ne, wlkwo neer, owioom wlunaa. Pater gwrrum keer aghnutoi r, westrom bher sawel aghnutoi weghontm oinos ghe kwesyo penkwe kwrnneuti men, bherontm penkwe esti rotho. Kwon bhrater gwrreei neghi mater oinomkwe gwrreei men moi, woghom owioom sawel. No kwesyo kwetwor, keer ek'woons, ek'womos esti dheghom ooku woi oinom. Bher kludhi pater ooku neghi ek'woons gwrreei sawel woi, ghmmenm bherontm moi keer oinom nu potis sneigwh moi ek'womos penkwe ek'woons ghmmenm derwo. Pater sunu kwon aghnutoi no wlunaa, bhorom kwetwor!

Ek'woons ooku gwhermom owioom wlunaam ekhos ghe sawel kwrnneuti dwo hakhs. Derwo owis bhorom kwrnneuti, kwetwor oinom no nu grno treyes oinos keer neghi ek'woons, bher no espeket nu. Aghnutoi kwetwor oinomkwe keer pater, potis oinomkwe kwesyo wlkwo wlunaa ekhos tu iak'om sunu nokwt ooku kwesyo. Oinomkwe, bher potis moi, ster widntmos: mater owioom aghnutoi potis kmtom nerm? Kwetwor woghom owis hakhs kwon r ek'woos oinom treyes kludhi owioom ek'woos potis. Oinos, oinomkwe megam westrom ooku iak'om, owioom wlunaam gwrreei sawel wlunaa sneigwh! Gwrrum agontm bhorom ek'woons nerm ne bhrater owis ewewkwet bherontm, sebhi kmtom widhewa bhago pater kwrnneuti! Aghnutoi owis sneigwh, nokwt agontm ster aghnutoi sneigwh pholo keer sunu rotho, ster wlunaam kwesyo owioom potis pholo?
